Kut ma yang ta tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men sakal wet sun taku, “Ngon tin kot pim men, e sakal i tin imen, men e ton mi pim maksin kha men.”

Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Auh, wom tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men, epo wom men wa endara tin mamaik men ko po po tunus tin khung nginan epo po ku lat i men, si wom tuo wom men ku kah po endara tin mamaik imen epo wili wom pon pon ta akomen.
Auh, epo wom ning uwin tin tanuan e ta po pokngin men, epo po inana wom tuo hi kha lek sun ko huu men.

Wungin tin wom ning i imen kha wom pok put wungin epo mi wom tin tunusngin pit wo wungin tin po ning i men ako. Epo irawin epo po men lek sun ko huu, ma wom kha ning uwin tin tanuan e po kil sun ko min kho men.

Sinsin tin imen kha mhin ekngin tin ta Got men sakal maksin taku, ‘Ngo ku tih po pokngin u po paengin tumen li epo po, ma po kara kuk mi sun tin imen, men kuli po lek sun ko huu u po ning i lengwal epo sun kut tumen,’
kumali kalolan tin ta po pokngin mosop men, tin yuk yukngin ko ewo maran tin mulusngin pho pongin ma me men, men ku lasin tan ko po po tin khuuk wal homan tin iyi, ma men kuli po kul i,

hosingin epo Abel kalolan li pol epo a-Sekaraia kalolan, tin po wini ko hun emin suyung tin po ning talungin won men u mang auluungin kut tumen. Wai, nga sakal ta wom, epo wungin tin mosop imen ku lasin tan ko po po tin khuuk wal homan tin iyi, ma men kuli po kul i weh.

Auh, wom tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men, epo wom klok enda tin po klas epon kuma po li sup epo maran ekngin men li. Wom tuo wom men ku lu sup akomen, kuru po tin taku li sup men, men wom ten ten eya hi kut tumen.”

Ma yang in e sakal i tin imen si ta po, men po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u po Parisi kut tumen hosi wungin epo po ku ning wungin amhees epo yang, ma po kines mi yang epo wungin munuman,
ma po kaun kuk e li li mi sun ma po haum epo yang tin ku pok put sakalngin ta tin ku po suo yang ton kuma po wa lasin ko po yang epon men.

Kut si po wa ilio angan hambip takut tin ku po tiik hi angan akomen kho me palu wal, wungin tin imen kha po khi hi sak po sun kara lunga hi kara men, men ma yang ko hosi sakalngin si ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men muk epo sun taku, “Wom haum tunus epo yiis tin ta po Parisi men, men wungin ta po tin nuk wo eha men kha men.
Epo endara tin pang pongin nuk homani men, tin kuli lasngin si in pi mlaeng som men, ku ta nuk akomen; u endara tin kaunngin nuk homani men, tin kuli po pong epon men, ku ta nuk akomen kut tumen.

Tumen ma sakalngin tin akani e wom sakal i mi pi tin mi ku men, men kuli po hul i pi mlaeng; u sakalngin tin wom sakal i ko mi kinga po mi lahembengin tin ung e li li mi mang emin men, men kuli po si pok put ili eluwi mang tin ung e li li men kut tumen.
Ma nga sakal ta wom tin tita it men, epo po tin lek sun emkusin a hi ko huu men, anima po ku ning wungin ta maksin kyok si po sun tin imen kyok akomen, men ku wom lem pit wo hi asin.

Si ngo ku suk mara wom epo po ta tin ku wom lem pit won weh men. Men ku wom lem pit wo yang tin ku lek wom ko huu, anima yang in to emhong tin ku yang whis wom kyok ko put ngi yau tin sindak men. Wai, nga wo ta wom, epo wom men ku lem pit wo yang tin imen weh!
Iyi, po tirih emon tururun khaut eip epo ulu tin turun weh men ponwal ako, wah? Ma emon tin kuk to mara Got imen ku yang tulun som epon ta akomen.
Epo yut wom tin wala nuk mhi wom men mosop men tiikngin kho ako. Tumen ma wom men ku lem asin. Epo enu wom men tunus weh epo emon tururun munuman kara ako.
Kuru nga sakal ta wom ti, taku po ta pok put ngo to mara po tunus, po tin imen kha kuli Wiru Po Tunus pok put maksin to mara tihngin tin ta Got men kut tumen.
Si taku po ta sup sup put ngo to mara po tunus, men ku nga sup sup put maksin to mara tihngin tin ta Got men kut tumen.
Ma taku po ta pok put sakalngin ewut Wiru Po Tunus, men ku lasin tan klokngin ako. Si taku po ta wa ton mingin ewut Emiun Auluungin, men ku lasin tan klokngin akomen.

Ma minan tin akani e ku po wa wom lu mang akotngin tin ung e li li men, u epo po tin mara hi pit wo sun men, u epo po tin emhong nuk si wut hi men tumen, men ku sila wom khing epo wom tin ku sakal wet po tua wa epo wungin tin ku wom sakal i men asin.
Epo Emiun Auluungin men ku kot wom minan tin wala imen siik epo sakalngin tin tunus epo wom ku sakal i men.”
Kut ma po ta tin in mi sun tin wa ilio angan men sakal ta yang taku, “Ngon tin kot pim men, e wo ta worok epo yang ku pok mi moolngin tin yok pakuh po tuk epon men ma yang wai kara si ta ngo.”
Takuma yang ko wo ta sun taku, “Tuon, ara won ung wo ngo epo ngo ku ples wungin tap wa nga pok mi enda ta si tap?”
Ti ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Mara wom si kuk ma wom haum tunus epo maran nesngin, epo tunusngin ta po ta men ku in epo endara nomoyong tin po kasum i men som.”
Kut ma yang pok put wungin emol ta si ta po, men yang sakal taku, “Mipi ta yang miran ta, men endara aiingin muru ma nuk a salok.
Ma yang wo ta min taku, ‘Ngo ku ning i tua, epo mang min tin ku nga wa endara aiingin ta ngo li pit min men men pi om.’

Tumen ma yang ko wo ti, ‘Ngo men ku ning i ti: ngo ku ninhien mang ta ngo tin ung e li li e nga halung po enda aiingin ta ngo li pit min men, ma ngo ku ning i nunhum kara epo sun. Ma mi mang tin imen men ku nga halung po enda aiingin ta ngo u miranngin ta ngo kut tumen mosop li pit e li li min.
Ma ngo ku wo ta enu ngo ti, “Enu ngo, ngon men endara tap tin turunus men hambip nuk tin ku kai ngon to posan munuman men. E nhing ma e ii endara u e um u mip keh keh engun kut tumen.”’
Takuma Got ko wo ta yang taku, ‘Ngon tin leleke men, pi luk tin iyi weh men ku nga wo ma enu ngon klokngin hang ngon. Ma minan tin imen men ku endara tin e hihi i imen men kuli ta are?’
Wungin tin tumen kha ku si epo po ta tin halung po miranngin tan tuon, si men in lengwal to mara Got men.”

Kut ma yang sakal ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku, “Tumen ma nga wo ta wom ti, epo wom men ku sila wom khing pit po tunusngin tin ta wom men asin, epon kuli wom ku ii ele. Kuru wom men ku sila wom khing pit po emkusin a wom asin, epon kuli wom ku phi ele.
Tunusngin men nhum epo enda aiingin, u po emkusin na hi men nhum epo moolngin kut tumen ako.

Tulu wom hu pit po emon khong, epo emon tin imen men ku som e wha u ku som e lok lok endara ewin akomen. Kuru mang emin ta u mang nhum ta tin ku emon halung po enda aiingin tan li pit min men men pi om kut tumen, takuma Got in e pa ken emon engun. Iyi, wom men tunus weh epo emon ako, wah?
Ara weh tin in lunga wom men taku silan khing, men ku wa kaingin then ta ko pit po mhin li si?
Taku wom talok mi wungin tin tun weh imen, taku tua ma sila wom khing epo wungin tin kara maksin men?

Wom men ku urut wungin tunus epo mongin tin plok si tua men. Mongin tin imen men ku wuh kumang wa ku piak kawu tin ku po ning mulu epon men ewin akomen, takuma nga pok wom siik epo a-Solomon kut tin in mi moolngin tan maran kiring kiring men, men ku mool ken sun tin imen ta akomen kut tumen.

Wom tin wo phepngin ta wom kiak men, taku Got phi epilil epo moolngin tin tumen, tin homani ma nuk tunus yanga pi tin yangae men, si to pi king kauk men whisngin ko mi wunwun tin po sut endara min men, men kuli yang iso phi wom epon maksin kut tumen ako, wah!
Ma wom men ku tohuh epo wom ku pon ta endara tin ku wom iini wa tin ku wom um i men asin, kuru wom men ku sila wom khing epon asin kut tumen.
Epo endara tin mosop imen kha po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som e hi ung e li li wo mulus men tohuh epo po ku pon tan men, si Wirama wom men ion wom tin kalwok epo endara tin imen kho ako.
Si wom men ku tohuh epo wom ku pon ta enunu tin ta Got men weh, men kuli endara tin mosop imen sum sumngin ko po sun ta wom maksin kut tumen.
Wom tin kuk ken sipsip sakun kara engun men, wom men ku lem asin, epo Wirama wom men min nawaehngin weh epon tin ku yang wa enunu si ta wom men.

Wom men ku tih endara tin wom kuk ton men ma ulu tin wom wai men, men ku mi wom suk po tin kalwok men epon. Wom ning eyel ta tuo wom tin ku wom nonon ulu ko min men, tin ku lengwal ewin som men, men miranngin tin pit ili wet pi e ku kis ewin som men. Pi tin imen men ku po tipngin me tikayung epon u ewup tin tururun men ku ning pi won pit po moolngin tumen ewin akomen.
Epo pi tin wom halung po miranngin ta wom li pit epon men, men pi tin imen kha kuli mi wom pit pon men maksin kut tumen ako.
Moolngin tin ta wom e nomalak men, men ku wom mol i si wom sol i ko put wom pipip, u esul tin ta wom men men ku ung e ngin ngin kokyok kokyok li kut tumen.
Ma wom tuo wom men ku kuk ken po tin kaeng phua ta hi men, tin ku kyok me to pi elini epo po tin enanangin men, kumali yang kyok me ma yang nhong nhong, men ku po klas epo yang kerek engun.

Emhong tin ta Got men ko po po tin kum wo phua ta men, tin phua ku me, men ku yang me pon ta po tin kuk e haum tunus men. Nga wo anuh ta wom, epo moolngin tin ta phua e nomalak men men ku yang mol i si yang sol i ko put pipip, ma yang wo epo po ku ko nuk ewo tili hi kuma po ii enda aiingin, men ku yang tuon me hang po ma yang kikyu po epo enda aiingin.

Ma taku yang me mi elup tin me ponwal angan e po haum to pi luk ton men, wa yang ku me mi elup tin me miuk angan e po haum to pi luk ton men, ma yang me pon ta po men kuk e haum tunus tumen, po tin kum wo phua tumen kha emhong tin ta Got men ko po hi men.

Si wom men ku ion i ti, epon taku phua tin mang tan men ku ion elup put ta tin tipngin ku me epon men, men ku yang haum ma yang maran pit tunus, men ku yang mang ta sun tin ku hik mang ta sun ma li sup min men akomen.
Tumen ma wom kut men ku hihi wom kho, epo Wiru Po Tunus men ku me, men ku me mi elup put ta tin ku wom hoo mi mi wom epon ku kyok me men akomen.”
Kut ma a-Pita ko sakal ta sun taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, e sakal emol tin imen, men e sakal i epo misa pim, wa epo po masang to sun wala mosop, wah?”

Ti ma yang tin Akono men ko sakal taku, “Tumen ma ara in e maran pit wo endara tin ta phua men, tin wungin tan anuh u mhin ek kut tumen, tin phua ku ning i ma maran pit wo po mosop u endara mosop tin pit mi mang ta phua men, kuma yang kikyu po epo endara aiingin ta hi then then to pi tin phua won ung won men siik?
Emhong tin ta Got men ko po po ta tin kum wo phua ta men, tin phua tan ku me, men ku phua me pon ta yang men in e ning i tumen.
Nga sakal anuh ta wom, epo phua men ku wa yang tin imen si maran pit wo endara mosop tin ta phua men ako.

Si taku yang tin kum ta phua men wo ta min taku, ‘Phua tin ta ngo men yak mi engin epo yang tin ku me men,’ ti ma yang hosi wungin epo yang ku lek po masang to sun wala tin kum ta phua men, u yang in e ii endara u yang um u yang um wain hambip li yang tulun som tumen,

men ku phua tin ta yang tin kum ta phua tin imen me, men ku me mi ungunan ta tin ku yang maran pit epo sun ton men akomen, u mi elup put ta tin yang pong epo engin epon men kut tumen. Ma phua me mut put yang ma yang won ung wo pi ta sun to po tin ku wo hi phep som men.
Ma yang tin kum wo phua tin imen, tin ion wungin tin phua min epon men, si ku hihi i tunus wa ning i ira wungin tin phua min epon men akomen, men ku wawlaukngin ma pon wluk wluk munuman.

Si yang tin ku ion wungin tin phua min epon men som, tin ning wungin tin tunus epon tin ku yang wawlaukngin epon men, men ku wawlaukngin ma pon wluk wluk kiak engun. Epon taku po ta wa endara munuman, men kuli wai munuman kyok si emhut sun; u po ta tin sun wa endara munuman si yanga wilin kuma maran pit won ta sun men, po tin imen men ku sun kines i kyok epo endara kara kyok si po sun kut tumen ako.
Nga me epo ngo ku whis yau ko wo mulus. Auh, mi ngo epo yau tin imen ku tunngin kho.
Si baptais ta ngo ta men in tin ku nga wai weh men. Auh, nga in e miu ngo tuung weh li pol minan tin kuli baptais tin imen suuk siingin weh men.
Iyi, wom wo taku nga me kuma nga wa wungin aminis ko in wo mulus? Nga pok wom, men pi om, si nga me epo ngo ku ning i ma po masang to sun wala pok pok mi al ako.
Epo homani ma li, men ku po khaut eip khuuk wal mi mang ta, men ku pok mi al. Men ku wuluk miuk nolo wulong ponwal, u wulong ponwal nolo wuluk miuk kut tumen.

Yang ta tin kuk sun men ku nolo wirun, u wirun ku nolo wiraman; wut wala ta tin khuuk sun men ku nolo erun, u erun ku nolo tonin; wut wala ta men ku nolo erkan, u erkan ku nolo sun tin erkan men kut tumen.”
Kut ma yang sakal kyok ta po tin wa ilio angan men taku, “Taku wom ion hingis ta me si solong sin, kerek engun men ku wom wo taku, ‘Pi yung ku me,’ ma men tumen kut.
U taku wom ion eip tin me esaul men si, men ku wom wo taku, ‘Pi men ku ngeng ngeng,’ ma men si.
Wom tin wungin ta wom nuk wo eha men, wom ion i tin ku wom hop wet pi maran u mulus maran tumen, taku tuni ma wom ku ples elup tin homan iyi tunus akomen?
Kuru tua ma wom ku ples wungin tin e ku siik weh men lunga wom tuo wom akomen kut tumen?

Epon taku e lu pol to yang ta tin wa wungin pit po ngon men li epo phua tin maran pit wo wom men ma mom ira soput li, men ku e tohuh weh epo ngon tin ku plosngin epo naumngin tap tin pit wo yang men, epon akuli yang tin wa wungin pit po ngon men nak ngon li epo phua tin ples wungin nginangan men, ma phua tin ples wungin nginangan men wa ngon li sup yanga wili sun tin in to bainat men, ma yang tin in to bainat men psik ngon li sup mi mang tin po kan kan sun li pit min ewin men.

Nga pok ngon, epo ngon men ku mu pol mi mang tin imen angan ta som. Awu. Ngon men ku in min weh li pol minan tin kuli e kul naumngin tin pit po ngon men weh li ulu tin tun weh e me sulung weh men men e suuk siin kut.
Kut ma minan tin imen po kara kuk, men me pok yang epo po Galili tin a-Pailat phae kalol a hi to talungin tin ta hi men.
Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet po taku, “Iyi, wom phaeng taku po Galili tin imen men lasin ta hi e ku nhum epo sun tin ta hi Galili kara men ani po wuh wungin tin imen, wah?
Nga pok wom, men pi om. Si taku wom ku phae mi wom som, men ku wom mosop huuspit kai po tin imen ako.

U po tin khaut eip miuk u miuk me nuk wo sun (18) e suyung nomalak tin pit mi hi Siloam men plong ko lek hi ko huu men, men wom phaeng taku lasin ta hi men nhum epo sun kara tin hi ung Yerusalem men, wah?
Nga pok wom, men pi angul. Si taku wom ku phae mi wom som, men ku wom mosop huuspit kai po tin imen ako.”
Kuru yang sakal emol ta ti, “Yang ta men sa pik tan whangin pit mipi wain tin tan men, ma yang taku me pon ta sa tin imen enun kara, takuma yang ku me pon ta sa enun kara som.

Kut ma yang sakal ta sun tin maran pit wo mipi wain men taku, ‘Auh, posan miuk kho li ani nga me tuh wo sa pik tin iyi kuma nga me suon enun kara, takuma men pi om. E taini ko engun. Epon men ku pit ma uspo mulusngin tin ikil men engul epo ele?’
Takuma yang sakal wet sun taku, ‘Ngon tin Akono men, e mang tan pit to posan tin iyi wet, kuma nga kil pi sup siin u nga wa piukngin ko siin kut tumen.
Ma taku sa enun, men tunus; wa taku pi engun, men ku posan tin me men men ku e taini ko engun.’”
Li klet ma yang in e kot po mi mang akotngin tin ta hi men ta to pi Sabat.
Ih, wut wala ta in, men emiun lengwal ta ning i ma wut wiak wiak to posan khaut eip miuk u miuk me nuk wo sun (18) tumen kho li, epo wut musut plem ma wut ku si pit siik angan akomen.
Ma a-Yesus ion wut, men yang yuk wut me epo yang ma yang sakal ta wut taku, “Ngon tin wala men, won maikngin tin tap men men klokngin li kut.”
Ti ma yang wilin si nuk po wut, ma kerek engun ma wut si pit siik, ma wut wa Got yan si.

Kut si yang tin maran pit wo mang akotngin men sakal wet sun to min kakhat sun, epon tin a-Yesus mlis saihngin to pi Sabat men. Ma yang sakal ta po tin wa ilio angan men taku, “Ungunan tin eip u then ta me sup kha ku po tunus ning kumang epon men. Tumen ma ungunan tin imen kha ku wom mu ma saihngin ta wom mlisngin epon men, si wom kuk aku wom mu to pi tin Sabat men asin.”

Ti ma yang tin Akono men sakal wet sun taku, “Ngon tin wungin tap nuk wo eha men, iyi, wom then then men poplos bulmakau wa donki tin ta wom then then men mi mang ta wom then then to pi Sabat, ma wom wa li epo eki ewin ako, wah?

Tumen ma wut tin wala imen, tin hi khuuk wal me epo Abraham men, men a-Nolongin kan kan i to posan eip miuk u miuk me nuk wo sun tumen kho li. Tulu wom hu i wet, men tunus epo wut men ku plosngin epo won maikngin tin kan kan wut men to pi Sabat men ako, wah?”
Ma yang sakal i tin imen kut, men po tin nolo yang men manngin wa hi. Si po tin wa ilio angan men mi hi keh keh epo wungin tin min tunus weh e ning ningngin yanga wili yang men.
Kut ma yang sakal taku, “Enunu tin ta Got men e ken ele? U ngo ku kaini to ele tumen?
Men ken sa mastet ihun ta tin yang ta wai li mipi tan ma yang psik i ko men; ma men plok si ken sa men, ma emon tin yap yap wet pi men me ning mlut kuk e li li po wili sa.”
Kuru yang wo kyok taku, “Ngo ku kai enunu tin ta Got men to ele?
Men ken yiis, tin wut wala ta wai me ma kaun i mi plaua kaingin khaut miuk, li ma plaua mosop ung e iit si.”
Ma yang mili mili mi pi tin nunhum u tururun tumen, ma yang in e kot po, ma yang muk muk ku li Yerusalem.
Kut ma po ta ko sakal ta yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, po tin kuli palolongin men ku kiak kara engun, wah?” Ti ma yang ko sakal ta sun ti,
“Wom men ku tohuh weh epo wom ku lu sup mi sowon tin won tun men, epo nga sakal ta wom ti, epo po munuman taku li sup, takuma po men ku li khuk po engin weh.

Epo phua tin mang tan men taku si ma sambal si eya mang kho, si wom men ku nuk mara so ma wom nuk e nhong nhong mara sowon, ma wom nuk e sakal taku, ‘Ngon tin Akono men, ngon tin Akono men, e klas epo pim!’ Ti men kuli yang sakal wet wom taku, ‘Ngo ku pon ta pi tin wom mu epon men som.’
Minan tin imen men kuli wom hosi sakalngin taku, ‘Pim a ii endara u um tumen to marap, u e kot pim ira soput tin nuk e li li ta pim men kut tumen.’
Takuma yang kuli sakal taku, ‘Nga pok wom epo ngo ku pon ta pi tin wom mu epon men akomen. Wom yang mara ngo, wom mosop tin ning wungin lengwal nginangan men.’

Pi tin imen men ku wom kuk e hau hambip u wom kuk e ii ngi wom kakyat kakyat po al epon kut tumen, minan tin wom ion Abraham, u Aisak, u a-Yakop u po pokngin mosop kut tumen, men hi me kuk mi enunu tin ta Got men, si wom tuo wom men ku whisngin li pol wetpo so.
Ma po men ku me epo pi mara naeng u pi solong sin, u ku me pi nekip sin u pi esaul kut tumen, ma po ko nuk ewo tili hi baul suyung tin ta kakaomngin men mi enunu tin ta Got men.
Irawin, epo po kara tin li muk men, kuli me sulung, si po kara tin li sulung men kuli li muk.”
Ungunan tin wala imen ma po Parisi kara me sakal ta yang taku, “E yang pi tin iyi ma e lu, epo a-Herot taku wi ngon ko hun.”

Ti ma yang ko sakal ta po taku, “Wom lu pok elwa enih tin tun imen ti, ‘E hul, nga luul to emiun lengwal li pol u nga mimlis saihngin ta po homani u to pi king kauk kut tumen, li ma ungunan tin me miuk angan men kha kuli nga suuk sii kumang tin ta ngo men.’
Takuma ngo men ku muk muk li homani, u to pi kingkauk, u to pi malam kut tumen weh. Epon men khung nginan weh epo pokngin ta tin ku wingin ko hun ma huuspit wetpo pi Yerusalem men.

Auh, Yerusalem, Yerusalem, ngon tin lek po pokngin ko huu u e tep enah po po tin tihngin li epo ngon men tumen! Angan munuman kho men nga taku palu husanim me kuk to al ken emon nomal wala ta palu husanin me sup wet mhit tin tan men, takuma mara wom luluun.

Wom hul, mang tin ta wom men, men nga mang tan min engul ung epo wom. Nga wo anuh ta wom, epo ngo men ku ion wom kyok som weh li pol minan tin kuli me ma ku wom sakal taku, ‘Emhong tin ta Got men men ku weh ko po yang tin me epo yang tin Akono men yan men.’”
Kut si wungin si nuk ti, epo yang li sup mi mang ta sun ta tin hi mara hi pit wo hi Parisi men kuma yang ii beret to pi Sabat, men po kuk e mara hi pit mi wungin ta yang weh.
Ih, yang ta in to mara sun men elit som hambip.
Ma a-Yesus ko sakal ta po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u po Parisi kut tumen taku, “Iyi, wungin sinsin men sam wet it tin ku mlis saihngin to pi Sabat men, wah?”
Takuma po iso homong. Ma yang wa sun me, ma yang mlis saihngin ta sun, anima yang mang ta sun li.
Kut ma yang sakal wet po taku, “Ara in lunga wom, men in to donki ta wa bulmakau ta tin li plong ko ung mi nahu ta men, men ku kerek li wa li me si mi nahu to pi Sabat wa ku in engun, wah?”
Takuma po khuk po engin epo po tin ku sakal wet yang pit mi wungin tin imen.
A-Yesus ion po tin me wo hi ung wo ehus ta po tin ya hi pos men, men yang sakal emol ta epo po tin sun yuk hi me men taku,
“Taku po ta yuk ngon ku me epo kakaomngin ta tin ta enanginngin men, men ku e lu ung wo ehus tin ung muk men asin, epon akuli yang tin mang tan imen yuk sun ta tin yan pos epo ngon men,

ma yang tin yuk ngon u sun tin imen me wo tap taku, ‘E si powi yang tin imen si yang ti wa ehus tin tap men,’ ma minan tin imen manngin wa ngon, ma e lu ko ung wo ehus tin ta po tin me sulung weh men.

Si taku po ta yuk ngon, men ku e lu ung wo ehus tin ta po tin me sulung weh men, si kuma yang tin yuk ngon me men ku me, men ku yang sakal tap ti, ‘Worok, e lu si ili maran min.’ Minan tin imen men ku e si nhum to mara po tin ko nuk ewo tili hi baul suyung to ngon men.
Epon taku po ta wa yan si awon, men kuli yan wangin ko, si taku po ta wa yan ko, men kuli yan wangin si.”

Li klet anima yang sakal maksin ta sun tin yuk yang me men taku, “Minan tin akani e ku e ning kakaomngin ta men, taku to pi kingkauk angan wa to pi luk angan wa tumen, men ku e in aku e yuk po tin tita wom men, wa ehuro wom, wa po tin wom khuuk wal men, wa po miran tin wom kuk then men ta asin, epon takuli po yuk ngon kyok, ma po wai si emhut sun tap.

Si taku e ning kakaomngin ta, men ku e yuk po tin weh kuk engun epo endara men, u po tin sokongin maran kiring kiring lek hi men, u po tin khi hi lengwal men, u po tin mara hi korip men tumen me epo kakaomngin tap.

Ma emhong tin ta Got men kuli ko po ngon, epo po tin imen ku wa endara si emhut sun tin tap men akomen. Epo ngon men kuli wa endara emhut sun minan tin kuli po tin wungin ta hi siik men khek kyok si tunus men ako.”
Ti ma po ta in mi sun tin hi nuk ewo tili hi baul suyung men hul sakalngin tin imen, men yang sakal ta sun taku, “Emhong tin ta Got men ko po po ta tin kuli ii beret mi enunu tin ta Got men!”
Kut ma yang sakal ta sun taku, “Yang ta men ning kakaomngin nhum ta ma yang wa myus li pit wo po munuman tin ku me men,
ma yang tih sun tin kum tan men to pi luk angan tin po ii endara epon men kuma yang li wo ta po tin yang wa myus li pit wo hi kho men taku, ‘Wom muh, epo endara aiingin mosop men hihingin kho kut.’

Takuma po mosop sakal then ma po ko hosi sakalngin epo po ku kalele sakalngin. Yang tin muk men sakal ta sun ti, ‘Ngo men kul mulusngin ta, ma ngo ku li ion i. Nga kines ngon, e mang si nga in engun.’
Si yang ta maksin men sakal ti, ‘Nga kul bulmakau kan kanngin to al ponwal khaut eip, ma ngo ku li tong tong li. Nga kines ngon, e mang si nga in engun.’
Si yang ta maksin kyok ko sakal taku, ‘Nga enangin wut wala ta, tumen ma ngo ku me akomen.’

Tumen ma yang tin kum ta sun men me pok phua tin tan men epo sakalngin tin mosop imen. Kut ma phua tin mang tan men yan sal ma yang sakal ta sun tin kum tan men taku, ‘E lu pol nang nang put soput tin nunhum u tururun e ta enunu men ma e espo po tin weh kuk engun epo endara men, u po tin sokongin lengwal maran kiring kiring lek hi men, u po tin khi hi lengwal men, u po tin mara hi korip men, tumen, me iyi.’
Ti ma yang tin kum ta sun men ko sakal ti, ‘Phua, men ningngin kho ken sun tin e wo epon men, ma pi kara iso pit.’
Kut ma yang tin phuan men wo ta sun tin kum tan men taku, ‘E lu pol put soput tin nunhum u tururun e nuk woringi pi men ma e heek weh epo po ku weh me sup, kuma mang tin ta ngo men ku kol weh.
Epo nga sakal ta wom epo po tin yukngin kho men ku ta me tong enda aiingin tin ta ngo men akomen, taku phiit wa manom wa men.’”
Kut si po wa ilio angan hambip kara li to yang. Ma yang phae i ma yang sakal ta po taku,

“Taku po ta me hang ngo, si ku wetpon wa wiraman ngong tonin, u titien hi husani hi, u ehuro hi u ehulut hi, wai, u enun tuon kut tumen som, men ku si ken po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo ngo men ta akomen.
U taku po ta ku lat sa wlong put wal tan ma me ira ngo som, men ku si ken po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo ngo men ta akomen kut tumen.
Epon taku po ta in mi wom taku ning mang nomalak ta, men ku ko ung ma maran pit mi ulu tin epo mang ning nginan men wet, taku ulu tin imen ku kai mang tin imen ning nginan li suuk siingin weh wa men.
Epon akuli po tin imen hang enah tin ku mang ningngin si won men kho, si po kalwok epo endara tin ku po suuk sii mang epon men, anima po mosop tin ion i tin imen hosi lesngin tin pit wo yang men,
ma po sakal taku, ‘Yang tin ikop hosi mang tan ning nginan, takuma yang ku kakha weh epo yang ku suuk sii mang akomen.’

U taku yang sinkhaung ta taku li sewut sun sinkhaung ta ma ngong lek wal, men ku yang ko ung ma yang maran ira kakhangin tan wet, taku yang ku apalukngin hut sun to po nolo tan khaut khum khum khum khum ta (10,000) li sewut sun tin ku me lek wal to yang to po nolo tan khaut khum khum khum khum ponwal (20,000) wa men?
Wa taku yang ion i epo yang ku kakha som, men ku yang tin sinkhaung ta maksin men iso in hin, men ku yang tih po kara li epo sun ma po kines sun epo sinsin tin ku wulong ung aminis to wal epon men.
Tumen engun, taku po ta in lunga wom men ku wetpon wa endara mosop tin tan men som, men ku in ken po ta tin hul wet kotngin mi wo ngo men akomen.
Sauli men tunus, si taku sauli ko manom, men ku ningngin si phiit tua kyok?

Sauli tin tumen men ku tunus epo po ku wai ko mipi wa po ku phae to piukngin tin ta bulmakau e po halung pon men kyok akomen. Awu. Po tunus whis i li engun. Po ta kingan ung epon ku hul, men ku hul weh!”
Kut ma po mosop tin hi palu takis ta sun phuan men u po tin ya hi to lasin men kut tumen, men me tikayung yang kuma po me hul yang.
Ma po Parisi to sun tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men katiktik wungin, ma po sakal taku, “Yang tin ikop wa po tin ning lasin nginangan men ma yang ii endara to po.”
Tumen ma yang sakal emol tin iyi si ta po, men yang sakal taku,

“Taku po ta in to sipsip khum khum ta (100), u taku yang kis sipsip ta, men ku yang mang ta sipsip tin khaut khum mnal me sup u mnal me sup (99) tumen kuk pi tin tahunggu men, si yang li langun epo sipsip tin kis men li yang suon weh, wah? Wai, men ku yang ning i tumen ako.
Ma minan tin yang li suo li men, men yang lat li si ung uwan, ma yang min keh keh takut.

Ma yang kyok li mang tan, men ku yang yuk po tin tita hi u po tin pi ta hi then men tumen me palu wal, ma yang sakal ta po taku, ‘Mi wom keh keh to ngo, epo nga li suo sipsip tin ta ngo e kis men kho kut!’

Nga sakal ta wom ti, epo min kehngin nhum kai sun tin imen men ku si ili wet pi epo po tin to lasin men ta tin phae min men, men ku nhum epo min kehngin tin ku si epo po tin khaut khum mnal me sup u mnal me sup (99) e wungin ta hi siik men tin kuk epon ku phae mi hi som men.

U taku wut wala ta men in to ulu eip ponwal, ma taku wut kis ulu then ta men ku wut tun esul, ma wut whek mi mok, ma wut maran pit tunus epo ulu li wut suon weh ako, wah? Iyi, po wala tin ku ning i tumen ewin som men ta in, wah? Awu. Men pi engun.

Ma minan tin wut suo ulu tin imen, men ku wut yuk po tin tita hi u po tin hi kuk then men tumen me palu wal, men ku wut sakal ta po taku, ‘Mi wom keh keh to ngo, epo nga suo ulu tin nga kis i men kho kut!’
Nga sakal ta wom ti, epo min kehngin nhum kai sun tin imen, men si mi Got to mara po tihngin tin tan men epo po tin in to lasin men ta tin phae min men.”
Li klet ma yang sakal taku, “Yang ta in to husanin masang ponwal.

Ma wirun tin ira sun men wo ta wiraman taku, ‘Yok, e pok mi endara mosop tin tap men ma e pakuh po ngo epon tin wop ung won ta ngo men.’ Tumen ma wiraman pok mi endara mosop tin tan men ma yang wai si si ta wulong.

Li ma ungunan kara kho li ma wirun tin ira sun men palu endara mosop tin tan men, ma yang muk muk li wo mulusngin ta tin ung hin men, ma pi tin imen yang siwul mi endara tin tan men epo sasayihngin maran kiring kiring.
Ma yang uspon mosop, men elwip nhum ta si wo mulusngin tin imen, ma yang me in engul weh epo endara mosop.
Ma minan tin imen yang li in to sun ta tin nopuan e hi khuuk wal wo mulusngin tin imen, ma yang tih sun li wo mulusngin tin tan men kuma yang pa ken kanem tin kuk pi tin imen.
Ma yang min epo yang taku ii erek elit engun tin kanem kuk e iini men li ko mi kuman kuma yang mut, takuma po ta ku wa endara kara si ta yang kuma yang iini akomen.

Li klet ma tulun hungin ta yang kyok si, ma yang sakal ti, ‘Auh, po esini tin lengwal engun e hi kum anaum ta yok men, men endara aiingin ta hi kai po weh u kara si po sun weh kut tumen, si ngo men ku hun angan wo elwip kut khae!
Ngo men ku si ma nga kyok li epo yok, ma nga sakal ta yang taku, ‘Yok, ngo men ning lasin epo yang tin ung ili wet pi men u to marap kut tumen,
ma homani ma ngo men ku tunus epo ngon ku sikia ngo wirum kyok akomen. Si e mang ma nga si ken po ta tin kum anaum tap men engun.”’
Tumen ma yang si ma yang li epo wiraman. Si yang iso muk muk me hin, men wiraman maran li kon sun ma yang min suk sun, ma yang sa pukalal sun li kasum wut sun, ma yang tumum wo sun.
Ma wirun sakal si ta sun taku, ‘Yok, nga ning lasin epo yang tin ung ili wet pi men u to mara ngon kut tumen, ma homani men ku nga tunus kuma e sikia ngo wirum kyok akomen.’

Takuma wiraman ko wo ta po tin kum ta yang men taku, ‘Wom wa moolngin tin tunus weh men me pol ma wom wai ko po yang, u wom wa moolngin min pil ta ung wili yang eringin, u wom wa sandel me ung hut khi yang kut tumen.
Ma wom wa bulmakau tin tuleng nuk pi mlaeng men me iyi ma wom wini, ma it men ku iini ma mi it keh keh weh takut.
Epo wiruk tin iyi men hun kho si homani ma yang kyok si tunus. Yang men kis kho, si homani men it suo yang kyok.’ Ti ma po hosin epo po ku mi hi keh keh.
Si wirun tin nomuru men in mipi. Ma yang ung e me tikayung mang, men yang hul lutngin u po kara tin yik men kut tumen.
Tumen ma yang yuk sun ta tin kum ta wiraman men me, yang kines sun epo wungin tin imen sinsin ani tua.
Ti ma yang ko sakal ta sun taku, ‘Wirom men kho me kut, ma wiramap wi bulmakau tin tuleng men, epon tin yang wa sun kyok me in anga tunusngin men.’
Takuma yang yansal ma yang ku li sup mi mang akomen. Tumen ma wiraman me pol ma yang paret sakalngin si ta sun.

Ti ma yang sakal wet wiraman taku, ‘Auh, posan tin munuman kho li men, men nga in e kum tap. Ngo ku hik put sakalngin tap angan ta akomen, takuma ngon ku wa meme nerengin ta si ta ngo kuma nga in e mi ngo keh keh to po tin tita pim men angan ta akomen.
Si wirum tin imen tin ii endara tin tap men epo po wala elwan kara men me, men ku e kaeng som. Awu. E wi bulmakau tin tuleng men epo yang kerek engun.’
Ti ma yang sakal ta sun taku, ‘Wiruk, kokyok kokyok men e in to ngo, ma endara mosop tin ta ngo men men tap ako.
Men tunus epo it ku mi it keh keh ma mi it tunusngin engun, epo wirom tin in ken i e hun kho men men tunus kyok, u yang men kis, li ma it suo yang kyok kut tumen.

Kuru a-Yesus sakal ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku, “Yang miran ta men in tin sun ta tin maran pit wo endara ta sun men in to yang, ma po kara wa sakalngin me epo yang tin miran men kuma po wa sakalngin ko pit po yang tin maran pit wo endara ta sun men, men po sakal epo yang men in e siwul mi endara tin ta sun tin miran men.

Tumen ma yang tin miran men yuk sun me, yang ko sakal ta sun taku, ‘Sakalngin tin tua e nga hul i epo ngon ti? Ngon men ku pok put endara mosop tin marap pit won ta ngo men si ta ngo kut khae, epo ngon men ku marap pit wo endara tin ta ngo men kyok akomen.’

Kut ma yang tin maran pit wo endara ta sun men sakal ta min taku, ‘Auh, ngo ku ning i tua? Epo phua tin ta ngo men ku klok kumang tin marango pit wo endara tan men hang ngo li kut khae. Si ngo men ku kakha kuma nga kil mulusngin akomen, u manngin wa ngo epo ngo tin ku hau amusukngin pit wo po kara epo ulu men kut tumen.

Ih, nga ion wungin tin ngo ku ning i men kut khae, tumen kuma minan tin kuli phua klok kumang hang ngo tin ku marango pit wo endara tan men li, men ku po masang to sun wala wa ngo li sup mi mang tin ta hi e ung e li li men.’

Ti ma yang yuk yuk po tin naumngin ta phua pit wo hi men mosop then then kho me epo yang kut, anima yang sakal ta sun tin muk men taku, ‘Naumngin ta phua tin ta ngo men tin pit wo ngon men men esini?’

Ti ma yang ko wo ta sun taku, ‘Olip sut kaingin khum khum ta (100).’ Tumen ma yang ko wo ta sun taku, ‘E wa kisang tin naumngin tap panngin ko min men, ma e ko ung, ma e pan khum eip (50) misan ko nuk min wiewi sun.’

Li klet ma yang wo ta sun ta kyok taku, “Si naumngin tin pit po ngon men esini?’ Ti ma yang ko wo ta sun taku, “Wit enun kaingin khum khum ta (100).’ Ti ma yang ko wo ta sun taku, “E wa kisang tin naumngin tap panngin nuk min men, ma e pan khum miuk me sup (80) ko nuk min wiewi sun.’

Tumen ma phua wangan po yang tin maran pit wo endara tan e wungin tan ku siik som men, epon tin yang ning i e ken po tin mhi hi ek men. Epo husani po tin ta pi mulus men, mhin ekngin ta po tin po kuk ton lunga po tin ta hi e hi khuuk wal mi elup then men, men nhum epo husani po tin ta pi mi mlaeng men ako.

Ma nga sakal ta wom ti, wom men ku wa miranngin tin ta pi mulus e lengwal men ma wom ning po tin ku si tita wom men epon, kumali miranngin tin imen ko om men kuli po wa wom sup li kuk mi mang tin sindak men kara.

Taku po ta maran pit wo endara tururun kara to wungin anuh, men ku maran pit wo endara nomoyong to wungin anuh maksin kut tumen ako; u taku po ta maran pit wo endara tururun kara to wungin tin ku siik som men, men ku maran pit wo endara nomoyong to wungin tin ku siik som men maksin kut tumen ako.
Tumen ma taku wom ku mara wom pit wo miranngin tin ta pi mulus e lengwal men to wungin anuh som, men ku ara weh ku wa miranngin tin irawin men sup yanga wili wom kuma mara wom pit won?
U taku wom ku mara wom pit wo endara tin ta po enginin kara men to wungin anuh som, ara weh ku wa endara tin ta wom tuon men si ta wom?

Po ta tin kum wo sun engun men ku kum ta phua ponwal akomen. Epon men kuli min lel phua ta, si min pit wo phua ta, wa ku klap sun ta, si ion sun ta ken i e lengwal engun men. Wom men ku kum ta Got u miranngin tumen to al akomen.”
Kut si po Parisi tin mi hi pit pit wo ulu men hul wungin tin mosop imen kut tumen, men po hut hi nuu yang ma po sakal lengwal epo yang.

Ti ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Wom men ning wom si kuk siik to mara po tunus weh, takuma Got ion wungin tin nuk ta mi wom men ako. Epo endara tin po tunus wai si nhum lunga hi men, men hies to mara Got.

Wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men u wungin tin ta po pokngin men, tumen, men in me pol minan tin ta a-Yon men. Ma minan tin imen ma me, men enunu tin ta Got men pok putngin si in, ma po mosop tohuh weh epo po ku li sup min.
Si wet pi to mulus ku om men awo mlus nginan engun, si wungin sinsin panngin tingit tun ta tin ku put mih men men khung nginan weh.

Po masang mosop tin hik put enanginngin ta ngong titien, si li enangin po wala enginin ta kyok men, men ning wungin tin po sup si khi wal epon men kha men; u taku po masang ta enangin wut wala tin imen, tin titien hik put enanginngin ta ngong kho men, men ning wungin tin po sup si khi wal epon men kut tumen kha men.
Yang miran ta in, men pi moolngin pon mhee ama u moolngin pon tunus ta nuk wet sun tumen kokyok kokyok, ma ungunan then then men yang in e ii endara tunus tunus weh.
Si yang ta tin in e hau amusukngin pit wo sun nginangan men in, men po sikian yan a-Lasarus, men po wa yang li nuk mara sowon tin ta sun men to pon tin sal sal klet pon men.
Ma yang min epo yang ku ii endara tin plak plak ko wet suyung tin ta yang tin miran men kara kuma yang mut. Kuru elwa kara me hom hom po yang tin sal sal men kut tumen.
Li klet ma yang tin hau pit wo sun men hun, ma yang latngin li yanga wili po tihngin li nuk po engai sun Abraham. Kuru yang tin miran men hun kyok kut tumen, ma po kil yang.
Ma yang li in e won maan maan weh pi tin ta hunngin men, men yang maran si ma yang maran li kon Abraham tin in hin men, u a-Lasarus tin nuk po engai sun Abraham men kut tumen.

Kut ma yang sakal taku, ‘Yok Abraham, mip suk ngo, ma e tih a-Lasarus me kuma yang wa wilin pon pon ta ko pit mi eki ma yang ning i ma mamai ngo pon nglik wet. Epo wo ngo maan maan takut put ngi yau tin iyi.’

Takuma Abraham ko wo taku, ‘Wiruk, tulup hu epo elup tin e tunus in ton wo mulus kho men, men e wa endara turunus tap, si a-Lasarus men wai lengwal. Si homani ma yang won pias, kuru wop maan maan kut tumen.

Kuru wungin ta maksin men nuk ti, ilwang nhum ta hihingin nuk kut lunga pim u wom kut tumen, tumen ma po tin taku yok ko pit iyi ma ut put ilwang ti epo wom men, men khung nginan epo po, kuru po tin kuk imen ku ut put ilwang me epo pim, men khung nginan epo po kut tumen.’
Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Yok, tumen ma nga hau nuk sii khi ngon epo ngon ku tih yang li epo po tin pim a khuuk wal e kuk mi mang tin ta yok men.
Epo ehurok eip iso kuk, ma yang ku li kuma yang pok po epo po men ku haum tunus, epon akuli po maksin me pi tin iyi tin to won maanngin men.’
Ti ma Abraham ko wo ta sun taku, ‘Po men kuk to wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men u po Pokngin kut tumen. Po men ku hul sun.’
Ti ma yang ko wo taku, ‘Awu, Yok Abraham, men pi om. Si taku po ta tin khek mi po tin huu kho men li epo po, men ku po phae mi hi ako.’
Ti ma Abraham ko wo ta sun taku, ‘Taku po ku hul wet a-Moses u po tin Pokngin men tumen som, aku, taku po ta ku khek mi po tin huu kho men, men ku po wo hi nuk wet akomen maksin kut tumen.

Kut ma yang sakal ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku, “Wungin tin ku ning i ma po plong ko mi lasin men ku weh si, ma po ta ku klet epon akomen. Takuma won maikngin nhum men ku in epo po ta tin wungin tin ku po plong ko mi lasin men si epon men.

Epo po ku wa enah nhum ta tin po tut wit enun epon men si po kan i ko kuk wut yang, ma po psik yang ko mi wiu, men tunus epo sun tin ku yang ning i ma po tin tururun imen ta ku plong ko epo lasin men.
Wom men ku haum tunus epo wom tuo wom. Taku wirom ning lasin ta epo ngon, men ku e pio yang. Ma taku yang phae min, men ku e mang ta lasin ta yang.
Ma taku yang ning lasin epo ngon angan ponwal me sup mi ungunan ta, ma angan ponwal me sup men yang kyok me epo ngon, ma yang sakal taku, ‘Nga phae mi ngo,’ men ku e mang ta lasin ta yang.”
Kut ma po tin paengin men sakal ta yang tin Akono men taku, “E ning i ma wo phepngin ta pim men ku ko ung po sun si.”

Tumen ma yang tin Akono men sakal taku, “Taku wo phepngin ta wom ken mastet ihun tun ta, men ku wom wo ta sa tin imen taku, ‘E khuk si to sun imut, ma e lu whangin pit mi wiu,’ ti, men ku sa hul wet wom engun ako.
Ara in lunga wom, men ku kerek e sakal ta sun tin kum won e in e kil mulus mipi wa maran pit wo sipsip men minan tin yang ku kyok me mipi men ti, ‘E mu ko nuk ewo tilip kuma e nuk e ii endara?’

Awu. Si men ku sakal ta sun taku, ‘E hihi enda aiingin ta ngo kara si nga iini, ma e wa moolngin tap tin nomalak men si hut sok put ngon kuma e kum ta ngo weh li nga ii endara u nga um kut tumen, anili sulung ma e ii endara u e um tumen,’ men ku po sakal ti ako, wah?
Iyi, po ta tin sun kum won men ku sam sam sun epo sun tin ning wungin mosop tin po wo ta sun epon men, wah? Awu. Nga wo taku pi engun.

Wom kut taku wom suuk sii sakalngin mosop tin Got wo ta wom epon men, men ku wom sakal ti, ‘Pim men ken po tin kum wo sun engun e ku wungin ta pim tunus weh som men, epo wungin tin tunus epo pim ku ning i men kha pim a ning i kut men.’”
Kut ma a-Yesus in e muk muk li Yerusalem, men wungin si nuk ti, epo yang hik put pi Samaria u Galili kut tumen.
Ma yang li sup pi tanuan ta, men po khaut eip ponwal me tut yang tin khu khu ii hi men, men me nuk hin long epo yang.
Ma po wut hi pit pit ili awon taku, “Yesus, Phua, mip suk pim!”
Tumen ma yang ion po, men yang wo ta po taku, “Wom lu suk mara po tin kum auluungin men epo po wom.” Ti ma po yok ma po li, men wungin men si in ti, epo po men si po hi yil kho kut.
Ma yang then ta in lunga po ion pon tin si yil men, men yang phae ma yang kyok li, ma yang wut pit ma yang wa Got yan si,
ma yang li plong ko nuk sii khi sun ma yang mhin ko nuk mulus, ma yang sam sam sun. Epo yang men api Samaria.
Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal taku, “Iyi, po khaut eip ponwal kha si po hi yil yil men ako, wah? Si po tin khaut mnal me sup men ani a?
Iyi, po ku pon ta sun ta kyok tin ku kyok me sam sam Got men som, si yang tin api enginin men misan, wah?”
Ti ma yang ko wo ta sun ti, “E khek si ma e lu ira soput tin tap men. Wo phepngin tap weh kha ning i ma e si tunus men.”
Kut si kinesngin ta me epo yang, men po Parisi kines epo enunu tin ta Got men, men ku si to pi elini weh. Tumen ma yang sakal wet po taku, “Enunu tin ta Got men men ku me to supangin kara akomen.
Kuru po ku sakal, ‘Mara wom mu iyi,’ wa ‘Mara wom lu imen,’ ti akomen. Iis, epo enunu tin ta Got men men in lunga wom kho ako.”
Kut ma yang wo ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku, “Elup ta kuli iso me, men ku mi wom epo wom ku ion ungunan tin Wiru Po Tunus ku in lunga wom men ta, takuma wom ku ion i akomen.
Ma kuli po sakal ta wom taku, ‘Mara wom mu iyi,’ wa ‘Mara wom lu imen.’ Si wom men ku lu ira po asin.
Epo pi si mlangan tin ngin ngin porili mulusngin ta li pol porili mulusngin palan ta, tumen kut kha kuli Wiru Po Tunus me mi elup tin tan men.
Si muk men ku yang wuh wungin maran kiring kiring ma po tin khuuk wal wo mulusngin homani men wetpo hi wa yang.
Ma wungin tin si mi elup tin ta a-Noa men, men kuli wungin in tumen kut mi elup tin ta Wiru Po Tunus men:

men po ku kuk e ii enda, po um, po enangin sun wala, u po wa sun wala tin wawahin men si ung ta sun masang tumen, weh li pol ungunan tin a-Noa li sup mi imut men, anima eki num si ma lek po mosop ko huu.
Kuru men ku ken wungin tin si mi elup tin ta a-Lot men: men po kuk e ii endara, po um, po kul endara si ta sun, po tirih endara, po wha enda, u po ning mang kut tumen.
Si ungunan tin a-Lot li pol wetpo pi Sodom men, men yau u enah tin ngiseng men tumen me ko wet pi ken pi yung men, ma lek po mosop ko huu.
Tumen kut kha kuli wungin si minan tin kuli Wiru Po Tunus si in pi mlaeng men.
Minan tin imen po ta ku si ung eluwi mang, si endara tan iso pit mi mang, men ku kyok me ko kuma espon li asin. Kuru po ta ku li in mipi, men ku phae kyok me asin kut tumen.
Tulu wom hu a-Lot titien.
Taku po ta tohuh epon ku palolo tunusngin tan tuon men ku huuspit ton kyok, si taku po ta min alang si tunusngin tan men ku in anga tunusngin ton kyok ako.
Nga pok wom, to pi luk tin imen wulong masang ponwal ku pit wo ehus then ta, ma wi ta ku wangin li, si wi ta ku mang tangin in.
Wulong wala ponwal men ku nuk e ngyung wit enun to al, ma wut ta ku wangin li, si wut ta men ku mang tangin in.
Wulong masang ponwal ku li in mipi, ma wi ta men ku wangin li, si wi ta men ku mang tangin in.”

Ti ma po sakal wet yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, wungin tin imen ku si ko pit ia weh?” Tumen ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Pi tin akani e ku emkusin nuk, pi tin imen kha kuli emon tin ii endara emalin ewin men me palu wal epon men.”
Kut ma yang sakal emol ta si ta po epo po tunus men ku kines Got sumsum, si po ku mi hi mokongin weh asin,
ma yang sakal taku, “Yang ta tin ples wungin nginangan men in pi ta, men ku lem pit wo Got wa won nuk wet po tunus ewin akomen.
Kut si wut wala ta tin wamuh men in pi tin imen. Ma wut me epo yang, ma wut wo ti, ‘Ngon men ku ning wungin emhut sun ta po tin nolo ngo e taku wa wungin pit po ngo men.’
Ma yang in li put monlo long ma yang min epo yang ku ning i tumen akomen, taku li klet ma yang sakal ta min taku, “Aku, ngo men ku lem pit wo Got som wa ngo ku wo ngo nuk wet po tunus ta som,
takuma wut tin wala wamuh imen ning i ma mi ngo nuk epo wut, tumen ma ngo ku ples wungin emhut sun ta po tin nolo wut men, epon akuli wut kyok me epo ngo kokyok kokyok, ma mi ngo mokongin.”
Kut ma yang tin Akono men sakal ti, “Wom hul sakalngin tin yang tin ples wungin nginangan e ku ples wungin emin ewin som men sakal i men weh.

Tumen ma Got men ku ples wungin emhut sun ta po tin yang won ung wo hi men tin kuk e hau pit wo yang to pi mhangin u to pi luk kut tumen kokyok kokyok ako, wah? Si yang men ku som e min mokongin pit wo po kerek ewin akomen.
Nga pok wom ti, epo yang men ku ning wungin emhut sun kerek engun ako. Takuma minan tin Wiru Po Tunus kuli iso me men, men irawin epo yang ku me pon ta wo phepngin kara pit wo mulus wa men?”
Kuru yang pok put wungin emol tin iyi epo po kara tin wo hi nuk wet hi tuo hi ken hi e kuk siik, si po ion sun tin kara men ken hi e kuk lengwal engun men:
“Wulong ponwal li si mang auluungin kuma wulong kines Got, wi ta men Parisi u wi ta men po tin hi palu takis ta sun phuan men ta tumen.

Yang tin Parisi men si pit ma yang kines Got los pon tuon taku, ‘Got, nga sam sam ngon epo ngo men ku in ken po kara men som, tin torok ma nak nak endara hang sun kara men, u wungin ta hi ku siik weh som, u po kara tin sup si khi sun men, wa ngo men ku maksin in ken yang tin palu takis ta po phuan imen akomen.
Ngo men suuh mi ngo epo endara aiingin to ungunan ponwal mi sun tin ponwal me sup men u nga talu Got epo endara mosop tin ta ngo men maran min eip ponwal mi sun tumen kokyok kokyok ako.’

Si yang tin palu takis ta po phuan men li pit hin, ma yang maran maksin kut men yang min epon ku si ili wet pi som, si yang pit e wilin sup po engain, ma yang sakal ti, ‘Got, mip suk ngo tin in to lasin men!’

Nga pok wom ti, epo yang tin imen li ko mang tan men in siik to mara Got kho, si yang tin ta kyok men men pi engun. Epo po mosop tin wa hi si pit men men kuli Got wa hi ko, si taku po ta wai ko men kuli Got wai si.”
Kut ma po wa sun hoin tin tururun men me epo yang kuma yang wilin si nuk e li li po po, takuma po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men ion wungin tin imen, men po pio sun.
Si a-Yesus yuk po me epo yang, ma yang sakal taku, “Wom mang, si po hoin tin tururun men ku me epo ngo, si wom uluu po asin. Epo enunu tin ta Got men men ta po tin wungin ta hi tumen.
Nga sakal anuh ta wom, taku po ta ku wa enunu tin ta Got men ken po hoin ta men som, men ku li sup min angan akomen.”
Kut si yang miran ta me kines yang taku, “Ngon tin kot pim e wungin tap tunus men, ngo ku ning i tua weh kuma Got pakuh po ngo epo tunusngin tin sindak men?”
Tumen ma a-Yesus ko wo ta sun taku, “Tua ma e sikia ngo e tunus? Po ta men ku tunus som, si po then ta misan, men Got misan.

Ngon men pol ta sakalngin sinsin kho, tin wo ti: ‘E in aku e sup si khi po ta asin, e in aku e wi po ta ko hun asin, e in aku e tip endara asin, e in aku e torok pit wo po ta asin, u ngon men ku wa wiramap ngong tonim ya ngong si kut tumen.’”
Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Sakalngin tin mosop imen nga iran kokyok kokyok minan tin nga iso hoin li nga si nomuru men.”

Ma a-Yesus hul sakalngin tin imen, men yang sakal ta sun taku, “Si ngon men iso kalwok epo endara then ta. E tirih endara mosop tin tap men, si e kikyu po tin kuk lengwal weh men epon, kha kuli miranngin tap halung po ngin pit ili wet pi men. Li klet anima e mu pet kira ngo.”
Yang hul wungin tin imen, men yang min urut i weh, epo miranngin tin ta yang men men hambip.
Ma a-Yesus ion sun tin min urut i weh men, men yang sakal taku, “Auh, men khung nginan weh epo po tin miranngin ta hi hambip men tin ku li sup mi enunu tin ta Got men!
Epo kamel ta ku plek mi sulmu won, men awo mlus nginan epo po miran ta tin ku li sup mi enunu tin ta Got men.”
Ti ma po tin hul sakalngin tin imen sakal taku, “Taku tumen, men ara weh ku palolongin?”
Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Wungin tin po tunus khuuk pon ning nginan men kha ku Got ning i men ako.”
Kut ma a-Pita sakal taku, “E ion i, epo pim men mang ta endara mosop tin ta pim men, si kuma pim a ira ngon.”
Tumen ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Nga wo anuh ta wom, taku po ta mang ta mang, wa wiraman ngong tonin, wa ehuro hi, wa titien, wa husani hi, sinsin in epo enunu tin ta Got men,
men ku wa endara munuman kara ko po sun mi elup tin homani men, u mi elup tin ku me men men ku wa tunusngin tin sindak men.”

Li klet ma yang wa po tin khum ta u ponwal tumen li nuk ta tuo hi ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Wom hul, it men li si Yerusalem, ma wungin mosop tin po pokngin pok put epo Wiru Po Tunus men men ku si pyu pongin weh.
Epo po ku wa yang sup yanga wili po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, ma po mimi yang, u po wa manngin si po yang, u po kimos tip yang kut tumen.
Ma po wawlauk yang kut, anili po wi yang ko hun. Li klet ma ungunan tin me miuk angan men khama yang khek kyok si tunus.”
Takuma po ku mara hi ples wungin tin mosop imen ta ku tunus akomen. Awu. Sakalngin tin imen sinsin men kaun epo po, ma po pong epo sakalngin tin yang sakal i men.
Kut si yang li pol tikayung pi Yeriko, men wungin ta si nuk ti, epo yang maran mhi ta ung e hau amusukngin pit wo po tingi soput.
Ma yang hul po wa ilio angan tin muk muk me men, men yang kines po epo wungin sinsin tin po me epon men.
Tumen ma po pok yang epo a-Yesus tin api Nasaret men kha me men.
Tumen ma yang wut pit taku, “Yesus, ngon tin Wiru a-Dewit men, mip suk ngo!”
Kut ma po tin li muk men pio yang ma po wo epo yang ku yuk asin. Takuma yang iso wut pit ili awon weh ira sun tin yang yuk li muk men taku, “Ngon tin Wiru a-Dewit men, mip suk ngo!”
Tumen ma a-Yesus ting pit, ma yang wo epo po ku wa yang me epo sun. Ma yang kho me in tikayung sun kut, men yang kines sun taku,
“Mip epo ngo ku ning ela weh epo ngon?” Ti ma yang ko wo, “Ngon tin Akono men, mi ngo epo ngo ku si marango plas.”
Ti ma a-Yesus sakal ta yang taku, “Ngon men ku marap plas. Wo phepngin tap kha ning i ma marap si tunus men.”
Ti ma kerek engun ma yang maran plas, ma yang pet kira sun, ma yang wa Got yan si. Ma po masang to sun wala mosop ion wungin tin imen, men po sam sam Got epon kut tumen.
Li klet ma a-Yesus li sup Yeriko ma yang in e muk muk mi pi li.
Ih, yang ta in men yan a-Sakias, men wa kumang epon ku maran pit wo po tin hi palu takis ta sun phuan men, ma yang men miran.
Ma yang taku maran kon a-Yesus kuma yang hop sun, takuma yang khuk po engin, epo po tin wa ilio angan men phae mara yang, epo yang men hut sok weh.
Tumen ma yang saa li muk sun li si po sa nhum ta kuma yang maran ko kon sun, epo soput ta a-Yesus men li imen li.
Li klet ma a-Yesus li pol pi tin imen, men yang maran si kon sun, ma yang wo ta sun taku, “Sakias, e pus engin mu ko, epo homani ma ngo ku li nuk mang tin tap men.”
Tumen ma yang pus engin me ko, ma yang wa sun to min kehngin.
Si po masang to sun wala ion wungin tin imen, men po katiktik wungin pit wetpo yang taku, “Imen, yang kho li in to sun ta tin ning lasin nginangan men.”

Li klet ma a-Sakias si pit ma yang sakal ta sun tin Akono men taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, marap mu, nga wa enda tin ta ngo men tingit ta si ta po tin kalwok men kut khae. Ma taku nga klok endara ta hang po ta epo wungin torokngin tin nga wai pit po po men, men ku nga wai emhut sun ta po, kuru nga wai mnal ko ung po sun kut tumen.”
Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal ta sun taku, “Homani ma wungin tin Got palolo po tunus men men si mi mang tin iyi, epo yang men khuuknginin ta Abraham maksin kut tumen ako.
Epo Wiru Po Tunus men me epon ku langun epo po tin huuspit men kuma yang palolo po.”
Kut ma po nuk e hul sakalngin tin imen, men yang sakal emol ta kyok, epo yang li in tikayung Yerusalem u po masang to sun wala men phaeng taku homani kut men ku enunu tin ta Got men si in pi mlaeng.
Tumen ma yang sakal taku, “Yang akono ta li in wo mulusngin ta tin ung hin men kuma yang li wa enunu tan ta, anili ma yang kyok me.

Tumen ma yang yuk po tin kum ta yang men khaut eip ponwal me epo yang, ma yang wa eyuk eip ponwal ma yang kana wal po then then epon, ma yang wo ta po taku, ‘Wom men ku kum anaum epon li pol minan tin nga kyok me men.’
Si po tin nopu men mi hi lel yang. Ma po tih sun kara ira yang li sakal taku, “Mi pim epo yang tin imen ku si maran pit wo pim akomen.”

Li klet ma yang wa enunu tan kut ma yang kyok me, men wungin si nuk ti, men yang wo epo po tin kum ta yang e yang wa eyuk si ta hi kho men ku yukngin me epo yang, kuma yang ion eyuk tin po then then kum anaum ma po wai si po sun men.
Kut ma yang tin muk men me, men me sakal taku, ‘Phua, eyuk tap men nga kum anaum epon ma nga wa eyuk eip ponwal si po sun tap.’

Ti ma yang ko wo ta sun taku, ‘Ngon tin kum ta ngo e wungin tap tunus men, ngon men ning i tunus, epo ngon men marap pit wo endara sakun kara engun to wungin anuh, tumen ma ngon men ku in to emhong tin ku marap pit wo pi nunhum khaut eip ponwal epon men.’
Li klet ma yang tin me ponwal angan men me, men me sakal taku, ‘Phua, eyuk tap men nga kum anaum epon ma nga wa eyuk eip si po sun tap.’
Ti ma yang sakal maksin ta sun kyok taku, ‘Ngon men ku marap pit wo pi nunhum khaut eip.’
Li klet ma yang ta maksin me, men me sakal taku, ‘Phua, eyuk tin tap men wala iyi, men nga wai li nga pang pon epo mulu tingit tun ta.
Epo nga lem epo ngon, epo wungin tap men ngeng ngeng weh. Ngon men kot endara tap tin ngon ku wai mu kho som men, u ngon men lok lok endara tin ngon ku wha i kho som men kut tumen.’

Ti ma phua ko wo ta yang taku, ‘Ngon tin kum ta ngo e wungin tap lengwal men, sakalngin tin me pol mi wo ngon tuon men kha ku nga ples wungin tap epon men. E ion i kho epo wungin ta ngo men ngeng ngeng, ma nga kot endara ta ngo tin ngo ku wai me kho som men, u nga lok lok endara tin ngo ku wha i kho som men kut tumen.
Tua ma ngon ku wa eyuk ta ngo li nuk mi mang ta po tin mara hi pit wo eyuk men som, kuma nga me, men ku nga wai to sun tin ku ko ung po sun men?’
Ti ma phua sakal ta po tin nuk tikayung men taku, “Wom wa eyuk tin then imen hang yang men, si wom wai si ta yang tin in to eyuk eip ponwal men.’
Takuma po ko wo ta yang taku, ‘Phua, yang tin imen in to eyuk tan eip ponwal kho kut.’

Ti ma phua ko wo taku, ‘Nga sakal ta wom ti, epo po mosop tin kuk to endara ta hi kara kho men, men ku endara kara kyok ko po sun li si. Si taku po ta in engun epo endara, men ku endara tin sakun kara e yang iso in ton men, men ku klokngin epon maksin kut tumen.
Si wom espo po tin nolo ngo men mu iyi, tin mi hi epo ngo ku marango pit wo hi som men, ma wom lek po ko hu hu to mara ngo.’”
Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wungin tin imen kut, anima yang kho li muk po ira soput tin li si Yerusalem men.
Ma yang muk muk li pol tikayung pi Betpake u pi Betani, tumen, tin nuk sii pi tin po sikian Olip men ma wungin si nuk ti, men yang tih wulong ponwal tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men,

ma yang sakal ta wulong taku, “Mom lu sup pi tanuan tin ung maran min mom men, ma mom lu sup min kut, men ku mom pon ta donki nerengin ta tin kan kanngin pit e ku po ta ung won kho som men. Mom plos li, si mom wai mu iyi.
Ma taku po ta kines mom ti, ‘Mom plos li epo ele?’ men ku mom sakal ta po taku, ‘Yang tin Akono men ku ning kumang tan ta epon.’”
Kut ma wulong tin yang tih ngong li men li ira soput ta ngong, ma wulong li pon ta endara, men nuk siik ira sun tin a-Yesus wo ta wulong epon men.
Ma wulong in e plos donki tin nerengin men, men yang tin donki tan men ko kines wulong taku, “Mom plos donki tin nerengin imen epo ele?”
Ti ma wulong ko wo taku, “Yang tin Akono men ku ning kumang tan ta epon.”
Kut ma wulong wa li li epo a-Yesus. Ma wulong wa moolngin tin wulong phini nuk po sun men si ung wo donki tin nerengin men, ma wulong wa a-Yesus si ung wo li.
Ma yang ira soput li, men po munuman yas yas moolngin ta hi ko nuk e li li ira soput li.

Li klet ma yang li pol put soput tin taku li ko put pi Olip men, men po tin wa ilio angan mosop e hi hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men si mi hi keh keh, ma po wut hi pit pit ma po sam sam Got epo wungin maran kiring kiring tin nunhum e po ion i kho men,
ma po sakal taku, “Emhong tin ta Got men in to yang tin sinkhaung e me epo yang tin Akono men yan men! Wungin aminis men ku si in ili wet pi, u Got men ku yan si nhum ili awon weh kut tumen!”
Ti ma po Parisi kara tin kuk lunga sun tin wa ilio angan men sakal ta yang taku, “Ngon tin kot po men, e pio po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo ngon men akai.”
Ti ma yang sakal wet po taku, “Nga pok wom, taku po tin imen ku ping wo hi, men ku kerek engun ma enah tin nuk e li li men ku si yuk yuk.”
Ti ma yang li pol tikayung, men yang maran kon pi tin nhum men ma yang hau epon,

ma yang sakal taku, “Auh, ngon tin Yerusalem men, taku ngon ku ion wungin tin ku ning i ma e ung aminis epon men, iis, taku e ion i mi elup tin tap iyi weh, takuma awu. Tumen ma homani ma wungin tin imen men ku nuk kaunngin epo marap.
Epo elup men ku iso si, men ku po tin nolo ngon men me pulum po mulusngin ulu ngon, ma po kyok me baul ngon, ma po nghen eya ngon,

ma po hik hik ngon ko nuk mulus u husanim mosop tin kuk mi ngon men kut tumen; ma po ku mang ta enah ta ku si ung po sun ta akomen, sinsin epo ngon tin ku hop enal tin Got taku me tuh wo ngon epon men akomen.”
Ti ma yang li sup nowhang tin ta mang auluungin men ma yang ko luul to po tin nuk e kul kul endara u tirih endara, tumen, epon men li,
ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Sakalngin men panngin nuk ti, ‘Mang tin ta ngo men men ta kinesngin,’ si wom ning i ma si ken ‘pi uwin ta tin po tin nak nak endara hang sun amhees men li kaun min men.’”

Ti ma yang kot po nowhang tin ta mang auluungin men to ungunan then then. Si po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men, u po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men, u po tin li muk epo po masang to sun wala men kut tumen taku wi yang ko hun,
takuma po khuk po engin epo po ku ning wungin ta epo yang akomen, epo po masang to sun wala mosop kinga hi si kuk epo po ku hul sakalngin put then then mosop tin yang pok put men weh.

Kut ma ungunan tin imen ta si, ma yang in e kot po masang to sun wala mara mang auluungin ma yang in e pok put pok putngin tin tunus men, men wungin si nuk ti, epo po tin ning kumang auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men, u po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men, tumen, men me to po tin akokono men, ma po me wo si mara yang,
ma po sakal ta yang taku, “E pok pim weh, emhong tin ia ani e ning wungin tin mosop imen epon men? Wa ara weh wa emhong tin imen si tap?”
Ti ma yang sakal wet po taku, “Ngo kut men ku kines wom epo wungin ta, khama wom sakal wet ngo:
baptais tin ta a-Yon men, men api wet pi wa ta po tunus engun?”
Ti ma po mara hi pit min lunga hi tuo hi, men po sakal taku, “Taku it wo epon api wet pi, men ku yang sakal wet it ti, ‘Si tua ma wom ku wo wom nuk wet yang som?’
Wa taku it wo epon ta po tunus engun, men ku po masang to sun wala mosop si whis enah epo it, epo po wo hi phep epo a-Yon men pokngin ta.”
Tumen ma po sakal wet yang epo po men pong epo baptais tin ta a-Yon men tin me akani men.
Ti ma a-Yesus ko sakal ta po taku, “Kuru ngo ku pok wom epo emhong tin ia e nga ning wungin tin mosop imen epon men akomen kut tumen.”

Kut ma yang ko sakal emol si ta po masang to sun wala taku, “Yang ta wha mipi wain ta, ma yang wai li sup yanga wili po kara tin ku me kum anaum epon men. Li klet anima yang li in wo mulusngin ta tin ung hin men kuma yang li in li kho nginan.

Li klet ma enal si kut, men yang tih sun ta tin kum won men li epo po tin mara hi pit wo mipi wain ta yang men, kuma po wa wain enun tin ta mipi wain men kara si ta yang. Takuma po tin kum anaum mipi wain men wi yang, ma po tih yang li engul.
Angan ta kyok men yang tih sun ta maksin tin kum tan men kyok li; ma po wi yang kut, ma po wa manngin si po yang, ma po tih yang kyok li engun.
Kuru angan ta kyok ma yang tih sun tin me miuk angan men li; ma yang li po mumhek mi yang, ma po psik yang li pol wetpo ehup.
Li klet ma yang tin mipi wain tan men sakal taku, “Auh, ngo ku ning i tua? Ngo ku tih wiruk tin mi ngo epon weh men. Po ku ion yang, men ku po wo hi nuk wet yang wa men.’

Takuma po tin kum anaum mipi wain men ion yang, men po mara hi pit mi sakalngin lunga hi tuo hi, ma po sakal ta al taku, “Yang tin tuon ikop kha kuli pakuh pongin epo moolngin tin ta wiraman men kha ikop. Tih, it wi yang ko hun, kumali moolngin tin ta yang men men ku ta it.’
Tumen ma po psik yang li pol wetpo ehup ma po wi yang ko hun. Tumen ma yang tin mipi wain tan men ku ning i tua epo po tin imen?
Yang ku me lek po tin kum anaum mipi wain imen ko huu anima yang wa mipi wain si ta po enginin kara.” Ti ma po hul wungin tin imen, men po sakal taku, “Timen ku pi om weh.”
Ti ma a-Yesus supa po, ma yang sakal taku, “Si tua ma sakalngin panngin nuk ti, ‘Enah tin po tin ning mang men mut i men men kho si enah tin ung mang sinsin siin emol e nhum epo sun kara men.’
Taku po ta plong ko po enah tin imen, men ku ko pal, si taku enah tin imen plong ko po po ta, men ku konian i ko epian.”

Ti ma minan tin imen siik men po tin ning kumang auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men, u po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men kut tumen, taku wa wili hi si po yang, takuma po lem pit wo po masang to sun wala. Epo po ion i epo yang sakal emol tin imen pit wo po.

Tumen ma po mara hi pit wo yang, ma po tih sun tin ku li wa emon men tin pong apele epo hi e kuk siik men, kuma po li suo lasin ta yang ta, kumali po wa yang sup yanga wili emhong tin ta phua e yang maran pit wo pi tin tan men epon men.

Kut ma po kines yang taku, “Ngon tin kot pim men, pim a ion i epo e sakal u e kot po tumen, men e ning i to wungin siik ako, ma e wa po mosop to wungin then, si ngon ku lem pit wo po ta som. Awu. E kot po epo soput tin ta Got men to wungin irawin misan.
Iyi, wungin sinsin sam wet it epo it tin ku kul takis si ta Sisa men wa pi engun?”
Takuma yang ion mi wungin tin po taku kek emuh mara yang men, ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Wom taku karong ngo epo ele?
Wom suk marango epo ulu ta wet. Ulu tin imen ara enun u panngin ta are nuk pon?” Ti ma po sakal wet yang taku, “Men ta Sisa.”
Ti ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Kut ma wom wa endara tin ta Sisa men men ku kyok si ta Sisa weh, si wom wa endara tin ta Got men men ku kyok si ta Got weh.”
Ti ma po khuk po engin epo po ku suo lasin ta yang ta to mara po masang to sun wala. Ma po teret wo sakalngin tin yang sakal wet po epon men, ma po homong.
Li klet ma po Sadyusi tin wo epo khekngin kyok si e pi engul men kara me epo yang ma po kines yang taku,
“Ngon tin kot po men, a-Moses pan sakalngin ta epo it epon taku po ta wiron hun, si titien iso in, ma yang hun si ku khuuk husanin kara som, men ku wiron wa titien ma khuuk husanin ko kuk ewi wiron.
Tumen ma po irit won khaut eip u ponwal me sup tumen men kuk. Ma yang tin muk men enangin wut wala ta, li yang hun si yang ku khuuk sun ta som.
Kut ma yang tin me ponwal angan men wa wut me ung tan, li yang hun si yang ku khuuk sun ta som kyok kut tumen.
Li klet ma yang tin me miuk angan men wa wut ma yang hun kut, kuru po tin kara e hi khaut eip ponwal u ponwal me sup tumen kuk e pat wal wut kut tumen, ma po kuk anga pitngin kut, anili po huu.
Li klet ma wut tin wala men hun kut.
Tumen ma minan tin kuli po tin hu hu kho men ku khek kyok si men, wut tin wala imen kuli titie ara weh? Epo po tin ponwal me sup men kha mosop enangin wut men.”
Ti ma a-Yesus sakal wet po taku, “Po tin khuuk wal mi elup tin homani men men enangin sun wala u po wa sun wala me ung ta hi kut tumen ewin.
Si po tin Got ion po e tunus epon ku sup mi elup tin imen u khekngin kyok si mi po tin huu kho men, tumen, kuli enangin sun wala wa po ku wa sun wala me ung ta hi kyok akomen.
Kuru po men ku hu hu kyok akomen, epo po to sun tihngin men kuli po hi kai wal, ma po si husani Got, epo po men ku kuk pit mina sun tin ku iso khek kyok si men.

Si po tin hu hu kho e kuli khek kyok si men, men a-Moses wa wungin si in pi mlaeng epon mi sakalngin put tin pok epo wolopon men, minan tin yang sikia yang tin Akono men ti, ‘Got tin ta Abraham, u Got tin ta Aisak, u Got tin ta a-Yakop men tumen.’
Epo yang men ku Got ta po tin hu hu kho men som. Awu. Yang men Got ta po tin enu hi iso tunus kuk men ako, epo to mara Got men po mosop enu hi iso tunus kuk ako.”
Ti ma po kara tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men sakal wet yang taku, “Ngon tin kot pim men, e nut sakalngin.”
Ma minan tin imen ma li kut men po lem epo po tin ku kyok me kines yang kyok epo wungin ta men.
Kut si yang sakal ta po taku, “Tua ma po sakal epo Mesaia e wiru sun a-Dewit?
Epo a-Dewit tuon sakal mi Kisang tin to Lutngin men taku, ‘Yang tin Akono men sakal ta sun tin Akono ta ngo men taku, “E ko ung ewo wili ngo tin eronin men,
li pol minan tin kuli nga wa po tin nolo ngon men me sup wet khip ken po e ehus ta khip ta men.”’
Tumen ma a-Dewit sikia sun ‘Akono,’ si tua ma yang tin Akono men e ku wiru sun men?”
Kut ma po masang to sun wala nuk e hul, men yang ko sakal ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men taku,

“Wom men ku haum tunus epo po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men, tin mi hi epo po ku mili mili mi moolngin tin nomalaklak men, u po mi hi pit pit wo sun tin ku paret yukngin ta hi mi nal walngin tin ung e li li men, u po mi hi pit pit wo ehus tin turunus weh e ku po ung e li li won mi mang akotngin tin ung e li li men, u po mi hi pit pit pi tin ta po tin ya hi pos e po ko nuk e li li ewo tili hi mi kakaomngin men kut tumen.

Po men me torok mara sun tin wawamuh men ma po uspo endara tin pit mi mok ta sun men, u po ning kinesngin li maran nomalaklak kuma po masang to sun wala ion sun kut tumen. Po tin imen kuli huuspit mi wungin ples nginan, men ku nhum epo sun kara.
Kut si yang maran si kon po mimiran kara men kuk e whis talungin ta hi ko mi wunwun tin ta mang auluungin e po whis talungin ta hi ko min ewin men.
Kuru yang ion wut wala wamuh ta tin in amusukngin men men me whis ulu tin tururun weh men ponwal ko mi wunwun kut tumen.
Ti ma yang sakal taku, “Nga wo anuh ta wom, epo wut tin wala wamuh e in amusukngin imen men whis talungin tan ko mi wunwun, men nhum epo sun mosop.

Epo po tin mosop imen endara ta hi men tang pit ma po me whis i tin ku po talu Got epon men kara ko engun, si wut men kalwok weh ma wut me whis i tin ku wut in anga tunusngin epon men mosop tin wut in ton men ko mi wunwun.”
Kut si po kara kuk e sakal epo mang auluungin, tin po pa mool i epo enah pon turunus kara u to talungin tin po kara wai si epo mi hi men kut tumen, men yang sakal taku,
“Endara tin mosop e mara wom kon i homani men, men elup ta ku iso si, men ku enah tin imen ta ku po mang tan ung po sun ta akomen. Awu. Enah mosop men ku po ninhien i ko.”
Tumen ma po kines yang taku, “Ngon tin kot pim men, si wungin tin imen ku si to pi elini? U tosukngin tin ia e ku si minan tin wungin tin mosop imen ku si angan epon men tumen?”

Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Wom men ku haum tunus, epon akuli torokngin kara ek ek mara wom. Epo po munuman men ku me epo ya ngo, ma hi me sakal taku, ‘Ngo men Mesaia tuon,’ u ‘Enal me tikayung kut khae,’ ti tumen. Tumen ma wom men ku lu ira po asin.

Si minan tin ku wom hul epo lek walngin kara si u po kara si wawhim sun phuan tin mara hi pit wo hi men kut tumen, men ku wom papham asin. Epo wungin tin mosop imen ku weh si muk wet, si elup tin ku li ponsol men men ku si yek minan tin imen akomen.”

Kut ma yang wo ta po kyok taku, “Po tin khuuk wal wo mulusngin ta men ku si sewut sun tin khuuk wal wo mulusngin enginin ta men, u po tin ung mi enunu ta men ku si sewut sun tin ung mi enunu enginin ta men kut tumen.

Ma pi kin nunhum kara ku si si wo mulusngin, u elwip, u saihngin lengwal kara ku wat po yanga pi kut tumen. Ma suk marangin kara ku si tin ku po lem epon men u tosukngin nunhum ku si ili wet pi kut tumen.

Si muk epo wungin tin mosop imen, men ku po wili hi si po wom ma po ning i lengwal epo wom, men ku po wa wom lu sup yanga wili po tin ku ples wungin ta wom mi mang akotngin tin ung e li li men, anili po wa wom lu sup mi mang tin po kan kan sun li pit min ewin men kut tumen. Po ku wa wom lu nuk mara po tin sinkhaung men u po tin phuan men kut tumen, sinsin epo ya ngo tin ung wo wom men.
Aku, wungin tin imen ku si, men ku pi min ek tunus ta tin ku wom pok put sakalngin ta ngo epon men si ung hut.
Tumen ma wom men ku kaek wo wungin weh mi wom ti, epo wom men ku mara wom ira wungin kho nuk mi wom tin ku wom sakal wet po epon men asin.
Epo ngo ku wa mhin ekngin ko nuk wo wom tin ku wo wom po elel ton men, tin po mosop tin nolo wom men ku hik put wa pit nhing wet akomen.

Po ku wa wom sup yanga wili po nolo, men po tin khuuk wom men u po tin wom irit won men, u po tin ewo wom men, u po tin tita wom men, tumen, kha ku ning i tumen epo wom maksin kut tumen. Ma po ku lek wom kara ko huu.
Ma po masang to sun wala mosop men ku mi hi lel wom, sinsin epo ya ngo tin ung wo wom men.
Takuma yut wom tin ung po wom men men ku ta kis akomen.
Wom tin ku pit nhing wet won maikngin men kha kuli wom kasum enu wom epon men.
Si taku wom ion pi Yerusalem men po nolo me baul i, khama wom ion i epo elup ti ku pi Yerusalem ko tahunggu epon men men kho me tikayung kut khae.

Minan tin imen men ku po tin kuk Yudia men men ku mhup li si po pi emian, u po tin ung emin pi Yerusalem men ku mang ta pi ma po li, u po tin li kuk woringi pi men men ku kyok me Yerusalem asin kut tumen.
Epo elup tin imen men ku ta mumhek mingin tin ku Got ning wungin emhut lasin ta po epon men, kumali sakalngin mosop tin panngin nuk kho men ku si enun ung e li li hut weh.

Auweh, po wala tin ku kuma hi men u po wala tin ku kuk e pa sus sun hoin men, tumen, mi elup tin imen, men ku wo hi maik hi weh! Epo won maikngin nhum men ku ko wo mulusngin tin iyi, u mumhek mi ngin men ku ko po po masang to sun wala tin khuuk wal ko pit iyi kut tumen.

Ma po men ku sun lek hi ko huu epo bainat ngin, ma po tet sun li ung e li li mi po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men. Ma po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men ku sak sak po pi Yerusalem weh li pol minan tin kuli elup tin ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men ung e wiewi al li pyu pongin weh men.

Ma tosukngin kara ku si epo sinang u namih u awheng tin nuk e li li ili wet pi men kut tumen; u wo mulus men ku po tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li yangan men ku miu hi tuung weh, ma po kuum la makasul, epon tin wiu ingut hambip u esap hihik amhees kut tumen.
Po tunus men ku mara hi hihih ma ku huu angan, sinsin epo lemngin tin po hoo mi hi epo won maikngin tin ku iso si wo mulus men, epo endara tin nuk nhing ili wet pi men ku kuk e plak sup mi al engun.
Ma minan tin imen men ku po ion Wiru Po Tunus, men ku me mi hingis ta to kakhangin u moolngin nhum takut tumen.
Si minan tin wungin tin mosop imen hosingin si, men ku mara wom lu si ma mhi wom pham si, epo enal tin ku wo wom pias ton men men me kuk enu mara wom angan kut khae.”
Kut ma yang sakal emol ta si ta po taku, “Mara wom lu kon sa pik u sa kara kyok kut tumen.
Minan tin sa puun kyok si men, men wom ion i ma tuo wom pon tan epo pi seng men ku me tikayung angan kut khae.
Wom kut, taku wom ion wungin tin mosop imen si tumen, men ku wom ion i epo enunu tin ta Got men, men ku me tikayung kut khae.
Nga sakal anuh ta wom ti, epo po tin kuk e khuuk wal mi elup tin imen ku huu kho som, si wungin tin mosop imen ku weh si muk.
Wet pi to mulus men kuli om ako, si sakalngin tin ta ngo men ku om angan akomen.

Si wom men ku haum tunus epo wom tuo wom weh, epon akuli wom kakaom u wom um um u sila wom khing epo wungin tin ta pi mulus men, ma wungin tin imen nak nak mi wom ma tulu wom som som, ma ungunan tin wala imen ku si po wom, men ku wom teret epon.
Epon men ku si po po mosop tin ung e li li wo mulus men ken esih ta tin ku po li kuh epon men.
Tumen ma wom haum tunus, ma wom kines Got sumsum epo yang ku ion wom ken wom e ku tunus epo wom ku yek ta wungin tin mosop e ku iso si men, kumali wom lu nuk nhing to mara Wiru Po Tunus.”
Epo to pi mhangin men yang in e kot po mi mang auluungin, si to pi luk men yang li nuk po pi emian tin po sikian Olip men.
Li klet ma to pi tin huus kingkauk kokyok kokyok men men po masang to sun wala mosop kyok me epo yang nowhang tin ta mang auluungin men kuma po hul wet yang.
Kut si kakaomngin tin epo beret tin yiis om min men ku si angan, men kakaomngin tin po sikian Paska men.

Ma po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men kut tumen tohuh epo soput ta tin ku po wi yang ko hun epon men, epo po lem pit wo sun masang to sun wala.
Epo minan timen a-Nolongin me sup mi a-Yudas, tin yan ta kyok a-Iskariot men. Yang men in lunga po tin khaut eip ponwal u ponwal me nuk wo sun men tumen.

Tumen ma yang ira soput li ma po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po tin mara hi pit wo sun tin haum eya mang auluungin men kut tumen hi pok wal epo soput tin tua ani ku yang wa a-Yesus li sup yanga wili po epon men.
Ma po mi hi keh keh, ma po mi hi then epo po ku wa ulu kara si ta yang.
Tumen ma yang tung tung to mara po ma yang tohuh epo yang ku pon ta pi min ek tunus ta tin ku po masang to sun wala tin wa ilio angan men kis kis ma yang wa sun li sup yanga wili po epon men.
Li klet ma ungunan tin epo beret tin yiis om min men si, men ungunan tin ku po lek sipsip asus tin epo Paska men weh ko huu epon men.
Ma a-Yesus tih a-Pita ngong a-Yon li, men yang sakal ta wulong taku, “Mom lu hihi kakaomngin tin epo Paska men ta it, kuma it li iini.”
Tumen ma wulong ko sakal ta yang taku, “Mip epo tuk ku li hihi i ko pit ia?”
Ti ma yang ko wo ta wulong taku, “Mom hul, mom lu sup mi enunu, men ku yang ta me tut mom, men lat karia eplukan ta tin eki kuk min men. Mom ira yang li sup mi mang tin yang li sup min men,

ma mom wo ta yang tin phuan e mang tan men taku, ‘Yang tin kot it men ku sakal tap ti, “Mang min tin ta po nomisang e ku nga ii kakaomngin tin epo Paska men min to po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo ngo men ani ung a?”’
Anima yang ku suk mara mom epo mang min nhum ta ung po eki sun tin po hihi suyung, umu u tumen pit min kho men. Pi tin imen kha ku mom hihi kakaomngin epon men.”
Tumen ma wulong li pon ta endara men maran pit ewin ken sun tin yang wo ta wulong epon kho men, ma wulong ko hihi kakaomngin tin epo Paska men.
Li klet ma sinang maran tin imen si, men yang ko nuk ewo tilin kuma yang ii endara, kuru po tin paengin e khaut eip ponwal u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen ko nuk ewo tili hi to yang kut tumen.
Kut ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Epo mi ngo weh kha kho ma mi ngo epo ngo ku ii kakaomngin tin iyi to wom, anili nga wuh won maikngin.
Epo nga sakal ta wom ti, ngo men ku ii kakaomngin kyok som weh li pol minan tin kuli wungin si enun ung hut mi enunu tin ta Got men.”
Li klet ma yang wa karu ta si, yang sam sam Got epon kut, anima yang wo ta po taku, “Wom wai tin iyi, ma wom kikyu i mili lunga wom.
Epo nga sakal ta wom taku, ngo men ku um wain tin enun si put elik men sut kyok som, weh li pol minan tin kuli enunu tin ta Got men ku iso me men.”

Ti ma yang wa beret ta si, ma yang sam sam Got u yang tik tik i tumen kho, anima yang wai si ta po, ma yang sakal taku, “Tin iyi men emkusi ngo kha men, tin mi ngo alang sin mut eya wom men. Wom ning wungin tin imen kuma tulu wom hu pit po ngo epon.”

Kuru yang ira wungin then ma yang wa karu ta si sulung epo po tin ii endara men, ma yang sakal taku, “Karu tin iyi men los po wungin tin Got kaek siin homan lungan to wom epo kalol a ngo men kha men, tin nga yuk yuk i ko epon ku nhio wo wom men.
Si wom hul, epo yang tin ku wa ngo sup yanga wili po nolo men wilin in to ngo wo suyung.
Ma irawin weh epo Wiru Po Tunus men ku li ken sun tin wungin hihingin kho epon men, takuma won maikngin nhum men ku si epo yang tin ku wa sun li sup yanga wili po nolo men!”
Kut ma po ko hosi kinesngin lunga hi tuo hi epo ara weh in lunga po ku ning wungin tin imen.
Kuru heek walngin ta si lunga po, men po heek wal pit mi ara in lunga po, men ku po wo epon e nhum weh epo sun kara.

Ti ma yang ko sakal ta po taku, “Po tin sinkhaung e mara hi pit wo sun tin ta hi e hi ku khuuk wal Yuda som men men tohuh weh epo po ku si nhum epo sun, ma po kara tin emhong nuk wut hi men sikia hi tuo hi tin nhio wo po ewin men.

Takuma wungin tin imen ku si lunga wom asin, si po ta tin ku si nhum weh lunga wom men, men ku in ken po tin nerengin men engun, u po ta tin ku maran pit wo wom men men ku in ken po tin kum ta sun engun men kut tumen.

Epo po tin ia e nhum epo sun, men po ta tin nuk ewo tilin wo suyung men wa po ta tin kum ta sun men? Iyi, men po ta tin nuk ewo tilin wo suyung men kha nhum epo sun men ako, wah? Si ngo men me in lunga wom ken po ta tin kum ta sun engun men.
Wom men men po tin iso kuk to ngo wet won maikngin tin ta ngo men.
Si ngo men pakuh po wom epo enunu ta, ken Yok tin pakuh po ngo epo enunu ta men,

kumali wom ii enda u wom um tumen wo suyung tin ta ngo men mi enunu tin ta ngo men, ma wom ko ung e li li wo ehus tin ta po tin sinkhaung men, ma wom ples wungin ta po tin khum ta u ponwal me nuk wo sun, tumen, tin ung e pho po wal then then weh lunga hi Israel men.”
Ti ma yang tin Akono men ko sakal taku, “Saimon, Saimon, e hul! Epo Got sam wet a-Nolongin kho epo yang ku karong wom, ken po tin tok tok wit kuma elit koklok po sun tin imtun men weh li men.
Si ngo men kines Got mut eya ngon kho, epo wo phepngin tap men ku put mut akomen. Ma minan tin kuli e kyok mu epo ngo men, men ku e pa nhing po tin ehurom men.”

Ti ma a-Saimon ko wo ta sun taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, ngo men hihi epo ngo ku li to ngon, ngo ku weh li to ngon mi mang tin po wo hi maik hi min ewin men u weh li sup to ngon mi hunngin kut tumen ako.”
Takuma a-Yesus ko wo taku, “Pita, nga pok ngon, epo emon nomal ta kuli iso wum kho som, si ngon men kuli sup sup angan miuk kho epo ngon men iso pong epo ngo.”

Ti ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Kho ma nga tirih wom lu, si eyel u elik airun u sandel tin ung hut khi wom men men pi engun, men wom kalwok epo endara ta, wah?” Ti ma po ko wo taku, “Awu, men pi engun.”

Tumen ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Si homani men po ta ku eyel tan ta ung, men ku wai, kuru elik airun tan ta ung, men ku wai kut tumen; u po ta ku in engun epo bainat ta, men ku tirih moolngin tin tan men ma kul i tan ta kut tumen.

Epo nga wo ta wom taku, epo sakalngin tin panngin nuk men men ku weh si enun ung hut epo ngo, tin wo taku, ‘Ma po mara hi ion yang ken yang e in lunga po tin hik put wungin sinsin men ta.’ Epo sakalngin tin panngin nuk epo ngo kho men, men ku si pyu pongin weh.”
Tumen ma po ko wo taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, marap mu, bainat ponwal wala iyi.” Ti ma yang ko sakal ta po taku, “Tin imen kut.”
Kut ma yang me pol, men yang li po pi emian Olip, tin yang in e li epon kho ewin men, kuru po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men pet kira yang kut tumen.
Ma yang kho me pol pi tin imen, men yang sakal ta po taku, “Wom kines Got epo yang ku wa wom sup mi karongngin asin.”
Ti ma yang osong li hin long epo po, men pi maran nomalak long kai enah tin ku po psik i li ko epon men, ma yang li powut ko suul ma yang kines,
ma yang sakal taku, “Yok, taku mip epon, men ku e klok karu tin imen li epo ngo. Takuma e ning wungin tin mi ngo epon men som, si e ning wungin tin mip epon men weh.”
Tumen ma tihngin ta me ko wet pi ma si put plo nginan to mara yang, ma tihngin pa nhing sun.
Ma yang miun tuung weh, ma yang tohuh epo kinesngin hambip weh epo sun tin kho men. Ma muk lungin ta yang men si ken yang kalolan tin psit psit ko wo mulus men.
Ma yang khek si epo kinesngin kut, ma yang kyok li pol ta po tin hul wet kotngin mi wo yang men, men yang li pon ta po tin kuk e nanhaung men, sinsin epo po tin mi hi urut hi men.
Ti ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Tua ma wom nuk e nhaung? Wom kekhek si ma wom kines, epon akuli wom lu sup mi karongngin.”

Tumen ma yang pit e sakal, ih, po wa ilio angan me ma yang tin po sikian a-Yudas men, tin in mi po tin khum ta u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen, men kho li muk epo po, ma yang li tikayung a-Yesus kuma yang tumum wo sun.
Si a-Yesus sakal ta sun taku, “Yudas, e wa Wiru Po Tunus li sup yanga wili po nolo epo tumum wongin ta ani men?”
Si po tin nuk baul yang men ion wungin tin ku si men, men po sakal ta yang taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, pim ku lek po epo bainat, wah?”
Ti ma yang ta in lunga po men wi sun tin kum ta yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men ma yang klok kinga sun tin ato sa men ko.
Takuma a-Yesus ko sakal wet po taku, “Wom mang si wungin tin imen si engun!” Ti ma yang wilin si nuk po kinga sun, ma yang kingan kyok si tunus.
