Ma Got mumhek mi po nopu tin ung e khuuk wal ta hi weh khaut eip u ponwal me sup e ung e li li wo mulusngin Kenan men kho kut, anima yang kikyu po Israel epo mulusngin ta hi then then.
Ma sulung epo wungin tin imen, to posan khum khum mnal u khum eip (450) wa tumen, men Got won ung wo po kara tin ku ples wungin ta po men, li pol mi elup tin ta a-Samuel tin pokngin men.
Ma po kuk li ma po hau epo po sinkhaung ta. Tumen ma Got wa a-Sol tin wiru sun a-Kis e khuuknginin ta a-Bensamin ta men si maran pit wo po to posan khum mnal.

Li pol minan tin Got wiewi a-Sol men, anima yang wa a-Dewit si sinkhaung ta po, ma yang pok put wungin epo sun ma yang sakal taku, ‘Nga pon ta a-Dewit tin wiru sun a-Yesi men, men po ta tin min ira mi ngo weh men, men ku ning wungin mosop tin nuk ta mi ngo men.’
Ma yang tin imen kha ku Got ira wungin tin yang wo kuk mara po epon kho men ma yang wa Palolongin ta po Israel ta si mi khuuknginin tin tan men, men a-Yesus ako.
Yang men ku kho me som, si a-Yon pok put wungin epo baptais tin los po phae mingin men si ta po Israel mosop muk kho.

Ma a-Yon taku suuk sii kumang tan, men yang sakal ti, ‘Si wom phaeng taku ngo men are? Ngo ku yang akomen. Takuma wom hul, epo po ta ku iso me sulung epo ngo, men sandel tin ung hut khi yang men men ngo ku tunus epo ngo ku plos i akomen.’

Wom masang tin worok hi men, wom tin wiru Abraham hi tin hi khuuk wal men, u po tin kuk lunga wom e lem pit wo Got men kut tumen, wom kha sakalngin tin ku it palolongin epon iyi tihngin me epo wom men.

Epo po tin ung Yerusalem men, u po phuan tin ta hi e mara hi pit wo sun men, men ku hop yang akomen, kuru po ku hop mi wut po pokngin tin sakalngin ta hi tiikngin kokyok kokyok to pi Sabat men akomen kut tumen, khali sakalngin si enun ung hut ma po wo los yang epo yang men ku hun.
Aku, po ku pon ta wungin sinsin ta tin ku yang hun epon men som, takuma po hau si wo a-Pailat epo yang ku wo ma po wi yang ko hun engun.
Li klet ma po suuk sii sakalngin mosop tin panngin nuk epo yang kho men, anima po wa yang me ko put sa, ma po wa yang li nuk mi uwin tin tanuan men ta.
Takuma Got khek yang mi hunngin kyok si tunus,

ma yang si put plo nginan to ungunan munuman ta po tin me to yang Galili ma hi li si Yerusalem men, men po tin wala homani ma pok put wungin ta yang tin po mara hi nuk pon men si ta po masang to sun wala tin ta it men.
Ma pim men pok put sakalngin tunus kara si ta wom, men ti, sakalngin tin Got wo kuk mara po tin inana it men epon kho men,

khali homani ma Got kaini ta it tin husani po men kho kut men, wala li yang khek a-Yesus si men, men ken sakalngin tin panngin nuk mi Lutngin tin me ponwal angan men tin sakal taku, ‘Ngon men Wiruk, homani kut ma nga khuuk ngon.’

Kuru Got tin khek yang mi hunngin kyok si kuma homani ma li kut men ku yang whuk kyok akomen, men yang sakal epon ira wungin tin ti, ‘Ngo ku wa endara tin nga wo anuh maran ko klat ta a-Dewit epon men si ta wom weh.’
Sinsin tin imen khali yang sakal kyok mi Lutngin ta kyok taku, ‘Ngon ku mang ta yang tin Auluungin tap weh men kuli emkusin whuk akomen.’

Epo a-Dewit men ira wungin tin nuk ta mi Got men ma yang kum ta sun mi elup tin hi khuuk wal min men kho kut, anima yang ko nuk e nhaung, ma po kil yang to po tin inana hi men, ma yang emkusin ko whuk mi nahu kho ako.
Si yang tin Got khek i kyok si men, men emkusin ku whuk mi nahu akomen.
Tumen ma wom masang tin ehurok men, wom men ku ion i weh epo yang tin imen kha sakalngin pok putngin si ta wom epo lasin klok nginan men.
Ma sakalngin mosop tin wom khuk po engin epo wom ku si kuk siik epo wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men, men po mosop tin wo hi phep pit wo yang men khali po si kuk siik to mara Got epon men.
Tumen ma wom haum, epon akuli sakalngin tin pok putngin si mi kisang tin ta po pokngin men si ta wom, tin sakal taku,

‘Wom tin ion sakalngin ken i e amiron nginan engun men, wom men ku hul weh, epo wom men ku papham wet anima wom huu! Epo ngo ku ning kumang ta mi elup tin ta wom men, men kumang ta tin ku wo wom nuk wet angan ta akomen, aku, taku po ta pok wom epon mosop.’”
Ti ma po Yuda yok mi mang akotngin ma po kho li pol kut, men po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men hau nuk sii khi sun epo wungin tin imen ku pok putngin si ta po to pi Sabat tin ku kyok si men.

Ma po tin palu wal mi mang akotngin men yang wal kho kut, anima po Yuda u po tin lem pit wo Got e hi phae ira wo phepngin ta po Yuda men munuman ira a-Pol ngong a-Barnabas, ma wulong wo ta po, ma wulong taku sakal phae mi po weh kuma po iso ira nanaangin tin ta Got men weh li kut.
Li klet ma pi Sabat tin ira sun men si, ma tikayung epo po mosop tin ung epo pi tin imen li palu wal kuma po hul sakalngin ta Got.
Takuma minan tin po Yuda mara hi kon sun tin wa ilio angan men, men po mi hi heh wet sun ma po taku sakal hik hik put sun u po ton mi sun kut tumen, ma po sakal ewut sakalngin tin a-Pol sakal i men.

Kut ma a-Pol ngong a-Barnabas wo phepngin ta wulong si pit nhing, ma wulong sakal ti, “Sakalngin men weh nuk epo sakalngin tin ta Got men men ku pok putngin si ta wom muk. Takuma wetpo wom wai ma wom mang tan lu, ma wom ples wungin epo wom tuo wom taku wom e ku tunus epo wom ku wa tunusngin tin sindak men akomen, kha homani ma pim a phae mili epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men kut khae.

Epo wungin tin imen kha yang tin Akono men wo maran ko klat epo pim taku, ‘Nga hihi ngon epo ngon kha ku si esul ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, kumali wungin tin ku Got palolo po epon men, men ku weh li pol porili mulusngin mosop epo ngon.’”

Po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men hul sakalngin tin imen men po mi hi keh keh ma po wangan po sakalngin tin ta yang tin Akono men. Ma po khaut esini siik tin wungin hihingin epo hi kho epo hi ku wa tunusngin tin sindak men kha wo hi phep men.
Ma sakalngin ta yang tin Akono men men pat walngin li yanga pi tin imen sup e klet.

Takuma po Yuda seh po ewhat sun wala tin lalamit e lem pit wo Got men, u po masang tin mimiran e kuk pi tin imen kut tumen, ma po hosin epo po ku ning i lengwal ewut a-Pol ngong a-Barnabas, ma po luum to wulong wo mulusngin tin ta hi men li.
Takuma wulong tung tung nokokwa tin nuk yanga khi wulong men ko kuma wungin timen kha ku wulong pok put wungin ewut po epon men, si wulong li Aikoniam.
Si po tin ira kotngin men min kehngin u Emiun Auluungin tumen ko kol kol mi po.

Si wungin si pol ko li Aikoniam ti, epo wulong lahun li sup mi mang akotngin tin ta po Yuda men, ma wulong li nut sakalngin pok put nginan, tumen ma po wa ilio angan tin api Yuda u Grik kut tumen wo hi phep.
Takuma po Yuda tin ku wo hi phep som men seh po ewhat sun tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, ma po mi hi lengwal pit po sun tin hi ehuro it men.

Tumen ma wulong in ko pit imen maran nomalak long, ma wulong sakal amdal mi yang tin Akono men, ma yang pa nhing sii sakalngin tin wulong pok put epo nanaangin tin ta yang men, ma yang wa tosukngin u wungin ateret wo nginan tumen maran kiring kiring si ningngin yanga wili wulong.
Tumen ma po masang to sun wala tin ung pi tin nhum imen pok mi al, ma po kara ira sun Yuda, si po kara ira wulong tin paengin men.
Li klet ma po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men u po Yuda kut tumen to po tin akokono ta hi men taku sewut wulong angan ma po taku ning wulong lengwal u po taku lek wulong epo enah ko huu kut tumen,
men wulong ion i kho ma wulong mhup li Listra u Derbe, men pi tin nunhum e ung wo mulusngin Laikonia men, u li pi tin ung e li li baul sun men kut tumen,
ma wulong in e pok put pok putngin tin tunus men ko pit imen.
Ma yang ta in ko li Listra men kakhangin tin in po khin lup lup men om ma ung, men tonin khuuk i yek ko khin hu hu ma ku muk muk ewin akomen.
Yang tin imen hul wet a-Pol tin in e sakal men. Ma a-Pol maran li tuk pit wo sun, ma yang ion sun tin in to wo phepngin tin ku yang si tunus epon men kho,
khama a-Pol wut pit pit ili awon taku, “E khek si pit siik epo khip!” Ti ma yang lup si ma yang muk muk mili mili.

Ma po masang to sun wala mara hi kon wungin tin a-Pol ning i kut men, anima po wut hi si, ma po sakal ira sakalngin tin ta hi Laikonia men taku, “Got kara tin ta it men kho me ko epo it, wala maran ken po tunus men imen!”
Ti ma po ko sikia a-Barnabas men a-Sus, u po sikia a-Pol men a-Hermes tumen, epo yang kha li muk to sakalngin men.

Tumen ma yang tin kum auluungin ta got tin ta hi a-Sus men, men got tin ta po e mang auluungin tan ung wetpo enunu maran min pi nhum tin ta hi men, men espo bulmakau kara u monkini tin po susulu i men li mara sowon, epo yang taku ning talungin wo suyung epo bulmakau tin imen to po tin wa ilio angan men.

Takuma a-Barnabas ngong a-Pol tin ngong paengin men hul epo wungin tin imen, men wulong kakhas moolngin ta ngong tin nuk po sun men, si wulong mhup li sup mi po tin wa ilio angan men, ma wulong wut ngong pit pit,

ma wulong sakal taku, “Tuon, tua ma wom ning wungin tin imen? Tuk men tunusan ma tuk a khuukngin maksin pit mina wom, ma tuk a pok put sakalngin si ta wom epo wom men ku phae epo endara tin sinsin om imen lu epo Got tin in kokyok kokyok men, tin ning wet pi, u mulus, u wiu, u endara mosop tin kuk e li li min men kut tumen.
Got tin imen men elup tin po khuuk wal min e kho li men, men yang mang ta po mosop tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li men, si hi ira wungin ta hi tuo hi weh.

Takuma yang ku mang ta endara tin pok put yang men pi om weh akomen, wala yang ning i tunus kara, ma yang wa pi yung wet pi me ko ta it, u yang wa endara ko ta it mi elup tin tan weh men, ma yang ning i ma it mut mut epo enda aiingin u epo min kehngin kut tumen.”
Wulong pok put wungin tin imen, takuma men nuk po lel lelngin engun epo po tin wa ilio angan men tin taku ning talungin epo wulong men.

Kut si po Yuda kara me Antiok u Aikoniam men me pi tin imen, ma po wo ko mi po tin wa ilio angan men ma po tup ewut a-Pol epo enah ma po hih yang li pol wetpo pi tin nhum imen, epo po wo taku yang e hun kut.
Takuma po tin ira kotngin men me nuk baul yang kut, khama yang khek si pit ma yang kyok li sup mi pi tin nhum men. Li pi king kauk ko yang men yang yok to a-Barnabas ma ngong li Derbe.
Ma wulong li pok put pok putngin tin tunus men pi tin nhum imen, ma wulong ning i ma po munuman si ira kotngin tin ta a-Yesus men kho kut, anima wulong kyok li Listra u Aikoniam u Antiok kut tumen,

ma wulong pa nhing enu po tin ira kotngin men u wulong wo nut po epo po ku iso ira wungin tin po wo hi nuk wet men weh kut tumen, ma wulong sakal taku, “It ku sup mi won maikngin munuman wet, anili it li sup mi enunu tin ta Got men.”

Ma wulong wo ngong ung wo po akokono kara mi palu walngin then then, ma wulong suuh mi ngong u kines Got tumen kho kut, anima wulong wa po sup yanga wili yang tin Akono e po wo hi phep pit won kho men.
Ma wulong hik put mulusngin Pisidia kho ung, si wulong li pol wo mulusngin Pampilia.
Ma wulong pok put sakalngin Perga kho kut, anima wulong li ko Atalia.
Ma ko pit imen wulong wa imut ta li Antiok, men pi tin wala kho ma po wa wulong li sup yang wili nanaangin tin ta Got men epo kumang tin homani ma wulong suuk siin kho kut men.

Ma wulong kho me pol ma wulong palu po tin kuk mi palu walngin men me palu wal kho kut, anima wulong pok put sakalngin mosop tin Got ning i yanga wili wulong ma yang klas ma sowon pit epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men tin ku wo hi phep men.
Kut ma po iso kuk pi tin imen maran nomalak long to po tin ira kotngin men.
Si po kara me ko Yudia, men po ko kot sun tin ehuro it men ti, “Taku wom ku mut wal ira wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men som, men ku wom palolongin akomen.”

Ma a-Pol ngong a-Barnabas tel wal to sakalngin to po ma heek walngin ta si, men ku tun akomen, tumen ma po tin kuk mi palu walngin men hihi wungin epo a-Pol ngong a-Barnabas hi po tin ta hi weh men kara ku hi li si Yerusalem li epo po paengin to sun akokono pit mi wungin tin nhum imen.

Tumen ma po tin kuk mi palu walngin men tih sun li, men po siik li epo pi Ponisia to sun Samaria ma po li, ma po pok pok sun tunus epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, tin hi phae li epo Got kho men. Ma sakalngin ta po ning i ma po mosop tin ehuro it men mi hi keh keh takut.

Ma po li pol Yerusalem kho kut, men po tin kuk mi palu walngin men u po paengin u po tin akokono men tumen wa sun to mi hi tin nawaehngin pit po sun men, ma wulong pok po epo wungin mosop tin Got ning i yanga wili wulong men.

Si po kara tin wo hi phep e hi Parisi hik put ilio epo wal kuk mi sun men men si nuk, ma po sakal taku, “Po men ku mutngin weh, kuru it men ku wo nut po epo po ku ira wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men weh kut tumen.”
Tumen ma po paengin to sun tin akokono men me palu wal kuma po mara hi pit mi sakalngin tin imen.

Ma heek walngin nhum ta nuk kho, anima a-Pita si pit ma yang sakal ta po taku, “Wom masang tin ehurok men, wom ion i epo ewo maran men Got won ung wo ngo lunga it epo mi wo ngo kha ku po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men hul sakalngin tin pok putngin tunus men ma po wo hi phep epon men.
Tumen ma Got tin ion mi it masang to sun wala men pok put yang tin min tunusngin pit po po men, wala yang wa Emiun Auluungin ko ta po ken sun tin yang wai ko ta it kho men.
Si yang ku ning wungin enginin ta epo it u po akomen. Awu. Yang khis mi po epo wo phepngin ta po misan.
Tumen ma tua ma wom taku karong Got ma wom wa endara tin maik men ko wut po tin ira kotngin men, tin ku po irama it u it kut tumen ku kakha epon ku it lat i men akomen?
Si wo it phep epo nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kha ku it palolongin ira wungin then tin po palolongin epon men.”

Kut ma po mosop tin wa ilio angan men mara hi ain, si po hul wet a-Barnabas ngong a-Pol tin pok po tunus epo tosukngin u wungin tin po teret won men tumen tin maran kiring kiring e Got ning i yanga wili wulong lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men.
Ma wulong ko homong kut, anima a-Yemis si sakal taku, “Wom masang tin ehurok men, wom hul wet ngo wet.
Epo a-Simeon pok put sakalngin kho epo Got tin ewo maran ma yang li tuh wo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, kuma yang klok po masang wala kara mi sun kuma yang yan ko ung e li li wo po.
Ma sakalngin tin imen men then to sun tin po pokngin pok put men, wala panngin nuk taku,
‘Silung epo wungin tin mosop imen, men kuli nga kyok me ma nga ning mang ausel tin ta a-Dewit e hik ko nuk men ku kyok si. Ngo ku ning i tin ninhienngin men, ma nga khek i kyok si pit tunus,

kumali po tunus tin kara men ku langun weh epo yang tin Akono men, men po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som tin mosop sun e sikia ya ngo ung e li li wo hi men kha men. Yang tin Akono men, tin ning wungin tin mosop imen, kha sakal tumen.’
Elup tin sindak in kokyok kokyok kho li men, men Got ion kumang mosop tin kuli yang iso ning i sulung men kho.
Tumen ma marango ples wungin ti, epo it men ku wa won maikngin ko pit po po tin kuk lunga sun tin hi ku khuuk wal Yuda som e hi ung e phae li epo Got men asin.

Si it men ku pan kisang li epo po epo po men ku kuk hin epo endara tin po talu got torokngin enun epon kha li min suuan men, u elwanngin, u endara tin po ngit wut men, u endara tin kalolwan men kut tumen.

Epo a-Moses men kho nginan ma po tin khuuk wal me men kara pok put sakalngin ta yang mi pi tin nunhum e ung e li li men mosop, ma po tiik sakalngin mi mang akotngin tin ung e li li men to pi Sabat kokyok kokyok.”

Kut ma po paengin u po tin akokono to sun tin hi kuk mi palu walngin men tumen ion i epon taku tunus epo po ku tih sun tin po suk pit po hi mi sun tin ta hi weh men ku li Antiok to a-Pol ngong a-Barnabas, men ya ngong ti, a-Yudas tin yan ta maksin a-Barsabas men, u a-Sailas kut tumen, tin ya ngong pos lunga hi tin ehuro it men.

Ma po pan kisang tin iyi ma po wai si yanga wili wuluk, ma wuluk wai li, men wo ti: “Pim paengin u po akokono u po tin ehuro it men kha pim a pan kisang tin iyi ti epo wom tin ehuro pim e ku khuuk wal Yuda som e ung Antiok u Siria u Silisia kut tumen. Pi mhangin tunus ti epo wom.

Epo pim a hul epo po kara tin yok hang pim ma ti pol men, men ning i ma wom kamus ma enu wom ku ung tunus akomen. Epo po wo taku, ‘Wom men ku mut wal weh, u wom men ku ira wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men weh kut tumen,’ ti, takuma pim ku wa sakalngin sinsin ta tin tumen si ta po kho akomen.
Tumen ma men tunus to mara pim tin palu wal kho to mi pim then men epo pim ku wo pim ung wo po ta pim kara ma pim a tih po ti epo wom to a-Barnabus ngong a-Pol tin ta it e mi it epo ngong weh men.
Po tin imen men koho ma ning wo lalaingin weh to enu hi epon ku mut eya a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men yan.
Tumen ma pim a tih a-Yudas ngong a-Sailas tin ku pok wom epo wo ngong tuo ngong epo wungin tin kai sun tin imen ku ti.
Epon men tunus to mara Emiun Auluungin u to mara pim kut tumen epo pim ku wa won maikngin ta kyok ko po wom asin, si wungin tin iyi misan kha ku weh pit po wom men, men ti:

epo wom men ku kuk hin endara tin po talu got tororokngin enun epon men, u endara tin to kalolwan men, u endara tin po ngit wut men, u elwanngin kut tumen. Taku wom put kilil wom epo wungin tin mosop imen, men ku wom ning i tunus ako. Wom men ku weh pit nhing. Kut kha men.”
Kut ma po tih sun kho li, men po li pol Antiok, ma po palu sun tin wa ilio angan men me, po wa kisang si ta sun.
Kut ma po tiik i kut, men po mi hi keh keh epo sakalngin tin pa nhing mi po men.
Si a-Yudas ngong a-Sailas tuo ngong men pokngin maksin kut tumen, ma sakalngin munuman wulong wo nut po ma wulong pa nhing po epon.
Ma wulong in pi tin imen put monlo long koho, anima po mang ta wulong si wulong iok hang po ehuro it ma wulong kyok li to min wyungin hang po tin paengin men.
Si men tunus to mara a-Sailas epo yang ku iso in pi tin imen.
Kuru a-Pol ngong a-Barnabas iso in Antiok kut tumen, ma wulong in e kot po u pok put sakalngin to po munuman kara kyok tumen epo sakalngin tin ta yang tin Akono men.

Li klet ma ungunan kara kho li, anima a-Pol wo ta sun a-Barnabas taku, “Tong men ku kyok li tuh tuh wo po ehuro it tin wo hi phep e hi ung e li li pi tin yan pos men then then tin kho ma tong pok put sakalngin ta yang tin Akono men epon men, kuma tong li ion po men kuk tuni.”
Ma a-Barnabas taku wa a-Yon tin po sikian ta maksin a-Mak men ma ngyuk li.
Takuma a-Pol wo taku ku tunus som epo po ku wa yang tin saa silang po Pampilia, si ku li to po epo kumang som men ma ngyuk li asin.
Ma heek walngin si hambip weh kut, tumen ma wulong hik put ilio epo wal, ma a-Barnabas wa a-Mak ma ngong si wo imut ta ma wulong li Saiprus.
Si a-Pol won ung wo a-Sailas ma po ehuro it wa wulong sup yang wili nanaangin tin ta Got men kho kut, anima wulong iok ma wulong li.
Ma yang suuk sii mulusngin Siria to sun Silisia, ma yang pa nhing palu walngin tin ung e li li pi tin imen.
Kut ma yang li pol Derbe to sun Listra, si yang ta tin ira kotngin men in imen, men yan a-Timoti, men wiru wut wala Yuda ta tin won phep men, si wiraman men api Grik.
Yang men ehuro hi tin ung Listra to sun Aikoniam men pok put yang yan to wungin tunus.
Yang tin imen men a-Pol min epon ku ngong li. Ma yang wa sun me, yang mut sun, sinsin epo po Yuda kuk pi tin ung e li li pi tin imen, epo po mosop ion i epo yang men wiraman Grik.

Ma wuluk li mi pi tin nunhum e ung e li li ira soput men li, men wuluk tet sakalngin tin po paengin to sun akokono tin ung Yerusalem men pias pon kho kut ma po wo maran ko klat epon men si ta po ko pit ko pit kuma po iran.
Tumen ma palu walngin tin ung e li li yanga pi men, wo phepngin ta hi men ko pit nhing, ma ungunan then then men po enu hi ung e ko po sun li si.
Ma wuluk li yek wo mulusngin Prigia to sun Galesia kho, khama Emiun Auluungin uluu wuluk epo wuluk tin ku pok put sakalngin pi Esia men asin.
Ma wuluk li pol Misia, ma po taku li wo mulusngin Bitinia, takuma Emiun Auluungin ku mang ta wuluk li sup akomen.
Tumen ma wuluk wetpo ngyuk wa pi Misia, si wuluk li ko Troas.
Ma Got pahiphip a-Pol to pi luk, men yang ta api Masedonia pit ma yang hau nuk sii khi sun ti, “E mu hik put wiu ma e mu Masedonia, kuma e mu nhio wo pim.”

Kut ma sulung epo Got tin pahiphip a-Pol men, men kerek engun ma pim taku li sup Masedonia. Epo mara pim ira wungin ti, epo yang tin Akono men yuk pim ku li pok put pok putngin tin tunus men si ta po.
Tumen ma pim a si wo imut Troas, men pim a siik li Samotres, li ungunan ta kyok anima pim a li pol Neapolis,
ma ko pit imen men pim a kyok li Pilipai, men pi tin yan pos epo sun tin kara ung e Masedonia men, men pi ta tin kho ma po Rom kara me tekel i men. Ma pim a kuk pi tin imen to ungunan kara.

Li klet ma pi Sabat men si, men pim a yok li pol wetpo enunu li pol suu eki nesiling ta. Pi tin imen po me ning kinesngin epon ewin. Ma pim a li ung ma pim a sakal ta po wala tin hi me palu wal pi tin imen.

Ma wut wala ta yan e-Lidia men in e hul pim. Wut men api Taiataira ma wut kum anaum epo moolngin tin pon ayurin men tih nginan, ma wut lem pit wo Got. Ma yang tin Akono men klas mi wut, kuma wut hul wet sakalngin tin a-Pol sakal i men.

Ma wut hi po tin hi kuk mi mang ta wut men wa baptais kho kut, khama wut hau nuk nuk mi pim ti, “Taku mara wom ples wungin ta ngo ken ngo e ira yang tin Akono men to wungin anuh, men ku wom mu sup mi mang tin ta ngo men ma it kuk.” Ti ma wut iso heek weh, ma pim a hul wet wut engun.

Kut ma minan ta kyok ma wungin ta si ti, epo pim taku li kines Got, men wut wala wahin ta tin kum wo po phuan e emiun lengwal tin pok put wungin tin ku iso si sulung men in mi wut men, men me tut pim. Wut tin imen ning ulu hambip ta po tin phuan ta wut men epo sakalngin tin wut pok put maran kiring kiring men.

Wut tin imen pet kira pim a-Pol hi, ma wut in e wut pit pit kokyok kokyok taku, “Po masang tin imen men kum ta Got tin in ili awon weh men kha imen. Po men pok put soput tin ku it palolongin epon men.”

Ma wut in e pok put wungin tin imen kokyok kokyok to elup munuman, tumen ma a-Pol min luk pit wo wut, men yang phae ma yang sakal ta emiun tin imen taku, “Nga wo tap epo ya a-Yesus Krais epo ngon ku mu pol mi wut tin imen.” Ti ma emiun me pol mi wut to sinang maran tin imen siik.

Takuma po tin phuan ta wut men ion i epo soput tin po hoo mi hi epo po ku wa ulu epon men men kis kut, men po kasum a-Pol ngong a-Sailas ma po hih wulong li pi tin po nal wal epon men li epo po tin phuan e mara hi pit wo sun men.
Ma po wa wulong li ta po phuan tin ples wungin ta po nginangan men, ma po sakal ti, “Wulong tin imen men api Yuda, ma wulong seh po ewhat po tin ung pi tin ta it iyi ma po mi hi ung ulil takut.
Ma wulong ning kotngin epo wungin sinsin kara, men uluungin epo it Rom ku wai wa it ku iran tumen asin.”
Kut ma po tin wa ilio angan men mi hi lup si ma po hik li sewut wulong, ma po tin ples wungin epo po nginangan men kakhas moolngin tin ta wulong men, ma po wo epo wulong men ku wawlaukngin epo eup.

Ma po wawlauk wulong ma wulong po ngong wluk wluk koyang kho kut, anima po espo wulong li sup mi mang tin po wo hi maik hi min men, ma po wo ta yang tin maran pit wo mang men epo yang ku haum eya wulong tunus weh.
Yang hul wet sun tin wo nut yang tumen, men yang wa wulong weh li pit mi mang tin ung emin weh men, ma yang wa sa klasngin ta ko klap wut khi wulong ma yang kan kan wulong pit to al.
Li klet ma pi put elup si, men a-Pol ngong a-Sailas in e ning kinesngin u wulong lut lutngin kara tumen li epo Got, ma po tin hi pit mi mang men pit e hul wet wulong.

Ma kerek engun ma pi kin nhum ta si, tumen ma mang tin sinsin men titiok ma kerek engun ma sowon mosop won pit e li li, kuru esih tin po koklong men tin ta po mosop e po kan kan sun epon men men poplosngin kut tumen.

Ma yang tin maran pit wo mang men phip si ma yang ion sowon tin won pit e li li men, men yang phaeng taku po tin kan kanngin pit mi mang men mhup kut, tumen ma yang slok bainat tan mi sun khin si, yang taku niin tuon.
Takuma a-Pol yuk pit ili awon takut, ma yang sakal ti, “E in aku e mhuk mi ngon asin, epo pim men mosop iso pit ako.”
Tumen ma yang yuk epo po ku wa esul ta me, si yang saa li sup, ma yang plong ko, ma yang nuk e kwat sii khi a-Pol ngong a-Sailas.
Ma yang wa wulong me pol, men yang sakal taku, “Mom tin akono men, ngo ku ning i tua weh kumali nga palolongin?”
Tumen ma wulong ko wo taku, “Wop phep pit wo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men, khamali e palolongin, ngon u po mosop tin kuk mi mang tap men kut tumen.”
Tumen ma wulong pok put sakalngin ta yang tin Akono men si ta yang u ta po mosop tin hi kuk mi mang ta yang men kut tumen.

Ma yang wa wulong to pi luk tin imen yek salak ma ngyuk li, men yang li khis khis po wulong tin wo ngong wluk wluk men. Li klet ma kerek engun ma yang wa baptais, men yang tuon u po mosop tin hi khuuk wal men kut tumen.
Ma yang wa wulong li sup mi mang tin ta yang men kho, men yang wa enda aiingin me nuk mi yanga wulong. Ma yang min keh keh epo yang tin won phep pit wo Got to po mosop tin hi kuk mi mang ta yang men.
Ma pi plas koyang, men po phuan tin peples sakalngin epo po nginangan men tih sun phuan tin kum wet wili sun men kara li sakal taku, “E mang ta wulong tin imen lu.”

Tumen ma yang tin maran pit wo mang tin po kan kan sun li pit min men li pok sun a-Pol, ma yang sakal taku, “Po phuan tin peples sakalngin ta sun nginangan men tih wungin epo mom men ku lu. Tumen ma homani men mom yok to min wyungin ma mom lu.”

Takuma a-Pol sakal si ta po taku, “Po lek tuk pi mlaeng, men ku po wo los tuk kho som, aku, tuk men po Rom pakuh po tuk, takuma po whem tuk li sup mi mang tin po wo hi maik hi min men engun. Ma homani ma kaunngin engun men po taku luul to tuk li, wah? Awu. Po tuo hi men ku me ma po wa tuk li pol mara so weh.”
Ti ma po tin phuan men li pok sun tin peples wungin nginangan men epo wungin tin ta wulong men, ma po hul epo wulong tin po Rom pakuh po ngong men, men lemngin wa po.
Tumen ma po me wo amusukngin ta wulong ma po wa wulong me pol, men po hau nuk sii khi wulong epo wulong ku mang ta pi tin imen ung, si wulong li.

Tumen ma wulong kho me pol mi mang tin po wo hi maik hi min men kut, khama wulong siik li sup mi mang tin ta e-Lidia men. Ma wulong ion po tin ehuro hi men, men wulong sakal pa nhing mi po, anima wulong yok ma wulong li.
Ma wuluk siik li yek ta pi Ampipolis u Apolonia kho li kut, anima wuluk li pol Tesalonaika, men pi ta tin mang akotngin ta po Yuda ta ung epon men.
Ma a-Pol ira wungin tin yang iran kokyok kokyok men ma yang li sup mi po to pi Sabat khaut miuk ma yang wa sakalngin mi Panngin Auluungin ma yang maran pit min to po.

Ma yang ples po epon sinsin ma yang hihi sakalngin to mara po epo Mesaia tin ku wuh i ma yang ku khek kyok si mi po tin huu kho men, men ku wungin timen weh si, ma yang sakal ti, “A-Yesus tin nga in e pok put si ta wom men, men Mesaia kha men.”

Ti ma po kara tin hul sakalngin men sakalngin phae mi po ma po wo hi phep, men po Grik tin lem pit wo Got men wa ilio angan takut, kuru po wala tin lalamit men ku kiak som kut tumen, kha hi sup me then to a-Pol ngong a-Sailas men.

Si po Yuda tin ku wo hi phep som men mi hi heh wet sun, ma po li espo sun kara tin wungin ta hi lengwal engun men mi po tin hi kuk engun pi tin po nal wal epon men, men po pulum po sun wa ilio angan kara ma po seh po ewhat sun mosop tin ung pi tin imen ma sokongin nhum ta si. Ma po hik li pol mang tin ta a-Yeson men, men po taku wa a-Pol ngong a-Sailas me pol ta po masang to sun wala.

Si po ku pon ta wulong som, men po hih a-Yeson hi ehuro it kara li epo po phuan tin mara hi pit wo pi tin imen, ma po wut hi pit pit ma po sakal taku, “Po tin ning i ma ekwha nuk lunga it yanga pi wo mulus men, men me kuk iyi kut tumen.

Ma a-Yeson wa po me sup mang tin ta yang men, ma po mosop kuk e ning wungin tin hik put wungin sinsin tin Sisa wo maran ko klat epon men, men po wo epo yang sinkhaung ta tin taku wiewi Sisa men kyok in, men a-Yesus.”
Ma po tin wa ilio angan men u po tin akokono ta pi tin imen tumen hul sakalngin tin imen, men ning i ma po mi hi lup si.
Ma po phuan wa ulu kara hang a-Yeson hi po tin ta hi kara men tin ku po hau i ko ta sun men kho kut, anima po mang ta a-Yeson hi li.
Tumen ma kerek engun ma po tin ehuro it men tih a-Pol ngong a-Sailas to pi luk li Beria. Ma wulong li pol, men wulong siik li sup mi mang akotngin tin ta po Yuda men.

Si po tin ung pi tin imen men ira wungin ta hi tin akono men tunus weh epo sun tin ung Tesalonaika men, epo po wa sakalngin to min nawaehngin tin klet mi po men. Ma ungunan then then men po mara hi pit mi Panngin Auluungin, men po taku ion i, sakalngin tin wulong pok put men, men ku irawin wa men.
Tumen ma po munuman tin kuk mi sun men wo hi phep, kuru po wala Grik tin lalamit men u po masang Grik kut tumen munuman wo hi phep maksin kut tumen.
Si po Yuda tin api Tesalonaika men hul epo a-Pol tin li pok put sakalngin ta Got Beria men, men po li pi tin imen kut, ma po seh po ewhat sun tin wa ilio angan men.
Kut ma kerek engun ma po tin ehuro it men tirih a-Pol li ko put wiu, si a-Sailas ngong a-Timoti iso in Beria.
Si po tin pau a-Pol li men men pau yang weh li pol Atens, ma po wa wungin mi wo sun epo a-Sailas ngong a-Timoti ku pus engin weh ma wulong me pol ta yang, li klet anima po yok ma po kyok li.
Si a-Pol iso in e kaeng wulong ko li Atens, men yang min lup si minan tin yang ion pi tin imen tin got tororokngin enun kol wal epon men.

Tumen ma yang pele mi sakalngin mi mang akotngin tin ta po Yuda men to po Yuda u to po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som e hi lem pit wo Got men, kuru mi pi tin po nal wal epon men to ungunan then then men yang pele mi sakalngin to po tin me tut yang engun pi tin imen kut tumen.

Kut ma po kara tin mi hi pit pit epo mhin ekngin e hi wa ilio angan Epikurian u hi wa ilio angan Stoik kut tumen, men me tut yang ma po mara hi pit mi sakalngin to yang. Ma po kara sakal ti, “Yang tin parom po sakalngin engun imen men taku sakal tua?” Si po kara wo ti, “Maran ken yang e pok put got ta po enginin kara men kha men.” Po wo tumen epo yang tin pok put wungin si ta po epo a-Yesus u epo khekngin kyok si tunus men tumen.
Kut ma po wa yang li pit mara po kaunsil tin palu wal mhi pi Ares men ma po sakal taku, “Iyi, pim ku ion kotngin homan tin e sakal epon imen, wah?
Epo e tet sakalngin kilangin kara me po kinga pim. Tumen ma mi pim epo ngon ku pok pim epo endara tin imen sinsin ani tua.”

Epo po Atens mosop kuru po tin nomisang e hi kuk pi tin imen kut tumen men ku ning wungin ta maksin som. Awu. Po men wilayuk epo po ku pok wungin homan kara wa po ku hul wungin homan kara tumen misan.
Kut ma a-Pol si pit emin po mhi pi Areopagus, ma yang sakal taku, “Wom masang tin api Atens men, nga ion i kho epo wo wom phep pit wo endara maran kiring kiring weh.

Epo nga in e muk muk mili mili mi pi tin ta wom men, men nga in e turupa endara tin wo wom nuk wet men, ma nga mak li pon ta suyung ta tin panngin ta nuk epon men ti, ‘Ta got tin pim a pong epon men.’ Tumen ma yang tin wo wom nuk wet si wom pong epon men kha homani ma nga pok put si ta wom men.

Got tin ning wet pi u mulusngin tin hihingin nuk kut men to endara mosop tin kuk epon men, men nhum ta pi wet pi u mulusngin kut tumen, tumen ma yang ku ung e li li mi mang auluungin tin po tunus ning i epo wili hi men ewin akomen.
Wa po tunus wili hi ani ku po kum ta yang epon men akomen, ken yang e ku kalwok epo endara ta akomen. Awu. Epo yang kha wa tunusngin u emiun u tumen si ta endara mosop men.

Ma pit mina yang then ta kalolwan kha Got ning po mosop tin ung e khuuk wal ta hi weh men, kumali po li ung wo mulusngin yanga pi koyang, ma yang won ung wo elup ta hi then then kho u kalungin tin ut pi tin po li ung e li li epon men kut tumen,
kumali po langun mi pi epo yang tin Akono men, taku po pong pong mi wili hi kuma po pon ta yang wa men, takuma yang ku in hin epo it then then akomen.

Epo yang kha it tunus ung u it mili mili u it kuk kut tumen, men ken po kara tin ta wom tuo wom e hi nut sakalngin nginangan men sakal i taku, ‘Epo it men khuukngin tin ta yang men maksin kut tumen ako.’
Ma it men khuukngin ta Got, tumen ma it men ku phaeng taku Got e ku ken gol wa silwa wa enah tin enunan e po tunus nut i klas nginan u po mara hi iran tumen asin.
Ma elup tin lap kho li e po kuk ailung engun min men, men Got wetpon sing i, si homani ma yang wo nut po tunus mosop tin ung yanga pi kut men epo po men ku phae mi hi weh.

Epo yang won ung wo elup ta kho tin kuli yang ples wungin ta pi mulus to po mosop tin ung e li li won men to wungin siik yanga wili sun ta tin yang won ung won kho men, ma yang kaek si sakalngin anuh tin imen si ta po tunus mosop epo yang tin khek sun si mi po tin huu kho men.”
Si po hul yang tin sakal epo khekngin kyok si tunus men, men po kara mimi yang, si po kara wo ti, “Mi pim epo pim ku hul wet ngon angan ta kyok epo wungin tin imen.”
Tumen ma a-Pol yok lunga po kaunsil ma yang li.
Si po masang kara si lup to yang ma po wo hi phep, men a-Dionisias tin hi kaunsil palu wal mhi pi Ares men kha in mi po men, kuru wut wala ta yan e-Damaris, u po kara kyok kut tumen.
Silung epo wungin tin mosop imen ma a-Pol yok Atens, ma yang li Korin.

Ma yang me pon ta sun Yuda ta yan Akwila, men pi tan sinsin Pontus, men in Itali ma me homan to titien e-Prisila. Epo a-Klaudias men wo maran ko klat kho epo po Yuda mosop men ku mang ta pi Rom si po li. Ma a-Pol me pol ta wulong.
Epo kumang ta wuluk men then, tumen ma yang in to wulong ma yang kum. Epo wuluk kum epo mang ausel ning nginan, men kumang tin wuluk ning i ewin men.
Ma to pi Sabat then then men a-Pol pele mi sakalngin to po Yuda mi mang akotngin tin ta hi men, ma yang taku phae mi po Yuda to sun Grik kuma po wo hi phep.
Ma a-Sailas ngong a-Timoti kho me Masedonia, men Emiun Auluungin nak nak mi a-Pol, ma yang maran arre ma yang pok put sakalngin si ta po Yuda epo a-Yesus kha Mesaia men.

Takuma po Yuda wo hik put sakalngin ta yang, ma po ning ton mingin, tumen ma yang tembe po moolngin tin yang phini los po sun men, ma yang wo ta po taku, “Engik tin ta wom men men ku ung po mhi wom weh, si ngo men po ngo yil. Homani ma li kut men ku nga li epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men.”
Ti ma yang yok pi tin imen ma yang li sup mang ta yang ta yan a-Yastus tin uluu Got e mang tan ung tikayung mang akotngin men.

Si a-Krispas tin maran pit wo mang akotngin men won phep pit wo yang tin Akono men to po mosop tin kuk mi mang ta yang men. Si po Korin munuman kara kuk mi sun hul, men po wo hi phep, ma po wa baptais.
Kut si yang tin Akono men sakal ta a-Pol mi enun yolngin ta tin yang maran plal to pi luk ma yang ion men ti, “E lem asin, si e sakal, si wop korip asin;
epo nga in to ngon, ma po ta ku sewut ngon, men epon ku ning i lengwal epo ngon akomen; epo po masang to sun wala men munuman tin ta ngo men kuk mi pi tin imen.”
Tumen ma yang ko ung pi tin imen to posan then ta u namih eip u ta me sup tumen, ma yang in e ning kotngin epo sakalngin ta Got lunga po.
Si li mi elup tin a-Galio tin phuan men mara pit wo pit Akaia men, men po Yuda mi hi lup si then ma po sewut a-Pol ma po wa yang li pit maran min ehus tin po phuan ples wungin won men,
ma po sakal taku, “Yang tin iyi men wo nuk nuk mi po epo po ku uluu wal epo Got ira wungin tin ku po hik put wungin sinsin men.”

Ma a-Pol taku won ngam angan, men a-Galio sakal ta po Yuda ti, “Auh, wom tin api Yuda men, taku wungin tin imen men sakalngin ta epo wungin lengwal ta wa lasin nhum ta weh, men sinsin ung kha ku nga hul wet wom men.
Takuma men kinesngin engun epo sakalngin min kara wa endara yan wa wungin sinsin ta wom weh, men ku wom ples i ta tuo wom; epo ngo ku mi ngo epo ngo ku ples wungin tin tumen akomen.”
Tumen ma yang luul to po mara ehus tin yang ples wungin won men li.

Si po Grik mosop wa a-Sostenes tin maran pit wo mang akotngin tin ta po Yuda men, ma po si wi yang mara ehus tin po phuan ples wungin won men. Takuma a-Galio ku silan khing pit po wungin tin mosop imen ta akomen.

Si a-Pol iso in pi tin imen put monlo long, anima yang wa min si ta po tin ehuro it men, si yang si wo imut ma yang taku li Siria, si e-Prisila ngong Akwila kha ngyuk li men. Si po klat po yang kho ko li Senkria, epo yang in wet tung tungngin ta kho.
Ma yang li pol Epesus, ma yang mang ta wulong in ko pit imen, si yang misan li sup mi mang akotngin tin ta po Yuda men ma hi po Yuda mara hi pit mi sakalngin.
Ma po kines yang epo yang taku iso in maran nomalak long to po, takuma yang ku hul wet po akomen,

ma yang wa min si ta po ma yang sakal taku, “Ngo men ku weh li in mi kakaomngin tin ku iso si Yerusalem men; si ngo ku kyok me epo wom, men taku Got min epon.” Yang wo tumen kut khama yang si wo imut Epesus ma yang li.
Ma yang li pol Sisaria ma yang li si wa min si ta palu walngin kho kut, anima yang kyok li ko Antiok.
Yang in ko pit imen li kho long, anima yang yok ma yang li pi then then tin ung e li ira al wo mulusngin Galesia to sun Prigia men, ma yang pa nhing po mosop tin ira kotngin ta a-Yesus men.
Si yang Yuda ta yan Apolos, men khuukngin ko li Aleksandria, men won po elel to sakalngin, men me in Epesus, men kakha epo Panngin Auluungin ion mi nginan.

Yang tin imen men po kot i epo soput ta yang tin Akono men kho; ma emiun seh seh mi yang, ma yang sakal u yang kot po siik epo sakalngin tin ta yang tin Akono men, takuma yang pon ta baptais tin ta a-Yon men misan.

Ma yang hosi sakalngin ma yang sakal kamlas po mi mang akotngin tin ta hi Yuda men, ma Akwila ngong e-Prisila hul wet yang, men wulong wa yang me in to ngong, ma wulong pok yang epo soput tin ta Got men tunus weh.

Ma yang in li yang taku hik put wiu li epo pi Akaia, men po tin ehuro it men pan kisang ta, ma po suh mi kinga sun tin ira kotngin ta a-Yesus men epo po ku wa yang. Ma yang li pol kut, men yang nhio wo po tin Got min suk po ma po wo hi phep kho kut men hambip takut.
Epo yang tohuh weh ma yang wo plak sun ta po Yuda pi mlaeng to mara po masang to sun wala, ma yang wa Panngin Auluungin ma yang nes wungin to mara po epo a-Yesus kha Mesaia men.
Li klet ma wungin si nuk ti, epo Apolos iso in Korin, men a-Pol li hik put pi ahup tin nuk ili awon men kho, anima yang li ko Epesus, ma yang li pon ta po kara tin ira kotngin ta sun men,
men yang sakal ta po ti, “Iyi, wom wa Emiun Auluungin minan tin wo wom phep men, wah?” Ti ma po sakal wet yang taku, “Ma ken pim a hul kara epo Emiun Auluungin tin ta ku in men.”
Ti ma yang ko kines po taku, “Si wom wa baptais ko mi ele?” Ti ma po ko wo taku, “Ko mi baptais tin ta a-Yon men.”

Kut ma a-Pol sakal taku, “A-Yon men po wa baptais tin los po phae mingin men hang yang men, ma yang wo ta po masang to sun wala epo po men ku wo hi phep pit po yang tin ku iso me sulung men, men a-Yesus tin Mesaia men ako.”
Po hul sakalngin tin imen khama po wa baptais ko mi a-Yesus tin Akono men yan.
Ma a-Pol wilin si nuk po po kho kut, khama Emiun Auluungin me ko po po, ma po ko sakal ta sun enginin kara weh u po pok put sakalngin ken po pokngin men kut tumen.
Ma po masang tin imen mosop men eip ponwal u ponwal me sup angan tumen.

Ma yang li sup mi mang akotngin tin ta hi Yuda men, ma yang sakal amdal to namih khaut miuk, ma yang maran pit mi wungin to po ma yang taku phae mi po kuma po wo hi nuk wet sakalngin tin pit epo enunu tin ta Got men.

Takuma po kara mi hi khang ma po ku wo hi phep som, ma po sakal lengwal ewut Soput tin imen to mara po tin wa ilio angan men, tumen ma a-Pol yok silang po ma yang espo po tin ira kotngin ta a-Yesus men ma hi li, ma yang maran pit mi wungin to po ungunan then then mi mang akotngin tin ta a-Tiranus men.
Ma wungin tin imen si to posan ponwal, tumen ma po mosop tin ung e li li yanga mulusngin Esia men hul sakalngin ta a-Yesus tin Akono men, men po Yuda u po Grik to wal.
Ma Got ning wungin maran kiring kiring homan kara yanga wili a-Pol,

kuma taku po wa mulu tin po luk luk muklungin epon men wa moolngin tin nuk po sun ma po ning kumang ton men wa tumen tin po wai li kah po a-Pol men li hang sun tin sasaih men, men ku saihngin mang mang ta po, kuru emiun lengwal me pol mi po maksin kut tumen.

Kut si po Yuda kara tin mili mili ma luum to emiun lengwal nginangan men taku sikia a-Yesus tin Akono men yan ut po po tin to emiun lengwal men, ma po sakal taku, “Pim a luum to wom epo a-Yesus tin a-Pol pok put men.”
Ma a-Skewa tin kum auluungin ta Got e nhum epo sun kara men husanin khaut eip u ponwal me sup kha kuk e ning wungin tin imen.
Tumen ma emiun lengwal sakal wet po taku, “A-Yesus men nga pon tan, u a-Pol men nga hop i kut tumen, si wom tin ikop men are?”

Kut ma yang tin to emiun lengwal men teng si nuk po po ken yang e nhum epo po men, ma po huuspit wet kakhangin tin ta yang men, tumen ma po mhup li pol mara so to wiwilngin u po po hi tin enghikan men kut tumen.
Ma po Yuda u po Grik tin mosop e ung Epesus men hul epo wungin tin imen, ma lemngin ung mi po mosop, ma po wa a-Yesus tin Akono men yan si.
Ma po munuman tin wo hi phep kho kut men kuk e me pok put lasin ta hi, ma po tak si wungin lengwal tin ta hi men si in pi mlaeng.

Kuru po munuman kuk mi sun tin wo hi phep men tin kho ma ning wunngin nginangan men espo kisang tin to wunngin ta hi nuk min men me pit to wal ma po sut i to mara sun mosop. Ma po tiik ulu tin ku po wai sup wet kisang tin mosop imen, men tiik nginan si silwa tingit khum khum khum khum eip (50,000).
Tin tumen kha sakalngin ta yang tin Akono men plok li hambip ma nghen powi sun tin lengwal men.

Wungin tin mosop imen men pyu pongin kho li kut, anima Emiun Auluungin pong si a-Pol ma yang pok put min epo yang ku in e wlong li pol pi Masedonia to sun Akaia, anima yang hik put pi li Yerusalem, ma yang sakal taku, “Silung epo nga li in pi tin imen, men ku nga weh li ion pi Rom maksin kut tumen.”
Tumen ma yang tih wulong ponwal tin kum ta yang men kho li Masedonia, men a-Timoti ngong a-Erastus, si yang tuon iso in put monlo long Esia.
Si mi elup tin imen men sisne mingin nhum ta si pit mi Soput tin imen.
Epo yang ta yan a-Demitrius tin ning silwa nginangan men tin ning mang enun tururun tin got wala Artimas enun pit min men, ma yang wa ulu hambip kara si ta po tin kum anaum ta yang men.
Yang timen yuk po tin kumang ta hi then men to po tin kumang ta hi tikayung wal angan men me palu wal, ma yang sakal taku, “Apo, wom ion i epo it ung tunus epo kumang tin iyi.

Kuru wom ion i u wom hul i epon ko pit Epesus iyi misan akomen, si yanga pi Esia mosop angan, men a-Pol tin iyi ek ek mi po munuman ma po wetpo hi wa sakalngin, ma yang sakal epo got tin po ning i epo wili hi men men ku got weh akomen.

Tumen ma ku kumang anaum tin ta it imen misan ani ku plong ko amiron nginan men akomen. Awu. Mang auluungin ta got wala Artimas tin nhum men ku ko amiron nginan to mara po, ma moolngin ta wut tin po Esia mosop u po mosop tin ung wo mulus men uluu wal epon men ku mumhek mingin maksin kut tumen.”
Ma po hul wet sakalngin tin imen, men po mosop mi hi nenen takut, ma po hau hambip, ma po sakal taku, “Artimas tin ta it Epesus men kha nhum kut men.”

Tumen ma pi tin nhum imen men ingutngin kuk min koyang, ma po mhup li sup nowhang tin po supa sun tin ning ning kalek to mara sun men to mi hi tin lup si then men, ma po kasum a-Gaius ngong Aristarkus tin api Masedonia e ngyuk a-Pol me then men ma hi li sup.
Si a-Pol taku li sup mi po masang to sun wala tin wa ilio angan men, men po tin ira kotngin men nghen epo yang tin ku li sup men.
Kuru po phuan kara tin mara hi pit wo mulusngin Esia men tin tita hi a Pol hi men tih wungin li epo yang ku phuk mi engin li sup mi nowhang tin po ning kalek epon men asin kut tumen.

Epo po kara hau epo endara kara weh u po kara hau epo endara kara weh tumen, epo po tin me palu wal imen mi hi kuk lilil, ma po munuman kara mi sun men ku ion i sinsin tin po me palu wal epon men akomen.
Si po pong si Aleksanda mi sun tin wa ilio angan men me pol maran min po, men po Yuda kha ning i tin imen. Ma Aleksanda wilin mili ma yang taku sakal mut eyan li ta po masang to sun wala.
Takuma po ion i epo yang men Yuda ta kho kut, khama po mosop hau then to sinang maran ponwal angan taku, “Artimas tin ta it Epesus men kha nhum kut men.”

Si phua tin maran ek e kum ta sun tin mara hi pit wo pi tin nhum imen wut tang po ma po mara hi ain, si yang sakal ta po taku, “Wom masang tin api Epesus men, ara in tin iso pong epo pi Epesus tin nhum men tin haum eya mang auluungin ta got tin wala Artimas e nhum men, u wut enun tin enahan tin plong me ko wet pi hang got Sus men?
Awu. Po ta men ku ton mi sakalngin tin imen akomen, tumen ma wom men ku ping wo wom, si wom men ku wo phuk mi engin epo endara ta asin.
Epo wom wa wulong tin masang me iyi, men ku tip tip endara mi mang auluungin nginangan wa wulong ku ton mi got wala tin ta wom men tumen akomen.

Tumen ma taku a-Demitrius hi po tin hi kum anaum then men kuk to wungin tin ku po wai pit po sun men, men mang tin po ples wungin min men sowon pit u po phuan tin ples wungin nginangan men kuk kut tumen. Pi tin imen kha ku po li ples wungin tin po wai pit po al men epon men.
Si taku wom kuk to wungin kara kyok, men ku plesngin mi palu walngin tin ira wungin sinsin siik men.
Epo tikayung ma po ku wa wungin pit po it pit mi wungin tin ulil si homani men, epo wungin sinsin tin ku it pok po tunus epo palu walngin tin si ulil homani men om.”
Tumen ma yang sakal tin imen li klet, anima yang wo ma po tin me palu wal imen yang wal.
Sokongin tin nhum imen put mut kut, anima a-Pol yuk po tin ira kotngin ta a-Yesus men me hang yang, ma yang wa min si ta po kut, anima yang yok ku li Masedonia.
Ma yang suuk sii pi tin hap ko nuk ko nuk imen ma yang pa nhing po epo sakalngin munuman, li klet ma yang li pol wo mulusngin tin ta po Grik men,

ma yang in imen to namih khaut miuk. Ma po Yuda pok wal eking yang minan tin yang taku si wo imut ma yang li Siria men, tumen ma yang min wiewi al ma yang kyok li ewin ira soput tin li hik put pi Masedonia men.

Ma a-Sopater tin api Beria men li to yang li pol Esia, kuru Aristarkus u a-Sekundos tin ta po Tesalonaika men, u a-Gaius tin api Derbe men, u a-Timoti, u a-Tikikus ngong a-Tropimus tin ngong api Esia men kut tumen.
Po tin imen kho li muk pim ma po kaeng pim ko li Troas.

Elup tin kakaomngin tin epo beret tin yiis om min men kho li, anima pim a si wo imut Pilipai ma pim a li, ma ungunan khaut eip kho li kut, men pim a li pol ta po Troas, ma pim a kuk pi tin imen to ungunan khaut eip u ponwal me sup tumen.

Ma ungunan tin li muk sun mi enal ta men si ma po tin ira kotngin men me palu wal epo po ku tik tik beret kho kut, men a-Pol maran pit mi sakalngin to po, ma yang hihi wungin ta min kho epo yang ku yok to ungunan tin pit wetpo sun men ma yang li, tumen ma yang nak nak sakalngin li maran nomalak weh li pol to pi put elup.
Kut si esul munuman ngin ngin mi lahembengin tin miuk ung po eki al e po palu wal min men.

Ma mara sowon tin eip me sup epon men yang wahin ta yan a-Yutikus ung won, men nhaung li yol akanda. Nhaungngin wi yang weh kut, ma a-Pol iso maran pit mi sakalngin to po li maran nomalak takut, si yang plong ko ili wo suyung tin miuk angan men ma po ko wa yang si hun.
Si a-Pol saa li ko, ma yang me plong ko sung wo sun, men yang sakal taku, “Miu wom tuung asin, epo yang enun iso in mi yang.”
Ma yang kyok li si, ma yang tik beret ma yang iini, ma yang sakal maran nomalak weh li pi plas koyang, anima yang yok ma yang li.
Si po wa yang tin wahin imen maran to tunusngin li, ma po mi hi ko li wyu ung, men ku kiak akomen.
Si pim a kho li si wo imut ma pim a li Asos, ko pit imen kha pim taku wa a-Pol si wo imut to pim men, epo yang panen pim tumen kho, si yang tuon ku muk muk na khin.
Ma yang me tut pim Asos kho kut, men pim a wa yang si wo imut to pim ma pim a li pol Mitilini.

Ma ko pit imen men imut yok to pim ma ungunan ta kyok men pim a li pol tikayung pi Kios. Ma ungunan tin pit wetpo sun men pim a li pol Samos ma pim a kuk Trogilium. Si ungunan ta kyok si anima pim a li pol Miletus.

Epo a-Pol min wawai kho epo yang ku iso in wo imut li yek ta pi Epesus, timen kuma yang in maran nomalak wo mulusngin Esia asin. Epo yang taku pus engin epon taku men, men ku yang li in Yerusalem to pi ungunan tin ta pi Pentikos men.
Ko li Miletus yang tih wungin li Epesus ma yang yuk po tin akokono e mara hi pit wo palu walngin men me.
Ma po me pol ta yang kut, men yang ko sakal ta po taku, “Tuo wom ion wungin ta ngo tin nga in lunga wom ton kokyok kokyok ungunan tin khi ngo kah pi Esia wo maran ma me pol homani men,
men nga ning kumang ta yang tin Akono men to mi ngo mosop tin nga wa ya ngo ko men u to tinisngin u karongngin munuman tin si ta ngo epo po Yuda tin pok wal eking ngo men kut tumen.
Ma ngo ku kaun sakalngin ta tin ku nhio wo wom men akomen, si nga pok put mosop si ta wom, ma nga kot wom pi mlaeng weh u ko pit ko pit mi mang kut tumen,
ma nga pok put wungin si ta po Yuda u si ta po Grik kut tumen epo po ku phae mi hi li epo Got u po ku wo hi phep pit wo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen.
Wom hul, homani ma emiu ngo nak nak mi ngo ku weh li Yerusalem, ma wungin tin ku si ta ngo ko pit imen men ku nga ion i akomen,
si Emiun Auluungin pok put si in mi pi tin nunhum men then then ma yang sakal ti, epo esih tin po koklong men u won maikngin kara kut tumen men kaeng ngo ako.

Takuma endara tin mosop imen ku ta kiik ngo li akomen, kuru wo ngo ku nuk wet ngo enun ku tunus weh to mara ngo akomen kut tumen, si kuma nga suuk sii saangin ta ngo to min kehngin, u kumang tin nga wai hang a-Yesus tin Akono men tin ku nga pok put pok putngin tin tunus e epo nanaangin tin ta Got men weh.
Wom hul, ma homani nga ion i epo wom mosop tin nga mili mili lunga wom kho ma nga pok put enunu tin ta Got men men kuli wom ion marango kyok akomen.
Tumen ma nga pok put sakalngin to mara wom homani epo po tunus ta ku huuspit, men nga in pi mlaeng mi enghik ta po masang to sun wala mosop.
Epo kho men ku nga lem ewo ngo epo ngo tin ku pok put sakalngin mosop tin nuk ta mi Got men si ta wom men akomen.

Tumen ma mara wom pit wo wom weh u sipsip mosop tin Emiun Auluungin won ung wo wom ku si mara wom pit wo hi men, kuma wom ning kumang ta po tin mara hi pit wo sipsip men mi palu walngin ta Got tin yang kul i epo yang enghikan tuon men weh.
Epo nga ion i ti, mi khi ngo tin ku li kut men, men ku elwa enih kara tin lases kuk tan men men kuli iso me sup lunga wom, ma ku mumhek mi sipsip tin wa ilio angan men.
Kuru lunga wom tuo wom men ku po kara si ma po pok put sakalngin ulil kara tin ku ek ek mi po tin ira kotngin ta a-Yesus men li ira po.
Tumen ma mara wom si kuk ma tulu wom hu epo posan miuk tin kho li men men ku nga nhing epo ngo tin ku wo nut wom mosop mi tinisngin to pi luk u to pi mhangin kut tumen akomen.
Ehurok, homani ma nga wa wom sup yanga wili Got u sakalngin tin epo nanaangin tin ta yang men, tin ku pa nhing wom si nuk nhing ma pakuh po wom epo moolngin lunga po mosop tin si auluungin men.
Ngo ku marango nes silwa wa gol wa moolngin ta po ta angan ta kho akomen.
Wai, tuo wom ion i epo yanga wili ngo tuon kha nga ning endara tin ku nhio wo ngo u po tin kuk to ngo men kut tumen ako.

Nga suk mara wom epo soput mosop tin ku wom kum i tumen kha ku wom nhio wo po tin kalwok men. U tulu wom hu sakalngin ta a-Yesus tin Akono men tin yang sakal taku, ‘Min kehngin ta po tin wa endara si ta sun men men nhum epo min kehngin ta po tin wa endara hang sun men ako.’”
A-Pol sakal wungin tin mosop imen li klet, anima yang powut ko suul si yang kines Got to po mosop.
Ma po mosop tirinis kara kut, ma po plong ko kasum a-Pol wut ma po turumum suu yang,
epo po mi hi urut i weh epo sakalngin tin yang sakal i epo po ku ion mara yang kyok akomen. Ma po pau yang li wo imut.
Li klet ma wungin si nuk ti, epo pim a yok silang po ma imut li pol, men pim a saa siik li pol Kos, anima ungunan tin ira sun men pim a li pol Rodes, ma ko pit imen men pim a kyok li pol Patara.
Ma pim a pon ta imut ta tin taku li Ponisia men, men pim a si won ma pim a li.

Ma mara pim iis pi Saiprus kut, anima pim a li yek tan ung ewo wili pim tin ekos men, si imut wa pim li Siria, ma pim a li sup Taia; epo ko pit imen kha po taku tal nemokong tin pit wo imut men ko imen.

Ma pim a ko pon ta po tin ira kotngin ta a-Yesus men, ma pim a kuk to po ungunan khaut eip u ponwal me sup tumen. Ma Emiun Auluungin men pong si po ma po sakal ta a-Pol epo yang men ku li si Yerusalem asin.

Ma pim a me suuk sii ungunan tin pim a me kuk to po min men, anima pim a yok ma pim a ira soput ta pim li; ma po mosop to titien hi u husani hi tumen pau pim weh li pol wetpo enunu. Ma powut pim ko suul suu wiu ma pim a kines Got.
Ma pim a wa mi pim si ta al kut, anima pim a si wo imut, si po kyok li mang ta hi.
Si pim a pyu po muk mukngin ta pim yanga wiu tin pim a yok Taia ma me men, men pim a li pol Tolemais, ma pim a wa mi pim si ta po tin ehuro it men, ma pim a kuk hang po ungunan ta.

Ma ungunan ta maksin si men pim tin wa ilio pit po a-Pol men yok ma pim a li pol Sisaria, ma pim a li sup mi mang tin ta a-Pilip tin kum epo sakalngin tunus pok put nginan men tin wala in mi po tin eip u ponwal me sup men, ma pim a kuk hang yang.
Epo yang tin imen in to husanin wala khaut mnal, men ku nuk e li li to po masang kho akomen, men ngyuk pok put wungin kaunngin.
Ma pim a kuk to ungunan nomoyong kara, anima yang pokngin ta yan Agabus me ko Yudia.

Ma yang kho me pol ta pim, men yang wa mulu tin a-Pol wat put epon men, ma yang kan kan wilin to sun khin epon, ma yang sakal taku, “Emiun Auluungin sakal ti, ‘Po Yuda tin kuk Yerusalem men ku kan kan yang tin mulu tan iyi ti, ma po ku wa yang sup yanga wili po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men.’”
Pim a hul sakalngin tin imen, men pim kuru po tin nopuan imen kut tumen, suh mi kinga yang epo yang ku li si Yerusalem asin.

Kut ma a-Pol ko sakal ti, “Tua ma wom tirinis u wom taku hik put mi ngo? Epo nga hihi kho epo ngo tin ku kan kanngin men, takuma ku tin imen misan som, si epo ngo tin ku hun ili Yerusalem mut eya a-Yesus yan men maksin kut tumen ako.”
Ma yang ku hul wet pim tin taku phae mi yang men som, ti ma pim a kuk engun, ma pim a sakal taku, “Aku, wungin tin yang tin Akono men min epon men men ku weh si.”
Ma ungunan tin imen lap kho li, anima pim a hihi endara ta pim ma pim a yok ma pim a li si Yerusalem.
Kuru po kara api Sisaria tin ira kotngin ta a-Yesus men li to pim, ma po wa yang ta tin ku pim a li pit ton men, men a-Neson tin api Saiprus men, men yang ta tin ira kotngin kho men.
Ma pim a li pol Yerusalem, men po tin ehuro it men wa pim to min kehngin.
Ma ungunan tin ira sun men a-Pol li sup to pim li hang a-Yemis, ma po tin akokono men mosop kuk.
Ma a-Pol wa min si ta po kut, anima yang pok put ira sun then then tin Got ning i lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men epo kumang tin yang ning i kho kut men.

Ma minan tin po hul wungin tin imen po kuk e hihi epo po ku wa yang tin Akono men yan si. Li klet ma po sakal si ta yang taku, “Worok, e ion po Yuda tin wa ilio angan takut tin wo hi phep men, ma po mosop tohuh epo po ku ira wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men weh.

Takuma po hul wungin mi wo sun epo ngon e kot po Yuda mosop tin kuk lunga sun tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men epo po ku wetpo hi wa a-Moses, ma e wo ta po epo po ku mut husani hi wa po ku muk muk ira wungin sinsin tin ta it e it pat wal i me men asin.
Tumen ma it ku ning ele? Palu walngin men ku palu wal weh ako; epo po hul epo ngon tin kho me in iyi.
Tumen ma ngon men ku ning wungin tin pim ku wo tap epon men. Wuluk masang khaut mnal kuk hang pim men men wa ngyuk sup wet tung tungngin ta.

E wa wuluk ma e ning ngon kuma pop yil to wuluk, ma e kul i mut eya wuluk kuma wuluk yeng yeng po ngyuk, kuma po mosop ion i epo wungin tin po hul mi wo sun epo ngon men men lengwal engun, si kuma po ion i epo tuop men muk muk ira soput tin ta wungin sinsin men ma e in siik kut tumen.

Si po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som e wo hi phep men men it pan kisang kho ma it ples po epo po ku ira wungin ta tin tumen asin, si po men ku kuk hin epo endara tin po talu got torokngin enun epon men, u endara tin to enghik men, u li ken nginan tin po ol wut men u elwanngin kut tumen misan.”

Li klet ma a-Pol wa wuluk tin masang imen, ma ungunan tin ira sun men yang ning wungin tin ku yang si pon yil to mara Got epon men to wuluk kho, anima yang li sup nowhang hut mang auluungin kuma yang pok put ungunan tin elup ta wuluk tin po ngyuk yil ton men ku li hun epon ma talungin ku ningngin epo wuluk then then weh men.

Ma ungunan khaut eip u ponwal me sup tin imen ku pi om angan, men po Yuda tin api Esia men ion yang tin in nowhang hut mang auluungin men, ma po seh seh mi sun tin wa ilio angan mosop men ma po kasum yang,

ma po wut hi pit pit taku, “Wom masang tin api Israel men, wom mu nhio wo pim! Yang tin iyi tin kot po masang to sun wala yanga pi ma yang sakal nolongin ewut po masang wala tin ta Got men u wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men u pi tin iyi kut tumen wala iyi; kuru si po wungin tin imen men yang wa po tin Grik men me sup nowhang tin ta mang auluungin men ma po ning i ma pi auluungin tin iyi ko min lengwal ma amiron nginan engun.”
(Epo kho men po mara hi kon a-Tropimus tin api Epesus men men in to a-Pol mi pi tin nhum imen, ma po phaeng taku a-Pol wa sun kho li sup wo nowhang tin ung hut mang auluungin men.)
Tumen ma po mosop tin ung pi tin nhum imen mi hi lup si, ma po mhup me to wal, ma po kasum a-Pol, ma po hih yang mi mang auluungin li pol; ma kerek engun ma po sasambal mang auluungin.
Ma po taku wi a-Pol ko hun angan, men wungin li pol ta phua tin maran pit wo po nolo Rom ilio ta men epo po Yerusalem mosop tin mi hi lup si men.

Ma kerek engun ma yang tin phuan men espo po elara kara u po tin mara hi pit wo sun men tumen, ma hi mhup li ko hang po. Ma po mara hi kon yang tin phuan men hi po elara tin tumen, men po wo hi anhok wo a-Pol si po ku paplai yang kyok akomen.
Kut ma yang tin phuan men li tikayung ma yang wa sun, ma yang wo ma po kan kan a-Pol epo esih tin po koklong men khaut ponwal; ma yang kines sun epo yang men are u yang ning ele tumen.

Ma po kara kuk lunga sun tin wa ilio angan men hau epo endara kara weh u po kara hau epo endara kara weh tumen. Ma phua ku pon tan sinsin irawin ta som epon tin ingutngin pit men, tumen ma yang wo ma po wa a-Pol li sup mi mang tin ta hi elara men.
Takuma minan tin a-Pol li pol sii engan tin li si mang men men po elara ku lul yang weh, epon tin po wa ilio angan hak nuk po to yang men.
Epo po masang to sun wala tin wa ilio angan men ira sun to yang ma po hahau ti, “E wa yang lu e wi yang ko hun!”

Ma po taku wa a-Pol li sup mi mang tin ta hi elara men, men a-Pol sakal si ta phua tin maran pit wo po elara men taku, “Ngo ku sakal tap kara wa pi engun?” Ti ma yang sakal wet sun taku, “Ih, e sakal Grik maksin, wah?

Tumen ma ngon men ku yang tin Isip e minan ta kho li ma yang seh mi po kara epo hi ku sewut po phuan ma yang muk po tin lek lek sun phuan nginangan khaut khum khum khum mnal (4000) men li pi tin tahunggu men ani men som, wah?”

Ti ma a-Pol ko wo taku, “Ngo men Yuda ta men api Tasis tin ung wo mulusngin Silisia men, pi tin nga pakuh pongin epo emhong tin tan imen men ku tun ta akomen; ma nga hau nuk sii khi ngon epo ngon ku mang, si nga sakal ta po masang to sun wala kara.”
Ti ma yang sam wet sun kho kut, anima a-Pol pit put engan ma yang tala po masang to sun wala epo wilin. Ma po homong weh koyang kut, men a-Pol ko sakal ta po ira sakalngin Hibru, ma yang sakal taku,
”Wom masang tin worok hi u yok hi men tumen, wom hul wet ngo tin ku sakal nuk eya ngo to mara wom homani men.”
Ma po hul yang tin sakal si ta po ira sakalngin Hibru, men po mosop homong weh koyang. Kut ma yang sakal taku,

“Ngo men api Yuda ta ako, ma nga khuukngin pi Tasis tin ung wo mulusngin Silisia men, takuma po paruk ngo pi tin nhum iyi sii khi a-Gamaliel, ma nga wa maran ekngin ira sun siik tin ta po inana it men sinsin, ma nga tohuh epo ngo ku ira Got ken wom mosop tin tohuh me homani kut tumen.
Ngo men ning i lengwal epo po tin ira soput tin iyi weh li hunngin ko epon, kuru nga kan kan po ma nga tet po li sup mi mang tin po kan kan sun li pit min ewin men, men po masang to sun wala to wal.

Wungin tin imen men ku yang tin kum auluungin ta Got e nhum epo sun kara men kha ku pit wetpo ngo to wungin tin iyi, kuru po akokono tin wa ilio mosop men kut tumen, tin nga wa kisang kara hang hi ku li epo po ehuro it men, ma nga li Damaskus epo ngo ku espo po maksin, aku po li kuk hin imen, men ku nga li kan kan po epo elik tin po koklong men kyok li Yerusalem epon ku wuh won maikngin emhut wungin tin imen.
Ma wungin si nuk ti, epo nga in e ira soput li pol tikayung pi Damaskus to pi sinang pit bing angan, men kerek engun ma pi mha nhum ta mha me ko wet pi ko hawus ngo ma baul ngo,
ma nga plong ko mi mulus ma nga hul wut po ta men sakal ta ngo taku, ‘Sol, Sol, tua ma e in e mumhek mi ngo?’
Ti ma nga ko wo taku, ‘Ngon tin Akono men ngon are?’ Ti ma yang sakal ta ngo ti, ‘Ngo men a-Yesus tin api Nasaret men tin e in e mumhek mi ngo men.’
Ti ma po tin pim a li men ion pi mha tin imen ma lemngin wa po, takuma po ku hul wut yang tin sakal ta ngo men akomen.

Ti ma nga sakal taku, ‘Ngon tin Akono men, ngo ku ning i tua?’ Ti ma yang tin Akono men ko wo ta ngo ti, ‘E si ma e lu sup Damaskus, ma ko pit imen men ku po ta pok ngon epo wungin mosop tin hihingin kho epo ngon ku ning i men.’
Ti ma ngo ku ion pi kyok som epon tin pi mha hambip weh men, tumen ma po tin pim a li to al men yak yak po wili ngo li ma nga li sup Damaskus.
Ma yang ta yan Ananaias, men lem pit wo Got ira sakalngin tin wungin sinsin wo epon men, ma po Yuda mosop tin ung Damaskus men pok pok wal epo wungin tunus tin yang ning i men,
men me pol ta ngo; ma yang me pit ma yang sakal ta ngo taku, ‘Worok, Sol, ngon men ku marap ek kyok.’ Ti ma to sinang maran tin imen siik men marango si kon yang.
Li klet ma Ananaias ko sakal taku, ‘Got tin ta po inana it men won ung wo ngon epo ngon ku pon ta yang min, u marap kon yang tin wungin tan Siik men kut tumen, ma e hul mi wut yang weh.
Epo ngon men ku si po ta tin pok put wungin ta yang men tin marap kon i u e hul i men kut tumen si ta po masang to sun wala mosop.
Homani ma e kaeng epo ele? E si wa baptais ma e ning i ma lasin tin tap men ku mlusngin li epo ngon tin ku yuk si wo ya yang tin Akono men.’
Ti ma wungin si nuk ti, epo nga kyok li Yerusalem ma nga in e kines mi mang auluungin, men tulun hungin ta ngo wiewi al,
ma nga ion yang men sakal ta ngo taku, ‘E pus engin ma e kerek e lu pol erak Yerusalem, epo po ku hul wet wungin tin e pok put epo ngo men akomen.’
Ti ma nga ko wo taku, ‘Ngon tin Akono men, po ion i epo mi mang akotngin mosop men nga kan kan po u nga lek po tin wo hi phep pit wo ngon men tumen ako.

Ma minan tin po ning i ma a-Stiwen tin hun pit mi ngon men kalolwan yuk yuk ko men men ngo kha maksin pit tikayung ma mi ngo then to po tin wi yang ko hun men, u nga haum eya moolngin ta po kut tumen.’
Ti ma yang sakal wet ngo taku, ‘E yok ma e lu, epo ngo ku tih ngon lu epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men tin kuk hin men.’”

Po hul wet yang me pol put sakalngin tin yang sakal epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, khama po wut hi si ma po sakal taku, “Wom wa yang tin wungin tan in tumen yang wo mulusngin, epo yang ku tunus epon ku in akomen!”
Tumen ma po kuk e wut hi pit pit u po kakak moolngin tin po phini nuk po sun men ko, u po tep nekokwa si wet pi kut tumen,

men yang tin phuan e maran pit wo po elara Rom men wo epo po ku wa sun me sup mi mang tin ta hi elara men, ma yang wo epo po ku paplai yang ma po kines mi yang tunus, kuma yang pon ta wungin sinsin tin po yuk ase ewut yang epon men.

Takuma po kuk e kan kan yang to elik bulmakau elitan kara, men a-Pol ko sakal ta yang tin maran pit wo po elara khum khum ta (100) men tin pit tikayung men taku, “Iyi, men wungin sinsin ta wom Rom epo wom ku paplai po ta tin po Rom pakuh pon epo emhong tin ta hi men si wom ku ples wungin tan kho akomen, wah?”

Ti ma yang tin maran pit wo po elara khum khum ta (100) men hul wungin tin imen, men yang li pok sun tin maran pit wo hi men taku, “Marap pit mi wungin tin e ning i imen, epo yang tin imen men po Rom kha pakuh pon epo emhong tin ta hi men ako.”
Tumen ma phua tin imen me kines a-Pol taku, “E pok ngo, epo ngon e po Rom pakuh po ngon epo emhong tin ta hi men, wah?” Ti ma yang ko wo taku, “Wai.”

Ti ma phua ko wo taku, “Ulu nhum kha nga kul po Rom tin ku pakuh po ngo epo emhong tin ta hi men.” Takuma a-Pol ko wo taku, “Si ngo men ko khuukngin pit mina po Rom tin pakuh po ngo epo emhong tin ta hi men ako.”

Tumen ma kerek engun ma po tin taku kines mi yang angan men wo hi anhok wo yang, kuru phua tin maran pit wo hi men lem maksin kut tumen, epon tin yang hul epo sun tin po Rom pakuh pon epo emhong tin ta hi men, u epon tin yang kan kan sun kho men tumen.

Si ungunan ta kyok yang taku pon tan sinsin tin irawin weh e po Yuda wa wungin pit po yang epon men, tumen ma yang plos elik tin sun kan kanngin epon men li, si yang wo maran ko klat epo po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po Kaunsil tin ta hi men kut tumen mosop men ku me nuk to mara yang, anima po wa a-Pol ko pit to mara po.
Kut ma a-Pol maran tuk pit wo po Kaunsil ma yang sakal taku, ‘Wom masang tin worok hi men, nga in to mi ngo tin ples wungin om po ngo to mara Got men kha me pol homani kut i.”
Ti ma Ananaias tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men wo ta po tin nuk tikayung a-Pol men epo po ku psat wo yang,

anima a-Pol ko sakal ta yang taku, “Got ku wi ngon, ngon tin ken lahembengin ta tin po pan pon po kal wetpon engun men. Epo e ung epo ngon ku ples wungin ta ngo ira wungin sinsin, si e wo epo po ku wi ngo hik put wungin sinsin, wah?”
Ti ma po tin nuk tikayung men ko sakal taku, “Yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men ani ku e sakal lengwal epon men, wah?”

Ti ma a Pol ko sakal taku, “Ih, worok hi, nga pong epo yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men ako; epon men sakalngin ta panngin nuk taku, ‘ E in aku e sakal lengwal epo po ta tin maran pit wo po masang wala tin tap men asin.’”

Si minan tin a-Pol ion i epo po maran min kara men hi Sadyusi u po maran min kara men hi Parisi tumen men yang yuk si awon mi po Kaunsil taku, “Wom masang tin worok hi men, ngo men Parisi ta, wiru yang Parisi ta, ma pit mi hoo mingin tin nuk epo khekngin mi hunngin kyok si tunus men kha po ples wungin ta ngo epon men.”
Yang sakal wungin tin imen kut, khama heek walngin ta si lunga po Parisi to sun Sadyusi, ma palu walngin tin nhum imen pok mi engin.
Epo po Sadyusi wo epo khekngin kyok si men pi om, u tihngin u emiun men pi om kut tumen, si po Parisi pok put wo phepngin ta hi epon mosop.

Tumen ma po wa wungin tumuyup ta al pit pit awon engun, ma po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan tin hi Parisi men si nuk ma po tohuh wo sakalngin ma po sakal taku, “Pim ku pon ta wungin lengwal ta in mi yang tin iyi som; si taku emiun ta wa tihngin ta sakal si ta yang, men kuli?”

Po nuk e heek wal li heek walngin si nhum weh, men yang tin phuan e maran pit wo po nolo Rom maran min ta men lem epon akuli po nak wal a-Pol li yang put mut, tumen ma yang wo ta po nolo maran min ta epo po ku li ko ma po nak yang amhees lunga sun, ma po wa yang kyok li sup mi mang tin ta hi nolo men.

Si pi luk tin ira sun men men yang tin Akono men li pit porili sun a-Pol, ma yang sakal taku, “Pol, mip pit nhing, epo marap ten ten to sakalngin ta ngo pok put nginan Yerusalem kho, ma tumen kut kha kuli e iso pok put epo pi Rom maksin kut tumen ako.”

Li klet ma pi mhangin ko yang kut, anima po Yuda kara ko sakal lang po ngi al ma po tuo hi tung tung mara al, ma po sakal epo po ku ii enda aiingin wa po ku um som weh li po wi a-Pol ko hun, wa taku pi angun, men ku Got ngil ngil po.
Epo po kara khum mnal (40) u weh li si kha hihi i epo wungin tin imen.

Ma po li pol ta po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po tin akokono men kut tumen, ma po wo taku, “Pim a wa pim sup mi tung tungngin nhum ta, epo pim ku ii endara som weh li pol minan tin ku pim a wi a-Pol ko hun men weh, wa taku pi om, men ku Got ngil ngil pim.

Tumen ma homani men wom to po tin Kaunsil men lu sakal wa wa mi phua tin maran pit wo po nolo Rom maran min ta men epo a-Pol ku wangin me ko epo wom to pi kingkauk, ken wom taku mara wom pit mi wungin kara kyok pit mi yang, si pim men ku hihingin nuk kuma pim a wi yang ko hun minan tin yang taku me tikayung men.”
Takuma a-Pol wiehun tin elut khuuk i men hul put po tin ku kakaun nuk ma wi yang men, men yang li sup mi mang tin ta po nolo men, ma yang li pok sun a-Pol epon.

Kut ma a-Pol yuk po elara tin hi mara hi pit wo po nolo Rom maran min khum khum ta (100) men ta me, yang sakal taku, “E wa yang tin nerengin imen lu epo phua tin maran pit wo wom men, epo yang in to wungin ta tin ku yang pok sun epon men.”

Tumen ma yang wa sun ma yang muk sun li epo sun tin phuan men, ma yang sakal taku, “A-Pol tin kan kanngin men yuk ngo li hang i ma yang kines ngo epo ngo ku wa yang tin nerengin iyi me hang ngon. Yang in to sakalngin kara tin ku yang sakal i tap men.”
Tumen ma phua isum po wili sun ma ngong li woringi pi, ma yang kines sun ta tuon taku, “Wungin tin tua ngon taku pok ngo epon?”
Ti ma yang ko sakal taku, “Po Yuda mi hi then epo po ku kines ngon epo ngon ku wa a-Pol li ko epo Kaunsil tin ta hi men to pi kingkauk, e ken po taku mara hi pit mi sakalngin tunus weh epo yang.

Takuma e hul wet po asin, epo po kara khum mnal (40) u weh li si men kekek nuk e kaeng yang, men po tin tuo hi e wa hi sup mi tung tungngin ta epo po ku ii endara wa um tumen som weh li pol minan tin ku po wi a-Pol ko hun men, wa po wo epon taku pi angun, men ku Got ngil ngil po; ma homani men po hihi, ma po kaeng ngon tin ku sakal wungin ta tin ku si kuk mara po epon men.”
Tumen ma phua mang ta yang tin wahin men li, ma yang wo ta sun taku, “E pok po ta epo ngon tin mu pok ngo epo wungin tin iyi asin.”

Si yang tih wungin epo wulong ponwal tin mara ngong pit wo po nolo Rom maran min khum khum ta (100) men, ma wulong kho me, yang sakal ti, “Mom hihi po elara khaut khum khum ponwal (200), u po elara tin saa wo hos men khaut khum ponwal me sup (70), u po elara tin kasum pali men khaut khum khum ponwal (200) maksin kut tumen, kuma po li Sisaria to pi luk tin po hoin mon wal ton men,
kuru mom hihi hos kara tin ku wom wa a-Pol si ung won ma wom pau yang li anga tunusngin li pol ta a-Peliks tin phuan e maran pit wo po men.”
Kut ma yang pan kisang ta to wungin ti,
“Ngo a-Klaudias Lisias kha pan kisang tin iyi ti epo ngon tin akonoan weh tin phuan a-Peliks men. Pi mhangin tunus.

Yang tin imen po Yuda kasum i ma tikayung epo yang ku hun yanga wili po. Takuma nga me to po nolo maran min ta ma nga palolo yang, epon tin nga hul kho epo yang tin iyi men it Rom kha pakuh pon epo emhong tin ta it men.
Ma nga taku pon tan sinsin tin po wa wungin pit po yang epon men, ma nga wa yang li pit to mara Kaunsil tin ta hi men.

Ma nga pon tan sinsin epo po wa wungin pit po yang pit mi kinesngin epo wungin sinsin tin ta hi men kara engun, si po ku wa wungin pit po yang ta weh tin ku yang hun wa po kan kan yang epon men akomen.

Li ma po pok ngo epo po Yuda haum epo yang kuma po wi yang ko hun, men nga tih yang kerek siik ti epo ngon, kuru nga wo nut po tin wa wungin pit po yang men epo po ku pok put sakalngin to marap tin po wai pit po yang men. E weh pit nhing.”
Tumen ma po elara ira wungin tin phua wo ta po epon men, ma po wa a-Pol ma po wa yang li to pi luk li Antipatris.
Ungunan tin pit wetpo sun men si ma po mang ta sun elara tin ung wo hos men ma po iso li to yang, si po tin kara men kyok li mang tin ta hi elara men.
Si po li sup Sisaria kho kut anima po wa kisang si ta yang tin phuan e maran pit wo po men, kuru po wa a-Pol li pit mara yang kut tumen.
Ma yang tin phuan men tiik kisang kut, anima yang kines sun epo mulusngin tan sinsin. Ma yang ion i epo sun tin api Silisia men,
men yang wo ti, “Ngo ku hul wet ngon minan tin po tin wa wungin pit po ngon men kho me pol men.” Ti ma yang wo epo po ku mara hi pit wo yang mi mang ta a-Herot tin ta ta hi phuan men.

Li klet ma ungunan khaut eip kho li, anima Ananaias tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men men me ko Yerusalem to po tin akokono men u yang ta tin won po elel to sakalngin yan a-Tertullus men kut tumen, men me pok yang tin phuan e maran pit wo pi men epo wungin tin po wai pit po a-Pol men.

Ma po yuk yang kho me, men a-Tertullus hosi sakalngin tin yang wai pit po a-Pol men, ma yang sakal taku, “Peliks, ngon tin akono weh men, epo ngon kha pim a ung aminis weh men u ngon tin e ion mi wungin tin ku iso si men kho men kha pim tin ung wo mulusngin tin iyi ung tunus weh kut tumen.
Wungin tin imen men pim a wai kokyok kokyok epo tanu mosop to sam samngin misan.
Takuma ngo ku huuh sakalngin li nomalak ma mip mokongin pit po ngo asin, tumen ma nga kines ngon amusukngin epo ngon ku ning wungin amunu to pim ma e hul sakalngin kiak kara kyok hang pim.

Epo pim a pon ta yang tin imen men hosi maikngin ning nginan, u yang kha hosi ekwha nuk lunga po Yuda tin ung yanga pi men, u yang kha nhum ta po Nasarin tin hi kuk enginin mi sun to wo phepngin ta hi weh men kut tumen.
Kuru yang taku ning i maksin ma mang auluungin ta pim ko amiron nginan engun, ma pim a kasum yang, ma pim taku ples wungin ta yang ira wungin sinsin ta pim weh,
takuma a-Lisias tin maran pit wo po nolo maran min ta men me to wungin amhees ma yang me nak sun yanga wili pim,
ma yang wo ta po tin wa wungin pit po yang men ku me epo ngon. Ma tuop ku kines mi yang, men ku e ion i epo wungin mosop tin pim a wai pit po yang men men irawin weh ako.”
Ti ma po Yuda kut men si nhio wo yang tin wa wungin pit po a-Pol men, ma po heek epo wungin tin mosop imen men tuon kut.

Kut ma yang tin phuan men mhin kin epo a-Pol ku sakal kara, anima a-Pol sakal wet sun taku, “Nga ion i epo to posan munuman men e ples wungin ta po tin ung wo mulusngin tin iyi, tumen ma mi ngo keh takut epo ngo ku sakal emhut sun kara eya ngo,

epon taku e kines mi pi mulu, men ku e ion i men irawin weh epo ungunan khaut khum ta u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen, si ku kara kyok som, kha mut eya ngo epo ngo tin li si Yerusalem epo ngo ku li uluu Got men.

Ma po ku pon ta ngo in mi mang auluungin ma ngo ku tuk po ta heek wal wa nga seh po ewhat po tin wa ilio angan men akomen, men ku nga ning i maksin mi mang akotngin tin ung e li li men wa mi pi Yerusalem akomen kut tumen.
Kuru wungin tin po wai pit po ngo homani men ku po nes wungin weh akomen.

Si tin iyi kha nga pok put si tap men, epo ira Soput tin po wo epon e maran min enginin kara men kha nga ning kumang auluungin tin ta yok hi men, ma wo ngo nuk wet wungin mosop tin panngin nuk mi Wungin Sinsin tin ta a-Moses men u mi po Pokngin kut tumen.

Ma nga in to hoo mingin ta ngo tin pit wo Got men weh, tin po tuo hi wo hi nuk wet men, epo po tin huu kho men kuli khek kyok si, men po tin wungin ta hi siik men u po tin wungin ta hi ku siik som men tumen mosop men ku kekhek kyok si.
Wungin tin imen men irawin ako, tumen ma nga tohuh kokyok epo mi ngo ku ples wungin ta mi ngo epo lasin tin ku nga ning i epo Got u po tunus ta tumen men ku om.
Ma posan munuman kho li ma homani nga kyok me kuma nga tet talungin tin epo min sukngin men u talungin kara kut tumen si ta po tin pim a khuuk wal Yuda men,

men nga in e ning i tin imen ma po Yuda kara api Esia me pon ta ngo tin po ngo yil to mara Got kho kut hut mang auluungin men, si ngo ku in to po wa ilio angan kara wa ngo ku seh po ewhat po kara akomen.
Tunus epo po tin imen tuo hi kha ku me nuk marap men kuma po tuo hi ku wa wungin ta pit po ngo, men ku po pok put.
Wa pi engun, men ku po tin nuk iyi tuo hi pok put endara ta tin po pon tan lengwal in po ngo minan tin nga pit to mara Kaunsil tin ta hi men,
si sakalngin then ta misan kha nga pit lunga po ma nga yuk i ti, “Khekngin kyok si ta po tin huu kho men kha wom ples wungin ta ngo pit min homani men.’”

Takuma a-Peliks wa maran ekngin tunus long epo Soput tin imen kho, tumen ma yang hul wungin tin mosop imen, men yang al mi elup li to pi ungunan ta kyok, ma yang sakal taku, “A-Lisias tin maran pit wo po nolo men ku me ko, men ku nga pok put i tin mi ngo wai epo ngo ku ples i ta wom men.”

Tumen ma yang wo maran ko klat ta sun tin maran pit wo po nolo Rom khum khum ta men epo yang ku maran pit wo a-Pol tunus ma yang ku mang ta sun in e won pias engun mi mang, kuru yang wo ta sun epo yang ku uluu po tin tita hi men ta tin ku me nhio wo yang epo endara ta wa tuh wo yang tumen asin.
Li klet ma ungunan kara kho li, anima a-Peliks me to titien e-Drusila tin api Yuda men, ma yang yuk a-Pol me, yang hul mi wo sun epo wo phepngin tin pit wo Krais men.

Ma a-Pol in e maran pit mi sakalngin to sun epo wungin tin siik men, u po tin ku karuk hi tunus men, u wungin ples nginan tin ku iso si men kut tumen, ma a-Peliks lem, ma yang ko wo taku, “E lu in wet, si wo ngo pias kara sulung, men ku nga tih wungin epo ngon kyok.”
Si minan tin imen a-Peliks hoo min pit wo sun a-Pol taku wa ulu kara si ta sun, kuma yang plos sun li. Tumen ma yang tih wungin epo sun nang nang me ngong sakal.

Takuma posan ponwal kho li kut, anima a-Porsius Pestus me wiewi a-Peliks; ma a-Peliks taku ning min sukngin ta epo po Yuda kuma po mi hi tunusngin pit po yang, tumen ma yang mang ta a-Pol iso kan kanngin in.
Kut ma a-Pestus kho me khin kah wo pi tin ku yang maran pit won men, anima ungunan miuk mili ma yang yok Sisaria li si Yerusalem.
Kut ma yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men u po tin nunhum kara kuk mi sun tin hi Yuda men kut tumen men me pok put wungin tin po wai pit po a-Pol men, ma po hau nuk sii khi a-Pestus,
ma po kines yang epo min sukngin ta ewut a-Pol, epo yang ku yuk a-Pol me Yerusalem, si kuma po kaun nuk ira so kuma po wi yang ko hun.
Takuma a-Pestus sakal wet po epo a-Pol men ku po iso mara hi pit won Sisaria, si epo a-Pestus tuon ku iso li Sisaria angan.
Ma yang sakal taku, “Tumen ma po tin wo wom nuk wet hi lunga wom men misa hi kha ku li ko to ngo ma wa wungin pit po yang tin imen, kuma it ion i epo yang men to lasin ta wa men.”

Kut ma a-Pestus iso in lunga po to ungunan eip ponwal u kara kut tumen, anima yang kyok li ko Sisaria. Ma enal ta kyok si, men yang li ung wo ehus tin po phuan ples wungin won men, ma yang wo epo a-Pol ku po wai me.
Ma a-Pol kho me pol, men po Yuda tin me ko Yerusalem men me nuk baul yang, ma po wa wungin munuman tin mamaik men los a-Pol, tin po ku nes wungin epon weh akomen.
Si a-Pol sakal wet po eyan tuon taku, “Ewut wungin sinsin tin ta po Yuda men, wa ewut mang auluungin, wa ewut Sisa tumen men ku nga ning lasin ta epon akomen.”

Takuma a-Pestus taku ning min sukngin ta epo po Yuda kuma po mi hi tunusngin pit po yang, tumen ma yang sakal wet a-Pol taku, “Iyi, mip epo ngon ku lu si Yerusalem ma ko pit imen men ku e ples wungin to mara ngo pit mi wungin tin mosop imen, wah?”

Ti ma a-Pol ko wo taku, “Nga pit mara ehus tin ta Sisa e po ung won ma po ples wungin won men kut, men pi tunus tin wungin ta ngo ku plesngin epon men kha iyi. Ngo ku ning lasin ta epo po Yuda akomen, men tuop ion i tunus maksin kut tumen ako.

Epon taku nga ning wungin tin ku siik som men ta, wa nga ning wungin ta tin tunus epo ngo ku hun epon men, men ku nga heek epo ngo tin ku hun som men akomen; si taku lasin om mi sakalngin tin po tin iyi wai pit po ngo men, men ku po ta wa ngo sup yanga wili po akomen. Nga hau si wo Sisa.”
Ti ma a-Pestus sakal to po tin hi nhio wo al to wungin ples nginan men, anima yang ko sakal wet sun taku, “Ngon men hau si wo Sisa kut, ma Sisa kha ku e lu epon men!”
Kut ma ungunan kara kho li, anima Agripa tin sinkhaung men ngong e-Bernis me pol Sisaria kuma wulong wa mi ngong si ta a-Pestus.
Ma wulong in imen to ungunan munuman kho, anima a-Pestus las wungin tin po wai pit po a-Pol men si to mara yang tin sinkhaung men, ma yang sakal taku, “Yang ta a-Peliks mang tan kan kanngin in iyi,

men po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men u po tin akokono ta po Yuda men kut tumen pok ngo epon minan tin nga li in ili Yerusalem men, ma po kines ngo epo ngo ku wo los po yang epo yang men ku hun.

Po tin imen nga ko sakal ta po ti, ‘Men ku wungin ta pim Rom epo pim ku wo los po po ta epon ku hun kho epo po tin sun hik put wungin pit won men ku mara ngong sak wal to po tin wa wungin pit pon men, ma pi put iso nuk epo po ku sakal emhut wungin eyan tuon pit mi wungin tin po wai pit pon men akomen.’
Tumen ma elup tin pit wetpo sun men si, ma po me palu wal kut, men ngo ku iak som, nga li ung wo ehus tin ta wungin ples nginan men ma nga wo epo po ku wa yang me sup.
