Yang tin imen po tin wa wungin pit pon men si nuk, men ku po wa wungin tin pit po yang men men ku ken sun tin nga phaeng won men akomen.
Awu. Po kuk to kinesngin kara pit mi wo phepngin tin ta hi weh men, u pit mi yang ta tin yan a-Yesus men, tin hun ma a-Pol heek epon tunus in men.
Ma nga kingung mi engin pit mi kinesngin tin tumen, tumen ma nga kines yang epon taku yang min epon, men ku yang li si Yerusalem ma ko pit imen kha ku wungin plesngin pit mi sakalngin tin imen.

Takuma a-Pol hau si wo pim epo pim ku iso mara pim pit wo yang li Augustus tuon kha ku pias po wungin ta sun taku wungin e tunus wa lengwal wa men, tumen ma nga wo epo po ku iso mara hi pit wo yang li pol minan tin ku nga tih yang li epo Sisa men.”
Tumen ma Agripa sakal si ta a-Pestus taku, “Mi ngo epo tuo ngo ku hul wet yang kut tumen.” Ti ma a-Pestus ko wo taku, “To pi king kauk men ku e hul wet yang.”

Tumen ma pi king kauk ko yang ma Agripa ngong e-Bernis me sup to moolngin tin epo sasayihngin men ma kho li sup mang tin po hul sakalngin min men to po nolo tin nunhum men u to po masang tin ya hi pos e api tin nhum imen kut tumen, anima a-Pestus wo ma po wa a-Pol me sup.

Kut ma a-Pestus ko sakal taku, “Agripa, ngon tin sinkhaung men, u po masang tin wala it nuk iyi homani kut tumen, wom ion yang tin imen tin po Yuda wa ilio angan mosop tin ung ili Yerusalem kuru ko pit iyi kut tumen hau si wo ngo, ma po hau pit awon epo yang ku tunus epon ku iso in akomen.
Takuma ngo ku pon ta lasin ta tin ku yang hun epon men akomen, kuru yang tuon yuk si wo Sisa kut tumen, tumen ma mi ngo wai epo ngo ku tih yang li.

Si ngo ku in to wungin anuh ta tin ku nga pan i li epo yang tin nhum ta ngo men epo sun tin iyi akomen. Tumen ma nga wa yang me pol to mara wom, kuru weh me pit to mara ngon tin sinkhaung Agripa men, kuma sulung epo it tin kines mi yang tunus weh men, anima nga in to sakalngin kara tin ku nga pan i men.
Epo nga ion i men sinsin om epon tin taku nga tih po ta tin kan kanngin men li, si ngo ku pan wungin kara tin po wai pit pon men akomen.”
Kut ma Agripa ko sakal ta a-Pol taku, “Pim a mang tap si tuop sakal kara mut eyap.” Tumen ma a-Pol wilin li pol, si yang ko sakal eyan tuon taku,
“Agripa, ngon tin sinkhaung men, nga ion ngo ken emhong tin ta Got men ko po ngo epo ngo ku sakal homani mut eya ngo to marap epo wungin mosop tin po Yuda wai pit po ngo men,
men tunus weh epo ngon tin marap ek wungin tunus tin sinsin u tin to kinesngin tumen tin mosop nuk epo po Yuda men. Tumen ma nga hau nuk sii khip epo ngon ku marap ain si e hul wet ngo wet.
Wungin tin nga in e iran wo mulus minan tin nga iso hoin men, tin nga in e iran wo maran lunga po Yuda tin pim a khuuk wal then ili Yerusalem men, men po Yuda mosop pon tan ako.

Po ion ngo ewo maran ma me, men taku po mi hi epo po ku pok put, epo kho men ira wo phepngin ta pim Yuda, men pim a pok mi engin ma pim kara kuk ma ira wo phepngin tin ta pim Parisi men, tin siik weh men.
Ma homani nga pit ma po ples wungin ta ngo pit mi hoo mingin ta ngo tin pit wo wungin tin Got sakal i kuk mara po tin inana pim men,

tin wala khuukngin ta pim sinsin tin eip ponwal u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kuk e ning kumang auluungin to pi luk u to pi mhangin kokyok kokyok to mi hi tin pit nhing men ma po hoo mi hi epo po ku weh li sup min men. Agripa, ngon tin sinkhaung men, epo hoo mingin tin imen siik kha po Yuda wa wungin pit po ngo epon men.
Tuni ma mi wom wawai ken i e khung nginan epo Got tin ku khek po tin huu kho men kyok si men?
Irawin, epo kho ma nga phaeng taku ngo men ku weh ning wungin maran kiring kiring ewut ya a-Yesus tin api Nasaret men.

Wungin tin imen wala nga ning i kho ili Yerusalem men, ma nga wa emhong mi wo po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men ma nga kan kan po munuman mi sun tin auluungin men mi mang tin po wo hi maik hi min ewin men, kuru minan tin po lekngin ko huu men nga psik sakalngin tin ta ngo men ko ewut po maksin kut tumen.

Ma nga in e mumhek mi po kokyok kokyok mi mang akotngin mosop tin ung e li li men ma nga taku ning i ma po ton mi a-Yesus engun; ma ya ngo sal pit wo po hambip takut kha nga ira po weh li pol pi tin nunhum kara e ung e li li wetpo mulusngin tin ta pim men ma nga mumhek mi po pi tin imen maksin kut tumen.
Nga in e ning wungin tin imen ma minan ta ma nga ira soput tin li Damaskus men to emhong tin po tin kum auluungin e nunhum epo sun kara men pakuh po ngo ma po tih ngo ton li men.

Auweh, ngon tin sinkhaung men, to pi sinang pit bing ma nga ira soput li, men nga ion pi mha ta me ko wet pi, men mha weh epo sinang, men mha ko hawus ngo ma baul ngo u po tin pim a li men maksin kut tumen.

Ma pim mosop a poplong ko wo mulus kut, men nga hul wut po ta sakal ta ngo ira sakalngin Hibru ti, ‘Sol, Sol, tua ma e in e mumhek mi ngo? Men khung nginan epo ngon tin ku khip pul wo sa tin hut keng keng e ngo taku tus ngon epon men.’
Ti ma nga ko wo taku, ‘Ngon tin Akono men, ngon are?’ Ti ma yang ko wo ti, ‘Ngo men a-Yesus, tin wala e in e mumhek mi ngo men.

Si e khek si pit ewo khip; epo nga si put plo nginan tap epo sinsin tin iyi, kuma wo ngo ung wo ngon tin ku si kum ta ngo ma e lu pok put wungin tin marap nuk pon kho men u sakalngin tin ngo ku iso suk marap epon men kut tumen,
ma nga palolo ngon mi po masang to sun wala tin Yuda men, u mi po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men kut tumen, tin homani ma nga tih ngon lu epo hi men,

kuma e ning i ma po mara hi plas, ma e phae po mi pi tin mi ku men li mi pi tin mha men, u mi emhong tin ta a-Nolongin men li epo Got, kumali po wa lasin klok nginan u moolngin kut tumen lunga po tin kuk auluungin epo wo phepngin tin pit wo ngo men.’
Tumen ma, Agripa, ngon tin sinkhaung men, ngo ku wetpo ngo wa enun yolngin tin marango plal ma nga ion i tin me ko wet pi imen akomen.

Awu. Si nga pok put muk si ta po tin ung Damaskus u ung Yerusalem men kut tumen, kuru wo mulusngin Yudia sup e klet, anima li epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, kuma po wetpo hi wa lasin ta hi, si po phae hi li epo Got, ma po ning wungin tin siik to po tin phae mi hi men.
Sinsin tin imen kha po Yuda kasum ngo mi mang auluungin ma po taku wi ngo ko hun angan men.

Takuma nga wa nhio wongin hang Got kha nga pit nhing weh me pol homani, ma nga pok put sakalngin si ta po tin ya hi om men u si ta po tin ya hi pos men kut tumen, si ngo ku sakal ira wungin enginin ta som, si ira sun tin po pokngin u a-Moses tumen sakal i epon ku iso si men,

tin po pok pok epo Mesaia ku wuh wungin weh, u yang kha tin ku khek si muk mi po tin huu kho men, ma yang pok put pi tin mha men si ta po masang to sun wala tin api Yuda men, u si ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men kut tumen.”

Ma a-Pol iso sakal sakalngin tin imen mut eyan, men a-Pestus wut pit pit takut, ma yang sakal taku, “Pol, ngon men mengengin wa ngon! Maran ekngin hambip tin tap men kha ning i ma mengengin si tap men!”
Takuma yang ko wo taku, “Pestus, ngon tin akono weh men, mengengin ku wa ngo akomen, si nga sakal ira wungin tin irawinan u to mhi ngo tin ek tunus men kut tumen ako.

Epo yang tin sinkhaung e nga sakal kamlas i ewo maran imen men ion wungin tin mosop imen ako; epo wo ngo phep epo wungin tin imen ku ta kis to mara yang akomen, epo wungin tin mosop imen ku ningngin woringi pi akomen.
Agripa, ngon tin sinkhaung men, iyi, ngon e wop phep pit wo po pokngin, wah? Epo nga ion i epo ngon men wop phep ako.”
Ti ma Agripa ko wo ta a-Pol taku, “Tikayung ma ngon ku wa wa mi ngo ma nga si Kristen.”

Ti ma a Pol ko sakal ta sun ti, “Ngo taku kines Got epon men ku tikayung angan kuru yek homani men ku misap som, si po mosop tin hul wet ngo homani men ku kuk ken ngo men, takuma esih tin nga kan kanngin epon iyi misan men ku wom kan kanngin epon asin.”
Yang sakal wungin tin mosop imen li klet, anima yang tin sinkhaung men si pit, kuru yang tin phuan men, u e-Bernis, u po tin nuk to sun men kut tumen.
Ma po osong li nuk ta tuo hi, men po sakal lunga hi ta tuo hi taku, “Yang tin imen ku ning wungin ta tin ku yang hun epon wa yang kan kanngin epon men akomen.”
Kut ma Agripa sakal ta a-Pestus taku, “Taku yang tin imen ku hau si wo Sisa som, men ku yang plosngin li won pias kho ako.”

Ma po ples sakalngin epo pim ku wa imut li Itali kut, anima po wa a-Pol hi po kara tin hi kan kanngin pit to al men li sup yanga wili yang ta yan a-Yulius, tin phuan e maran pit wo po nolo Rom khum khum ta (100) tin hi kuk mi ilio tin ta Ogastas tin sinkhaung ta po Rom men.

Ma pim a si wo imut api Adramitium ta, ma pim a yok ma pim a li, epo pim taku li sup sup pi tin ung e li li suu wiu tin ta sun Esia men; ma Aristarkus tin hi Masedonia e api Tesalonaika men men li to pim.
Li pi king kauk ko yang anima pim a li sup Saidon. Ma a-Yulius ning i tunus epo a-Pol, ma yang mang ta sun li won pias kuma yang li hang po tin hi tita hi men kuma po mara hi pit wo yang.
Ma pim a yok ko pit imen li pol malang, men pim a kaun tonu pi Saiprus, epo eip pit ma li song e mara pim.
Ma pim a saa yanga wiu tin ta pi Silisia to sun Pampilia men, li ma pim a li sup pi Maira, men pi nhum ta tin ung wo mulusngin Lisia men.
Ko pit imen yang tin phuan men pon ta imut api Aleksandria ta tin taku li Itali men, ma yang wa pim si won.

Ma imut saa hin hin to ungunan kara kho, anima pim a khuk po engin ma pim a li pol tikayung pi Kunidus, epo eip iso klet epo pim tin ku li men, tumen ma pim a saa tonu pi Krit li pol tikayung pi Salmone.
Ma pim a khuk po engin li yek ta pi tin imen, anima pim a li pol pi ta po sikian Pi Suu Wiu Maran Tunus, men ung tikayung pi Lasia.

Li klet ma elup kara mili kut, kuru pim tin taku saa wo imut men men homani ma pim a saa min hunngin kut tumen, epo elup tin po Yuda suuh mi hi to endara aiingin men kho li kut, tumen ma a-Pol wo nuk po,

ma yang sakal taku, “Apo, nga ion i kho epo saangin tin ta it iyi men kuli mumhekngin si min u nemokong munuman men ku kis kis kut tumen, si men ku nemokong to imut misan akomen. Awu. Si men tunusngin ta it kut tumen.”
Takuma phua tin maran pit wo po elara men won nuk wet sun tin luum to imut men u yang tin imut tan men kut tumen weh, si yang ku won nuk wet sakalngin tin a-Pol sakal i men weh akomen.

Ma mi wiu lunga pi tin imen men ku tunus epo pim ku kaun tonu epo pi tin ku puus me epon men akomen, tumen ma po tin munuman kara men wo nuk sun epo pim ku yok wo imut ko pit imen ma pim a li, epon taku tumen, men ku pim a weh li pol Piniks, men mi wiu lunga pi Krit ta tin osong li ung lunga pi esaul u nekip siin u osong li ung lunga pi mara naeng u nekip siin kut tumen, kuma pim a kaeng pi tin puus men pi tin imen.
Kut ma eip tin me esaul angan men pon ayokngin si, men po phaeng taku po ku whal weh li pi tin po taku li epon men, tumen ma po wa endara tin imut ung sui men si, ma po saa tikayung pi Krit.
Takuma ku maran nomalak akomen, men eip saa me ko po pi ken pi puus nhum ta, men po sikian Yurokludon.
Ma eip kasum imut, ma imut ku saa sup mi eip akomen, tumen ma pim a mang si eip wa imut to pim li.
Ma pim a saa tonu pi po nemutmut ta tin po sikian Klauda men, men pim a khung po engin epo pim tin ku kan kan naak tin tun e haum epon ku nhio wo pim men.

Ma po wai me si wo imut kut, anima po wa elik nunhum kara ko plek wet imut kuma kasum imut kekek; ma po lem epon takuli po kikin li klang ung po namak tin nuk Sirtus men, tumen ma po poplos ilia ta imut me ko, ma esap paiong wal imut to pim ung e li tumen.
Ma pi puus iso phae phae pim takut, tumen ma pi king kauk ko yang men po ko hosi nemokong tep tep nginan li ko mi wiu.
Li ma ungunan tin me miuk angan men ma pim a whis endara tin pit wo imut e imut whal ton men ko mi wiu epo wili pim tuon.

Li ma sinang u awheng tumen ku si put plo nginan som to ungunan tin munuman me men, kuru pi puus tin lek pim men ku tun akomen kut tumen ma hoo mingin ta pim epo pim tin ku palolongin men ung e mih ko li om kut.

Ma po oos mi hi epo endara aiingin li kho, anima a-Pol si pit emin po ma yang sakal taku, “Apo, taku wom ku hul wet wungin ta ngo kho, ma wom yok pi Krit asin, men ku wom pon ta mumhek mingin wa wom ku tep endara ta wom li ko akomen.
Si homani men nga wo nut wom epo wom ku mi wom pit nhing, epo enu wom ku ta kis lunga wom akomen, si imut misan.
Epo pi luk tin iyi men tihngin ta Got tin nga in wet wilin ma nga kum auluungin tan men ko pit tili ngo,
ma yang wo taku, ‘Pol, e lem asin; ngon men ku po wa ngon weh lu pit to mara Sisa ako; iis, kuru Got min suk ngon ma yang wa tunusngin ta po mosop tin wom mu then wo imut imen si tap kut tumen ako.’
Tumen ma wom tin masang men, wom kasum mi wom weh, epo wo ngo nuk wet sakalngin ta Got epon men ku si ken tihngin pok ngo epon men ako.
Epo it men ku iso saa li klang ung po pi po nemutmut ta.”

Tumen ma pi luk tin khum ta u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen men si, men esap iso pat wal pim si u ko mi wiu tin Atria men, ma pi put elup angan men po tin kum wo imut men wo hi hip i ken po e ung e li tikayung mulusngin ta men.

Ma po psik kaingin ko mi wiu, ma po pon ta wiu tin muut men mita tan khum mnal (40), ma imut sa osong li kara kyok, anima po psik kaingin kyok ko men po pon ta wiu tin muut men mita tan khum miuk (30).

Kut ma po lem epon takuli pim a kikin li klang ung po enah, tumen ma po whem anka tin isum imut ung men khaut mnal li ko mi wiu wangari imut, si po kuk e kines got tin ta hi then then men epo pi tin ku plas kerek si men.
Ma po tin kum wo imut men taku mhup silang imut, ma po hihi naak tin tun men li ko mi wiu, ma po khek emuh epo po taku whem anka tin kasum imut ung men kara ko hut imut,
men a-Pol sakal si ta phua tin maran pit wo po elara men u po elara kut tumen ti, “Taku po tin imen ku kuk wo imut som, men kuli wom palolongin akomen.”
Tumen po elara li paplah elik tin po kan kan naak epon men, si po mang ta naak ko ung yanga wiu.

Ma pi taku plas angan, men a-Pol heek epo po mosop ku ii endara aiingin kara, ma yang wo taku, “Homani men ungunan tin khum ta u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen tin wom kaeng ma wom iso kuk engun epo wom ku ii enda aiingin men. Epo wom ku wa endara aiingin kara kho som.
Tumen ma nga suh mi kinga wom epo wom ku ii endara aiingin kara, epon tin imen men epo wom tin ku iso kuk anga tunusngin men, epo yut wom ta men ku plong ko mhi wom ta akomen.”
Yang sakal i tin imen li klet, anima yang wa beret ta si, yang sam sam Got epon to mara po mosop, ma yang tik tik i kho, anima yang hosin ii nginan.
Kut ma po mosop miu hi plo, u po wa endara aiingin ta hi tuo hi kut tumen.
Epo pim mosop tin kuk wo imut men men enu pim khaut khum khum ponwal, u khum ponwal me sup u ta me sup tumen (276).
Kut ma po ii endara ko kai mi po kut, anima po taku ning i kuma imut malil ma po whem wit ko mi wiu.
Li ma pi plas ko yang ma po mara hi ko kila mulusngin tin imen; takuma po mara hi kon wiu susun tin to namak men, men po mi hi wai epon taku tumen, men ku po wa imut li sup po namak tin imen.
Ma po mang ta anka tin kasum imut ung men nuk mi wiu, si po kara poplos elik tin kasum endara tin po phae saangin ta imut epon men; kuru po yuh ilia si mara eip, ma po taku phae imut li sup suu wiu.

Takuma imut li sup pi ta tin esap ponwal hik me tut wal epon men, ma po wa imut sup li ung pon, ma imut hut li klang ung kut ma ku wonngin kyok akomen, si imut wangarin men pal palngin epo esap tin hik hik amhees me sup men.
Ma po nolo mi hi wawai epo po ku lek sun tin kan kanngin men ko huu, epon akuli hi ta suu li sup ma saa.

Takuma phua tin maran pit wo po nolo men taku palolo a-Pol, tumen ma yang wo hik put wungin tin po taku ning i men, ma yang wo ta po tin anga suungin men epo po ku lup wo imut kho li muk kuma po susuu li sup wo mulusngin,

si po kara tin anga suungin som men men ku hi mosop kara suu wo plang u kara suu wo endara tin ta imut e pal pal men kut tumen. Ma soput tin imen kha po mosop susuu li anga tunusngin li sup wo mulus men.
Kut ma po susuu li pol anga tunusngin kut, men po ion pi po nemutmut tin iyi men po sikian Melita.
Ma po tin nopu men ning wungin tunus takut epo pim. Epo po pong yau ta ma po wa pim mosop to min kehngin, epo pi yung pit u pi huk hukan kut tumen.
Takuma a-Pol tamuk yau hut engul kara me yang wai si wo sun, men tamha lengwal ta me pol epon tin yau mom i men, ma li tuk yang pit po wilin ma li nget kuk po wili yang.

Ma po tin nopu men ion tamha tin nget kuk po wili yang men men po sakal ta al taku, “Yang tin imen men tin lek po ko huu nginangan men kha imen, aku, yang anga tunusngin mi wiu, takuma got tin ples wungin nuk emin weh men ku mang ta yang iso tunus in akomen.”
Takuma a-Pol tembe po wilin ma tamha plong ko put ngi yau, si saihngin lengwal kara ku si ta yang akomen.

Si po kuk e hoo mi hi epo yang tin ku wilin som wa yang tin ku plong kerek ko hun men wa tumen. Takuma po nuk e kaeng li kho weh ma po ku ion tosukngin ta tin ku si ta yang men akomen, men po ko mi hi wiewi al ma po wo epo yang men got ta kha men.

Kut si pi kara ung e li li baul mulusngin tin imen men ta phua tin nhum epo sun mosop pi po nemutmut tin imen, men yan a-Publius. Yang tin imen wa pim li kuk mang tin ta yang men ma yang ning wungin tunus epo pim to ungunan miuk.

Si wungin si epo a-Publius wiraman men nuk e saih wo ehus to won tin ngeng ngeng u paphakngin tin to enghik men kut tumen, ma a-Pol li sup ta sun ma yang kines Got, ma yang wilin lup lup si nuk po sun ma yang ning sun si tunus.
Li klet ma wungin tin imen ningngin kut, men po mosop tin kara hi ung wo pi po nemutmut tin imen tin sasaih men maksin me ma po si turunus kut tumen.
Po tin imen kut men wa ya pim si epo wungin maran tin kiring kiring men, ma pim taku yok angan, men po me naa pim epo endara tin pim a kalwok epon men.

Li klet ma namih khaut miuk kho li, anima pim a si wo imut api Aleksandria ta tin got Sus husanin tin hukap men enu ngong nuk hut imut men, men me kaeng pi tin puus men ko pit pi po nemutmut tin imen.
Ma pim a li sup Sirakyus, ma pim a kuk imen to ungunan miuk.
Li klet ma pim a yok imen ma pim a baul pi mili pol Regium. Ma ungunan ta kyok si men eip tin me esaul men pit, ma ungunan ta kyok men pim a li pol pi Puteoli.
Ko pit imen men pim a li pon ta po tin ehuro it men kara, ma po yuk pim li kuk to po to ungunan eip u ponwal me sup tumen. Wungin tin tumen kha pim a li Rom angan epon men.

Ma ko pit imen po tin ehuro it men hul put pim, men po me pon ta pim weh li li hang nowhang tin po sikian Appi men u Mang Miuk tin po nomisang me pit min men kut tumen. Ma a-Pol ion po, men yang sam sam Got ma yang min pit nhing.

Li klet ma pim a li pol Rom kut, men yang tin phuan e maran pit wo po nolo Rom khum khum ta (100) men wa po tin kan kanngin men li sup yanga wili sun phuan tin maran pit wo pi tin po nolo tekel i men, si a-Pol men po mang tan in ta tuon to yang nolo ta tin haum eya yang men.

Li klet ma wungin si nuk ti, sulung epo ungunan miuk men a-Pol yuk po tin ya hi pos mi sun tin hi Yuda men me palu wal. Tumen ma po me palu wal kut, anima yang sakal ta po taku, “Wom masang tin ehurok men, ngo ku ning wungin ta ewut po tin ta it it khuuk wal men wa ewut wungin sinsin tin po inana it khuuk wal ton men akomen, takuma po kan kan ngo ili Yerusalem li sup yanga wili po Rom.
Po Rom men kines mi ngo tunus kho kut ma po taku mang ta ngo li engun, epo sinsin tin ku po wi ngo ko hun epon men men om.
Takuma po Yuda iso sakal hik put wungin ta sun, ma soput ku ta maksin nuk akomen, tumen ma nga yuk si wo Sisa, si ku ken nga in to wungin ta weh tin ngo ku wai pit po po tin it khuuk wal men akomen.
Epo sinsin tin imen kha nga yuk wom kuma nga ion wom ma nga sakal to wom epon men, epo hoo mingin ta po Israel kha nga kan kanngin epo esih tin po koklong iyi.”
Ti ma po ko sakal ta yang taku, “Pim ku wa kisang ta me Yudia epo ngon wa po tin ehuro it e me iyi men ku me pok wa sakal tun tira lengwal epo ngon akomen.

Takuma pim a wo taku tunus epo pim ku hul sakalngin mi wo ngon weh epo wungin tin nuk mip weh men. Epo po kara tin hik put it Yuda to wo phepngin ta hi weh iyi men pim a ion i kho epo po sakal lengwal epo sun mili yanga pi.”

Ma po hihi ungunan ta yang ta kho, anima po munuman me hang yang mi mang tin yang me in min men, ma yang maran ten ten to sakalngin ma yang ples po epo enunu tin ta Got men sinsin, kuru yang wa wungin mi wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men to sun tin ta po pokngin men ma yang taku phae mi po li pit wo a-Yesus kut tumen, hosingin to pi king kauk angan weh li pol to pi luk angan.
Ma po kara phae mi hi wet sakalngin tin yang sakal i men, si po kara pang po hi.
Kut ma po ku mi hi then lunga hi som ma po taku yok, men a-Pol ko sakal ta ti, “Emiun Auluungin pok put siik mi wo Aisaia tin pokngin men si ta po tin inana it men

tin yang sakal taku, ‘E lu epo po masang to sun wala tin imen ma e sakal taku, “Wom ku hul sakalngin, men ku wom hul i, takuma mara wom ku pem siin akomen, u mara wom kon i, men ku wom ion i, takuma mara wom ku iis i min akomen kut tumen.

Epo po masang to sun wala tin imen ko mi hi mokongin, u kinga po men ko khung nginan epo po tin ku hul men, u po mara hi men po ning i ko klet, epon takuli po ion i epo po mara hi tuo hi u po hul i epo kinga hi tuo hi, u po mara hi pem siin ta mi hi weh, ma po phae, kumali nga mlis saihngin ta po li.”’
Tumen ma wom men ku ion i weh epo wungin tin po palolongin epon e me hang Got men men tihngin kho li epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, ma po men ku hul wet.”
Ti ma a-Pol sakal sakalngin tin imen li klet, anima po Yuda yok ma heek walngin nhum ta si lunga po tuo hi.
Kut ma a-Pol in to posan pala musung ponwal mi mang tin yang in min ma yang in e kul i li men, ma yang wa po tin mosop e me hang yang men,
ma yang sakal amdal misan ma yang pok put enunu tin ta Got men u yang kot po epo wungin tin pit epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen, men ku po ta uluu yang akomen.
Ngo a-Pol tin kum wo a-Yesus Krais e Got yuk ngo epo ngo ku si paengin ta ma yang wa ngo li in enginin epo po epo ngo ku si pok put pok putngin tunus tin ta Got men.
Pok putngin tunus tin imen kha kho ma Got wo kuk mara po epon mi wo po pokngin tin tan men mi Panngin tin Auluungin men,
men pok put wungin epo Wirun, tin wungin tin nuk porili sun tin epo emkusin men, men yang si mi po tin khuuknginin tin ta a-Dewit men,
si wungin tin nuk porili sun tin epo emiun tin ta wungin auluungin men, men Got pakuh po Wirun to emhong tin nhum men epo yang tin khek kyok si tunus mi po tin huu kho men.

Mi wo yang kha pim a wa nanaangin u kumang tin ta po paengin men kut tumen, epon kumali hul wet wungin tin si wo wo phepngin men ku si lunga po mosop tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, epon ku yang yan si nhum epon.
Po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som e a-Yesus Krais yuk hi ku si tan men kha wom kuk lunga hi maksin kut tumen ako.

Kisang tin iyi ti epo wom mosop tin ung Rom e Got min epo wom weh men, tin yang yuk wom epon ku si tin kuk auluungin tan weh men. Nanaangin men ku weh ko ta wom u min wyungin kut tumen, tin me hang Got tin Wiwoli it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen.
Muk ma nga sam sam Got tin ta ngo men yanga wili a-Yesus Krais epo wom mosop, epon men wo phepngin tin ta wom men men po pok wal put wo mulus koyang sup e klet.
Epo Got tin nga kum tan to emiu ngo weh mi pok putngin tin tunus e ta Wirun men tuon ion ngo epo ngo ku nhing som, si nga sikia wom kokyok kokyok mi kinesngin tin ta ngo men.
Nga kines epon taku soput ta nuk, men ku homani weh kut men ku nga pon ta soput ta tin ira mi Got men, tin ku nga ti epo wom epon men.
Epo mi ngo epo ngo ku ti ion wom weh, kumali nga tet talungin tin emiunan men kara si ta wom, kumali wom kuk nhing weh.
Men sakalngin ta ngo sinsin nuk ti, epon kuma nga wa pa nhingngin to wom epo wo phepngin tin ta it then men, tin ta wom men, kuru tin ta ngo men kut tumen.

Ehurok, mi ngo epo wom ku kuk akuli wom pong epo engin epo angan munuman kho men nga hihi wungin ta mi ngo epo ngo ku ti epo wom (takuma soput ta ngo put ko klet kha me pol homani kut i) kumali kumang ta ngo ku kara si enun ung e li li hut sun lunga wom maksin, ken sun tin si enun lunga po tin kara e hi ku khuuk wal Yuda som men.
Naumngin ta Got men pit wo ngo epo ngo ku pok put sakalngin ta yang epo po Grik, u epo po tin ku Grik som men, u epo po tin mhi hi ek men, u epo po tin ku mhi hi ek som men kut tumen.
Tumen ma in epo mi ngo mosop, men mi ngo seh seh ta engin epo ngo tin ku pok put pok putngin tin tunus men si ta wom tin ung Rom men maksin kut tumen.

Epo ngo ku manngin wa ngo epo pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men akomen, epon men kakhangin ta Got epo palolongin ta po mosop tin wo hi phep men, men ta po Yuda muk, kuru ta po Grik maksin kut tumen.

Epo wungin siik tin ta Got men men lasngin si in pi mlaeng mi pok putngin tin tunus men, men wungin siik ta tin me epo wo phepngin u li epo wo phepngin tumen misan. Wala sakalngin panngin nuk ti, “Wo phepngin kha ku po tin wungin ta hi siik men tunus kuk epon men.”

Epo yan salngin tin ta Got men me ko wet pi in pi mlaeng, men emhut wungin tin po ku lem pit wo Got som ma po ning i men, u wungin tin ku siik som men kut tumen, mosop tin ta po tunus men, tin po put hi los wungin tin irawin men epo wungin tin ku siik som men.
Epo wungin tin ku po ion i epo Got men men in pi mlaeng mi po ako, epo Got suk mara po epon kho.

Epo ewo maran tin Got pho po endara mosop ma me men, men wungin tin yang in ton e ku mara it kon i akomen, men po mara hi iis i nuk epo endara tin ningngin men, men emhong tin ta yang e sindak in men u yang tin Gotan men kut tumen; tumen ma wungin tin ku po kalele i mut eya hi men men pi om.

Epo po men hop Got kho ako, takuma po ku wa yang yan si ken yang e Got weh men akomen, kuru po ku sam sam yang akomen kut tumen. Awu. Wungin tin po mara hi iran ta mi hi men ko amiron nginan engun, ma mi po tin wungin ulil kuk mi hi men men ko mi ku.
Po wo taku po e mhi hi ek, takuma po men si mhi hi ulil,

ma po wiewi moolngin tin ta Got tin ku som e hun ewin men epo endara enun tin maran ken po tunus tin huu ewin men, u ken emon, u li ken nginan tin khin khaut mnal men, u endara tin hih wo mulus men kut tumen engun.
Tumen ma Got mang ta po si po ngelek wo wungin tin maran kiring kiring men tin nuk ta mi hi men, ma po sup mi wungin tin min lengwal men, kuma po wa manngin si po po elit hi lunga hi tuo hi engun.

Po men wiewi wungin tin irawin e ta Got men epo torokngin tin nhum men, si po uluu wal u po kum auluungin tumen ta endara tin pho pongin men engun, si po ku ning i epo yang tin pho po endara mosop men akomen. Yang men ku it mosop sam sam i kokyok kokyok li kut. Men irawin.

Sinsin tin imen kha Got mang ta po, si wungin tin imen siwil si mi po tin ku po wa manngin ton men. Epo po wala tin ta hi men maksin kut wiewi wungin tin po khuukngin pit minal men, si po ning wungin tin ku po khuukngin pit minal som men epo al.

Kuru po masang maksin men ning i tumen kut, ma po mang ta wungin tin ku po ning i siik to sun wala men, si po mi hi siwil si epo al tin masang men, men po masang ning wungin tin to manngin men epo sun tin ta hi masang men, ma po wa wungin si po hi tuo hi emhut wungin ulil tin ta hi men siik.

Ma po ion Got tin ku iso in mi maran ekngin tin ta hi men ken i e ku tunus akomen, tumen ma Got mang ta po, si tulun hungin tin ta po men men pit wo wungin tin lengwal engun men misan, kuma po ning ning wungin tin ku siik som men.

Epo po mi hi kol epo wungin tin ku siik som men maran kiring kiring tin klet mi po men, men elwanngin, wungin lengwal, maran nesngin, u min lengwal pit wo sun kut tumen; u po mi hi kol epo wungin tin po mi hi heh wet sun men, u wungin tin po taku lek sun ko huu men, heek walngin, wungin amui, u wungin tin po taku mumhek mi sun men kut tumen; u po men sakal kaskas pit wetpo sun nginangan,

po hik put wungin pit wo sun nginangan, po kuk e mi hi lel Got, po men to wungin amhees, po kuk e mi hi wa hi si pit, po kuk e wangan po hi, po kuk e mara hi ira wungin lengwal homan kara, po kuk e wetpo hi wa sakalngin tin ta po irama hi to eleni hi men,

po mara hi ku ples wungin tunus akomen, wungin anuh tin ta po e ku sun wo hi nuk wet men men pi om, min epongin ta po men pi om, tulun somngin ta lasin men pi om, u min sukngin ta po men pi om kut tumen.

Aku, po men ion wungin ples nginan tin ta Got men tin siik men kho, tin wo epo po tin ira wungin tin tumen, men tunus epon ku huu ako. Takuma po kuk e ning wungin tin imen engun, si ku tin imen misan som. Awu. Po men sam wet sun tin ira wungin tin imen maksin kut tumen.

Tumen ma, tuon, ngon tin tunus men, ngon tin in tua ma e ples wungin nginangan men, wungin tin ku e kalele i wet Got eya ngon men, men pi om. Epo wungin tin e ples i ta po enginin kara men, men e ples wungin ewut ngon tuop kha men. Epo ngon tin ples wungin men ning wungin tin kai sun tin imen ewin ako.
Si it ion i epo wungin ples nginan tin ta Got men, men ira wungin irawin ma ko po po tin ning wungin tin tumen ewin men.
Tuon, ngon tin ples wungin ta po tin ning wungin tin tumen, si tuop men ning i kai sun tin po ning i men ewin kut, iyi, e phaeng taku ngon ku meleng wungin ples nginan tin ta Got men, wah?

Wa wungin tin yang ning i tunus tunus u yang ning i amang epo ngon, u yang wuh lasin tap li maran nomalak men tumen, tin munuman weh men, men e phaeng taku i e amiron nginan engun, si e pong epo wungin tunus tin ta Got men taku wa ngon li kumali e phae mip, wah?

Takuma e in e ira mip tin khang men, tin ngon ku phae mip som men kha e halung po mumhek mingin tap tuon tin ku si po ngon mi elup tin ta min kakhat sun e wungin ples nginan tin siik e ta Got men ku si in pi mlaeng epon men.
Epo Got men “ku wa wungin emhut sun ta po then then ira ewi sun tin po ta ning i men siik weh ako.”

Po tin pit nhing ma tohuh epo wungin tunus ning nginan kokyok kokyok kuma po wa moolngin u ya hi tin pos men u emkusi hi tin ku whuk som men kut tumen, men ku Got wa tunusngin tin sindak men si ta po.

Si po tin iso tohuh epo po ku ira mi hi ta hi tuo hi, ma pang po hi epo po tin ku ira wungin tin irawin men, si po ira wungin tin ku siik som men, men ku min kakhat sun u mumhek mingin tumen ko po po.
Won maikngin u miun tuungngin tumen men ku ko po enu po mosop tin tohuh epo wungin lengwal ning nginan men, men po Yuda muk, anima po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen.
Si moolngin, u po tin ya hi pos men, u min wyungin tumen ku ko po po mosop tin ning wungin tunus men, men po Yuda muk, anima po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen.
Epo Got men ku in to wungin tin yang ku ples wungin enginin enginin epo po kara ewin men akomen.

Epo po tin wungin sinsin om epo hi ma hi ning lasin men, aku, wungin sinsin om epo hi, takuma hi mosop men ku iso huuspit ako, u po tin kuk wet wungin sinsin ma hi ning lasin men, men kuli lasin ta hi plesngin epo wungin sinsin tin tuon imen kut tumen.
Epo po tin hul wungin sinsin men ani ku si kuk siik to mara Got men akomen. Awu. Po tin ira wungin sinsin weh men kha ku Got wo epo hi e kuk siik to mara yang men.

Epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, tin wungin sinsin om epo hi men, taku po ira mi hi weh tin po khuukngin pit minal ton men ma po ira wungin tin wungin sinsin wo epon men, aku, po tin imen wungin sinsin om epo hi, takuma po tuo hi kuk ken wungin sinsin ta po tuo hi ta men.

Po tin imen kumang ta wungin sinsin tin panngin nuk mi po men si in pi mlaeng epo hi. Kuru tulun hungin tin ta po e ples wungin mi po nginangan men men pok put sakalngin to sun maksin, ma wungin tin po mara hi iran men kuk e wa wungin pit po hi tuo hi, wa taku tumen som, men nuk eya po tuo hi kut tumen.
Wungin tin mosop imen ku si minan tin kuli Got ples wungin tin kaunngin nuk mi po tunus men epo a-Yesus Krais ira pok putngin tin tunus e nga pok put men.
Irawin, epo po sikia ngon men Yuda ma e hing wo wungin sinsin, u e wangan po ngon hing wo Got,
u e pon ta yang min, u e ion mi sakalngin tin ku tunus weh men kut tumen, epon tin e hul wet kotngin mi wungin sinsin men.
Ma wop phep epo ngon tuop kha suk mara po tin mara hi mih men epo soput men, u ngon men esul ta po tin kuk pi mi ku men ta,

u ngon men po tin kot po tin mhin ekngin ta hi om men ta, u po tin kot sun tin hohoin men ta tumen, epon tin e kasum maran ekngin u wungin tin irawin men, tin mosop e kasumngin mi wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men.
Tumen ma ngon tin kot po tin enginin kara men, iyi, ngon ku kot ngon tuop som, wah? Ngon tin pok put wungin epo po ku tip endara asin men, iyi, e tip endara maksin kut ti?

Ngon tin wo ti, “ E sup si khi po asin,” iyi, ngon e sup si khi po maksin kut ti? Ngon tin got tororokngin enun e hies pol hut ngon men, iyi, e tip endara tin pit mi mang auluungin tin tan men maksin kut ti?
Ngon tin wangan po ngon epo wungin sinsin men, iyi, e wa manngin ko po Got epon tin e hik put wungin sinsin men maksin kut ti?
Epo “Got yan men ton mingin lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men sinsin epo wom,” wala sakalngin tin panngin nuk epon men.

Wai, epo ngon tin po mut elit ngon men ku nhio wo ngon tuop ako, tin taku e ira wungin sinsin men. Si taku ngon men po ta tin hik put wungin sinsin men, men po tin mut elit ngon men ko ken ngon e ku po mut elit ngon kho som men.
Tumen ma taku po ta tin ku mutngin som men ira wungin tin sisiik e wungin sinsin wo maran ko klat epon men, men ku yang tin ku mutngin som men, men ku Got ion i ken i e mutngin men kut ti ako, wah?

Ma po ta tin ku po mut i elit som men, taku ira wungin sinsin weh, men ku ples wungin tap, aku, e in to wungin sinsin tin panngin nuk men u e mutngin kut tumen, takuma ngon men in pit mina po tin hik put wungin sinsin men ta ako, wah?
Epo yang ta tin Yuda nuk wo eha wo elit engun men ani ku Yuda weh men akomen, kuru wungin tin po mut hi elit hi men ani ku mutngin weh men akomen kut tumen.

Awu. Po ta tin Yuda e wungin nuk ta min tin kaunngin men kha Yuda weh men. U mutngin tin irawin weh men, men tin nuk ta mi po ta weh men, tin si mi po epo Emiun Auluungin, si ku epo panngin tingit tin hihingin nuk yanga kisang men akomen. Po tin imen sam samngin tin ku po wai ta hi men, men ku me hang po tunus ta akomen. Awu. Si men ku me hang Got weh.
Si ela ku po Yuda kuk ton tin po ku ut mara sun tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men ton men? Wa wungin tin po mut wal men ku nhio wo po tua?
Men wungin munuman maran kiring kiring nuk epon ako! Tin li muk epo sun men men ti, epo wungin tin me pol mi wo Got weh men, men yang wai ko ta po kuma po mara hi pit won ta yang.
Epon taku po kara ku kasum wo phepngin ta hi som, men kuli tua? Iyi, men ku wungin tin po ku wo hi phep som men ning i ma wungin anuh tin ta Got men kuli si enun ung hut som, wah?

Awu, tin imen men ku pi om weh! Iis, Got men ku weh in to wungin tan anuh ako, aku, po tunus mosop men torok nginangan. Wala sakalngin tin panngin nuk ti, “Kuma po ion ngon men in siik epo sakalngin tin tap men, u e nhien mi po to sakalngin minan tin po taku ples wungin epo ngon men kut tumen.”

Si taku wungin tin ta it e ku siik som men ning i ma wungin tin siik e ta Got men si in pi mlaeng epon, men ku it wo tua? Iyi, Got men wungin tan ku siik som tin yang taku ning mumhek mingin epon men, wah? (Nga sakal ira wungin tin ta po tunus men engun).
Awu, tin imen men pi om weh! Epon taku tumen, men kuli Got ples wungin ta po tin ung wo mulus men tua?
Epon taku wungin anuh tin ta Got men si nhum epo torokngin tin ta ngo men kuma yang yan si epon, tuni ma wungin iso plesngin epo ngo ken ngo e to lasin men?

Si tunus epo ngon ku sakal ken po kara tin hik put wungin pit wo pim ma po heek epo pim a sakal taku, “It men ku ning wungin lengwal kuma wungin tunus maksin si epon” ti engun, wah? Po tin imen ku huuspit, men wungin plesngin si siik ako.

Tumen ma it ku sakal tua? Iyi, it Yuda ani ung tunus weh epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, wah? Awu, wungin tin imen men pi om weh! Epo pim a wa wungin pit po po Yuda u po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men lup lup kho epo po mosop men kuk wet lasin ako.
Wala sakalngin men panngin nuk taku, “Po tin kuk siik men ku ta in som. Awu. Men pi pi om weh.
Po tin mara hi ples wungin tunus men ku ta in akomen, u po tin in e hip epo Got men ku ta in akomen kut tumen.
Awu. Po mosop men li wetpo hi wa soput tin tunus men kho kut, ma po li kuk amiron nginan to al. Po tin ning wungin tunus men ku ta in akomen. Awu. Pi angun weh.”
“Po emhong a hi men ken uwin tin po kil sun pit min men ta tin sowon tan won pit engun men; to po mamai hi men po ning ning wungin amo epon”; “isaling sut tin makalek men nuk wet wo po elit hi”;
“po wo hi men kol epo sakalngin tin ku po wo hi mut put sun men u sakalngin makalek kut tumen.”
“Saangin ung po khi po epo po ku li lek sun ko huu kuma po kalolwa hi yuk yuk ko;
mumhek mingin u won maikngin tumen men si mi khi po;
Ma soput tin ku po ung aminis epon men men ku po pon tan angan ta kho som.
Lemngin tin pit wo Got men men ku in maran min po akomen. Awu. Men pi om.”

Epo it ion i epo wungin tin tun tira e wungin sinsin wo epon men, men wo ta po tin kuk wet wungin sinsin men ako, kumali po mosop men ku po ping wo hi, ma po mosop tin ung wo mulus men ku me sup wet wungin ples nginan tin ta Got men misan.
Tumen ma wungin sinsin tin ku irangin men ani ku po tunus ta si in siik to mara Got epon men akomen, epo wungin sinsin kha it ion lasin ta it epon men ako.
Kut si homani men wungin siik tin me hang Got men, men si in pi mlaeng kut, men si enginin epo wungin sinsin, men kisang tin to wungin sinsin u ta po pokngin men tumen pok put epon,
men wungin siik tin ta Got e me epo wo phepngin tin pit wo a-Yesus Krais men ako, tin li epo po mosop u ko po po mosop tin wo hi phep men. Epo po ta ku in enginin epo sun akomen.
Epo po mosop men ning lasin kho ma po kalwok epo moolngin tin ta Got men,
ma po si kuk siik to mara Got hut emul engun epo nanaangin tin ta yang men epo lasin kiis nginan tin po wo hi pias epon mi Krais Yesus men.

Yang men Got wai si in pi mlaeng kuma yang si talungin ta tin ku Got min suk it ma Got klok lasin ta it epo wo phepngin tin pit wo yang kalolan men, kumali Got wa wungin siik tin tan men si in pi mlaeng, epon tin kho ma Got wuh wet lasin tin ta po men ma yang yek ta lasin tin ning ningngin kho men.
Kuru Got ning i tumen kuma homani maksin kha ku yang wa wungin siik tin tan men si in pi mlaeng men kut tumen, kuma yang in siik ma yang tet wungin siik ko po po ta tin won phep pit wo a-Yesus men.

Tumen ma sinsin tin ku po ta wangan pon epon men ani a? Awu. Men pi om. Iyi, men pi om epo wungin sinsin tin ia weh? Iyi, men pi om epo wungin sinsin tin po wuh kumang epon men, wah? Awu, men pi om epo wungin sinsin tin ta wo phepngin men ako.
Tumen ma mara pim ira wungin ti, epo po tunus ta men ku si in siik to mara Got epo wo phepngin weh, si ku epo wungin sinsin ira nginan akomen.
Wa tua? Got men ta po Yuda misa hi? Epo yang men Got ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen ako, wah? Wai, yang men Got ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen ako.
Epo Got men then tin ku tet wungin siik ko epo po tin mut wal ewin men si wo wo phepngin ta hi, u po tin ku mut wal ewin som men si epo wo phepngin ta hi kut tumen.
Kut ma it tin sakal tumen men wo phepngin kha it ning i ma wungin sinsin ku siin si in iis akomen, wah? Awu, wungin tin imen men pi om weh! Si it kaek si wungin sinsin kha men.
Kut ma it ku wo epo Abraham tin yau a it sin men men tuon tohuh, men yang pon ta ele?
Epon taku Abraham e ku Got tet wungin siik ko po yang epo tohuhngin tin ta yang tuon men, men ku yang in ton sinsin tin ku yang wangan pon men ako, takuma men ku to mara Got akomen.
Epo Panngin tin Auluungin men wo tua? Men wo ti, “Abraham won phep pit wo Got, men Got maran iran ta yang ken i e wungin siik men.”
Si po ta tin ning kumang men, kulngin tin po wai emhut kumang tin imen men ku po mara hi iran ken i e nanaangin men akomen. Awu. Men ken i e naumngin ta men engun.

Si taku po ta ku tohuh som, si won phep pit wo yang tin in to wungin tin yang tet wungin siik ko po po tin ku lem pit wo Got ewin som men engun, men wo phepngin tan Got maran iran ken i e wungin siik men.
Wala a-Dewit maksin sakal epo min kehngin tin nhum e ta po tunus ta tin Got maran ira wungin tan ken i e wungin siik men, epo sinsin men enginin epo tohuhngin tan,
wala yang sakal ti, “Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin wungin tin po hik put wungin sinsin men klokngin li kut men u lasin mosop ta hi men pang pongin kut tumen.
Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tunus ta tin yang tin Akono men ku maran ira wungin tan ken i e ku ning lasin ta men akomen.”

Tumen ma min kehngin tin nhum imen men ko po po tin mut wal men misa hi, wa men ko po po tin ku mut wal ewin som men maksin kut ti? Epo pim a sakal kho epo wo phepngin kha Got maran iran ta Abraham ken i e wungin siik men.

Si wungin tin siik imen men Got maran iran ta yang tin ku in tua? Iyi, Got maran iran ta yang minan tin yang mutngin kho, wa yang iso in engun? Men ku minan tin yang mutngin kho men som, si men minan tin yang iso in engun men ako.

Ma yang wa tosukngin tin epo mut walngin men, men tosukngin tin kaek si wungin siik tin me epo wo phepngin tin yang in ton minan tin yang ku mutngin kho som men, kumali yang si wirama po mosop tin wo hi phep men, aku, taku po ku mut wal som, kumali Got maran ira wungin ta po ken i e wungin siik men maksin kut tumen,

kuru yang men ku ko wirama po tin mut wal ewin men, men po tin kuk mi sun men tin ku mutngin engun som si po muk muk maksin pit mina wo phepngin tin wirama it Abraham ku mutngin kho som, si yang in ton kho men.

Epo sakalngin tin Got wo kuk mara Abraham epo yang ku pakuh po sun epo mulus mosop men ku ko ta yang wa po tin khuuknginin ta yang men epo wungin sinsin akomen. Awu. Men ko ta yang epo wungin siik tin me epo wo phepngin men weh.
Epon taku po tin wo hi nuk wet wungin sinsin men ani ku wa pakuh pongin men, men wo phepngin ko sinsin om ma sakalngin tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men ku siin iis akomen.
Epo wungin sinsin kha pong si yan salngin tin ta Got men siin si in men ako. Epo pi tin ani wungin sinsin om epon men men wungin sinsin hik put nginan men om epon maksin kut tumen.

Sinsin tin imen kha sakalngin tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men me epo po tin wo hi phep men, epon ku si pit mina min sukngin, kumali sakalngin tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men ku kaek siingin ta po tin khuuknginin ta Abraham men mosop, si ku ta po tin khuukngin pit mina wungin sinsin men misa hi akomen. Awu. Men ku ta po tin khuukngin pit mina wo phepngin tin ta Abraham men maksin kut tumen. Epo yang men wirama it mosop.

Wala sakalngin ta panngin nuk ti, “Nga wa ngon si wirama po tin ung e khuuk wal ta hi weh men men ku munuman.” Yang men wirama it to mara Got tin ani yang won phep pit won men, men Got tin wa tunusngin ko ta po tin huu kho ma sikia endara tin ku kho kuk som men ken i e kho si kuk men.

Yang men wungin sinsin tin ku yang hoo min epon men men pi om, takuma yang hoo min ma yang won phep engun. Tumen ma yang si wirama po tin khuuk wal ta hi weh men munuman, men ira sakalngin tin Got wo ta yang kho men ti, “Tin tumen kha kuli po tin khuuknginin tap men si munuman epon men.”

Ma yang ku won wiak epo wo phepngin som, tumen ma yang ku tulun hu pit po emkusin tuon tin ut nung men akomen, aku, posan ta yang khum khum angan kho li, kuru e-Sara kuman tin ut nung kho men, men ku yang tulun hi pit pon akomen kut tumen.
Yang men ku wo phepngin tan om ma yang min ponwal pit wo wo kuk marangin tin ta Got men akomen. Awu. Yang iso pit nhing to wo phepngin ma yang wa Got yan si,
ma yang men wo phepngin klet mi yang weh epo wungin tin Got wo kuk mara yang epon men, men Got in to kakhangin maksin tin ku yang pyu pon tumen ako.
Sinsin tin imen wala “Got maran ira wo phepngin ta yang ken i e wungin siik men.”
Epo sakalngin tin panngin nuk epo Got ku tet wungin siik ko po yang men, men ku sinsin epon ku nhio wo yang misan akomen.
Awu. Men epon kuli nhio wo it maksin kut tumen ako, men kuli Got tet wungin siik ko po it, tin taku wo it phep pit wo yang tin khek a-Yesus tin Akono ta it men kyok si tunus mi po tin huu kho men.

Yang men Got min alang siin si in yanga wili po epon ku hun, men sinsin epo wungin tin it ning i e yek ta sun tin siik men, u Got khek yang kyok si tunus, men sinsin epon ku Got ning it si kuk siik kut tumen.
Got men ning it si kuk siik kho kut, tumen ma homani ma it ung aminis to Got yanga wili yang tin Akono ta it e a-Yesus Krais men.
Yang kut kha soput ta it tip nuk epo wo phepngin ma it me sup mi nanaangin tin it nuk nhing min kut iyi men, ma it wangan po hoo mingin ta it tin kuli it wa moolngin tin ta Got men.
Si ku tin imen misan som. Awu. Si it wangan po won maikngin maksin kut tumen, epo it ion i epo won maikngin men pho po wungin tin ku it pit nhing wet won maikngin men,

ma wungin tin it pit nhing wet won maikngin men men pho po it tin ya it to wungin tin it pit nhing wet won maikngin nginangan men, ma it tin ya it to wungin tin it pit nhing wet won maikngin nginangan men, men pho po hoo mingin si in mi it.
Ma hoo mingin men ku wa manngin ko po it akomen, epo min epongin tin ta Got men men yuk yukngin ko mi it epo Emiun Auluungin tin wangin si ta it kho men.
Epo minan tin kho e it iso kakhangin ta it om men, to pi tin Got won ung won e tunus weh men, kha Krais hun mut eya it tin wungin ta it ku pit mina sun tin ta Got men som men.
Epon men khung nginan epo it ku pon ta po ta tin ku hun mut eya sun ta tin wungin tan siik men. Aku, taku po ta ku ning wo lalaingin ma hun mut eya sun ta tin wungin tan tunus men wa men.
Si Got men pok put min epongin tin yang tuon min epo it men si in pi mlaeng, epon tin it iso kuk to lasin men, men Krais hun mut eya it.
Tumen ma Got ning it si kuk siik epo Krais kalolwan kho kut khali homani ma wungin maran ko klat weh epo it tin kuli Got iso palolo it yanga wili yang epo it tin ku li sup mi mumhek mingin men.

Epo it tin kuk kho e nolo Got ma minan timen it si mi it then to Got epo hunngin tin ta Wirun men, khali homani ma wungin maran ko klat weh epo it tin si mi it then to Got kho kut men kha kuli Got iso palolo it epo tunusngin tin ta yang men.
Kuru ku wungin tin imen misan som, si it wangan po Got maksin yanga wili a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, tin homani ma it wai tin it si mi it then to Got men epon kho kut men.
Kut ma yang then ta misan kha lasin me sup wo mulus epon men ma hunngin me sup epo lasin tin imen, wala lasin mili ko klet po po tunus mosop men, epon tin po mosop ning lasin kho men.
Epo kho nginan ma li pol epo wungin sinsin tin ko ta a-Moses men, lasin men kuk wo mulus ako, takuma taku wungin sinsin ta pi om, men ku Got tet lasin ko po po akomen.

Takuma hunngin si kasum po tunus mosop ken po tin sinkhaung men ta, hosingin epo Adam ma weh li pol epo a-Moses, men kasum po tin ku ning lasin ira ewi sun tin ta Adam men som men maksin kut tumen. Epo Adam men tosukngin ta epo yang tin kuli sulung ma iso me men.

Si talungin tin it wai hut emul engun men ku ken wungin yek ta sun tin siik men tin Adam ning i men akomen. Epo yang then ta tin ning wungin tin yek ta sun tin siik men ma po munuman huu epon men, kha wungin maran ko klat weh epo nanaangin tin ta Got men u talungin tin me epo nanaangin tin ta yang tin then e a-Yesus Krais men kut tumen, kha ku min sukngin ko pu wal weh epo po tin munuman men, ma hambip kara weh si po sun li si.

Kuru talungin tin po wai hut emul engun men ku ken wungin tin me epo yang tin then e ning lasin men akomen kut tumen. Epo wungin ples nginan tin me epo lasin then ta men khali wungin si ung hut epo po tin ku huuspit men. Si talungin tin po wai hut emul engun men, tin me sinsin epo po munuman tin ning wungin tin yek ta sun tin siik men, khali wungin si ung hut tin ku po si kuk siik to mara Got epon men.

Epon taku wungin yek ta sun tin siik men tin yang then ta ning i men khali hunngin si maran pit wo po tin kara men ken po tin sinkhaung men ta epo lasin ta yang tin then imen, men wungin maran ko klat weh epo po tin wa nanaangin tin pu wal weh men u talungin tin epo wungin siik men kut tumen, kha kuli si ken po tin sinkhaung men ma po mara hi pit wo sun to tunusngin yanga wili yang tin then e a-Yesus Krais men.

Tumen ma wungin yek ta sun tin siik men then ta khali wungin ples nginan si epo po tunus mosop ma po tin ku huuspit men si enun ung hut, tumen kut kha wungin siik then ta khali talungin tin po wai hut emul engun men li epo po tunus mosop ma po tin si kuk siik to mara Got men tin wa po sup mi tunusngin men si enun ung hut men.

Epo yang then ta tin wetpon wa sakalngin men khali po tin munuman men si kuk to lasin epon kho men, tumen kut kha yang then ta tin hul wet sakalngin men kha ku po tin munuman men si kuk siik epon men kut tumen ako.
Kuru wungin sinsin me sup epon kumali wungin yek ta sun tin siik men ku si pu wal weh. Takuma pi tin lasin si pu wal epon men, pi tin wala imen kha nanaangin si pu wal weh epon men,

kumali lasin tin si maran pit wo po ken po tin sinkhaung men ta mi hunngin, tumen kut kha kuli min sukngin si maran pit wo po ken po tin sinkhaung men ta epo wungin tin siik men, ma wa po li sup mi tunusngin tin sindak men yanga wili a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men.
Kut ma it ku wo tua? Iyi, it ku iso kuk e ning lasin kuma nanaangin tin ta Got men iso si pu wal weh, wah?
Awu, men pi angul weh! Tua ma it tin huu epo lasin ning nginan kho men ku iso tunus kuk mi lasin ma it iran men?
Wa wom iso pong epo engin epo it tin wa baptais ko mi Krais Yesus kho men, men it mosop wa baptais ko mi hunngin tin ta yang men kha imen ako, wah?

Tumen ma it men kilngin to yang epo baptais ko mi hunngin kho, kumali Krais tin khek kyok si tunus mi po tin huu kho men epo moolngin tin ta Wiraman men, tumen kut kha ku it muk muk mi tunusngin homan ta maksin kut tumen.

Epon taku it lup to yang ko mi hunngin tin kai hunngin tin ta yang men enun, men wungin maran ko klat weh epo it ku iso lup to yang ko mi tunusngin tin kai khekngin kyok si tunus tin ta yang men enun maksin kut tumen ako.

Epo it ion i ti, epo mi it tin kho men hun put sa wlong putwal to yang kho, kumali lasin emkusin khakhangin tin tan men ku hik putngin, kumali it men ku iso kuk e kum engun wet wili lasin kyok akomen.
Epo po ta tin hun epo lasin ning nginan kho kut men, men plosngin wet wili lasin kut kha men.
Epon taku it huu to Krais kho, men ku wo it phep epo it tin kuli iso tunus kuk to yang men maksin kut tumen ako.
Epo it ion i epo Krais tin khekngin kyok si mi hunngin kho kut men, men ku hun angan ta kyok akomen. Epo hunngin men ku kasum yang kyok akomen.
Epo hunngin tin yang hun epon kho men, men yang hun ta lasin angan then ta los po sun mosop. Si tunusngin tin yang tunus in ton homani men, men yang tunus in ta Got kokyok kokyok li kut.
Tumen kut kha ku mara wom ira wungin ken wom e huu irawin weh ta lasin ning nginan kho kut, si wom tunus kuk ta Got mi Krais Yesus tin Akono ta it men.
Tumen ma wom men ku kuk aku wom mang ta lasin tin ku si maran pit wo wom emkusin tin huu ewin men ken po tin sinkhaung men ta, kuma wom hul wet sangelekngin tin tan men kyok asin.

Kuru wom kuk aku wom wa emkusin a wom tingit then then si ta lasin ken endara tin wungin tin ku siik som men ku ning kumang tan epon men kyok asin kut tumen, si wom wa tuo wom si ta Got ken wom e si tunus mi po tin huu kho men, kuru wom emkusin a wom tingit then then si ta Got ken i e endara tin ku wungin siik ning kumang tan epon men weh.
Epo lasin men ku maran pit wo wom kyok akomen, epo wom men ku kuk wet wungin sinsin kyok som. Awu. Wom men kuk wet nanaangin ako.
Kut ma tua? It ku kuk wet wungin sinsin som, si it kuk wet nanaangin, tumen ma it ku ning lasin engun, wah? Awu, men pi angul weh!

Iyi, wom iso pong epo engin epo po tin ani wom wa wom tuo wom si tan kuma wom hul wet wungin tan ken po tin kum wo sun engun men, po tin wom hul wet wungin tan imen kha wom kum won engun men, tin taku wom kum wo lasin tin hunngin si ung hut men, wa taku wom kum won tin hul wet wungin men tin wungin tin siik men si ung hut men, tumen wah?

Takuma sam samngin men ku li epo Got, epo kho, aku, wom men tin kum engun wet wili lasin men, taku li klet ma wom hul wet kotngin to mi wom weh, tin hihingin nuk e pim a wa wom li sup wet, kuma maran pit wo wom men.
Ma wom plosngin epo lasin kho kut khali homani ma wom si po tin kum wet wungin tin siik men.

Nga sakal ira wungin emol tin ta po tunus men engun, epon tin mi wom iso wiak wiak men. Epo wom tin kho ma wom wa emkusin a wom tingit then then si kum engun wet wungin tin min lengwal men, u wungin tin wom hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men, tin li epo wungin sinsin hik put nginan kara kyok men, tumen kha ku homani ma wom wa emkusin a wom tingit then then si kum wet wungin tin siik men, kumali wom si kuk auluungin weh.
Epo minan tin kho ma wom kum wet lasin engun men, men wo wom pias epo wungin tin siik men.
Wungin tin wom ning i kho imen, tin homani ma manngin wa wom epon men, ela ku plok si ma enun epon? Epo wungin tin mosop imen li ponsol epo hunngin misan.

Kut si wom tin homani ma wom plosngin wet lasin ma wom si po tin kum wet wili Got kho kut men, kha wom si enun to wungin tin wa wom lu epo wom tin ku si auluungin weh men, men weh li ponsol epo tunusngin tin sindak men.
Epo wungin tin ku emhut lasin men men hunngin ako, si talungin tin Got wai si hut emul engun men men tunusngin tin sindak in mi Krais Yesus tin Akono ta it men.
Si, ehurok, iyi, wom iso pong epo engin, epo nga sakal ta po tin pon ta wungin sinsin men ako, epo wungin sinsin men kasum po tunus ta minan tin yang tunus in weh li pol minan tin yang hun men, wah?
Epo wut wala ta tin titien in men, wungin sinsin kan kan i to titien minan tin yang iso tunus in men. Si taku wut titien hun, men wut plosngin epo wungin sinsin tin kan kan wut to titien men.

Tumen ma taku titien iso tunus in, si wut enangin yang enginin ta, men ku po wa wungin tin po sup si khi sun men si po wut. Si taku wut titien hun, men wut plosngin epo wungin sinsin tin imen, kuma wut ku ning wungin tin po sup si khi sun men akomen, aku, taku wut enangin yang homan ta.

Tumen ma, ehurok, wom kut men huu ta wungin sinsin kho epo Krais emkusin, kumali wom ku enangin yang enginin ta, men yang tin khek mi po tin huu kho men kyok si tunus men, kuma it si ning kumang ta Got ken sa tin muluk men ta.

Epo minan tin mi it tin kho men iso kasum it men, men mi it tin ngelek wo lasin men, tin wungin sinsin pong sin men, men ning kumang tan mi it emkusin tingit then then, kuma it ning wungin tin ku enun si ung hut tin ku li epo hunngin men.

Kut si homani men it plosngin wet wili wungin sinsin kho kut, epon tin it huu epon tin kan kan it kho men, kumali it kum ta Got epo wungin homan tin ta Emiun Auluungin men, si ku epo panngin tingit tin kho e hihingin nuk e li li men kyok akomen.

Kut ma it ku wo tua? Epo wungin sinsin ani lasin men, wah? Awu, men pi angul weh! Epo ngo ku pon ta lasin engun akomen, awu, epo wungin sinsin misan. Epo kho men ku nga pon ta maran nesngin akomen, si wungin sinsin tin wo ti, “Ngon men ku marap nes endara asin,” misan kha nga pon tan men.

Takuma wungin siin tin maran ko klat men kha soput ta lasin tunus ta nuk ma lasin pong si wungin lengwal maran kiring kiring ma si wa wa mi ngo weh men. Epon taku wungin sinsin kis, lasin men in e ken hunngin men.
Epon kho minan tin wungin sinsin iso kis epo ngo men, men nga iso tunus in, taku li klet ma wungin sinsin tin maran ko klat men kho me, khama lasin khek si tunus ma nga hun epon kyok.
Ma wungin sinsin tin maran ko klat men, tin taku wa tunusngin si ta ngo men, takuma nga pon tan, men tuon wa ngo kyok li epo hunngin.
Epo lasin ira soput tin nuk tunus tan epo wungin sinsin tin maran ko klat men, ma lasin torok mara ngo, ma wungin sinsin tin maran ko klat men kha lasin wi ngo ko hun epon men.
Kut ma wungin sinsin men auluungin, u wungin sinsin tin maran ko klat men, men auluungin u siik u tunus kut tumen ako.

Kut ma endara tin tunus men ani si ken hunngin ta ngo men, wah? Awu, men pi om weh! Takuma lasin tin ku si in pi mlaeng weh men, kha lasin ning hunngin mi ngo epo endara tin tunus men, kumali wungin tin maran ko klat men kha ku it ion lasin epon men, men lengwal weh.
Epo it ion i epo wungin sinsin men emiunan, si ngo men emalinan, men lasin kul ngo ma nga kum wet wilin engun.
Epo wungin tin nga in e ning i men nga kingung min. Epo wungin tin ngo taku ning i men, men ku nga ning i akomen; si wungin tin mi ngo lel i men, tin imen kha nga ning i men.
Kut ma taku nga ning wungin tin mi ngo epo ngo ku ning i som men, men mi ngo then to wungin sinsin epon men tunus ako.
Si homani men ngo ani ku ning i kyok men som. Awu. Lasin tin ung mi ngo men kha ning i men.

Epo nga ion i epo mi ngo, nga sakal epo mi ngo tin kho men ako, men ku wungin tunus ta in min akomen. Epo nga in to mi ngo tin taku ning i men, takuma tua ma ngo ku ning wungin tin tunus men, men ku nga pon tan akomen.
Epo wungin tunus tin mi ngo epo ngo ku ning i men, men ku nga ning i akomen. Si wungin lengwal tin mi ngo epo ngo ku ning i som men, timen kha nga ning i men.
Kut si taku nga ning wungin tin mi ngo epo ngo ku ning i som men, men ngo ani ku ning i kyok som, si lasin tin in mi ngo men kha ning i men.
Kut ma nga pon ta wungin sinsin ta in ti, ngo tin mi ngo epo ngo ku ning wungin tunus men, men wungin lengwal in tikayung ngo weh.
Epo mi ngo tunusngin pit po wungin sinsin tin ta Got men to mi ngo tin in mi ngo ahi weh men ako.

Takuma nga ion wungin sinsin ta kyok tin nuk mi ngo emkusin tingit then then men, men in e sewut wungin sinsin tin nuk mi ngo weh men, ma tet ngo li sup wet wili wungin sinsin tin ta lasin men, tin kan kan ngo men, tin in mi ngo emkusin tingit then then men.
Auweh, ngo men in amusukngin takut! Ara weh ku palolo ngo wet wili ngo emkusin tin ta hunngin tin i?

Nga sam sam Got epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men! Kut ma to mi ngo weh, men nga kum ta wungin sinsin tin ta Got men, si to mi ngo tin kho men, men nga kum wet wili wungin sinsin tin ta lasin men engun.
Tumen ma homani men po tin kuk mi Krais Yesus men ku Got wo los po po kyok epo wungin ta akomen, men po tin ku muk muk ira mi hi tin kho men ewin som, si po ira mi Got Emiun men.
Epo wungin sinsin tin ta Emiun tin sinsin epo tunusngin tin in mi Krais Yesus men, men plos ngo epo wungin sinsin tin ta lasin u hunngin kut tumen kho kut.

Epo endara tin wungin sinsin khuk pon men, epon tin won wiak wiak epo mi it tin kho men, timen Got ning i epo yang tin tih Wirun tuon to maran tin kai it tin emalinan e it kuk to lasin men, sinsin men epo lasin ta it, men Got wo los po lasin tin nuk mi it tin kho men kha men,
kumali wungin siik tin wungin sinsin wo maran ko klat epon men ku si enun ung hut epo it tin ani ku muk muk ira mi it tin kho men som, si it muk muk ira Emiun tin Auluungin men.

Epo po tin kuk ma ira mi hi tin kho men, men wa mi hi ko pit po wungin tin ta mi hi tin kho men kokyok kokyok, si po tin kuk ma ira Emiun Auluungin men, men wa mi hi ko pit po wungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men kokyok kokyok kut tumen.
Epo po tin wa mi hi ko pit po wungin tin ta mi hi tin kho men, men hunngin kha men, si po tin wa mi hi ko pit po wungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men, men tunusngin u min wyungin kut tumen kha men.
Epo mi it tin pit po wungin tin ta mi it tin kho men, men nolongin ta Got kha men. Epon men ku wai sup wet wili wungin sinsin tin ta Got men ewin akomen, kuru men khuk po engin weh kut tumen.
Kut ma po tin kuk ma ira mi hi tin kho men, men khuk po engin weh epon ku ning wungin ta tin ku Got min tunusngin pit po po ton men.

Kut si wom men mi wom tin kho men ani ku muk wom men akomen, tin taku irawin epo Emiun tin ta Got men in e li li mi wom men. Si taku po ta, Emiun tin ta Krais men ku in min akomen, men ku ta Krais akomen.
Si taku Krais in mi wom, men wom emkusin men hun kut, men sinsin epo lasin, si emiu wom men tunus in, sinsin men epo wungin tin siik men.

Si taku Got tin khek a-Yesus mi hunngin men Emiun in mi wom, men ku yang tin khek Krais mi hunngin men wa tunusngin si ta wom emkusin tin hunngin nuk epon men epo yang Emiun tin in mi wom men maksin kut tumen ako.
Tumen ma, ehurok, naumngin ta it, takuma ku naumngin tin ta mi it tin kho men kuma it kuk ma it iran kyok akomen.
Epon taku wom kuk ma wom ira mi wom tin kho men, men ku wom huu ako. Si taku Emiun Auluungin kha wom lek wungin tin emkusi wom ning i men ko huu epon men, men ku wom tunus kuk ako.
Epo po mosop tin Got Emiun li muk hi men, tin imen kha husani Got men siik.
Epo wom ku wa emiun tin kan kan wom kuma wom lem kyok men akomen. Awu. Wom wa Emiun tin ku Got wo epo husanin ung po wom e ku it yuk “Aba, Yok,” ti epon men ako.
Emiun tuon pok put wungin to emiu it epo it tin husani Got men,

ma taku it e husani Got, it men po tin ku wa moolngin men, men moolngin tin ku Got pakuh po it epon men u moolngin tin ku it wai to Krais men kut tumen, taku irawin epo it lat won maikngin to yang, kumali it si wa moolngin to yang maksin kut tumen.
Epo marango ira wungin ti, epo won maikngin tin ta elup tin homani iyi ku tunus weh kuma it kaini to it tin kuli wa moolngin men, tin ku iso lasngin si in pi mlaeng mi it men akomen.
Epo endara mosop tin Got pho pon men nuk e hoo min weh epo po tin husani Got e masang men, tin ku iso lasngin si kuk pi mlaeng men.

Epo kho men Got wa endara tin yang pho pon men li sup wet wungin tin sinsin om min men, si endara tuon ani ku min epon tumen som. Awu. Yang tin wai li sup wet sun to hoo mingin men kha sinsin epon men.
Epo endara tin Got pho pon men tuon men ku plosngin wet wili wungin tin ku emkusin tan whuk men li sup mi won piasngin tin to moolngin e ta po tin husani Got men maksin kut tumen ako.
Epo it ion i epo endara mosop tin Got pho pon men, men nuk e yut yut to al to won maikngin ken po wala tin ku wanhung ma won maan maan men, kha me pol homani kut i.

Ma ku wungin tin imen misan som, si it maksin tin kuk to Emiun Auluungin ken endara tin muru muk po ewun men, tuo it kuk e yut yut mi it tuo it kut tumen, ma it kuk e kaeng to mi it weh epo Got tin ku sikia it e husanin men, tin ku emkusin a it plosngin epo hunngin men.

Epo it men palolongin kho epo hoo mingin tin imen, takuma hoo mingin tin mara it nuk pon kho kut men, men ku hoo mingin kyok akomen. Epon tuni ma po ta ku iso hoo min epo endara tin maran nuk pon kut men?
Si taku it hoo mi it epo endara tin mara it ku nuk pon kho som men, men ku it pit nhing wet won maikngin ma it kaeng li maran nomalak epon.

Kuru Emiun Auluungin kho wo it tin wo it wiak men kut tumen. Epo endara tin ku it kines epon men, tin ku it kines tunus tua epon men, men ku it pon tan akomen, takuma Emiun tuon in emin ma yang ning kinesngin nhio wo it to yut yutngin tin maik e khung nginan epon ku pok putngin men.
Ma yang tin ion mi po tunus weh men men ion wungin tin nuk mi Emiun Auluungin men, epo Emiun Auluungin in emin ma yang kines nhio wo po tin auluungin men ira mi Got weh.
Ma it ion i epo wungin mosop men kum to al kuma si tunus epo po tin mi hi pit wo Got men, men po tin wala Got yuk hi ira wungin tin yang hihi ta min epon ku si men.
Epo po tin Got ion hi kho men, men yang won ung wo hi epo po ku si enu hi ken Wirun weh men, kumali Wirun weh si li muk mi ehuro hi tin munuman men.

Kuru po tin yang won ung wo hi kho men, timen yang yuk hi kho maksin; u po tin yang yuk hi kho men, timen yang ning hi si kuk siik kho maksin; u po tin yang ning hi si kuk siik kho men, timen yang wa moolngin ko po hi maksin kho kut tumen.
Kut ma it ku sakal tua epo wungin tin mosop imen? Taku Got ku tita it, men ara weh ku nolo it?

Yang tin ku min ko wo Wirun tin tan weh men som, si yang min alang si sun sup yanga wili po kuma Wirun hun mut eya it mosop men, ma tua ma yang ku naa it hut emul engun epo endara mosop maksin akomen?
Ara weh e ku hik put wungin pit po po tin Got won ung wo hi men? Awu. Got tuon kha ning po si kuk siik men.

Ara weh e ku wo los po it? Awu. Krais tuon kha hun kut men, kuru yang khek kyok si tunus maksin, men yang tin wala si in ewo wili Got tin eronin men, kuru yang in emin ma yang ning kinesngin nhio wo it maksin kut tumen.

Ara weh e ku pok mi it epo min epongin tin ta Krais men? Iyi, won maikngin wa miun tuungngin wa mumhek mingin wa hun elipngin wa wiwilngin wa lalaingin wa bainat wa tumen ani ku ning i tumen, wah? Awu.

Wala sakalngin men panngin nuk ti, “Yap tin nuk wo pim men kha po lek pim ko huu to pi mhangin u to pi luk kut tumen kokyok kokyok epon men. Po ion pim ken pim e sipsip tin kuk epon ku lekngin ko huu engun men.”
Takuma wungin tin mosop imen men it nomka hut weh yanga wili yang tin min pit wo it weh men.

Epo ngo men wo ngo phep weh kut epo hunngin wa tunusngin, wa tihngin wa emiun tin mara hi pit wo sun men wa emiun tin ahuwesngin men, wa endara tin ta elup tin iyi wa endara tin ta elup tin ku iso me men,

wa endara tin nuk ili awon men wa endara tin nuk ko li awet men wa endara tin pho pongin kara maksin men kut tumen, ku kakha epon ku pok mi it epo min epongin tin ta Got e in mi Krais Yesus tin Akono ta it men akomen.
Nga sakal irawin mi Krais, si ngo ku torok som, kuru mi ngo tin ples wungin men pok put sakalngin nhio wo ngo mi Emiun Auluungin kut tumen,
epo nga in to won maikngin nhum u min urutngin sumsum tumen mi ngo.
Epo ngo taku tuo ngo ku in wet ngil ngilngin tin ta Got men ma nga in engini ngo epo Krais kuma mut eya po tin ehurok e pim a khuuk wal wo mulus men,

men po Israel tin Got kuh husani Got ung po hi men, u moolngin tin ta Got men, u wungin kara tin Got kakaek siin lunga yang to po men, u wungin sinsin tin ko ta po men, u kumang tin po ning kumang auluungin epon men u wungin kara tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men kut tumen kha ta hi men.

Kuru po tin yau a hi sin men ta hi, u Mesaia tin in ili awon epo endara mosop e Got tin ku it sam sam i kokyok kokyok li kut men men kha me khuukngin ira wungin pit mina po tunus tin khuuk wal wo mulus men kut tumen. Men irawin.
Si ku ken sakalngin ta Got e ku put ko nuk engun akomen. Epo po tin khuuknginin ta a-Israel men mosop ani ku ta Israel weh men akomen,
wa po tin khuuknginin ta Abraham men mosop ani ku Got kuuh husani Abraham epon men akomen kut tumen. Awu. Got wo ta Abraham ti, “Epo Aisak kha ku nga kuuh husanim ko po hi men.”

Wungin timen sinsin ti, po tin khuukngin epo mi po tunus engun men ani ku Got husanin weh men akomen. Awu. Po tin khuukngin epo wo kuk marangin tin ta Got men kha Got maran iran ken i e Abraham khuuknginin weh men.
Epo wungin tin Got wo kuk mara Abraham epon men men ti, “Mi elup tin wala iyi mi posan tin ta maksin men kha ku nga kyok me, men ku e-Sara ku khuuk sun masang ta.”
Si ku wungin tin imen misan som. Awu. E-Rebeka kut men kuman kuk po wulong tin hukap men epo yang then ta men, men Aisak tin wala yau a it siin men.

Epo wulong tin imen ku khuukngin kho som u wulong ku ning wungin tunus ta wa lengwal ta tumen kho akomen, si epon kumali wungin tin Got nana i ta min kho men ku si nuk nhing weh ira wungin tin yang tuon won ung won men, men ku si epo kumang ta wulong ta som, si men si epo Got tin yuk po men,
kut kha yang wo ta e-Rebeka taku, “Yang tin khuukngin muk sun men ku kum wo sun tin khuukngin ira sun men.”
Men ira ewi Panngin Auluungin tin wo taku, “A-Yakop kha mi ngo epon kho men, si a-Isau men nga mut i kho.”
Kut ma it ku wo tua? Got men in to wungin tin ku siik som men, wah? Awu. Ti men pi angul weh!

Epo Got wo ta a-Moses taku, “Ngo ku mi ngo suk po tin araling e mi ngo epo ngo ku mi ngo suk hi weh men, u ngo ku mi ngo amusukngin to po tin araling e mi ngo epo ngo ku mi ngo amusukngin to hi weh men kut tumen.”
Tumen ma mi po ta tin min nawaehngin men, wa po ta tin saangin ung po khin men, ani ku wungin si epon men som. Awu. Got tin min suk po ewin men kha wungin si epon men misan.

Epo Panngin Auluungin men wo ta Parau taku, “Wungin sinsin tin nga khek ngon si in epon men wala ti, epon kuma nga suk mara po epo wungin ahuwesngin tin ta ngo men epo ngon, ma ya ngo men ku pok putngin yanga pi wo mulus sup e klet weh.”
Kut ma Got min suk po tin araling e yang min epo yang ku min suk hi men engun, u yang ning mi po ma po mi hi khang tin araling e yang min epo yang ku ning i tumen epo po men engun kut tumen.
Kut ma nga wo taku ngon ku wo ta ngo ti, “Tuni ma yang iso wilala ewut it epo lasin? Epo ara weh e ku hik put wungin tin yang min wai epo yang ku ning i men?”
Awu. Si tuon, ngon ara weh e ku pae wungin kyok li ewut Got? Iyi, mulus tin po pang i men ku ko wo ta po tin pang i men, “E pang ngo tumen epo ele,” ti, wah?

Iyi, po ta tin pang pang mulus nginangan men, men e nhum epo mulus tin yang pang i men, kuma epo mulus tingit ta, men ku yang ning endara ta epo kumang tin tunus men, u endara ta epo kumang tin amiron nginan engun men kut tumen, epo min engun ako, wah?

Kut si taku Got tin taku ning tosukngin epo min kakhat sun tin tan men, u yang taku wa kakhangin tan si in pi mlaeng men kut tumen, kha yang iso kaeng i ma yang wuh wungin maran nomalak eya endara tin ta min kakhat sun e hihingin kho epon ku mumhek mingin men,
u yang taku ning tosukngin epo moolngin ta yang tin ko pu wal weh wo endara tin ta min sukngin e yang hihi i kho epon ku wa moolngin men kut tumen,
men it tin wala yang yuk it mi po Yuda misan som, si mi po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen, men ku yang ning i tumen epo min engun ako, wah?

Wala yang sakal maksin mi kisang tin ta pokngin a-Hosea men ti, “Ngo ku sikia po tin e ku masang wala ta ngo kho som men, men masang wala tin ta ngo men weh, u wut tin ngo ku mi ngo pit won kho som men, men wut tin mi ngo pit won weh men kut tumen.”
“Ma kuli wungin si nuk ti, pi tin nga wo ta po taku, ‘Wom men ku masang wala ta ngo som,’ pi tin wala imen kha kuli nga kuuh husani Got tin in kokyok kokyok men ung po po men.”

Kuru Aisaia wut plai los po po Israel taku, “Aku, taku tiikngin ta po masang to sun wala tin khuuknginin ta a-Israel men si munuman kai namak tin nuk suu wiu men, takuma men kuli kiak sakun kara engun kha kuli palolongin men.
Epo yang men kuli suuk sii kumang tan ma hik put wungin tan maran ko hut sok epo wungin tin siik men, epo yang tin Akono men kuli pus kumang tan ning nginan si wo mulus.”

Kuru men ken Aisaia tin sakal kho men ti, “Taku yang tin Akono e maran pit wo po nolo men ku mang ta po tin khuuknginin ta it kiak kara engun men iso kuk som, men ku kho ma it ko ken pi Sodom men, u it ko ken pi Gomora men kut tumen ako.”

Kut ma it ku wo tua? Men ti, epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, tin kho ma ku tohuh epon ku hi li wa wungin siik som men, men hi li wat wo wungin siik kho kut, men wungin siik tin me epo wo phepngin men.
Si po Israel tin tohuh epo po ku li wa wungin sinsin tin po taku si kuk siik epon men, men ku hi li wat wo wungin sinsin tin hi taku si kuk siik epon men akomen.

Epo ele? Epo po taku wai epo wo phepngin akomen, si po taku wai ken i e tohuhngin epo wungin sinsin ira nginan kha ku po wai epon men. Epo po li po plong ko hut enah tin hut si pit ma po plong pon ewin men.

Wala sakalngin panngin nuk ti, “Wom hul, nga wa enah ta ko ung po pi Saion tin ku po poplong ko hut men, men umat ta tin ku po poplong ko epon men, ma po mosop tin wo hi phep pit wo yang men ku ta manngin wan akomen.”
Ehurok, wungin tin mi ngo epon ta mi ngo weh men u kinesngin tin nga kines Got mut eya po Israel men kut tumen men wala ti, epon ku po palolongin weh.
Epo nga pok put wungin nhio wo po epo po men tohuh ta Got ako, takuma po men ku mara hi ek wungin tunus ani po ning i tumen akomen.
Epo po men pong epo wungin tin siik e ta Got men, ma po tin tohuh epo po ku pit nhing epo wungin siik ta po tuo hi men, kha po ku wa hi sup wet wungin tin siik e ta Got men akomen.
Epo Krais men mhin tin wungin sinsin tin po taku si kuk siik epon men me ponsol epon men ta po mosop tin wo hi phep men.
Epo a-Moses pan sakalngin epo wungin siik tin me epo wungin sinsin men men nuk ti, “Yang tin ning wungin tin imen weh kha ku tunus in epon men.”
Si wungin siik tin me epo wo phepngin men men sakal ti, “Wom men ku sakal ta mi wom taku, ‘Ara weh e ku li si wet pi?’ ti asin” (men los po po tin taku wa Krais me ko wet pi men)
wa “’Ara weh e ku li ko mi nahu tin siin yup men?’ ti asin” (men los po po tin taku wa Krais kyok me si mi hunngin men).
Si wungin tin imen men wo tua? Men wo ti, “Sakalngin men nuk tikayung ngon, men nuk wo ngon u mi ngon kut tumen weh,” (men los po sakalngin tin epo wo phepngin men tin pim a pok put men),
epon taku e pok put a-Yesus tin Akono men na wo ngon ma wop phep in na mi ngon epo Got tin khek yang kyok si mi hunngin men, men ku e palolongin.
Epo na min kha po ta won phep khali si in siik men, u na won kha po ta pok put wophepngin tan si epon khali palolongin men kut tumen.
Epo Panngin Auluungin men wo taku, “Po mosop tin wo hi phep pit wo yang men ku ta manngin wan akomen.”
Epo takonngin ku ta nuk lunga po Yuda u po Grik kyok som, epo yang tin Akono tin then e maran pit wo po mosop men suusuunguh miranngin tan ko epo po mosop tin hau si wo yang men.
Epo “ara e ku hau si wo yang tin Akono men yan men kuli palolongin.”

Kut si po ku hau si wo yang tin po ku wo hi phep pit won kho som men tua? U po ku wo hi phep pit wo yang tin po ku hul epon kho som men tua? U taku po ta tin ku pok put wungin men ku pi om, men ku po hul epon tua?

U taku po ku tihngin li som, men ku po li pok put sakalngin tua? Wala sakalngin panngin nuk ti, “Po tin li pok put pok putngin tin tunus e epo min wyungin men, tin wa pok putngin tunus tin ku po mi hi keh keh pit pon men me men, po khi po men pon lungin takut!”
Takuma po mosop ku hul wet pok putngin tin tunus imen som. Epo Aisaia wo taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, ara weh e ku won nuk wet sakalngin tin pim a pok put kho men?”
Tumen ma wo phepngin me epo sakalngin tin hulngin in min men, ma sakalngin tin hulngin in min men men me epo sakalngin ta Got.
Si nga kileng taku, po men hul sakalngin kho ako, wah? Wai, po men hul i ako, “Wut po men li pol yanga pi wo mulus mosop tin nuk kut men, u sakalngin ta po weh li pol woringi mulus mosop kut tumen.”

Si nga kines ta maksin men ti, po Israel tin ku pon ta wungin kho som men, men pi angul, wah? Wai, men pi angul ako. Muk men a-Moses sakal taku, “Ngo ku seh po ewhat wom epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men ma wom gus po. Ngo ku ning i epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som e ku mi hi ek wungin tunus som men, ma ya wom sal pit wo po.”
Kuru Aisaia min puplet weh, wala li yang sakal ti, “Po tin e ku langun epo ngo kho som men men pon ta ngo kho kut. Po tin e ku kines epo ngo kho som men men nga si in pi mlaeng to mara hi kho kut.”
Si po Israel men yang sakal si ta po taku, “Ungunan ta men li pi luk, men nga in e wili ngo kalulu pi mili eya po masang to sun wala tin ku hul wet wungin som e hi wo phae sun nginangan men.”

Kut ma nga kines ti, Got e wetpon wa po masang to sun wala tin ta yang men kho, wah? Awu, men pi angul weh! Epo ngo kut ngo men api Israel kut. Ma nga pol hut mulu tin ta Abraham men, men nga si mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Bensamin men.

Got e ku wetpon wa po masang to sun wala tin ta yang e po iso kis kis si yang won ung wo hi kho men akomen. Iyi, Panngin Auluungin put tin sakal epo a-Elaiha men, tin yang hau si wo Got ewut po Israel taku,

“Ngon tin Akono men, po lek po pokngin tin tap men ko hu hu, u po ninhien suyung tin tap men kho kut tumen, si misa ngo iso in, ma po taku wi ngo ko hun kut tumen,” tin imen e ku wom pon tan akomen, wah?
Takuma Got sakal wet yang tua? Men yang wo ti, “Nga mang ta po masang khum khum khum khaut ponwal me sup (7,000) iso ta ngo kuk, men tin ku powut hi ko suul mara a-Baal kho akomen.”
Tumen kut kha homani ma po parom nginan kara iso kuk kut, tin Got won ung wo hi epo nanaangin tin ta yang men.

Ma taku epo nanaangin, kut men ku me epo kumang ning nginan kyok som. Epon taku ku tumen som, men nanaangin e ku nanaangin kyok akomen. Si taku men me epo kumang ning nginan, men ku nanaangin kyok akomen. Epon taku ku tumen som, men kumang e ku kumang kyok akomen kut tumen.
Kut ma tua? Po Israel men ku wa wungin tin po langun epon men akomen. Si po tin Got won ung wo hi men wai kho kut, si po tin kara men ko mara hi mhi.

Men ira sakalngin tin panngin nuk men in ti, “Got wa po emiu hi tin kuk a nhaung nginan engun men si ta po, u yang wa po mara hi ung kuma po ku ion endara epon akomen, u yang wa po kinga hi ung kuma po ku hul akomen kut tumen, men in tumen kha me pol homani kut i.”

Kuru a-Dewit sakal taku, “Suyung tin ta po men men ku ko ken esih tin li ken nginan kuuh min men ta u ken nomkal ta u ken endara tin po plong ko epon men ta tumen, kumali men ku si endara tin emhut wungin ta po men ta.
Ngon men ku ning i ma po mara hi men ku pi mi ku hawus i, kuma po mara hi iis endara akomen, u ngon men ku hik hik put musut po, kuma po men ku si pit nhing kokyok kokyok akomen kut tumen.”

Kut ma nga kines ti, po Israel tin plong ko kho men, men epon ku po plong ko yek, wah? Awu, men pi angul weh! Si po tin ning wungin tin yek ta sun tin siik men kha wungin tin Got ku palolo po epon men, men ku me epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, kuma wungin tin imen ku seh po ewhat po Israel ma po mi hi heh wet sun tin ku khuuk wal Israel som men.

Si taku po Israel tin ning wungin yek ta sun tin siik men kha po tin kara e ung wo mulus men wa miranngin hambip epon men, u po Israel tin huuspit men kha po tin ku khuuk wal Israel som men wa miranngin hambip epon men kut tumen, taku po Israel mosop si wo hi phep, kut men wungin maran ko klat weh epo po tin ku khuuk wal Israel som men ku wa miranngin hambip weh, kuru kara si po sun kut tumen ako!
Epo nga wo ta wom tin ku khuuk wal Israel som men. Epo ngo men paengin ta wom tin ku khuuk wal Israel som men ta, tumen ma nga wangan po kumang tin ta ngo men,

epon taku soput ta ti wa ta tumen nuk, men ku nga seh po ewhat po Israel tin pim a khuuk wal then wo mulus men, kumali po mi hi heh wet sun tin ku khuuk wal Israel som men, ma nga palolo po tin ta hi men kara mi sun.

Epon taku Got tin wetpon wa po Israel li kuk men, men soput tin po tin kara e ung wo mulus men si mi hi then to Got epon men, iyi, Got tin kuli wa po kyok me sup men, men ku ken ele, epon men ku ken tunusngin tin po khek kyok si mi hunngin men ako, wah?

Epon taku beret tin misikin e po talu Got epon muk men e auluungin, kut men ku beret tin enginin kara men auluungin maksin kut tumen ako. U taku sa imut auluungin, kut men ku sa wilin tin imen auluungin maksin kut tumen ako.

Si taku Got pepsek sa olip wilin kara li, si yang sum sum ngon tin ken sa olip tin tuon plok misuk men ta lunga po Israel, ma to po men e si sa wilin tin sa olip sut ngon tin whal men, ma e si kialwung to sun wilin tin iso pit po sun men,
men ku e wangan po ngon ewut sa wilin tin iso pit po sun men asin. Si taku e wangan po ngon, men ku tulup hu nuk po engin, epo ngon ani ku isum sa imut men som. Awu. Sa imut kha isum ngon men ako.
Kut ma nga wo taku ngon ku sakal ti, “Got pepsek sa wilin kara li si kuma yang sum sum ngo ewi sun.”
Sakalngin timen e nut i. Po men ku wo hi phep som kha Got pepsek po li men, si ngon men pit nhing epo wo phepngin. E wa ngon si pit asin, si ngon men ku lem.
Epon taku Got ku min ko wo sa wilin tin irawin weh men som, epon men kuli yang ku min ko wo ngon som kut tumen.

Tumen ma tulup hu nuk po engin epo wungin tin amunu u ngeng ngeng tumen tin ta Got men weh. Po tin plong ko men, men wungin tin ngeng ngeng men ko epo po. Si ngon men wungin amunu ti epo ngon, men taku e iso kaek wo wungin amunu tin ta yang men. Wa taku pi engun, men ku e pepsekngin mak lu kut tumen ako.
Kuru po kut, taku po ku kaek wo wungin tin po ku wo hi phep som men akomen, kut men ku Got sum sum po kyok li sup put sun ewun kyok ako, epo Got men kakha epon ku sum sum po kyok ako.

Epo ngon tin Got klat ngon put sa olip tin plok si misuk e khuuk wal pit minal ko ung tumen kut men, si yang hik put wungin tin ta sa olip e sa olip khuuk wal pit mina wal men ma yang sum sum ngon put sa olip tin tunus men, kut men wungin maran ko klat epo yang ku iso sum sum sa olip wilin tin tunus men kyok li pit put sun tin tunus e tan weh men kyok ako, wah?

Epo ehurok, wungin tin ngo ku mi ngo epon som men, men nuk ti, epo wom men ku kuk akuli wom pong epo wungin kaunngin ta, epon akuli wom wa wom si pit to mara wom tuo wom e ken wom e mhi wom ek men.
