Wungin kaunngin tin imen wala ti, epo po mara hi mhi men si ta po Israel tin misikin kara men kho, ma men ku kuk weh li pol mi elup tin po tin ku khuuk wal Israel som men, tin ku me sup men, enu hi tiikngin klet kho kut.

Iis, ma soput tin imen kha kuli po Israel mosop palolongin epon men, wala sakalngin panngin nuk ti, “Yang tin Palolongin men ku me pol po pi Saion, men ku yang phae po tin khuuknginin ta a-Yakop men, ma po wetpo hi wa wungin tin po ku ira wungin tin pit mina sun tin ta Got men som men.
Ma wungin tin imen men wungin tin ta ngo e ngo ku kaek siin lunga ngo to po men, minan tin nga klok lasin tin ta po men li men.”

Sakalngin tin nuk porili sun tin pok putngin tunus men, men po kuk ken po tin Got nolo hi men, men sinsin epon ku Got nhio wo wom, si sakalngin tin nuk porili sun epo po tin Got won ung wo hi men, men po kuk ken po tin Got min pit wo hi men, men sinsin pit epo yang tin tulun hu pit po po tin yau a hi sin men ako.
Epo talungin tin ta Got men u yukngin tin tan men kut tumen, men ku Got phae min epon kyok ewin akomen.
Epo wom tin kho ma wetpo wom wa sakalngin ta Got, si homani ma wom wa min sukngin epo po tin wetpo hi wa wungin ta yang men,
tumen kut kha homani ma po tin imen wetpo hi wa sakalngin ta Got, kumali min sukngin tin Got ku min suk wom men kha ku po wa min sukngin epon maksin kut tumen.
Epo Got klet eya po mosop epo wungin tin po wetpo hi wa sakalngin men, epon kumali yang min suk po mosop kyok.

Auweh, mhin ekngin tin ta Got men u maran ekngin tin tan men kut tumen, men hambip weh ma muut takut! Wungin ples nginan tin ta yang men men mara it wai li purut takut, u wungin tin ta yang e yang iran ewin men, men ku mara it wai li pem som kut tumen!
“Epo ara weh e ku ion wungin tin nuk ta mi yang tin Akono men kho? Wa ara weh e ku si kot yang?”
Wa ara weh e ku wa endara ta si ta yang muk kumali yang wai emhut sun tan?
Epo Got kha endara mosop sinsin pit epon men, u si nuk yanga wili yang, u li ponsol epo yang kut tumen, men yang tin ku it wa yang yan si ma yang yan pos in kokyok kokyok li kut men. Men irawin.

Tumen ma, ehurok, nga suh mi kinga wom epo min sukngin tin mosop e ta Got men, epo wom men ku mu nuk to mara Got to wom emkusin tin ku wom wai si ta Got ken i e talungin maran to tunusngin men ta, men ku talungin auluungin ta tin ku Got min saah pit pon men, men kumang tin ta wom e mara wom ira wungin tunus ma wom kum auluungin epon men.

Si wom kuk aku wom mang ta wungin tin ta pi mulus men tin ku klet po enu wom men asin, si wom men ku mang ta tulun hungin tin ta wom men tin ku phae wom ma wom si homan men, kumali wom ion mi wungin tin nuk ta mi Got men, men tunus u yang min saah pit pon, u men siik weh kut tumen, kuma wom iran.

Epo nga sakal to nanaangin tin wangin ko ta ngo men si ta po mosop tin kuk lunga wom men then then, epon men ku tuon ion i tuon ken i e nhum epo wungin tin tunus epon ku tuon ion i tuon epon men asin, si men ku tuon ion i tuon to mhin ekngin tin ples wungin tunus men ira ewi wo phepngin tin Got kaini ta po then then weh men.
Epo it emkusin tin tingit then then kuk mi emkusin then ta, si tingit then then ku ning kumang kai wal som men,
tumen kut kha it tin munuman men kuk mi emkusin then mi Krais, ma tingit then then men tita wal weh.

Kut ma it tin wa talungin enginin enginin ira nanaangin tin wangin ko ta it then then weh men, kha it men ku ning kumang epo talungin tin imen weh. Taku po ta wa talungin epon ku pok put wungin kaunngin, men ku pok put ira wo phepngin tin Got kaini ko tan weh men;
wa taku po ta wa talungin epon ku kum ta sun kara, men ku in e kum ta po epon siik weh; taku po ta wa talungin epon ku kot sun kara, men ku in e kot po epon siik weh;

taku po ta wa talungin epon ku wo nut sun kara, men ku wo nut po epon siik weh; taku po ta wa talungin epon ku naa sun kara, men ku naa po epon hambip engun; taku po ta wa talungin epon ku maran pit wo sun kara, men ku ning i tumen to min tin seh seh ta engin men; u taku po ta wa talungin epon ku min suk sun kara, men ku min suk po to min kehngin kut tumen.
Min epongin men ku to wungin amo asin. Wom men ku mut wungin tin lengwal men weh, si wom kasum wungin tin tunus men pip.
Wom men ku mi wom tunusngin pit po al to min epongin tin ta po tin irit won men weh, men ku wom ut ut mara al epo wom ku wa ya wom si epo al.
Wom ning lamang epo wom tin ku pus kumang ning nginan men asin, si to emiu wom tin min nawaehngin weh men, men ku wom kum ta yang tin Akono men engun;
mi wom keh keh to hoo mingin weh, wom pit nhing wet won maikngin weh, u wom wilayuk epo kinesngin sumsum weh kut tumen;
wom men ku kikyu po tin auluungin men epo endara tin po kalwok epon men, u wom tohuh epo wom ku ira wungin tin ku wom lang pit wo po tin nomisang men tunus men kokyok kokyok kut tumen.
Wom men ku kines Got epo yang ku wa emhong ko po po tin ning i lengwal epo wom men; ma wom kines tumen, si wom ku kines epo yang ku ngil ngil po asin.
Mi wom keh keh to po tin mi hi keh keh men, u wom tinis to po tin tinis men kut tumen.
Wom men ku kuk e mi wom then epo al, si wom wa wom si pit asin, si wom klap po tin wa ya hi ko nginangan men. Wom phaeng wo wom tuo wom ken wom e mhi wom ek men asin.
Wom ning i lengwal emhut sun ta po ta tin ning i lengwal epo wom men asin, si wom hihi wungin ta mi wom kho epo wom ku ning wungin tin tunus tunus to mara po masang to sun wala mosop men.
Taku tumen, men ku wungin tin nuk epo wom weh men, men ku wom ung aminis to po masang to sun wala mosop engun.

Apo, wom tin mi ngo epo wom weh men, wom kuk aku wom tuo wom ning wungin emhut sun asin, si wom mang ta Got tin ku wa pi tin ku yang mumhek mi po epon men. Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk taku, “’Wungin tin emhut sun men men nuk epo ngo, ngo tuo ngo kha ku ning i emhut sun men.’ Yang tin Akono men kha wo tumen.”
Tumen ma “taku po tin nolo ngon men ta hun elip, men ku e pa ken i; taku hun eki, men ku e wa eki si tan ma um; epo wungin tin imen kha ku e halung po yau tin ngilis men ko pon mhin epon men.”
Ngon men ku mang ta wungin tin lengwal men tin ku nomka hut ngon men asin, si e nomka hut wungin lengwal to wungin tunus.

Po mosop men ku wa enu hi sup wet wili po phuan tin wa emhong epon ku po mara hi pit wo sun men. Epo po phuan tin kuk to emhong men tin ku wa emhong hang Got som men ku ta in akomen, ma po phuan tin wa emhong e kuk kut men, Got kha hihi hi kuk tumen.
Tumen ma taku po ta si nolo po phuan tin kuk to emhong men, men nolo hihingin ta Got kha men, ma po tin nolo sun men kuli wa mumhek mingin ko po hi tuo hi.

Epo po phuan tin mara hi pit wo sun men ku ning lemngin wo sun tin ning wungin tunus men ewin akomen, si po tin ning wungin lengwal men kha po ning i tumen epo sun ewin men. Iyi, mip epo ngon ku lem to mara po phuan tin kuk to emhong men asin, wah? Taku tumen, men ku e ning wungin tin tunus men, men ku e wa sam samngin hang po tin imen tuo hi.

Epo phua ta tin in to emhong men, men tin kum ta Got mut eya ngon kuma e ung tunus men kha men. Si taku e ning wungin lengwal, men ku e lem ako, epo phua tin imen ku lat bainat engun akomen. Epo yang men tin kum ta Got men, tin ku ning mumhek mingin emhut sun tin po ta ning wungin lengwal kokyok men kha men.
Tumen ma wom men ku weh kuk wet wili po phuan, sinsin men epon ku mumhek mingin si po wom misan akomen, si epo mi wom tin ples wungin nginangan men maksin kut tumen.
Epo sinsin tin imen kha wom kul takis si ta po phuan tin mara hi pit wo wom men. Epo po men tin kum ta Got e po wilayuk kokyok kokyok epo kumang tin wala nuk tumen.

Tumen kha ku wom men ku kul naumngin si ta po mosop tin naumngin ta hi pit wo wom men weh: takis men ku wom kul i si ta po phuan tin naumngin ta hi pit wo wom men weh; naumngin ta po phuan tin wom kul i epo kumang wa endara wa tumen, men ku wom kul i si ta po phuan tin naumngin ta hi tin imen pit wo wom men siik weh; po tin sun wo epo wom ku lem pit wo hi men, men ku wom lem pit wo hi weh; u po tin sun wo epo wom ku wa ya hi si men, men ku wom wa ya hi si weh kut tumen.

Wom men ku mang ta naumngin ta wom ta iso pit wo po ta asin, si naumngin tin wom ku mi wom epo al men then kha ku iso in epo wom kokyok kokyok men, epon taku po ta min epo sun ta, men kai wungin sinsin kho kut kha men.

Epo wungin sinsin tin wo taku, “Ngon men ku sup si khi po ta asin”, “Ngon men ku wi po ta ko hun asin,” “Ngon men ku tip enda asin,” “Ngon men ku pok put wungin torokngin pit po po ta asin,” “Ngon men ku marap nes endara asin,” u taku wungin sinsin kara kyok nuk tumen, men mosop kuk wet sakalngin mhin tin ti, “Ngon men ku mip epo po tin wom ung them men ken sun tin mip epo ngon tuop men.”
Min epongin men ku ning i lengwal ta epo po tin ung then men ta ewin akomen. Tumen ma min epongin men kai sakalngin tin wungin sinsin sakal epon men.

Ma wom ning wungin tin imen weh, epo wom ion elup tin i, epo homani ma pi tin ku it phip si epo nhaungngin ta it men kho si kut. Epo homani men pi tin ku it palolongin weh kut epon men, men me tikayung epo sun tin muk ma wo it phep men.
Pi luk maran nomalak kho li, si pi mhangin me in tikayung kut. Tumen ma it men ku psik moolngin tin ta pi mi ku men li, si it phae po it epo moolngin tin epo lek walngin e ta pi tin mi mlaeng men.

It men ku muk muk ira wungin tin maanngin om epon men weh, ken it muk muk to pi mhangin men, si kakaomngin tin si ma po lulus to al amen engun min men to wungin tin po um hambip ma po mara hihi hi men, u elwanngin to wungin tin po mang ta mi hi ngelek wo wungin lengwal men, u heek walngin to wungin tin po mi hi heh wet sun men kut tumen, men ku it muk muk min kyok asin.
Si wom men ku phae po wom epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men, si wom hihi soput ta mi wom tin kho men ta nuk kuma wom ira wungin ta sangelekngin tan asin.
Po ta tin won wiak to wo phepngin tin tan men, men ku wom wai mu lup to wom, takuma wom men ku heek wal to po pit mi wungin tin nuk awhat lunga wom men asin.
Epo po ta won phep weh epon men tunus kuma ii endara tin maran kiring men mosop, si po enginin ta tin wo phepngin tan ku pit nhing som men men ku ii khaupngin misan.

Yang tin ii endara mosop ewin men men ku ion sun tin ku ii endara mosop ewin som men ken i e lengwal engun men asin, u yang tin ku ii endara mosop ewin som men, men ku ples wungin ta sun tin ii endara mosop ewin men asin kut tumen. Epo Got men wa po tin imen kho ako.

Ngon ara weh e ku ples wungin ta po ta tin kum wo sun enginin ta men? Phua tin ta yang weh men kha yang pit nhing wa yang plong ko epon men. Iis, yang men ku ningngin si pit nhing ako, epo Got men kakha epon ku ning i ma yang iso pit nhing.

Yang ta ion ungunan ta ken i e nhum epo sun kara men, si yang ta maksin men ion ungunan mosop ken i e kai wal engun men ako. Po mosop then then men ku wo phepngin ta hi maran ko klat klet mi hi then then weh.

Yang tin won nuk wet ungunan ta men, men tulun hu yang tin Akono men kha yang won nuk wet men; u yang ta maksin tin ku won nuk wet ungunan tin imen som men, men tulun hu yang tin Akono men kha yang ku won nuk wet som men maksin kut tumen. Yang ta tin ku suuh min som men, men tulun hu yang tin Akono men kha yang ku suuh min som men, epo yang sam sam Got epon; u yang ta maksin tin suuh min men, men tulun hu yang tin Akono men kha yang suuh min men, ma yang sam sam Got epon maksin kut tumen.
Epo po ta it ta ku tunus in ta tuon akomen, u po ta ku hun ta tuon akomen kut tumen.

Epon taku it tunus kuk, men it tunus kuk ta yang tin Akono men misan; u taku it huu, men it huu ta yang tin Akono men misan kut tumen. Tumen ma taku it tunus kuk wa taku it huu, men it men ta yang tin Akono men misan.
Epo sinsin tin imen kha Krais hun u yang khek si u yang tunus in kokyok kokyok epon men kut tumen, kumali yang si Akono ta po tin huu kho u tunus kuk tumen mosop.
Si tuni ma e ples wungin ta wirom? Wa tuni ma e ion wirom ken yang e lengwal engun men? Epo it mosop men kuli li nuk mara ehus tin ta Krais e ku yang ples wungin ta it won men.

Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk ti, “Yang tin Akono men sakal taku, ‘Nga tung tung si wo ngo tin weh in men epo po powut hi mosop kuli ko suul epo ngo, u po mamai hi mosop kuli pok put ya Got weh si in pi mlaeng kut tumen.’”
Kut ma it mosop then then kuli pok put wungin ta it then then sinsin si ta Got.
Tumen ma it men ku ples wungin ta al kyok asin, si it men ku mi it wai ti, epo it men ku wa endara ta ko nuk put soput ta ehuro it ta tin ku yang tut po khin wa yang plong ko epon men asin kut tumen.

Nga ion i u a-Yesus tin Akono men phae mi ngo ma wo phepngin klet mi ngo weh kut tumen, epo endara ta ku sinsin epon tuon tin pon lengwal men in akomen. Si taku po ta phaeng taku endara ta pon lengwal, to mara po tin imen kha endara tin imen pon lengwal men.

Si taku wirom min urut i, sinsin men pit mi endara aiingin tin tap men, men ku homani ma e muk muk mi min epongin kyok akomen. E mumhek mi po ta tin Krais hun mut eyan men epo endara aiingin tin tap men asin.
Tumen ma wungin tunus tin wom ning i men, men ku wom mang ta po ma po sakal epon ken i e lengwal men asin.
Epo enunu tin ta Got men ku siin kaek wo enda aiingin wa eki wa tumen akomen, si men siin kaek wo wungin siik, u min wyungin, u min kehngin tin in mi Emiun Auluungin men kut tumen misan.
Epo po ta tin kum ta Krais to wungin tin imen, men Got min saah pit pon u po tunus wangan pon kut tumen.
Tumen ma wungin tin ku ning i ma it ung aminis to wal epon men kha ku it tohuh epo it ku iran men, kuru wungin tin ku it khek wal si pit nhing epon men kut tumen.

Ngon men ku mhuk kumang tin ta Got men sinsin epo endara aiingin asin. Irawin, epo endara aiingin mosop men tunus to mara Got epon ku it iini ako. Si taku po ta ii endara ta tin ning i ma sun ta plong ko epon men, men ning lasin kha men.

Taku e ii endara ta wa e um wain wa e ning wungin enginin ta tin ning i ma wirom tut po khin wa plong ko mi lasin wa won molok to wo phepngin tan epon men, men tunus epo ngon ku ning i tumen kyok asin.

Iyi, ngon e wop phep? Men ku e in to wo phepngin tap ta tuop to mara Got. Emhong tin ta Got men men ku ko po po ta tin ku wa lasin ko pon tuon som epo wungin tin po tong i ma po ion min kho epon e tunus men.
Si taku po ta min ponwal ma ii endara, men tuon wo los pon tuon, epon men ku won phep ma ii endara akomen. Epo wungin tin tuni e ku wo phepngin pong sin som men, men lasin kha men.

Kut ma tunus epo it tin wo phepngin ta it pit nhing men ku wuh wungin tin po tin wo phepngin ta hi ku pit nhing som men sila hi khing epon men, si it men ku ning wungin tin mi it ku tunusngin epon men epo mi it engun asin.
It mosop then then men ku ning po tin it ung then men mi hi tunusngin, kuma po ung tunus ma po kuk li po khekngin si pit nhing weh.
Epo Krais kut men ku tuon ning i min tunusngin engun akomen. Awu. Wala sakalngin panngin nuk ti, “Wungin tin po mimi ngon epon men, men kyok me ko po ngo maksin.”

Epo wungin tin akani e panngin nuk kho men, men panngin epon ku it urut sakalngin epon, kumali Panngin Auluungin tin pa nhing it ma it pit nhing wet won maikngin li maran nomalak men, kha ku it kuk to hoo mingin epon men.
Homani men ku Got tin pa nhing it ma it pit nhing wet won maikngin li maran nomalak men ku wa khakhangin si ta wom tin ku wom kuk to mi wom then epo al pit mina wungin tin ta Krais Yesus men,
kumali to mi wom then u to wo wom then kut tumen, men ku wom wa Got tin Wirama a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men yan si.
Tumen ma wom men ku wa wom sup mu lup to al, ken Krais tin wa it sup me lup to yang men, kumali Got men ku yan weh si.

Kut si nga wo epo a-Yesus Krais men kho si in ken po tin kum ta sun tin mut mut wal men ta, epon ku mut eya wungin irawin tin ta Got men, kuma yang kaek si wungin tin Got wo kuk mara po tin yau a it sin men epon men,

kuru epon ku po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men ku wa Got yan si epo min sukngin tin ta yang men, wala panngin nuk ti, “Epo sinsin tin imen kha kuli nga pok put si tap lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, u nga lut li epo yap kut tumen.”
Kuru angan ta kyok men sakal taku, “Wom tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, wom men ku mi wom keh keh to po masang to sun wala tin ta yang men!”

Kuru angan ta kyok men wo ti, “Wom tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, wom mosop men ku sam sam yang tin Akono men! Wom masang to sun wala tin khuuk wal ta wom weh men, wom mosop men ku wa Got yan weh si.”

Kuru angan ta kyok men Aisaia wo taku, “A-Yesi himut ta ku iso plok si po kimut sun, men yang tin wala e ku si maran pit wo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men. Yang tin imen kha ku po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men hoo mi hi pit won men.”

Homani men ku Got tin sinsin epo hoo mingin men wa min kehngin u min wyungin kut tumen, ku ko kol mi wom tin wo wom phep men, kumali hoo mingin men ku pu wal mi wom epo wo phepngin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men weh.

Kut si, ehurok, tuo ngo men wo phepngin ta ngo men maran ko klat epo wom, epo wom tuo wom men wungin tunus kol mi wom, kuru maran ekngin mosop klet mi wom kut tumen, ma wom e wo wom nhing epo wom tin ku wo nut wal men maksin kut tumen ako.
Taku ma, ehurok, mi ngo puplet weh ma nga pan kisang to sakalngin put nunhum kara kho ti epo wom epon ku tak tulu wom, men sinsin epo nanaangin tin Got wai ko ta ngo men,

kumali ngo men ku in ken po tin kum ta a-Yesus Krais men ta li epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, ma nga ning kumang ta pok putngin tin tunus e ta Got men ken po tin kum auluungin nginangan men ta, kumali talungin tin nga talu Got epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, men ku Got min saah pit pon, epon tin Emiun Auluungin ning i ma si auluungin men.
Tumen ma nga in to wungin sinsin kara tin ku nga wangan po ngo mi Krais epo kumang tin nga ning i ta Got men.

Epo ngo ku mi ngo puplet epo ngo tin ku sakal epo wungin ta tin in mi sun e Krais ku ning i epo ngo som men akomen, si nga sakal epo wungin tin Krais ning i epo ngo weh men, kuma wungin tin nga sakal i u nga ning i kut tumen, kha ku po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men hul wet wungin epon men,

tin nga ning i to tosukngin u wungin teret wo nginan kut tumen tin nunhum kara e epo kakhangin tin ta Emiun tin ta Got men, tumen ma ko pit Yerusalem ma baul weh mili pol Ilirikum, men nga pyu po pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men pok put nginan mosop kho kut.
Tumen ma nga tohuh epo mi ngo weh epo ngo ku pok put pok putngin tin tunus men pi tin po ku hul Krais yan epon kho som men, epon akuli nga ning mang si ung po sun sinsin ta po enginin ta.
Si ngo taku ira sakalngin tin panngin nuk men ti, “Po tin ku sakalngin pok putngin li epo hi kho som men kuli ion i, u po tin ku hul sakalngin kho som men, kuli mara hi ples sakalngin kut tumen.”
Sinsin tin imen kha endara munuman klet epo ngo tin ku ti hang wom men.
Si homani men pi tin ku nga ning kumang epon men ku ta maksin ung mi sun tin iyi akomen, kuru ngo tin in e mi ngo hiim hiim wom to posan munuman kho li epo ngo ku ti hang wom men kut tumen,

kha minan tin akani e ngo ku muk muk ti ma nga li Spen men, men ku nga ti pol ta wom. Epo nga hoo mi ngo epo ngo ku ion wom ira soput tin nga ti epon men, ma nga wa kho wongin tin ku nga iso ira soput li epo pi tin imen hang wom, si taku nga in e mi ngo keh keh to wom muk kara wet.
Si homani ma nga ira soput ku li Yerusalem, kuma nga nhio wo po tin auluungin men.
Epon men min tunusngin ta po Masedonia to sun Akaia epo po tin ku wa talungin kara si ta po tin auluungin e kalwok Yerusalem men.

Po men mi hi tunusngin, kuru irawin epo naumngin ta po Yuda men pit wo sun tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen ako. Epon taku endara ta po Yuda tin emiunan men, men po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men pok min to sun, men ku naumngin ta po Yuda pit wo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men epo po ku nhio wo sun epo endara tin ta pi mulus men maksin kut tumen ako.
Tumen ma ngo ku suuk sii kumang tin iyi ma nga wa talungin tin iyi li anga tunusngin li epo po kut, khamali nga ira soput tin wom ung epon men ma nga li Spen.
Ma nga ion i epo minan tin kuli nga ti pol ta wom men, men ku nga ti to emhong tin ta pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men, tin ku klet mi ngo weh men.
Kut si ehurok, nga suh mi kinga wom epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men, u epo min epongin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men kut tumen, epo wom men ku tohuh to wal to ngo mi kinesngin li epo Got epo ngo,
epo ngo ku palolongin wet wili po tin kuk Yudia e ku wo hi phep som men, u epo kumang ta ngo tin ku nga ning i ta po tin ung Yerusalem men, men ku po tin auluungin men mi hi saah pit pon kut tumen,
kumali nga ti hang wom to min kehngin ira mi Got, ma nga ti nhing to wom kara.
Homani men ku Got tin sinsin epo min wyungin men weh in to wom mosop. Men irawin.
Mi ngo epo wom ku ning i tunus epo e-Pibi tin elut it men, tin kum ta palu walngin tin ung Senkria men,

kuma wom wa wut sup ti lup to wom mi yang tin Akono men to wungin tin tunus epo po tin auluungin men ku iran men, ma wom nhio wo wut epo endara tin tuni e ku wut hing wo wom epo wom ku nhio wo wut epon men. Iis, epo wut men tin si nhio wo po munuman kho u tuo ngo kut tumen.
Wom wa mi ngo si ta e-Prisila ngong Akwila, tin pyuk a kum to al mi Krais Yesus men,
tin kho ma ngong ning wo lalaingin mut eya ngo men. Wulong men nga sam sam ngong, si ku misa ngo som, si palu walngin mosop tin ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen.

Kuru wom wa mi ngo si ta palu walngin tin palu wal mi mang ta wulong men. Wom wa mi ngo si ta a-Epainetus tin mi ngo epon weh men, tin won phep pit wo Krais muk epo hi mosop tin hi ung wo mulusngin Akaia men.
Wom wa mi ngo si ta e-Maria tin wuh kumang hambip kho epon ku kho wo pim men.

Wom wa mi ngo si ta Andronikus ngong e-Yunia tin pim a khuuk wal then u po kan kan pyuk to al kho men kut tumen, tin ya ngong pos lunga po paengin men, tin ngong maksin si in mi Krais muk kho epo ngo men.
Wom wa mi ngo si ta Ampliatus tin mi ngo epon weh mi yang tin Akono men.
Wom wa mi ngo si ta a-Urbanus tin pim a kum then to al mi Krais men, u wom wa mi ngo si ta a-Stakis tin mi ngo epon weh men kut tumen.
Wom wa mi ngo si ta Apeles, tin yan to wungin tin yang pit nhing mi Krais men. Wom wa mi ngo si ta po tin hi Aristobulus hi khuuk wal men.
Wom wa mi ngo si ta a-Herodian tin pim a khuuk wal then men. Wom wa mi ngo si ta po tin hi a-Nasisus hi khuuk wal then e hi kuk mi yang tin Akono men.
Wom wa mi ngo si ta e-Traipina ngong e-Traiposa tin wuh epo kumang mi yang tin Akono men. Wom wa mi ngo si ta e-Pesis tin mi it epon weh men, tin wuh epo kumang hambip mi yang tin Akono men.
Wom wa mi ngo si ta a-Rupus tin Got won ung won mi yang tin Akono men, u a-Rupus tonin tin inuan men kut tumen.
Wom wa mi ngo si ta Asinkritus, a-Plegon, a-Hermas, a-Patrobas, a-Hermes, u po tin ehuro it e hi kuk to po men kut tumen.
Wom wa mi ngo si ta a-Pilologus ngong e-Yulia, u a-Nereus ngong elut, u a-Olimpas, u po tin auluungin mosop e hi kuk to po men kut tumen.
Wom wa mi wom si ta al epo tumum wongin tin auluungin men ta. Palu walngin tin ta Krais e ung e li li men wa mi hi si ta wom.

Kut si, ehurok, nga suh mi kinga wom weh epo wom men ku haum tunus epo po tin pho po heek walngin u wungin tin ku sun plong ko epon men kut tumen, tin hik put kotngin tin wom urut sakalngin epon kho men, ma wom men ku lu kuk hin epo po.

Epo po tin tumen men ku kum ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men akomen. Awu. Po men kum ta endara tin po mi hi sangelek pit pon men engun, ma sakalngin min kawiaingin kara u sakalngin tin po wo sut nuk nuk pon men kut tumen, kha po ek ek mi po tin kuk ailung nginan engun men epon men.

Epo wom tin hul wet wungin nginangan men, men po mosop hul epon yanga pi. Tumen ma mi ngo keh ken ngo e wa pi ta wom men. Takuma mi ngo epo wom men ku mhi wom ek mi wungin tin tunus men, si wom men ku kuk min ailung nginan engun epo wungin tin lengwal men.
Ma maran tikayung engun ma Got tin sinsin epo min wyungin men kuli mang ta a-Nolongin me, khi wom paplot i. Ma min sukngin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ku in to wom. Men irawin.
A-Timoti tin tita tuk epo kumang men, u a-Lusius, a-Yeson, u a-Sosopater tumen tin pim a khuuk wal men wa mi ngyuk ti epo wom.
Ngo a-Tertius tin pan kisang tin iyi men wa mi ngo ti epo wom mi yang tin Akono men.

A-Gaius tin nga in mi mang ta yang u palu walngin mosop palu wal mi mang tan men kut tumen, men wa min ti epo wom. A-Erastus tin maran pit wo ulu ta pi tin nhum iyi wa min ti epo wom, u a-Kwartus tin wiro it men kut tumen.
Nanaangin tin ta yang tin Akono ta it e a-Yesus Krais men ku weh in to wom mosop. Men irawin.

Homani men ku yang tin kakha epon ku wa wom ko pit nhing pit mina pok putngin tunus tin ta ngo men, u sakalngin pok put nginan tin epo a-Yesus Krais men kut tumen, ira sakalngin kaunngin tin lasngin si in pi mlaeng men, tin kho ma yang kasum i kek nuk ewo maran tin mulus pho pongin ma me men,

si li homani men lasngin si in pi mlaeng men, ma panngin auluungin tin ta po pokngin men kha sakalngin kaunngin tin imen pok putngin si ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men mosop epon men, ira wungin maran ko klat tin ta Got tin sindak in men, kumali po hul wet wungin tin ku po wo hi phep pit won weh men --
Got tin then e mhin ek men ku yan pos si ta yang epo a-Yesus Krais to elup tin ung e lap e li kut men. Men irawin.
Ngo a-Pol tin Got yuk ngo epo ngo ku si paengin ta a-Yesus Krais ira wungin tin nuk na mi Got men u a-Sostenes tin wiro it men tumen,

kha tuk a tirih kisang tin iyi ti epo palu walngin tin ta Got e ung epo pi Korin men, men wom tin si auluungin kut mi Krais Yesus e Got yuk wom epon ku si auluungin men, to po masang to sun wala mosop tin ung e li li yanga pi kut men tin kuk e yuk si wo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men yan men, men Akono ta po u Akono ta it kut tumen.
Nanaangin u min wyungin tumen tin me hang Got tin Wiwoli it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen men ku ti epo wom.
Nga in e sam sam Got tin ta ngo men epo wom sumsum, epo nanaangin tin ta Got e yang wai si ta wom mi Krais Yesus kho men,
tin wom wai ma wom si mimiran to endara mosop mi Krais men, men to sakalngin pok put nginan mosop u to maran ekngin mosop tumen,
wala sakalngin tin pim a pok put epo Krais men ko nuk nhing lunga wom epon men.
Kut ma wom men ku kalwok epon talungin ta som, si mi wom seh seh ta engin ma wom hoo mi wom epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men tin kuli iso me sungin yang si si in pi mlaeng men,
men yang tin ku pa nhing wom weh li pol mi elup tin ku li ponsol men, kumali wungin om po wom ungunan tin kuli a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men kyok me in pi mlaeng men.
Got men in to wungin tan anuh, men yang tin wala yuk wom mu sup mi min thenngin tin wom si klap wal ton mi Wirun a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men.

Kut si, ehurok, ngo men ku suh mi kinga wom weh epo ya a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, epo wom mosop men ku sakal then, si takonngin kara men ku ko nuk lunga wom asin, si wom men ku si lup to al tunus weh to mi wom then u to mi wom tin ples wungin then men kut tumen.
Epo, ehurok, po tin hi a-Kloe hi khuuk wal men pok ngo epo heek walngin men kara nuk lunga wom.

Sakalngin tin nga sakal i iyi men sinsin ti, epo po ta wom then then kara men kuk e wo taku, “Ngo men ta a-Pol,” si po kara maksin men wo taku, “Ngo men ta Apolos,” si po kara maksin men wo taku, “Ngo men ta a-Sipas,” si po kara maksin men wo taku, “Ngo men ta Krais,” ti.
Iyi! Krais e ku pok pok mingin ewin, wah? Wa a-Pol ani hun put sa wlong put wal mut eya wom men, wah? Wa a-Pol yan ani wom wa baptais epon men, wah?
Nga sam sam Got epo ngo men ku ning baptais epo wom kara kho akomen, si a-Krispas ngong a-Gaius misa ngong,
epon akuli po ta sakal epo ngo e ning baptais epo ya ngo tuon.
Ih, irawin, epo ngo men ning baptais epo po tin hi a-Stepanus hi khuuk wal men kho kut tumen ako. Si taku ngo men ku ning baptais epo po kara kyok kho, men nga pong epon.

Epo Krais ku tih ngo me epo ngo ku ning baptais akomen. Awu. Yang tih ngo me epo ngo ku pok put pok putngin tin tunus men weh, men ku nga ning i to sakalngin tin ta mhin ekngin men akomen. Awu. Epon akuli sa wlong put wal tin ta Krais men kuli siin iis akomen.
Epo sakalngin tin epo sa wlong put wal men men si in ulil to mara po tin kuk e huuspit men, si to mara it tin Got in e palolo it men men auwesngin tin ta Got men kha men.

Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk ti, “Ngo ku mhuk mhin ekngin tin ta po tin mhi hi ek men li, u wungin ples nginan ta po tin ples wungin nginangan men men ku nga wai li nuk worengin engun maksin kut tumen.”

Iyi, po tin mhi hi ek men ani a? Iyi, po tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men ani a? Iyi, po tin kuk e ning sakalngin sup wet wal mi elup tin imen kuk a? Epo Got ning i ma mhin ekngin tin ta pi mulus men men ko ulil kho kut ako, wah?

Epo mhin ekngin tin ta Got men kha po tin ung wo mulus men ku ion Got epo mhin ekngin tin ta hi weh men akomen, tumen kut khali Got min tunusngin epo wungin tin po wo epon e ulil men tin pok putngin men kha ku yang palolo po tin wo hi phep men epon men.
Epo po Yuda ning sangelekngin weh epo po ku ion tosukngin maran kiring ta, u po Grik men tohuh epo po ku wa mhin ekngin kut tumen.
Si pim men pok put Krais tin hun put sa wlong put wal men, men po Yuda tut po khi hi epon, u po Grik wo epon e ulil kut tumen,
si to mara po tin Got yuk hi men, men taku Yuda wa Grik wa tumen, Krais men auwesngin ta Got u mhin ekngin ta Got kut tumen.

Epo wungin tin ta Got e po wo epon e taku ulil men men nhum epo mhin ekngin tin ta po tunus men ako, u wungin tin ta Got e po wo epon e taku nhing som men men nhum epo kakhangin tin ta po tunus men kut tumen ako.

Epo, ehurok, wom ion wom tin kuk tuni ma Got yuk wom men, epo po ta wom kara men ku munuman kuk to mhin ekngin tin ta pi mulus men, u po munuman kara men ku apalukngin u po munuman kara men ku akokono tumen akomen.

Awu. Got men won ung wo endara tin ulil e ta pi mulus men epon ku wa manngin ko po po tin mhi hi ek men, u Got won ung wo endara tin ku nhing som e ta pi mulus men epon ku wa manngin ko po po tin apalukngin men,
u endara kara tin yan om men u endara kara tin amutngin men tumen kha Got won ung won men, u endara kara tin kis kis men tumen, epon kuli Got ning i ma endara tin kuk men ku ko amiron nginan engun,
kumali po ta men ku wangan pon tuon to mara Got kyok akomen.
Epo Got tuon kha ning i ma wom kuk mi Krais Yesus, tin si ta it ken mhin ekngin tin me hang Got men, kuru men si ken wungin tin siik u auluungin u wo it pias epon men tumen ta it kut tumen --
kuma wungin si ira sun tin panngin nuk men ti, “Po ta men ku wangan po endara ta akomen. Awu. Men ku wangan po Got tin Akono men misan.”
Kuru, ehurok, nga me in to wom kho, ma nga pok put sakalngin ta Got si ta wom, men ku nga me to sakalngin u to mhin ekngin tumen tin nutngin si ta wo men akomen. Awu.
Epo mi ngo wai kho epo ngo ku in lunga wom, men ku marango ek wungin ta maksin som, si a-Yesus Krais kuru yang tin hun put sa wlong put wal men tumen misan.
Ma nga in lunga wom, men wo ngo wiak, u nga lem, u nga kwat hambip kut tumen.

Ma sakalngin tin nga sakal i e nga pok put men men ku to wa wa mingin tin ta mhin ekngin tin ta po tunus men akomen. Awu. Men nga suk mara wom epo Emiun Auluungin u emhong tumen kha nga pok put sakalngin epon men,
kumali wo phepngin tin ta wom men ku si pit nhing wo mhin ekngin tin ta po tunus men akomen, si men ku weh si pit nhing wo emhong tin ta Got men misan.

Kut si pim a pok put mhin ekngin si in lunga po tin wo phepngin ta hi pon muru mi hi men ako, si men ku tin ta mhin ekngin tin ta elup tin iyi, wa tin ta po tin akokono ta elup tin iyi men akomen, epo po tin imen kuk epon ku huuspit engun.
Si pim men pok put mhin ekngin tin ta Got e in mi wungin kaunngin ta men, tin wala nuk kaunngin e elup tin nuk e lap me men ku kho si som, si Got hihi i kho epon ku it wa moolngin nhum epon men.

Mhin ekngin tin imen ku po tin akokono e mara hi pit wo mulus to elup tin iyi ku ta pon tan kho akomen; epon taku po pon tan kho, men ku po poo poo yang tin Akono e to moolngin men si kuk put sa wlong put wal akomen.
Takuma men ira sakalngin tin panngin nuk men taku, “Endara tin po tunus ku mara hi kon i, wa kinga hi hul i, wa tulu hi hu i som men, timen kha Got hihi i kho nuk epo po tin mi hi pit wo yang men.”

Si Got men las wungin tin kaunngin imen si in pi mlaeng epo it epo Emiun tin tan men kho kut. Epo Emiun tin imen ion mi wungin mosop, wai, men yang ion mi wungin tin kaunngin weh nuk mi Got tuon men kut tumen ako.

Epo ara weh men ku ion mi wungin tin nuk ta mi po enginin ta men? Awu. Emiun tin nuk mi po tin imen misan kha ku ion i men. Tumen kut kha po ta ku ion wungin tin nuk na mi Got men akomen, si Got Emiun misan.
Si it men wa Emiun kho kut, men ku emiun tin ta pi mulus men akomen, si men Emiun tin me hang Got men ako, epon kuma it ion endara tin Got naa it epon hut emul engun men.

Endara tin imen men pim a pok put wungin epon maksin kut tumen, si sakalngin put kara tin mhin ekngin tin ta po tunus men kot pim epon men ani ku pim a pok put sakalngin epon men akomen. Awu. Men tin Emiun Auluungin tuon kha kot pim epon men, men pim a ples po tin Emiun Auluungin nuk mi hi men epo sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin tuon pok put men.

Si po ta tin Emiun Auluungin kis min men ku wa endara tin ta Emiun tin ta Got men kara akomen, epon men ulil to maran; kuru men khung nginan epon ku pon tan kut tumen, epon men po tin Emiun Auluungin kasum mi hi men misa hi kha ku ion min men.
Si po ta tin Emiun Auluungin kasum min men tuon ples sakalngin mosop sinsin, si po tuo hi men ku po enginin ta ples wungin tan akomen.
Epo “ara weh e ku pon ta wungin tin nuk na mi Got tin Akono men kuma maksin kot yang epo wungin kara?” Si it men wungin tin nuk na mi Krais men kha nuk mi it men ako.

Ehurok, kho men ku nga sakal ta wom ken wom e Emiun Auluungin kasum mi wom men akomen. Awu. Nga sakal ta wom ken wom e mi wom tin kho men iso kasum mi wom men engun, men ken wom e ken po hoin tin iso tururun engun e kuk mi Krais men ako.
Nga wa esus pit wo wom engun, si ngo ku pa ken wom epo endara aiingin tin po koklong men akomen; epo wom men ku nhing weh epon ku wai kerek akomen, kut kha homani ma wom iso kuk tumen kut men;

epo wom men mi wom tin kho men iso kasum mi wom ako. Epo mi wom heh wet po kara, u wom heek wal u takonngin nuk lunga wom tumen kha mi wom tin kho men kasum wom ma wom kuk e muk muk ira wungin ken po tin api mulus engun men ako, wah?
Epo po ta wom ta men wo taku, “Ngo men ta a-Pol,” u po ta wom ta men wo taku, “Ngo men ta Apolos,” tumen kha mi wom tin kho men kasum wom men ako, wah?

Epo a-Pol men are, u Apolos men are tumen ma wom heek wal pit mi tuk? Epo tuk men tin kum engun e wo wom phep epo kumang tin tuk a ning i men ako, men ira kumang tin yang tin Akono men won ung won ta tuk then then weh men ako.
Epo ngo kha wha i men, li ma Apolos kha yuk eki ko wut men, si Got kha ning i ma plok si men.
Tumen ma yang tin wha i men u yang tin yuk eki ko wut men tumen ku ya ngong si som, si Got tin ning i ma endara plok men kha ku yan si men.
Kut ma yang tin wha i men u yang tin yuk eki ko wut men tumen men then ako, takuma wulong then then kuli wa talungin emhut kumang tin ta ngong men weh.
Epo Got kha pyuk a kum then to al men; si wom tin imen ken mipi ta Got men, u ken mang ta yang men kut tumen ako.

Ma nanaangin tin ta Got e yang naa ngo epon men kha nga hang enah tin mang ningngin si ung won men ken po ta tin maran ek mang ning nginan tunus weh men, si po enginin kara kuk e ning mang si ung won engun. Si po then then men ku tulu hi hu nuk po engin epo wungin tin tuni e ku po ning mang si ung wo enah tin imen weh.
Epo enah tin ku po ta hang mang si ung won men ku ta maksin in akandira akomen, si tin then e hangngin ung kut men misan, men a-Yesus Krais ako.
Si taku po ta wa gol wa silwa wa enah maran kiring kiring tin po ngel epon men wa sa wa enemsi wa wit musut tumen ma ning mang si ung wo enah tin imen epon,

men kuli kumang ta po then then men ku si in pi mlaeng; epo elup tin kuli wungin ples nginan si ton men kha kuli pok put endara si in pi mlaeng men. Epo yau kha kuli pok put si in pi mlaeng men. Ma yau tuon tin imen kha kuli karong kumang ta po masang to sun wala then then men, taku tunus wa lengwal wa men.
Ma taku kumang ta po ta tin po ning i si ung wo enah tin imen men ku yau khuk pon ma iso ung, men kuli wa talungin emhut kumang tan epon ako.
Si taku kumang ta po ta men yau uspon ii nginan, men kuli kalwok, si po tuo hi men kuli palolongin iso ako, takuma men ku palolongin ken po ta tin yau ii mang tan ma sa li yek ta yau ma li pol men.
Iyi, wom ku pon tan som epo wom kha mang auluungin tin ta Got men ma Got Emiun kha in mi wom men ako, wah?
Taku po ta ning mang auluungin ta Got ko amiron nginan engun, men ku Got mumhek min maksin kut tumen. Epo mang auluungin tin ta Got men men auluungin weh, ma mang auluungin tin imen men tuo wom ako.
Wom kuk aku po ta wom ta tuon torok maran asin. Taku po ta wom ta phaeng taku i e mhin ek epo mhin ekngin tin ta elup tin iyi, men ku ko in ken i e ulil men engun, kha kuli sulung ma si mhin ek weh.

Epo mhin ekngin tin ta pi mulus tin iyi men ulil engun to mara Got ako. Epo sakalngin ta men panngin nuk taku, “Got kha ning i ma po tin mhi hi ek men tuo hi kuh mi esih tin po taku kusamuh sun me kuh epon men,”
kuru panngin ta maksin men wo taku, “Got tin Akono men ion wungin tin po tin mhi hi ek men mara hi iran men ako, men kuli put mih engun.”
Tumen ma po ta wom ta men ku wangan po sun tunus ta engun asin. Epo endara mosop men ta wom,
taku a-Pol wa Apolos wa a-Sipas wa mulus wa tunusngin wa hunngin wa endara tin nuk to elup tin homani men wa endara tin ku iso me sulung men tumen, mosop men ta wom ako,
ma wom men ta Krais, si Krais men ta Got.
Kut si wom men ku ion pim ken pim e po tin kum ta Krais men u ken pim e po tin Got wa wungin kaunngin tin tan men si ta pim epon ku lang pit won men kut tumen.
Tumen ma wungin nuk po tin mara hi pit wo endara ta sun men epo po ku kum ta sun li, men ku po pon ta sun e kuk to wungin anuh weh.
Si to mara ngo men wungin tun ta engun tin taku wom wa po tunus kara ku ples wungin ta ngo. Iis, epo ngo ku tuo ngo ples wungin ta ngo ewin som.
Epo ngo ku tulu ngo hu wungin tin pit po ngo men ta akomen, takuma wungin tin imen ani ku wungin om po ngo epon men akomen. Awu. Yang tin Akono men misan kha ku ples wungin ta ngo men.

Tumen ma wom ples wungin kerek asin, si wom kaeng li pol to elup tin yang tin Akono men ku me men, epo yang kha ku wa wungin tin kaunngin nuk mi pi mi ku men si in pi mlaeng men, men ku yang las las wungin tin nuk e li li mi po tunus sinsin tin po ning wungin epon weh men si in pi mlaeng. Ma minan tin imen wungin tin ku po then then wa sam samngin epon men ku me hang Got weh.

Ehurok, wungin tin imen men nga wai los po tuk Apolos epon ku nhio wo wom, kuma wom urut wungin epo tuk tin ku wom kuk aku wom phaeng wo engin li wom yek ta wungin sinsin tin panngin nuk men, epon akuli po ta wom ta wangan po wi ta, si wi ta men ton mingin.
Epo ara weh ion mi wungin tap ma wa ngon si nhum epo po kara? Iyi, ela tin e in ton men ku e wai ta kho som? Si taku irawin epo e wai kho, taku tuni ma e wangan po ngon ken ngon e ku wai kho som men?

Epo wom men muut muut kho kut! Wom men mimiran kho kut! Wom men si ken po tin sinkhaung men kho kut, si pim men pi engun. Aluuh, taku wom e ku si ken po tin sinkhaung men irawin kut, khama pim a maksin si sinkhaung ma mara pim pit wo po masang to sun wala to wom!

Epo nga ion i maran ken Got wa pim tin paengin men si nuk pi mlaeng to mara po masang to sun wala ken po tin me sulung weh e po wo los hi epon ku hi huu engun men. Epo pim paengin men si kuk ken po mosop tin ung wo mulus men hang mara hi me ung wo pim men, men tihngin u po tunus tumen mosop.

Pim men kuk ken po tin wungin ta hi ulil engun men epon ku eya Krais yan, si wom men mhi wom ek wungin mi Krais kho; pim men luk engin engun, si wom men kho si apalukngin kut; wom men ya wom pos, si pim men ya pim om.
Epo kho nginan ma me pol homani kut imen pim a kuk e huu elip u pim a kuk e huu eki, u pim a kuk e phi phi moolngin tin kakhas men, u po kuk e lek pim pon ewung engun, u mang ta pim om tumen.
Ma pim a kuk e wuh kumang, men tuo pim ning i epo wili pim weh. Po kuk e ton mi pim, takuma pim a kuk e kines Got epo yang ku wa emhong ko po po; po kuk e mumhek mi pim, takuma pim a wuh i engun,

u po kuk e kikiong pim, takuma pim a iso sakal amlus ta po tumen. Pim a kuk alok mi nginan weh ken siwulngin tin ta pi mulus men, u ken endara amutngin tin po masang to sun wala mosop whis i tek nuk e li li engun men tumen, men pim a kuk tumen kha me pol homani kut i.
Ngo ku pan wungin tin imen epon ku ning i ma manngin wa wom akomen. Awu. Nga pan i epon ku nga tus wom ken wom e husanik tin mi ngo epo wom weh men.

Epon taku po tin paruk wom e wom kuk then mi Krais men ku tausen tausen kuk, takuma po irama wom ku munuman akomen. Epo ngo tin it kuk then mi Krais men kha nga si wirama wom epo pok putngin tin tunus men ako.
Tumen ma nga sil mi kinga wom weh epo wom men ku kuk pit mina wungin ta ngo.

Epo wungin sinsin tin imen khali nga tirih a-Timoti ti epo wom men, men yang tin mi ngo epon weh e wirukan to wungin anuh e tuk a in then mi yang tin Akono men kha imen, ma yang kha ku tak tulu wom epo wungin ta ngo tin nga in mi Krais ma nga ning i men, men wungin tin wala e nga mili mili yanga pi ma nga kot po epon mi palu walngin mosop tin ung e li li men.
Si po ta wom kara men kuk e ning i ma wungin si pawha kho ken ngo e ku iso ti pol ta wom men akomen.

Takuma ngo ku iso ti pol ta wom kerek engun ako, men taku yang tin Akono men min epon, ma wungin tin ngo ku ion i minan tin imen, men ku wungin tin ku po kuk e ning i ma si pawha kho men akomen, si kakhangin ta po tin tuni men kha ku nga ion i men.
Epo sakalngin engun ani ku enunu tin ta Got men siin kaek won men som. Awu. Men siin kaek wo emhong weh.
Mi wom epo ele? Iyi, mi wom epo ngo ku ti pol ta wom to kwatngin ta, wa ngo ku ti to min epongin u to wungin amunu wa tua?

Auh, po pok wal mili yanga pi epo elwanngin si lunga wom, men wungin lengwal weh tin ku po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men ku sikian si in lunga hi ewin som men, men ti, yang ta men wa wut tin ung ta wiraman men!
Ma wom men wangan po wom weh, si wom ku mi wom urut i kuma yang tin ning wungin tin imen klokngin lunga wom lu akomen.
Iis, epo ngo emkusin men in hin epo wom ako, si ngo emiun men nga in lunga wom, ma nga ples wungin ta yang tin ning wungin tin imen kho ken ngo e in lunga wom weh men.
Minan tin wom mu palu wal epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men yan to emiu ngo to emhong tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men,
men ku wom wa yang tin wungin tan tumen si yanga wili a-Nolongin kuma yang emkusin mhukngin, si kumali yang emiun palolongin kyok ungunan tin ta a-Yesus tin Akono men.
Wangan pongin tin ta wom men men ku tunus som. Iyi, wom e pong epo yiis sakun kara tin ku ning i ma beret mosop iit men, wah?

Tumen ma wom men ku tauluk yiis tin akho men mosop lu, kumali wom si ken beret tin po paphae homan ta e yiis om min men. Iis, epo wom men kuk ken beret tin tumen kut ako. Epo irawin epo Krais tin in ken Sipsip Asus ta tin po talu Got epon to pi Paska ewin men, men si talungin tin mut eya it men kho kut ako.

Tumen ma it men ku ira kakaomngin tin imen weh, takuma it ku ning i to yiis tin akho e los po wungin lengwal tin po mi hi lel sun epon u po ngelek wo wungin lengwal ton men tumen asin, si it men ku kakaom epo beret tin yiis om min e los po wungin tin mi yil u irawin men tumen misan.
Epo nga pan kisang ti epo wom kho epo wom ku sup me lup to po tin ning elwanngin men asin.

Si ngo ku sakal los po po tin ta pi mulus e ning elwanngin ewin men, wa po tin mara hi nes endara ta sun nginangan men, wa po tin torok mara sun ma nak nak endara ta sun men, wa po tin uluu got tin tororokngin men tumen ani ku nga sakal tumen som. Epon taku wom ku mang ta po tin imen, kut men ku wom mang ta pi mulus tin iyi lu yek.

Si homani ma nga pan kisang ti epo wom epon taku po ta tin wom kuh i e worokan men ta ning elwanngin nginangan, wa maran nes endara nginangan, wa won nuk wet got torokngin nginangan, wa ton mi po nginangan, wa um wain nginangan, wa tip tip nginangan wa tumen, men ku wom lup ton asin, kuru wom ii endara to po ta tin wungin tan tumen asin kut tumen.
Epo ngo tin ku ples wungin ta po tin kuk tak li wetpo palu walngin men maksin men ku kumang ta ngo som, wah? Si wom men ku ples wungin ta po tin kuk mi palu walngin men ako, wah?
Si po tin kuk tak li wetpo palu walngin men Got kha ku ples wungin ta po men. Si “wom men ku luul to yang tin wungin tan lengwal men lunga wom lu.”

Iyi, po ta wom ta ku in to wungin epo sun enginin kara ma teng teng mut powi sun kara tin auluungin e ta Got men, si li phuk mi wungin ples nginan si ta po tin wungin ta hi ku siik som men engun, wah?

Iyi, wom iso pong epo engin epo po tin auluungin men kuli ples wungin ta po masang to sun wala mosop tin ung wo mulus men, wah? Ma taku wom ku ples wungin ta po masang to sun wala mosop tin ung wo mulus men, men wom e tunus epon ku wom ples wungin tin tururun e si lunga wom men engun ako, wah?
Iyi, wom iso pong epo engin epo it tin kuli ples wungin ta po tihngin maksin men, wah? Ma taku tumen, men ku it ples wungin tin ta pi mulus tin imen maksin weh kut ako, wah?
Tumen ma taku wungin kara si in lunga wom pit mi wungin tin ta pi mulus men kara, men ku wo wom ung wo po tin ya hi om mi palu walngin men epon ku ples wungin tin imen engun?
Nga sakal i tin imen epon ku nga wa manngin ko po wom. Iyi, irawin epo po ta wom ta tin mhin ek epon ku ples wungin tin si lunga po tin ehuro hi men ku then ta in lunga wom som, wah?
Si po ehoro wom ta wa sun ehuro hi ta li epo ples walngin, kuru po ning i timen to mara po tin ku wo hi phep som men epo ele?

Iis, tin wom wa po tin ta wom men li epo ples walngin men men wom huuspit kho kut ako. Si tuni ma wom ku mang ta po tin ku ning i lengwal epo wom engun? Si tuni ma wom ku mang ta po tin ku nak nak endara ta wom engun?
Takuma awu. Wom tuo wom wile ning i lengwal epo po u wom nak nak endara ta po tumen engun, ma po ehuro wom kha wom ning wungin tin tumen epo hi men.

Wa wom iso pong epo engin epo po tin wungin ta hi ku siik som men tin ku wa pakuh po ngin ta hi mi enunu tin ta Got men som men, wah? Wom kuk aku wom ek ek mara wom tuo wom. Epo po tin ning elwanngin men, u po tin wo hi nuk wet got tin torokngin men, u po tin ning wungin sup si khi sun men, u po masang tin ning wungin to manngin maran kiring kiring epo sun masang men,

u po tin tip tip nginangan men, u po tin mara hi nes endara ta sun men, u po tin um ma mara hihi hi nginangan men, u po tin ton mi mi sun nginangan men, u po tin kusamuh sun ma nak nak endara ta sun men tumen, kuli wa pakuh pongin ta hi ta mi enunu tin ta Got men akomen.

Ma kho nginan men wom kara kha wungin ta wom nuk tumen. Takuma wom men khis pongin ma si auluungin kho kut ma Got wo epo wom e kuk siik epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men yan, u epo Got tin ta it men Emiun tumen kho kut tumen.

Epo irawin epo wungin mosop men tunus epo ngo ku ning i ako, takuma wungin mosop men ku nhio wo ngo weh akomen. Wai, wungin mosop men tunus epo ngo ku ning i ako, takuma ngo ku mang ta ngo sup wet kakhangin ta wungin ta akomen.

Irawin, epo endara aiingin men ta kuma it, u kuma it men ta endara aiingin kut tumen ako, takuma Got kuli iso mhuk min likiong. Kut si it emkusin men epon ku it ning elwanngin epon akomen. Awu. Men ta yang tin Akono men, u yang tin Akono men men ta it emkusin kut tumen ako.
Epo Got khek yang tin Akono men kyok si tunus kho kut, ma Got ku iso khek it maksin si tunus epo kakhangin tin tan men kut tumen ako.
Iyi, wom e pong epo engin epo wom emkusin tin Krais emkusin tingit then then men, wah? Tumen ma tunus epo ngo ku wa Krais emkusin ta ma lup i to wut wala elwan ta, wah? Awu, men pi om ako!

Wa iyi, wom e pong epo engin epo po ta tin lup i to wut wala elwan ta men si ngong emkusi ngong then kha men, wah? Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk taku, “Wulong tin ponwal imen ku si ngong emkusi ngong then,” ti.
Si taku po ta si lup to yang tin Akono men, men si emiu ngong then to al kha men.

Tuon, wom men ku mhup lu kuk hin epo elwanngin weh! Epo wungin lengwal tin kara maksin e po masang to sun wala lasin epon men men si tak me in po po emkusin. Si po ta tin ning lasin epo elwanngin men men ning i ko po emkusin tuon.
Iyi, wom e pong epo wom emkusin tin mang auluungin ta Emiun Auluungin tin in mi wom e wom wai hang Got men, wah? Tumen ma wom men ku ta wom tuon kyok akomen.
Epo wom men kulngin epo kulngin nhum ta kho kut, tumen ma wom men ku ning wungin tin ku Got yan si epon men epo wom emkusin, kuru epo emiu wom kut tumen, epon likiong men ta Got ako.
Kut si wungin tin wom pan kisang mu epo ngo epon kho men, epon taku po masang ta ku kah wut wala ta som, men tunus ako.
Takuma elwanngin si si, tumen ma tunus epo po masang then then ku kuk to titien hi weh, u po wala then then ku kuk to titien hi weh kut tumen.
Ma yang tin masang men ku pyu po wungin tin pit po yang e titien min epo men, kuru wut tin wala men ku ning i tumen epo titien tin masang men maksin kut tumen.

Epo wut tin wala men ani ku maran pit won emkusin men som. Awu. Men titien kha maran pit won men, kuru yang tin masang men ani ku maran pit won emkusin men som, si titien kha maran pit won men kut tumen.

Si mom in aku wi ta min ko won epo sun ta asin, si tin e taku then taku mi mom then epo mom ku mang ta mom sup wet wungin tin ku mom suh mi mom men u epo kinesngin tumen elup maran hut sok ta misan. Li klet anima mom lup to wal kyok, epon akuli a-Nolongin karong mom epon tin mom ku karut mom tunus som men.
Epo wungin tin imen mi ngo suk wom kha nga wo tumen, si ngo ku wo maran ko klat epon akomen.
Epo mi ngo epon taku po masang to sun wala mosop ku kuk kai ngo men ako. Takuma po then then wa talungin ta hi weh hang Got, ma po ta wai tan enginin ta, u po ta wai enginin ta tumen.
Si nga wo ta po tin kuk po moran men, u po tin wamuh men tumen taku, men tunus epo po ku iso kuk ken ngo men weh.
Si taku po ku mara hi pit wo hi tunus weh som, men ku po enangin engun. Epo po tin mi hi sil sil men, men tunus epo hi ku enangin.
Kut si po tin enangin kut men, men nga wo maran ko klat epo po, si ngo ani ku wo tumen som, si yang tin Akono men kha wo maran ko klat epo po men, epo wut tin wala men ku saa silang titien asin.
Si taku wut saa silang yang kut, men ku wut li in wamuh engun, wa wut kyok me ngong titien mi ngong then kyok tumen. Kuru po masang ta men ku tere titien li asin kut tumen.

Si nga in to sakalngin epo wom tin kara men, men ku sakalngin ta yang tin Akono men som, epon taku po tin ehuro it men ta titien ku won phep som ma wut min tunusngin epon ku ngong in, men ku yang tere wut li asin.
Si taku wut wala ta titien ku won phep som ma yang min tunusngin epon ku ngong in, kut men ku wut tere yang li asin kut tumen.

Epo po masang ta tin ku won phep som men men si auluungin epo titien tin won phep men, u po wala ta tin ku won phep som men, men si auluungin epo titien tin won phep men kut tumen. Epon taku pi engun, kut men husani wom men ku kuk lengwal to mara Got, takuma homani ma po men kuk auluungin kut ako.

Si taku po ta tin ku won phep som men, taku wala wa masang tumen, ta saa silang titien, men ku titien mang tan ma li engun. Epon taku wungin tin imen si, men ku po tin ehuro it wa po tin ehulut it wa tumen ta men ku wungin ta kan kan i kyok akomen. Epo Got yuk it epo it ku ung aminis to al engun.
Epo ngon tin wala men, yanda ngon e ku palolo titiem, men timen e pong epon. Wa ngon tin masang men, yanda ngon e ku palolo titiem, men timen e pong epon kut tumen.

Kut si it then then men ku kuk tunia weh ken sun tin it kuk ma Got hihi wungin epo it then then ma yang yuk it men, ma it kuk e ira wungin timen li kut. Ma men wungin tin nga hihi i nuk mi palu walngin mosop tin ung e li li men kha nuk tumen.

Iyi, po ta mutngin kho kut minan tin Got yuk i men? Taku tumen, men ku in tumen kut, si ku kyok ko in to sun elit asin. Wa taku po ta ku mutngin kho som minan tin Got yuk i men, men ku in tumen kut, si ku mutngin kyok asin kut tumen.

Epo wungin tin po mut wal ewin men men won engun, u wungin tin ku po mut wal ewin som men men won engun kut tumen, si tin ku po ira wungin sinsin tin mosop e Got wo maran ko klat epon men kha nhum men.
Epo wom then then ku ung tuni minan tin Got yuk wom men, men ku wom iso kuk tumen li kut.
Iyi, ngon e in e kum wet wili po engun minan tin Got yuk ngon men? Men ku silap khing asin. Si taku soput tap nuk tin ku wop pias epon men, aku, men tunus epon ku e iran engun.

Epo po ta tin in e kum engun wet wili sun ta minan tin yang tin Akono men yuk i men men tin won pias ta yang tin Akono men ta ako. Tumen kut kha po ta tin won pias minan tin yang tin Akono men yuk i men kha tin kum ta Krais men ta kha men.
Epo wom men kulngin epo kulngin nhum ta kho kut, tumen ma wom men ku kum engun wet wili po tunus ta asin.
Ehurok, wom then then ku kuk tuni minan tin Got yuk wom men men ku wom klap Got weh ma wom iso kuk tumen li kut.

Kut sini po wala tin wawahin men men ku nga in to wungin maran ko klat ta yang tin Akono men ta epo hi akomen; takuma ngo tin yang tin Akono men min suk ngo kha ku wo wom nuk wet ngo men kha nga pok put wungin tin nga phaeng taku i e siik men.
Epo nga phaeng taku miun tuungngin tin si homani men kha ku tunus epo po then then ku kuk ken sun tin po kuk tumen kut men.

Iyi, ngon e kan kanngin to wut wala ta kho kut, kut men ku e langun epo soput ta tin ku e plosngin epon men asin. Wa ngon e ku kan kanngin to wut wala ta kho som, kut men ku e langun epo po wala ta tin ku ung tap men asin kut tumen.

Si taku ngon ku enangin, men ku e lasin som. U taku po wala wahin ta ku enangin, men ku lasin som kut tumen. Takuma po tin enangin men kuli pon ta won maikngin munuman wo mulus tin iyi, ma wo ngo ii epon akuli wungin tin imen si ta wom.
Takuma, ehurok, nga wo ti, epo elup ung e me maran hut sok kut, tumen ma elup tin misikin e iso ung e li men men ku po tin kuk to titien hi men ku kuk ken po tin titien hi om men,

u po tin kuk e tirinis men ku kuk ken po e ku tirinis som men, u po tin kuk e mi hi keh keh men ku kuk ken po e ku mi hi keh keh som men, u po tin kuk e kul kul endara men ku kuk ken po e ku kuk to endara tin imen som men,
u po tin kuk e hing wo endara tin ta pi mulus men ku kuk ken po e ku hing won weh som men kut tumen. Epo mulus tin wungin tan nuk to mara it homani men ung e maran woh woh epon ku li om.

Wo ngo ii epo wom ku sila wom khing epo wungin ta pi mulus ta akomen. Epo po tin ku enangin som men kuk e sila hi khing pit po wungin ta yang tin Akono men, tin ku po ning i tuni kuma yang tin Akono men min saah pit po po epon men.
Si po tin enangin men kuk e sila hi khing epo wungin ta pi mulus, tin ku po ning i tuni kuma titien hi mi hi saah pit po po epon men.

Po wala ta tin enangin men men in maran kiring epo sun tin ku enangin som men. Po wala ta tin ku enangin som men in e silan khing pit po wungin tin ta yang tin Akono men epon ku in auluungin to emkusin u emiun tumen likiong. Si po wala ta tin enangin men in e silan khing epo wungin tin ta pi mulus men, tin ku ning i tuni kuma titien min saah pit pon epon men.

Ma nga sakal wungin tin imen epon ku kho wo wom ako, si ku epon ku klet eya wom akomen. Awu. Men epon ku wom ira wungin tin siik men ma wom kum ta yang tin Akono men, si ku wungin ta maksin nak nak mi wom akomen.

Si taku po masang ta phaeng taku i e ning wungin ma manngin wa wut tin wala e po wo hi ung won epon ku ung ta yang men, u taku wut si awiung kho kut, u taku wungin nuk epo wulong kho tumen, men ku yang ning i ta min engun, men ku lasin som, nan men ku po mang, si wulong enangin wal engun.

Si taku po masang ta min pit nhing weh ma ku wungin ta kan kan i som, si kasum min tin tan weh men tunus, ma ples wungin tin imen ta min kho epon ku iso mang ta wut tin wahin imen ku iso in tumen engun wet, timen men ning i tunus ako.
Tumen ma po ta ku wa erun tin wahin men si enangin, men ning i tunus ako, si po ta ku wa erun ku si enangin som, men po ning i tunus weh.

Kut si po wala ta tin enangin kut men taku titien iso tunus in, men wungin kan kan i epon ku iso ung ta titien, si taku titien hun, men won pias epon ku enangin epo min ako, si men ku enangin mi yang tin Akono men misan weh.
Takuma wungin tin marango ples i men, men taku wut ku in tumen kut, men ku wut min keh weh -- ma nga wo taku ngo e in to Got Emiun kut kha nga wo tumen.

Kut sini li ken nginan tin po talu got tororokngin enun epon men, men it ion i epo it mosop men mara it ek wungin epon ako. Takuma maran ekngin ning i ma mi it wai si pit, si min epongin ning i ma it kek si pit nhing.
Taku po ta phaeng taku i e maran ek epo wungin ta, takuma ku maran ek wungin kai maran ekngin tin tunus epon ku po mara hi ek wungin epon men akomen.
Si taku po ta min pit wo Got, men po tin imen kha Got hop i weh men.

Tumen ma li ken nginan tin po talu got tororokngin enun epon men, men it ion i ako epo endara ken sun tin imen ku ta in wo mulus weh akomen, u Got ta maksin ku in som, si Got tin then e in tumen misan.
Aku, taku endara tin po wo epon e gotan men kara kuk, taku ku kuk wet pi wa mulus wa tumen, epo endara tin po wo epon e gotan men u endara tin po sikian ya hi akokono men tumen munuman kara kuk ako,

si it men Got ta it then ta misan, men Wirama it tin sinsin epo endara mosop e wungin sinsin tin it kuk epon men li ponsol epon men; u yang tin Akono men then ta in, men a-Yesus Krais tin endara mosop si nuk epon u it si kuk tunus yanga wilin men kut tumen.

Takuma maran ekngin tin imen ku nuk mi po masang to sun wala mosop akomen. Epo po kara tulun hungin ta hi iso ut pi nuk mi hi to got torokngin kha me pol homani kut i, men ii li ken nginan tin imen ken i e talungin ta got tin torokngin men irawin weh men, ma tulun hungin ta po put mih ma ko lengwal ken po e ning wungin lengwal ta men.

Takuma endara aiingin ani ku ning i ma it ung tunus to mara Got men som. Epon taku it ku ii endara, men ku homani ma it ung tunus weh to mara Got ken sun tin kho men som, wa taku it ku ii endara som, men ku homani ma it ko ung lengwal weh to mara Got ken sun tin kho men som kut tumen.
Takuma wom men ku haum tunus, epon akuli won piasngin tin ta wom imen ning i tun tira ma po tin wo phepngin ta hi wiak wiak men tut po khi hi ma po plong ko mi lasin.

Epon taku po ta tin wo phepngin tan wiak wiak men ion ngon tin in to maran ekngin men tin in e ii endara mi mang auluungin ta got torokngin ta men, men ku timen ning i ma po wo hi ek epo po ku ii li ken nginan tin po talu got torokngin epon men ako, wah?
Ma maran ekngin tin tap imen kha wirom tin wiak wiak e Krais hun mut eyan men huuspit epon men ako.
Ma taku wom ning lasin tin tumen epo po ehuro wom, ma wom sisnieh mi po tin ples wungin nginangan men tin ku nuk nhing som men, men wom ning lasin epo Krais kha men.

Tumen ma taku li ken nginan ani ning i ma worok tut po khin ma yang plong ko mi lasin men, men ku ngo ku ii li ken nginan tin imen kyok angan akomen, epon akuli nga ning i ma worok tut po khin ma yang plong ko mi lasin kyok.
Iyi, ngo e ku paengin som? Ngo e ku wo ngo pias som? Ngo e ku ion a-Yesus tin Akono ta it men kho som? Wom e ku kumang ta ngo tin nga ning i mi yang tin Akono men som, wah?
Epon taku po kara wo epo ngo e ku paengin ta hi som, takuma ngo men paengin ta wom weh ako. Epo wom kha tosukngin tin kakaek kumang tin nga kum ta po paengin mi yang tin Akono men ako.
Sakalngin tin nga sakal i mut eya ngo si ta po tin taku ion mi wungin tin ta ngo men men nuk ti:
Iyi, Got wa emhong ko po pim paengin epo pim ku ii endara u um tumen emhut kumang tin pim a ning i men wa pi engun?
Iyi, Got wa emhong ko po pim paengin epo pim ku espo titie pim tin wo hi phep men me to pim ken po paengin tin kara men, u yang tin Akono men ehuron, u a-Sipas tumen wa pi engun?
Wa tuk a-Barnabas misa tuk in engun epo emhong tin ku tuk a kum som men, wa pi engun?

Epo ara li epo lek walngin ma tuon ku kul enda aiingin tan? Wa ara wha mipi wain ta ma tuon ku iini enun som? Wa ara maran pit wo sipsip wa ilio angan ta ma tuon ku um esus ta sipsip tin imen kara som, tumen?
Iyi, nga ira wungin ta po tunus engun ani nga sakal tumen, wah? Wa wungin sinsin sakal tumen maksin ako, wah?
Epo sakalngin men panngin ta nuk mi Wungin Sinsin tin ta a Moses men taku, “Wom men ku paim wo bulmakau minan tin li paplot wit men asin.” Iyi, bulmakau ani Got silan khing epon weh men,

wa yang taku nhio wo it misan ani yang sakal tumen, wah? Wai, epon ku nhio wo it ako, kuma po tin kil kil mulus epon ku wha wit ihun men ku wha i to hoo mingin, u po tin paplot wit men ku ning i to hoo mingin tin ku po iso wa wit enun ta hi kara men kut tumen.
Epon taku pim a tep tep endara ihun tin emiunan men lunga wom, iyi, taku pim a lok lok endara aiingin tin ta pi mulus e ta wom men si emhut sun, men ku tin imen ku pim a dus wom epon hambip, wah?

Taku po enginin kara pok mi emhong to po kara tin tunus epo po ku wa endara kara hang wom men, si pim, epo pim men pok min weh kut ako, wah? Takuma emhong tin imen men ku pim a ning wungin ta epon som, si pim a wuh wungin mosop engun, epon akuli pim a ning i ma wungin ta pim ta ten ten epo pok putngin tunus tin ta Krais men.

Iyi, wom e pong epo engin epo po tin ning kumang mi mang auluungin men wa endara aiingin ta hi mi endara tin ta mang auluungin men, u po tin kum wo suyung men wa li ken nginan tin talu nginan wo suyung men ta hi kara kut tumen, wah?

Tumen kut kha yang tin Akono men wo maran ko klat ti, epo po tin pok put pok putngin tin tunus men ku wa endara tin ku elit hi tunus kuk epon men sup wet kumang tin po pok put pok putngin tin tunus men ako.

Takuma wungin tin nuk wom epo wom ku nhio wo ngo men men ku nga heek epo wom ku nhio wo ngo epo endara ta wa nga pan wungin ta tumen epon akomen; epon men tunus epo ngo ku hun wet, epon akuli po ta ning i ma wungin tin nga wangan po ngo ton iyi ko hut liit nuk engun.

Epon taku nga pok put pok putngin tin tunus men, men wungin tin ku nga wangan po ngo ton men men ku pi angun ako, epo Got wa kumang timen ko nuk ngo epo ngo ku ning i weh. Auh, won maikngin nhum takut ku los ngo, tin taku ngo ku pok put pok putngin tin tunus men som men!

Epon taku mi ngo nawaehngin ma nga ning kumang tin imen, men ku nga wa talungin epon ako; si taku ngo ku mi ngo nawaehngin som, men ku kumang tin Got wai si ta ngo epo ngo ku marango pit won men iso nuk yanga wili ngo ako.

Tumen ma talungin tin ku emhut kumang tin ta ngo men ani tua? Men ti, minan tin nga pok put pok putngin tin tunus men, men ku nga talu po epon hut emul engun, kumali emhong tin nga in ton mi pok putngin tin tunus men, men ku nga heek eyan weh akomen.
Epo ngo men wo ngo pias epo po masang to sun wala mosop ako, takuma nga wa ngo me sup wet wili po mosop ken po tin kum wo sun engun men ta, kumali nga espo po munuman si po sun me sup wet wili Krais;

ma to mara po Yuda men nga ko in ken po Yuda men ta, kumali nga espo po Yuda kara; to mara po tin kuk wet wungin sinsin men, men nga ko in ken po tin kuk wet wungin sinsin men ta, kumali nga espo po tin kuk wet wungin sinsin men kara;

to mara po tin kuk wetpo wungin sinsin men, men nga ko in ken po tin kuk wetpo wungin sinsin men ta, aku, ngo ku in wetpo wungin sinsin to mara Got som, si nga in wet wungin sinsin to mara Krais weh, takuma nga ko in wetpo wungin sinsin kumali nga espo po tin kuk wetpo wungin sinsin men kara;

si to mara po tin wo hi wiak men, men nga ko in ken po tin wo hi wiak men, kumali nga espo po tin wo hi wiak men kara kut tumen. Ngo men si in to wungin mosop to mara po masang to sun wala mosop, kumali nga ira soput mosop tin ku nga palolo po kara epon men.
Nga ning wungin tin imen sinsin men epo pok putngin tin tunus men, kumali nga pok mi moolngin tin ta pok putngin tin tunus men to wom.

Iyi, wom e pong epo engin epo po tin urut mara al epo saangin men mosop men whal ako, takuma po then ta kha kuli wa talungin men, wah? Tumen ma wom men ku whal ira wungin tin ti, epon ku wom wa talungin epon.

Ma po then then mosop tin urut mara al epon ku wa talungin men men karut hi tuo hi mi wungin mosop ako. Ma po men ning i tumen epon ku po wa talungin tin ku whuk kerek engun men ko ung mhi hi, si it men ning i epon ku it wa talungin tin ku whuk ewin som men ko ung mhi it ako.
Tumen ma nga saa, men ku nga saa asong pongin engun akomen. Ngo ku pim a lek wal, men ku nga peh wili ngo ken po tin peh wili hi amen engun men som kut tumen.
Awu. Tuo ngo wi ngo emkusin kuma nga wai me sup wet ngo, epon akuli nga pok put sakalngin si ta po enginin kara, si tuo ngo huuspit.
Apo ehurok, mi ngo epo wom ku kuk aku wom pong epo engin epo kho ma po tin inana it men kuk wet hingis ma po mosop li hik put wiu,
ma po mosop lup to a-Moses ma po wa baptais mi hingis u mi wiu kut tumen,
ma po mosop ii enda aiingin then tin emiunan men,
u po mosop um um then tin emiunan men kut tumen, epo po um um tin pol mi umat tin emiunan e ira po li men, ma umat tin imen men Krais ako.
Takuma po ta hi munuman kara men ku Got min saah pit po hi weh som, epo po emkusin a hi kara men nuk e plak pi tin tahunggu men engun.
Epo wungin tin si imen men tosukngin epo it kut tumen ako, men taku suk mara it epo it ku ngelek wo wungin lengwal ken po tin lap e ngelek won men asin.

Ma wom ning i aku wo wom nuk wet got tin tororokngin men enun ken po ta hi kara tin ning i men asin. Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk taku, “Po masang to sun wala ko nuk e ii enda u po nuk e um um tumen, li klet ma po kekhek si ma po ula wal amen engun.”
Kuru it men ku kuk aku it ning elwanngin ken po ta hi kara tin ning i men asin, epo po ning i ma po khaut tausen khum ponwal u tausen myuk tumen (23,000) ko huu mi ungunan then ta engun.
Kuru it kuk aku it karong Krais ken po ta hi kara tin ning i men asin, men po ning i ma isaling mhuk po.
Kuru it kuk aku it sangengngeng ken po ta hi kara tin kuk e sangengngeng men asin, men po ning i ma tihngin tin wa kumang epon ku mhuk po men mhuk po kyok.
Epo wungin tin mosop imen si ta po epon men ku tosukngin engun, ma panngin nuk epon ku tak tulu it tin ung to elup tin ung e wiewi al me e me pyu pongin ko po it homani men.
Tumen ma taku po ta phaeng taku i e pit nhing, men ku haum tunus, epon akuli plong ko.

Karongngin enginin ta ani ku si ta wom men kho som, si men tin si ta po tunus kho ewin me kut men, takuma Got men to wungin anuh, ma yang men ku mang ta karongngin ta si ta wom tin ku los wom weh men akomen, si karongngin tin imen men ku yang hihi soput tin ku wom meleng karongngin epon men, kuma wom kakha hut ma wom lat i engun.
Tumen ma ehurok, wom tin mi it pit wo al men, wom men ku mhup lu kuk hin epo wungin tin ku wo wom nuk wet got torokngin men.
Nga sakal ta wom ken wom e po tin mhi hi ek men, ma tuo wom men ku ion mi wungin tin nga sakal i men weh.

Iyi, karu tin epo sam samngin men tin it sam sam Got epon men, men it pok mi Krais kalolwan epon kha men ako, wah? Kuru beret tin it tik tik i men, men it pok mi Krais emkusin epon kha men kut tumen ako, wah?
Epo it men munuman, takuma it men beret then u emkusin then kut tumen ako; epo it mosop men pok mi beret tin then imen ii nginan ewin.
Tulu wom hu pit po po Israel tin ung e khuuk wal wo mulus men, epo po tin ii talungin tin po talu Got epon men men mosop si klap to Got tin suyung tan men ako, wah?

Iyi, wungin tin nga sakal i imen ani sinsin tua? Men wom wo taku nga wo epo endara aiingin tin po talu got torokngin epon men men endara irawin ta, wa got tin torokngin men e endara irawin ta ani men, wah?

Awu. Epo nga wo epo talungin tin po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men ning talungin epon men, men po talu emiun lengwal tin kuk e li li po pi pomua men kha men, si ku ta Got akomen, tumen ma marango luun epo wom tin ku si klap to emiun tin lengwal imen.

Wom men ku um ko mi karu tin ta yang tin Akono men u karu tin ta emiun lengwal tin kuk po pi pomua men tumen to al asin; wom men ku pok mi endara tin pit wo suyung ta yang tin Akono men u mi endara tin pit wo suyung ta emiun tin lengwal men to al asin kut tumen.
Wa it taku ning i kuma yang tin Akono men min luk ma yan sal pit wo it, wah? Iyi, ma it e taku kakha weh epo yang, wah?

Wungin mosop men tunus epo ngo ku ning i ako. Takuma wungin mosop ani ku nhio wo ngo weh men akomen. Wungin mosop men tunus epo ngo ku ning i ako. Takuma wungin mosop ani ku pa nhing ngo weh men akomen.
Po ta men ku tohuh epon ku tuon ung tunus asin, si men ku tohuh epon ku po tin hi ung then men ku hi weh ung tunus to al weh.
Endara tin emalin tunus e po tirih i mi nal walngin men men ku wom iini engun, si wom kines munuman epon asin, akuli mi wom tin ples wungin nginangan men wa wungin kyok ko pit po wom;
epo “mulus men ta yang tin Akono men, to endara mosop tin nuk won men.”

Ma taku po tin ku wo hi phep som men ta yuk wom lu ii endara to hi, ma mi wom epo wom ku lu, men ku wom ii endara tin tuni e po hihi i nuk maran min wom men engun, men ku wom kines munuman epon asin, akuli mi wom tin ples wungin nginangan men wa wungin kyok ko pit po wom.

Si taku po ta pok wom taku, “Li ken nginan tin imen men po talu got torokngin epon kha men,” men ku wom iini asin, sinsin epo po tin pok wom epon men, u epo mi po tin ples wungin nginangan men tumen, epo “mulus men ta yang tin Akono men, to endara mosop tin nuk won men.”

Epo nga wo epo mi po tin ples wungin nginangan men men ku nga sakal los po mi wom som. Awu. Men mi po tin enginin men kha men ako. Epo tua ma po tunus enginin ta min tin ples wungin nginangan men ku ples wungin epo ngo tin nga in e wo ngo pias engun men?
Epon taku nga sam sam Got ma nga ii endara to po, tuni ma po mimi ngo pit mi endara tin nga sam sam Got epon men?
Tumen ma taku wom ii endara wa wom um wa wom ning wungin ta tun tira wa tumen, men ku wom ning i mosop epon ku wom wa Got yan weh si epon misan.
Si wom kuk aku wom ning wungin ta tin ning i ma po Yuda, wa po Grik, wa po tin palu walngin ta Got men ku plong ko epon men asin,

men ken ngo maksin e taku ning wungin mosop tin ku po masang to sun wala mosop mi hi saah pit po ngo ton men, men ku nga tohuh epo wungin tin ku nhio wo ngo tuon men akomen. Awu. Nga tohuh epo wungin tin ku nga nhio wo po munuman epon men, kumali po palolongin epon weh.
Wom men ku ning wungin pit mina ngo weh ken ngo tin ning wungin pit mina Krais men.
Kut si ehurok, nga wangan po wom epon tin tulu wom hu ngo epo wungin mosop, ma wom kasum wungin pip tin ku wom ung e pat wal i lu ira wungin tin nga wai sup yanga wili wom weh kho kut men.
Takuma mi ngo epo wom ku ion i ti, epo Krais kha mhin epo po masang mosop men, u po masang kha mhin epo po wala men, u Got kha mhin epo Krais men kut tumen.
Taku po masang ta kines Got wa pok put wungin kaunngin, ma suk mhin, men wa manngin ko po mhin kha men.
Si taku wut wala ta ku kines Got wa pok put wungin kaunngin to mhin tin ku wut suk pon som men, men wut wa manngin ko po mhin kha men, epo wungin tin imen men ken wut e yeng pon mhin kha men ako.
Epon taku po wala ta ku suk mhin som, men ku klat yut li weh. Takuma it ion i epon taku wut wala ta ku klat pon yut li wa yeng pon tumen, men ku manngin ko pon ako, tumen men ku suk mhin engun.
Iis, epo po masang ta men tunus epon ku suk mhin akomen, epon men in kai Got enun u moolngin ta yang tumen ako, si po wala kha moolngin ta po masang men.
Epo po masang ani ku ningngin epo po wala men som, si po wala kha ningngin epo po masang men ako.
Kuru po masang ani ku ningngin epon ku nhio wo po wala men som, si po wala kha ningngin epon ku nhio wo po masang men ako.
Sinsin tin imen kha ku tunus epo po wala men ku suk mhi hi epo tosukngin ta tin ku pok put hi tin kuk wet wili sun men, men sinsin epo tihngin tin kuk e li li ma ion po men.
Takuma mi yang tin Akono men men ku po masang kuk engini hi weh epo po wala, wa po wala ku kuk engini hi weh epo po masang tumen akomen.
Epo po wala men ningngin epo po masang, tumen kut kha po masang maksin ko khuukngin epo po wala men, si epo wungin tin mosop imen men me hang Got ako.
Tuo wom ion mi wungin tin ti, men tunus epo po wala ta ku kines Got to mhin tin ku suk pongin som men wa tua?
Iyi, epo endara mosop tin khuuk wal pit minal to wungin ta hi weh men kha it ion i epon taku po masang ta yut nomalak, men ku manngin ko pon ako, wah?
Si taku po wala ta yut nomalak, men moolngin tan ako. Epo Got wa po wala yut hi si epon ku hi suk po hi epon.
Si taku po ta ku ngelek wo heek walngin pit mi wungin tin imen, men ku pim a ira wungin enginin ta wa palu walngin tin ta Got e ung e li li men ku ira wungin enginin ta tumen akomen.

Kut sini wungin tin ku nga panen wom epon homani men men ku nga wangan po wom epon akomen, epo minan tin wom mu palu wal men, men ku wungin tunus si hut akomen. Awu. Men wungin lengwal kha si hut men.

Epo wungin tin nuk epo sun tin imen tin li muk epo sun men men ti, minan tin wom mu palu wal then to palu walngin mosop men, nga hul epo takonngin kara si lunga wom, ma wungin tin imen put kara men wo ngo nuk wet ako.
Epo takonngin kara kuli iso weh si lunga wom ako, kuma po tin akani e Got min saah pit po hi men ku si nuk pi mlaeng lunga wom kuma wom hop i.
Tumen ma minan tin wom mu palu wal pi then ta men, men kakaomngin ta yang tin Akono men ani ku wom mu palu wal epon ku wom iini men akomen.
Epo minan tin wom ku ii endara men, men wom then then soh soh epon ku ii endara muk epo po kara engun, ma po kara kuk e huu elip si po kara um hambip ma mara hi hihi.

Who, wom e mang ta wom tin ku wom ii endara u wom um min men pi om, wah? Wa wom ku ion palu walngin ta Got ken i e amiron nginan engun men ani wom wa manngin ko po po tin endara ta hi om men, wah? Ngo ku sakal tua epo wom? Iyi, ngo ku wangan po wom, wah? Awu. Ngo ku wangan po wom epo wungin tin tumen akomen.

Epo wungin tin nga wai hang yang tin Akono men kha nga wai sup yanga wili wom kho men, men ti, epo pi luk tin a-Yesus tin Akono men wangin li sup yanga wili po tin nolo yang men, men yang wa beret ta si,
yang sam sam Got epon kut, anima yang tik tik i, ma yang wo taku, “Wom wai, si wom iini; men emali ngo tin ku hik putngin epon ku mut eya wom men kha men; wom ning i timen kuma tulu wom hu ngo epon.”

Kuru po ii endara li klet, anima yang ira wungin tin pit mina sun timen kyok ma yang wa karu ta si, yang wo taku, “Karu tin iyi men wungin tin kaekngin nuk lunga Got u po tunus tumen tin homan e si epo ngo kalolwan men. Wom men ku ning i tumen kokyok kokyok minan tin ku li pol akani e ku wom um ko min men, kuma tulu wom hu ngo epon.”
Epo minan tin akani e ku wom ii beret tin imen u wom um ko mi karu tumen, men wom pok put hunngin tin ta yang tin Akono men li pol minan tin ku yang kyok me men kha men.
Tumen ma taku po ta ii beret tin imen u um ko mi karu tin ta yang tin Akono men tumen to wungin tin ku tunus som men, men wa lasin si pon epo yang tin Akono men emkusin u kalolwan tumen kha men.
Si po ta men ku ion mi wungin tan wet, ma wungin tin tumen khama tunus epon ku ii beret u um ko mi karu kut tumen.
Epon taku po ta ku ii beret u um ko mi karu to wungin tin ku tunus som men, men ii beret u um ko mi karu tin kuli Got wo los pon men kha men, epon men ku hop yang tin Akono men emkusin weh akomen.
Epo sinsin tin imen kha po munuman kuk e wiak wiak u sasaih tumen lunga wom men, kuru po munuman huu kho kut tumen.
Epon taku it tuo it men ku ples wungin ta it tunus, men ku wungin nuk epo po enginin kara ku ples wungin ta it akomen.
Si taku it sup mi ples walngin, men yang tin Akono men tus it kha men, epon akuli Got wo los po it to po tin ira wungin ta pi mulus men.
Tumen ma, ehurok, minan tin wom ku mu palu wal epon ku ii endara men, men ku wom kaeng wal wet.
Si taku po ta hun elip, men ku ii endara mang tan wet, epon akuli wom mu palu wal li Got wo los po wom. Si wungin tin kara e iso nuk men kuli minan tin nga me men khama nga nemeh i iso.
Kut si, ehurok, talungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men, mi ngo epo wom men ku pong epon asin.

Wom ion i epon kho ma wom kuk ken po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, men got tororokngin enun kara ek ek mi wom epo wom ku ira endara tin imen li, men wom ira wungin enginin kara e endara tin imen wa wom li iran men engun.

Tumen ma nga pok wom ti, epo po ta tin sakal epo Emiun Auluungin men ku sakal taku, “A-Yesus men ku huuspit,” ti, akomen, wa po ta ku sakal taku, “A-Yesus men Akono,” ti, engun akomen kut tumen. Awu. Men epo Emiun Auluungin misan.
Epo talungin men kikyungin maran kiring kiring, si Emiun men then.
Kumang tin po kum ta sun men men maran kiring kiring, si yang tin Akono men men then.
Ma emhong tin siin iis men men maran kiring kiring, si Got then ta misan kha emhong tan siin iis mi po mosop epo kumang mosop men.
Kut ma Emiun Auluungin tin si in pi mlaeng men men ko ta po then then epon ku nhio wo po mosop.
Epo po ta wa talungin tin ku pok put sakalngin to mhin ekngin men epo Emiun Auluungin, u po enginin ta wa talungin tin ku pok put sakalngin to maran ekngin men epo Emiun tin then imen,
u po ta wa talungin tin epo wo phepngin men epo Emiun tin then imen, u po ta wa talungin epon ku ning i ma saihngin mimlis epo Emiun tin then imen,

u po ta wa talungin epon ku ning wungin maran kiring kiring men, u po ta wa talungin epon ku pok put wungin kaunngin men, u po ta wa talungin epon ku ion mi emiun tin kuk e li li men taku e tunus wa taku e lengwal, u po ta wa talungin epon ku pok put sakalngin ira sakalngin enginin enginin, u po ta wa talungin epon ku ples wungin tin sun ta pok put sakalngin ira sakalngin enginin enginin men sinsin kut tumen.
Takuma talungin tin mosop imen men Emiun tin then e tuon imen emhong tan siin iis min men, ma yang kikyu po then then epon ira mi yang tuon weh.
Epo emkusin men then ma tingit munuman, takuma emkusin tin then imen tingit mosop, aku, men munuman, takuma men emkusin then, tumen kut kha ken Krais emkusin men.

Epo Emiun then ta kha it mosop wa baptais ma it sup mi emkusin then ta epon men, aku, taku it Yuda, wa Grik, wa po tin kum wo sun engun men, wa po tin wo hi pias men, ma men ningngin ma it mosop um ko mi Emiun tin then imen.
Iis, epo emkusin men ku tingit then ta akomen, si men tingit munuman ako.
Taku khin sakal taku, “Ngo men ku wilin som, tumen ma ngo ku emkusin tingit ta akomen,” ti, iyi sakalngin tin imen ani ku ning i ma khin ku tingit ta emkusin ta som men, wah?
U taku kingan sakal taku, “Ngo men ku maran som, tumen ma ngo ku emkusin tingit ta akomen,” ti, iyi, sakalngin tin imen ani ku ning i ma kingan ku tingit ta emkusin ta som men, wah?
Taku emkusin palamisim mosop maran, si tingit tin ku hul sakalngin epon men ani a? Wa taku emkusin palamisim kingan, si tingit tin ku ipek endara epon men ani a?
Si homani ma Got hihi emkusin tingit mosop, men yang hihi i then then sup li pit e li li mi emkusin ira mi yang weh.
Si taku emkusin mosop tingit then ta engun, si kuli emkusin timen kara maksin kuli in a?
Si homani ma emkusin tingit munuman, takuma tingit mosop men si emkusin then irawin weh ako.

Si maran men khuk po sakalngin tin ku maran ko wo ta wilin taku, “Ngo men ku hing wo ngon akomen,” ti; u mhin men khuk po sakalngin tin ku mhin ko wo ta khin taku, “Ngo men ku hing wo ngon akomen,” ti kut tumen.
Si irawin weh epo emkusin tingit tin maran ken i e wiak wiak engun men, timen taku kis, men ku emkusin kalwok weh.

Kuru it emkusin tingit kara tin it wo taku i e taku yan om epo sun kara men, timen kha it pa mool i weh epo sun kara men; si it emkusin tin it ku wai si in pi mlaeng akomen, timen kha it khek i weh epo sun kara men,

si it emkusin tingit kara tin it mang tan si nuk pi mlaeng engun men ku in epo it ku phae pon akomen. Epo Got hihi it emkusin sup me klap then, men yang wa yan si ta emkusin tingit tin yan om engun men men si nhum epo sun kara,
tumen kumali emkusin ku pal pal mingin kyok akomen, si emkusin tingit mosop ku mara hi pit wo al to min sukngin then weh.
Ma taku emkusin tingit ta wuh won maikngin, men ku emkusin mosop wuh won maikngin to al ako; u taku emkusin tingit ta yan pos, men ku emkusin mosop mi hi keh keh to al kut tumen.
Epo wom mosop kha Krais emkusin men ako, ma wom then then men Krais emkusin tingit ta kha men.
