Ma Got hihi po kara kuk mi palu walngin men ti, men yang hihi po paengin kha muk men, u tin me ponwal angan men men po pokngin, u tin me miuk angan men men po tin kot sun men, anima talungin tin epo wungin maran kiring kiring ning nginan men, anima talungin tin epo saihngin mimlis nginan men, u kho wongin, u tin maran pit wo po men, u tin sakal ira sakalngin enginin enginin men tumen.
Iyi, po mosop e ku si paengin, wah? Po mosop e ku si pokngin, wah? Po mosop e ku si tin kot sun men, wah? Po mosop e ku kuk e ning wungin maran kiring kiring, wah?
Iyi, po mosop e ku wa talungin epo saihngin mimlis nginan, wah? Po mosop e ku sakal ira sakalngin enginin enginin, wah? Wa po mosop e ku pok put wungin tin imen sinsin, wah?
Si wom men ku tohuh epo wom ku mara wom nes talungin tin nunhum epo sun kara men weh. Si homani ma ngo ku suk mara wom epo soput tin iso tunus weh men.

Aku, taku nga sakal ira sakalngin enginin enginin tin ta po tunus men wa tin ta po tihngin men tumen, si nga kalwok epo min epongin, men nga si ken enda brasan ta tin sokngin ma ingut engun men u ken lawosang tin ingut whung whung engun men kut tumen.

U taku nga wa talungin tin ku nga pok put wungin kaunngin epon men, ma nga hop mi wungin kaunngin sinsin mosop u nga wa maran ekngin mosop, u nga wa wo phepngin mosop kuma nga wo ma pi emian osong li pit pi ta tumen, si taku nga kalwok epo min epongin, men nga in amiron nginan engun ako.
U taku nga wa endara mosop tin ta ngo men si ta po tin kes men, u taku mi ngo alang si ngo emkusin si po kara sut i, si nga kalwok epo min epongin, men ku nhio wo ngo kara som.
Min epongin men wuh wungin li maran nomalak, u ning i tunus epo po tumen; min epongin men ku min heh wet po ewin som; min epongin men ku sasayih ewin som, men ku wai si pit ewin som,
men ku ning wungin tin to manngin men ewin som, men ku tohuh epo wungin tan tuon weh ewin som, men ku min teng si kerek ewin som, men ku tulun hu wungin tin po ning i lengwal epon men ewin som,
men ku min keh keh pit po wungin tin po ples i lengwal men ewin som, si min keh pit po wungin tin po ples i to wungin tin irawin weh men misan;
men lat won maikngin mosop tin si pon men, men won nuk wet wungin mosop, men hoo min pit po wungin mosop, u men pit nhing wet won maikngin mosop kut tumen.

Min epongin men ku put ko nuk angan akomen. Si taku po pok put wungin kaunngin kara, men kuli put mih ko; taku po sakal ira sakalngin enginin enginin kara, men kuli put mut; taku po pok put maran ekngin ta hi, men kuli li kis ako.
Epon homani ma it ion wungin, men kiak kiak engun u it pok put wungin kaunngin, men kiak kiak engun kut tumen.
Si takuli sulung ma tin tunus weh men si, men ku tin kiak kiak men ku mlisngin li ako.

Minan tin nga iso hoin men nga sakal ken po hoin men, nga ples wungin sinsin ken po hoin men, marango ira sakalngin ken po hoin men, taku li klet ma nga si nomuru kut, men nga mang ta wungin tin ta po hoin men li ako.

Epo homani ma mara it hilo po endara ken i e it ion i mi tupngin men engun, takuli sulung men ku mara it sak wal weh. Homani ma nga ion wungin, men kiak kiak engun, si kuli sulung men ku nga ion wungin, men ku nga ion i ken sun tin Got hop ngo ton weh men.
Si homani ma wo phepngin, hoo mingin, u min epongin tumen, tin khaut miuk imen kha iso nuk men, si wungin tin khaut miuk imen ta tin nhum weh epo sun men men min epongin.

Wom men ku ira wungin tin epo min epongin men weh, kuru wom men ku tohuh epo wom ku wa talungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men weh kut tumen, si wom men ku tohuh weh epo wom ku pok put sakalngin tin kaunngin men.

Epo po ta tin sakal ira sakalngin enginin ta men, men ku sakal ta po tunus akomen. Awu. Men sakal ta Got ako, epo po ta ku hul wungin tin po tin imen sakal i men som, si men pok put wungin kaunngin epo Emiun Auluungin.
Si taku po ta pok put wungin kaunngin, men sakal ta po tunus epon ku khek po si pit nhing, u wo nut po, u pa nhing po kut tumen.
Si taku po ta sakal ira sakalngin enginin ta, men khek i tuon si pit nhing, si taku po ta pok put wungin kaunngin, men khek palu walngin si pit nhing kha men.

Mi ngo epo wom mosop ku sakal ira sakalngin tin enginin enginin men, si mi ngo weh epo wom ku pok put wungin kaunngin; epo po ta tin pok put wungin kaunngin men men nhum epo sun tin sakal ira sakalngin tin enginin men, si taku irawin epo po ta tin imen tuon kha ku ples sakalngin tin imen sinsin, kuma palu walngin wa pa nhingngin epon, men timen nhum weh kut tumen ako.

Si, ehurok, taku homani ma nga me epo wom ma nga sakal ira sakalngin tin enginin men, men kuli nga nhio wo wom tua? Si taku nga sakal ta wom ira wungin tin Got las i si in epo ngo men, wa nga ira maran ekngin kara, wa nga ira pok put wungin kaunngin kara, wa nga ira kotngin kara tumen, men timen kha ku nhio wo wom weh men, wah?

Iis, epo endara kara tin ku to maran tunusngin som men, tin ken lapulwi wa gita wa tumen, taku ingut si ingutngin tan ku ieh wal som, men ku it hop lutngin tin po so so lapulwi wa po sok gita iran men tua?
Epon taku kiyak ku hau sup mi al, men are ku hihi epo lek walngin?

Tumen kha wom maksin taku mamai wom ku pok put sakalngin, men ku pok put sakalngin put kara tin awo mlus nginan epon ku po hul i sinsin men, wah? Wa taku pi engun, men kuli po kara hul sakalngin tin wom sakal i men sinsin tua? Epo wom men sakal i lu yang ken eip men engun.
Irawin, epo sakalngin tin po sakal i ta hi weh men maran kiring kiring kuk wo mulus ako, ma men ta ku sinsin om akomen.
Tumen ma taku nga pong epo sakalngin tin po sakal i ta hi men sinsin, men ku po ion ngo men enginin epo po, u nga ion po men enginin epo ngo kut tumen.
Tumen kha wom maksin tin tohuh epo wom ku wa talungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men, sinsin epo wom ku khek palu walngin si pit nhing kha ku wom tohuh weh epon men.
Tumen ma taku po ta sakal ira sakalngin tin enginin men ta, men ku kines Got, kuma pok put sakalngin sinsin timen weh.
Epon taku nga kines ira sakalngin enginin ta, men emiu ngo kha kines men, si mi ngo tin ples wungin sinsin men ku wa endara aiingin kara akomen.
Tumen ma kuli tua? Men ku nga kines epo emiu ngo, kuru epo mi ngo tin ples wungin sinsin men kut tumen. Ngo ku lut lutngin epo emiu ngo, kuru epo mi ngo tin ples wungin sinsin men kut tumen.

Wa taku tumen som, taku e sam sam Got epo emiun misan, men ku po ta tin in pi ta po tin pong epo engin men sakal, “Irawin,” ti, wet sakalngin tin e sam sam Got epon men tua, epon men ku hul wungin tin e sakal i imen sinsin akomen?
Iis, epo ngon men sam sam Got irawin ako, takuma men ku khek po ta tin enginin men si pit nhing akomen.
Nga sam sam Got epo ngo men sakal ira sakalngin tin enginin enginin men hambip epo wom mosop ako.

Si lunga palu walngin men mi ngo epo ngo ku pok put sakalngin put eip epo mi ngo tin ples wungin sinsin men weh, kuma nga kot po kara epon maksin, si taku nga pok put sakalngin put tausen kum ta (10,000) ira sakalngin enginin ta, men ku mi ngo epon weh akomen.

Ehurok, wom men ku kuk to mi wom tin ples wungin sinsin men ken po hoin men asin, si wungin tin lengwal men, men ku wom weh kuk ken po hoin tin po hi mumlek men engun, si mi wom tin ples wungin sinsin men men ku wom kuk ken po tin nonomuru men weh.

Sakalngin men panngin nuk mi wungin sinsin taku, ‘’’Po tin sakal ira sakalngin enginin kara tin ta hi weh men u mi wo po enginin kara tumen kha ku nga sakal i si ta po masang to sun wala tin imen epon men, ma nga in e sakal wungin tin imen kokyok kokyok, takuma po ku hul wet wungin ta ngo akomen.’ Yang tin Akono men kha wo tumen.”

Tumen ma wungin tin po sakal ira sakalngin enginin enginin men men tosukngin ta, si men ku tosukngin ta po tin wo hi phep kho men som, si men ta po tin ku wo hi phep som men; si wungin tin po pok put wungin kaunngin epon men ku ta po tin ku wo hi phep kho som men akomen. Awu. Men ta po tin wo hi phep kho men ako.

Tumen ma taku palu walngin mosop me palu wal pi then ta, ma po mosop sakal ira sakalngin tin enginin enginin men, ma po kara tin pong epo engin wa ku wo hi phep som men kara me sup, men ku po wo epo wom e ulil engun kha men wah, iyi?

Si taku po mosop pok put wungin tin kaunngin men, ma po ta tin ku won phep som men wa po ta tin pong epo engin engun men me sup mi wom, men wungin tin wom mosop pok put men ku tak si wungin tin ta po men ako, ma po mosop ples wungin ta sun tin imen.

Ma wungin tin imen men ku wungin tin kaunngin nuk mi po tin imen lasngin si in pi mlaeng epon, tumen ma po plong ko mara hi ko mi mulus, men ku po wa Got yan si ma po pok epo Got men in lunga wom irawin weh ako.

Tumen ma ehurok, minan tin ia e wom mu palu wal then epon men, tua ma po ta wom ta lut lutngin ta, u po ta wom ta ira kotngin ta, u po ta wom ta sakal ira sakalngin enginin ta, u po ta wom ta pok put wungin tin Got suk maran epon men ta, u po ta wom ta ples wungin tin po sakal ira sakalngin enginin ta men tumen? Wom men ku ning wungin mosop tin ku wom khek wal si nuk nhing epon men weh.
Taku po ta sakal ira sakalngin enginin ta, men ku wulong ponwal wa wuluk miuk, si ku po kara sup me lup to sun asin, men ku ngyuk pit e wiewi al to sakalngin, ma po ta pok put sakalngin sinsin.
Si taku po ta tin ku pok put sakalngin sinsin men pi om, men ku yang tin imen homong mi palu walngin, si sakal si tan tuon u ta Got tumen misan.
Si pokngin men ku wulong ponwal wa wuluk miuk tumen sakal, si po tin kara men ion mi wungin ta wuluk.
Si taku wungin kaunngin ta lasngin si ta po enginin ta tin ung porili sun men, men ku yang tin sakal li muk men homong engun.
Epo wom mosop men ku pit e wiewi al ma wom pok put wungin kaunngin then then ako, kuma po mosop urut sakalngin kuma po mosop wa nhingngin epon.
Epo po pokngin emiu hi men po tuo hi kasum i tunus ako.
Epo Got men ku sinsin epo wungin tin hik sup mi al men ewin akomen, si men epo min wyungin misan, wala wungin si tumen mi palu walngin mosop tin ta po masang to sun wala tin hi auluungin men.

Si po wala tin ta wom men men ku hi homong mi palu walngin tin ung e li li men, epon men auluungin epo po tin ku sakal men; si po men ku wa hi me sup wet wili sun ken wungin sinsin tin sakal epon men.
Si taku po mi hi epo po ku urut wungin ta, men ku po kines titien hi mi mang tin ta hi men wet; epon taku po wala sakal mi palu walngin, men to manngin ako.
Iyi, wom ani sakalngin ta Got si epo wom muk men, wah? Wa misa wom ani sakalngin ta Got me pol ta wom men, wah?
Taku po ta phaeng epon e ku pokngin ta wa ku in e ira Emiun Auluungin, men ku sam wet sakalngin tin nga pan i ti epo wom men men wungin tin yang tin Akono men wo maran ko klat epon kha men.
Si taku po ta pong epo engin, men ku pong epo engin kut.
Tumen ma, ehurok, wom men ku tohuh weh epo wom ku pok put wungin kaunngin, si wom uluu po tin taku sakal ira sakalngin tin enginin enginin men asin.
Si wom men ku ning wungin mosop, men ku wom ning i tin manngin om epon men u tin ira hihingin tunus men kut tumen weh.
Kut si, ehurok, ngo ku pok wom kyok epo pok putngin tin tunus e nga pok put si ta wom kho men, tin wom wai kho ma wom nuk nhing epon men,
tin wom palolongin epon maksin men, tin taku wom kasum wungin tin nga pok put si ta wom kho men pip, epon akuli wo wom nuk wet ma hut li nuk engun.
Epo kho ma nga wa wungin si nuk yanga wili wom kho muk, tin nga wai maksin yanga wili po kara men, men ti: epo Krais hun mut eya it to lasin ta it ira sakalngin tin panngin nuk men,
ma po kil yang, ma ungunan miuk mili, anima yang khekngin kyok si tunus ira sakalngin tin panngin nuk men,
ma yang si put plo nginan ta a-Sipas, anima wuluk tin paengin e eip ponwal u ponwal tumen maksin.
Li klet anima po ehuro it tin khum khum eip (500) u iso ung e li si tumen ion yang maksin mi elup then, men po tin imen munuman kara iso kuk, si kara huu kho.
Li klet anima a-Yemis ion yang, anima po paengin mosop ion yang kut tumen.
Li klet ma sulung epo po mosop men nga ion yang maksin kut tumen, men ken ngo e po ta tin ko khuukngin mi elup tin ku siik som men.
Epo ngo men tun engun weh mi po paengin, ma ngo men e ku tunus epon ku po sikia ngo paengin akomen, epon tin nga mumhek mi palu walngin tin ta Got men.

Takuma nanaangin tin ta Got men kha nga si in ken nga in ti kut i, ma nanaangin ta yang tin me epo ngo men ku hut li nuk akomen, si men nga tohuh epo kumang hambip weh epo po paengin kara ako, si ku tuo ngo som, si men nanaangin ta Got tin in to ngo men ako.
Tumen ma, aku, taku ngo wa po paengin enginin kara pok put wungin, men wungin tin tumen kha pim a pok put men u wungin tin tumen kha wo wom nuk wet men tumen ako.
Kut si homani ma taku pim a pok put Krais tin khek si mi hunngin kyok si tunus men, taku tuni ma po kara tin kuk lunga wom men wo epo khekngin mi hunngin si men men e pi engun?
Si taku khekngin mi hunngin si pi om, men ku Krais maksin ku khekngin kyok si som.
Ma taku Krais ku khekngin kyok si som, men kuli wungin tin pim a pok put men sinsin om, u wo phepngin ta wom sinsin om kut tumen.

Kuru po men ku ion pim ken pim e po tin pok put sakalngin ta Got e torokngin men kara, sinsin epon tin pim a pok put wungin epo Got tin taku yang khek Krais si men, si taku irawin epo po tin huu kho men ku khek kyok si tunus som, men ku Got ku khek Krais si tunus som maksin kut tumen ako.
Epon taku po tin huu kho men ku khek kyok si som, men ku Krais ku khekngin kyok si som kut tumen.
Ma taku Krais ku khekngin kyok si som, men ku wo phepngin ta wom sinsin om, men ku wom iso kuk to lasin ta wom!
Kuru taku tumen, men po tin huu mi Krais kho men huuspit kyok kut tumen.
Epon taku wo mulusngin tin iyi misan ani it hoo mi it pit wo Krais men, men it ko kuk to mara po masang to sun wala ken po tin kuk amusukngin weh mi po tunus tin kara e it ung wo mulus men.
Si homani ma Krais khekngin kyok si mi po tin hi huu kho men kho kut ako, ma yang li muk po tin huu kho kut men ken endara tin enun muru muk men.
Epo po tunus ta kha hunngin me epon men, tumen kut kha po tunus ta kyok kha wungin tin po khek kyok si tunus men me epon kut tumen ako.
Epo po mosop tin huu mi Adam men, tumen kut kha po mosop tin kuk mi Krais men kuli hi khekngin kyok si tunus kut tumen ako.

Takuma po then then men ku khekngin kyok si ira hihingin ta hi weh; Krais men khekngin kyok si muk ken endara tin enun muru muk men, anima po tin ta Krais men kuli kekhekngin kyok si minan tin kuli yang kyok me men ako.

Li klet anima elup tin ku li ponsol men si, men ku yang suuk sii po mosop tin mara hi pit wo sun men u po mosop tin emhong nuk si wut hi men u kakhangin mosop tumen, anima yang wa enunu kyok li sup yang wili Got tin Wiraman men.
Epo yang men ku weh si sinkhaung ta ma yang maran pit wo endara mosop weh li pol minan tin kuli yang khin los po po mosop tin nolo yang men me sup wet khi yang men.
Po nolo tin kuli yang mhuk i sulung weh men men hunngin ako.

Epo “Got wa endara mosop me sup wet khi yang kho kut.” Si Got tin sakal taku, “Endara mosop men wangin me sup wet khi yang kho kut,” men it ion i in pi mlaeng ako epo yang tin wa endara mosop me sup wet khi yang men ku wungin tin imen los yang akomen.

Ma minan tin kuli endara mosop ku me sup wet khi yang men, anima Wirun tuon maksin ku me sup wet yang tin wa endara mosop me sup wet khi Wirun men kut tumen, kumali Got in ken endara mosop mi po mosop.

Wa taku po tin huu kho men ku khekngin kyok si som, men ku po tin wa baptais mut eya sun tin huu kho men ku ning i tua? Epon taku po tin huu kho men ku kekhekngin kyok si tunus som, men tuni ma po tin imen wa baptais mut eya po tin huu kho men?
Kuru tuni ma pim a kuk e ning wo lalaingin kokyok kokyok epo ele?
Ungunan then then men ngo taku hun angan. Nga tung tung nuk wo ngo tin wangan po wom mi Krais Yesus tin Akono ta it men epo wungin timen men irawin weh.

Taku nga ira wungin ta po tunus engun ma nga sewut li ken nginan enih epo pi Epesus, men timen kuli nhio wo ngo tua? Taku po tin hu hu kho men ku kekhek kyok si som, “men ku it ii endara u it um um tumen engun, epo pi king kauk men ku it huu!”
Wom mang ta po kara me ek ek mara wom asin. “Taku it klap po tin wungin ta hi lengwal men, men ku timen ning i ma wungin ta it tin tunus men ko hies.”
Tuon, wom piphip si ira wungin tin siik men, si wom ning lasin kyok asin; epo po ta wom kara iso pong epo Got. Nga wo tumen, men nga wa manngin ko po wom kha men.
Kut si po ta ku kines taku, “Po tin huu kho men kuli kekhek kyok si tua? Kuru po ku kekhekngin kyok si to hi emkusi hi tua tumen?”
Ngon tin wungin tap ulil men, endara tin e wha i men ku plok si, men ku hun wet, khali iso plok kyok si tunus.
Ma endara tin e wha i men men ku e wha i tin ku iso plok si men akomen, si men e wha i ihun engun, tin taku wit ihun wa endara kara maksin wa tumen.
Si Got wa endara tin plok si men pon tan weh ira mi yang weh, men yang wa endara tin plok si men si ta enda ihun then then weh.
Endara mosop men ku emalin kai wal som. Awu. Po tunus men emali hi tawe, u li ken nginan men emalin tawe, u ili men emalin tawe, u emon men emalin tawe kut tumen.

Kuru endara tin kuk ili wet pi men men pon tawe, u endara tin kuk mulus men men pon tawe kut tumen; takuma moolngin ta endara tin kuk ili wet pi men men pon ta weh, u moolngin ta endara tin kuk mulus men men pon ta weh kut tumen.
Moolngin ta sinang men tawe, u moolngin ta namih men tawe, u moolngin ta awheng men tawe kut tumen ako; epo awheng ta men moolngin tan men maran kiring epo sun tin then then kara men.
Tumen kut kha kuli khekngin mi po tin huu kho men si in tumen. Epo emkusin tin kilngin men men whuk ewin, si men ku khekngin si, men ku emkusin tin ku whuk ewin som men.
Emkusin kilngin, men ken i e amiron nginan engun, si emkusin khekngin si, men to moolngin. Emkusin kilngin, men wiak wiak, si emkusin khekngin si, men to kakhangin ako.
Emkusin tin kilngin men men ta pi mulus, si emkusin tin khekngin si men men emiunan. Epo emkusin tin ta pi mulus men men in, u emkusin tin emiunan men men in kut tumen.
Tumen ma sakalngin panngin ta nuk ti, “Po tunus tin muk e Adam men men si enun tunusan ta,” ti, si Adam tin me sulung men men si emiun ta tin pho po tunusngin men.
Takuma emkusin tin emiunan men ani ku si muk men som, si emkusin tin ta pi mulus men kha si muk men, anima emkusin tin emiunan men si.
Po tunus tin in muk men men ta pi mulus, ma men mulusan; si po tunus tin me ponwal men men yang tin Akono e me ko wet pi men.
Yang tin tunus e mulusan men in ti, kut kha po mosop tin mulusan men kuk ti kut tumen; ma yang tin ta pi wet pi men in ti, kut kha po tin ta pi wet pi men kuk timen kut tumen.
Ma it tin wa yang tin mulusan men enun kai po it kho men, tumen kut kha kuli it wa yang tin ta pi wet pi men enun kai po it kut tumen.

Ehurok, nga pok wom ti, epo emalin u enghik ani ku wa pakuh pongin epo enunu tin ta Got men akomen; kuru endara tin whuk ewin men ani ku wa pakuh pongin epo endara tin ku whuk ewin som men akomen kut tumen.
Wom hul, epo ngo ku pok wom epo wungin kaunngin ta ti, epo it mosop men ku huu som, si it mosop kuli phae si enginin ta ako,

timen men ku si kerek engun ken it tin mara it khim men, minan tin kiyak tin ingut sulung men ingut men. Epo kiyak tin imen ku ingut, men ku po tin huu kho men ku khekngin kyok si to emkusi hi tin ku whuk ewin som men, ma it ku si phae si mara it enginin.
Epo emkusin tin whuk ewin iyi ku sup mi emkusin tin ku whuk ewin som men weh, u emkusin tin hun ewin iyi ku sup mi emkusin tin ku hun ewin som men weh kut tumen.

Tumen ma minan tin emkusin tin whuk ewin iyi ku sup mi emkusin tin ku whuk ewin som men, u emkusin tin hun ewin iyi ku sup mi emkusin tin ku hun ewin som men tumen, men ku sakalngin si pyu pongin tin panngin nuk taku, “Hunngin men huuspit ma kuumngin li kut.”
“Tuon, Hunngin, kut ngon tin e wel po epon men ani a? Ngon tin pi ta hunngin men, nomkangin tin tap men ani a?”
Kut tin hunngin wel po epon men men lasin, ma kakhangin ta lasin men wungin tin sinsin men.
Takuma it men ku sam sam Got tin ning i ma it nomka hut hunngin yanga wili a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men.

Tumen ma, ehurok, wom tin mi it pit wo al men, wom nuk nhing si wom ning i aku wom hoko si wom kyok lu asin, men ku wom tohuh epo kumang tin ta yang tin Akono men ning nginan kokyok kokyok weh, epo wom ion i epo kumang tin wom wuh i ta yang tin Akono men ku li hut emul engun ewin akomen.
Kut si ngo ku sakal epo wom tin ku palu ulu ta po masang to sun wala tin auluungin men, tin nga panen palu walngin tin ung e li li Galesia men epon kho men, kut kha ku wom iran weh kut tumen.

Ungunan tin si muk sun mi elup ponwal me sup tin ung e wiewi al li men, men ku wom then then pok pok mi ulu ta wom kara li ung e li li enginin ma wom halung pon ira miranngin ta wom then then weh, kumali minan tin ku nga kyok me pon ta wom men, men ku wom palu talungin kara kyok akomen.
Ma minan tin nga kyok me pol men men ku nga tirih po tin akani e ku wo wom ung wo hi men to kisang ma po espo talungin ta wom li Yerusalem.
Si taku tunus epo ngo ku li maksin, men po ku pim a li.
Epo ngo ku iso me pol ta wom minan tin ku nga li Masedonia li men, epo ngo ku li Masedonia ma li ako.
Ma ngo ku ti in hang wom kara wa men, wa taku nga in hang wom kaeng elup tin ta pi huk hukan men wet, kumali wom nhio wo ngo epo muk mukngin ta ngo epo pi tin kuli nga li tuni epon men.
Epo mi ngo epo ngo ku ion wom homani engun men ku ngo ku iso kerek li akomen, epo nga hoo mi ngo epo ngo ku iso in hang wom put monlo long, tin taku yang tin Akono men mang ta ngo men.
Si ngo ku iso in epo pi Epesus li pol Pentikos.
Epo sowon tin ku nga ning kumang tunus epon men nhum pit epo ngo kho kut, takuma po tin nolo ngo men munuman kuk.
Kut si taku a-Timoti me pon ta wom, men ku wom ning i kuma yang in lunga wom to min tin lemngin om epon men, epo yang men ning kumang ta sun tin Akono men, ken ngo tin ning i men kut tumen ako.
Tumen ma wom mang si po ta wom ta men ku mimi yang asin, si wom tih yang lu to min wyungin, kuma yang kyok me epo ngo, epo nga in e kaeng yang tin ku me to po ehuro it kara men.

Kut si wiro it Apolos men nga hau nuk sii khin hambip epon ku ti pol ta wom to po ehuro it kara, takuma yang maran luun takut epo yang tin ku ti pol ta wom minan tin iyi men, si yang kuli me minan tin yang ku ion soput tunus ta tin ku nuk men.
Wom haum tunus, ma wom pit nhing wo wo phepngin tin wo wom nuk wet kut men, men ku mi wom puplet weh ma wom kakha ton.
Ma wungin mosop tin wom ning i men, men ku to min epongin weh.

Kut si, ehurok, wom ion a-Stepanus hi po tin hi khuuk wal men, tin po si wo hi phep muk epo po mosop tin ung wo mulusngin Akaia men, kuru po hihi mi hi epo po ku kum ta po tin auluungin men kut tumen, tumen ma nga suh mi kinga wom,
epo wom ku wa wom sup wet wili po tin wungin ta hi tumen, u wet wili po mosop tin pim a wuh kumang to wal men kut tumen.
Epo mi ngo keh keh epo a-Stepanus u a-Portunatus u Akaikus tumen tin ngyuk me pol ta ngo men, epo endara tin wom kalwok epo wom ku wai si men, men wuluk wa pi ta wom ma wuluk wai si kut.
Epo wuluk ning i ma emiu ngo ko li wyu ung u emiu wom ko li wyu ung maksin kut tumen. Tumen ma wom men ku wa ya po tin tumen ya hi si.

Kut si palu walngin tin ung e li li wo mulusngin Esia men wa mi hi ti epo wom, kuru Akwila ngong e-Prisila wa mi ngong ti epo wom mi yang tin Akono men to mi ngong weh kut tumen, to palu walngin tin palu wal mi mang tin ta wulong men.
Po ehuro it tin mosop ung iyi men wa mi hi ti epo wom. Kuru wom men ku wa mi wom si ta al then then to tumum wongin tin auluungin men tumen weh.
Ngo a-Pol wa mi ngo ti epo wom epo wungin tin wili ngo tuon pan i men wala iyi.
Ma taku po ta ku min pit wo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men som, men ku huuspit. Aluuh, mi ngo epo yang tin Akono ta it men ku me kerek!
Min sukngin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men men ku in to wom.
Min epongin tin ta ngo men men ku in to wom mosop mi Krais Yesus kut tumen. Men irawin.

A-Pol tin paengin ta a-Yesus Krais epo wungin tin nuk ta mi Got men u a-Timoti tin wiro it men tumen kha tuk a tirih kisang tin i ti epo palu walngin tin ta Got e ung Korin men, to po mosop tin auluungin e ung e li li wo mulusngin Akaia sup e klet men:
Nanaangin ku ko ta wom kuru min wyungin kut tumen hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen.
It men ku sam sam Got tin Wirama a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, tin sinsin epo min sukngin maran kiring kiring men, kuru Got tin sinsin epo pa nhingngin mosop men kut tumen,

tin pa nhing pim wet wili wo maikngin mosop tin ta pim men, kumali pim men ku pit nhing epo pim tin ku pa nhing po tin sup wet wili wo maikngin kara tin tun tara men to pa nhingngin tin Got pa nhing pim tuon epon men.

Epo wo maikngin tin maran kiring kiring e Krais wuh i men ko tenge ma los po pim maksin, tumen kut kha pa nhingngin tin Got pa nhing pim epon men ko tenge mi pim epo Krais ma los po wom maksin kut tumen.

Si taku won maikngin lek pim, men epon ku pim a pa nhing mi wom epon maksin ma wom si palolongin epon. Pa nhingngin tin imen men ku siin iis mi wom kumali wom nuk nhing wet won maikngin ken sun tin pim a nuk nhing wet won maikngin men. Wa taku pim a wa pa nhingngin, men epon ku wom wa pa nhingngin maksin ma wom si palolongin epon maksin kut tumen.
Ma hoo mingin tin ta pim e pit wo wom men men pit nhing, epo pim a ion i epo wom tin pok mi won maikngin to pim men, tumen kut kha kuli wom pok mi pa nhingngin to pim maksin kut tumen ako.

Epo, ehurok, mi pim epo wom ku pong epo engin asin, epo won maikngin tin si ta pim wo mulusngin Esia men, men iso maik pim weh ma ku po ta kai maikngin tan akomen, men nhum weh epo kakhangin ta pim, khali hoo mingin tin ta pim men om men ku pim a huu engun.

Wai, pim a ples wungin mi pim kho ken po e wo los po pim epo pim ku huu engun, kumali pim men ku wo pim nuk wet kakhangin ta pim weh asin, si pim men ku wo pim phep pit wo Got misan tin khek po tin huu kho men kyok si tunus men weh,

men Got tin palolo pim kho epo wo lalaingin tin nhum e taku lek pim ko huu men, kuru Got tin in e palolo pim homani kut tumen; kuru wo pim phep pit wo Got epo yang ku iso palolo pim sulung kut tumen ako,
kuru wom kut men ku si lup ma wom kines Got nhio wo pim, epon kumali po munuman sam sam Got mut eya pim epo min sukngin tin Got palolo pim epon emhut kinesngin tin ta po tin munuman men.

Epo pim a wangan po pim, kuru mi pim tin ples wungin men pok put wungin kut tumen, epo tuo pim men karut wungin ta pim wo mulus to mi pim tin si in pi mlaeng weh men, kuru mi pim tin mi yil men kut tumen, si ku to mhin ekngin tin ta pi mulus men akomen. Awu. Men epo nanaangin tin ta Got men, wala pim a ning i tumen epo wom weh men.
Epo pim men ku pan wungin enginin kara ti epo wom som. Awu. Wungin tin ku wom tiik i wa ion min tumen misan. Ma nga hoo mi ngo epo wom ku iso ion mi pim tunus weh,
ken sun tin kho ma wom ion mi pim tunus long men, epo pim men kha ku wom wangan po pim ken sun tin pim ku wangan po wom mi elup tin ta a-Yesus tin Akono men.
Ma wo phepngin tin imen men ngo taku ti pol ta wom ton kho, kuma angan tin me ponwal angan men ku wom wa kho wongin kara epon,
epo ngo taku ti pol ta wom khama nga li yek Masedonia, anima nga kyok me pol ta wom, ma wom nhio wo ngo epo soput tin ku nga li Yudia epon men.

Iyi, nga hihi wungin timen ta mi ngo, men wom wo taku mi ngo ta si ta mi ngo engun, wah? Wa wom wo taku wungin tin nga hihi i ta mi ngo men men nga hihi i ira wungin ta pi mulus engun, tin taku nga in to wungin tin ku nga wo epo “Wai” u “Awu” ti to al, wah?
Epo Got tin in to wungin tan anuh men kut kha wungin ta pim tin ti epo wom men ku “Wai” u “Awu” to al tumen engun akomen.

Epo Got Wirun tin a-Yesus Krais men, tin kho ma pok putngin lunga wom mi wo pyuk tin ngo u a-Silwanus u a-Timoti tumen, ku in to wungin tin yang wo “Wai” u “Awu” tumen to al ewin akomen, si mi wo yang men “Wai” weh misan kut.
Epo wo kuk marangin tin ta Got men mosop si enun ung hut epo yang ma men “Irawin” misan, kumali Got yan si epo pim.
Ma yang tin wa pim ko nuk nhing to wom mi Krais ma won ung wo pim men men Got ako,
tin wa tosukngin tan tuon ko po it, men yang wa Emiun Auluungin ko in mi it ken tosukngin ta tin paii po it epo yang ku iso wa endara tin kara men kyok si ta it sulung men.
Kut si nga yuk Got tin taku nga torok, men ku pok put wungin tin ku khung nginan epo ngo men, epo ngo taku mi ngo suk wom kha ngo ku kyok me Korin kerek som men.
Si pim men ku ning i ken pim e mara pim pit wo wo phepngin ta wom men akomen. Awu. Pim men tin kum to wom epon ku mi wom keh keh weh men; epo wo phepngin kha ku wom pit nhing epon men.
Takuma nga hihi wungin ta mi ngo ta nuk ti, epo ngo ku ti pol ta wom to min urut i timen kyok asin.
Epon taku nga ning i tumen ma mi wom urut i, men kuli ara ku ning i ma mi ngo keh keh, men po tin nga ning i ma mi hi urut i imen ako, wah?

Ma nga pan wungin tin wala imen ti epo wom, epon akuli nga ti pol ta wom, men ku mi ngo urut i epo po tin tunus epo po ku ning i ma mi ngo keh men, epo wo ngo phep pit wo wom mosop epo min kehngin tin ta ngo men men ku ning i ma mi wom keh keh to ngo ako.

Epo won maikngin u miun tuungngin tumen men hambip los ngo kha nga pan kisang ti epo wom to tinisngin tin ko ko marango men, ngo ku pan i epon ku mi wom urut i akomen, si nga pan i epon ku wom ion min epongin tin nga in ton hambip weh pit po wom men.

Si taku po ta ning i ma min urut i si in lunga wom, men ku ning i ma mi ngo urut i weh akomen, si men ning i ma wom mosop mi wom urut i sakun kara, epon akuli nga phuk mi sakalngin pit mi wom ma li si nhum lunga wom.
Won maikngin tin wom tin munuman kara men ning i emhut sun ta yang men men kai po ta tin wungin tan tumen,
si kuma tunus epo wom ku mang ta lasin ta yang si wom pa nhing yang, epon akuli yang tin tumen min urut i weh, ma min urut i timen kuum yang engun.
Tumen ma nga sil si kinga wom epo wom men ku suk mara yang epo min epongin ta wom tin pit wo yang men si in pi mlaeng weh.
Epo sinsin tin imen kha nga pan kisang tin kho men ti epon men, epon ku nga karong wom, kuma nga ion i epo wom ku ira wungin tin ta ngo men mosop wa men.
Ma po tin wom mang ta lasin tan men, men nga mang tan maksin kut tumen. Iis, epon taku nga mang ta lasin ta po ta, men nga mang tan mut eya wom to mara Krais ako,
epon akuli a-Nolongin ku ut mara it epo kusamuhngin tan; epo it men ku pong epo kusamuhngin tin ta yang men weh akomen.
Kut ma nga me pol Troas epon ku nga pok put pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men ma yang tin Akono men klas epo ngo ma sowon pit,
men emiu ngo ku ung nhing kara som, epo ngo ku pon ta worok a-Taitus akomen. Tumen ma nga wa mi ngo si ta po ma nga yok pi tin imen li Masedonia.

Auweh, homani ma it men ku sam sam Got weh, tin kokyok kokyok ma muk it mi Krais ken po nolo tin paplung ilio mili to mara po masang to sun wala men, ma epo it kha yang ning i ma ipekngin tin tan e ku po ion yang epon men mili mili li yanga pi mosop epo it.
Epo pim men kuk to mara Got ken ilukngin tunus tin pok put Krais men lunga po tin kuk e palolongin men u lunga po tin kuk e huuspit men kut tumen.

Ta po tin kuk put soput tin ku po huuspit epon men men pim a kuk ken ilukngin tin pok put hunngin men tin ku wa po li epo hunngin men, si po tin kuk put soput tin ku po palolongin epon men, men pim a kuk ken ilukngin tin pok put tunusngin tin ku wa po li epo tunusngin men. Ara tunus weh epon ku ning kumang tin tumen?

Epo pim men ku ken po munuman kara tin li yanga pi ma wa ulu sup wet sakalngin ta Got ken po tin kum anaum men akomen. Awu. Mi pim tin yil u Got tin tirih pim men tumen kha pim a pok put sakalngin to mara Got mi Krais men.

Iyi, tua, pim taku hosi sakalngin kyok epo pim ku wangan po pim, wah? Wa pim ku hing wo kisang panngin kara tin ku pakuh po pim ti epo wom wa pakuh po pim me epo wom tumen ken po kara tin ning i ewin men, wah?
Awu. Tuo wom kha kisang tin pakuh po pim men ako, tin panngin nuk po ewhat pim men, tin po masang to sun wala mosop kuk e ion i u tiik i tumen;

wungin nuk pi mlaeng epo wom kha kisang tin panngin me epo Krais men, tin yang tirih i me yanga wili pim men, men ku panngin epo mara sut akomen, si men panngin epo Emiun Auluungin tin ta Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men; men ku panngin nuk yanga enah tin yanga wang men tingit kara som, si men panngin nuk yanga eplang elit tin emalinan men, men po tunus ewhat hi ako.
Ma wo phepngin tin tumen kha pim a kuk ton yanga wili a-Yesus Krais to mara Got men.
Si ku ken pim tuo pim e ku kakha weh kuma pim a phaeng taku pim tuo pim kha ku kumang ta si epo tuo pim akomen. Awu. Kakhangin ta pim men me hang Got misan,

tin wa kakhangin tan ko ta pim tin wa kumang epo wungin siin tin homan e nuk lunga Got u po tunus tumen, men ku si wo sakalngin tin panngin nuk men som, si men si wo Emiun Auluungin weh; epo sakalngin tin panngin nuk men men lek po ko huu ewin, si Emiun Auluungin men wa tunusngin si ta po.

Si kumang tin po ning i ma hunngin si epon men, tin panngin u kikhimngin tumen ko nuk yanga enah men, men to moolngin ako, tin ma po tin khuuknginin ta a-Israel men ku supa mara a-Moses akomen, epon tin moolngin tin nuk mara yang men mha hambip men, takuma moolngin timen ung e mlis li pi om engun.
Si tua, taku moolngin tin ta kumang tin imen nhum, men ku moolngin tin ta kumang tin ta Emiun Auluungin men men ku iso nhum weh ako, wah?
Epo kumang tin wa lasin ko po po men men to moolngin, tumen ma kumang tin wa wungin siik ko po po men men ku to moolngin tin nhum weh epo sun men ako.
Iis, epo endara tin Got wa moolngin ko tan kho men taku it kaini to endara tin homan men, men e ken moolngin tan pi om engun, epon tin moolngin tin homan men men nhum weh epo sun ako.
Epo endara tin nuk li ma pi om men men to moolngin, tumen ma endara tin iso nuk men men ku to moolngin tin nhum weh epo sun men ako!
Tumen ma pim tin kuk to hoo mingin tin tumen kha pim a pok put sakalngin to wo phepngin tin nhum men --
si pim men ku ning i ken a-Moses men akomen, tin pang maran epo mulu ta kuma po tin a-Israel khuuknginin men ku supa moolngin tin ku ung e yat ko weh li om engun men akomen.

Takuma mi po tin po ples wungin epon men, men maran ko klat weh. Epo hosingin minan timen kha me pol homani kut imen mulu tin tuon imen iso klet mara po, ma ku siin lapngin si mara po minan tin po tiik Kisang Auluungin tin kho men akomen, epo mulu tin imen men ku klokngin li mi Krais misan.
Takuma iso me pol homani ma minan tin po tiik sakalngin tin a-Moses pan i men, men mulu tin imen iso pang po ewhat po ako.
Si taku po ta phae kyok li epo yang tin Akono men, men ku mulu timen klokngin li.
Epo yang tin Akono men kha Emiun tin imen ako; ma pi tin akani e ku Emiun tin ta yang tin Akono men in epon men, men pi tin imen men won piasngin in epon ako.

Ma it mosop men mulu tin pang mara it men klokngin kho li, ma it ion moolngin tin ta yang tin Akono men ken po ta tin ion maran mi tupngin men, ma it kuk e phae si ken yang tin Akono men enun ma moolngin ung e ko po sun li si, men me epo Emiu yang tin Akono men ako.
Pim a wa kumang tin iyi, men pim a wa min sukngin kho khali pim a wai men, tumen ma pim ku ning lamang po kumang tin i akomen.

Si pim men wetpo pim wa wungin tin kaunngin e to manngin men kho kut, ma pim ku ira wungin tin epo kusamuhngin men wa pim ku wa sakalngin torokngin kara me nau mi sun tin ta Got weh men tumen kyok akomen. Awu. Pim men pok put wungin tin irawin men si in pi mlaeng weh, ma wungin timen kha pim a pakuh po pim ko ta po tunus mi hi tin ples wungin men then then to mara Got men.
Si taku pok putngin tin tunus e pim a pok put men ku mulu pang mara po kara, men pang mara po tin kuk e huuspit men ako,

tin got tin ta pi mulus men ning i ma po tin ku wo hi phep som men mara hi mhi pit po mi hi tin po ples wungin epon men, epon akuli esul tin ta pok putngin tin tunus e pok put moolngin tin ta Krais tin Got enun men ku pal ko nuk po po asin.

Epo pim men ku pok put wungin los po pim tuo pim akomen. Awu. Pim a pok put wungin los po Krais Yesus tin Akono men, u epo pim tin kum ta wom epo mi pim weh epon ku pim a nhio wo a-Yesus men kut tumen ako.

Epo Got tin wo maran ko klat kho epo pi mi mlaeng men ku mha mi pi tin mi ku men kha mha nuk mi ewhat pim kuma yang wa pi mi mlaeng tin ta maran ekngin tin ta moolngin tin ta Got men tin ngin ngin nuk mara Krais men si ta pim men.
Takuma pim a kuk to moolngin tin nhum imen men nuk mi pim emkusin tin mulusan engun men, epon kumali kakhangin tin tunus weh men ku me hang Got siik, si ku me hang pim akomen.
Epo pim men klang pit lunga wo maikngin, takuma wo maikngin ku hum pim weh som; miu pim tuung, takuma men ku hawus pim weh som;
po kuk e ning pim lengwal, takuma Got ku mang put pim som; po whis pim li poplong ko, takuma pim men ku huuspit akomen --
ma hunngin tin ta a-Yesus tin Akono men los pim emkusin kokyok kokyok ma pim a kuk e mili mili ton, kuma tunusngin tin ta a-Yesus men ku si in pi mlaeng po pim emkusin maksin kut tumen.

Epo pim tin tunus kuk men men po wa pim sup yanga wili hunngin kokyok kokyok epon tin a-Yesus yan los po pim men, kumali tunusngin tin ta a-Yesus men ku si in pi mlaeng epo pim emkusin tin huu ewin men.
Tumen ma hunngin kha ning kumang mi pim tin paengin men, si tunusngin men kum mi wom.
Ma emiu pim in to wo phepngin then tin ira sakalngin tin panngin nuk kho men taku, “Wo ngo phep, tumen kha nga sakal men,” ti, iis, wala wo pim phep maksin, kha pim a sakal maksin kut tumen,
epo pim a ion i epo yang tin khek a-Yesus tin Akono men kyok si men kha kuli khek pim maksin to a-Yesus ma yang wa pim si nuk to wom enu mara yang ako.

Epo wungin tin mosop e si epo pim men men si epon ku nhio wo wom ako, timen kuma nanaangin tin yang tongin li yanga wili po tin munuman men kha ku ning i ma sam samngin men ku si kol pak pit kumali Got yan si epon men.
Tumen ma pim a kuk si pim ku ning lamang akomen. Aku, elit pim tin tunus e nuk mara so men kuk e malukluk ko, takuma mi pim tin tunus e nuk emin men men kuk e si si homan to ungunan then then li.
Epo won maikngin tin ta pim e malil engun men, tin si ta pim mi elup tin maran hut sok engun men, men in e ning ning moolngin ta pim tin nhum weh u maik weh tumen tin kuli sindak in men.

Epo it men ku mara it nuk po endara tin ku mara it ion i men akomen, si mara it nuk po endara tin ku mara it kon i som men misan. Epo endara tin ku mara it kon i men men to elup tin i engun, si endara tin ku mara it kon i som men men sindak in.

Epo it ion i epon taku mang ausel tin ta it e ung wo mulus men mhukngin, men ku mang ta it tin me hang Got men, tin po tunus ku ning i epo wili hi ewin som men, ta it ta men sindak ung ili wet pi ako.
Epo it kuk mi mang tin iyi men it kuk e sasas to won maikngin, epo mi it weh epo mang tin ta it e api wet pi men ku me pae po it ken moolngin ta men.
Irawin weh, taku it phi moolngin timen kho, men ku po pon ta it tin wiwil men akomen.
Epo it tin kuk mi mang ausel tin iyi men kuk e sasas, ku ken it taku wiwil akomen, si epon ku it wa moolngin ko po sun, kumali endara tin hun ewin men kuli tunusngin kuum i.
Epo yang tin hihi it epo wungin tin wala nuk tumen men Got ako, tin naa it epo Emiun Auluungin ken tosukngin ta tin me paii wo it epo yang ku iso wa endara tin kara men kyok si ta it sulung men.
Tumen ma it men kuk to mi it tin pit nhing men kokyok kokyok, epo it ion i epo minan tin it iso kuk mi emkusin ta it tin mang ta it tin i, it men kuk hin epo yang tin Akono men ako.
Epo it muk muk wo mulus epo wo phepngin, si ku epo maran konngin akomen.
Ma mi it men pit nhing, wai, mi it men tunusngin, epon men tunus weh epo it ku kis mi emkusin tin i, si kuma it li kuk hang yang tin Akono men.
Tumen ma wungin tin it tohuh epon ku si men men nuk ti, tin taku it li kuk hang yang wa it kis hang yang, men ku yang min tunusngin pit po it.

Epo it mosop men ku iso weh si nuk mara ehus tin ta Krais e ku yang ples wungin won men, kumali it then then wa talungin tin ku emhut wungin tin it kuk mi emkusin ma it ning i men, men ku ira wungin ta po then then weh, aku, taku tunus wa taku lengwal wa tumen.

Pim a ion yang tin Akono men tin ku iso ples wungin ta pim men kha pim a uk yang weh ma pim a tohuh epo pim ku phae mi po masang to sun wala kuma po wo hi phep pit wo yang men; wungin tin nuk mi pim men men nuk pi mlaeng to mara Got weh, ma nga hoo mi ngo epon men nuk pi mlaeng to mi wom tin ples wungin ewin men maksin kut tumen ako.

Epo pim men ku pakuh po pim kyok si ta wom akomen. Awu. Pim taku ning i kuma sinsin si ung tin ku wom wangan po pim epon men, kuma wom kuk to wungin tin ku wom phae wungin wet po tin wangan po elit hi tin nuk mara so men engun, si ku wangan po wungin tin nuk mi hi men weh akomen.
Epon taku pim a kuk to tulun hungin tin kis ewin men, men epon ku Got yan si, wa taku pim a kuk to tulun hungin tunus, men epon ku kho wo wom ako.
Epo min epongin tin ta Krais men kha kasum mi pim men, epo mara pim ples wungin ti, taku po then ta hun mut eya po mosop, men e ken po mosop huu kho kut ako,
ma yang hun mut eya po mosop, epon ku po tin iso tunus kuk men ku kuk epon ku ira mi hi tuo hi kyok akomen, si men ku kuk epon ku ira yang tin hun mut eya po ma khek kyok si tunus men min weh.

Tumen ma homani ma li men ku it ion mi wungin ta po ta ira wungin tin ta pi mulus men kyok akomen, aku, kho ma it ira wungin ta pi mulus ma it ion mi wungin ta Krais, takuma homani men ku it ion mi wungin ta yang tumen kyok akomen.
Tumen ma taku po ta in mi Krais, men si pho pongin homan ta, ma endara tin kho men kho li, imen, endara mosop men si homan kut.
Ma wungin tin mosop imen men me hang Got, tin ning i ma it si mi it then to yang kyok yanga wili a-Yesus Krais ma wa kumang si ta pim epo pim ku pok put min thenngin tin imen,

wungin timen men sinsin ti, epo Got men in mi Krais ma Got si min then to po masang to sun wala mosop, epo yang ku wa lasin epo wungin tin po yek ta sun tin siik men ko po po tuo hi akomen, ma yang wa kumang si nuk yanga wili pim paengin epo pim paengin ku pok put sakalngin epo min thenngin tin imen.

Kut ma pim men kuk ken po tin wa sakalngin mi wo Krais weh ma Krais tirih pim li li to sakalngin tin tan men, men e ken Got tuon yuk me pol mi wo pim kha pim a wa pi ta Krais ma pim a hau si wo wom epo wom men ku si mi wom then to Got men.
Epo yang tin pong epo lasin men kha Got ning i ma yang si lasin ta it men, kumali it men ku si wungin siik tin ta Got men mi yang.
Kut ma pim tin lup to kumang to Krais men ku suh mi kinga wom epo wom men ku wa nanaangin tin ta Got men awhat engun asin.

Epo Got men sakal taku, “Mi elup tin epo nanaangin men kha nga hul wet wom men, u ungunan tin epo palolongin men kha nga nhio wo wom min men kut tumen.” Iis, homani kha elup tin epo nanaangin men si in men, iis, kuru homani men elup tin epo palolongin men si in kut tumen.
Epo pim men ku wa endara ta ko nuk soput wom tin ku wom tut po khi wom epon men akomen, epon akuli kumang ta pim men kuli po kuh alelngin si po pim ton.

Si wungin mosop tin pim a sup min men men pim a pakuh po pim ken pim tin kum ta Got men: kokyok kokyok men pim a nuk nhing wet won maikngin maran kiring kiring, u endara tin pim a kalwok epon men maran kiring kiring, u miun tuungngin maran kiring kiring,

u wet wungin tin po wawlauk pim men, u wet wungin tin po kan kan pim men, u wet po tin me tumulung amen engun ewut pim men, u wet kumang tin pim a wuh i men, u epo pim tin mara pim wang si ku nhaung akomen, u epo pim tin kuk e huu elwip men,
u to wungin tin mi yil men, u to maran ekngin tunus, u to wungin tin pim a wuh won maikngin li maran nomalak epon men, u to wungin amunu, u epo Emiun Auluungin, u to min epongin tin irawin weh men,

u epo sakalngin tin anuh weh men, u epo kakhangin tin ta Got men, u to moolngin tin epo lek walngin e ta wungin tin siik men tin nuk ewo wili pim tin api psik men epon ku pim a sewut po epon men u tin nuk ewo wili pim tin ato ilio men epon ku pim a pulum po pim epon men tumen,

u wet wungin tin po wa ya pim si u po wa ya pim ko men, u wet wungin tin po sakal lengwal epo pim u po sakal tunus epo pim men tumen. Po ning wungin epo pim ken pim e torok nginangan, takuma pim men kuk to wungin anuh ako;
po ning i epo pim ken po e pong epo pim, takuma po munuman pon ta pim ako; pim taku huu, ih, pim a iso tunus kuk; po kwat pim ken po taku kot pim, takuma po ku lek pim ko huu yek akomen;

pim a kuk ken po tin mi hi urut hi men, takuma mi pim keh keh kokyok kokyok; pim a kuk ken po tin kalwok weh men, takuma pim a ning i ma po munuman si mimiran; pim a kuk ken po tin endara ta hi om weh men, takuma pim a kasum endara mosop ako.
Auweh, wom tin api Korin men, pim a sakal awo pias nginan weh ko ta wom, pim a klas weh ma wungin tin nuk mi pim men nuk pi mlaeng weh to mara wom ako.
Epo pim men ku pau mi pim epo wom som, si tuo wom kha pau mi wom epo pim men.

Homani ma ngo ku sakal ta wom ken wom tin husanik weh men, epo wom men ku ning wungin emhut sun tin ta pim men siik weh, ma wom klas ma wungin tin nuk mi wom men ku weh si nuk pi mlaeng to mara pim weh.

Wom kuk aku wom klap to po tin ku wo hi phep som e wungin ta hi enginin men asin. Epo wungin tin ia e ku wungin tin siik men u wungin tin po hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men ngong klap wal then? U wungin tin ia e ku pi tin mi mlaeng men u pi tin mi ku men mi ngong then epon kut tumen?
U ela weh ku Krais u a-Nolongin ngong sakal then epon? U ela weh ku po tin wo hi phep men u po tin ku wo hi phep som men si ngong then?

U ela weh ku mang auluungin tin ta Got men u got tin tororokngin men enu hi si mi hi then? Epo wom kha mang auluungin tin ta Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men ako, wala Got wo kho taku, “Ngo men ku in mi po ma nga muk muk lunga po, ma nga si Got ta po, si po men ku si masang to sun wala tin ta ngo men weh.”
Tumen ma “Yang tin Akono men wo taku, ‘Wom mu pol lunga po ma wom lu kuk engini wom weh, si wom kah po endara pon lengwal ta asin, kuma nga wa wom to min nawaehngin,
men ku nga si Wirama wom si wom si husanik masang u wala tumen.’ Yang tin Akono e Apalukngin weh men kha sakal tumen.”

Wom tin mi ngo pit wo wom weh men, it kuk to wo kuk marangin tin mosop imen, tumen ma it men ku mahek po it epo siwulngin mosop tin nuk po it u to mi it tin emiunan men kut tumen, ma it tohuh epo it ku si auluungin weh epo lemngin tin pit wo Got men.
Wom hihi pi ta pim kara tin nuk ta mi wom men, epo pim ku ning i lengwal epo po ta som, wa pim ku mhuk mi po ta som, wa pim ku laluk endara ta po ta som.
Nga sakal tumen epon ku nga wo tumuyup ewut wom akomen. Awu. Epo nga wo kho epo wom men kuk epo mi pim weh kuma it huu then wa it tunus kuk then kut tumen.
Nga sakal si in pi mlaeng epo wom weh. Nga wangan po wom weh. Mi ngo ko li wyu ung epo wom weh. Mi ngo keh weh wet wo maikngin tin mosop e los pim men.

Iis, epo pim a li sup Masedonia, men pim emkusin ku nhing kara akomen. Awu. Won maikngin iso nghen eya pim weh lik kut, epo mara so men hek walngin si si, u mi pim men lemngin kara si mi pim kut tumen.
Takuma Got tin pa nhing po tin mi hi urut hi men ewin men men pa nhing mi pim epo a-Taitus tin me men,

ma ku epo yang tin me men misan som, men epo pa nhingngin tin yang wai in lunga wom men maksin kut tumen. Epo yang me pok pim epo wom tin kuk e hiim ngo men, u wom tin kuk e mi wom urut i men, u wom tin tohuh epon ku haum eya ngo men kut tumen, tumen ma mi ngo keh keh hambip weh.

Epo kisang tin nga pan i ti epo wom kho men ning i ma mi wom luk, aku, ngo ku mi ngo muul i epon som; irawin, muk kha mi ngo muul i men. Epo nga ion i epo kisang tin wala imen kha ning i ma mi wom luk men, takuma men ku in put monlo engun.

Kut si homani ma mi ngo keh, epo wom tin ku mi wom luk kyok akomen, men epo wom tin mi wom luk li wom phae mi wom men. Epo min lukngin tin si mi wom men men ira wungin tin nuk na mi Got men kut, tumen ma wungin ta pim ta ani ku wom wuh i men som.

Epo wungin tin mi it luk ira wungin tin nuk na mi Got men men pong si wungin tin it phae mi it epon men kha kuli it palolongin epon men, min lukngin tin imen men ku mi it muul epon asin. Si min lukngin tin ta pi mulus men men li enun ung hut epo hunngin ewin.

Iis, wom ion i, epo wungin tin wala imen, tin mi wom luk ira wungin tin nuk na mi Got men, kha pong si wom ma mi wom seh seh ta engin u wom sakal mut eya wom, u ya wom sal pit po yang tin ning lasin men, u wom lem pit wo Got, u wom hiim pim weh, u wom tohuh mut eya pim, u wom ning wungin emhut sun tin po ning i lengwal men kut tumen. Wungin tin mosop e wom iran imen men suk mara pim epo wom men lasin om po wom pit mi wungin tin imen.

Tumen ma kisang tin nga pan i ti epo wom kho men, men ku nga pan i epon ku nga nhio wo yang tin ning lasin men weh akomen, wa epon ku nga nhio wo yang tin wuh lasin wet sun men akomen. Awu. Men epon ku to mara Got men ku silan khingngin tin ta pim e epo wom men ku si in pi mlaeng to mara wom weh.

Tumen ma pim a wa pa nhingngin maksin epo pa nhingngin tin wom wai men. Ma mi pim keh keh hambip weh si po pa nhingngin tin imen epo min kehngin tin ta a-Taitus men, epo wom mosop ning i ma yang emiun ko li wyu ung.

Epo kho ma nga wangan po wom si ta a-Taitus epo wungin tin ta wom men, ma homani men ku manngin ko po ngo epo wungin tin imen ta akomen. Awu. Pim tin sakal sakalngin mosop si ta wom kho to wungin tin irawin men, tumen kut kha sakalngin tin pim a wangan po wom si ta a-Taitus men men yang pon tan men irawin kut tumen.
Ma a-Taitus iso min pit pit wom hambip kara kut minan tin yang tulun hu wom mosop tin hul wet yang men, tin wom lem u wom kwat tumen ma wom wa sakalngin me in lunga wom.
Tumen ma homani ma mi ngo keh, epo wo ngo phep pit wo wom weh.
Kut si, ehurok, pim a pok wom epo nanaangin tin ta Got men tin yang wai ko mi palu walngin tin ung e li li wo mulusngin Masedonia men.

Epo po kuk wet won maikngin nhum ta tin karong po men, aku, min kehngin tin ta po e weh si kol mi po men u po tin kalwok weh men tumen kha po wa miranngin hambip weh epon men, ma po naa sun epon amen engun, men ken eki tin tup si ma yuk yuk ko men.
Epo nga pok wom ti, epo endara tin po kuk ton men kha po naa sun epon men, wai, kuru kara ko po sun kut tumen, men po ning i tumen epo mi hi weh,
ma po hau nuk sii khi pim kokyok kokyok epo pim ku wa talungin ta po kuma po nhio wo sun tin wo hi phep e auluungin men to po kara.

Si po ku ning wungin timen ira wungin tin pim a hoo mi pim epon men akomen. Awu. Muk ma po wa hi tuo hi si ta yang tin Akono men, li klet ma po ira wungin tin nuk na mi Got men ma po wa hi si ta pim maksin kut tumen.
Tumen ma pim a suh mi kinga a-Taitus epo yang tin hosi kumang tin epo nanaangin men kho men kha ku yang suuk siin weh lunga wom men.

Kut si homani ma wom tin si pu wal to wungin tin mosop e turunus men -- to wo phepngin, u to sakalngin pok put nginan, u to maran ekngin, u to tohuhngin tin wom tohuh epon weh men, u to min epongin tin ta wom e pit wo pim men tumen -- kha mi pim epo wom men ku si pu wal to nanaangin tin ku wom talu po tin kalwok epon men maksin kut tumen.
Ngo ku wo maran ko klat ma nga sakal tumen akomen, si tohuhngin tin ta po enginin kara men kha nga taku karong min epongin tin ta wom men taku irawin weh epon wa men.

Epo wom pon ta nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men kho kut, tin yang miran, takuma yang ko lungunan engun epon ku yang ut eya wom men, kumali lungunanngin tin ta yang men kha ku wom si mimiran epon men.

Ma talungin tin imen nga wo taku tunus epo wom ku ning i ti, epon men ku nhio wo wom ako, tin taku wom ning wungin tin wom hosin to posan tin kho li men kuru mi wom tunusngin epo wom ku ning i kut tumen,

si homani wom men ku suuk siin ning nginan weh kut tumen. Tumen kuma mi wom tin lup si kho epo wom ku ning kumang tin imen, kha ku homani ma wom suuk siin ning nginan weh kut tumen, men ku wom pok mi endara tin wom kuk ton men ma wom wai si si ta po.

Epon taku min nawaehngin in kho, men ku Got maran ira endara tin esini e po ta in ton men khali yang min tunusngin pit po talungin tin ta po men, si yang ku maran ira endara tin po ku in ton som men ewin akomen.
Epo wungin ta ngo sinsin ku epo po kara tin enginin men wo hi pias, si wo wom maik wom akomen. Awu.

Men epon ku los wom mosop ken wal, epon ku homani ma endara ta wom ku nuk a salok, men ku wom nhio wo po epo endara tin po kalwok epon men, kumali taku endara ta po nuk a salok khama po nhio wo wom epo endara tin wom kalwok epon men maksin, kuma wungin sinsin then los wom mosop.
Wala sakalngin ta panngin nuk ti, “Po tin tamuk i hambip men, men ku misikin ta hi kara pit akomen, u po tin tamuk i sakun men, men ku kalwok akomen kut tumen.”
Nga sam sam Got tin wa wungin ko mi a-Taitus ma yang silan khing pit po wom weh ken ngo men.
Epo yang men hul wet pim tin suh mi kinga yang men ako, takuma yang tuon tohuh weh, ma yang ti epo wom ira min tuon weh.
Ma pim a tih a-Taitus ngong wiro it tin po wangan pon to pok putngin tin tunus men mi palu walngin tin mosop e ung li li yanga pi men,

si ku misa pim som. Awu. Palu walngin tin ung e li li yanga pi men men wo hi ung wo yang maksin epon ku muk muk to pim to talungin tin iyi, tin tihngin si yanga wili pim epon ku yang tin Akono men tuon yan si, kuru epon ku suk mara po epo mi wom tin nawaehngin men kut tumen.
Epo pim men ku lem u pim a karuk weh kut tumen, epon akuli po ta wa lasin ko po pim pit mi talungin tin nhum e in yanga wili pim men.
Epo tulu pim hu wungin kho tin ku in amunu to mara yang tin Akono men, kuru to mara po masang to sun wala maksin kut tumen.

Kuru pim a tih wiro it ta maksin ti to wulong, tin pim a ion kumang tan angan munuman kho ma pim a pon ta wungin tan tin tohuh epo kumang maran kiring kiring men, takuma homani ma yang tohuh weh, epon tin yang won phep hambip pit wo wom men.

Si taku po ta kines epo a-Taitus, yang men tin tuk a klap wal to kumang then tin in lunga wom men. Wa taku po kara kines epo wulong tin ehoro it men, men ku po ion i epo wulong men tin wa wungin mi wo palu walngin tin ung e li li men, tin Krais wa yan pos epo ngong men.

Tumen ma wom men ku suk mara wuluk, kuru wom ning tosukngin to mara palu walngin tin ung e li li men kut tumen, tin pok put min epongin tin ta wom men si in pi mlaeng weh men u tin suk mara po epo wungin tin pim a wangan po wom epon men men irawin weh kut tumen.
Kut si kumang tin nuk yanga wili pim epo po tin wo hi phep e auluungin men, men ku tus nginan epo ngo tin ku pan kisang epo wom men akomen.

Epo nga pon ta min nawaehngin tin ta wom men, tin nga wangan po wom epon si ta po Masedonia men taku, “Po Akaia hihi talungin ta hi mi posan then ta tin kho li men,” ti. Ma wungin tin wom tohuh epon imen seh po ewhat po Masedonia munuman epo po ku hihi talungin tin ta hi men kyok.
Takuma nga tih po ehoro it tin imen, epon akuli wungin tin pim a wangan po wom epon men ku ko min pit, si kuma wom kuk e hihi talungin ira wungin tin nga wo ta wom epon kho men.
Epon akuli yanda po Masedonia kara me to ngo ma ku ion wom tin ku hihi kho som men, men ku manngin ko po pim, kuru wom kut tumen, epo pim tin wangan po wom men.

Tumen ma nga wo taku tunus epo ngo ku wo nut po ehuro it epo po ku kho ti epo wom, ma po hihi wom to talungin tin ta wom e asikia po ngin men, tin wom wo kuk mara po epon kho men, kuma talungin tin imen ku hihingin kho ma maran ken talungin tin ira nanaangin men, si ku suuhngin kaun i mi wom akomen.
Si nga wo ta wom ti, epon taku po ta wha enda sakun kara, men ku lok lok i sakun, si taku po ta wha enda hambip, men ku lok lok i hambip tumen.

Tumen ma po then then men ku wa talungin si ira wungin tin nuk na mi po weh men, si ku to mi po tin kamus men wa ku epo po kara tin me soh ung sin engun men akomen; epo Got min tunusngin pit wo po ta tin wa talungin si to min kehngin men.

Ma Got men kakha epon ku ning i ma nanaangin maran kiring kiring ko po wom hambip takut ako, kuma kokyok kokyok men ku wom kuk to endara mosop tin ku kai wom men ma endara tin ta wom men nuk a salok tin ku wom ning kumang turunus mosop epon men.
Wala sakalngin panngin nuk ti, “Yang naa po amen engun, yang wa talungin si ta po tin kalwok weh men. Wungin siik tin ta yang men men sindak nuk e li kut.”

Yang tin hihi endara ihun si ta po tin ku tep tep i men u beret tin ku po iini men tumen, men ku hihi endara ihun ta wom ma yang wai kara kyok si to sun tin wom tep tep i kho men, ma yang ning i ma wungin tin ta wom e siik men ku enun tin ung e li li hut sun men si hambip weh.
Men ku wom si mimiran to endara mosop epon ku wom nanaa po kara maksin epon hambip, ma wungin tin imen ku ning i ma sam samngin li epo Got epo talungin tin wom wai si yanga wili pim men.

Epo kumang tin auluungin e nuk yanga wili wom imen tin wom ku nhio wo po epon men men ku kai po tin wo hi phep e auluungin men epo endara tin po kalwok epon men, kuru men ku tup si kol ma yuk yuk ko epo sam samngin munuman tin ku li epo Got men kut tumen.

Wom tin nes wungin to mara po epo kumang tin imen kha ku po wa Got yan si epo wom tin ira pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men tin wom pok put men weh men, kuru epo wom tin naa po u po enginin kara tumen hambip men.
Ma mi kinesngin ta po epo wom men ku po hiim wom weh, epon tin Got wa nanaangin hambip ko po wom men.
It men ku sam sam Got weh epo talungin tin ta yang e ku it talok mi sakalngin tin ku it pok put sinsin epon men.

Kut si ngo a-Pol tuo ngo kha ku suh mi kinga wom epo wungin amunu u amlus tumen tin ta Krais men -- ngo tin wom kara wo epo ngo e taku nga in enu mara wom, men nga pauuk ngini ngo engun, si taku nga kis wom men nga sakal amdal ewut wom men.

Takuma nga hau nuk sii khi wom epo minan tin kuli nga kyok me in enu mara wom kyok men, men ku nga in aku nga sakal amdal to mi ngo tin puplet e nga hoo mi ngo epo ngo ku sakal amdal ewut po kara epon men, tin e hi phaeng taku pim e ira wungin tin ta pi mulus men engun.
Epo irawin epo pim men kuk wo mulus to emkusin a pim ako, takuma pim men ku lek wal ira wungin tin ta pi mulus men ewin akomen.
Epo moolngin tin ta pim e pim a lek wal ton men, men ku api mulus akomen, awu, men me hang Got weh ma apalukngin takut epon ku uus enda tin po hang pul pul i ung po sa men me ko.

Pim a wa wungin tin po mara hi iran men maran kiring kiring u endara mosop tin po wai si ili awon men tumen tin po taku klet put soput tin ku po mara hi pon ta Got epon men uusngin me ko, ma pim a kan kan wungin mosop tin nuk mi po men epon ku kyok me ira wungin ta Krais.
Ma pim a hihi pim kho epon taku wungin tin wom ku hul wet wungin ta pim men klet kut, khama pim a ning wungin emhut sun mosop tin po kara ku hul wet pim som men.

Epo wom men kuk e ion endara tin nuk mara so men engun. Si taku po ta won phep ken i e tuon ta Krais men, men ku tulun hu epo wungin ta min tuon kyok taku, yang tin ta Krais weh men, tumen kut kha pim a ta Krais weh men maksin kut tumen ako.

Aku, epon taku nga iso wangan po pim epo emhong tin yang tin Akono men wai ko ta pim epon ku pim a khek wom si nuk nhing, si epon ku pim a mhuk wom epon kyok akomen, takuma ngo men ku manngin wa ngo epon akomen.
Epon akuli wom ion ngo ken ngo e taku uluu mi wom epo kisang tin nga pan i ti epo wom men.

Epo po kara sakal taku, “Kisang tin a-Pol pan i men men to wungin mamaik u apalukngin kut tumen, si yang tuon in mi it to yang emkusin, men yang in e malungan engun u sakalngin tin ta yang men men amiron nginan engun kut tumen,” ti.

Po tin wo tumen ku tulu hi hu wungin tin ti, epo wungin tin pim a kuk ton ma pim a pan kisang ti epo wom minan tin pim a kis kis lunga wom men kha kuli pim a kuk ton ma pim a iran weh minan tin kuli pim a kuk lunga wom men.

Epo pim men ku phuk mi wungin engun ma pim a wo epo pim e khuuk wal pit mina po tin wangan po hi tuo hi men wa pim a kai pim to po tin imen akomen. Si po men kuk e kai wungin ta hi tuo hi epo hi tuo hi, u po kuk e ion mi wungin ta al lunga hi tuo hi kut tumen, epo po men mhin ekngin ta hi om kha men.

Si pim men ku wangan po pim li yek ta kaingin tin ut eya pim men akomen. Awu. Mi enunu tin Got won ung won ku ut pim men kha pim a wangan po pim epon men, epo enunu tin imen wom Korin weh men kuk min kho kut ako.
Epo pim men ku yek ta kaingin tin ut eya pim ken emhong tin ta pim e ku li ut po wom men akomen, epo wom kha pim a me epo wom to pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men ako.

Si pim men ku yek ta kaingin tin ut eya pim ma pim a wangan po pim to kumang tin po enginin kara wuh i ning nginan men akomen. Si pim a hoo mi pim ti, epo wo phepngin tin ta wom e ku iso ung e si po sun li men kha kuli kalungin tin ta pim e pim a kum min men ku ung e huu li nhum epo wom,
kumali pim a pok put pok putngin tin tunus men wo mulusngin tin ung wetpo wom men, epon akuli pim a wangan po kumang tin po enginin ta suuk siin ning nginan mi kalungin tin tan weh men.
Si “taku po ta ku wangan po wungin ta, men ku wangan po yang tin Akono men weh.”
Epo po ta tin tuon pakuh pon men ani ku Got wo epon e tunus men akomen, si po ta tin yang tin Akono men tuon pakuh pon men kha yang wo epon e tunus men.
Auweh, nga hoo mi ngo epo wom men ku mara wom ain ma wom hul wet ngo tin ku pok wungin tin ulil men kara, ken sun tin wala wom kuk e ning i homani men.
Epo nga kos kos eya wom to kos kosngin tin me hang Got men. Epo nga sop wom to yang masang ta kho, men Krais, kuma nga pau wom li ung ta yang ken wut wala tin po lolo i nuk mang men ta.
Takuma nga lem, epon akuli yanda tamha tin kusamuh Ewa kho epo kusamuhngin tin tan men, tumen kut kha kuli po ta pses mi wom ma wetpo wom wa wungin tin ku mi wom pit wo Krais then ta misan men.

Epon taku po ta me pok put a-Yesus yan enginin ta epo sun tin pim a pok put wungin epon kho men, wa taku wom wa emiun enginin ta epo sun tin wom wai kho men, wa taku wom hul wet pok putngin tunus enginin ta epo sun tin wom hul wet kho men tumen, men ku wom mang ta po tin imen si po ning i tumen awo mlus nginan engun!
Epo nga phaeng taku tuo ngo men ku in ti ko kara wet po paengin tin po sikia hi e ya hi pos weh e kuk kho men akomen.

Aku, taku ngo ku wo ngo po elel to sakalngin pok put nginan som, takuma nga iso marango ek wungin ako. Iis, epo wungin mosop tin pim a ning i lunga wom kho men men pim a suk mara wom epo wungin tin imen si nuk pi mlaeng to mara wom weh.
Iyi, nga ning lasin tin nga wa ya ngo in ti ko si kuma ya wom si, epo ngo tin pok put pok putngin tin tunus e ta Got men si ta wom hut emul engun men, wah?
Nga tip endara mi palu walngin enginin kara epo ngo tin wa nhio wongin hang po kuma nga kum ta wom engun men.

Kuru minan tin kho li ma nga in to wom ma nga kalwok men, men ku nga wa won maikngin ko po po ta som. Epo endara tin nga kalwok epon men men po tin ehuro it e me Masedonia men kha kaini si ta ngo men. Ma wungin mosop men nga karut ngo ton weh, epon akuli nga wa won maikngin ta ko po wom, ma ngo ku iso in e ira wungin tin tumen weh.
Wungin anuh tin ta Krais e in mi ngo men kha nga tung tung eya ngo weh epo po ta ku klet epo ngo epo wangan pongin tin imen pi tin ung e li li mili wo mulusngin Akaia men akomen.
Epo ele? Epo ngo ku mi ngo pit wo wom som, wah? Awu. Got ion i epo ngo men mi ngo epo wom ako.
Kut si wungin tin nga in e ning i men kha ku nga iso in e ning i kut men, kuma nga nghen soput ta po tin taku pon soput ta tin ku po wangan po hi ken po e kuk pit mina wungin tin ta pim men.
Epo po tin tumen men paengin torokngin, tin kusamuh nginangan men, ma po si sing hi e taku paengin ta Krais irawin.
Ma it men ku teret wo wungin timen asin, epo a-Nolongin tuon men si sing i ken tihngin tin ta pi mi mlaeng men ta ewin.

Tumen ma ku wungin enginin ta som tin taku po tin kum ta a-Nolongin men si sing hi ken po e tin kum ta wungin tin siik men. Epon sulung men kuli po wa wungin emhut sun tin ira wungin ta hi weh men kyok ako.

Nga sakal kyok ti, epo po ta wom ta men ku phaeng wo engin taku ngo e to wungin ulil asin. Wa taku wom phaeng wo wungin timen, aku, men ku wom wa ngo ken ngo e po tin in to wungin ulil men ta, kuma nga wangan po ngo sakun kara engun.
Wungin tin wo ngo phep ma nga wangan po ngo epon imen, men ku nga sakal i ira wungin tin ta yang tin Akono men som, si men nga sakal i men ken i e ulil men engun.
Epo po munuman wangan po hi ira wungin tin ta pi mulus men, tumen ma ngo maksin kut.
Epo wom men wuh wungin ta po tin wungin ta hi ulil men to min kehngin engun, epo wom men wo taku wom e mara wom ek!

Epo wom men wuh wungin tin taku po ta wa wom li wuh kumang tan, wa taku po ta me kusamuh wom ma tauluk endara ta wom mosop li, wa taku po ta me tip endara ta wom, wa taku po ta wai si pit, wa taku po ta me wilin hik hik suu wom tumen.

Manngin ko po pim ma nga sakal nuk ti, epo pim men elit pim huu ma ku pim a ning i tumen akomen. Si wungin tin tun tira e po ta ku phuk mi sakalngin engun ma wangan pon ton men, men nga phuk mi sakalngin ma nga wangan po ngo epon maksin kut tumen (auh, wungin tin tumen men nga sakal ulil kha men).
Iyi, ma po e api Hibru, wah? Epo ngo kut. Wa po e Israel, wah? Men ngo kut. Wa po e Abraham khuuknginin, wah? Wai, men ngo kut.

Iyi, po e kum ta Krais, wah? Auh, homani ma nga sakal ulil ta ti, epo ngo men kum ta Krais hambip weh epo po ako. Epo kumang tin nga wuh i men men nhum weh epo po, u po paplai ngo angan munuman ma ku nga tiik i akomen, u po kan kan ngo li wo ngo maik ngo angan munuman kara kut, u hunngin topo mi ngo angan munuman weh kut tumen.
Po Yuda wawlauk ngo tin angan khum miuk u mnal me sup tumen (39) men angan eip weh.

Angan miuk men po paplai ngo epo niak niakngin; angan ta men po tup ewut ngo epo enah; angan miuk men imut tin nga saa won men in e muu to ngo; to pi luk ta u to pi mhangin ta men nga in e muu tak li malang;

nga muk muk li pi tin ung hin men angan munuman. Nga ning wo lalaingin put eki angan munuman, nga ning wo lalaingin epo po tin kaun nuk ira so ma ku talak ngo men angan munuman, nga ning wo lalaingin yanga wili po Yuda tin pim a khuuk wal then men angan munuman, nga ning wo lalaingin yanga wili po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men angan munuman, nga ning wo lalaingin mi enunu tin nunhum e ung e li li men angan munuman, nga ning wo lalaingin pi tin tahunggu men angan munuman, nga ning wo lalaingin yanga wiu angan munuman, u nga ning wo lalaingin lunga po tin wo epo hi e pim a irit won mi Krais takuma hi torok men angan munuman kut tumen.

Nga wuh kumang weh li elit ngo hun angan munuman, angan munuman men ku nga nhaung som, nga in e hun elip u hun eki, nga kalwok epo endara aiingin angan munuman, u nga kot kot ku nga kalwok epo endara tin ku nga pang po ngo epon men tumen.

Won maikngin tin si po ngo u los ngo timen, kuru wungin tin hukut mi ngo ungunan then then kokyok kokyok men, men silan khingngin nhum tin ta ngo e pit wo palu walngin tin mosop e ung e li li men men los ngo maksin kut tumen.
Iyi, ara won wiak, men ku wo ngo wiak ton som? Iyi, ara po ta taku ning i ma plong ko mi lasin, men ku mi ngo kakhat sun pit won akomen?
Si taku tunus epo ngo ku wangan po ngo, men ku nga wangan po wungin tin pok put ngo tin wo ngo wiak men engun.
Got tin Wirama a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, tin ku po sam sam i kokyok kokyok li kut men, men ion i epo wungin tin nga pok put imen, men ku nga torok epon akomen.
Epo pi Damaskus tin nhum men phua tin kum wet wili Aretas tin sinkhaung ta hi men wo ma po kuk e haum mara enunu to po nolo maran min ta, epo po mi hi epo po ku kasum ngo.
Takuma nga ko li ung mi eyel ta ma po yuh ngo plek put pi won tin ta enunu men ta li ko, ma nga meleng hut wili yang tin sinkhaung e taku kasum ngo men.

Wungin men ku weh nuk ti epo ngo tin ku wangan po ngo men, takuma men ku nhio wo po ta weh akomen, aku, ngo ku kyok me sakal kara epo enun yolngin tin marango plal ma nga ion i men u wungin kaunngin kara tin yang tin Akono men pok put si ta ngo men kut tumen.

Ngo men pon ta yang ta tin in mi Krais men men posan khum ta u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen kho li (taku yang e ku in mi emkusin, men ku nga pon tan som, wa taku yang ku in wetpo emkusin, men ku nga pon tan som kut tumen, si Got misan kha pon tan men) yang tin in tumen kha uusngin si ma weh li pol wet pi tin me miuk angan men.
Ma nga pon ta yang tin in tumen (taku yang e ku in mi emkusin, wa taku yang ku in mi emkusin som, men ku nga pon tan kut tumen som, si Got misan kha pon tan men)
epon men uusngin li si epo pi Paradais tin pon lungin weh men ma yang hul sakalngin tin auluungin weh e po talok min epon ku po pok put men, tin uluungin epo po tunus ta tin ku pok put men.
Po ta tin in tumen kha ku nga wangan pon men, si ngo ku wangan po ngo tuon akomen. Awu. Ngo tin wo ngo wiak to wungin maran kiring kiring men misan kha ku nga wangan po ngo epon men.

Epon taku mi ngo epo ngo ku wangan po ngo, takuma ngo men ku si ken po tin wungin ta hi ulil men ta asin. Epo ngo men ku sakal irawin misan engun. Takuma ngo men ku mang si nga wangan po ngo asin, epon akuli po ta ku ion ngo ken ngo e nhum epo wungin tin po ion ngo tin in ton men u po hul ngo tin sakal i men tumen asin.

Kuru epon akuli nga yek ta kaingin tin siik men ma nga pakuh po ngo si nhum weh to wungin kaunngin tin munuman weh e si si ta ngo men, tumen ma endara tin ngin si si put sun men ta wangin ko ta ngo, men tihngin ta a-Nolongin ta tin ku me songhu pit wo ngo men, epon akuli nga yek ta kaingin tin siik men ma ngo men ku pakuh po ngo si nhum weh asin.
Epo endara tin imen nga hau li nuk sii khi yang tin Akono men angan miuk epon men ku klokngin hang ngo li.

Takuma yang ko wo ta ngo taku, “Nanaangin tin ta ngo men men kai ngon ako, epo kakhangin tin ta ngo men men si pyu pongin weh mi po tin wo hi wiak wiak men.” Tumen ma wungin tin mi ngo nawaehngin epon weh men men ti, epo ngo ku mi ngo keh keh weh ma nga wangan po ngo to ngo tin wo ngo wiak wiak epo wungin maran kiring kiring men, epon kumali emhong tin ta Krais men ku weh me ung po ngo.

Tumen ma mi ngo nawaehngin epo ngo tin wo ngo wiak wiak to wungin maran kiring kiring men, u wet po tin mimi ngo men, u epo ngo tin kalwok kokyok kokyok men, u wet won maikngin tin maran kiring kiring men, u epo wungin tin miu ngo tuung wet e maran kiring kiring men kut tumen, tin nga wuh i mut eya Krais men. Epo minan tin wo ngo wiak wiak men, kha nga si apalukngin weh men.

Auh, ngo men si ulil kut khae epo wungin tin nga wangan po ngo epon men. Epo wom tuo wom kha pae wo ngo ma nga ning wungin timen. Epon men tunus epo wom kha ku wangan po ngo men. Epo wungin ta men ku nga me sulung epo po tin sun sikia hi e paengin tin ya hi pos weh men akomen, aku, ngo men ku in amiron nginan engun.

Iis, epo tosukngin tin pok put ngo epo ngo e paengin irawin ta men men ningngin me lunga wom to wungin tin nga pit nhing wet won maikngin li maran nomalak men, men me to tosukngin maran kiring kiring u wungin tin ateret wo nginan men maran kiring u wungin tin apalukngin men maran kiring kiring kut tumen.

Epo wungin tin ia weh e ku wom ko kuk amiron nginan epo palu walngin tin kara men? Awu. Si wungin tin then imen men ti, epo tuo ngo men ku wa maikngin ko po wom weh akomen? Auh, po som men ku mang ta lasin ta ngo tin i engun!

Homani men angan tin me miuk angan e nga hihi epo ngo ku ti epo wom men kut khae. Ma ngo ku wa maikngin ko po wom som. Epo ngo ku me epo ngo ku wa endara tin ta wom men ta som, si nga me epo ngo ku wa wom weh. Epo po hoin ani ku halung po pakuh pongin ta wiraman ngong tonin men som. Awu. Epo wiraman ngong tonin kha ku halung po pakuh po ngin ta husani ngong men ako.

Ma ngo men ku mi ngo keh keh weh epo ngo tin ku uspo endara mosop tin ta ngo men kuru ngo men ku mi ngo alang si ngo tuon kut tumen epon ku nga nhio wo enu wom epon weh. Aku, mi ngo tin pit wo wom men ung e li si weh kut, si mi wom tin pit po ngo men ku ung e me ko wet sun tin ta ngo men engun.
Irawin, epo ngo men ku wa maikngin ko po wom akomen. Si po ta wom kara wo epo ngo e kikik si wungin, ma nga torok mara wom kha nga kasum endara ta wom men!
Iyi, po tin nga tih hi ti epo wom to wungin amui men ani ku nga kasum endara ta wom kara me yanga wili hi ta men, wah?

Epo nga wo nut a-Taitus, ma nga tih wiro it ta si to yang ma ngong ti. Iyi, a-Taitus men wo amui nuk mara wom ma tip endara ta wom kara, wah? Iyi, pim tin muk muk lunga wom men men to emiun then ako, wah? Iyi, pim men muk muk ira ewi al tunus weh ako, wah?

Iyi, kyok ma wom phaeng taku pim e taku sakal mut eya pim nuk mara wom, wah? Awu. Pim men sakal to mara Got mi Krais weh. Si wom tin mi pim pit pit wo wom men, wungin mosop tin pim a ning i men, men pim a ning i epon ku khek wom si nuk nhing ako.

Epo ngo men lem, epon akuli nga ti pon ta wom, men ku nga pon ta wom tin kuk to wungin tin ku mi ngo epon som men, kuru ngo men ku in to wungin tin ku wom ku mi wom epon som men kut tumen. Epon akuli heek walngin, u wungin tin mi wom heh wet po kara men, u mi wom tin lup si to min kakhat sun men, u wom tin tohuh epo wungin ta wom tuo wom men, u wom tin wa sakalngin pit wo po engun men, u wom tin anin sakalngin pit wetpo po ewin men, u wom tin ning nenenngin men, u wom tin kuk e tumulung sup mi al engun men tumen ku kara nuk lunga wom.

Epon akuli nga kyok ti, men ku Got tin ta ngo men wa ya ngo ko lunga wom, ma mi ngo urut i epo po munuman tin ning lasin kho si ku hi phae mi hi som epo wungin tin min lengwal men, u elwanngin, u wungin tin po mi hi teng si epon ku po ning wungin lengwal epon men tumen tin po kuk e ning i kho men.
Angan tin me miuk angan men wala ngo ku ti epo wom homani men. “Mi wo wulong ponwal wa wuluk khaut miuk tin ku pok put wungin men kha ku sakalngin put then then mosop kha ku kaek singin epon men.”

Nga wo ta wom kho, kuru nga wo ti kuk mara wom kho angan tin ponwal iyi ken ngo e si in enu mara wom weh men. Ma homani ma ngo ku in lunga wom som men nga pan sakalngin kha ti epo po tin ning lasin kho men, kuru epo wom tin kara maksin men kut tumen, epon taku nga kyok ti, men ku ngo ku sakal amang ta wom kyok akomen.

Epo wom kuk e tohuh epo wom ku ion tosukngin ta tin kakaek wungin sinsin epo Krais tin sakal me pol mi wo ngo men. Epo Krais ku tus wom, men ku yang won wiak akomen, si yang men apalukngin ma in lunga wom ako.

Irawin, epo kho ma Krais won wiak ma po poo poo yang si kuk put sa wlong put wal, si li homani men yang tunus in epo emhong tin ta Got men. Epo pim kut men kuk mi yang ma wo pim wiak wiak kut tumen, si pim men ku iso tunus kuk to yang epo emhong tin ta Got e ku pim a tus wom epon men ako.

Wom karong wom tuo wom wet epo wom e taku kuk to wo phepngin wa pi om. Wom ion mi wungin ta wom weh. Iyi, wom iso pong epo wom tuo wom tin a-Yesus Krais in mi wom men, wah? Si taku wom karong wom tuo wom ma wom huuspit, men ku yang in mi wom som.
Takuma ngo men tuo ngo hoo mi ngo epo wom ku ion i epo pim tin tuo pim karong pim men, men ku pim a huuspit akomen.

Kut si homani ma nga kines Got epo wom ku ning wungin lengwal ta kyok asin. Takuma sinsin epo tuo pim tin ku kuk ken pim e ku nut wungin ion mi nginan men som, si epon ku wom ning wungin tin amunu men weh. Aku, taku wom ion pim taku pim e ku nut wungin ion mi nginan ta pim som, aku, men tunus ako.
Epo pim men ku kakha kuma pim a ning wungin ta ewut sakalngin tin irawin men akomen, si epon ku pim a nhio wo sakalngin tin irawin men misan.
Epo mi pim keh keh minan tin wo pim wiak, si wom si nuk nhing men. Ma wungin tin pim a kines Got epon men wala ti, epo Got ku ning wom si kuk tunus weh.

Tumen ma ngo ku in lunga wom som ma nga pan wungin tin i nuk ti, epon akuli nga in lunga wom ma nga sakal si ta wom to sakalngin tin ngeng ngeng men, tin ku nga sakal to emhong tin yang tin Akono men wai si ta ngo epon ku nga khek wom si pit nhing, si men epon ku ngo ku mhuk mi wom epon akomen.

Ha kut, ehurok, ngo ku suuk sii sakalngin kut khae, ma ngo ku yuk tunus ti epo wom. Wom men ku si kuk tunus weh, u wom men ku pa nhing wal weh, u wom si nuk to mi wom tin then men, u wom si kuk to wungin aminis weh kut tumen. Ma Got tin sinsin epo min epongin u min wyungin men tumen ku in to wom weh.
Ma wom men ku wa mi wom si ta al epo tumum wongin tin auluungin men ta.
Po masang to sun wala mosop tin auluungin e ta Got men wa mi hi ti epo wom.
Nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men, u min epongin tin ta Got men, u min thenngin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men tumen ku in to wom mosop. Men irawin.

Ngo a-Pol tin paengin men ta, (si ngo ku tihngin me hang po masang to sun wala kara wa epo po tunus ta akomen. Awu. Epo a-Yesus Krais u Got tin Wiraman men tumen tin khek yang mi po tin huu kho men kha tirih ngo me men).
Kuru po ehuro it mosop tin pim a kuk then men kha tirih kisang tin iyi men ti epo palu walngin tin ung e li li yanga pi Galesia men kut tumen.
Nanaangin u min wyungin tumen men ku weh me ko po wom hang Got tin Wirama it men, u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men kut tumen,
tin min alang siin tuon mut eya lasin ta it epon kumali yang ira mi Got tin Wirama it men ma yang klok it mi elup tin i e wungin lengwal kuk epon homani men.
Got tin imen kha ku po wai yan si in kokyok kokyok li kut men. Men irawin.
Nga teret wo wom tin kerek e wetpo wom wa yang tin yuk wom epo wom ku kuk mi nanaangin tin ta Krais men, si wom lu ira pok putngin tunus enginin ta.
Si ku ken pok putngin tunus ta maksin ta in som, takuma po kara kuk e ning i ma wom kamus, ma po taku phae pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men li ulil.
Si taku pim wa tihngin api wet pi ta wa tumen, ku pok put pok putngin tunus ta si ta wom ma me ie sun tin pim a pok put si ta wom kho men, mi ngo epo Got ku ngil ngil i engun.

Epon men kho ma pim a pok wom epon kho kut men, khali nga wo i kyok iyi, taku po ta in e pok put pok putngin tunus ta si ta wom ma me ie sun tin wom wai kho kut men, mi ngo epo po tin imen ku Got ngil ngil i engun.

Epo ngo taku tohuh homani kuma po tunus ani ku mi hi saah pit po ngo, wa Got, wah? Wa nga taku wa wa mi po tunus, wah? Epon taku ngo ku iso in e wa wa mi po tunus engun, men ngo e ku kum wo Krais akomen.
Kut si ehurok, mi ngo epo wom ku ion wungin tin nuk ti, epo pok putngin tunus tin nga pok put kho men men ku sinsin in epo wungin tin po tunus mara hi iran tunus weh men akomen.
Epo ngo ku wai hang po tunus kara, wa po ta ku kot ngo epon akomen. Awu. A-Yesus Krais tuon kha pok put si in pi mlaeng epo ngo men.
Epo wom hul kho epo wungin tin nga in e ning i kho men, tin nga ira wungin tin pim Yuda wo pim nuk wet men, men nga in e mumhek mi palu walngin tin ta Got men kara kut ma nga taku mhuk min engun.

Ma wungin tin pim Yuda wo pim nuk wet men nga in e li muk epo po munuman lunga pim tin pim a khuukngin mi elup then men pit min, tin nga iso tohuh kara kut epo ngo tin ku ira wungin tin po tin yau a pim siin men tin pim a ung e khuuk wal ton me men.
Taku li klet ma Got tin nga iso in yek mi kuma inu ma yang won ung wo ngo kho ma yang yuk ngo epo min sukngin tin tan men, minan tin yang tuon min nawaehngin

epo yang tin ku pok put Wirun si in pi mlaeng in mi ngo weh kumali nga li pok put yang lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, men ngo ku kerek e sakal to po tunus kara wet kuma po pok ngo tun tira men akomen.
Kuru ngo ku li ili Yerusalem hang po tin si paengin muk kho epo ngo men akomen. Si ngo men siik li Arabia muk wet, anima nga kyok mili pol Damaskus.
Li klet ma posan miuk kho li, anima nga li si Yerusalem epon ku nga li pon ta a-Pita, ma nga li tuk a in ungunan khaut eip miuk misan.
Takuma ngo ku pon ta po paengin tin kara men akomen, si a-Yemis tin wiro sun tin Akono men misan kha nga li pon tan men.
Wom hul, epo sakalngin tin nga pan i ti epo wom iyi, men nga sakal to mara Got weh epo ngo ku torok akomen.
Li klet ma nga li pol wo mulusngin Siria to sun Silisia.
Takuma po tin palu walngin ta Krais e ung e li li wo mulusngin Yudia men men ku hi me ion marango kara kho akomen.
Si po kuk e hul wungin misan engun tin nuk ti, “Yang tin mumhek mi it kho men kha homani ma in e pok put wo phepngin tin kho ma yang taku mhuk min men,” ti.
Ma po wa Got yan si epo ngo.
Kut ma posan khum ta u mnal me nuk wo sun, tumen, kho li, anima tuk a-Barnabas a kyok li si Yerusalem, kuru a-Taitus men pyuk a li to al kut tumen.

Ma Got tuon kha suk marango ma nga li si Yerusalem men, ma nga suk mara po epo pok putngin tunus tin nga in e pok put lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men weh ko nuk pi mlaeng to mara po, men nga ning wungin timen to mara po tin hi e akokono men tin pim a kuk ta tuo pim weh men, kuma nga ion i weh taku kumang tin nga saa ton homani wa kho men tumen, men kuli sinsin om asin.
Kuru a-Taitus tin tuk a me in men men api Grik, takuma po ku soh ung si yang tin ku mutngin men akomen.
