Si wungin tin imen si epon tin po wa sun ehuro it tin kuk to torokngin men kara me sup men, men me sup kaunngin engun epon ku me waheking it kha men, epo wungin tin wo it pias epon mi Krais Yesus men, kumali po wa it kyok li sup ma po wa maikngin kyok ko los it ako.
Takuma pim men ku hul wet wungin tin ta po men sakun kara kho akomen. Awu. Men pi angun weh, si kumali wungin tin irawin e ta pok putngin tin tunus men men ku iso in to wom weh li kut.

Si po tin mara hi ken hi e akokono men, (aku, taku po e tuni, men ngo ku sila ngo khing epon som, epo Got men ku ples wungin maran enginin epo po kara ewin som), si po tin mara hi ken hi e akokono men ku hi sakal sakalngin homan ta ko pit hut sun tin ta ngo men minan tin pim a palu wal men akomen.

Awu. Po men ion i epo Got wa pok putngin tunus tin ta po tin ku mut wal ewin som men ko ta ngo kuma marango pit won ta yang, wala kai sun tin Got wa pok putngin tin tunus e ta po tin mut wal ewin men ko ta a-Pita kuma yang maran pit won ta sun kut tumen.

Epo Got tin emhong tan siin iis mi a-Pita epon ku yang wa kumang tin ta po paengin men ma yang li epo po tin mut wal ewin men, wala emhong tan siin iis mi ngo epon ku nga wa kumang tin ta po paengin men ma nga li epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men maksin kut tumen ako.

Ma a-Yemis u a-Sipas u a-Yon tumen, tin ya ngyuk ken ngyuk e lapalakan men, ngyuk ion nanaangin tin Got naa ngo epon men, ma wuluk wa wili ngyuk tin ato sa men, tin pok put wuluk tin mi ngyuk then to tuk men, si ta tuk sun a-Barnabus, men pok put wuluk tin mi ngyuk then to tuk epo tuk men ku li epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, si wuluk men ku li epo po tin mut wal ewin men.
Si wungin then ta kha wuluk kines tuk epon ku tulu tuk hu pit po po tin kalwok weh men. Iis, wungin tin wala imen kha mi ngo seh seh ta engin epon ku nga ning i men maksin kut tumen ako.
Taku li klet ma a-Pita me pol Antiok, ma nga wo si mara yang, epo yang men in epon ku po wo los po yang.

Epo po kara ku kho me hang a-Yemis men som, si a-Pita in e ii endara to po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men. Si po kho me pol hang a-Yemis kut, men yang osong li in hin epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, epo yang lem pit wo po tin kuk mi sun tin me hang a-Yemis men tin tita hi e hi mut wal ewin men.
Kuru po Yuda tin kara men men ira yang to wungin amo tin imen kut tumen, li ma wungin timen ek mi a-Barnabas kut, ma yang li ira po ton.

Si nga ion po tin ku muk muk ira wungin tin irawin e ta pok putngin tin tunus men siik som men, khama nga sakal si ta a-Pita to mara po mosop taku, “Ngon men api Yuda ako, ma taku e ira wungin tin ken sun ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, si ku ken sun tin ta po Yuda men som, taku tuni ma e puh si po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men epo po ku me ira wungin tin siin e ta po Yuda men epo ele?”
Epo it men khuuk wal pit minal Yuda weh, si it ku khuuk wal pit mina po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som e ning lasin nginangan men akomen.

Ma it ion i epo po ta ku si in siik to mara Got epo wungin sinsin tin ku iran siik men akomen. Awu. Men epo wo phepngin tin pit wo a-Yesus Krais men misan. Tumen ma it kut men wo it phep pit wo Krais Yesus kho, kumali it men ku si kuk siik weh epo wo phepngin tin pit wo Krais men, si ku epo wungin sinsin tin ku it iran siik men akomen. Epo wungin sinsin tin ku po iran siik men men ku po ta si in siik epon akomen.
Si taku it taku si kuk siik to mara Got epo Krais, ma minan timen it pon ta it tin kuk to lasin men, men ku it wo tua? Iyi, epo Krais ani lasin si epo kumang tin tan men, wah? Awu. Men pi angun weh!
Epon taku nga ning endara tin nga ninhien i kho men kyok si, men nga ning ngo si ken po tin hik put wungin sinsin men ta kha men.
Epo wungin sinsin tuon kha nga hun tan kho kut men kumali nga tunus in ta Got misan.

Ngo men hun to Krais put sa tin wlong put wal men kho, si nga iso tunus in ako, si tunusngin ta ngo tuon ani ku nga tunus in ton kyok men akomen, si Krais kha tunus in mi ngo men. Ma tunusngin tin nga in ton wo mulus homani men, men nga tunus in ton epo wo phepngin tin pit wo Got Wirun men, tin min epo ngo weh ma min alang siin tuon mut eya ngo men.
Ngo ku wa nanaangin tin ta Got men li nuk engun akomen. Epon taku wungin tin siik men me epo wungin sinsin, men Krais tin hun men men sinsin om ako.

Auh, wom Galesia tin wungin ta wom ulil men, ara ngil ngil mi wom ma wom ku ira wungin tin irawin men kyok som? Epo nga pok put sakalngin epo a-Yesus Krais si in pi mlaeng to mara wom kho kut, men kai wom e mara wom kon yang tin poo poongin si kuk put sa wlong put wal lunga wom weh men.
Wungin then ta misan tin mi ngo epo ngo ku hul i mi wo wom men wala ti, iyi, wom wa Emiun Auluungin epo wungin sinsin tin wom iran siik men wa epo wom tin hul sakalngin to wo phepngin men, wa tua?
Iyi, wom e leleke weh ani wom hosi wungin epo Emiun Auluungin, si homani ma wom taku suuk sii wungin epo kakhangin tin ta wom tuo wom men, wah?
Iyi, wungin munuman tin wom wuh i kho men men wom wuh i engun, wah? Epo nga hoo mi ngo epo wom ku wuh i engun akomen.
Tumen ma yang tin naa wom amen engun epo Emiun Auluungin u emhong ta yang siin iis mi wom men, men yang ning i epo wom tin ira wungin sinsin siik men, wa epo wom tin hul to wo phepngin men, ie?
Tumen wala Abraham won nuk wet sakalngin ta Got ma Got maran iran ta yang ken i e wungin siik men.
Tumen ma wom men ku ion i epo po tin kuk mi wo phepngin men misa hi kha husani Abraham men.

Ma Panngin Auluungin ion wungin kho tin Got kuli iso kuh wungin siik ko po po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men epo wo phepngin men, kha Panngin Auluungin pok put pok putngin tin tunus men ko ta Abraham kho taku, “Ngon kha kuli po mosop tin ung e li li e hi khuuk wal ta hi weh men ku wa emhong tunus mi wo ngon men.”
Tumen ma po tin kuk mi wo phepngin men kha wa emhong tunus to Abraham tin won phep nginangan men.

Epo po mosop tin hing wo wungin sinsin epo hi e taku si kuk siik epon men, men hi kuk wet ngil ngilngin tin ta wungin sinsin men ako. Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk taku, “Ngil ngilngin men ko po po mosop tin ku som e ira wungin mosop tin panngin nuk mi kisang tin to wungin sinsin men kuma po ning i.”
Si po ta tin ku weh si in siik to mara Got epo wungin sinsin akomen, men si in pi mlaeng ako, epo “po tin wungin ta hi siik men men ku tunus in epo wo phepngin misan.”
Si wungin sinsin men ku ta wo phepngin akomen. Awu. Epo “po ta tin ira wungin sinsin mosop weh men misan kha ku tunus in epo wungin tin imen.”

Krais men kiis li mut eya it epo ngil ngilngin tin ta wungin sinsin men epo yang tin si ngil ngilngin mut eya it ta men. Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk ti, “Ngil ngilngin men ko po po mosop tin si kuk put sa men.”

Got ning i tumen kuma emhong tunus tin ta Abraham men men ku ko klet po po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men mi Krais Yesus, kumali it mosop men ku wa wungin tin Got wo kuk mara it epo it ku wa Emiun Auluungin epo wo phepngin men.

Ehurok, ngo ku sakal ira wungin tin po tunus iran wo mulus men: taku wungin siin ta kaekngin nuk lunga wulong ponwal, aku, men ta po tunus engun, si taku si kaekngin kut, men ku po ta hik put wa sum sum sakalngin enginin ta me pit hut sun kyok akomen.

Epo Abraham u po tin khuuknginin ta yang men ta kha Got wa wungin tin yang wo kuk mara wulong epon men ko ta ngong men. Got ku sakal ta Abraham taku, “u men ku ta po khuuknginin tap” ti som, e taku maran ken i e ku munuman men som, si Got wo taku, “u ta khuuknginin tap ta,” e maran ken i e po then ta misan, epon men Krais kha men.

Nga wo ti, epo wungin siin tin Got kaek i to Abraham kho epon ku pit li pol Krais tin ku me men, men ku wungin sinsin tin si in mi posan khum khum mnal u khum myuk tumen (430) sulung epo sun men hik put emhong tan akomen, ken i e taku ning i ma wo kuk marangin tan kuli siin iis akomen.

Epon taku moolngin tin ku Got pakuh po it epon men ku me epo wungin sinsin, men ku me epo wungin tin Got wo kuk mara Abraham epon men kyok akomen. Takuma Got wa moolngin tin imen ko ta Abraham epo wungin tin yang wo kuk mara sun epon kho men ako.

Tumen ma ela sinsin tin wungin sinsin ku pit epon men? Wungin sinsin tin imen men sum sumngin me pit hut sun tin Got kaek i to Abraham men pit mi wungin sinsin hik put nginan, epon ku in tumen weh li pol minan tin kuli khuuknginin tin then ta e Got wa wo kuk marangin tan si ta yang men tin kuli me men. Ma wungin sinsin tin imen Got won ung wo po tihngin kara tin ku hi wai ko ta po tunus yanga wili yang then ta tin in emin men.
Si po ta tin in emin men men ku in emin po then ta ewin akomen, si Got tin wa wungin tan ko ta Abraham men men then.

Ma taku tumen, men nga wo taku wungin sinsin men nolo wungin tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men, wah? Awu. Men pi angun weh! Epon taku Got ku wa wungin sinsin ta ko nuk tin ku wa tunusngin si ta it epon men, men wungin tin siik men men ku me epo wungin sinsin tin imen weh ako.
Takuma Panngin Auluungin men nghen po po mosop me sup wet lasin, kumali sakalngin tin Got wo kuk marangin epon mi a-Yesus Krais men men ku ko ta po tin wo hi phep men weh.
Si wo phepngin men ku kho si som, si wungin sinsin in e haum eya it, men nghen epo it weh li pol minan tin kuli wo phepngin ku iso me lasngin si in pi mlaeng sulung men.
Tumen ma wungin sinsin men ken po tin kum wo sun e mara hi pit wo sun hoin men ta it ta, men in kuma pau it li epo Krais, kumali it si kuk siik epo wo phepngin.
Kut si wo phepngin men kho me kut, men ku it kuk wet po tin kum wo sun e mara hi pit wo sun hoin men ta kyok akomen.
Epo wom mosop men si wiru Got epo wo phepngin tin pit wo Krais Yesus men.
Epo wom mosop tin wom wa baptais ko mi Krais men men phi Krais ken moolngin ta men kha men.

Mi Krais men takonngin tin ku nuk lunga po Yuda to sun Grik, u lunga po tin kum wo sun men to sun tin wo hi pias men, u lunga po masang to sun wala tumen men om. Epo wom moyong men kuk then mi Krais Yesus ako.
Ma taku wom men ta Krais weh, men wom men khuuknginin tin ta Abraham men kha men, ma wom men tin ku wa pakuh pongin ira wungin tin Got wo kuk marangin epon men.
Si nga wo ti, epo po ta tin ku wa pakuh pongin men, aku, po men ku iso si phuan ma maran pit wo endara mosop, takuma men iso hoin, ma men ku iso in ken po tin kum wo sun men engun.
Yang men ku in wet wili po tin haum eyan u po tin mara hi pit wo endara ta sun men tumen weh li pol minan tin kuli wiraman won ung won men.
It kut men kuk tumen, minan tin kho ma it kuk ken po hoin men, men wo it maik it wet wungin sinsin tin ta pi mulus men kara engun.
Si pi ung e lap me pyu pongin kut, men Got tih Wirun me pol, men wut wala ta kha khuuk yang men, men me khuukngin wet wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men,
epon kuli kiis i mut eya po masang to sun wala tin kuk wet wungin sinsin men, kumali it men ku wa emhong tin ta po tin Got kuh husanin masang ko po hi men.
Ma wom tin si husani Got tin masang men kha Got tih Emiun tin ta Wirun men me ko ma in e li li mi wom men, men me yuk mi wom taku, “Aba, Yok,” ti.
Tumen ma ngon men ku in ken po tin kum wo sun engun men ta kyok akomen, si ngon men in ken Got wirun men ta, ma taku ngon e Got wirun ta, men ku e wa pakuh pongin tin ta Got men epo Krais weh.
Si irawin, epo minan tin kho e wom iso pong epo Got men, ma wom kum wet got kara tin hi ku kuk pit mina Got tin irawin men weh akomen.

Si homani ma wom pon ta Got kho kut, si tunus epo ngo men ku wo taku Got kha pon ta wom kho kut men. Si tua ma wom phae kyok lu epo wungin sinsin tin ta pi mulus e luk engin u lengwal engun tumen? Iyi, wom taku wo wom maik wom wet wungin tin imen kyok engun, wah?
Wom men kuk e wuh epo wom ku ira ungunan kara, u namih kara, u elup kara, u posan kara, tumen, weh kha men.
Nga lem epo wom, epon akuli nga wuh kumang tin ku mut eya wom men engun asin.
Ehurok, nga hau nuk sii khi wom epo wom men ku si ken ngo men, epo nga si in ken wom men. Kho men ku wom men ning lasin ta epo ngo som.
Wom ion i epo kho minan tin elit ngo ku nhing weh som men kha nga pok put pok putngin tin tunus men si epo wom ewo maran men.
Ma karongngin tin si ta ngo e nuk po elit ngo kho men men ku wom mimi ngo wa mut ngo ton akomen, si wom wa ngo ken ngo e tihngin ta Got men ta, u ken ngo e Krais Yesus tuon men tumen.
Tumen ma min tunusngin tin wom kuk ton kho men ani a? Epo nga pok put wungin si in pi mlaeng epo wom, epon taku tumen, men ku tuo wom soslok mara wom kho, ma wom wai mu si ta ngo.
Tumen ma ngo e ku si nolongin ta wom kho epo ngo tin pok put wungin tin irawin men si ta wom men, wah?
Po tin imen kuk e tohuh epo po ku wa wa mi wom, si ku epo wungin tunus ta akomen. Wai, po taku klet eya wom epo pim, si kuma wom tohuh epo wom ku ira po misan.
Si men tunus epo wom tin ku tohuh epo wom tin ku ira wungin tin tunus men sumsum ako, si ku minan tin nga in enu mara wom men misan akomen.
Husanik tin hohoin men, tin wo ngo maan to wom ken wut wala ta tin ku wanhung men, ngo men ku wo ngo maan to wom weh li pol minan tin ku Krais ung e hoh mi wom si men.
Mi ngo epo ngo ku in to wom homani ma nga phae mi haungin ta wut ngo, epo ngo men mi ngo ponwal to wom.
Wom pok ngo wet, wom tin taku kuk wet wungin sinsin men, iyi, wom e ku hul wungin sinsin som, wah?
Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk epo Abraham men husanin masang ponwal, wi ta men wut wala ta tin kum wo sun men khuuk i, u wi ta men wut wala ta tin won pias men khuuk i kut tumen.
Yang tin ta wut tin kum wo sun men men ko khuukngin pit mina po tunus elit hi, si yang tin ta wut tin won pias men men ko khuukngin pit mina wo kuk marangin tin ta Got men.

Wungin tin mosop imen men wungin emol ta, epo wulong tin wala men los po wungin siin tin ponwal e nuk lunga Got to po tunus men, wungin siin tin ponwal imen ta me ko put pi Sainai, men ken wut wala tin khuuk sun ko mi won maikngin men, men e-Hagat ako --
epo e-Hagat tin imen men los po put pi Sainai tin ung wo mulusngin Arebia men, men kai Yerusalem tin ung homani ma ung e won maik i to husanin men --
si Yerusalem tin ung ili awon men men won pias, ma men toni it mosop.

Epo sakalngin men panngin nuk taku, “Ngon tin wala e wop ek ngon epo ngon tin ku khuuk sun hoin men, tin homani ma ku wop maan epo sun khuuk nginan kara akomen, ngon men ku mang ta mip ma e yuk hambip to min kehngin! Epo wut tin wala e in engun men men husanin ko munuman epo sun tin wala e titien in men.”
Si ehurok, it men ku kuk ken husani wungin tin Got wo kuk mara Abraham epon men wala ku ken Aisak men.

Si minan tin imen yang tin ko khuukngin ira wungin tin po tunus khuuk wal pit mina elit hi men men ning i lengwal epo sun tin khuukngin pit mina emhong tin ta Emiun Auluungin men, kha homani kut men wungin tin imen men iso in.

Takuma Panngin Auluungin men wo tua? Men wo taku, “Ngon men ku luul to wut tin wala e kum wo sun engun men to wirun lu, epo yang tin wiru wut tin kum wo sun engun men men ku wa pakuh pongin to sun tin wut tin wala e won pias men khuuk i men kara akomen.”
Tumen ma, ehurok, it men ku husani wut tin kum wo sun engun men akomen. Awu. It men husani wut tin won pias men ako.
Tumen ma wom men ku nuk nhing mi won piasngin tin Krais ning i ma wo it pias epon kho men, si wom kuk aku wom kyok lu kan kanngin wet epus tin wo wom maik wom wet kho men.
Wom hul, epo ngo a-Pol kha wo ta wom men, epon taku wom mang si po mut wom, men ku kumang tin ku Krais nhio wo wom epon kyok men men pi om.
Nga pok put wungin kyok si ta po mosop then then tin mang si po mut sun men, epo naumngin ta wungin sinsin men pit pon epon ku iran mosop iso.
Ngon tin taku si in siik epo wungin sinsin men, ngon men kho lu in hin epo Krais kut. Ngon men plong ko kho ma e lu in hin epo nanaangin tin ta Got men.
Epo emhong tin ta Emiun Auluungin men kha wo it phep ma it kuk e hoo mi it epo it tin kuli iso si kuk siik weh men ako.

Epo mi Krais Yesus men ku wungin tin po mut wal ewin men wa wungin tin po ku mut wal ewin som men tumen, men ku nhio wo it kiak kara akomen, si wo phepngin tin ning kumang tan epo min epongin men misan kha ku nhio wo it men.
Kho ma wom whal tunus, si homani ma ara klet put soput ta wom kyok ma wom ku ira wungin tin irawin men kyok akomen?
Wungin tin po kara taku wa wa mi wom epon imen men ku me epo yang tin yuk wom men akomen.
Yiis sakun kara engun men ning i ma beret mosop iit si nhum takut.

Wo ngo phep pit wo wom mi yang tin Akono men epo wom men wungin enginin ta ku nuk mi wom som. Si yang tin wungin tan mhuk mi wom men ku iso lat wungin tin ku Got ples i emhut sun tin tan men iso ako, yang tin imen ku ara weh men ku nga pon tan som.

Si, ehurok, taku irawin epo ngo men iso in e pok put wungin epo po tin ku mut wal weh men, si tuni ma po iso ning i lengwal epo ngo? Epon taku nga pok put sakalngin tumen, men ku sa wlong put wal tin mhuk mi po men put mut kho kut ako.
Mi ngo epo po tin mhuk mi wom ewin men men ku mhuk hi elit hi tuo hi weh!

Epo, ehurok, Got men yuk wom epo wom ku lu sup mi wungin tin ku wo wom pias epon men kho kut ako. Takuma wom kuk aku wom phaeng wo won piasngin tin imen ken i e ku sinsin epo wom tin ku ira mi wom tin kho men kyok asin, si wom men ku mi wom epo al ma wom ning kumang ta al tunus weh.
Epo wungin sinsin mosop men kaingin epo sakalngin then ta, wala nuk ti, “Ngon men ku mip epo po tin ung porili ngon men ken ngon tin mip epo ngon tuop men.”
Si taku wom kuk e koh koh wal u kuum kuum wal tumen, men ku wom haum, epon akuli wom kuum kuum wom mosop li om to al engun!
Si nga sakal ti, epo wom men ku muk muk mi wungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men, men ku wom kai wungin tin mi wom tin kho men sangelek epon men kyok akomen.

Epo mi it tin kho men sangelek wo wungin tin nolo Emiun Auluungin men, kuru Emiun Auluungin men sangelek wo wungin tin nolo mi it tin kho men, ma wulong men pakik khung wal, wala wom ku ning wungin tin mi wom epo wom ku ning i men som men.
Si taku Emiun Auluungin li muk wom, men ku wom kuk wet wungin sinsin kyok akomen.
Si kumang tin mi it tin kho men tohuh epon men men wala ti: wungin tin ku po sup si khi al epon men, wungin elwanngin, wungin tin min lengwal men, wungin tin po ning sasayihngin tin to manngin men,

wungin tin po uluu got tin tororokngin enun men, u wamngin, u min lengwal pit wo po, u heek walngin, u tohuhngin lengwal tin nuk mi po men, u wungin tin po mi hi teng si men, u wungin tin po mi hi pakuh po hi engun epon men, u wungin plit pit wo al, u takonngin nuk lunga po,

u min heh wet po, u po lek sun ko huu, u wungin tin po um ma po mara hi hi nginangan men, u sasayihngin maran kiring kiring, u wungin kai sun tin imen kara kyok kut tumen. Wungin tin mosop imen nga anin wungin si ta wom epon homani ken sun tin nga anin si ta wom kho men, epo po tin ning wungin tin tumen men kuli wa pakuh pongin mi enunu tin ta Got men akomen.

Si wungin tin si enun ung hut emhong tin ta Emiun Auluungin men wala ti, min epongin, min kehngin, mi wyungin, pit nhing wet won maikngin li maran nomalak engun, wungin amunu, wungin tin po ning i tunus epo sun men, wungin anuh,
maran ii, u karut i to wungin tunus kut tumen. Wungin tin mosop imen ku wungin sinsin ta uluu it epon ta akomen.
Ma po tin ta Krais men men poo poo mi hi tin kho men pit put sa wlong put wal to min pit pit po wungin u min sangelekngin maran kiring kiring tumen tin tan men kho kut.
Taku it tunus kuk mi Emiun Auluungin, men ku it muk muk ira Emiun Auluungin khin maksin kut tumen.
It men ku wa ya it si pit to wungin tin it seh po ewhat po wa mi it heh wet sun epo al men engun asin kut tumen.

Ehurok, taku po ta men wom pon tan in e ning wungin yek ta sun tin siik men ta, men ku wom tin Emiun Auluungin kasum mi wom men mara wom ii ma wom nemeh i kyok si in tunus, si ngon men ku marap pit wo ngon tuop tunus, epon akuli karongngin si tap maksin kut tumen.
Wom men ku lul won maikngin ta po ta wom kara, ma wungin tin tumen kha kuli wom kai wungin sinsin tin ta Krais men epon men.
Epon taku po ta phaeng taku i e yan pos, takuma men yan kis, men torok maran tuon kha men.
Si po mosop then then men ku ion mi kumang tin tan tuon weh men, men kuli tuon ku min keh pit po kumang tan tuon, si ku min keh pit po kumang tin tan e ku kaini to po kara men akomen.
Epo it mosop then then men ku lat endara ta it maran kiring kiring then then ta it weh.
Po ta tin hul wet kotngin epo sakalngin tin ta Got men men ku pok mi endara tan mosop tin turunus men ma naa sun tin kot i men epon kara.
Wom kuk aku wom torok mara wom tuo wom, epo po ta men ku kakha epon ku hut nuu Got akomen. Epo endara tin tuni e po ta ku wha i men, tin imen kha kuli lok lok i pit mina sun men ako.

Epo po ta tin in e wha wha endara ira min tin tan e kho men men kuli lok lok i elit tin pon whuk men pit mina sun tin kho men ako, si po ta tin in e wha wha endara tan ira Emiun Auluungin men men kuli lok lok tunusngin tin sindak men pit mina sun tin ta Emiun Auluungin men ako.

Ma it men ku mi it mokongin minan tin it ning wungin tin tunus men asin, epo minan tin po hung namih ton men ku si, khama it lok lok endara ako, tin taku mi it ku ning lamang som po endara tin ku it ning i men.
Tumen ma taku pi min ek tunus ta pit, men ku it ning i tunus epo po masang to sun wala mosop, si it men ku ning i tumen epo po tin it khuuk wal mi wo phepngin then men weh.
Wom ion panngin tin tingit nunhum e nga pan sakalngin ti epo wom epon men, men to po wili ngo weh kha imen!

Po mosop tin taku ning tosukngin tunus kara pit po elit sun men po tin imen taku soh wom epo wom tin ku mut wal men, takuma po ning i tumen epon akuli sun ning i lengwal epo po pit mi sa wlong put wal tin ta Krais men.
Epo po tin mut mutngin kho men men ku tuo hi ira wungin sinsin weh akomen, si po taku mut mut wom epon kumali po wangan po hi epo elit wom engun kha men.

Si mi ngo epo Got tuon men ku uluu ngo weh epo ngo tin ku wangan po endara enginin ta men asin. Awu. Sa wlong put wal tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men misan, epo yang kha wungin tin ta pi mulus men hun to yang put sa wlong put wal epo ngo men, u nga hun to yang pit put sa wlong put wal epo wungin tin ta pi mulus men kut tumen.
Epo mi Krais Yesus men ku wungin tin po mut wal ewin men wa wungin tin po ku mut wal ewin som men tumen men ku nhio wo it kara akomen, si pho pongin tin homan men misan kha ku nhio wo it men.
Ma po mosop tin hi muk muk ira wungin siin tin imen, men ku min wyungin u min sukngin tumen ko po po, kuru men ku ko po po Israel tin ta Got weh men kut tumen.
Homani ma li kut men ku po ta dus ngo kyok asin, epo tosukngin tin ta a-Yesus tin Akono men los po elit ngo.
Ehurok, nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men men ku weh in to emiu wom. Men irawin.
Ngo a-Pol tin paengin ta a-Yesus Krais epo Got min men kha ti kisang tin iyi ti epo wom tin auluungin e ung Epesus men, tin kuk to wo phepngin ta wom anuh mi Krais Yesus men:
Nanaangin u min wyungin tumen tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen men ku ko po wom.
Sam samngin men ku si epo Got tin Wirama a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, tin wa emhong tin emiunan mosop kuk ili wet pi mi Krais men ko po it men,
wala yang won ung wo it mi Krais muk kho epo yang tin pho po endara mosop tin hihingin nuk kut men, kumali it men ku kuk auluungin weh u wungin om po it to mara yang to min epongin,
epo yang min wai kho epo yang ku kuuh husanin ung po it epo a-Yesus Krais kuma it men ku ta yang siik weh, men yang ira min tunusngin tin nuk ta min weh men kha yang ning i tumen,
kumali sam samngin men ku si epo moolngin tin ta nanaangin tin ta yang men, tin yang naa it epon ma yang min nawaehngin pit po it mi Wirun tin yang min epon weh men.
Mi yang kha wo it pias epo yang enghikan tin yang kiis li mut eya it epon men, men wungin yek ta sun tin siik men klokngin kha men, men si ira nanaangin tin ta yang e pu wal weh men,
tin yang yuk yuk i ko po it hambip weh to mhin ekngin u wungin ples nginan tunus tumen mosop.
Epo yang pok put wungin kaunngin tin nuk ta min men si ta it kho ira wungin tin yang tuon min tunusngin epon men, tin yang hihi i kho mi yang tuon men,

epon kumali hihingin tin ta elup tin ku sun mosop ung e wiewi al li ponsol epon men ku si, men ku Got palu endara mosop ta yang me kuk then mi Mesaia, men endara tin kuk e li li ili wet pi men kuru endara tin kuk e li li wo mulus men kut tumen, men ku me kuk then mi yang.

Kuru mi yang kha it wa moolngin tin Got pakuh po it epon kho men maksin kut tumen, epo yang min wawai kho ira hihingin tin nuk ta mi Got tin ning wungin mosop ira wungin tin Got min tuon maran iran men,
epo it tin wo it phep pit wo Krais muk epo po kara men men ku kuk epon ku Got wa sam samngin mi wo it epo moolngin tin tan men.

Wom kut men wo wom phep pit wo yang sulung epo wom tin hul sakalngin tin irawin men, men pok putngin tunus tin wom palolongin epon men; kuru wo wom phep pit wo yang kho kut, anima wom wa tosukngin tin Emiun Auluungin tin yang wo kuk mara wom epon kho men, men tosuk to wom epo wom men ta yang siik weh,

men Emiun tin kho me paii po it epo Got tin ku iso pakuh po it epo moolngin tan tin kara e kuli iso me men, tin ku it kuk e kaeng epon weh li pol minan tin kuli po mosop tin Got kul i tan men ku wo hi pias weh men.
Tumen ma ngo kut men nga hul epo wo phepngin tin ta wom e pit wo a-Yesus tin Akono men u epo min epongin tin ta wom e pit po po tin auluungin mosop men kut tumen,
men ngo ku nhing epo ngo tin ku sam sam Got epo wom men akomen, si nga in e sikia ya wom mi kinesngin tin ta ngo men,

epo Got tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, tin Wirama it e sinsin epo moolngin men, ku wa emiun tin epo mhin ekngin u epo pok put wungin kaunngin men tumen si ta wom mi maran ekngin tin ta wom e epo yang men,

men ku mara wom tin nuk ta mi wom men pi mha nuk pon kho kuma wom ion enda tin yang yuk wom epo wom ku hoo mi wom pit pon men u wom ion moolngin tin nhum weh e yang ku pakuh pongin ton mi po tin auluungin men,
u wom ion emhong tin ta yang men tin nhum weh tua ma me epo it tin wo it phep men, men ira tohuhngin tin ta kakhangin tin ta yang e apalukngin weh men,
tin sin iis mi Krais minan tin yang khek sun mi po tin huu kho men kyok si tunus ma yang wa sun li ung ewo wili yang tin ato sa men ili wet pi,

ili awon weh epo emiun tin mara hi pit wo sun men mosop, u emiun tin emhong nuk si wut hi men mosop, u emiun tin auwesngin men mosop, u emiun tin akokono men mosop tumen, kuru epo ya po mosop tin po sikia hi men, tin po sikia hi mi elup tin iyi, kuru po ku sikia hi mi elup tin ku iso me men kut tumen.
Ma yang wa endara mosop me sup wet khi sun, ma yang wa sun tin ku si maran pit wo endara mosop men si ta palu walngin,
tin Krais emkusin men, tin yang tin in mi endara mosop ma kol min men kha kol weh mi palu walngin men.
Ma wom men kho ma wom huu mi wungin yek ta sun tin siik men u lasin kut tumen,

tin kho ma wom muk muk iran ira wungin tin ta pi mulus men u ira yang tin maran pit wo hi tin emhong nuk si wut hi e hi kuk e li li put pi tin alilil men, men emiun tin homani ma emhong tan siin iis in mi po tin khuuk wal pit mina wungin tin po pang po hi nginangan men,

tin angan kara kho li men it mosop kuk lunga hi ma it karut it to wungin maran kiring kiring tin mi it tin kho men sangelek epon men, ma it pyu po wungin tin mi it u tulu it sangelek epon men, ma it khuuk wal pit minal epo yan salngin tin ta Got men ku me epo it, ken po tin kara maksin men kut tumen.
Taku li klet ma Got tin min sukngin tan hambip men, sinsin epo min epongin tin ta yang e nhum weh e yang min pit wo it epon men,
aku, minan tin it huu mi lasin kho kut men, takuma yang ning it si tunus then to Krais kyok (epo nanaangin kha wom palolongin epon men),
ma yang khek it si to al, ma yang wa it si ko ung e li li to al ili wet pi mi Krais Yesus,
kumali mi elup tin ku iso nuk e me men men ku yang wa wungin tan si in pi mlaeng tin yang naa it epon hambip weh epo wungin tin yang ning i tunus epo it mi Krais men.
Epo min sukngin kha wom palolongin epon epo wo phepngin men, men ku epo tuo wom akomen. Awu. Men talungin ta Got ako,
men ku me epo kumang kara akomen, epon takuli po ta wangan pon.
Epo it men kuk ken kumang tin Got nut i ning nginan men, tin yang pho po it mi Krais Yesus epo it ku ning wungin turunus kara, tin Got hihi i kho ma nuk kuma it muk muk min men.

Tumen ma wom men ku tulu wom hu i epo wom men angan ta kho ma po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men kha wom kuk tumen ta elit wom tin tumen -- tin po tin hi sikia hi tin mutngin epo mutngin tin po tunus wili hi ning i ewin men men hi sikia wom po tin ku mut wal ewin som men --

tulu wom hu epo minan tin imen wom plit pit wo Krais, u wom kuk wetpo emhong tin po Israel pakuh pongin epon wet wili po phuan tin ta hi men, u wom pong epo wungin siin tin kara e Got kakaek i to wo kuk marangin lungan to po men tumen, ma wungin tin ku wom hoo mi wom epon men om u wom kuk hin epo Got tumen wo mulus tin i.
Si li homani mi Krais Yesus kha wom tin minan ta kho ma wom kuk hin men kha Got wa wom kho me kuk tikayung kyok epo Krais kalolwan men.
Epo Krais tuon kha it ung aminis to al epon men, epo yang kha ning i ma wulong likiong si then kyok men, ma yang ninhien enunu tin nuk emin ma pok mi wulong men ko kut,

ma yang emkusin tin hun men kha yang mlis ekwha tin nuk lunga wulong men epon men; ekwha tin imen men sinsin in epo wungin tin maran ko klat e nuk e li li mi sun tin Got hihi i ma ko nuk men, kumali wulong tin ponwal imen kha ku yang pho po po tunus homan ta mi yang tuon epo wulong tin si klap wal men, ma wungin tin tumen kha yang ning i ma wulong ung aminis to wal epon men,
kuru yang ning i maksin ma wulong likiong si mi ngong then to Got mi emkusin then ta epo sa wlong put wal tin ta yang men, ma wungin tin imen kha yang ning i ma ekwha hun epon men.
Ma yang me ma yang pok put wungin aminis si ta wom tin kho ma kuk hin men u si ta po tin kho ma po kuk tikayung men kut tumen.
Epo yang kha tong likiong soput ta tong tip nuk epo Emiun then ta tin li epo Wirama it men.

Tumen ma homani men ku wom kuk ken po tin kilangin men wa ken po tin api enginin men kyok akomen, si wom men kuk ken po tin nopuan to po tin auluungin men u ken po tin kuk mi sun e wom khuuk wal mi mang tin ta Got men kut tumen,
tin ningngin kho si ung wo mang sinsin tin po paengin u po pokngin tuo hi tumen, ma a-Yesus Krais tuon men enah tin nhum e ung mang siin emol men.
Mi yang kha mang mosop me pit hut wal tunus ma mang ung e si ken mang auluungin ta mi yang tin Akono men.
Mi yang kha wom kut men ung e ningngin si to al kuma wom ung ken mang ta tin ku Got ung min epo Emiun tin tan men.
Sinsin tin imen kha ngo a-Pol tin po kan kan ngo pit mi ngo tin kum ta Krais Yesus epon ku nga nhio wo wom tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men
ih, epo nga wo taku wom e hul kho epo kumang tin Got wai ko ta ngo kho epo ngo ku marango pit wo nanaangin tin ta Got men, tin yang wai ko ta ngo epo wom men,
tin yang tuon las wungin tin kaunngin nuk men si ta ngo, ken sun tin nga pan wungin put kiak kara engun epon kho men.
Wungin tin imen taku wom tiik i, men ku wom ion ngo tin marango ek wungin kaunngin tin epo Krais men sinsin tunus ako.

Wungin kaunngin tin imen men elup kara tin kho li men men ku pok putngin si ta po tunus tin khuuk wal wo mulus men ken homani ma pok putngin epo Emiun Auluungin si ta po paengin u po pokngin tumen tin auluungin e ta Got men akomen.

Wungin kaunngin tin imen wala ti, epo po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men men ku si ken po tin wa pakuh pongin to sun men, men ku kuk mi emkusin then ta, ma po pok mi endara tin Got wo kuk mara po epon mi Krais epo pok putngin tin tunus men.
Pok putngin tin tunus imen kha nga si po ta tin nga kum tan men epo talungin tin epo nanaangin tin ta Got men, tin yang wai ko ta ngo epo kakhangin tin ta yang e emhong tan siin iis in mi ngo men.

Ngo tin in wet po tin auluungin e hi kuk wet sun tin kara men kha Got wa nanaangin tin imen ko ta ngo men, kumali nga pok put sakalngin lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men epo miranngin tin ta Krais e ku it pon tan sinsin weh akomen,

ma nga wa wungin si in pi mlaeng to mara po masang to sun wala mosop ma po ion endara tin ela weh e po pok pok min then mi wungin kaunngin tin imen. Wungin kaunngin tin imen men to elup mosop tin hosingin ma ung e lap me men men kaunngin nuk na mi Got tin pho po endara mosop yanga wili a-Yesus Krais men,

kumali homani men ku mhin ekngin tin maran kiring kiring e ta Got men men ku si in pi mlaeng epo palu walngin to mara emiun tin mara hi pit wo sun men to sun tin emhong nuk si wut hi men pi tin nuk e li li ili wet pi men.
Wungin tin mosop imen si ira wungin tin sindak nuk na mi Got men, tin yang pyu pon ning nginan mi Krais Yesus tin Akono ta it men.
Mi Krais kha soput ta it tip nuk tin ku mi it puplet ma it li pol ta Got awo phepngin engun epo wo phepngin tin pit po yang men.
Tumen ma nga kines wom epo wom men ku kuk aku mi wom hunngin epo won maikngin tin nga lat i mut eya wom men, epo won maikngin tin imen kha wom wa moolngin epon men ako.
Wungin sinsin tin imen kha powut ngo ko suul mara Wirama a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men,
tin po mosop tin khuuk wal ta hi e hi khuuk e li li wet pi u wo mulus men kut tumen men yang yan ung e li li wo po mosop.
Nga kines yang epo yang ku naa wom ira moolngin tin ta yang e hambip weh men, kuma wom wa emhong ma wom nuk nhing epo yang Emiun mi wom tin emin weh men,

kumali Krais bing in e li li mi wom epo wo phepngin. Tumen kuma wom tin ku nuk nhing mi min epongin ken sa tin imut ko kasum mulus ma pit nhing men u ken mang ta tin ung wo mang sinsin tin ung nhing men tumen,
kha ku mara wom pe mi min epo ngin tin ta Krais men to po mosop tin auluungin men, men min epo ngin tin min nhum weh u nomalak weh u ewum weh u nomalak li si weh tumen,
kuma wom ion min epongin tin ta Krais men, tin ku it hik e mara it pem sin weh men akomen, kumali Got ku kol mi wom ma yang tenge mi wom weh.
Homani men ku yang tin kakha epon ku ning wungin hambip weh tin si nhum epo sun mosop tin it kines epon u mara it iran men tumen, ira emhong tin tan e siin iis ung mi it men,
yang tin imen kha ku po wa yang yan si mi palu walngin mi Krais Yesus weh li pol mi elup tin ku po iso ung e khuuk wal min men, tin ku ung e lap li men. Men irawin.

Tumen ma wungin tin mosop imen kha ngo a-Pol, tin in mi yang tin Akono men kha po kan kan ngo epon men, wo nut wom epo wom men ku muk muk mi wungin tin kai sun tin Got yuk wom epo wom ku iran men tunus weh men.

Wom men ku ning i tumen to wungin tin klet po wom mosop e wom pauuk ngini wom epon weh u wom ning wungin amlus men tumen, to wungin tin wom wuh wungin epo al li maran nomalak epon men, u mi wom epo al ma wom ning i amang epo al kut tumen,
men ku wom tohuh epo wom tin ku kasum min thenngin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men mi wungin tin nuk aminis e kan kan wom to al weh men.
Krais emkusin men then ta u Emiun Auluungin men then ta, wala Got yuk wom kuma wom lu sup mi hoo mingin then ta tin yang yuk wom epo wom ku hoo mi wom pit won men;
kuru yang tin Akono men men then ta, u wo phepngin men then ta, u baptais men then ta kut tumen;
kuru Got tin Wirama it mosop men, tin in ili awon epo it mosop, u klet in lunga it mosop, u in e li li mi it mosop kut tumen, men then ta misan kut tumen.
Si nanaangin men ko ko ta it mosop then then ira kaingin tin ta talungin tin ta Krais men kho kut,
wala sakalngin put ta men panngin nuk taku, “Minan tin yang li si ili awon men yang kan kan po munuman tin hi lek wal men ma yang muk po li si, ma yang wa talungin kara si ta po masang to sun wala.”
(Si wungin tin “Yang li si” men, men sinsin ku suk mara it epo wungin enginin ta som. Awu. Men suk mara it epo muk men yang li ko weh ko li wet mulus kho wet ako.
Yang tin li ko men wala maksin li si wet pi tin nuk ili awon weh epo sun mosop men, kuma yang klet in mi endara mosop.)
Ma yang tuon kha wa po kara e ku si paengin, u po kara e ku si pokngin, u po kara e ku si pok put pok putngin tin tunus men, u po kara e ku si mara hi pit wo sipsip ma kot sun nginangan men tumen.
Yang ning i tumen kumali po tin auluungin men ku wa endara mosop tin ku po ning kumang ta Got epon men, kumali Krais emkusin ku hi khek wal si kuma si pit nhing weh,

men ku pit nhing tumen weh li pol minan tin kuli it mosop sup mi min thenngin tin wo it nuk wet sakalngin then u mara it ek Got Wirun weh men kut tumen, li ma it si ken po tunus ta tin si nomuru kut men, weh li it si kai Krais tin si nomuru weh men, ma Krais si kol weh mi it.

Tumen kuma homani ma li kut men ku it kuk ken po hoin men kyok akomen, tin esap psik wal i to po li u me tumen, u kotngin maran kiring kiring wa po mili mili ken eip tin hik sup wet wal men tumen, sinsin men in epo kusamuhngin tin ta po tunus men, tin po mhi hi ek sakalngin ma po sakal lang po ngi al epo wungin kara tin po taku ek ek mi sun epon ma sun mang ta soput ta hi nuk epon men.
Si it tin ku kuk e pok put sakalngin tin irawin men to min epongin men kha wungin mosop tin it ning i men kha ku it si nomuru mi yang tin emkusin mhin men epon men, men Krais ako.

Krais tin mhin men kha emkusin tingit tin kara men sum sum pit hut wal tunus epo yang u kan kanngin to al epo elik mosop tin kasum sun men ira emkusin tingit then then tin nut kumang tan weh ning nginan men, ma yang ning i ma emkusin ung e plok si nhum li ma emkusin khek i tuon si pit nhing epo min epongin.

Tumen ma ngo tin in mi yang tin Akono men kha nga sakal u nga pok put wungin epon ti, epo homani ma li men ku wom muk muk kyok ken po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, tin muk muk mi tulun hungin ta po tin wungin irawin om min men asin.

Epo mi po tin ples wungin sinsin men men pi mi ku awhus i, epon tin po kuk awetpo nginan epo tunusngin tin ta Got men, epo wungin tin po pong epon nginangan e nuk mi po men, epon tin po mara hi tin ung mi hi men tin mara hi mhi men.

Po men elit hi ku maeng po sun tin po ning lasin epon men akomen, tumen ma po mang ta hi sup mi wungin tin po wile ning manngin epo mi hi engun men, kuma po tohuh epo wungin tin min lengwal e maran kiring kiring men to min wawai tin klet mi po men.
Si wom men ku hul kotngin epo Krais kho ira wungin tin tumen akomen,
tin taku irawin weh epo wom e hul wet yang kho ma wom wa kotngin mi yang ira ewi sun tin irawin e in mi a-Yesus weh men.
Kotngin tin imen wala ti, epo wungin tin wom iran kho ewin men, tin ta po tunus min tin kho men, tin ung e whuk ira min wai wai tin ek ek min men, men ku wom kuul i ma mang tan lu.
Si wom men ku mang, si wom ung e si homan mi emiu wom tin kasum tulun hungin ta wom weh men,
ma wom wa po tunus tin homan men, tin pho pongin to wungin siik u auluungin tumen ira ewi Got enun weh men, ko po wom ken moolngin ta men.
Tumen ma wom men ku mang ta wungin tin epo torokngin men li, si “Wom mosop then then men ku sakal irawin to po tin e ung porili wom men,” epo it then then men ta emkusin then ako.
“Taku mi wom kakat sun, men ku wom haum, epon akuli wom ning lasin.” Wom kuk aku wom mang ta sinang li ko, si wom iso kasum mi wom tin kakat sun men asin,
epon akuli wom wa pi tin min ek men kara nuk epo emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men.

Taku po ta tip tip endara nginangan kho, men ku homani ma li men ku tip endara kyok asin, si men ku wuh kumang ning nginan tin tunus men epo wilin likiong, kumali in to endara kara tin ku nhio wo sun tin kalwok men.
Wom men ku mang ta wungin tin hies men ta me pol wo wom asin, si wungin tin tunus e ku khek po si pit nhing men misan kha ku me pol wo wom men, kumali men ku nhio wo po tin huli men.

Ma wom men ku wa min urut i si po Emiun Auluungin tin ta Got men asin, epo Emiun tin imen kha Got tosuk to wom epo wom e ta yang weh li pol to elup tin kuli wo wom pias weh kut epo lasin tin ta wom men.

Wungin tin mi wom makasian pit pon men, u min kakhat sun, u yan salngin, u wungin il mi nginan, u wungin tin ton mi nginan men tumen, men ku wom mang tan mosop lu hin epo wom, to wungin mosop tin mi wom lengwal pit wo al epon men.
Si wom men ku ning i tunus epo al, men ku mi wom ami sukngin pit po al, ma wom mang mang ta lasin ta al, ken sun tin wom kuk mi Krais ma Got mang ta lasin tin ta wom men kho men.
Tumen ma wom men ku ira wungin tin Got suk mara wom epon men siik weh ken wom tih husani Got tin yang min pit wo wom weh men.
Ma wom men ku muk muk mi min epongin weh, ken Krais tin min epo it ma yang min alang siin tuon mut eya it ken talungin ta Got ta tin ku ipek tunus li ko hut yang ma yang min tunusngin pit pon men.
Si elwanngin u wungin mosop tin min lengwal men wa maran nesngin tumen, men ku wom ning i aku po sikian yan si in lunga wom asin, epon men ku siik epon ku si in lunga po tin auluungin men akomen.
Kuru kiongngin u sakalngin ulil, wa sakalngin tin min lesngin e lengwal men tumen, men ku siik to wom som kut tumen, si tunus epo sam samngin men ku wiewin.

Epo wom ion i kho epo po tin ning elwanngin nginangan men, wa po tin wungin ta hi min lengwal men, wa po tin mara hi nes endara nginangan e kuk ken hi e won nuk wet got torokngin enun men kuli ta wa pakuh pongin ta mi enunu tin ta Krais ngong Got men akomen.

Wom kuk aku wom mang ta po ta tin ku me torok mara wom epo sakalngin put kara tin wungin irawin om min men asin, epo wungin tin mosop imen kha kuli min kakhat sun tin ta Got men iso yukngin ko po po tin khuuk wal pit mina wungin tin pang po hi nginangan men ako.
Tumen ma wom men ku pok mi wungin tin imen to po asin.
Epo angan ta kho men wom kuk ta pi tin mi ku men, si li homani men wom kuk ta pi tin mha mi yang tin Akono men. Wom men ku muk muk ken wom e husani pi tin mha men weh.
(Epo enun tin ta Emiun Auluungin men men si to wungin mosop tin tunus u siik u irawin weh men tumen.)
Ma wom ion mi wungin kuma wom pon ta wungin tin yang tin Akono men min nawaehngin pit pon men.
Si wom men ku klap to po to wungin tin ta pi mi ku e enun tan pi om men asin, si men tunus epo wom men ku tak si wungin tin imen weh si in pi mlaeng weh.
Epon men in to manngin epo it tin ku sakal epo wungin tin po ning i pi tin kaunngin men.
Si endara mosop tin tak singin si in pi mlaeng men men pi tin mha men kha ning i si nuk pi mlaeng men, epon taku endara ta ning i ma endara ta si in pi mlaeng kho, timen men ta pi tin mha men ako.
Sinsin tin imen wala sakalngin nuk ti, “Ngon tin nhaung men, e phip si ma e khek si mi po tin huu kho men, men ku Krais pon mha ko nuk po ngon.”
Tumen ma wom men ku mara wom pit tunus epo wungin tin wom muk muk min men, si men ku ken po tin wungin ta hi ulil men asin, si men ku ken po tin mhi hi ek men weh,
ma wom tohuh epo wom ku kasum pi min ek tunus mosop, epo elup tin it kuk min homani men men ta wungin lengwal.
Tumen ma wom men ku kuk ken po tin wungin ta hi ulil men kyok asin, si wom men ku mara wom ples wungin tin nuk ta mi yang tin Akono men ani ku nuk tua.

Ma wom kuk aku wom um wain hambip ma mara wom hih hih, epo wungin tin po ku mara hi pit wo hi tunus epon som men men in mi wungin tin imen ako; si wom men ku mang, si Emiun Auluungin kha ku si kol mi wom weh men.

Ma wom sakal ta al epo lutngin tin nuk mi Kisang tin to lutngin men, u epo lutngin tin ku wom nut Got sam sam nginan epon men, u epo lutngin tin to min kehngin e Emiun Auluungin pong siin si in mi wom men kut tumen, ma wom lulut ma wom ning sam samngin ta mi wom li epo yang tin Akono men.
Wom men ku ning sam samngin kokyok kokyok emhut wungin mosop tin si ta wom men li epo Got tin Wirama it men epo ya yang tin Akono ta it e a-Yesus Krais men,
ma wom lem pit wo Got ma wom wa wom ko kuk wet po ta wom kara tin kuk lunga wom men.
Wom tin wala enanangin men, wom men ku wa wom ko kuk wet po masang tin wom pit ta hi men weh, ken wom e wa wom ko kuk wet yang tin Akono men weh men.
Epo po masang ta tin enangin men kha mhin epo titien tin wala men, ken Krais tin mhin epo palu walngin men, ma yang men Palolongin tin ta emkusin tin tan men.
Tumen ma Krais tin palu walngin tan in wet men, tumen kut kha kuli po wala tin enanangin men ku ko kuk wet titien hi tin mamasang ta hi weh men epo wungin mosop.
Wom tin mamasang enanangin men, wom men ku mi wom epo titie wom tin wawala men ken sun tin Krais maksin min epo palu walngin ma yang min alang siin tuon mut eya wut,
kumali yang ning wut si auluungin ma yang khis po wut epo eki tin ku yang khis po wut epo sakalngin men.

Yang ning i tumen kumali yang wa wut me in to mara yang tuon, men ku palu walngin to moolngin ta, tin ku endara ta memlel pon wa pon mol mol ta wa endara kara tumen nuk pon akomen, si wut men ku in auluungin ma wungin om po wut weh.
Wungin tin tumen kha ku po masang tin enanangin men ku mi hi epo titien hi tuo hi ken po mi hi epo emkusi hi tuo hi men. Epo po masang ta tin min epo titien men men min epon tuon kha men.

Epo po ta men ku in akandira kho ma min lel i emkusin tuon akomen. Awu. Men in e maran pit won epo enda aiingin u men ning i ma elit kah po sun tumen, ken yang tin Akono men ning i epo palu walngin men.
Epo it men kuk ken yang wilin, khin, maran u tumen tin ta yang emkusin men, men ta yang emalin u ta yang pokoin kut tumen.
“Sinsin tin imen kha ku po masang ta mang ta wiraman ngong tonin in, si li lup to titien, ma ngong si emkusi ngong then men.”
Wungin kaunngin tin imen men nhum takut, men nga sakal los po Krais u palu walngin tumen ako.

Kut sini wungin tin imen men nga sakal ta po masang then then lunga hi kut tumen, men ku po ta min epo titien ken i e tuon min epon men, u titien tuon men ku maran weh pit epon ku won nuk wet titien weh kut tumen.
Apo hoin, wom tin kuk mi yang tin Akono men kha ku wom hul wet po irama wom to eleni wom weh men, epo wungin tin imen men siik ako.
“Ngon men ku wa wiramap ngong tonim ya ngong si,” men wungin maran ko klat tin si muk to wo kuk marangin men,
wala sakal ti, “kumali e ung tunus ma e in maran nomalak wo mulus tin iyi li.”

Si wom masang tin khuuk po hoin men, wom men ku mhuk mi po hoin tin wom khuuk i men asin, aku po ya hi sal pit wo wom. Si wom men ku mara wom pit wo po ma wom kot po u wo wom nut po tumen, epo sakalngin tin ta yang tin Akono men misan.

Wom tin kum wet wili po phuan men, wom men ku hul wet po tin phuan ta wom wo mulus men, men ku wom hul wet po to lemngin u iikngin tumen, u to mi wom tin then epon ku hul wet sakalngin men kut tumen, ken wom e ning wungin timen e ta Krais weh men.

Si wom men ku ning kumang minan tin po phuan mara hi nuk po wom men misan ken wom e taku torok mi po tunus engun men asin. Si wom men ku ning kumang ken wom e po tin kum wet wili Krais weh men, tin ira wungin tin nuk ta mi Got e yang min epon weh men epo mi wom weh.
Wom men ku mi wom tunusngin ma wom ning kumang tin imen, ken wom e ning i ta yang tin Akono men, si ken i e ta po tunus men akomen.
Epo wom ion i epo wungin tin tuni e ku po ta ning i tunus men, men yang tin Akono men ku wai emhut sun si ta po siik, aku, taku po kum wet wili sun wa po wo hi pias engun wa tumen.

Si wom tin phuan men, wom men ku ning wungin kai sun tin imen epo po kut tumen, men ku wom mang ta wungin tin wom uluu mi po epon men, epo Phua tin ta wom tuon men maksin in ili wet pi ako, ma wungin tin po ples wungin enginin enginin epo po kara men men ku yang in ton akomen.
Ehurok, ngo ku suuk sii sakalngin kut khae, ma nga wo nut wom ti, epo wom men ku nuk nhing mi yang tin Akono men u mi kakhangin tin ta emhong tin ta yang men weh kut tumen.

Wom men ku nghen po wom epo moolngin tin ta Got e epo lek walngin men, kumali elup tin lengwal men ku si, men ku wom nuk nhing ma wom ten ten epo wungin tin emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men hihi i ta min ma yang taku kusamuh wom epon men.

Epo it men ku wuh lek walngin ewut po tunus tin to emali hi u enghik a hi tumen akomen, si men ewut emiun tin mara hi pit wo sun men u ewut emiun tin emhong nuk si wut hi men u ewut emiun tin hihingin kuk e li li ma mara hi pit wo pi mi ku tin kuk mi elup tin iyi, u ewut po nolo tin emiunan e wungin ta hi lengwal e hi nomoyong kara kuk e li li ili wet pi men kut tumen.

Tumen ma wom men ku wa moolngin tin ta Got e epo lek walngin men mosop si, kumali wom nuk nhing ma wom ten ten tunus weh mi elup tin lengwal men, ma wom ten ten epo wungin mosop kho li kut, men ku wom iso nuk nhing.
Tumen ma wom men ku nuk nhing, men ku wom wat put wom kho epo wungin tin irawin men, u wom klet po engai wom kho epo wungin tin siik men,
u wom kan kan moolngin kho tin nghen po khi wom e wom hihi i to pok putngin tin tunus e pok put wungin aminis men kut tumen;

si moolngin tin nhum epo sun mosop men, men ku wom wa ilio tin epo wo phepngin men, tin ku wom wai si wom whus yau ngin tin ung hut emon enun tin mosop e emiun tin wungin tan lengwal men whis i me epo wom men.
Kuru wom men ku wa moolngin tin ku klet mhi wom men, tin tulu wom hu Got tin palolo wom men, u bainat tin ta Emiun Auluungin men kut tumen, men sakalngin ta Got ako;

epo kinesngin mosop men ku wom hau si wo Got sumsum epo wo phepngin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men, ma sinsin tin imen kha ku wom haum tunus ma wom wuh kokyok kokyok epo wom tin ku hau si wo Got tin ku nhio wo po mosop tin auluungin men.

Kuru wom men ku kines Got epo yang ku nhio wo ngo kut tumen, kuma Got wa sakalngin ko ta ngo tin ku wo ngo ngam to mi ngo tin puplet men ma nga pok put wungin kaunngin tin ta pok putngin tin tunus men si in pi mlaeng.

Pok putngin tin tunus imen kha Got tih ngo me ton ma nga me pok put ma po kan kan ngo epo esih tin po koklong men kha iyi. Wom men ku kines Got epo pok putngin tin tunus imen kuma mi ngo puplet weh ma nga pok put ira sakalngin tin tunus epo ngo ku sakal i men.

Si kuma wom maksin ku pon ta wungin tin si si epo ngo men u ele tin nga in e ning i men tumen, kha ku a-Tikikus tin mi ngo epon e wiro it weh e kum to wungin anuh mi yang tin Akono men kha ku ti pok put wungin mosop si in pi mlaeng to mara wom men.
Yang men nga tih i ti epo wom epo sinsin tin wala ti, kuma wom pon ta wungin tin si si epo pim men u yang men ku pa nhing mi wom kut tumen.
Min wyungin men ku weh in to wom tin it irit won mi Krais men, u min epongin to wo phepngin tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u yang tin Akono e a-Yesus Krais men tumen, ku weh in to wom kut tumen.
Nanaangin tin ta Got men men ku in to po mosop tin mi hi epo yang tin Akono ta it e a-Yesus Krais men to min epongin tin ku torokngin ta in min som men. Men irawin.

Ngo a-Pol u a-Timoti tumen tin tuk a kum wet wili a-Yesus Krais epo mi tuk weh men, kha tuk a tih kisang tin iyi ti epo wom mosop tin auluungin e kuk mi Krais Yesus e ung Pilipai men, to po tin mara hi pit wo palu walngin men u po tin kum ta palu walngin men kut tumen.
Nanaangin u min wyungin tumen tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen ku in to wom.
Nga sam sam Got tin ta ngo men kokyok kokyok minan tin tulu ngo hu pit po wom men,
ma mi kinesngin mosop tin ta ngo men nga kines Got epo wom kokyok kokyok to min kehngin weh.
Nga sam sam Got epo wom tin it klap wal to pok putngin tin tunus men pok put nginan tin to ungunan tin muk men kha me pol homani kut i.
Epo sakalngin tin wo ngo phep pit won men wala ti, epo Got tin kho ma hosi kumang tunus ta mi wom men kha ku iso ning i timen li pyu pongin weh li pol mi elup tin ta a-Yesus Krais men.

Epo wungin tin imen men siik epo ngo ku tulu ngo hu wom mosop to wungin tin tunus imen, epo wom men kuk mi ewhat ngo weh. Epo esih tin po koklong e po kan kan ngo epon men u ngo tin haum eya pok putngin tin tunus men u nga kaek siin tumen kha wom pok mi nanaangin tin ta Got men to ngo ton men.
Epo Got kha maran nuk po ngo to sakalngin men, epo nga hiim wom hambip kara kut to min epongin tin ta Krais Yesus weh men.
Ma nga kines epo wungin tin nuk ti, epo min epongin tin ta wom men ku iso pu wal weh ma ung e si po al weh li, to maran ekngin u wungin sinsin ples nginan mosop kut tumen,
kuma wom ion mi wungin tin tunus weh men kuma mi wom yil u wungin om po wom tumen weh li pol to elup tin ta Krais men,
ma endara tin wungin siik li enun ung hut men tin me epo a-Yesus Krais men ku pu wal mi wom weh, kuma Got yan si nhum u sam samngin ta yang si nhum epon kut tumen.

Kut si, ehurok, mi ngo epo wom ku ion i epo wungin tin si ta ngo kho men men ku klet soput ta pok putngin tin tunus men akomen. Awu. Men me si plo nginan ma si enun ung hut epon tin ku li huuh li yanga pi mili men,

wala homani ma wungin si in pi mlaeng to mara po nolo maran min then ta tin haum eya mang ta Sisa men, kuru po mosop tin kara men kut tumen, epo esih tin po koklong e po kan kan ngo epon men men nga in mi Krais kha nga wuh i men.

Ma po ehuro it tin munuman kara maksin men tin it irit won then mi yang tin Akono men si mi hi pit nhing epo ngo tin po kan kan ngo epo esih tin po koklong men, ma po si mi hi puplet weh epo po ku pok put sakalngin to hiukngin ta hi tin om men.
Irawin, epo po kara pok put Krais to mi hi tin heh wet sun men u to mi hi tin taku puh puh mara al men tumen, si po kara pok put Krais to mi hi tin tunus men.

Po tin wo ngo ung wo hi e li muk men men pok put Krais to mi hi tin po sila hi khing pit po hi tuo hi tin ku si nhum men, si ku to mi hi tin yil men som, ma po wo taku po ku wa won maikngin ko what ngo to sun tin po kan kan ngo epo esih tin po koklong men.
Si po kara tin wo ngo ung wo hi e me sulung men men pok put Krais to min epo ngin tin nuk mi hi men, epo po ion i epo Got won ung wo ngo epo ngo kha ku haum eya pok putngin tin tunus men.

Tumen ma kuli? Aku, taku po kara kaun wungin enginin kara mi hi ma po put wungin wa taku po kara pok put wungin to wungin irawin kara tin nuk mi hi men, Krais men pok putngin ako, taku in ti wa nuk tumen wa men. Ma wungin tin imen kha nga in e mi ngo keh keh epon men, wai, ma ngo men ku iso in e mi ngo keh keh weh li kut.
Epo nga ion i epo wungin tin siin si pit po sun tin imen ku si plo nginan epo ngo tin ku palolongin epo kinesngin tin ta wom men u epo Emiun tin ta a-Yesus Krais men tin ku nhio wo ngo men kut tumen.

Epon wala li nga hulum epo sakalngin epo hoo mingin ta ngo weh epo wungin ta men ku nga wa manngin epon som. Si epo mi ngo tin puplet weh men ken sun tin kho kut u homani kut tumen kha ku Krais si yan nhum epo ngo emkusin men, aku, taku epo ngo tin ku iso tunus in men wa epo ngo tin ku hun men wa tumen.
Epo ngo men nga ion wungin tin nuk ti, taku nga tunus in, men epo Krais misan, wa taku nga hun, men ku nga wa endara tunus weh kara si po sun tin i ako.
Si taku nga iso tunus in wo mulus to ngo emkusin, timen kha ku kumang ta ngo si enun ung hut men ako. Si ela ku nga pias pon, men ku nga pon tan akomen.
Epo mi ngo tin ponwal men nghen epo ngo weh, epo mi ngo epo ngo ku li silang wom ma nga li in hang Krais, epo wungin tin imen kha tunus weh men.
Si taku nga iso in wo mulus to ngo emkusin, men ku tunus weh epo wom ako.

Ma tuo ngo ion mi wo phepngin tin ta ngo men kha nga ion i epo ngo ku iso in wo mulus ma nga iso in to wom mosop kumali wo phepngin tin ta wom men ku osong weh li kara kut u mi wom keh keh epon kut tumen,
epon kumali min kehngin tin ta wom e wom wangan po ngo ton men ku si nhum weh mi a-Yesus Krais epo ngo tin ku iso kyok ti epo wom angan ta kyok men.

Si wungin then ta misan, epo wom men ku kuk e ira wungin ken wom e po tin me epo pi wet pi men kara, tin ku nuk tunus to al to pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men. Tumen kuma taku nga ti ion wom wa taku nga kis epo wom, men ku nga hul epo wom tin nuk nhing to emiun then ta men, ma to mi wom then ta kha wom tohuh to al epo wo phepngin tin ku weh pit wo pok putngin tin tunus men,

si wom ku lem epo wungin maran kiring kiring tin po tin nolo wom men taku ning i lengwal epo wom men akomen. Men tosukngin ta po ta si in pi mlaeng epo po men kuli iso huuspit, si men tosukngin ta wom ta epo wom men kuli iso palolongin. Palolongin tin imen men ku me hang Got ako.
Epon wala li Got min suk wom ma yang mang ta wom tin wo wom phep pit wo Krais men, kuru wom tin ku wuh won maikngin mut eya yang maksin kut tumen ako,
si wala li homani ma wom tohuh epo lek walngin tin kho ma wom ion ngo tin wuh i ken sun tin imen, kuru wom hul epo nga iso in e wuh i homani kyok kut tumen.

Iyi, pa nhingngin kara in mi Krais, wah? Iyi, sakalngin tin ku it wa mi it ko li wyu ung men kara in, wah? Iyi, min thenngin tin ku it klap wal ton mi Emiun Auluungin men kara in, wah? Iyi, min epongin to min sukngin kara in, wah?

Iis, taku tumen, men ku wom pyu po min kehngin tin ta ngo men si kol weh epo wom tin ku kuk to mi wom tin then men, ma wom kuk to mi wom tin pit wo al men then, u enu wom then, u wungin tin wom taku ning i men then kut tumen.

Si wom kuk aku wom tohuh epo wungin tin nuk ta mi wom e wom tuo wom taku si nhum epon men u epo wungin tin wom taku wa wom si pit engun men tumen asin, si wom men ku kuk to wungin tin nuk ta mi wom e ku wom wa ya wom ko epon men, ma wom ion mi al e kai po enginin e ku tunus epo wom weh men.
Wom kuk aku mara wom pit wo silan khingngin tin ta wom tuo wom men misan asin, si wom men ku mara wom pit wo silan khingngin tin ta po enginin men maksin kut tumen.
Wom men ku kuk to wungin tin nuk ta mi wom men ken sun tin kho ma nuk mi Krais Yesus men kut tumen,
tin in ewo maran kho ma moolngin ta Got ko pon men, takuma yang ion i tin ku yang ngong Got in kai wal weh men ken i e endara ta tin ku yang kasum i pip men akomen.
Awu. Men yang wa yan ko engun, ma yang wa moolngin tin ta po tin kum wo sun engun men ko pon, ma yang men ko khuukngin ken po tunus enu hi men engun.

Ma po ion yang tin maran ken po tunus ta men, khali yang tuon wai ko, ma yang iso ira wungin tin ta Wiraman men weh li ponsol ma yang hun, wai, men hunngin tin po huu lengwal put sa wlong put wal ewin men.
Sinsin tin imen kha Got wa yang si ung ili awon weh, ma yang pen ya sun yan homan ta, men yan pesek epo ya po mosop,
kumali po sikia a-Yesus yan, men ku po mosop powut hi ko suul, men po tin kuk ili wet pi men, u po tin kuk wo mulus men, u po tin kuk wet mulus men kut tumen,
ma po mosop mamai hi pok put a-Yesus Krais men Akono, kumali Got tin Wiraman men yan si nhum epon.

Tumen ma wom tin mi ngo pit wo wom weh men, wom tin kho ma ira sakalngin ta ngo kokyok kokyok men khali homani ma wom men ning i tumen kut. Ma ku ken wom e kuk enu mara ngo ani wom ning wungin timen som. Awu. Men ken ngo e kis lunga wom kha kuli wom tohuh epo wom tin ku pyu po kumang tin ku wom tuo wom palolongin epon men to lemngin u iikngin tumen.
Epo Got kha in e kum mi wom kuma mi wom kuru wungin tin wom ning i ira mi wom men kut tumen ku yang ira wungin tin yang min tunusngin epon men ako.
Wungin mosop tin wom ning i men men ku mara wom ain ma wom ning i engun, si wom sakal munuman wa wom sakal phae sun asin,

kumali wom si kai po tin wungin om po hi e mulu hi put yil weh men, tin husani Got e lasin om po hi e kuk lunga po tin khuuk wal to wungin ta hi tin ku siik som u ulil tumen. Kut men ku wom si ken esul ta ma pal nuk lunga po ken awheng tin nuk e li li ili wet pi ma ngin ngin me ko mulus men.
Ma wom kasum sakalngin tin epo tunusngin men pip weh, kumali nga wangan po wom mi elup tin ta Krais men epo ngo tin saa to kumang u wuh kumang kho men men ku nga saa li hut liit nuk engun akomen.

Si taku homani ma mi ngo alang si ngo ma nga yuk yuk ngo kalolwan ken talungin wainan ta ko po talungin ta wom tin wo phepngin ta wom pong si wom ma wom ning kumang auluungin epon men, aku, men mi ngo keh ako, kuru mi ngo keh to wom mosop kut tumen.
Wungin sinsin tin then imen kha mi wom keh keh kuru mi wom keh keh to ngo maksin kut tumen.

Kut si nga hoo mi ngo epo wo phepngin ta ngo tin pit wo a-Yesus tin Akono men epo pi maran tikayung engun ma ngo ku tih a-Timoti ti epo wom, kumali yang kyok me pok ngo epo wom tin kuk tun tira men, men ku enu ngo kyok si pit nhing.
Epo po ta ku ken a-Timoti men tin ku silan khing pit po wom weh tin ku kuk tun tira men ku ta in to ngo som.
Epo po mosop men kuk e sila hi khing pit po wungin ta hi tuo hi misan, si po ku sila hi khing pit po wungin tin ta Krais Yesus men weh akomen.
Si wom ion mi wungin ta yang ma wom men pon ta yang kho, epon ken yang ta tin kum to wiraman men kha kho ma yang kum to ngo mi pok putngin tin tunus men pok put nginan men.
Tumen ma nga hoo mi ngo epo ngo ku tih yang kerek ti, takuma men ku nga ion wungin tin ku si ta ngo tun tira men iso wet.
Kuru wo ngo phep epon taku yang tin Akono men min epon, men ku pi put monlo long anima tuo ngo ku ti epo wom maksin kut tumen.

Takuma nga wo taku tunus epo ngo ku tih wiro it a-Epaproditus ti epo wom, tin me tuk a klap wal to kumang u lek walngin tumen then men. Kuru yang men tin in to sakalngin ta wom, kuru yang men tin me nhio wo ngo epo endara tin nga kalwok epon men kut tumen.
Epo yang in e lun epo wom mosop ma yang miun tuung pit po wom tin hul epo yang tin saih men.
Irawin, epo kho ma yang saih ma yang taku hun angan, takuma Got min suk yang, kuru Got iso min suk ngo kut tumen, epon akuli min urut i tin ta ngo e homan men kyok ko los po sun tin kho men.
Tumen ma sosohngin wa ngo epo ngo ku tih yang ti epo wom kuma wom ion yang kyok ma mi wom keh keh, kuru min urut i tin ta ngo men ku mlisngin kara ko kut tumen.
Tumen ma wom men ku wa yang mi yang tin Akono men to min kehngin tin klet mi wom men, ma wom men ku wa po tin kuk tumen men ku ya hi si weh.

Epo kumang tin ta Krais men kho ma yang taku hun angan mut eyan, ma yang ku min ko wo tunusngin tin tan weh men som, si kuma yang ning i kai kumang tin wom kalwok epon ku wom ning i nhio wo ngo epon men.

Ehurok, ngo ku suuk sii sakalngin angan ma nga wo ta wom ti, epo wom men ku mi wom keh keh mi yang tin Akono men weh. Epon taku nga pan wungin ira sun kyok ti epo wom, men ku mi ngo mokongin epon akomen, kuru men epon ku wom kuk anga tunusngin kut tumen ako.
Wom haum epo elwa, men po tin ning kumang ta hi to wungin lengwal nginangan men, tin mhuk sun elit hi ewin men!
Epo it kha po tin mut wal ewin e irawin weh men, tin kum auluungin epo Emiun Auluungin, u it wangan po Krais Yesus, si ku wo it phep pit wo wungin tin ta po tunus men ta akomen.
Aku, tuo ngo kha ku wo ngo phep pit po wungin tin ta po tunus men ako. Epon taku po enginin ta phaeng taku i e ku won phep pit po wungin tin ta po tunus men ta, men kuli nga iso li ut maran ako.

Epo po mut ngo to ungunan tin miuk me sup men, u ngo men po Israel khuuknginin, u ngo men a-Bensamin phonginin, u ngo men khuukngin Hibru ma ngo men api Hibru weh kut tumen; kuru wungin tin nuk porili sun tin epo wungin sinsin men men nga iran to po Parisi ewin kut tumen;

u wungin tin nuk porili sun tin epo tohuhngin men, men nga lek po tin palu walngin ta Krais men; u wungin tin nuk porili sun tin nuk tua e siik e ira sun tin epo wungin sinsin men, men wungin om po ngo epon kut tumen.
Takuma wungin tin kho ma nga phaeng taku e ku nhio wo ngo men, men li homani ma nga ion i ken i e taku amiron nginan engun men.

Wai, kuru nga ion wungin mosop tin kara maksin men ken i e amiron nginan engun kut tumen, men taku nga kaini kara to maran ekngin tin pit po Krais Yesus tin Akono ta ngo men tin akauwo nginan weh men. Ma nga wuh wungin tin ku endara mosop ko amiron nginan engun epo ngo kho men, kuma nga wuh i mut eya yang, ma nga ion i ken i e asiluk nginan engun, si kuma nga si emhong tin ta Krais men salum po ngo weh,

kuma po pon ta ngo tin weh in mi Krais men, men ku to wungin siik tin ta ngo weh e me epo wungin sinsin men akomen. Awu. Men me epo wo phepngin tin pit wo Krais men weh, men wungin siik tin me hang Got epo wo phepngin men ako.

Mi ngo epo ngo ku ion mi wungin ta yang, u emhong tin ta yang e yang khek kyok si tunus epon men kut tumen, kuru ngo men ku klap yang to wungin maran kiring kiring tin yang wuh i men weh kut tumen, kumali nga si kai yang to hunngin tin ta yang men weh,
epon taku tumen men ku wungin tin nuk ti wa nuk tumen kha kuli nga kyok me sup mi khekngin kyok si mi po tin huu kho men.
Si ngo ku kasum i kho wa ngo ku si tunus weh kho akomen, takuma nga tohuh epo ngo ku iso kasum i, kumali nga weh li kasum i tin Krais Yesus kasum ngo weh epon ku nga wai men.

Ehurok, nga phaeng taku ngo ku kasum wungin timen kho akomen; takuma wungin then ta nga in e ning i, men tulu ngo som ta wungin tin kho li wetpo ngo men, si nga tus wili ngo li pol epo ngo ku wa endara tin nuk maran min ngo men muk wet.
Nga tohuh epo ngo ku saa weh li wa talungin tin Got yuk ngo mi wo Krais Yesus epo ngo ku weh li wai ili wet pi men.
Tumen ma it mosop tin si nonomuru kut men men wungin timen men ku iis mi it weh. Ma taku wungin enginin kara nuk mi wom, men ku Got tuon iso suk mara wom epo wungin timen maksin kut tumen ako.
Takuma wungin tin it kasum i kho men, men ku it muk muk iran ira wungin sinsin then, kuru it men ku wungin then ta misan nuk mi it kut tumen.

Ehurok, wom men ku sup me lup to ngo kuma wom ira tosukngin tin nga suk mara wom epon men, men ku mara wom ion mi po tin muk muk ira wungin tin tumen, ma wom kai wungin ta po to wungin tin pim a suk mara wom epon kho men.
Epo po munuman kara tin nga pok wom epo hi kho kokyok kokyok, kuru homani ma nga pok wom mi tinisngin men kut tumen, men muk muk kai po tin nolo sa wlong put wal tin ta Krais men.

Pi tin ku po li pol epon hut men men mhukngin, u got ta po men kuma po, u wungin tin po wa hi si pit ton men men po wa manngin epon kut tumen. Po men wa mi hi ko ung wo wungin tin ta pi mulus men misan engun.
Si it men pi ta it sinsin ung ili wet pi, men pi tin it hoo mi it ma it kuk e haum epo Palolongin tin kuli iso me ko epon men, men a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men,
tin ku me phae it emkusin tin amiron nginan engun men kuma si kai yang emkusin tin to moolngin men, men ku si epo emhong tin ku yang kakha epo yang ku wa endara mosop me sup wet yang tuon men.

Tumen ma, ehurok, wom tin mi ngo pit pit wo wom u nga in e hiim wom weh men kut tumen, wom men min kehngin ta ngo u talungin tin ku emhut kumang ta ngo e ung mhi ngo men tumen kha imen. Wom tin mi ngo pit pit wo wom men, wom men ku nuk nhing tumen mi yang tin Akono men.
Si nga suh mi kinga e-Yuodia u nga suh mi kinga e-Sintike tumen epo wulong ku in to mi ngong then mi yang tin Akono men weh.

Kuru nga kines ngon tin tita tong weh men epo ngon ku nhio wo wulong tin wala imen tin klap ngo to kumang tin nga wuh i mut eya pok putngin tin tunus men, kuru e nhio wo a-Klemen hi po tin kara e klap ngo to kumang men maksin kut tumen, tin ya hi panngin nuk mi kisang tin epo tunusngin men.
Wom men ku mi wom keh keh mi yang tin Akono men sumsum. Nga sakal kyok ti, wom men ku mi wom keh keh weh!
Wom men ku mang ta wungin amunu tin ta wom men ku si in pi mlaeng to mara po masang to sun wala mosop. Yang tin Akono men ku me angan kut khae.
Wom men ku sila wom khing pit po wungin ta asin, si epo kinesngin u wom tin ku hau si wo Got to sam samngin men tumen kha ku wom pok put kinesngin tin ta wom men si ta Got epon men,
men ku min wyungin tin ta Got men, tin nhum epo wungin mosop tin kara maksin e ku po tunus mara hi ples i sinsin men ku haum eya mi wom u tulun hungin tin ta wom men kut tumen epo Krais Yesus.

Ehurok, ngo ku suuk sii sakalngin angan kut khae ma nga wo ta wom ti, epo wungin tin akani e irawin, u wungin tin akani e yan pos, u wungin tin akani e siik, u wungin tin akani e min yil, u wungin tin akani e pon lungin, u wungin tin akani e yan tunus u tumen, taku wungin tunus ta weh wa wangan pongin tunus ta tumen, men ku tulu wom hu pit po wungin tin nuk tumen misan.
Wungin tin nga kot wom ma wom wai u wom hul i u wom ion ngo tin ning i men tumen, tin imen kha ku wom iran men, ma Got tin sinsin epo min wyungin men ku weh in to wom.

Kut si mi ngo keh keh hambip mi yang tin Akono men epo homani kut men silan khingngin tin ta wom e pit po ngo men men enun paas si homan kyok. Iis, epo silan khingngin tin ta wom e pit po ngo men men nuk kho ako, takuma pi ku put kara ko pit akomen.
Si taku nga kalwok ani nga sakal tumen som, epo nga urut wungin kho epo nga in tuni, men ku marango ain ma nga in tumen kut.

Nga urut wungin tin ku nga in amusukngin engun, u nga urut wungin tin ku endara ta ngo nuk a salok engun men kut tumen likiong. Pi tin akani e nga li epon u wungin tin tuni e si ta ngo men tumen, tin taku nga mut wa nga hun elip, wa taku endara ta ngo pu wal wa nga kalwok wa tumen, men nga urut i mosop kho kut.
Ngo men kakha epo ngo ku ning wungin mosop epo Krais tin pa nhing ngo weh men ako.
Takuma wom tin klap ngo to won maikngin ma wom nhio wo ngo men men wom ning i tunus ako.

Kuru wom tin api Pilipai men, tuo wom ion i kut epo ewo maran men tin wom hul pok putngin tin tunus men ma nga yok Masedonia ma nga li, men ku palu walngin ta ku klap ngo epo wungin epo nanaangin tin li u me tumen akomen, awu, men misa wom.
Epo pi Tesalonaika kut kha nga li in epon men ma wom tih nhio wongin me epo ngo angan tin li muk men u tin me ponwal angan men tumen epo endara tin nga kalwok epon men.

Si ngo ku hoo mi ngo pit po wom epo talungin ani nga wo tumen som. Awu. Ngo taku wa talungin kumali enun muluk ung hut ma naumngin ta wom ung e me ko po sun li si hambip tin kuli Got wai emhut sun men.

Takuma naumngin mosop men nga wai kut, kuru kara kyok hambip ko po sun kut tumen. Ma nga mut kut, epo nga wa endara hang a-Epaproditus tin wom tih i mu men, men ken talungin ipek tunus ta tin wom wai si ta Got ma yang min saah pit pon men.
Ma Got tin ta ngo men ku kaini mosop tin wom kalwok epon men ira miranngin tin tan e in mi moolngin ili wet pi mi Krais Yesus men.
Homani men ku it wa Got tin Wirama it men yan si ili awon kokyok kokyok li kut. Men irawin.
Wom men ku wa mi wom si ta po mosop tin auluungin e kuk mi Krais Yesus men. Si po ehuro it tin kuk hang ngo men kha ku wa mi hi ti epo wom men.
Kuru po mosop tin auluungin men maksin wa mi hi ti epo wom kut tumen, si po tin kuk mang tin ta Sisa men wo kanut ngo weh epo hi kha ku wa mi hi ti epo wom men.
Nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ku in to wom mosop. Men irawin.
Ngo a-Pol tin paengin ta a-Yesus Krais ira wungin tin nuk epo mi Got men, u wiro it a-Timoti tumen,

kha tuk a pan kisang tin iyi ti epo wom tin auluungin e it irit won mi Krais e nuk nhing to wo phepngin epo pi Kolosi men. Nanaangin u min wyungin tumen, tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen, ku in to wom.
Tuk a sam sam Got tin Wirama a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ma tuk a kines yang epo wom sumsum.
Epo pim a hul epo wo phepngin tin ta wom e pit wo Krais Yesus men u min epongin tin ta wom e pit wo po tin auluungin mosop men kut tumen,
sinsin men in epo hoo mingin tin wom hoo mi wom epo endara tin halung pongin ta wom pit ili wet pi men, tin wom hul epon kho mi sakalngin tin irawin men, tin pok putngin tunus men.

Pok putngin tunus tin imen men me pol ta wom kho ken sun tin ung e li li wo mulus mosop maksin kut tumen, ma ung e huuh li, ken sun tin ung e huuh mi wom maksin ewo maran tin wom hul i ma mara wom ples nanaangin tin ta Got men to wungin tin irawin men.
Kuru ken sun tin wom urut i mi wo a-Epapras tin mi pim pit won e pim a klap wal to kumang then men. Yang men pit nhing epo kumang ta Krais mut eya wom.
Yang pok pim maksin epo min epongin tin ta wom e wom kuk ton mi Emiun Auluungin men.

Kuru wungin sinsin tin imen kha ewo maran tin tuk a hul wungin epon men, men ku tuk a mang put epo kinesngin epo wom som. Men tuk a kines Got epo yang ku wa maran ekngin epo wungin tin nuk ta mi yang men ko kol mi wom to mhin ekngin u wungin sinsin ples nginan tin me epo Emiun Auluungin men tin ku klet mi wom weh men,

kumali wom muk muk ira wungin tin nuk tunus to wungin tin ta yang tin Akono men, ma yang min keh pit po wom to min kehngin tin klet mi yang weh men. Ma wungin tin ta wom men kumang maran kiring kiring tin turunus men ku enunun ung e li li hut sun weh, kuru maran ekngin tin ta wom e pit wo Got men ku ung e ko po sun li si kut tumen.

Kuru Got men ku pa nhing wom epo emhong mosop tin ta yang men, pit mina kakhangin tin ta yang e to moolngin men, kumali wom nuk nhing wet won maikngin ma wom wuh i lu maran nomalak to min kehngin engun.
Kuru wom men ku sam sam Got tin Wirama it men tin ning i ma it si tunus epon ku it pok pok mi moolngin ta al tin po tin auluungin men ku pakuh pongin epon mi pi tin mi mlaeng men.
Yang men palolo it wet wili emhong tin ta pi mi ku men, si li homani ma yang al po it li kuk mi enunu tin ta Wirun tin yang min pit won weh men,
tin kiis li mut eya it epo yang kalolwan, tin lasin ta it klokngin epon men.
Yang men tin Got tin ku mara it kon i som men men yang enun tuon, tin li muk epo endara mosop ma ku maran pit wo endara mosop tin Got pho pon men.

Epo yang kha Got pho po endara mosop yanga wilin men, men endara mosop tin kuk ili wet pi u wo mulus u tin mara it kon i u mara it ku kon i som men kut tumen, tin taku emiun tin kuk e li li e sinkhaung men, wa emiun tin akokono men, wa emiun tin kuk e li li e mara hi pit wo pi ta hi then then men, wa emiun tin emhong nuk si wut hi men wa tumen. Endara tin mosop imen Got pho pon epo yang u ta yang kut tumen.
Ma yang men in muk kho epo endara mosop, ma yang kha kasum endara mosop nuk bing to wal kumali endara mosop men ku yang wal li yanga pi akomen.

Ma yang men mhin epo emkusin, tin palu walngin ta yang men, tin yang tuon hosin men. Kuru yang men khek kyok si tunus muk kho epo po tin kara e huu kho li men, kumali yang kha ku si sinkhaung epo endara mosop men.
Epo Got tin Wiraman men min tunusngin epo moolngin mosop tin ta yang men ku iis in mi yang weh,

ma yang kha Got ning endara mosop kyok si min then ton epo yang, tin taku kuk wo mulus wa kuk ili wet pi wa tumen, wala Got ning i ma endara tin mosop imen nuk aminis epo yang kalolwan tin yuk yuk ko put sa wlong put wal men.

Ma wom men kho ma wom plit pit wo Got ma wom nolo yang to wungin tin nuk ta mi wom men epo wungin lengwal tin maran kiring kiring e wom kuk e ning i men, si li homani ma Got pulum po wom si mi wom then to yang kyok
epo Krais emkusin to sun emalin tin hun men, kumali Got wa wom me kuk to maran to wungin tin auluungin men, ma po wom yil weh ma wungin tin ku yang wa lasin ta ko po wom men om po wom to mara yang.

Wom men ku kuk tumen, tin taku irawin epo wom ku iso ira wo phepngin tin ta wom men ma wom nuk nhing won u nuk nhing ton tumen, si wom si yang wal epo hoo mingin tin ta pok putngin tin tunus e wom hul i kho men akomen. Pok putngin tin tunus imen wala pok putngin kho si ta po masang to sun wala mosop tin Got pho po hi e hi ko ko kuk wet pi men, tin wala ngo a-Pol si po ta tin nga kum ta pok putngin tin tunus imen.

Ma homani ma mi ngo keh mi won maikngin tin nga wuh i mut eya wom men, ma nga taku suuk sii won maikngin tin ta Krais men tin iso pit men epo elit ngo, kuma nga wuh wungin timen mut eya yang emkusin, tin palu walngin ta yang men.

Palu walngin tin imen men nga kho si po tin kum tan men ta, ira hihingin tin ta Got e yang wa kumang tin imen ko nuk yanga wili ngo epon kuma nga nhio wo wom epon men, kumali nga suuk sii sakalngin tin ta Got men weh.
Men sakalngin tin kho ma kaunngin nuk eking po tin ko ung e khuuk wal to elup tin ku iso ung e me men, si homani men lasngin si in pi mlaeng to mara po tin auluungin e ta Got men kho kut.

Po tin imen Got min epo yang ku pok put miranngin tin hambip e ta moolngin tin ta wungin kaunngin tin imen si in lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, ma wungin tin imen wala ti, Krais men in mi wom, men hoo mingin ta wom epo moolngin kha men.

Yang kha pim a pok put sakalngin epon men, ma pim a wo nut po masang to sun wala then then mosop epo po ku haum tunus, kuru pim a kot po mosop then then kut tumen epo mhin ekngin tin klet mi pim men, kumali pim a wa po masang to sun wala then then mosop me nuk to mi hi tin po muru weh men to mara Got mi Krais Yesus.
Sinsin tin imen kha nga wuh kumang epon men maksin kut tumen, ma nga tohuh epon to emhong tin ta Got men tin siin iis in mi ngo weh men.
Epo mi ngo epo wom ku ion i epo ngo tin wuh wungin nhum takut mut eya wom u po tin ung Laodisia men, u po kara tin esini e ku mara pim nuk po al kho som men kut tumen,

kumali po mi hi pit nhing weh wo po mi hi tin sum sumngin to al kho mi min epongin men, ma po wa miranngin tin mosop e si pu wal weh wo po mi hi tin pit nhing wo po mara hi tin pe wungin sinsin tunus men, weh li po mara hi ek wungin kaunngin tin ta Got men, men ta Got tin Wiraman men u ta Krais kut tumen to al.
Mi Krais kha miranngin tin ta mhin ekngin u maran ekngin men tumen mosop halung pongin ma kaunngin nuk mi yang men.
Nga wo tumen, epon akuli po ta me kusamuh wom epo sakalngin kara tin po nut i ma ku wa wa mi wom epon men.
Aku, epo ngo tunus men in hin epo wom, takuma emiu ngo men it kuk ako, ma mi ngo keh epon ku ion hihingin tunus tin ta wom men u wo phepngin tin ta wom e pit nhing wo Krais men kut tumen.
Tumen ma wungin tin wom wa Krais Yesus tin Akono men ton kho men, kha ku wom muk muk mi yang ton homani kut tumen,

men ku imut wom ko nhing wo yang u wom khek wal si wo yang kut tumen, ma wom ko nuk nhing wo wo phepngin tin wo wom nuk wet men, ken sun tin wom hul wet kotngin epon kho men, ma wo phepngin tin ta wom men ku tenge to sam samngin weh.

Mara wom si kuk, epon akuli po ta me kan kan wom epo mhin ekngin tin ta po tunus e po mi hi pit pit i men engun, u epo kusamuhngin tin kuli enun ung hut akomen kut tumen, pit mina wungin tin po tunus ung e pa mara al epon men, u pit mina emiun tin pu si po nginangan e kuk wo mulus men kut tumen, si ku pit mina Krais akomen.
Epo yang kut kha Got tin Gotan men iis min weh mi yang emkusin tin tunusan men,
ma wom men si klet weh mi yang, tin sinkhaung epo emiun tin kuk e li li e mara hi pit wo pi ta hi then then mosop men, u emiun tin emhong nuk si wut hi men kut tumen.
Mi yang kha wom mutngin epo mut walngin tin ku po tunus wili hi ning i ewin som men, si men tin klok elit tin imen tin los po mi wom tin kho men li men, epo mutngin tin Krais tuon kha ku ning i men,

ma wom men kilngin to yang mi baptais, kuru wom khekngin kyok si tunus to yang min kut tumen epo wo phepngin tin pit wo emhong tin ta Got e siin iis in mi yang men, men Got tin khek yang mi po tin huu kho men kyok si tunus men.

Ma wom men kho ma wom huu mi wungin tin yek ta sun tin siik men u to elit wom tin ku mut wal som e nuk ta mi wom tin kho men kut tumen, taku li klet ma Got ning i ma wom kyok si tunus kuk to yang, epon tin Got klok lasin tin ta wom men mosop kho li men.

Epo Got mlus wungin tin panngin nuk yanga kisang to naumngin tin ta yang e pit wo it e nolo it men kho kut, ma yang klok i kho mili nuk worengin kho kut, wala yang wai si yang poo poo i pit put sa wlong put wal kho kut men.

Ma Got tep emhong hang emiun tin kuk e li li e mara hi pit wo sun men u emiun tin emhong nuk si wut hi men tumen mosop li, ma yang wa emiun tin mosop imen si kuk pi mlaeng to mara po mosop, epo yang ning i ma emiun tin mosop imen huuspit epo sa tin wlong put wal men.

Tumen ma wom kuk aku wom mang ta po ta tin ku ples wungin ta wom pit mi endara aiingin wa pit mi endara ta tin ku wom um i men, wa pit mi kakaomngin ta wa namih homan ta wa pi Sabat tin auluungin men kara wa tumen asin.
Epon men endara enun tin tosukngin epo wungin tin ku iso me men engun, si endara tin irawin weh men men Krais ako.

Wom kuk aku wom mang ta po ta tin ku me sup ma torok mara wom ma tip talungin tin ta wom men asin, tin taku po mi hi pit po wungin tin po torok ma po wa ya hi ko engun men, u po uluu tihngin kara engun kut tumen, ma po phuk mi hi engun li sup epo endara tin ku po ion i kho som men, ma po sasayih to wungin tin nuk ta mi hi tin kho men engun,

si po ku kasum yang tin mhin epo po men pip som, men yang tin emkusin mosop wa kakhangin epon u pokoin nhung pit hut wal u lilwi kan kan i pit hut wal kut tumen, ma emkusin ung e plok si epo emhong tin me hang Got men kha men.
Tumen ma taku wom huu to Krais epo emiun tin pu si wom e ta pi mulus men kho, taku tuni ma wom tuo wom wa wom sup wet wungin sinsin kara ken i e wom iso ira wungin tin ta pi mulus men?
Epo po wo taku, “Wom men ku kah pon asin, wom men ku tong i sut tan asin, wom men ku wai si nuk yanga wili wom asin” ti.

Epo wungin sinsin tin mosop imen los po endara tin ku po ning kumang epon li klet khama pi om engun men, epo wungin sinsin tin imen po iran pit mina wungin sinsin u kotngin tumen tin ta po tunus engun men kha men.
