Irawin, epo wungin sinsin tin mosop imen maran ken to mhin ekngin ako, tin po uluun e si mi wo po tuo hi engun, u tin po torok ma po wa ya hi ko epon engun men, u tin po songhu pit wo hi emkusin engun men kut tumen, takuma wungin tin mosop imen ani ku tunus epon ku nhio wo po ma po mang ta wungin tin po wa mi hi sup wet wungin tin po mi hi tin kho men kling si epon men akomen.

Tumen ma taku irawin weh epo wom tin khekngin kyok si tunus to Krais kho kut men, men ku homani ma wom tohuh epo wom ku wa endara tin nuk ili wet pi men misan weh, men pi tin Krais li in epon men, tin yang li ko ung ewo wili Got tin eronin men epon men.
Tulun hungin tin ta wom men men ku pit po wungin tin nuk ili wet pi men weh, si ku pit po wungin tin nuk wo mulus men asin.
Epo wom men huu kho, ma tunusngin tin ta wom men men kaunngin nuk to Krais mi Got.
Ma minan tin kuli Krais tin tunusngin ta it men si put plo nginan in pi mlaeng men, men ku wom si put plo nginan kuk pi mlaeng to yang mi moolngin maksin kut tumen.

Tumen ma wom men ku mang ta wom emkusin tingit kara tin pit pit hut lasin wo mulus ewin men men ku sup wet hunngin weh: men elwanngin, u wungin tin ku mi yil som men, u min lup si, u min pit pit wo wungin lengwal, u maran nesngin u tumen, epo maran nesngin men ken wungin tin po wo hi nuk wet got tin tororokngin men enun men kha men.
Epo wungin tin mosop imen kha kuli mumhek mingin tin ta Got men ko po po tin khuuk wal pit mina wungin tin po pang po hi nginangan men ako,
men wungin tin kho ma wom muk muk iran ewin men, minan tin wom kuk min kho men.
Si li homani men ku wom mang ta wungin tin tumen maksin li: yansalngin, u min lup si, u min lengwal pit po po, u ton mingin, u kiongngin tin me pol wo wom men u tumen.
Wom men ku torok mara po ta it kara asin, epo wom mang ta mi po tunus tin kho men to wungin lengwal tin tan men kho li kut,
si wom pang po wom epo mi po tunus tin homan men kho kut ako, tin ung e si homan to maran ekngin pit mina enu yang tin pho pon men.

Epo lunga po tunus tin homan imen men ku takonngin nuk lunga po Grik u po Yuda, wa nuk lunga po tin mut wal ewin men u po tin ku mut wal ewin som men, wa nuk lunga po tin kara e sakalngin ta hi enginin men wa po tin wungin ta hi enih men, wa po tin kum wet wili sun engun men, wa po tin wo pias men tumen kyok akomen, si Krais misan in u Krais tuon kha in mi po mosop men kut tumen.

Tumen ma wom tin Got won ung e li li wo wom men, tin auluungin u yang min pit wo wom weh men kut tumen, men ku pang po wom epo min sukngin, u wungin amunu tin wom ning i tunus epo po men, u wungin tin ku wom wa ya wom ko engun men, u wungin amlus, u wungin tin wom ku pit nhing wet won maikngin li maran nomalak epon men kut tumen.

Ma wom men ku wuh wungin tin po ta wom ta ning i lengwal epo wom men engun, kuru wom mang ta lasin tin ta wom men epo wal kut tumen, tin taku po ta in to wungin epo sun ta men. Ken Krais tin mang ta lasin ta wom men, men ku wom ning i tumen maksin kut tumen.
Ma wungin tin ku wom ning i ma ko po sun tin mosop imen men ku wom pang po wom epo min epongin weh, men wungin tin ku kasum sun to al ma mosop si then tunus weh men.

Kuru wom men ku mang ta min wyungin tin ta Got men ku siin iis mi wom weh kut tumen, epo wungin tin wala imen kha Got yuk wom epo wom ku kuk aminis ton mi emkusin then ta men. Kuru wom men ku kuk to wungin tin ku wom sam sam Got epon men weh kut tumen.

Wom men ku mang ta sakalngin tin ta Krais men weh ko in ma kasum mi wom to mhin ekngin mosop, ma wom ung e kot wal u wom wo nut wal tumen ira lutngin kara tin panngin nuk mi Kisang tin to lutngin men, u lutngin kara tin ku wom sam sam Got epon men, u lutngin kara tin ku Emiun Auluungin pong siin si mi wom men kut tumen, ma wom men ku lut lutngin to sam samngin tin nuk mi wom men li epo yang tin Akono men weh.
Ma wungin tin tuni e ku wom sakal i u wom ning i tumen, men ku wom ning i mosop epo ya a-Yesus tin Akono men, men ku wom wa sam samngin si ta Got tin Wiraman men weh li yanga wili yang.
Wom tin wala enangin men, wom men ku wa mi wom sup wet titie wom, men wungin tin siik to po tin kuk mi yang tin Akono men ako.
Wom tin masang enangin men, wom men ku mi wom epo titie wom weh, ma wom men ku mi wom nuk lengwal epo po asin.

Apo hoin, wom men ku hul wet wungin tin ta po irama wom to eleni wom men epo wungin mosop tin po sakal ta wom epon men weh, epo wungin tin imen men yang tin Akono men min tunusngin pit po wom epon ako.
Wom masang tin khuuk po hoin men, wom ning i aku po hoin tin wom khuuk i men mi hi teng si, epon akuli po mi hi luk.

Wom tin kum wet wili po phuan men, wom men ku hul wet po phuan tin mara hi pit wo wom wo mulus men epo wungin mosop tin po wo ta wom epon men, men ku wom ning i tumen minan tin po kuk tili wom men misan asin, ken wom e taku wa wa mi po kuma po mi hi tunusngin pit po wom kha men, si wom men ku kuk to mi wom tin then men, ma wom lem pit wo Got misan weh.
Ma wungin tin mosop e wom taku ning i men, men ku wom ning i to mi wom weh, ken wom taku ning i epo yang tin Akono men weh, si ku epo po tunus ta akomen,
epo wom ion i epo wom ku iso wa talungin hang yang tin Akono men, tin ku yang pakuh po wom epon men ako. Epo wom men kum ta Krais tin Akono men ako.
Si taku po ta ning wungin tin ku siik som men men ku wa wungin emhut sun tin ning i lengwal men ako, si wungin tin po ples wungin enginin epo po kara men men ku pi om.
Wom tin phuan men, wom men ku naa po tin kum wo wom men epo endara tin siik epo po ku wai men, kuru wom ning i kai wal epo po mosop kut tumen, epo wom ion i epo phua ta wom ta men in ili wet pi ako.
Wom men ku nuk nhing weh epo kinesngin kokyok kokyok, ma wom kines, men ku mara wom si kuk ma wom haum tunus to sam samngin.

Kuru wom kines, men ku wom kines epo pim maksin kut tumen. Wom kines epo Got ku klas epo pim to sakalngin tin tan men, kumali pim a pok put wungin kaunngin tin pok put Krais men, tin wala homani ma po kan kan ngo maksin pit min men.
Wom men ku kines epo ngo ku pok put wungin kaunngin tin imen si in pi mlaeng weh, epo wungin tin tunus weh e ngo ku sakal i men wala tumen.
Wom men ku karut wungin tin ta wom men weh to mhin ekngin epo po tin kuk mara so men, ma taku pi min ek kara nuk, men ku wom tohuh min epo kumang timen.

Sakalngin tin ta wom men men ku wom sakal i, men ku sut nuk pon weh kokyok kokyok, men ku phiit weh ken endara tin po hyum pon men, kuma wom pon ta wungin tin tuni e ku wom sakal wet po then then tunus epon men.
Kut si wungin tin si epo ngo men, men ku wiro suk a-Tikikus, tin mi it pit won weh men, tin kum to wungin anuh e pim a klap wal to kumang wet yang tin Akono men, ku iso ti pok wom epo ngo.
Ngo ku tih yang ti epo wom epo wungin sinsin tin wala ti, epon ku yang ti ion wom tin ung tuni men, kuru yang ti pa nhing mi wom kut tumen.
Ngo ku tih yang to a-Onesimus tin wiro suk e in to wungin anuh epo kumang men, tin mi it epon weh men, men yang ta wom ta. Wulong men ku ti pok wom epo wungin mosop tin si ko pit iyi men.

Epo Aristarkus tin tuk a kan kanngin then men wa min ti epo wom, kuru a-Mak tin a-Barnabas wiehun men wa min ti epo wom maksin kut tumen (men yang tin nga panen wom epon kho men: taku yang ti epo wom, men ku wom wa yang epo mi wom tin nawaehngin men weh).

Kuru a-Yesus tin po sikian ta maksin a-Yastus men wa min ti epo wom maksin kut tumen. Wuluk tin imen kha misa ngyuk api mi po tin mut wal ewin e kum to ngo mut eya enunu tin ta Got men. Nga ion wungin ta wuluk kho, men wuluk ning i ma mi ngo ko li wyu ung.

A-Epapras tin ta wom men ta, tin kum wet Krais men, men wa min ti epo wom maksin kut tumen. Yang men wuh mut eya wom epo kinesngin kokyok kokyok, kuma wom nuk nhing mi wungin tin nuk epo mi Got men to mi wom tin po muru u wo phepngin klet min men kut tumen.
Epo nga ion wungin ta yang ma nga pok put wungin epo yang ti, epo yang men tohuh weh epon ku ut eya wom, u po tin ung Laodisia men, u po tin ung Hierapolis men kut tumen.
A-Luk tin mi pim pit won weh e wa kumang epo po tin sasaih men, u a-Dimas tumen, wulong men wa mi ngong ti epo wom maksin kut tumen.
Wom men ku wa mi wom lu epo po tin ehuro it e ung Laodisia men, kuru a-Nimpas hi palu walngin tin palu wal mi mang tin tan men kut tumen.

Ma taku wom tiik kisang tin iyi lunga wom kho kut, men ku mara wom pit epon ku tiikngin mi palu walngin tin ung Laodisia men maksin kut tumen. Kuru wom men ku tiik kisang tin ku me Laodisia men maksin weh kut tumen.
Kuru wom men ku wo ta Arkipus taku, “Ngon men ku marap pit wo kumang tin e wai kho mi yang tin Akono men, kumali e suuk siin ning nginan weh.”
Ngo a-Pol wa mi ngo ti epo wom epo wungin tin wili ngo tuon pan i men wala iyi. Wom men ku tulu wom hu pit po esih tin kan kan ngo men. Nanaangin men ku in to wom. Men irawin.

A-Pol u a-Silwanus u a-Timoti tumen kha pyuk a tirih kisang tin iyi ti epo palu walngin tin ung Tesalonaika e wom kuk mi Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen: Nanaangin ku tih epo wom kuru min wyungin kut tumen tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen.
Pim a sam sam Got epo wom mosop kokyok kokyok, ma pim a sikia wom in mi kinesngin ta pim,

men pim a kuk to mara Got tin ta it e Wirama it men ma tulu pim hu kumang tin ta wom e wo phepngin pong siin men, u kumang tin wom wuh i weh e min epongin pong siin men, u wom tin nuk nhing wet won maikngin to hoo mingin tin pit wo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men kut tumen, si pim ku nhing akomen.
Epo, ehurok, wom tin Got min epo wom weh men, epo pim a ion wom tin Got won ung wo wom mi po kara epon ku ta yang weh men.

Epo pok putngin tin tunus e pim a pok put men ku me epo wom to sakalngin engun akomen. Awu. Men me to emhong maksin, kuru to Emiun Auluungin u to mi wom tin pit nhing wo wo phepngin tin klet min men kut tumen, wala tuo wom ion wungin tin pim a kuk lunga wom ton epon ku pim a nhio wo wom epon men.
Ma wom si ken po tin ira wungin pit mina pim u yang tin Akono men kut tumen, epo wom wa sakalngin ta Got wet won maikngin munuman to min kehngin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men,
tin tumen kha wom si ken tosukngin kara epo po mosop tin wo hi phep e hi ung e li li wo mulusngin Masedonia to sun Akaia men.

Epo hang wom men sakalngin tin ta yang tin Akono men ingutngin kho li pol, men ku li wo mulusngin Masedonia to sun Akaia misan som. Awu. Wo phepngin tin ta wom e pit wo Got men men pok putngin li li yanga pi mosop, tumen ma pim ku khung sakalngin pok put nginan ta kyok akomen.

Epo po mosop tin ung yanga pi mosop men tuo hi kha pok put pim tin pim a ti sup mi wom to wungin tuni men, tin wetpo wom wa got tin tororokngin men enu hi, si wom phae mulu epo Got epon ku wom kum ta Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok e irawin weh men,
kumali wom haum soput Got Wirun tin ku me ko wet pi men, tin Got khek yang mi po tin huu kho men kyok si tunus kho men, men a-Yesus ako, tin palolo it wet min kakhat sun tin ta Got e ku iso me men.
Epo, ehurok, tuo wom ion i epo pim tin ti sup mi wom kho men men ku sinsin om akomen.

Awu. Pim a wuh wungin u po ning pim lengwal tumen li li Pilipai kho kut, men wom ion i kho ako, taku li klet anima mi pim puplet to Got tin ta it men epo pim ku pok put pok putngin tin tunus men si ta wom, aku, men po munuman nolo pim.
Epo sakalngin tin pim a wo nut wom epon kho men ku wungin torokngin ek ek mi pim wa wungin min lengwal wa wungin amo wa tumen pong siin si akomen.

Awu. Got tin ion pim ken pim e tunus epon ku yang wa pok putngin tin tunus men sup yanga wili pim men kha pim a pok put sakalngin men, men pim a ning i tumen epon ku po tunus mi hi tunusngin epo pim akomen, si epon ku Got tin karong mi pim men min tunusngin epo pim kha pim a pok put tin imen.

Epo minan ta men ku pim a ira sakalngin kara tin ku pim a wa wa mi wom epon men akomen, timen ma tuo wom men ku ion i ako, wa pim ku ira sakalngin kara tin ku pim a kaun maran nesngin ta pim nuk wet men akomen kut tumen, timen Got tuon kha ku pok put sakalngin nhio wo pim epon men.

Wa pim ku tohuh epon ku po tunus wa ya pim si som, taku wom wa po enginin kara akomen, aku, pim a kuk to emhong tin taku mi pim epon, men ku pim a tus wom epo kumang engun, epo pim men paengin ta Krais kha iyi.
Takuma awu. Pim a kuk lunga wom to wungin amlus engun, ken wut wala ta tin pa sus sun hoin men maran pit wo husanin tin tan weh men to silan khingngin tan.

Ma pim tin sila pim khing pit po wom to min epongin tin tumen kha mi pim tunusngin epo pim ku naa wom epo pok putngin tin tunus e ta Got men, si ku timen misan som. Awu. Mi pim alang si pim tuo pim epo wom maksin kut tumen, epo mi pim si to min epongin pit wo wom kho kut.

Epo, ehurok, tulu wom hu pit po pim tin tohuh men u kumang tin pim a wuh i men tumen; epo pim a kum to pi luk u to pi mhangin tumen kokyok kokyok, si kuma pim ku wa maikngin si ta po ta wom ta akomen, ma pim a pok put pok putngin tin tunus e ta Got men si ta wom.
Tuo wom ion wungin ta pim kho, kuru Got ion mi pim kut tumen, tin pim a kuk lunga wom ma pim a ning wungin epo wom tin wo wom phep men to wungin tin mi yil u siik u wungin om po pim men tumen,
wala wom ion wungin tin pim a wo nut wom u pa nhing wom u wo maran ko klat epo wom then then men tumen ken yang ta ning i epo husanin weh men,
epo wom men ku ira wungin tin tunus epo wom tin Got tin yuk wom epon ku lu sup mi enunu u moolngin tin tan weh men kha ku iran weh men.

Sinsin tin imen kha pim a sam sam Got sumsum epon men, epo minan tin wom wa sakalngin tin ta Got e wom hul i mi wo pim men, men ku wom wai ken i e ta po tunus engun men som. Awu. Wom wai ken i e sakalngin ta Got tin irawin e tuon kut men, tin kumang tan siin iis nginangan mi wom tin wo wom phep men.

Epo, ehurok, wom men kho si ira wungin pit mina sun tin ta palu walngin tin ta Got e ung e li li wo mulusngin Yudia e hi kuk mi Krais Yesus men. Epo wom wuh won maikngin kai wal yanga wili po tin wom khuuk wal ta wom weh men, ken sun tin po wai yanga wili po tin ung wo mulusngin Yudia men,

tin wi a-Yesus tin Akono men u po pokngin tin ta hi weh men kut tumen ko huu kho kut, anima po luul to pim maksin kut tumen; ma Got ku min saah pit wo po som, kuru po nolo po masang to sun wala mosop kut tumen,

men po uluu pim epo pim tin ku pok put sakalngin si ta po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men si kumali po palolongin, tin tumen kha po kuk e ning lasin ta hi ko po wal si nhum weh sumsum men; takuma min kakhat sun tin ta Got men kho ko po po ma nhum weh kut.
Kut si, ehurok, pim a klokngin lunga wom put monlo long, ma pim ku ion mara wom kyok som, si mi pim iso in to wom ako, tumen ma pim a tohuh kara kut epo pim ku ion mara wom to mi pim weh.
Tumen ma mi pim epo pim ku ti hang wom men, men ngo tin a-Pol men taku ning i tumen kokyok kokyok, takuma a-Nolongin klet put soput ta pim.

Epo ela weh tin pim a hoo mi pim u mi pim keh keh u moolngin tin ku ung mhi pim e ku pim a wangan po pim ton men tumen? Iyi, men wom tuo wom tin ku nuk to mara a-Yesus Krais minan tin ku yang me men ako, wah?
Epo wom kha moolngin u min kehngin tumen tin ta pim men.
Tumen ma pim a kuk li pim ku wuh i kyok som, men pim a wo taku tunus epo tuk ku misa tuk in Atens,
si tuk a tih a-Timoti tin wiro it e kum ta Got men, tin pim a kum then epo pok putngin tin tunus e ta Krais men, ku ti wa wom ko nhing u pa nhing wom tumen epo sakalngin tin wo wom nuk wet men,
epon akuli po ta wom ta papham wet wungin tin wo wom maik i wet wili po men; epo tuo wom ion i epo Got won ung wo it epo it ku lat won maikngin tin imen.
Iis, epo pim a pok wom kho minan tin pim a iso kuk to wom men epo it ku wuh won maikngin, ken sun tin si ta it kho kut men, men wom ion i kho ako.

Epo sinsin tin imen men nga wuh li ngo ku kaeng kyok som, kha nga tih a-Timoti ku ti ion wo phepngin tin ta wom men, epon akuli soput kara nuk tin emiun tin karong po nginangan men kuli karong wom epon men, men ku kumang tin pim a wuh i men ku li hut liit nuk engun.

Takuma homani ma a-Timoti yok hang wom ma yang kho me pol ta pim, men yang me to pok putngin tunus tin epo wo phepngin u min epongin tumen tin ta wom men, kuru yang pok epo wom tin tulu wom hu pim kokyok kokyok to mi wom tin tunus men, ma mi wom weh epo wom ku ion pim ken sun tin mi pim epo pim ku ion wom kut tumen --
tumen ma, ehurok, wungin mosop tin wo pim maik i u miu pim tuung epon men tumen, men pim a wa pa nhingngin min wo wom epo wo phepngin tin ta wom men.
Epon homani men pim a iso tunus kuk, tin taku wom pit nhing mi yang tin Akono men.
Epo pim ku sam sam Got tua emhut min kehngin mosop tin mi pim keh keh ton to mara Got tin ta it men pit mi wungin tin ta wom men?
Epo pim a kuk e tohuh epo kinesngin to pi luk u to pi mhangin, tumen, sumsum epo pim ku ion mara wom kuma pim a sum put wo phepngin ta wom li tunus weh.
Ma homani men ku Got tin Wirama it men tuon, u a-Yesus tin Akono ta it men tumen, ku nemeh soput ta pim tin ku pim a siik ti epo wom epon men.

Ma yang tin Akono men ku ning i ma min epongin tin ta wom men tin mi wom pit wo al u tin pit wo po masang to sun wala mosop men kut tumen, ku ung e ko po sun ma si kol weh, ken sun tin wala mi pim pit wo wom men,

kumali Got pa nhing mi wom to wungin tin sakalngin om min men ma wom kuk auluungin to mara Got tin Wirama it men minan tin kuli a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ku me to po mosop tin tan e auluungin men.

Kut ma, ehurok, pim taku uspo sakalngin ma pim a suh mi kinga wom u wo nut wom weh kut tumen mi a-Yesus tin Akono men, epo wungin tin wala kho ma wom wai mi wo pim men tin wom ku kuk e ira wungin tua kuma Got min saah pit po wom men, kha ku wom iso ning i tumen hambip ko po sun ung e li si kut men.
Epo tuo wom ion wungin tin pim a wo maran ko klat si ta wom kho to emhong tin ta a-Yesus tin Akono men kho kut.
Epo wungin tin Got min epon men wala ti, epo wom men ku si auluungin weh, kuma put wom kilil wungin elwanngin,
kumali wom mosop then then men ku ion wungin tin ku kasum wom emkusin tuon to wungin tin mi yil u ya wom pos ton men kut tumen,
si ku to mi wom tin siwil si epo elwanngin men ken po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som e pong epo Got men akomen,

epon akuli po ta yek ta wungin tin siik men ma nak nak endara tin ta wiron e ken i e tan tuon men pit mi wungin tin imen asin, epo yang tin Akono men tuon kha kuli ning wungin emhut sun tin mosop imen ako, ken sun tin pim a wo ta wom kho ma pim a uluu wom to mara pim tin ten ten e wo pim ung wo wom men.
Epo Got ku yuk it epo it ku sup mi wungin tin min lengwal men akomen, si men epon ku it kuk mi wungin tin auluungin men misan weh.
Tumen ma taku po ta wetpon wa wungin tin imen, men ku wetpon wa po tunus ta akomen, si men wetpon wa Got tin naa it epo Emiun Auluungin tin tan men kha men.

Kut si min epongin tin mi it pit wo po tin ehuro it men, men ku nga khung i epo ngo ku pan sakalngin epon ti epo wom akomen, epo wom tuo wom urut wungin mi wo Got weh epo wom tin ku mi wom pit wo al weh men.

Ma irawin epo wom ira min epongin tin tumen epo po ehuro it tin mosop e ung yanga pi Masedonia men kho kut. Takuma, ehurok, pim a suh mi kinga wom epo wom ku iso ning i tumen kuru hambip ko po sun ung e li si weh kut tumen;

kuru wom tohuh epo wom ku ira wungin tin ku wom ung mara ii engun men, kuma tulu wom hu pit wo kumang anaum tin ta wom weh men, ma wom ning kumang epo wili wom ta tuon tin ta wom weh men, ken sun tin pim a wo nut wom epon kho men,
kumali wom kuk e ira wungin tin siik men epo po tin kuk tak li wetpo so men, kuma wom ku kalwok epo endara ta akomen.
Kut si, ehurok, mi ngo epo wom ku pong epo engin epo po tin ko nuk e nhaung mi hunngin kho men akomen, epon akuli mi wom urut i ken po tin kara e hoo mingin ta hi om men.
Epon taku wo it phep pit wo a-Yesus tin hun ma khek kyok si tunus men, men wo it phep epo Got tin ku iso wa po tin ko nhaung mi a-Yesus men kyok me to yang men maksin kut tumen ako.

Epo wungin tin pim a wai mi wo yang tin Akono men weh men kha pim a sakal ta wom ti, epo it tin iso mara it to tunusngin kuk weh li pol minan tin kuli yang tin Akono men ku kyok me men, men ku kho li si muk kho epo po tin huu mi Krais kho men akomen.

Awu. Epo yang tin Akono men tuon ku me ko wet pi to wut tin pit pit hambip ta men, u to ingutngin tin ta tihngin tin maran pit wo sun kara men, u to kiyak tin ta Got e ku hau men tumen, khama po tin huu mi Krais kho men ku khek kho si muk kho.

Li klet anima it tin iso mara it to tunusngin kuk men ku uus pongin si lup to po mi hingis kuma it si tut yang tin Akono men put pi alilil. Ma wungin tin tumen kha kuli it kuk to yang tin Akono men kokyok kokyok li kut men.
Tumen ma wom men ku kuk e pa nhing wal epo wungin tin mosop imen.
Kut si, ehurok, wungin tin epo ungunan u elup tumen, men ku wom pong epo engin kuma pim a khung i epo pim ku pan wungin ti epo wom epon akomen.
Epo tuo wom ion i tunus kho kut epo ungunan tin ta yang tin Akono men ku me e ken po tin tipngin tin me to pi luk men engun.

Epo minan tin kuli po kuk e sakal taku, “It ung aminis u it ung anga tunusngin kut khae,” ti, kut men mhukngin mi ngin men ku si epo po kerek engun ken po wala tin kuman ma won maan maan epon ku wanhung men, ma soput tin ku po mhup li iran men pi om.
Si, ehurok, wom men ku kuk mi pi mi ku kuma ungunan tin imen salum po wom ken po tipngin ta men akomen.
Epo wom mosop men husani pi mi mlaeng u husani pi mhangin kut tumen. Si it men ku ta pi luk wa ta pi mi ku wa tumen akomen.
Tumen ma it men ku nhaung asol pongin ken po kara men asin, si it men ku mara it plal ma it haum tunus weh to tulun hungin.
Epo po tin nhaung men men nuk e nhaung to pi luk ako, u po tin um ma mara hihi men kuk e um to pi luk kut tumen.

Si it tin ta pi mhangin men ku haum tunus to tulun hungin kokyok kokyok, men ku it phi moolngin tin brasan e nghen po engai it men tin los po wo phepngin to min epongin men, kuru it men ku wa moolngin tin epo lek walngin e los po hoo mingin tin ku it iso palolongin epon men ko ung mhi it kut tumen.
Epo Got ku won ung wo it epon ku it sup mi min kakhat sun tin ta Got men akomen, si epon ku it wa palolongin yanga wili a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men,
tin hun mut eya it kuma taku mara it to tunusngin kuk wa it huu wa tumen, men kuli it iso tunus kuk to yang ako.
Tumen ma wom kuk e pa nhing wal ma wom khek wal si, e ken sun tin wom ung e ning i kut men.
Kuru, ehurok, pim a suh mi kinga wom epo wom ku hop po tin tohuh epo kumang lunga wom men ma wo wom nuk wet po tin mara hi pit wo wom mi yang tin Akono men tin wo nut wom men,
ma wom ion po ken po e akono weh men to min epongin, sinsin men in epo kumang tin po ning i men. Kuru wom men ku ung to wungin aminis tin ku nuk lunga wom men weh kut tumen.

Kut si, ehurok, pim a suh mi kinga wom epo wom ku wo nut po tin kuk wet wili sun engun men, u wom pa nhing mi po tin mi hi kauan men, u wom khek po tin wo hi wiak men si, kuru wom men ku wuh i li koho epo po mosop kut tumen.

Mara wom si kuk, epon akuli po ta ning wungin lengwal emhut sun ta po ta asin, si wom tohuh sumsum epo wom ku ira wungin tin tunus epo wom tuo wom men, kuru men tunus epo po masang to sun wala mosop kut tumen.
Mi wom keh keh sumsum;
wom kines Got, men ku wom nhing akomen;
wungin mosop tin si ta wom men, men ku wom sam sam Got min, epo wungin tin imen kha Got hihi i ta min mi Krais Yesus epo wom men;
wom kuk aku wom whus yau tin ta Emiun Auluungin men;
wom ning i aku wom ion wungin tin po pokngin pok put men ken i e lengwal engun men asin,
si wom ion mi wungin mosop tunus, ma wom kasum i tin tunus men pip weh.
Si wom men ku put wom kilil wungin tin lengwal e maran kiring kiring men mosop weh.

Homani ma Got tin sinsin epo min wyungin men ku tuon ning wom si auluungin mosop; ma emiu wom, u enu wom, u wom emkusin tumen, ku kasumngin mosop to al to wungin tin lasin om min men weh li pol minan tin kuli a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ku me men.
Yang tin yuk wom men men in to wungin tan anuh, men kuli iso suuk siin ning nginan weh ako.
Ehurok, wom kines Got epo pim weh.
Wom wa mi wom si ta po ehuro it mosop epo tumum wongin tin auluungin men ta.
Nga wa wom sup wet tung tungngin ta to mara yang tin Akono men epo wom men ku tiik kisang tin iyi to mara po ehuro it tin auluungin men mosop weh.
Nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ku in to wom. Men irawin.
A-Pol, u a-Silwanus, u a-Timoti, tumen kha pyuk a tirih kisang tin iyi ti epo palu walngin tin ta po Tesalonaika e hi kuk mi Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen.
Nanaangin u min wyungin tumen ku ko ta wom hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen.

Ehurok, tunus epo pim ku sam sam Got epo wom kokyok kokyok, ma men siik ako, epo wo phepngin tin ta wom men men ung e plok si nhum weh, kuru min epongin tin wom mosop then then mi wom pit wo al epon men ung e si po sun li si kut tumen.

Tumen ma tuo pim wangan po wom lunga palu walngin tin ta Got e ung e li li men epo wom tin nuk nhing u wo wom phep tumen wet wungin tin po ning i lengwal epo wom u wom sup mi maikngin men kut tumen, tin wom kuk e wuh i men.
Wungin tin imen men tosukngin ta tin nuk pi mlaeng men epo Got tin ples wungin siik men, kumali Got wo epo wom e tunus epon ku lu sup mi enunu tin tan men, tin wala wom wuh wungin epon homani men.
Epon men wungin siik ako epon tin taku Got ning i lengwal emhut sun tin po ning i lengwal epo wom men,
si yang wa nhingngin si ta wom tin po ning wom lengwal homani men to pim minan tin kuli a-Yesus tin Akono men ku si put plo nginan pi mlaeng ma me ko wet pi to po tihngin tin tan e apalukngin men
to yau tin ngiseng men ma yang ning wungin emhut sun ta po tin pong epo Got men u ta po tin ku hul wet pok putngin tin tunus e ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men akomen kut tumen.
Po tin imen ku wuh mumhek mingin tin emhut lasin ta hi men, men mhuk mingin tin sindak e ku po li kuk hin epo yang tin Akono men maran u epo moolngin tin ta kakhangin tin ta yang men kut tumen,

minan tin kuli yang me to Ungunan tin imen kuma yang wa moolngin lunga po tin auluungin e ta yang men u po mosop tin wo hi phep kho men ku whik wo yang ton kut tumen, epon tin kho ma wungin tin pim a pok put si ta wom men men wo wom nuk wet.

Tumen ma pim a kuk e ning kinesngin epo wom sumsum epo Got tin ta it men ku wo epo wom e tunus epo yukngin tin imen, ma yang kai wungin mosop tin mi wom epo wom ku ning i tunus men u kumang tin wo phepngin pong siin men tumen epo kakhangin tan tuon,
kumali a-Yesus tin Akono ta it men ku yan si nhum epo wom, u ya wom si nhum epo yang kut tumen, ira nanaangin tin ta Got tin ta it men u ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen.
Kut si, ehurok, a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men tin ku kyok me men u it tin ku me palu wal then hang yang men tumen, kha pim a suh mi kinga wom epon ti,

epo wom kuk aku wom kerek e kamus epo mi wom wa miu wom tuung taku emiun ta, wa sakalngin tin pok putngin men ta, wa sakalngin tin nuk yanga kisang men ta wa tumen, taku i e ken i e me hang pim men, ken ungunan tin ta Krais men e ku kho me kho kut men asin.

Wom kuk aku po ta me ek ek mara wom ira wungin maran ta wa sakalngin ta wa tumen asin, epo ungunan tin imen ku kho si som, si wungin tin po wetpo hi wa Got men tin nhum epo sun kara men ku kho si muk wet, ma yang tin ning lasin nginangan men si pol pi mlaeng, men yang tin ku iso ko khuukngin epon ku huuspit engun men.

Yang men nolo endara mosop tin po sikian e Got ta hi men u po uluu i tumen, wala yang si ung wo ehus ken yang e Got tuon men mi mang auluungin tin ta Got men, ma yang ning sasayihngin to mara po epo yang tuon ken yang e Got tuon men.
Iyi, tulu wom som epo kho ma nga iso in lunga wom men nga pok wom epo wungin tin imen ako, wah?
Ma homani ma wom ion enda tin klet soput ta yang men, kumali yang si put plo nginan mi elup tin tan weh men.

Epo wungin kaunngin tin epo wungin sinsin hik put nginan men men kho in e kum kut, takuma yang tin in e klet soput ta sun homani men ku iso klet soput li pol minan tin kuli yang klokngin lunga po li men, kumali soput si nuk.

Ma minan timen men ku yang tin hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men si pol pi mlaeng, tin a-Yesus tin Akono men ku kakiom i epo emiun tin pol won men, ma yang mhuk mi sun epo moolngin tin ku yang me ton e mara it lip lip i weh men.
Yang tin imen tin ku me epo emhong tin ta a-Nolongin men tin ku siin iis in min men to wungin maran kiring kiring u tosukngin u wungin a whik wo nginan tin tororokngin men tumen mosop,

u men ku me to wungin maran kiring kiring tin ku ek ek mi po men tin wungin tin ku siik som men sinsin pit epon men, tin ku si lunga po tin kuk epon ku huuspit men, epon tin min epongin tin pit wo wungin tin irawin men men ku po wai kho kuma po palolongin epon akomen.
Sinsin tin imen kha ku Got tih ek marangin po koklong ta tin ku siin iis mi po men kumali po wo hi nuk wet torokngin tin nhum men,
kumali po mosop kuli Got wo los po hi epo po ku huuspit, men po tin ku wo hi nuk wet wungin tin irawin men som, si po mi hi tunusngin pit wo wungin tin lengwal men.

Kut si, ehurok, wom tin yang tin Akono men min pit pit wo wom men, men tunus epo pim ku sam sam Got epo wom sumsum, epon tin ewo maran ma Got won ung wo wom epo wom ku palolongin epo Emiun Auluungin tin ku ning wom si auluungin men u wo phepngin ta wom tin ku pit wo wungin tin irawin men kut tumen.
Palolongin tin imen kha Got yuk wom epo wom ku sup min epo pok putngin tin tunus e pim a pok put men, kumali wom wa moolngin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men.
Tumen ma, ehurok, wom men ku pit nhing ma wom kasum wungin tin pat walngin me epo wom men, tin pim a kot wom epon kho men, taku epo sakalngin wa kisang ta pim wa tumen.

Homani men ku a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men tuon, u Got tin Wirama it men kut tumen, tin min pit wo it ma naa it epo pa nhingngin tin sindak men u hoo mingin tin tunus men kut tumen, epo min sukngin tin ta yang men,
ku pa nhing mi wom ma wa wom ko pit nhing mi kumang mosop u sakalngin tin turunus men mosop kut tumen.

Kut si, ehurok, pim taku uspo sakalngin ti, epo wom men ku kines Got epo pim epon ku sakalngin tin ta yang tin Akono men ku saa li yanga pi u po wa sakalngin yan si tumen, wala si tumen epo wom kho men,
u epon ku Got palolo pim yanga wili po tunus tin wungin ta hi ulil u lengwal men tumen, epo po mosop men ku kuk to wo phepngin akomen.
Si yang tin Akono men men in to wungin tan anuh, men ku iso wa wom ko pit nhing u haum eya wom epo emiun tin wungin tan lengwal men ako.
Ma wo pim phep pit wo yang tin Akono men epo wom, tin wom ira sakalngin tunus kut, kuru wom ku iso ira sakalngin tin pim a wo maran ko klat ta wom epon men maksin kut tumen ako.
Homani men ku yang tin Akono men muk wom li sup mi min epongin tin ta Got men u mi wungin tin ku wom pit nhing wet won maikngin ken Krais men kut tumen.

Kut si, ehurok, pim a wo maran ko klat ta wom epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men yan, epo wom men ku osong lu kuk hin epo po ehuro wom tin mosop e kuk e ira wungin tin po kuk wet wili sun engun men, si ku ira wungin tin pim a pat wal i me ko epo po men akomen.

Epo wom tuo wom ion i epon men tunus epo wom tin ku ira wungin pit mina sun tin ta pim weh men, epo pim tin kuk lunga wom kho men men ku pim a ira wungin tin pim a kuk wet wili po engun men ewin akomen,
u pim ku ii beret ta po ta hut emul engun ewin akomen kut tumen. Awu. Pim men wuh kumang u khung i tumen to pi luk u to pi mhangin kokyok kokyok, kuma pim a wa won maikngin ko ta po ta wom ta asin;
si ku ken pim ku kuk to emhong som kha pim a ning i tumen akomen. Awu. Men epon kumali pim a ning tosukngin ta to mara wom kuma wom ira wungin pit mina sun tin ta pim weh men.
Iis, epo kho ma pim a iso kuk to wom men pim a wo maran ko klat ta wom ti, “Epon taku po ta ku kum som, men ku ii endara akomen kut tumen.”
Epo pim a hul epo po kara kuk lunga wom men kuk wet wili po engun, si ku kum kara akomen. Awu. Men ku me sakal si kuk mi wungin tin ta po enginin kara men engul ako.

Epo po tin wungin ta hi nuk tumen men pim a wo maran ko klat epo po u suh mi kinga po kut tumen epo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men epo po men ku mara hi ain ma po kum engun kuma po ii beret tin ta hi weh men.
Si, ehurok, wom tin kara maksin men, wom kuk aku mi wom mokongin epo wungin tin tunus men ning nginan asin.
Si taku po ta ku hul wet sakalngin tin nuk mi kisang tin iyi som, men ku wom suk pit won tin imen weh, ma wom men ku klap i asin, kumali manngin wan.
Si wom ion yang ken yang e wom nolo i men asin, si wo wom nut yang ken i e wiro wom weh men.
Homani men ku yang tin Akono tin sinsin epo min wyungin men tuon wa min wyungin ko ta wom epo wungin mosop kokyok kokyok. Yang tin Akono men ku in to wom mosop.
Sakalngin tin nga wa mi ngo ti epon men, tin ngo a-Pol pan i epo wili ngo weh men, tin tosukngin nuk mi kisang mosop tin nga pan i men, kha nga pan i tumen epo wom iyi.
Nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ku in to wom mosop. Men irawin.
Ngo a-Pol tin paengin ta a-Yesus Krais epo wungin tin maran ko klat e ta Got tin Palolongin ta it men, u ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono e hoo mingin ta it pit won men kut tumen,

kha nga pan kisang tin iyi ti epo ngon a-Timoti tin wirukan weh mi wo phepngin tin ta tong then men. Nanaangin, u min sukngin, u min wyungin tumen tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men tumen ku in to ngon.

Ken nga wo nut ngon kho minan tin ngo ku yok li Masedonia men kha nga wo tap kyok homani epo ngon men ku iso ting in Epesus, kuma e wo nut po kara epo po men ku kot sun epo wungin tin maran kiring enginin enginin men asin.

Kuru po men ku wo hi nuk wet wungin tin lawinan engun men u pasikngin tin po pasik li hut li liit nuk engun men tumen asin, epon men pong si hek walngin kara si nuk lunga po kha men, si men ku khek po si nuk nhing pit mina wungin tin Got in ton men tin si epo wo phepngin men akomen.

Epo wungin tin nuk maran min pim ma pim a wo nut po epon men men min epongin tin me pol mi kuma po tin mi hi yil men, u men me pol mi kuma po tin ples wungin men tin ku wa wungin ta ko po po tuo hi men akomen, u men me pol mi wo phepngin tin irawin weh men kut tumen.
Wo phepngin tin imen po kara yek tan kho, ma po phae phae hi mili ira sakalngin tin ku enun ung hut ewin som men engun.
Po men taku si hi kara tin kot sun epo wungin sinsin men, takuma po ku mara hi ples wungin tin po sakal i u po heek epon men tumen sinsin ku ung tunus akomen.
Si it ion i epo wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men men tunus ako, tin taku po ta ning kumang epon to wungin tin ira wungin sinsin weh men.

Epo it ion i ti, epo wungin sinsin men ku hihingin nuk epo po ta tin ku wungin tan siik men akomen, si men hihingin nuk epo po tin wetpo hi wa wungin sinsin men to po tin ku wa hi me sup wet wungin sinsin ewin som men, u epo po tin ku ira wungin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men ewin som men to po tin ning lasin nginangan men, u epo po tin ku wo hi nuk wet endara auluungin ta ewin som men to po tin wo hi nuk wet wungin tin ta pi mulus men misan men, u epo po tin lek po irama hi to eleni hi ko huu ewin men, u epo po tin lek sun tunus ko huu nginangan men,

u epo po tin ning elwanngin nginangan men, u epo po masang tin ning elwanngin epo sun masang ken po Sodom ning i ewin men, u epo po tin li tip sun me kum wo hi nginangan men, u epo po tin torok nginangan men, u epo po tin tung tung takuma hik put sakalngin pit po sun engun men, kuru epo wungin tin kara maksin e nuk akani e nolo kotngin tin ning i ma it ku pit nhing epon men,
tin nuk siik to pok putngin tin tunus e to moolngin tin ta Got tin ung tunus weh mi emhong tin tan weh men, tin yang wai ko nuk yanga wili ngo kuma marango pit won ta yang men.

Ma nga sam sam Krais Yesus tin Akono ta it men, tin wa kakhangin si ta ngo kho men, epon tin yang ion ngo ken ngo e in to wungin tin anuh men, wala yang won ung wo ngo ku me sup mi kumang tin tan men.

Aku, kho ma nga in ken po ta tin ton mi a-Yesus nginangan men, u ken po tin ning i lengwal epo po tin wo hi phep pit wo yang men, u ken po tin songhu pit wo sun nginangan men kut tumen. Taku li klet ma nga wa min sukngin epo nga ning wungin tin imen men nga pong epo engin ma ngo ku wo ngo phep som men kha nga ning i men.
Ma min sukngin tin yang tin Akono ta it men naa ngo epon men ko pu wal po ngo weh, to wo phepngin u min epongin tin in mi Krais Yesus men.
Sakalngin anuh ta tin tunus epo po mosop ku hul wet men wala ti, epo Krais Yesus me in wo mulus epon ku yang palolo po tin kuk to lasin men, wala ngo tin li muk epo po men.

Takuma sinsin tin nga wa min sukngin epon men wala ti, epon ku epo ngo kha ku a-Yesus Krais wa wungin tan tin yang wuh wungin li maran nomalak weh epon men si in pi mlaeng epo ngo muk, ken tosukngin ta epo po tin ku iso wo hi phep pit po yang epon ku po wa tunusngin tin sindak men.

Homani men ku yang tin Sinkhaung e sindak in e ku hun ewin som u ku mara it kon i ewin som men kut tumen, men Got tin then e mhin ek weh men, ku yang yan pos u po sam sam yang tumen kokyok kokyok li kut. Men irawin.

Wiruk, Timoti, wungin tin maran ko klat iyi kha nga wai ti in yanga wilip kuma marap pit won tunus weh, men ti nuk pit mina sakalngin tin po pokngin pok put kho epo ngon men, kumali wungin tin imen kha ku e wuh weh epo lek walngin tin tunus men,
to wo phepngin u mip tin ples wungin e wungin om po ngon tuon min men. Po kara wetpo hi wa wungin tin imen, ma wo phepngin ta po men mhukngin ken imut ta tin li pal po enah men.
Wala a-Himeneus ngong Aleksanda in mi po tin imen, wala nga wa wulong si nuk yanga wili a-Nolongin kuma po urut sakalngin tin ku wulong ning ton mingin epon som men.

Tumen ma nga wo nut ngon muk kho epo wungin kara epo wungin tin po hau si wo Got men, u kinesngin, u wungin tin po kines Got mut eya sun ewin men, u sam samngin tin ku si men kut tumen men ku kara ningngin epo po tunus mosop.

Men ku ningngin epo po tin sinkhaung men u epo po mosop tin sun wa nowio ko wut hi epo po tin ku mara hi pit wo sun men kut tumen, kumali mara it ii ma it ung aminis wo mulus to wungin tin mosop e pit mina sun tin Got in ton men u to wungin tin mara it arre to sakalngin men kut tumen.
Epo wungin tin imen men tunus kuru to min nawaehngin kut tumen to mara Got tin Palolongin ta it men,
tin min epo po tunus mosop ku palolongin ma po kyok me sup mi maran ekngin tin po ion wungin tin irawin men epon men.
Epo Got then ta misan in, kuru po ta tin in emin Got u po tunus kut tumen men then ta misan in kut tumen, men Krais Yesus tin tunusan men,
tin min alang siin tuon ken talungin ta tin ku kiis i mut eya po mosop men, men wungin tin pok putngin si to elup tin tan weh kut men.

Wungin tin imen kha Got won ung wo ngo epo ngo ku in ken po ta tin pok put wungin epon u ken po paengin ta kut tumen (nga sakal irawin mi Krais si ngo ku torok akomen) ngo tin in ken po ta tin ku kot sun tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men to wo phepngin u wungin tin irawin men kut tumen.
Tumen ma mi ngo epo po masang tin ung e li li yanga pi kut men men ku hi wa wili hi tin auluungin men si ma po kines Got to mi hi tin yan salngin u min tin ku ponwal men om min men.

Kuru wungin tin tumen kha ku po wala mool epo moolngin tin po wa ya hi tunus epon men kut tumen, men ku to wungin tin ku manngin wa po epon som men u to wungin tin po karut hi tunus epon men kut tumen, si ku epo po yut hi tin ku po mol mol i men wa gol wa erel wa moolngin tin kulngin epo ulu hambip men wa tumen asin.
Si moolngin tin siik epo po wala tin wo taku hi e kuk to wungin tin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men kha ku po mool epon men, men wungin tin tunus men ning nginan ako.
Po wala ta men ku urut sakalngin to won tin kup men to wungin tin klet min e hul wet sakalngin mosop epon men.
Kuru ngo men ku mang ta po wala ta tin ku kot sun masang ta wa in to emhong tin ku maran pit wo yang masang ta men ewin akomen. Awu. Si men ku maran ain ma won kup engun.
Epo Adam kha Got pang i muk men, anima Ewa.
Kuru Adam ani ku torokngin ek ek min men som. Awu. Ewa kha torokngin ek ek min ma wut plong ko mi wungin tin wut hik put sakalngin ta Got men.

Takuma wut men kuli palolongin epo po hoin khuuk nginan, tin taku po iso ira wo phepngin u min epongin, u wungin tin ku po kuk auluungin ton men kut tumen, to wungin tin ku po karut hi tunus epon men.
Wungin anuh ta wala nuk ti, taku po ta min epon ku si wa kumang tin ta po tin mara hi pit wo palu walngin men, men min epo kumang tunus ta ako.

Tumen ma po ta tin ku maran pit wo palu walngin men men ku wungin om pon weh, men ku titien wala then ta misan, men ku min nuk weh to wungin tin amunu men, men ku tuon karut i tunus, men ku wungin tan hihingin tunus, men ku to wungin tin naa po tin me sup mi mang tin tan men, men ku won ek i epon ku kot po tunus weh;

kuru men ku in to wungin tin min epon ku um wain hambip men asin, men ku in to wungin amhees asin, men ku min pit pit wo ulu tin ku torok mara sun ma wai men asin, si men ku in to wungin tin amang maran men engun, men ku maran ii, si men ku in to maran nesngin asin;
kuru men ku maran pit wo po tin hi khuuk wal e hi ung mi mang then men tunus weh, ma in to husanin tin kuk wet wilin to uluungin tin pit won e klet mi hi men
(epon taku po ta ku ion wungin tin ku maran pit wo mang tan tuon tunus som men, men ku tua ma ku maran pit wo palu walngin tin ta Got men?);
kuru men ku po ta tin ku won phep homan men asin, epon akuli wai si pit, men ku plong ko mi mumhek mingin tin kai sun tin ta emiun tin hik put wungin pit po po nginangan men.
Kuru men ku yan tunus to mara po tin kuk mara so epo palu walngin men, epon akuli plong ko mi wungin tin to manngin men ma kuh mi esih tin ta emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men.

Kuru ira wungin tin tumen kha ku po dikon tin kum ta palu walngin men men ku kuk to wungin tin po ya hi tunus epon men kut tumen, po men ku kuk to mamai hi ponwal ma pok put sakalngin ta u ta tumen asin, po men ku kuk to wungin tin ku po um wain hambip men asin, po men ku mi hi pit pit wo ulu tin ku po torok mara sun ma po wai ta sun men asin,
si po men ku kasum wungin kaunngin tin wo it nuk wet men to mi hi tin ples wungin e min yil weh men misan.
Ma ngon men ku karong po tin imen muk wet, ma taku lasin om po po, khama e mang ta po si dikon ma po ning kumang ta palu walngin.

Kuru ira wungin tin tumen kha ku po wala tin pit ta sun men men ku kuk to wungin tin po ya hi tunus epon men kut tumen, si po men ku kuk to wungin tin ku po hik put wungin pit po sun nginangan men asin, u po men ku mi hi pit pit epo wungin tin amunu men, u po men ku kuk to wungin tin anuh men epo wungin mosop tin ku po ning i men kut tumen.
Si po dikon tin kum ta palu walngin men men ku titien hi then ta misan, ma ku mara hi pit wo husani hi to po tin kara e hi kuk mi mang tin ta hi weh men tunus weh.
Epo po tin kuk dikon ma kum tunus ta palu walngin men men ku wa ya hi tunus weh ma ku kuk to mi hi tin to wo phepngin ta hi tin maran ko klat weh e pit wo Krais Yesus men.
Sakalngin tin iyi men nga pan i ti epo ngon, takuma nga hoo mi ngo epo put monlo long kha nga ti epo ngon.

Si taku nga iak kara long, men nga pan wungin tin iyi kho ti kut kuma e ion wungin tin tunus epo ngon ku karut ngon weh mi mang tin ta Got men, men palu walngin tin ta Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men, tin lapalak u sinsin tumen epo wungin tin irawin men.

Ma wungin kaunngin tin ta wo phepngin tin ta it e pit wo Got men men nhum takut, ma men maran ko klat weh wala nuk ti: Got men si in pi mlaeng mi emkusin then ta kho kut, men si in siik to mara po epo Emiun Auluungin, men po tihngin kara ion i, men pok putngin si lunga po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men, men po tin ung wo mulus men wo hi nuk wet, u men wangin li si to moolngin kut tumen.

Kut si Emiun Auluungin pok put wungin si in pi mlaeng weh epo elup kara tin kuli iso me sulung epo sun tin i, men ku po kara wetpo hi wa wungin tin wo it nuk wet men, si po hul wet emiun enginin kara tin ku ek ek mi po men u kotngin kara tin ta emiun tin lengwal men kara kut tumen,
ma po sakal ira wungin torokngin kara to wungin amui tin kaun nuk mi hi men, epo mi po tuo hi tin ples wungin men men ku sakalngin yo yo po engun ken ain ngeng ngeng ta tin moom mi po men.
Po men ku uluu sun epo enanginngin, u po uluu sun epo endara aiingin kara kut tumen, tin Got pho pon epon ku po tin wo hi phep ma ion wungin tin irawin men ku wai to sam samngin men.
Epo endara mosop tin Got pho pon men men tunus ako, ma ku it mut i ta akomen, tin taku it wai to sam samngin men,
epon men si auluungin epo sakalngin ta Got u kinesngin tumen.

Wungin timen taku e kot po ehuro it epon, men ku e in ken po tin kum tunus ta a-Yesus Krais men ta, ken ngon e plok si tunus mi sakalngin tin ta wo phepngin men u ta kotngin tin tunus e e klap i kuma e iran men.
Si wungin tin lawinan e amiron nginan engun e po wala tin hyangan men pok put men men ku put ngon kilil i li, si e hihi ngon epo ngon ku si in to wungin tin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men weh.

Epo tohuhngin tin it hihi emkus a it epon ku it pit nhing epon men men ku nhio wo it kara ako, si wungin tin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men men ku nhio wo it epo wungin mosop, epon men wo kuk mara it epo tunusngin tin in homani men, kuru tunusngin tin ku iso si sulung men kut tumen.
Wungin anuh ta tin tunus epo po mosop ku wo hi nuk wet men wala timen.

Epo sinsin tin pim a wuh kumang u po wa mimingin los pim epon men tumen wala ti, epon men pim a hoo mi pim pit wo Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men, tin Palolongin ta po tunus mosop men, si men Palolongin ta po tin wo hi phep men weh.
Wungin tin mosop imen men ku e wo maran ko klat epon weh ma e kot po epon.

E ning i aku e mang ta po ta tin ku ion ngon tin hoin men e ken ngon e lengwal men asin. Si ngon men ku in ken tosukngin ta epo po tin wo hi phep men to wungin tin ku e sakal i men, u to wungin tin e karut ngon ton men, u to min epongin, u to emiu ngon, u to wo phepngin tap, u to wungin tin min yil men kut tumen.
Marap pit mi Kisang Auluungin tiik nginan to mara po masang to sun wala, u wo nutngin, u kotngin tumen li pol minan tin ku nga ti men.

Si e ning i aku wetpop wa talungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin e in mi ngon men, tin wangin ko po ngon si mi wungin tin po pokngin pok put men to wungin tin po tin akokono ta palu walngin men wili hi si nuk po ngon men.
Marap pit mi wungin tin mosop imen kokyok kokyok. E wa ngon sup wet wungin timen weh, kuma wungin tap tin ung e si tunus men ku si in pi mlaeng to mara po masang to sun wala mosop.

E haum tunus weh epo tuop u epo kotngin tin ku e kot po epon men kut tumen, ma e tohuh weh epo ngon ku iso iran, epon taku e ning i tumen, men ku e palolo ngon tuop u po tin kuk e hul wet ngon men kut tumen.
E in aku e pio po masang tin hyangan men ta asin, si e suh mi kinga yang ken yang e wiramap ta men, kuru e ning i tumen epo po masang tin nenerengin men ken po e wom irit won weh men kut tumen.

Kuru e ning i tumen maksin epo po wala tin hyangan men ken po e eleni ngon weh men, kuru e ning i tumen epo po wala tin nenerengin men ken po e ehulut ngon weh men kut tumen, men ku e ning i to wungin tin min yil men misan.
E nhio wo po wala wamuh tin kalwok weh men.

Si taku wut wala wamuh ta men husanin wa ehuron tumen kara kuk, men ku po tin imen kha ku urut wungin muk tin ku po wo hi nuk wet Got ton mi po tin hi khuuk wal weh men ma po emhut naumngin tin ta wirama hi ngong toni hi tin pit wo po men. Epo wungin tin imen men tunus to mara Got, ma yang min nawaehngin pit pon ako.
Si wut wala ta tin in wamuh weh ma misan in men, men wa hoo mingin tan si pit wo Got weh, ma men in e wilayuk epo haungin u kinesngin tumen to pi luk u to pi mhangin tumen kokyok kokyok.
Si taku po wala wamuh ta in epon ku ira wungin tin emkusin ngelek won men engun, aku, men iso tunus in, takuma men ken i e hun kut.
Ma wungin tin imen men ku e wo maran ko klat epon, kuma wungin men ku om po po weh.

Si taku po ta ku hihi endara epo po tin ta hi men som, men ku epo po tin hi ung mi mang then ta men weh, men po tin imen wetpo hi wa sakalngin tin wo it nuk wet men kha men, ma ko nuk lengwal weh epo po tin ku wo hi phep som men kara kha men.
Wut wala wamuh ta tin posan tan khum ta me sup (60) u li si tumen kho li men, men ku e wai mu sup to sun tin tiikngin kho men, kuru men ku in to min tin kho ma pit wo po masang then ta misan men,

u men ku po ta tin po sikian e ning wungin tunus ewin men, tin taku wut ut husanin li hi si nomuru men, u taku wut wa po nomisang me sup mi mang tan ma maran pit wo po tunus, u taku wut khis po khi po tin auluungin men, u taku wut nhio wo po tin miu hi tuung wet maikngin men, u taku wut tohuh epo wut ku ira wungin tin mosop e turunus men kut tumen.

Si po wala wamuh tin iso nenerengin men men ku e hul wet hi ma e pan ya hi ko nuk yanga kisang asin. Epon taku po mi hi kling si, men ku po mi hi tin pit wo Krais men put mih, ma po mi hi epo po ku enangin kyok,
men ku po wo los po hi tuo hi epon tin po wetpo hi wa wungin tin po tung tung epon muk men.

Kuru wungin kara maksin men si po sun ti, po men ku urut wungin tin ku po mayongngin epon ma po mut mara sun li mang ta u mang ta tumen engun. Si ku mayongngin misan som, si men ku po sakal pit wetpo sun u po kinga hi si kuk wet wungin ta sun tin enginin men kut tumen, ma po sakal ira sakalngin tin tunus epon ku po sakal iran som men.
Tumen ma mi ngo epo po wala wamuh tin nenerengin men men ku enangin ma khuuk sun, ma lang pit wo mang ta hi tunus, epon akuli po wa soput ta si nuk epo po nolo tin ku mimi it epon men kha men.
Epo po kara yek ta soput kho ma hi phae hi li ira a-Nolongin kho kut.

Taku po masang won phep ta wa po wala won phep ta kuk to po wala tin wamuh men kara, men ku po tuo hi nhio wo sun kuma sun men ku wo hi pias. Si po men ku mang ta maikngin timen ko los palu walngin asin, si kuma palu walngin nhio wo po wala tin wamuh e kalwok weh men kuma po wo hi pias engun.

Po akono tin mara hi pit wo palu walngin tunus weh men men ku e wo ta palu walngin ma po ion sun ken po e tunus epon ku ya hi lupngin si then, men ku wom ning i tumen weh epo po tin wuh kumang epo sakalngin u kotngin tumen pok put nginan men.
Epo Panngin Auluungin men wo taku, “Wom men ku paim wo bulmakau minan tin li khin sak sak po wit men asin.” Kuru men wo kyok taku, “Po tin kum anaum men men tunus epon ku hi kulngin weh kut ako.”
E ning i aku e hul wet wungin tin hik putngin pit wo po akono ta men asin, si taku wulong ponwal wa wuluk myuk wa tumen tin mara hi nuk po wungin tin imen weh men kha ku e hul wet hi men.
Ma taku po kara iso kuk e ning lasin, men ku e tak si lasin ta hi si in pi mlaeng to mara po masang to sun wala tin munuman men, kuma po tin imen men ku lem.

Nga sakal siik si tap to mara Got u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men u tihngin tin Got won ung wo hi mi sun kara men kut tumen, epo ngon men ku kasum wungin tin mosop imen ma e iran tin imen weh, si ngon men ku ples wungin wo wungin tin e phaeng won men asin wa takonngin ani ku tak tulu ngon ma e ples wungin ta po ta enginin epo sun ta akomen kut tumen.
Ngon men ku pus wilip si nuk po po ta tin ku si akono men kerek asin, epon akuli lasin ta po kara kyok me ung po ngon. Si ngon men ku marap pit wo ngon kuma lasin om po ngon weh.
Si ngon men ku um eki misan kokyok asin, si e um wain sakun kara kuma nhio wo kumap ma luul to saihngin tin si tap nang nang men.
Lasin ta po kara men nuk pi mlaeng kho, ma muk po li epo ples walngin, si lasin ta po kara men ku iso si pol pi mlaeng mi khi hi tin kho li men ako.
Tumen kut kha wungin tin po kara ning wungin ta hi tunus men ku si in pi mlaeng men, ma taku kara ku in pi mlaeng som, men ku tin imen kaunngin nuk kokyok kokyok akomen.

Po mosop tin epus si nuk uwa hi to kumang tin po kum wet wili sun engun men men ku ion po phua tin ta hi weh men ken hi e tunus epon ku po uluu sun weh, kuma Got yan u kotngin tin tan men tumen ku ton mingin akomen.

Ma taku po phua tin sun kum wo hi men kara wo hi phep, men ku po tin kum wo sun men ku kuk aku po phaeng taku po ehuro hi ma po ku wo hi nuk wet sun akomen. Si men tunus epo po men ku kum wo sun epo po tin sun kum wo hi e wa nhio wongin men men wo hi phep ma po mi hi pit wo al. Ma wungin tin imen ku e kot po epon u e wo nut po epon kut tumen.

Si taku po ta kot sun epo wungin enginin ta ma ku min then to sakalngin tin ning i ma po pit nhing ton men, tin wala ken sun tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, u kotngin tin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men kut tumen,

men po tin imen wai si pit engun kha men, ma ku maran ek wungin sinsin ta akomen. Si men in to saihngin tin po ngelek wo kinesngin u heek walngin tin si epo sakalngin put kara u put kara tumen, tin pong si min heh wet po u heek walngin u ton mingin u hoo mingin lengwal tin pit wo al men

u heek walngin tin po tin tulun hungin ta hi whuk ma wungin irawin om mi hi men kuk e ning i kokyok kokyok men kut tumen. Epo po tin imen phaeng taku wungin tin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men kha ku po si wa miranngin epon men. Po tin wungin ta hi nuk tumen men ku put ngon kilil po engun.
Si wungin tin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men taku mi it nawaehngin ton, men timen it wa miranngin hambip epon ako.
Epo it ko khuukngin wo mulus, men ku it wa endara ta me to it som, kuru wungin nuk pi mlaeng kho epo it ku kyok li pol to endara ta akomen kut tumen.
Si taku it kuk to enda aiingin u moolngin kut tumen, men ku mi it nawaehngin to endara tin imen engun.

Si po tin mi hi epon ku si mimiran men men plong ko mi karongngin u hi plong ko mi esih tin po kuh i men, u po plong ko mi min wawai tin ulil u tin mhuk po men kut tumen munuman, tin pamut po ko mi mumhek mingin u wungin tin po huuspit min men kut tumen.

Epo po tin mi hi pit pit wo ulu men men sinsin epo wungin lengwal maran kiring kiring. Ma wungin tin imen kha po kara yek ta wungin tin wo it nuk wet men kho to mi hi tin ngelek epo ulu men, ma po tuo hi nii hi epo wungin munuman tin po mi hi urut hi ton men.

Si ngon tin kum ta Got men, auweh, ngon men ku saa lu in hin epo wungin tin mosop imen weh, si e sau wungin tin siik men misan, u wungin tin pit mina sun tin Got in ton men, u wo phepngin, u min epo ngin, u wungin tin ku e pit nhing wet won maikngin men, u wungin tin amunu men kut tumen misan.

E tohuh epo lek walngin tin tunus e mut eya wo phepngin tin irawin men weh, e isum tunusngin tin sindak men, tin Got yuk ngon epon ku e wai ma e nut sakalngin tin e pok put epon tunus to mara po munuman tin nuk e hul wet ngon men.
Nga wo tap siik to mara Got tin wa tunusngin si ta endara mosop men u to mara Krais Yesus tin nut sakalngin pok put nginan tin tunus men to mara a-Pontius Pailat men kut tumen,

epo ngon men ku kasum sakalngin tin nga wo tap siik epon men ma e iran to lasin tin om po ngon men. Ngon men ku kasum sakalngin tin imen weh li pol minan tin kuli a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men ku si put plo nginan in pi mlaeng men.

Yang kha ku Got wai si in pi mlaeng mi elup tin tan weh men, men Got tin ung tunus weh mi emhong tin tan weh men, tin then maran pit wo endara mosop men, tin Sinkhaung epo po sinkhaung mosop u Akono epo po akono mosop kut tumen,

tin then e ku hun ewin som ma ung mi esul tin ngiseng weh e ku it li tikayung i akomen. Men yang tin ku po ta maran kon i kho som men, kuru po talok mi engin epo po tin ku mara hi kon i men kut tumen. Got tin imen men ku yan pos u in apalukngin kokyok kokyok tumen kokyok kokyok li kut.

Kut si e wo maran ko klat epo po tin kuk to miranngin hambip mi elup tin in homani men epo po men ku wai si pit asin. Kuru po men ku hoo mi hi pit wo miranngin tin ku siin kaek weh som men asin kut tumen, si hoo mingin ta hi men ku pit wo Got tin in kokyok kokyok men, tin naa it hambip epo endara mosop kuma mi it keh keh epon men.

Kuru po men ku ning wungin tunus, kuma po si miran epo wungin tin po ning i tunus epo sun men, ma po hihi epo po ku wa endara si ta sun, men ku po pok mi endara ta hi ma po naa sun tin kalwok men epon engun.
Epo wungin tin imen kha ku po halung po miranngin ta hi tin ku sinsin in tunus epo elup tin ku iso si men, kumali po isum tunusngin tin sindak e in men.

Auweh, Timoti, e haum eya wungin tin Got wai si tap epon ku marap pit won men, si put ngon kilil sakalngin kara pok put sakalngin ken po e kuk ton men, ma wungin timen kha po yek ta wungin tin irawin e wo it nuk wet men epon men. Nanaangin tin ta Got men ku weh in to ngon. Men irawin. tin ta po tunus e po phuk min si po sakal i engun men, u sakalngin tin po torok ma po sikian e maran ekngin men tin po taku sakal hik put wungin tap epon men kut tumen.
Maran ekngin tin imen po
Ngo a-Pol tin paengin ta a-Yesus Krais epo wungin tin nuk ta mi Got men, tin ira wungin tin wo kuk mara ngin tin epo tunusngin tin in mi Krais Yesus men,

kha nga tih kisang tin iyi ti epo ngon a-Timoti tin wirukan e mi ngo epo ngon weh men. Nanaangin u min sukngin u min wyungin tumen tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u Krais Yesus tin Akono ta it men tumen men ku weh in to ngon.

Nga sam sam Got tin nga kum tan epo mi ngo tin ples wungin e mi yil weh men, ken sun tin po tin khuuk wal me khuuk ngo men ning i men, epo tulu ngo hu ngon mi kinesngin tin ta ngo men to pi luk u to pi mhangin tumen, si ngo ku nhing som.
Epo tulu ngo hu tinisngin tin ko marap men kha nga in e hiim ngon epo ngo taku ion ngon weh men, kuma min kehngin ku kol mi ngo weh.

Nga sam sam Got epo ngon minan tin tulu ngo hu pit po wo phepngin tin nuk mi ngon e irawin weh men, tin muk ma in mi etiyim e-Lois u tonim e-Yunis kut tumen, khali homani ma wo ngo phep epon men in mi ngon maksin kut tumen ako.
Sinsin tin imen kha nga tak tulu ngon epo ngon ku pong yau kyok, tin talungin ta Got e in mi ngon epo ngo tin wa wili ngo si nuk mhi ngon men.
Epo Got ku wa emiun tin epo lemngin men ta si ta it kho akomen, si yang wa emiun tin epo kakhangin, u min epo ngin, u wungin tin it karut it tunus epon men tumen misan kha si ta it men.

Tumen ma ngon men ku manngin wap epo ngon tin ku pok put wungin epo yang tin Akono ta it men u epo ngo tin kan kanngin pit mi yang men kut tumen asin. Si ngon men ku pok mi won maikngin to ngo tin nga wuh i pit mi pok putngin tin tunus men ira kakhangin tin ta Got men.

Yang wala palolo it kho ma yang yuk it epo it ku ira wungin tin auluungin weh men, men ku ira kumang ta it ta som, si men ira wungin tin yang tuon hihi i nuk ta min u min sukngin tin yang naa it epon mi Krais Yesus kho men kut tumen, si pi tin ku iso si ma ung e li men men ku iso si ma ung e li.

Taku li homani ma sakalngin tin imen pok putngin si in pi mlaeng epo a-Yesus Krais tin Palolongin ta it men tin si put plo nginan kho men, tin hik put emhong tin ta hunngin men kho kut, ma wa tunusngin u wungin tin po ku huu ewin kyok som men tumen si nuk pi mlaeng epo pok putngin tin tunus men.
Men pok putngin tin tunus e Got won ung wo ngo epo ngo ku si po ta tin ku pok put sakalngin epon men, u si po paengin ta, u si po ta tin ku kot sun tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men kut tumen.

Sinsin tin imen kha nga wuh won maikngin tin mosop imen epon men. Takuma ngo ku manngin wa ngo akomen, epo nga ion yang tin wo ngo phep pit won men, kha mi ngo puplet weh epo yang men kakha epon ku haum eya endara tin wo ngo phep pit wo yang ma nga wai si nuk yanga wili yang epon ku yang maran pit won ta ngo men weh li pol to ungunan tin imen.

Ngon men ku kasum sakalngin tin ku po nuk nhing epon e e hul i mi wo ngo kho men, tin marap kon i ken tosukngin ta men, men ku e kasum i to wo phepngin u min epongin kut tumen tin in mi Krais Yesus men.
Sakalngin tin tunus e wangin ko tap kho men men ku e haum eyan tunus epo Emiun Auluungin tin ung mi it men.
Kut si ngon men ion wungin tin iyi kho, epo po mosop tin ung wo mulusngin Esia men wetpo hi wa ngo kho kut, men a-Pigelus u a-Hermogenes tumen men ngong in mi hi ako.

Yang tin Akono men ku min suk po tin khuuk wal mi mang tin ta a-Onesiporus men, epo yang men angan munuman kho ma yang ning i ma mi ngo kyok si tunusngin, si yang ku manngin wan epo ngo tin esih tin po koklong men kan kan ngo men akomen.
Awu. Minan tin yang me pol Rom men, ma yang tohuh weh ma yang in e langun epo ngo, li yang pon ta ngo kho kut.
Yang tin Akono men ku mang, si yang pon ta min sukngin tin me hang sun men to elup tin epo ples walngin men. Epo e ion i tunus epo wungin tin tuni tuni e kho ma yang nhio wo ngo Epesus epon men.
Tumen ma, ngon tin wirukan men, e pit nhing to nanaangin tin in mi Krais Yesus weh men.

Ma wungin tin e hul i e me pol mi wo ngo mi po tin munuman e mara hi nuk pon men, men ku e wai si nuk yanga wili po tin kuk to wungin anuh men, tin wo hi ek hi epon ku kot sun tin enginin kara men maksin kut tumen.
Tumen ma ngon men ku wuh won maikngin ken po nolo tunus ta tin ta a-Yesus Krais weh men.

Yang nolo ta tin ung epon ku li hi lek wal men ku kan kan i tuon to wungin tin ta pi mulus men ewin akomen, epon kumali yang ning i ma phua tin won ung wo yang epo yang ku me sup to po tin nolo men ku min tunusngin pit pon.
Kuru taku yang ta ku li hi ku urut mara al, men ku wa moolngin tin po wai ko ung mhi sun men engun akomen. Awu. Men ku ira wungin sinsin epo wungin tin imen weh, anima wa moolngin tin imen.
Kuru yang ta tin lip nginangan epo mipi men, kuli endara aiingin muru, men kuli wai muk epo po kara men ako.
Tulup hu pit po wungin tin nga sakal i men, men yang tin Akono men ku naa ngon epo maran ekngin tin ku e ples wungin sinsin mosop epon men weh.
Tulup hu pit po a-Yesus Krais tin khekngin kyok si lunga po tin huu kho men, tin pol hut mulu tin ta a-Dewit men, men ira pok putngin tin tunus e nga pok put kho men.

Pok putngin tin tunus imen kha nga wuh won maikngin epon ken ngo e po ta tin ning wungin lengwal ewin men kha men, men nga wuh i weh li po kan kan ngo epo esih tin po koklong weh men. Takuma sakalngin tin ta Got men ku kan kanngin ewin akomen.
Tumen ma nga wuh won maikngin mosop, sinsin men epo po tin Got won ung wo hi men, kumali po wa palolongin tin in mi Krais Yesus men to moolngin tin sindak in men.
Wungin anuh ta tin ku wo it nuk wet weh men men nuk ti: epon taku it huu to yang, men kuli it kyok si tunus kuk to yang maksin kut tumen ako.

Taku it pit nhing wet won maikngin weh li pol, men kuli it si kai po tin sinkhaung men kara ma mara it pit wo endara to yang. Si taku it sup sup put yang, men kuli yang sup sup put it maksin kut tumen ako.
Taku it hik put wo kuk marangin tin ta it men, men ku yang iso ira wungin tin yang wo kuk mara it epon men ako, epon men khung nginan weh epo yang tin ku wetpon wa wungin tin tan tuon men.

Ngon men ku in e tak tulu po epo wungin tin mosop imen weh, ma marap arre to sakalngin weh ma e wo nut po to mara Got epo po ku heek wal pit mi sakalngin put kara tin ku nhio wo po som men asin, men sakalngin tin mhuk mi po tin hul i men kha men ako.

Ngon men ku tohuh weh epo ngon ku si in to mara Got ken po ta tin Got ion mi wungin tan kho ma yang wo epon e tunus men, tin kum ta yang ewin ma ku in to wungin ta tin ku manngin wan epon men akomen, epon men maran tak si sakalngin tin irawin men si sisiik ewin.

Si ngon men ku put ngon kilil sakalngin tin ta pi mulus e lemngin tin pit wo Got men om min men. Epo wungin tin imen kha ku wa wungin tin po wetpo hi wa wungin tin pit mina sun tin ta Got men ung e ko po sun li si men.
Ma sakalngin tin ta po men ku ung e pawha li yanga pi ken elak tin ung e samlal po ta men. A-Himeneus ngong a-Piletus kha ngong in mi po tin wungin ta hi tumen.
Wulong men in e kikin engun, si wungin tin irawin men nuk, epo wulong wo epo khekngin kyok si men kho si kut, men wulong mhuk mi wo phepngin ta po kara kha men.

Takuma enah tin Got ning mang tan si ung won men men iso ung nhing ako, ma tosukngin tin kaek sii sakalngin men men kikhimngin nuk pon taku, “Yang tin Akono men ion po tin ta yang men kho ako,” u “Po mosop tin sikia yang tin Akono men yan men ku wetpo hi wa wungin tin lengwal men weh,” tumen.

Si mi mang nhum ta men ku timro golan u silwa an u tumen misan pit min akomen, men tin sa an u mulusan tumen men pit min kut tumen ako, men kara epo kumang tin yan pos men, u kara men epo kumang tin ku yan pos som men kut tumen.

Tumen ma taku po ta whek min epo endara tin ku yan pos som men li, men ku si timroan tin epo kumang tin yan pos men, men ku si min auluungin ma tunus epo phua ku ning kumang tan epon, epon men hihingin kho epo kumang mosop tin turunus men misan.

Tumen ma ngon men ku saa lu in hin weh epo wungin tin po tin nenerengin men mi hi kling epon men, si e ira wungin tin siik men, u wo phepngin, u min epongin, u min wyungin, tumen, to po mosop tin yuk li si ta yang tin Akono men to mi hi tin yil men.
Si heek walngin tin ulil e po pong epo engin ma po ung e heek wal engun men men ku put ngon kilil i, epo e ion i epo wungin tin imen men pong si heek walngin si ta po ako.

Ma po ta tin kum wet wili yang tin Akono men men ku min teng si epo heek walngin ewin asin, si men ku ning wungin amlus epo po mosop, men ku won ek i epon ku kot sun, men ku wuh wungin tin po ning i lengwal epon men li kho engun,
men ku tus po tin nolo sakalngin men to wungin tin ku wa min ko men, epon taku yanda Got naa po epo phae mingin, kumali po pon ta wungin tin irawin weh men,
ma tulun hunngin tin ta po men kyok si ma po meleng esih tin ta emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men, epo kho ma yang kan kan po epon ku po ira wungin tin nuk ta mi yang men engun.
Si ngon men ku ion i ti, epo ungunan kara tin kuli iso si sulung men, men ku elup tin ku po kuk wo lalaingin min men ku iso pit e si si.

Epo po tunus men ku kuk to wungin tin po mi hi pit wo hi tuo hi weh men, u po mi hi pit wo ulu nginangan, u po wangan po hi, u po wa hi si pit, u po ton mi sun nginangan, u po wetpo hi wa wungin ta po irama hi to eleni hi, u po ku sam sam sun ewin som, u po ku wo hi nuk wet endara auluungin ta ewin som,

u min epongin ta po men ku om, u men khung po engin epo po kara tin ku pa ho ho mi sun men, u po men ku hik put sakalngin pit po sun engun, u po ku karuk hi weh ewin som, u po kuk to wungin amhees, u po mut wungin tin tunus men,

u po mi hi alang si sun tin tira hi men sup mi won maikngin, u po phuk mi wungin kerek engun, u po sosoom to mi hi tin wai si pit men, u po mi hi pit pit wo wungin tin ku po mi hi keh keh epo wungin maran kiring kiring tin pit wo mulus men, si po ku mi hi pit wo Got weh akomen.
Epo po men kuk to wungin ken po e lem pit wo Got, takuma emhong tin in mi wungin tin po lem pit wo Got epon men men ku po wo hi nuk wet akomen. Ngon men ku in hin weh epo po tin wungin ta hi tumen.

Epo po tin yem yem li sup mi mok ma po wa wa mi sun wala tin hul wet sun engun e lasin ta hi los hi nginangan men, tin wungin kling si mi hi ma wungin ek ek mi hi nginangan men, kha kuk mi sun tin wungin ta hi tumen.
Po wala tin imen taku hul wet kotngin mi wo sun sumsum, takuma men khung po engin weh epo po tin ku pon ta maran ekngin tin epo wungin tin irawin men angan som.

Kho ma a-Yanes ngong a-Yambres nolo a-Moses, tumen kut kha po tin imen nolo wungin tin irawin men maksin kut tumen. Po men wungin lengwal ses mi tulun hungin tin ta hi men. Got ion mi wungin ta po kho, men wungin tin po wo hi phep pit won men men ku siik to wo phepngin tin irawin weh men akomen.
Takuma wungin tin ta po men ku huuh li nomalak som, epo wungin ulil tin ta po men ku si in pi mlaeng to mara po mosop ako, ken sun tin kho ma wungin tin ta wulong men si in pi mlaeng men.

Si ngon men pet kira ngo ma e ion kotngin tin nga kot po epon ewin men, u wungin tin nga ning i ewin men, u wungin tin nga hihi nuk maran min ngo epo ngo ku ning i wo mulus men, u wo phepngin tin ta ngo men, u wuh wungin li maran nomalak, u min epongin, u ngo tin pit nhing wet won maikngin nginangan men mosop kho kut ako,

kuru e ion mumhek mingin u won maikngin tumen tin si si ta ngo Antiok u Aikoniam u Listra maksin kut tumen. Mumhek mingin tin imen men nga lat i engun, takuma yang tin Akono men palolo ngo mi mumhek mingin tin imen mosop.
Wai, epo po mosop tin mi hi epo po ku ira wungin tin pit mina sun tin ta Got men mi Krais Yesus men, men ku wuh wungin tin sun ning i lengwal epo po men ako.

Si po tin wungin ta hi lengwal men u po tin ek ek mara sun nginangan men kut tumen ku kuk e wuh ma wuh wungin lengwal si kokyok kokyok li kut, men ku po kuk e wa wa mi sun, u sun kuk e wa wa mi po kut tumen.
Si ngon men ku iso ira wungin tin e in e urut i kho men tin wop nuk wet weh e tin maran ko klat men, epo e ion po tin e urut sakalngin mi wo hi kho men ako,
kuru e ion i epo e iso hoin men e ion Panngin tin Auluungin men, tin ku ning i ma mhip ek wungin tin ku e palolongin epo wo phepngin tin pit wo Krais Yesus men.

Panngin Auluungin mosop men si epo Got tin emiunan e in e nges nges si mi Panngin Auluungin tin imen, ma men tunus epon ku nhio wo it epo wungin tin ku it kot po epon men, u it tak si wungin lengwal si in pi mlaeng epon, u it tus po epon, u it urut sakalngin epo wungin tin siik men epon kut tumen,
kumali po ta tin ning kumang ta Got men men ku moolngin tin ku po ning kumang turunus mosop epon men klet po hi weh.

Tumen ma nga pok put sakalngin tin maran ko klat men si tap to mara Got, u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen, tin kuli ples wungin ta po tin iso tunus kuk men u ta po tin huu kho men kut tumen, minan tin kuli yang si put plo nginan ma yang wa enunu tin tan men ko ung nhing men.

Ngon men ku in e pok put wungin tin ta Got men weh. Aku, taku pi put ta pit wa taku pi om, men ku e hihingin in kut. Ngon men ku in epo ngon ku tak si wungin lengwal tin ta po men si in pi mlaeng, u e pio po epo wungin lengwal tin ku po ning i men, u e wo nut po kut tumen, ma e wuh won maikngin li maran nomalak kokyok kokyok men ku e kot po engun.

Epo elup ta kuli iso si tin ku po mi hi mokongin epo po tin ku hul kotngin tin tunus men, si po ku ira wungin tin po tuo hi mi hi epon men. Ma po kinga hi sangelek weh epo po ku hul wungin maran kiring enginin kara, kha kuli po pulum po sun tin ta hi e ku kot sun men munuman me,
men ku po phae mi kinga hi epo wungin tin irawin men li, si po kikin engun wala po ira pasikngin tin ulil men.

Si ngon men ku haum tunus epo wungin mosop, men ku e lat won maikngin engun, u men ku e ning kumang tin ta po tin pok put pok putngin tin tunus men, kuru ngon men ku pyu po kumang tin tap weh men kut tumen.
Epo ngo men wungin hihingin kho nuk epo kalolwa ngo tin ku yuk yukngin ko ken talungin tin ekian men ta, ma elup tin ku nga yok ma nga li epon men men me in tikayung kut khae.
Ngo men wuh epo lek walngin tin tunus men kho kut, ngo men suuk sii saangin kho kut, u ngo men kasum wo phepngin kho kut tumen.

Ma homani ma moolngin tin ku ko ung mhi ngo epo wungin tin siik men men hihingin nuk epo ngo kho, tin yang tin Akono e ples wungin siik ewin men ku wai si ta ngo to elup tin imen, si ku ta ngo misan som, men ku ta po mosop tin kho nginan ma me men tin mi hi pit wo yang tin ku si put plo nginan men maksin kut tumen ako.
Si ngon men ku tohuh epo ngon ku pus engin mu pon ta ngo kerek engun.

Epo a-Dimas men wetpon wa ngo kho kut, epo yang min pit pit wo wungin tin ta pi mulus tin to elup tin iyi, ma yang yok li Tesalonaika kho kut. Kuru a-Kresens yok li Galesia, u a-Taitus yok li Dalmatia maksin kut tumen.
Si a-Luk misan kha in tili ngo men. Si e wa a-Mak ma mom mu, epo yang men wungin tan tunus epon ku nhio wo ngo epo kumang.
Si a-Tikikus men nga tih i kho li Epesus.

Ma minan tin ku e mu men, men ku e wa moolngin tin nomalak e nga mang tan ung Troas hang a-Karpus men, kuru e wa kisang tin wlo nginan men to sun tin po ning i epo li ken nginan elit e mi ngo epon weh men mu kut tumen.
Si Aleksanda tin nenen endara epo bras ning nginan nginangan men ning i lengwal epo ngo hambip. Mi ngo epo yang tin Akono men ku ning wungin ta emhut sun tin yang ning i men.
Ngon kut men ku haum eya ngon epo yang tin imen weh, epo yang men nolo sakalngin ta pim hambip weh kut tumen.
Epo ewo maran tin po ples wungin ta ngo ma nga pok put wungin mut eya ngo men, men ku po ta pit to ngo som. Awu. Po mosop mhup sila ngo. Mi ngo epo Got ku wa lasin ko po po asin.

Si yang tin Akono men men in to ngo ako, ma yang pa nhing ngo, kuma sakalngin men ku pok putngin li pyu pongin weh epo ngo, kumali po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men mosop men ku hul. Ma Got pakol ngo me pol wo laion.

Ma yang tin Akono men ku iso palolo ngo mi wungin tin mosop e po taku ning i lengwal epo ngo men ako, ma yang ku wa ngo li anga tunusngin mi enunu tin ta yang e epo pi wet pi men. Yang kha ku it wai yan si kokyok kokyok li kut men. Men Irawin.
Si e wa mi ngo si ta e-Prisila ngong Akwila, u ta po tin hi khuuk wal e ung mi mang tin a-Onesiporus men kut tumen.
Si a-Erastus men iso in Korin, si a-Tropimus men nga mang tan iso saih in Miletus.
E pus engin epo ngon ku mu pol muk kho epo elup tin to huk hukngin men. Si a-Eubulus wa min si tap, kuru a-Pudens u a-Linus u e-Klaudia u po tin ehuro it men mosop wa mi hi si tap kut tumen.
A-Yesus Krais tin Akono men ku in to emiu ngon. Nanaangin men ku weh in to ngon kut tumen. Men irawin.

Ngo a-Pol tin kum wet wili Got epo mi ngo weh e paengin ta a-Yesus Krais men, men ira wo phepngin ta po tin Got won ung wo hi men u maran ekngin epo wungin irawin tin ira sun tin pit mina Got tuon men kut tumen,
tin si mi hoo mingin tin pit wo tunusngin tin sindak men, tin Got tin ku torok ewin som men wo kuk marangin epon kho epo elup tin ku iso si ma ung e li men,

si enal tin tan weh men si ma yang wa wungin tin tan men si in pi mlaeng epo sakalngin pok put nginan, tin yang won nuk wet ngo ma yang mang tan sup yanga wili ngo ira wungin tin Got tin Palolongin ta it men wo maran ko klat epon men.

Kisang tin iyi ti epo ngon a-Taitus tin wiruk irawin weh mi wo phepngin ta tong then men: Nanaangin, min sukngin, u min wyungin kut tumen, tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono e Palolongin ta it men kut tumen ku ko po ngon.

Sinsin tin nga mang ta ngon in Krit epon men men wala ti, epon ku e hihi endara tin ku suuk siingin kho som men ko nuk sisiik ma wop ung wo po akokono kara mi palu walngin mosop tin ung e li li mili yanga pi then then men, ira wungin tin nga panen ngon epon kho men --

tin taku po ta wungin om pon weh, tin titien then ta misan men, u to husanin tin wo hi phep e sakalngin om po hi tin po siwul mi endara tin ta po irama hi to eleni hi epo sasayihngin maran kiring kiring ma po wetpo hi wa sakalngin tin ta wulong men.

Epo po ta tin maran pit wo palu walngin men ku wungin om pon weh, epon men in ken po ta tin Got won nuk wet ma yang wa kumang tan ko nuk yanga wilin men, men ku ira min tan tuon weh ewin akomen, men ku yan sal kerek ewin akomen, men ku um wain nginangan akomen, men ku to wungin amhees ewin akomen, u men ku min pit pit wo ulu hambip weh asin kut tumen,

si men ku in to wungin tin maran pit wo po tin me mang tin tan men tunus men, u min pit wo wungin tin tunus men, u karuk i to tulun hungin tunus, u ples wungin nuk emin weh, u wungin tan min yil weh, u kasum min tuon tunus weh kut tumen,

kuru men ku kasum sakalngin tin anuh men pip ken sun tin hul wet kotngin epon kho men, kuma kakha to kotngin tin tunus men epon ku wo nut po u tak si wungin tin ta po tin taku sakal hik put kotngin men si in pi mlaeng kut tumen.
Epo po munuman kuk tin ku wa hi sup wet sun kara ewin akomen, men sakalngin ta hi tin sinsin om u ek ek mara po men tumen, men po tin hi mut wal ewin men kha hi kuk to wungin tin imen weh men.

Po tin imen ku e ning i kuma po ping wo hi, epo po siluk mi wo phepngin ta po kara to po tin hi khuuk wal ta hi mi mang ta hi weh men, men po kot sun epo wungin tin tunus epo po ku kot sun epon men akomen, sinsin in epo po ku torok mara sun ma po nak nak endara ta sun engun.

Po tin ta hi men ta, tin pokngin ta hi weh men, men wo taku, “Po Krit men torok nginangan sumsum weh, u po men ken li ken nginan enih tin lases kuk tan men, u po men mayongngin ma kuk e ii endara lak engun kut tumen.”
Wungin tin pok putngin imen men irawin ako. Tumen ma e pio po epo sakalngin tin to min nenenngin men weh kuma po phae mi hi, kuma po nuk nhing to wo phepngin ta hi.
Si po men ku kinga hi kuk epon ku hul pasikngin engun tin ta po Yuda men u wungin sinsin tin ta po tin wetpo hi wa wungin tin irawin men tumen asin.

Epo po tin mi hi yil men, men ion endara mosop ken i e mi yil men, si po tin ku mi hi yil som ma wo phepngin ta hi om men, men ku ion endara ta ken i e mi yil men akomen, epo tulun hungin ta po tin in mi po men u mi po tin ples wungin nginangan e taku tunus wa lengwal wa tumen, likiong men ko min lengwal maksin kut tumen.

Po men pok put wungin ken po e pol ta Got men, si wungin tin po ning i men men maran ken po e pong epo Got men, epo wungin ta po men iso hies lengwal weh, men po pang po hi epon ku hul wet wungin, ma wungin tunus men po e ku tunus epo po ku ning i ta akomen.
Si ngon men ku sakal sakalngin tin pit mina kotngin tin ku po nuk nhing epon men weh:

men ku e wo ta po masang tin hyangan men epo po ku karuk hi epo wain tin um nginan hambip men asin, u kuk to wungin ta hi tin amunu men, u mara hi pit wo hi tuo hi tunus, u nuk nhing to wo phepngin ta hi, to min epongin, u wungin tin po nuk nhing wet won maikngin men kut tumen;

kuru po wala tin hyangan men men ku e ning i kai sun epo po kut tumen, ma e wo ta po epo po ku ira wungin tin tunus e ken po tin auluungin men ku ning i men, si po men ku kuk aku po hik put wungin pit po sun lilil asin, u po ku mang ta mi hi sup wet wain um nginan hambip asin kut tumen, si po men ku kuk ken po tin kot sun epo wungin tin tunus men,
kumali po kot sun wala tin nenerengin men epo po men ku kuk to wungin tin po mi hi pit pit wo titien hi men u to wungin tin po mi hi pit pit wo husani hi men kut tumen,

kuru po kuk to wungin tin po karuk hi tunus ma po ira wungin tin mi yil epo po masang men, u po ku wilayuk epo kumang mi mang ta hi weh, u po ning i tunus epo sun, u po hul wet titien hi tin ta hi weh men kut tumen, kumali sakalngin tin ta Got men ku ton mingin akomen.
Kuru e ira wungin then ma e wo nut po masang tin nenerengin men epo po ku karuk hi tunus to tulun hungin tin ta hi men maksin kut tumen,

ma mi wungin mosop tin tap men men ku e suk mara po epo ngon tuop men tosukngin ta epo wungin tunus ning nginan; mi kotngin men ku e suk mara po epo ngon e in to mip then, u wungin tap mamaik kut tumen, si ku wungin enginin ta ek ek mi ngon ewin akomen,
u ngon men to sakalngin tin tunus e ku po wo los po ngon ewin akomen kut tumen, kumali po ta tin nolo ngon men ku manngin wan, epon tin wungin om tin ku po sakal lengwal epo ngon men.

Kuru e wo nut po tin kum wet wili po phuan men epo po ku hul wet po phuan tin ta hi weh men, ma wungin mosop tin po ning i men men ku po phuan mi hi tunusngin pit wo sun ton, si po men ku wo phae sun asin,

kuru po men ku meme endara ta sun asin, si po men ku suk mara sun epo wungin tin turunus e ku sun wo hi nuk wet sun ton men misan, kumali po pa mool kotngin tin ta Got tin Palolongin ta it men epo wungin mosop tin po ning i men.
Epo nanaangin tin ta Got e it wa palolongin epon men men si in pi mlaeng to mara po masang to sun wala mosop kho kut,

men kot it epo it men ku wetpo it wa wungin tin ku pit mina Got som men u wungin tin po tin ta pi mulus men ngelek won men kut tumen, si it men ku karuk tunus epo it ma it ira wungin tin siik men u wungin tin pit mina sun tin ta Got men kut tumen in mi elup tin iyi kut khae,
ma it kuk e mara it pit epo hoo mingin tin epo min kehngin tin nhum men, tin ku a-Yesus Krais tin Got ta it u Palolongin ta it kut tumen si pol pi mlaeng to moolngin men,

men yang tin min alang siin tuon mut eya it kuma yang kiis i mut eya it epo wungin mosop tin it hik put wungin sinsin men, kuma yang khis mi it ma it si po masang to sun wala tin mi it yil e ta yang weh men, tin ku tohuh epo wungin tin tunus men ning nginan men.
Ngon men ku sakal sakalngin tin imen kokyok kokyok, ma e wo nut po u e pio po to emhong mosop. Si e in aku e mang ta po ta tin ku ion ngon ken ngon e lengwal engun men asin.

E tak tulu po epo po ku wa hi sup wet wili po phuan tin mara hi pit wo mulus men to sun tin emhong nuk si wut hi men, men ku po hul wet wungin ta sun, ma po hihi epo po ku ning wungin tin turunus men maran kiring mosop,

si po ku sakal lengwal epo po ta akomen, si po ku kuk to wungin tin po mara hi ii u po ning i amang epo sun men kut tumen, men ku po suk mara po masang to sun wala mosop epo wungin tin po wa ya hi ko men in kokyok kokyok li kut.
