Epo it tuo it men kho ma it kuk to wungin ulil maksin kut tumen ako, ma it pang po it epo it tin ku hul wet sakalngin men, u wungin torokngin ek ek mi it ma it kuk e mang ta mi it sup wet ngelek wongin u min pit wongin kut tumen tin maran kiring kiring men, ma it kuk e wilayuk to tunusngin ta it sup wet it tin mi it lengwal pit wo po kara u mara it nes po to endara ta hi kut tumen, men po kara mi hi lel it u mi it lel po kara kut tumen.
Taku li klet ma wungin tin Got tin Palolongin ta it men ning i tunus u min epo po tunus men kut tumen si in pi mlaeng kho,

sinsin ani ku wungin tin siik men ning nginan tin it tuo it ning i men akomen. Awu. Min sukngin tin ta yang men kha yang palolo it epon men, men epo kiis pongin tin it ko khuukngin homan e it si homan epo Emiun tin Auluungin men,
tin wala Got yuk yuk i ko po it hambip weh yanga wili a-Yesus Krais tin Palolongin ta it men,
kumali Got wo epo it e kuk to wungin siik epo min sukngin tin tan men kho, anima it si ken po tin ku wa pakuh pongin pit mina hoo mingin tin pit wo tunusngin tin sindak men.

Wungin anuh tin ku wo it nuk wet men ta u sakalngin kara tin mi ngo epo ngon ku pa nhing siin kokyok kokyok men kut tumen wala nuk tumen, kumali po tin wo hi phep pit wo Got kho men ku sila hi khing epo po ku wilayuk epo wungin tin tunus men ning nginan misan. Sakalngin tin imen men tunus u men ku nhio wo po masang to sun wala kut tumen ako.

Si e in hin epo heek walngin tin ulil men u wungin tin po ples wal i pit mi pasikngin engun men, u wungin tin po pok pok mi al ma po heek wal pit mi wungin tin sinsin men kut tumen, epo wungin tin imen ku nhio wo po ta som u sinsin men om kut tumen.
Po ta tin in to wungin tin taku hik put palu walngin nginangan men, men ku e wo si kuk maran angan ta wa ponwal tumen, ma ku hul som, men ku e mang tan lu in apoi.
Epo it ion i epo po ta tin wungin tan tumen men phae sakalngin tin tunus men si lengwal ma ning lasin kokyok kokyok, men wa lasin si pon tuon kha men.

Minan tin kuli nga tih Artimas wa a-Tikikus ti pol tap men, men ku e tohuh epo soput ta tin ku e mu pon ta ngo pi Nikopolis men, epo mi ngo wawai kho epo ngo ku in mi elup tin to huk hukngin men mi pi tin imen.

A-Senas tin wa kumang epo wungin sinsin ples nginan men u Apolos kut tumen, men ku e tohuh epo ngon ku tirih wulong li ira soput ta ngong to endara ta ngong kara, kuma wulong kalwok epo endara ta akomen.

Ma po masang to sun wala tin ta it men men ku urut wungin tin ku po wilayuk epo wungin tin tunus men ning nginan weh, kuma po nhio wo sun tin kalwok men, kumali po men ku kuk ken sa tin aii men akomen.
Po mosop tin pim a kuk men wa mi hi ti epo ngon. E wa mi pim si ta po tin mi hi pit wo pim mi wo phepngin tin ta it men. Nanaangin tin ta Got men ku in to wom mosop. Men irawin.
Ngo a-Pol tin po kan kan ngo pit mi ngo tin kum ta Krais Yesus men, u wiro it a-Timoti kut tumen kha tuk a tirih kisang tin iyi ti epo ngon a-Pilemon tin tita it e it klap wal to kumang men,
u ti epo e-Apia tin mi pim pit won men, u Arkipus tin pim a klap wal to lek walngin eya Krais men, u ti epo palu walngin tin palu wal mi mang tin tap men kut tumen.
Nanaangin u min wyungin kut tumen tin me hang Got tin Wirama it men u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men tumen ku in to ngon.
Nga sam sam Got tin ta ngo men ma nga sikia ngon kokyok kokyok mi kinesngin tin ta ngo men,
epo nga hul epo min epongin tin tap men, u wo phepngin tin tap e pit wo a-Yesus tin Akono men, u pit wo po mosop tin auluungin men kut tumen.
Ma nga kines epo ngon tin ku naa po epo wo phepngin tin tap men men ku siin iis mi ngon weh epo ngon tin ku marap ek endara turunus mosop tin in mi wom mi Krais Yesus men.
Epo, worok, min kehngin u pa nhingngin kut tumen men nhum nuk mi pim epo min epongin tin tap men, epo po tin auluungin men mi hi wa nhingngin tunus epo ngon.
Tumen ma taku ngo e taku mi ngo puplet weh mi Krais epo ngo ku wo maran ko klat epo ngon ku ning wungin tin tunus epo ngon ku ning i men, men ku nga ning i tumen ako,
takuma awu, min epongin ta tong kha nga suh mi kingap epon men. Ngo a-Pol tin hyangan e homani ma nga kan kanngin maksin eya a-Yesus Krais men,
kha suh mi kingap epo wiruk a-Onesimus, tin nga khuuk i to wo phepngin si mi esih tin khang weh e kan kan ngo men,
men yang tin kho ma ku nhio wo ngon tunus som men, si homani ma yang si tunus epon ku nhio wo ngon kuru ngo kut tumen.
Ma ngo ku tih yang kyok ti epo ngon. Tumen ma ngon men ku wa yang, epo yang men mi ngo siik.
Epo kho men mi ngo weh epo ngo ku kan kan yang iso in to ngo, kuma yang wa pi tap ma yang maran pit wo ngo tin esih tin khang weh men kan kan ngo pit mi pok putngin tin tunus men.
Si taku ngon ku wo tunus epo yang som, mi ngo epo ngo ku ning wungin ta asin, kumali wungin tin tap e tunus men ku e ning i ken ngo e ku pae wo ngon men akomen, si men ku e ning i epo mip weh engun.
Epo yang men saa sila ngon put monlo long kho, men sinsin epon kumali e wa yang kyok ti in hang ngon weh kut wa men,

kumali yang in to ngon ken po tin kum wet wili sun engun men angan ta kyok asin, si ken po ta tin nhum epo po tin kum wet wili sun men, men ken wiro it tin mi it pit won men ta. Ma ngo men mi ngo pit wo yang weh, si yang tin kum wo ngon wo mulus men u tin si mom irit won mi yang tin Akono men kut tumen, ngong likiong kha ku mip pit wo yang hambip weh epon men.
Tumen ma taku e ion ngo ken ngo e tong klap wal to kumang mi Krais, men ku e wa yang ti sup to min nawaehngin ken i e e ning i epo ngo weh men.
Ma taku yang ning lasin ta tun tira epo ngon wa naumngin tap ta pit wo yang, men ku e alpon mu epo ngo.
Ngo a-Pol tuo ngo kha pan wungin tin iyi epo wili ngo weh men. Ngo men kuli iso wai emhut sun ako. Ih, naumngin ta ngo tin pit wo ngon epo tunusngin tap tuon men, men ku nga sikian akomen.
Wai, worok, som ning i kuma mi ngo keh me epo ngon mi yang tin Akono men. Som wa nhingngin si in mi ngo mi yang tin Akono men.
Epo wo ngo phep epo ngon tin ku hul wet ngo men ako kha nga pan wungin tin iyi ti epo ngon men, ma nga ion i epo ngon men ku iso ning i tunus epo yang weh epo sun tin nga kines ngon epon men.
Si ngon men ku hihi mang emin ta ngo ta tin ku nga ti in min men ung, epo nga hoo mi ngo epo kinesngin tin ta wom men kha kuli Got min suk ngo ma nga iso ti pol ta wom epon men ako.
Si a-Epapras tin po kan kan tuk likiong mut eya Krais Yesus men men wa min ti epo ngon.
Kuru a-Mak, u Aristarkus, u a-Dimas, u a-Luk kut tumen, tin pim a klap wal to kumang then men, hi tih mi hi ti epo ngon kut tumen.
Nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men men ku weh in to emiu wom. Men irawin.
Got tin kho nginan ma sakal si ta po yau a it sin mi wo po pokngin kara ira soput ta u ta tumen,
kha li elup tin ku me ponsol iyi ma yang sakal si ta it mi wo Wirun weh. Yang kha Got won ung won epon ku yang pakuh po sun epo endara mosop men, kuru yang ning mulus yanga wili sun maksin kut tumen.

Yang men moolngin tin ta Got e mha ma pon engil engil weh men, u men tosukngin tin tosuk to Got tuon e ira ewi sun siik weh men kut tumen. Yang men tin kasum endara mosop to sakalngin tin tan e to kakhangin weh men, tin tuon mlis lasin ta it mosop li, anima yang si ung ewo wili Got tin sinkhaung e ung ili awon weh men wilin tin ato sa men.
Epo yang men kho si nhum weh epo po tihngin mosop, epon tin Got pakuh po yang epo yang yan tin tunus weh epo po tihngin ya hi men.

Epo po tihngin tin akani e ku Got wo ta hi angan ta kho taku, “Ngon men Wiruk, homani kut ma nga khuuk ngon?” Kuru kyok men yang wo taku, “Ngo kuli in Wiraman ta yang u yang kuli in wiruk ta ngo” ti. Awu. Men pi om.
Si minan tin yang wa Wirun tin yang won to makngin ung won men me in lunga po tunus wo mulus men men yang wo taku, “Tihngin mosop men ku wa yang yan si.”
Si po tihngin men Got sakal epo hi taku, “Got men tin ning po tihngin tin tan men men hi si ken eip men, u po tin kum tan men ken yau tin ngin ngin men kut tumen.”

Si Wirun men yang sakal ta sun taku, “Auweh, Got, ehus tin tap tin sinkhaung men men sindak ung mi elup tin nuk e lap e li kut men. Kamtukngin tin ta po sinkhaung e marap pit wo enunu tin tap men epon men men kamdukngin tin to wungin siik men misan.

Ngon men mip pit wo wungin tin in siik men kokyok kokyok, si e mut wungin tin po hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men. Sinsin tin imen kha Got tin tap men won ung wo ngon epo nowhong tin pok put yang tin min tunusngin pit po ngon ku si nhum epo po tin tita wom men.”
Kuru sakalngin men panngin nuk taku, “Ngon tin Akono men, ewo maran men e hihi mulusngin sinsin ko ung, u wet pi men kumang tin to po wilip men kut tumen kha men.
Wet pi to mulus men kuli om ako, si ngon men ku in tumen li kut. Endara tin mosop imen kuli ko lengwal ken moolngin tin po phini nuk po sun men pon kho ta,
ma ngon ku mol mol i ken endara tin po pang po hi epon men ta, ma men ku phae i si pon enginin tawe. Si ngon men ku iso in tumen li kut, ma posan tap kuli li put mih angan akomen.”

Si tihngin tin akani e ku Got wo tan angan ta kho taku, “E ko ung ewo wili ngo tin eronin men li pol minan tin kuli nga wa po tin nolo ngon men me sup wet khip ken po e ehus ta khip ta men,” ti? Awu. Men pi engun.
Iyi, tihngin mosop men emiunan tin Got tirih hi li pol epon ku kum ta po tin kuli iso pakuh pongin epo hi tin ku palolongin men ako, wah?
Epo wungin sinsin tin imen men tunus epo wungin tin it hul i kho men kha ku it hul i tunus weh homani men, epon akuli it mang mang tan ken naak tin muu li yanga wiu men engun.
Epo sakalngin tin pok putngin mi wo po tihngin kho men men ko pit nhing, ma wungin mosop tin po ku hul wet som si po hik put engun men men ku po wa wungin emhut sun tin imen siik weh ako.

Tumen ma taku wetpo it wa sakalngin tin ku it palolongin epon men tin e nhum tumen, tin in ewo maran ma pok putngin si mi wo yang tin Akono men, anima po tin hul yang men kakaek siin si ta it, men kuli it yek ta mumhek mingin tin ta Got men tua?

Epo sakalngin tin imen Got tuon nhio won epo tosukngin u wungin tin po teret won men, u wungin tin to kakhangin e maran kiring kiring men u talungin tin ta Emiun Auluungin men kara kut tumen, men yang ira min weh kha yang ning i tumen.
Epo Got ku wa elup tin ku iso si wo mulus men, tin pim a sakal epon men, kuli sup wet wili po tihngin akomen. Awu.
Si po ta pok put wungin mi Kisang Auluungin put ta in taku, “Po tunus men tunia weh ma tulup hu pit po hi men, u wiru po tunus men ara weh ma silap khing pit pon kut tumen?
E ning po tunus osong ko kuk wet po tihngin kiak kara, ma e pa mool po tunus mhi hi epo moolngin u po tin ya hi pos men kut tumen, ma e wa po si nhum epo endara mosop tin to po wilip men.

E wa endara mosop me sup wet khi po.” Epo Got tin wa endara mosop me sup wet po men, men ku yang mang ta endara tin ku me sup wet po men ta ku in akomen. Takuma homani men ku it ion endara mosop me sup wet po kho akomen. Awu.

Si it ion yang tin Got wai ko in wet po tihngin osong ko in kiak kara men, men a-Yesus ako, tin Got pa mool po yang epo moolngin u yan pos kut tumen epon tin yang wuh hunngin kho men, tumen kumali nanaangin tin ta Got men kha ku yang tong hunngin mut eya po tunus mosop men.

Epo Got men sinsin epo endara mosop u endara mosop men to po wili yang misan kut tumen, ma taku yang taku tet husanin munuman weh li sup mi moolngin, men wungin nuk tunus to yang tin wungin tan in tumen epo yang ku ning sun tin sinsin epo palolongin tin ta hi men ku si pyu pongin weh epo wungin tin yang wuh i men.

Epo yang tin ning i ma po si auluungin men u po tin yang ning hi si auluungin men kut tumen mosop si sinsin then, tumen ma wungin sinsin tin imen kha ku yang manngin wan som epo yang tin ku wo epo po men ehuro hi men,
wala yang sakal nuk ti, “Ngo ku pok put yap si ta po tin ehurok men. Mi po tin palu wal men ku nga lut lutngin tin wa yap si men lunga po.”
Kuru yang sakal kyok taku, “Ngo men ku wa wo phepngin ta ngo pit wo Got,” kuru yang sakal angan ta kyok ti, “Nga in iyi to husanik tin Got wai si ta ngo men.”

Tumen ma husanin tin klap wal to emali hi u kalolwa hi kut tumen tin then men, tumen kha yang tuon klap po ton maksin kut tumen, kumali hunngin kha ku yang mhuk emiun tin kasum wo phepngin tin ta hunngin men epon men, men emiun tin hik put wungin pit po po nginangan men ako.
Ma soput tin imen kha ku yang plos po tin kuk wo mulus ma lemngin tin pit wo hunngin men kan kan po kokyok kokyok ken po tin kum wet wili sun engun men li wo hi pias epon men.
Epon men irawin, epo yang ku nhio wo po tihngin akomen, si yang men nhio wo po tin khuuknginin ta Abraham men weh ako.

Tumen ma endara mosop men ku yang weh si kai po tin ehuro hi men, kuma yang si po tin kum auluungin ta Got e si nhum epo sun kara men ta tin in to min sukngin u wungin anuh kut tumen epo kumang tin nuk epo Got men, kumali yang ning talungin tin ku yang kiis i mut eya po masang to sun wala to lasin tin ta hi men.
Epo yang tuon tin karongngin si tan minan tin yang wuh won maikngin men, sinsin tin imen kha li yang kakha epo yang ku nhio wo po tin karongngin si ta hi kokyok kokyok men.

Tumen ma, ehurok, wom tin auluungin men, wom tin klap wal to yukngin tin me ko ili wet pi men to po kara men, tulu wom hu pit po yang tin Paengin u tin kum auluungin ta Got e nhum epo sun kara men kut tumen, tin it pok put sakalngin epo yang yan men, men Krais Yesus ako.
Yang men weh pit nhing to wo phepngin tan tin pit wo sun tin won ung wo yang men, ken a-Moses tin pit nhing to wo phepngin tan lunga po mosop tin hi khuuk wal mi mang ta Got men.
Epo yang tin imen men Got ion i ken i e tunus epon ku wa moolngin nhum epo sun tin ta a-Moses men, men ira moolngin tin po tin ning mang men ya hi pos weh epo mang tuon ewin men siik.
Epo mang mosop men po ta kha ning i men ako, si po ta tin ning endara mosop men men Got.

Ma men irawin epo a-Moses men in to wungin tin yang ira sakalngin ta Got nginangan men ma yang ning kumang mi mang tin ta Got men ken po tin kum ta sun men ta, epon men ku tosukngin epo sakalngin tin ku iso pok putngin si silung men.

Si Krais men maran pit wo mang tin tan tuon men epon tin Got Wirun weh men. Epo it kha po tin khuuk wal mi mang tin ta yang men, men tin taku it kasum wo phepngin u hoo mingin tin it wangan po it ton men kut tumen pip weh li pol mi elup tin weh li ponsol men.
Sinsin tin imen wala Emiun Auluungin wo taku, “Homani kut, men taku wom ku hul wut Got,
men ku mi wom khang ken po tin wetpo hi wa wungin tin ta Got men mi elup tin po karong Got pi tin tahunggu men asin.
Men pi tin po tin yau a wom siin men karong ngo epon men, men po taku ion mi wungin ta ngo, aku, po mara hi kon kumang tin nga ning ning i men to posan khum mnal kho li kut.
Tumen ma mi ngo mokongin pit wo po tin ung e khuuk wal mi elup tin imen, ma nga wo ti, ‘Po tin imen ek ek mi sakalngin epo mi hi kokyok kokyok weh ma po ku ion soput tin ta ngo men kara kho akomen.’
Tumen ma ya ngo sal ma nga tung tung taku, ‘Po men ku li sup mi pi tin epo nhingngin tin ta ngo men angan akomen.’”
Ehurok, wom men ku haum tunus, epon akuli po ta wom ta wungin lengwal si min ma ku won nuk wet sakalngin ta Got som, si wetpon wa Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men.
Si wom men ku wo nut wal weh to ungunan then then minan tin to elup tin po iso wo epon ‘Homani’ men, epon akuli po ta wom ta lasin ek ek min ma timen ning i ma min khang.
Epo it men klap to Krais to po kara kho, men taku irawin epo it iso kasum wo phepngin tin wo it phep ton ewo maran men pip weh li pol minan tin kuli elup li ponsol epon men.
Wala po ta sakal ti, “Homani kut, men taku wom ku hul wut Got, men ku mi wom khang ken wom tin mi wom khang kho minan tin wetpo wom wa sakalngin ta Got pi tin tahunggu men asin.”
Epo araling e hul ma wetpo hi wa wungin? Men po tin mosop e yok Isip me pol ma a-Moses muk hi me men ako, wah?
Kuru araling e Got min mokongin pit wo hi to posan tin khum mnal men? Men po tin ning lasin ma emkusi hi poplong ko pi tin tahunggu men ako, wah?
Kuru araling e Got tung tung epo hi ku li sup pi tin epo nhingngin e ta yang men akomen? Epon men po tin ku ira sakalngin tin ta yang men som men ako, wah?
Tumen ma it ion i epo po men khuk po engin epon takuli sup, sinsin epon tin po ku wo hi phep som men.

Sakalngin ta Got tin yang wo kuk mara po epo po tin ku li sup mi nhingngin tin ta yang men ta it ta men iso nuk ako, tumen ma it men ku lem, epon akuli po ta wom ta in ken i e yek ta wungin tin Got wo kuk mara it epon men.

Epon men irawin epo pok putngin tin tunus men men pok putngin si ta it maksin kut tumen ken po men ako. Takuma sakalngin tin po hul i men men ku nhio wo po som, epo po tin hul sakalngin men ku po hul i epo wo phepngin tin nau wal to sakalngin tin imen akomen.

Epo it tin wo it phep kho men kha li homani ma it li sup mi nhingngin tin imen ako, wala Got wo taku, “Ya ngo sal ma nga tung tung taku, ‘Po men ku li sup mi nhingngin tin ta ngo men akomen,’” aku, yang suuk sii kumang tin tan men kho nginan minan tin yang pho po mulus kho men ako.

Epo yang sakal mi Panngin Auluungin put ta epo ungunan tin me ponwal me sup angan men, men yang sakal ira wungin ti, “Ma Got nhing to ungunan tin me ponwal me sup angan men epo kumang mosop tin yang ning i men.”
Kuru panngin put tin iyi, men yang sakal kyok min ti, “Po men ku li sup mi nhingngin tin ta ngo men angan akomen.”
Wungin iso nuk epo po kara ku li sup, ma po tin sun pok put wungin si ta hi muk men ku li sup akomen, sinsin epon tin po wetpo hi wa sakalngin tin ta yang men kha men.

Tumen ma yang won ung wo ungunan ta kyok, men yang sakal mi wo a-Dewit taku, “Homani,” ti, si elup munuman mili kho, men ira sakalngin tin kho si muk tin wo taku, “Homani kut taku wom ku hul wut Got, men ku mi wom khang weh asin.”
Epon taku a-Yosua ani ku wa nhingngin si ta po kho men, men ku silung ma Got sakal kyok epo ungunan ta maksin akomen.
Tumen ma ungunan tin ku po nhing ton men ta iso nuk epo po masang to sun wala tin ta Got men ako.
Epo po ta tin kho li sup mi nhingngin tin ta yang men men tuon li nhing epo kumang tin tan men maksin kut tumen, ken Got tin kho ma yang nhing epo kumang tin yang ning i men.
Tumen ma it men ku tohuh weh kuma it li sup mi nhingngin tin imen weh, epon akuli po ta plong ko ira tosukngin tin kai wal to po tin wetpo hi wa sakalngin kho men.

Epo sakalngin tin ta Got men men to tunusngin u kakhangin kut tumen, ma men tongin weh epo bainat tin ngin nuk ponwal men, men tenek it weh li sup hang enu it u emiu it tumen tin lup wal men, u pokoi it tin sum sum wal men, u enghus sin kut tumen, men maran ples wungin tin nuk mi it men u wungin tin it nana i ta mi it epo it taku ning i men kut tumen weh.

Ma endara tin Got pho pon men ku ta kaun to mara yang angan akomen. Awu. Endara mosop men wiwil ma kuk pi mlaeng weh to mara yang tin ku it pok put sinsin tin it ning wungin mosop epon men si ta yang men.

Kut ma yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men tin kho li plek wet pi tin ung po al li si men men ta it ta in, men a-Yesus tin Got Wirun men. Tumen ma it men ku kasum wo phepngin tin it pok put men pip weh.

Epo yang tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun ta hi men tin ku min suk it tin wo it wiak epo wungin kara men som men ku ta it ta in tumen akomen, epo yang men karongngin maran kiring kiring si tan ken it men kho, takuma yang men in engun epo lasin.

Tumen ma it men ku li tikayung ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men tin ku it wa nanaangin epon men to mi it tin puplet men weh, kuma it wa min sukngin ma it pon ta nanaangin tin ku nhio wo it minan tin it kalwok men.

Epo po mosop then then tin nhum epo sun ta hi kara e hi kum auluungin men tin Got espo hi kara lunga sun tin tunus men, men Got won ung wo hi epon ku hi wa pi ta po tunus ma hi si ning kumang ta po tunus pit epo kumang tin nuk epo Got men, kumali po ning talungin kara kut u po lek li ken nginan kara ko huu tin ku mut eya lasin men kut tumen.
Po men ku ning i amang epo sun tin pong epo engin ma li kikin epo soput men engun, epo po tuo hi men in wet wili wungin tin po wo hi wiak epon men maksin kut tumen ako.

Epo wungin sinsin tin imen kha Got wo epo po men ku ning talungin tin ku hun mut eya lasin men, ma talungin tin po ning i mut eya po masang to sun wala men, tumen kut kha kuli po ning i epo po tuo hi maksin kut tumen.
Ma po tunus ta men ku wa kumang tin po ya hi pos ton men epo min engun akomen. Awu. Men po tin Got yuk hi men misa hi, ken sun tin kho ma Got yuk Aron men.

Tumen kut kha Krais ku wai tuon si pit kuma yang si po tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun ta hi kara men ta epo min engun akomen. Awu. Yang tin wo ta sun taku, “Ngon men Wiruk, homani kut ma nga khuuk ngon” ti, kha wa kumang si ta sun men.
Wala Got wo maksin mi kisang put enginin ta men taku, “Ngon men tin kum auluungin e ku in kokyok kokyok li kut pit mina hihingin tin ta a-Melkisedek men ta ako,” ti.

A-Yesus iso in wo mulus ma yang pok put kinesngin kara u yang hau si wo Got to haungin kara pit ili awon weh u to tinisngin kara kut tumen li epo Got tin apalukngin epon ku palolo yang epo hunngin men, ma Got hul wet yang epon tin yang uluu sun men ako.
Aku, yang men Got Wirun weh ako, takuma yang urut wungin tin ku yang hul wet wungin nginangan men epo won maikngin tin yang wuh i men.
Ma yang urut wungin tin ku yang hul wet wungin nginangan men li pyu pongin weh kut, anima yang si sinsin epo palolongin tin sindak men epo po mosop tin hul wet wungin ta yang men.
Epo kho men Got yuk yang epo yang ku si ken po tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun ta hi kara men “pit mina hihingin tin ta a-Melkisedek e yang kum auluungin min men” ta.
A-Melkisedek tin imen men pim a kuk to wungin munuman epon, takuma khung nginan epo pim tin ku ples wom epon sinsin men, sinsin epon tin kinga wom si pere men.

Epo wom men si wo wom phep kho, tumen ma tunus epo homani men ku wom si ken po tin kot sun nginangan men kho ako. Takuma awu, wom men ku iso kuk e kaeng po ta tin ku me kot wom epo wungin sinsin tin me pol mi wo Got e li muk epo sun kara men. Ma wom men kho si ken po hoin tin hing wo esus men ako, si wom ku ii enda aiingin tin po koklong men kho akomen.
Epo po mosop tin ku iso susus misan men, men ku wo hi po elel to sakalngin tin siik men pok put nginan akomen, epon men hi iso hoin engun.
Si endara aiingin tin po koklong men men ta po tin si nonomuru kut men, men po tin urut wungin kho epo po ku mara hi ples wungin tin tunus men weh u tin lengwal men weh kut tumen.

Tumen ma it men ku mang ta kotngin sinsin tin epo Krais men tin li muk epo sun men, ma it tohuh epo it men ku si nomuru weh. Si it kuk aku it hihi enah tin ku kotngin si po sun men kara kyok epo it tin ku phae mi it epo kumang ning nginan tin li epo hunngin men u epo wungin tin ku wo it phep pit wo Got men,
u epo kotngin tin pit epo baptais maran kiring kiring men, u epo po wili hi tin si nuk po sun men, u epo po tin huhu kho e ku kekhek kyok si men, u epo ples walngin tin sindak men kut tumen asin.
Ma wungin tin imen men ku pim a ning i ako, tin taku Got mang ta pim men ku pim a ning i tumen.
Epon men khung nginan weh epo po tin ungunan ta kho ma pi mha ko po hi, u tong talungin tin api wet pi men, u klap to po tin hi wa Emiun Auluungin men,
u tong sakalngin tin tunusan e ta Got men u tong kakhangin tin ta elup tin ku iso si men kut tumen,

li ma taku po wetpo hi wa wungin, men wungin maran ko klat weh epo po tin ku kyok me phae mi hi kyok men. Epo po men poo poo Got Wirun si kuk put sa wlong putwal to hut hi kyok kha men, ma po ning i ma manngin ko po yang pi mlaeng.

Epo mulusngin tin pi yung me ko yangan ma um i kokyok kokyok men li ma endara poplok si turunus won tin ku nhio wo po tin khung po engin epon ku wha endara epon men, kha mulusngin timen wa emhong tin me hang Got men epon men ako.

Si taku mulusngin pho po elik tin ngin si si put sun men u wongin kara kut tumen, men mulusngin timen men ku tunus epo po ku wha endara won akomen, men tikayung epo po ku wa ngilngin ko pon, men nuk won li klet, anima po sut i.
Si wom tin mi pim pit wo wom weh men, aku, pim a sakal tin tumen, takuma wo pim phep epo wungin tunus epo sun tin iyi ku iso si epo wom ako, men tin klap to wungin tin po palolongin epon men.

Epo Got men ku ples wungin lengwal ewin som kuma yang tulun som epo kumang tin ta wom men, tin wom wuh i pi mlaeng to min epongin tin pit wo yang yan men, tin wom nhio wo po tin auluungin men kho u wom iso kuk e nhio wo po iso men kut tumen akomen.
Ma mi pim weh epo wom mosop then then ku tohuhngin ta wom men ku si in pi mlaeng, kumali mi wom tin ku pit nhing wo hoo mingin men ku klet mi wom weh li pol to elup tin ku li ponsol men.
Epon akuli wom mayongngin, si wom men ku ira wungin pit mina po tin sup mi wo phepngin ma wuh won maikngin li maran nomalak kha kuli po wa pakuh pongin tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men.
Epo minan tin Got wo kuk mara Abraham kho men, men ku po ta in akandira ku si nhum epo yang kuma yang tung tung i som, tumen ma yang tung tung i yan tuon,
ma yang sakal taku, “Ngo ku wa emhong ko po ngon, men ku nga ning wungin tin imen weh, u nga ning i ma po tin khuuknginin tap men ku si munuman kara kut, men ku nga ning i weh kut tumen ako.”
Ma wungin tin tumen kha Abraham in e wuh i li koho, anima yang wa endara tin Got wo kuk mara yang epon koho men.

Epo po masang to sun wala ku tung tung, men ku po tung tung endara ta tin nhum epo po men ewin ako. Ma tung tungngin ta tin ku po kaek wungin epon men, kha heek walngin mosop tin si lunga po men hik putngin epon men.

Tumen kut kha Got taku suk mara po tin ku wa pakuh pongin tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men si in pi mlaeng weh epo wungin tin yang nana i ta min tin ku yang phae kyok som men, men yang kakaek i epo tung tungngin ta,

kumali wungin ponwal tin yang ku phae ewin som men, tin maran ko klat weh epo Got tin ku torok epon men, kha ku wo phepngin ta it weh pit nhing epon men, men it tin mhup li kakaun kumali it kasum hoo mingin tin Got wai ko nuk maran min it men.

Hoo mingin tin imen it kuk ton ken anka tin kasum imut ung men ta, tin enu it kasum i ma weh pit nhing ton men, men hoo mingin ta tin wungin tan maran ko klat weh u pit nhing weh kut tumen, men wa it weh li sup mi mang emin tin ung wetpo mulu tin ut mang auluungin men.

Men pi tin yang tin li muk it men kho li sup epon ku yang nhio wo it men, men a-Yesus, tin kho ma si wa kumang tin ku yang si nhum epo po kara ma yang kum auluungin epon pit mina hihingin tin ta a-Melkisedek e yang kum auluungin min men.

Epo a-Melkisedek tin imen men sinkhaung epo pi Salem u tin kum auluungin ta Got tin Sinkhaung Weh men kut tumen, tin me tut Abraham tin li lek po tin sinkhaung men, yang kyok me ma a-Melkisedek wa emhong ko po Abraham.

Li klet ma Abraham ko pok pok mi endara mosop tin yang espon mi lek walngin men ko maran min eip ponwal, ma yang wai maran min ta si ta sun maksin kut tumen, men yang tin ewo maran ma yan sinsin men si in taku, “Sinkhaung epo wungin tin siik men,” ti, anima yang yan ta maksin men sinkhaung epo pi Salem, men sinsin taku, “Sinkhaung epo wungin aminis,” ti.

Yang tin imen men wiraman pi om, u tonin pi om, u po tin ung e khuuk wal me kuk yang men pi om, u ungunan tin yang ko in ton men pi om u elup tin ku yang tunus in ton men ku li ponsol som men kut tumen, si men in ken yang tin Got Wirun men kha yang in ken po tin kum auluungin men ta kokyok kokyok li kut men.

Homani ma tulu wom hu yang tin yan pos weh imen, men tin wala Abraham tin yau a it sin men, aku, yang men nhum, takuma yang kut men pok pok mi endara tin yang espon men ko maran min eip ponwal ma yang wai maran min ta si ta sun a-Melkisedek men!

Ma irawin epo po tin khuuknginin ta a-Liwai men tin wa kumang tin ku po kum auluungin epon men, kha wungin sinsin ta nuk epo hi ku wa endara maran min mi sun tin eip ponwal men ta yanga wili po masang to sun wala ira wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men, men po tin ehuro hi men kha men, aku, po tin imen khuuknginin ta Abraham maksin kut tumen ako.
Si a-Melkisedek tin ku hi khuuk wal som men, men wa endara maran min ta mi sun tin eip ponwal men hang Abraham men ma yang wa emhong ko po sun tin in to wo kuk marangin tin ta Got men ako.
Iis, ma ku it ion i epo po ta tin wa emhong ko po sun ta men kha nhum epo po tin wa emhong hang sun men ako, men po tin ku sakal ewut sakalngin tin imen ku ta in akomen. Awu. Men pi engun.

Po Liwai tin wa endara maran min ta mi sun tin eip ponwal men hang sun tin iyi men hi huu ewin. Si a-Melkisedek tin wa endara maran min ta mi sun tin eip ponwal men hang Abraham men, men yang ta tin wungin pok putngin epon kha ku weh iso in li kut men.
Men maran ken a-Liwai tin wa endara maran min ta mi sun tin eip ponwal men men yang tuon kul a-Melkisedek epo endara maran min ta yanga wili Abraham.
Epo a-Liwai men ku khuukngin kho som, si yang iso in mi mulu tin ta yauan sin Abraham men minan tin a-Melkisedek me tut Abraham men ako.

Tumen ma taku po tin kum auluungin e a-Liwai khuuknginin men ani taku po masang to sun wala si tunus weh epo kumang ta hi men (epo wet wili po tin imen kha po masang to sun wala wa wungin sinsin epo hi men ako), taku tuni ma po iso kaeng po tin kum auluungin enginin ta tin ku iso si pit mina hihingin tin ta a-Melkisedek men, si ku po sikian yan pit mina hihingin tin ta Aron men ta akomen?
Epon taku po tin kum auluungin e hi khuuk wal men wiewi al, men wungin nuk epo wungin sinsin men ku wiewi al maksin kut tumen ako.
Epo a-Yesus tin sakalngin timen los pon men men me mi khuuknginin enginin ta, ma mi khuuknginin tin imen ku ta kum wo suyung tin ta Got men kho ewin akomen.
Epo wungin in pi mlaeng epo yang tin Akono ta it men men si mi po tin a-Yuda khuuknginin men ako. Epo po Yuda tin imen ku a-Moses sakal epo hi ta men ku si po ta tin ku kum auluungin men akomen.
Kuru wungin in pi mlaeng weh tin taku po homan ta ken a-Melkisedek men si kum auluungin men, tin kho me,
men ku me ira hihingin ta wungin sinsin tin wo epo po ku ko khuukngin mi khuuknginin ta men akomen, si men me epo kakhangin tin ta tunusngin tin kuli pi om ewin som men.
Epo Got pok put wungin ta nuk taku, “Ngon men tin kum auluungin e ku in kokyok kokyok li kut pit mina hihingin tin ta a-Melkisedek men ta ako.”
Epo wungin tin imen wala nuk ti, epo wungin sinsin tin kho men men mili nuk woringin, epon men wiak wiak u men ku nhio wo po ta som kut tumen.
Epo wungin sinsin ani ku ning i ma endara ta si tunus weh men akomen. Si wungin tin iyi men in ti, epo hoo mingin tin tunus epo sun men homan ta me sup tin ku it li tikayung Got epon men.
Ma Got wo kho epo a-Yesus ku si kum auluungin, men ku yang wo engun som. Awu. Got men tung tung weh.

Epo po tin Aron hi tin si po tin kum auluungin men, men tung tungngin om epo hi. Si yang men si kum auluungin, men epo tung tungngin ta yang tin sakal ta sun men taku, “Yang tin Akono men tung tung kho ma men kuli yang ku phae sakalngin tan kyok akomen, ‘Ngon men tin kum auluungin e ku in kokyok kokyok li kut pit mina hihingin tin ta a-Melkisedek men ta ako,’” ti.
Ma tung tungngin tin imen tin nhum weh epo sun men kha a-Yesus men si tosukngin ta tin kaek si tung tungngin tin tunus weh epo sun tin kho men kha men.
Kuru kho ma po tin kum auluungin men munuman kuk e wiewi al, epon tin hunngin klet epo hi tin ku si kuk e kum li kut men.
Si yang men sindak in kokyok kokyok li kut kha yang wa kumang tin yang kum auluungin tin ku po ta wiewi yang epon ewin akomen.

Tumen ma yang men kakha weh epo yang ku palolo po tin taku me tikayung Got epo yang men weh li po li palolongin weh, epo yang men sindak in kokyok kokyok epo yang ku in emin kuma yang kines Got nhio wo po weh.

Epo po ta tin kum auluungin tin in tumen kha tunus weh epon ku nhio wo it men, tin ku auluungin, u lasin om pon, u min yil weh, u in enginin weh epo po tin ning lasin nginangan men kut tumen, tin kho si in ili awon weh li ut po wet pi men.

Yang men ku wungin in epo yang ku ning talungin ungunan then then ken po tin kum auluungin kho men akomen, tin taku yang ning talungin mut eya yang tuon wet, anima yang ning talungin tin ku mut eya lasin ta po masang to sun wala men. Epo yang ning talungin tin imen angan then ta los po sun mosop kho kut minan tin yang tuon talu i tuon men.

Epo wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men men won ung wo po tin ku si kum auluungin tin nhum epo sun kara men tin wo hi wiak engun men. Si wungin tin Got tung tung epon weh men, tin me silung epo wungin sinsin men, men yang won ung wo Wirun tuon tin kho si in tunus weh in kokyok kokyok li kut men.

Kut ma sakalngin tin pim a sakal epon iyi men sakalngin mhin wala ti, po ta tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men tin in tumen men ta it ta in, men kho li ung ewo wili ehus tin ta yang tin Sinkhaung weh e in ili wet pi men wilin tin ato sa men,
men po ta tin kum auluungin mi mang emin tin auluungin weh men, men mang ausel tin irawin weh e yang tin Akono men tuon ning i si men, si ku po tunus ta ning i akomen.

Epo po mosop tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men men Got won ung wo hi epo po ku tet talungin kara u lek li ken nginan kara ko huu wo suyung kut tumen. Tumen ma wungin men ku weh nuk epo yang tin imen ku in to talungin ta tin ku yang wai si men maksin kut tumen ako.
Epon taku yang in wo mulus, men ku yang si ken po tin kum auluungin men ta akomen, epo po tin kum auluungin e hi ning talungin ira wungin sinsin men kara men kho kuk kut ako.

Po tin imen tin kum mi mang tin tosuk to sun e enun kai sun tin ung ili wet pi men, tin wala Got panen a-Moses epon minan tin yang taku hosi mang ausel ning nginan men. Epo yang wo ta sun taku, “Ngon men ku marap pit tunus weh epo ngon tin ku ning endara mosop ira sun enun tin nga suk marap epon kho po pi emian men.”

Kut si homani men yang wa kumang tin tunus weh epo sun tin po wa kumang epon kho men, sinsin epon tin yang e po ta tin kum auluungin e tunus weh epo sun tin kho men, epon men kaekngin ko ung wo wungin kara tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men tin tunus weh epo sun tin kho men.

Epon taku wungin siin tin kakaekngin nuk lunga Got to po tunus muk men ku wungin om epon, men ku sinsin om epo po tin ku langun epo wungin siin tin kakaekngin nuk lunga Got to po tunus men ta tin taku me ponwal angan men ako.

Epo Got wa lasin ko po po masang to sun wala wala yang wo ti, “Yang tin Akono men pok put wungin taku, ‘Wom hul, epo elup ta ku iso me, men ku nga kakaek wungin siin homan ta ko nuk lunga ngo to po tin hi khuuk wal Israel men u to po tin hi khuuk wal Yuda men kut tumen iso,

men ku ken sun tin nga kaek i ko nuk lunga ngo to po tin yau a hi siin men minan tin nga yak yak po wili po ma nga muk po me pol wo mulusngin Isip men akomen; epo po men ku iso ira wungin siin ta ngo tin kaekngin nuk lunga pim men som, tumen kha wetpo ngo wa po men.’ Yang tin Akono men wala sakal tumen.

‘Epo wungin siin tin kuli nga kaek i ko nuk lunga pim po Israel tin ung e khuuk wal men to elup tin ku si silung epo sun tin imen wala ti: ngo ku wa wungin ta ngo sinsin ko nuk mi tulun hungin ta po, u nga pan i ko nuk ewhat po kut tumen; ma nga si Got ta po u po si masang to sun wala tin ta ngo weh men kut tumen.’ Yang tin Akono men wala sakal tumen.

‘Ma po ta hi ta ku kot sun tin hi ung then men wa hi khuuk wal men wa tumen ma po wo taku, “Ngon men ku hop yang tin Akono men weh,” ti akomen, epo po mosop men ku hop ngo weh, hosingin epo po tin ya hi om weh men ma weh li pol epo po tin ya hi pos weh men.
Epo ngo ku mi ngo suk po epo wungin tin po wetpo hi wa wungin tin siik men, ma lasin ta po u wungin tin po hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men kut tumen men ku tulu ngo hu i kyok akomen.’”

Sakalngin tin Got wo taku, “Wungin tin kaekngin nuk lunga pim e homan men,” ti, men yang ning i ma wungin tin kaekngin nuk lunga po muk men ko kumang tan om kut ako. Ma endara tin ko kumang tan om ma si kho kut men men sakalngin hihingin nuk epon men ku om kut ako.

Si men irawin epo wungin siin tin kaekngin nuk lunga Got to po masang to sun wala Israel muk men men wungin sinsin tan kara nuk tin ku po ning kumang auluungin epon men, kuru men nuk epo mang tin auluungin e ung wo mulus men kut tumen ako.

Epo kho men mang ausel ta men hihingin si ung, men emin tin nuk muk men esul khin to suyung tin beret tin yasngin nuk pi mlaeng to mara Got nuk won men mosop men pit min, men mang emin tin po sikian auluungin men;
kuru wetpo mulu tin ut eya mang e me ponwal angan men men mang ausel emin ta maksin ung, tin po sikian Mang Emin tin Auluungin weh epo sun kara men,

tin suyung golan tin to endara tin kuin nginan e ipek tunus men u wunwun tin to wungin siin tin kaekngin nuk lunga Got to po masang to sun wala e gol lalapatngin nuk porilin mosop men kut tumen, tin timro golan tin mana ko min men u kamdukngin tin ta Aron e enun plok si si put sun men, u enah tin ponwal e yangan pias e wungin siin tin kaekngin nuk lunga Got to po masang to sun wala men panngin nuk yangan men kut tumen pit min men;

kuru ili mara wunwun tin imen men tihngin serabim enun ponwal tin haum eya moolngin ta Got men enu ngong ko hawus wunwun maran kut tumen. Endara tin mosop imen ku homani ma pim a tak tak sanga sakalngin munuman weh epon akomen.
Kut ma endara tin mosop imen hihingin nuk tumen kho, men po tin kum auluungin men li sup sumsum mi mang emin tin ung maran min men, ma po ning kumang auluungin tin ta hi men.

Si mang emin tin me ponwal angan men men yang tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men misan kha li sup min angan then ta mi posan then then men, men ku yang li sup engun som, si yang men ku wa li ken nginan kalolwan weh, tin ku yang ning talungin epo yang tuon u epo lasin ta po masang to sun wala kut tumen tin po pong epo engin ma po ning i men;

Emiun Auluungin taku suk mara it epo wungin tin ti, epo soput tin li sup mi mang emin tin auluungin weh men men ku pok putngin si in pi mlaeng kho minan tin mang emin tin ung ewo maran men iso ung men akomen.

Wungin tin imen men tosukngin ta, men los po elup tin po kuk kho ma po pok epon homani men, men elup tin endara tin po talu Got epon men u li ken nginan tin po talu Got epon men kut tumen po talu Got epon mi elup tin imen; mi talungin tin imen men khuk po engin weh epon ku ning po ta tin ning kumang auluungin tin imen wungin om min weh tin ples wungin tan tuon weh men;

talungin tin imen men silan khingngin pit epo endara aiingin kara u endara aumngin kara, u khis pongin maran kiring kiring kara, u wungin sinsin kara tin los po emkusin men kut tumen engun, men ko los po li pol minan tin kuli endara mosop tusngin kyok si nuk siik epon men.

Si Krais men me ken yang e po tin nhum epo sun kara e hi kum auluungin ta Got epo endara tin turunus e ku iso si silung men ta, men yang li sup mi mang ausel tin nhum u tunus weh epo sun tin kho men, tin ku ningngin epo po tunus wili hi som men, tin imen men sinsin ti, men ku ningngin epo endara tin Got pho pon wo mulus tin iyi men akomen.

Si meme kalolwan wa bulmakau asus kalolwan ani ku yang li sup ton men akomen. Awu. Yang kalolwan tuon kha yang li sup ton mi mang emin tin auluungin weh men angan then ta los po sun mosop, men yang tuon suuk sii kumang tin epo lasin kiis nginan men tin ku sindak nuk tumen kokyok kokyok li kut.
Epo bulmakau kalolwan u meme kalolwan u bulmakau asus ekasan tin pla ma pit men tin po tep tep i ko po sun tin po hi lengwal men men ning i ma po si po hi yil to mara Got,

ma taku wungin tumen, men wungin tin imen maran ko klat weh epo kalolwa Krais tin min alang siin tuon si ta Got epo Emiun tin sindak men to pon tin muuk muuk men kha ku khis mi wom tin ples wungin taku i e tunus wa lengwal wa tumen epo tohuhngin maran kiring kiring tin li epo hunngin men, kumali wom kum ta Got tin in kokyok kokyok men weh.

Ma wungin sinsin tin imen kha yang si po tin in emin Got to po tunus to wungin homan tin kaekngin nuk lunga hi men, men si epo hunngin ta yang, epon ku wungin tin po hik put wungin sinsin wet wungin siin tin kaekngin nuk lunga Got to po muk men ku kiisngin, kumali po tin Got yuk hi men ku wa pakuh pongin tin sindak e Got wo kuk mara po kho epon men.
Epon taku po ta pok put min ko nuk yanga kisang epon ku pakuh po sun ta epo endara kara, men wungin weh nuk epon ku hun kho wet khama sun wai kha men.

Epo wungin siin tin po tunus kaek i nuk lunga hi kara men ta, ku po tin imen hun weh, anima sinsin iis kha men, epon taku po tin hihi wungin men iso tunus in, men ku sinsin iis akomen. Awu. Men pi engun.
Wala wungin siin tin kaekngin nuk lunga Got to po muk men men ku siin iis engun akomen. Awu. Li ken nginan kalolwan yukngin ko kho wet, anima wungin timen siin iis kha men.

Epo a-Moses suuk sii wungin sinsin mosop pok put nginan si ta po masang to sun wala mosop ira wungin sinsin li klet, anima yang wa bulmakau asus u meme kut tumen kalolwan to eki kara, u sipsip yut tin po mhee men, u sa hisop kut tumen, ma yang tep tep i ko po kisang tuon u ko po po masang to sun wala mosop kut tumen,
ma yang ko wo ta po taku, “Kalol tin kakaek wungin siin tin kaekngin nuk lunga Got to wom men tin Got wo maran ko klat ta wom kho epon men wala iyi.”
Li klet ma yang ira wungin tin imen kyok ma yang tep tep kalol ko po mang ausel u endara mosop tin pit mi mang e po kum ta Got epon men maksin kut tumen.
Iis, epo wungin tin ira wungin sinsin men men tikayung epo endara mosop kha kalol ning i ma si pon yil to mara Got men, ma taku kalol ku yukngin ko som, men ku lasin klokngin akomen.

Tumen ma wungin weh nuk kho epo endara tin nuk ili wet pi men enun tin ko nuk mulus men ku li ken nginan kalolwan ning i si pon yil to mara Got weh, si endara tuon tin nuk ili wet pi men men ku talungin tunus ta weh epo sun tin imen kha ku enda tin mosop imen weh si pon yil to mara Got epon men.

Epo Krais men ku kho li sup mang emin tin auluungin e po tunus ning i epo wili hi men, tin enun engun epo sun tin irawin weh men akomen. Awu. Yang men siik li si wet pi, kuma homani ma yang si pol to mara Got epon ku nhio wo it.

Epo yang ku li sup wet pi epon ku yang talu i tuon in kokyok kokyok ken po tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men ning i ewin ma po li sup mang emin tin Auluungin Weh men to posan then then to kalol tin enginin enginin men akomen --

epon taku wungin nuk tumen, men ku wungin weh nuk epo Krais men ku wuh wungin kokyok kokyok ewo maran tin mulus pho pongin ma ung e me men; takuma awu, angan then ta to elup tin ku me ponsol iyi kut i kha yang si put plo nginan epon ku yang klok lasin epo talungin tin yang tuon min alang siin tuon men.
Ma wungin men hihingin nuk epo po mosop men ku huu angan then ta, anima ples walngin si,

tumen kut kha Krais si talu i angan then ta epon ku lat lasin ta po munuman epon men. Ma po tin kuk e hoo mi hi epo yang tin ku kerek e me men kha kuli yang si plo nginan ta hi angan ta kyok men, men ku yang lat lasin kyok akomen, si epon ku yang palolo po.

Epo wungin sinsin men tosukngin enun engun epo endara tin turunus e ku iso me men, si ku endara tin tuon imen enun weh akomen, tumen ma men khuk po engin weh epon ku talungin tin tuon imen, tin po talu i kokyok kokyok to posan then then men ani ku ning i ma po tin taku me kuk enu mara Got men si tunus weh to mara Got epon men angan akomen.

Epon taku talungin tin imen ku ning po si tunus weh tumen, men ku po talu i kokyok kokyok akomen ako, wah? Epo po tin ku me talu Got men, taku angan then ta misan ma po si mi hi yil weh kut, timen ku po tulu hi hu lasin ta hi kyok akomen.
Takuma awu. Talungin tin imen tak tulu po epo lasin tin ta hi men to posan then then ako.
Epo wungin maran ko klat weh epo bulmakau to meme kalolwan tin ku klok lasin men.
Tumen ma minan tin Krais me in wo mulus men yang wo taku, “Li ken nginan tin lekngin ko huu mut eya lasin u talungin kut tumen men ku mip epon weh akomen, si e hihi ngo emkusin ta ngo ta kho.
Epon kho men talungin tin yau suuk siin ii nginan men u tin epo lasin klok nginan men tumen men ku mip tunusngin epon akomen.
Li klet ma nga sakal taku, ‘Aluuh, Got, e ion i, epo nga kho me kut (epon men sakalngin panngin nuk epo ngo mi kisang tin molngin men) epon ku nga ning wungin tin nuk na mi ngon men.’”

Si muk ma yang wo taku, “Li ken nginan tin lekngin ko hu mut eya lasin men u talungin maran kiring kiring u talungin tin yau suuk siin ii nginan men u talungin tin epo lasin klok nginan men kut tumen men ku mip epon weh som, kuru ngon ku mip saah pit pon som kut tumen,” ti, epon tin imen ningngin ira wungin sinsin ako,

li klet anima yang wo taku, “Imen, epo nga kho me kut epon ku nga ning wungin tin nuk ta mi ngon men kut khae,” ti. Iis, yang klok wungin tin me in muk men li, si kuma yang wai tin me ponwal angan men si nuk nhing kha men.
Wungin tin nuk ta mi Got imen kha it si auluungin epon epo a-Yesus Krais emkusin tin talungin angan then ta los po sun mosop men.
Si po mosop tin kum auluungin men kuk e ning kumang ta hi ungunan then then kokyok kokyok ma po ning talungin tin maran ken wal imen sumsum, takuma talungin tin imen ku klok lasin angan akomen.
Si yang tin tunus men men ning talungin then ta misan epon ku mut eya lasin in kokyok kokyok li kut, anima yang si ung ewo wili Got wilin tin ato sa men,
si elup tin mut eya sun men yang ung e kaeng li pol minan tin kuli po tin nolo yang men iso me sup wet khi yang men.
Epo talungin then ta misan kha yang ning po masang to sun wala tin hi si auluungin men tunus weh epon men men ku po kuk tumen kokyok kokyok li kut.
Kuru Emiun Auluungin men nhio wo sun ma yang pok put wungin epo it maksin kut tumen. Epo kho ma yang wo taku,

“Wungin siin tin ngo ku wai ko nuk lunga ngo to po mi elup tin si silung epo sun tin imen wala ti: ngo ku wa wungin sinsin tin ta ngo men ko nuk mi po mi hi, u nga pan i ko nuk mi tulun hungin ta po kut tumen.” Yang tin Akono men wala wo tumen.
Li klet anima yang wo ta maksin kyok taku, “Ngo ku tulu ngo hu pit po lasin ta po u wungin tin po hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men kut tumen angan ta kyok akomen.”
Ma taku Got klok lasin tin imen kho li, men ku po khung i epo po ku ning talungin tin ku klok lasin men ta kyok akomen.
Ehurok, it men ku mi it puplet epon ku it li sup Mang Emin tin Auluungin Weh men epo a-Yesus kalolwan,
epo soput homan ta tin li epo tunusngin e yang tak i ta it men, men it li yek ta mulu tin ut mi mang men ma it li sup, mulu tin imen, men los po yang emkusin kha men.
Kuru po ta tin kum auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men tin maran pit wo mang ta Got men men ta it ta in,

tumen ma it men ku me kuk enu mara Got to mi it tin wungin anuh misan nuk mi it men u to mi it tin nuk nhing wo wo phepngin tin klet mi it men tumen, men ku it me to mi it tin wa lasin ko po it ewin men tin Krais kalolwan tep tepngin ko pon kho ma ko min yil kut men u to po it tin khis pongin epo eki tin mi yil men kut tumen.
It men ku kasum hoo mingin ta it tin it pok put men pip weh, si it men ku mi it king king asin, epo yang tin wo kuk mara it men men in to wungin tan anuh misan.
Ma it men ku tulu it hu pit po al epo it tin ku seh po ewhat wal epo min epongin u wungin tin tunus men ning nginan men kut tumen,

si it kuk aku wetpo it wa wungin tin ku it me palu wal then epon men, ken po kara tin ning i ewin men, si it men ku kuk e pa nhing wal kokyok kokyok, ma it ion Ungunan tin imen tin ung e me enu mara it men, men ku it tohuh epo wungin tin imen weh.
Epon taku it kuk e ning lasin epo mi it weh mi khi it tin wa maran ekngin epo wungin tin irawin men, men ku talungin ta tin ku klok lasin ta maksin in akomen.
Awu. Hoo mingin to lemngin epo ples walngin tin ku iso si men, u yau tin tohuh epon ku ii endara men tin ku suuk sii po tin nolo Got men tumen.
Po ta tin wetpon wa wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men, ma taku wulong ponwal wa wuluk miuk tin mara ngyuk nuk pon men pok put, men ku po wini ko hun engun, si po ku mi hi suk i kyok akomen.

Si taku po ta sak po Got Wirun epo khin, ma wo epo yang kalolwan tin kaek wungin siin tin nuk lungan yang to Got e yang si auluungin epon men ken i e amironnginan engun men, ma mimi Emiun tin min sukngin ko tan epon men, men wom phaeng taku yang tin imen kuli wa mumhek mingin tua, epon men ku iso wai nhum weh epo sun tin po tin wetpo hi wa wungin sinsin tin ta a-Moses men wai men ako, wah?

Epo it pon ta yang tin wo taku, “Wungin emhut sun men kumang ta ngo weh, ma ngo ku ning i emhut sun ako,” kuru yang wo angan ta maksin taku, “Yang tin Akono men kha ku ples wungin ta po masang to sun wala tin tan men ako,” ti, kut tumen.
Lemngin wini epon tin taku po ta plong ko nuk yanga wili Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men.
Si tulu wom hu epo ungunan kara tin kho li men, tin esul ngin ngin ko po wom kho, anima wom khung wet maikngin nunhum kara ma wom nuk nhing wet weh,
tin minan kara ma po wa wom si po mimi wom u po ning wom lengwal to mara po masang to sun wala pi mlaeng, u minan kara kyok men wom si tita wom po tin sun ning hi lengwal tumen epo hi men kut tumen.

Epo mi wom suk ngo to esih tin po koklong e po kan kan ngo epon men, ma po me sisne mi wom ma po kot endara ta wom li, men mi wom keh ma wom mang ta po ma po me ning i tumen engun, epo wom ion i epo moolngin tin tunus epo sun e ko pit hut wal ung e li kut men ta wom men pit ili wet pi kut.
Tumen ma wom men ku tep mi wo phepngin ta wom lu asin, epo wo phepngin tin imen kuli wom iso wa talungin nhum emhut i ako.

Epo wom men iso kalwok epo wom tin ku kuk to wungin tin ku wom nuk nhing wet won maikngin li maran nomalak epon men, kumali wom ning wungin tin nuk ta mi Got men kho kut, anima wom wa endara tin yang wo kuk mara wom epon kho men.
“Epo put monlo long anima yang tin ku iso me men me, si yang ku iak kyok akomen.
Si po ta tin wungin tan siik men men ku tunus in kokyok kokyok epo wo phepngin misan weh. Si taku po ta mikih kyok li, men ku mi ngo tunusngin pit pon akomen.”
Takuma it men ku pit mina po tin mikih kyok li ma huuspit men akomen. Awu. It men pit mina po tin wo hi phep li po enu hi palolongin men ako.
Epo wo phepngin men sinsin ti, epo wo it phep epo endara tin it hoo mi it epon men men ku weh si, u wo it phep epo endara tin ku mara it kon i som men men weh kuk kut tumen.
Epo wo phepngin kha po tin yau a it sin men wa ya hi tunus epon men.

Wo phepngin kha mara it ples sakalngin epo endara mosop tin nuk yanga pi sup e klet men men hihingin ut pi nuk epo sakalngin tin ta Got men, tumen ma endara tin mara it nuk pon men ani ku ningngin epo endara tin ku mara it kon i men akomen.

Wo phepngin kha Abel ning talungin ta li epo Got men, men talungin tunus ta epo sun tin ta a-Kain men, ma wo phepngin tin imen kha wungin pok putngin epo yang e wungin tan siik men, men Got pok put epo yang min tunusngin pit po talungin tin ta sun men; ma wo phepngin kha li yang hun kho, takuma yang iso pok put wungin epon men.

Wo phepngin kha a-Inok uusngin si kuma yang ion hunngin som men, “ma po ku pon ta yang kyok som, epo Got uus yang kho si kut; epo muk tin yang ku uusngin kho li si som men, men po pok put yang e Got min tunusngin pit pon weh.

Si taku wo phepngin pi om, men ku wungin maran ko klat weh epo po ta tin ku ning wungin ta tin ku Got min tunusngin pit pon men. Epo po ta ku me in enu mara Got, men ku won phep epo yang tin in men weh, ma yang men po ta tin in e emhut wungin tunus ta po tin tohuh epon ku pon ta yang men.

Wo phepngin kha Got anin wungin ko ta a-Noa epo wungin tin yang ku ion i kho som men, ma lemngin tin pit wo Got men pong si yang, ma yang hihi imut ta epon ku po tin hi khuuk wal men palolongin epon men; ma wo phepngin tin ta yang men kha yang wo los po po tin ung wo mulus men ma yang si po ta tin ku pakuh pongin epo wungin tin siik e me epo wo phepngin men.

Wo phepngin kha Abraham hul wet sakalngin tin Got yuk yang epo yang ku yok li pol pi tin kuli yang iso wai ken pi ta tin kuli Got pakuh po yang epon men. Ma yang li pol, men ku yang pon ta pi tin yang ku li epon men kho akomen.

Wo phepngin kha yang li ung wo mulusngin tin Got wo kuk mara yang epon men ken i e mulusngin ta po enginin ta engun men, ma yang ung mi mang ausel to Aisak ngong a-Yakop, tin ngyuk wa pakuh pongin to yang epo wo kuk marangin then ta men;
Epo yang in e kaeng epo enunu tin sinsin ung e Got maran iran ma yang ning i men.
Wo phepngin kha e-Sara tuon wa kakhangin epon ku kuman men, ma wut khuuk sun hoin ta minan tin wut hyangan weh men, epo wut maran ples wungin epo Got tin wo kuk mara wut men men to wungin anuh ako.
Tumen ma yang then ta tin in epon ku hun angan men, kha po munuman ko khuukngin mi won ken awheng tin nomoyong nuk ili wet pi men, u ken namak tin nuk suu wiu e ku it tiik i angan som men kut tumen.

Po tin mosop imen huu to wo phepngin ta hi, si po ku wa endara tin Got wo kuk mara po kho epon men akomen, si po nuk hin epon ma po mara hi li kon i nuk wo neringting ta, ma po wo hi nuk wet weh epon ku iso si enun ung hut, ma po wai to mi hi tin nawaehngin men, ma po pok put hi epo po men kuk ken po tin api enginin e nomisang e me kuk wo mulus engun men.
Epo po tin sakal tumen men pok put wungin pi mlaeng epo po kuk e langun epo mulusngin ta hi sinsin ta ako.
Ma taku irawin epo po tulu hi hu pit po mulusngin tin po yok won ma po me men, men ku pi put ek kara nuk tin ku po kyok li epon men ako.

Takuma awu. Homani ma po mi hi epo mulusngin tunus ta epo sun tin iyi, men tin api wet pi men ako. Tumen ma Got men ku manngin wan epo po tin ku sikia Got e ta po men akomen, epo yang men hihi enunu ta po ta kho kut.
Wo phepngin kha Got karong Abraham, minan tin yang wa Aisak si yang taku talu Got epo sun men, ma yang tin wa wo kuk marangin men men wa wirun tin maran then men si ken talungin ta,
wirun tin imen wala Got wo ta Abraham epon kho taku, “Aisak kha ku po sikia khuukngin tap ung pon men,” ti,
epo yang maran iran ta min epo Got men kakha epon ku khek yang kyok si tunus ako, aku yang li in mi po tin huu kho men, ma taku it sakal emol epon, men ken yang e wa wirun kyok me mi hunngin men ako.
Wo phepngin kha Aisak wa emhong ko po a-Yakop ngong a-Isau epo wungin tin ku iso si ta wulong silung men.
Wo phepngin kha a-Yakop ku hun angan, men yang wa emhong ko po a-Yosep husanin likiong, ma yang powut ko suul hut kamtukngin tin tan men ma yang wa Got yan si.
Wo phepngin kha a-Yosep ku hun angan, men yang tulun hu pit po po Israel tin kuli yok Isip li men, ma yang panen po epo yang pokoin.

Wo phepngin kha a-Moses ko khuukngin, men wulong tin khuuk yang men kaun yang to namih khaut miuk, epo wulong ion yang men pon kes epo po hoin kara, si wulong ku lem epo wungin tin yang tin sinkhaung men wai maran ko klat ma nuk men akomen.
Wo phepngin kha a-Moses si nomuru kut, men yang maran luun epo yang tin ku po sikia Parau erun wirun men,

epo yang min wawai epon men tunus epo yang ku wuh won maikngin to po masang to sun wala tin ta Got men, si taku yang in e min keh to min kehngin tin ta lasin e to elup tin maran orot engun men, men ku yang ion i ken i e tunus weh akomen,
epo yang ion mimingin tin ku yang wai to Krais men ken i e miranngin nhum ta epo sun tin po halung pon si po wal Isip men; epo yang ion wungin emhut sun tin tunus e ta yang men ung e hoh si kut.

Wo phepngin kha a-Moses wetpon wa pi Isip men, si yang ku lem pit wo yan salngin tin ta yang tin sinkhaung men akomen; epo yang men pit nhing li maran nomalak ken yang e maran nuk po yang tin ku mara it kon i ewin som men.

Wo phepngin kha a-Moses ira wungin tin epo Paska men u li ken nginan kalolwan tin tep tepngin men kut tumen, epon akuli tihngin tin ku me songhu pit wo po tin sun khuuk i muk men ku me ning wungin ta epo po akomen.
Wo phepngin kha po masang to sun wala hik put wiu tin mi mhee men ken po e li wo mulusngin tin maran ewin nuk men, si po Isip taku ning i ken sun tin imen, men po li um kawot ma po huu.
Wo phepngin kha enunu tin baul pi Yeriko men kukyumngin ko epon men mi khi po tin muk muk baul pi to ungunan ponwal me sup kho men.
Wo phepngin kha e-Rehap tin api put soput men ku huuspit to po tin ku wo hi phep som men akomen, epon tin wut wa wulong tin ku me waheking men to min wyungin men.

Si ngo ku sakal si nuk po sun tin imen tua? Epon taku nga iso pasik epo a-Gideon, u a-Barak u a-Samson u a-Yepta, kuru a-Dewit u a-Samuel u po pokngin kara maksin kut tumen, men kuli elup kara put li pit akomen.

Epo wo phepngin kha po tin imen wa enunu ta sun kara me sup wet po epon men, u po ning wungin tin sisiik men, u po wa wo kuk marangin tin ta Got men, u po ning i ma laion mosop won po maik epo li tin ku koh po men,

u po whus yau tin bing si men ko, u po meleng bainat tin tongin men, u po tin wiak wiak men si apalukngin, u po si nomnga mi lek walngin, u po ning i ma po nolo tin api enginin men mhup li yanga pi kut tumen.

Kuru po wala kara wa po tin ta hi e huu kho men, tin khekngin kyok si turunus men kyok me kuk to hi. Si po kara maksin men sun wa won manngin hambip si po hi kyok, epo po men ku mi hi nawaehngin epo hi tin ku li wo hi ek men akomen, kumali po kekhek kyok si wa tunusngin tin tunus weh epo sun men.
Si po kara men karongngin si ta hi tin sun ton mi hi u paplai hi men kut tumen, wai, men po kara men kan kanngin epo esih tin po koklong men ma po wa hi li wo hi maik hi mi mang kut tumen.

Kuru po kara men sun tup ewut hi epo enah, u po kara men sun wa aso ma po hik hik put hi ko put ponwal epon, u po kara men karongngin si ta hi, u po kara men lekngin ko huu epo bainat kut tumen. U po kara men kalwok weh u sun ning hi lengwal u wa won manngin ko po hi tumen, ma po phi phi sipsip to meme elit ma po mili mili engun.

Po tin wo hi phep imen tunus epo po ku kuk lunga sun tin api wo mulus men akomen. Po men kuk e mili mili yanga pi tin tahunggu men u po pi emian, u po kuk mi uwin u po kuk mi nahu tin nuk e li li mi mulus men kut tumen.
Ma po tin mosop imen wa ya hi tunus epo wo phepngin tin ta hi men, takuma po ku wa wungin tin Got wo kuk mara po epon men kho akomen.
Epo Got hihi wungin tin tunus epo sun tin imen ta it kara kho kut, tumen kuma po tin imen ku sup me then to it khama it mosop si tunus weh to al.

Po masang to sun wala tin mosop imen nuk baul it ken hingis nhum ta men, ma po suk mara it epo wungin tin epo wo phepngin men. Tumen ma it kut men ku mang mang ta wungin mosop tin los it men li nuk worengin, u ta lasin tin kan kan it awo mlus nginan engun men li kut tumen, ma it whal ma it urut mara al to emiu it tin tang nuk men epo urut marangin tin hihingin nuk maran min it men,

men ku mara it weldung pit wo a-Yesus weh, tin sinsin epo wo phepngin ta it u tin pyu pon men kut tumen, tin tulun hu min kehngin tin hihingin nuk maran min yang men kha yang wuh won manngin put sa wlong put wal men, ma yang ion manngin tin imen ken i e amiron nginan engun men, ma homani ma yang kho si ung ewo wili ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men wilin eronin kho kut.
Epo wom men ku tulu wom hu pit po yang tin wuh wungin tin po tin kuk to lasin men ning i ewut yang li maran nomalak takuma yang pit nhing wet men, epon akuli wom mos ma mi wom hunngin.
Epo kho me pol homani men ku wom wuh lek walngin to lasin weh li kalolwa wom ku ko akomen. Awu. Men iso pi engun.

Iyi, tulu wom som ta wungin tin Got wo nut wom epon ken wom e Got husanin men wah, tin yang maran pit mi sakalngin to wom taku, “Wiruk, mip ton wungin tin yang tin Akono men wo nut ngon epon men ken i e lengwal engun men asin, kuru mip hunngin minan tin yang taku tus ngon men asin kut tumen.
Epo po tin ani yang tin Akono men min epo hi men kha yang wo nut hi men, ma yang paplai husanin masang tin mosop e yang wa hi to min tin nawaehngin pit po hi men.”

Got tin taku kot wom men kha wom men ku pit nhing wet won maikngin epon men. Got ning wungin epo wom ken wom e husanin tin masang men kha men; epo wirun ta tin ku wiraman tus i ewin som men ta in, wah? Awu. Men pi engun ako.
Si taku yang ku tus wom som epo wungin tin po tin husani yang mosop men pok min men, men ku wom kuk ken po tin apuluso men engun, si wom men ku husani Got irawin ani men akomen.
Kuru it men po irama it tin api mulus men kuk ma po kot it kho, ma it uluu po. Iyi, men tunus epo it men ku wa it sup wet Wirama it tin ta emiu it men weh kumali it wa tunusngin epon, wah?

Epo irawin epo po irama it tin imen men kot it to pi ungunan kara engun ira wungin tin po ion i ken i e tunus epo hi men, si Got men kot it epon ku nhio wo it weh, kumali it pok mi wungin tin ta yang e auluungin men to po kara.

Epo wungin tin po paplai sun hoin epon men men ku it ion i ta homani ken i e epo min kehngin men akomen, si men epo won manngin ako; takuli klet men enun ung hut tin to min wyungin e wungin tin siik men pong sin si in men epo po tin hoh wo hi epo kotngin tin imen kho ma po si wo hi nhing epon men.
Tumen ma wom men ku wa wili wom tin ko hun kuk men si pit nhing, kuru wom ning powut wom tin kikien men men ku si pit nhing kut tumen,
ma wom nemeh soput po ewi khi wom, kuma wom tin nes tongong tongong men ku khi wom soslok kyok akomen, si kuma men ku si tunus engun.

Wom men ku tohuh epo wom ku kuk aminis to po masang to sun wala mosop, kuru epo wom tin ku si auluunginan men kut tumen, epon taku po ta ku si auluungin som, men ku maran kon yang tin Akono men akomen.

Wom men ku haum tunus weh epon akuli po ta wom ta yek ta nanaangin tin ta Got men; epon akuli sa imut tin sut makalek men ta si lunga wom ma ning maikngin, men ku tin imen ma po munuman si lengwal to mara Got epon;

epon akuli po ta wom ta si in to wungin tin epo elwanngin men wa to wungin tin po wo hi nuk wet wungin tin ta pi mulus men ken a-Isau men, tin tih miranngin tin tan men sup wet enda aiingin tin misikin ta engun men.

Epo wom ion i epo yang in li klet, anima yang min epo yang ku pakuh pongin epo emhong tin imen, takuma yang men amutngin, epo pi tin ku yang phae min epon men ku yang pon tan ta ung akomen, aku, yang tohuh ma yang tinis weh epo yang ku wai.
Epo wom ku kho mu pol po pi emian tin ku po kah pon men, u tin yau ngin ngin pon men u pi mi ku tin min ko klet weh men u pi tin pus men,
u kiyak tin ingut men u wut po ta tin pok put sakalngin men, tin po hul i ma po hau wal epo wungin ku pok putngin ko ta po angan ta kyok asin men akomen. Awu.

Epo wungin sinsin tin Got wai maran ko klat epo po men men maik po weh, ma po ku kuk wet akomen, tin Got wo taku, “Aku, taku li ken nginan ta kah po pi emian, men ku po wini ko hun epo enah wa niin epo taplimngin tin nhum men ko hun weh.”
Ma wungin tin imen men po ion i ma po lem epon nhum takut, wala a-Moses maksin men wo taku, “Ngo men lem takut u nga kwat kut tumen.”

Si wom men kho mu pol po pi emian Saion u mi enunu tin ta Got tin tunus in kokyok kokyok men, men Yerusalem tin api wet pi men kha men, u wom mu pol ta tihngin tin wa ilio angan e ku po tiik i angan som men,

u wom mu epo palu walngin tin nhum men u palu walngin tin ta po tin sun wo hi to makngin ung wo hi e ya hi panngin nuk kut ili wet pi men, u wom mu epo Got tin ku ples wungin ta po mosop men, u epo emiu po tin wungin ta hi siik e kho si tunus weh men,

u epo a-Yesus tin in emin Got to po tunus to wungin siin tin kaekngin homan nuk lunga Got to po tunus men, u epo a-Yesus kalolwan tin tep tepngin ko e pok put sakalngin tin tunus epo sun kalolwan tin ta Abel men kut tumen.

Wom men ku haum tunus weh, epon akuli mara wom luluun epo wom tin ku hul sakalngin tin ta yang e yang sakal i men. Epo po tin kho ma mara hi luluun epon ku hul sakalngin tin ta yang e yang sakal ta po wo mulus men men ku yek ta wungin tin imen ma saa akomen, tumen kut kha wungin maran ko klat weh epo it tin ku yek ta sakalngin men akomen kut tumen, tin taku wetpo it wa yang tin sakal me ko ili wet pi men,
men yang tin kho ma wut ning i ma mulus kin men; si homani men yang wo kuk mara it taku, “Angan ta kyok men ku nga ning i ma mulus misan kin som, men ku wet pi kin kut tumen.”

Epo wungin tin yang wo taku, “Angan ta kyok,” ti, men suk mara it epo endara mosop tin kin homani men ku klokngin li, men endara tin pho pongin men, si kumali endara tin ku kin ewin som men ku bing nuk tumen li kut.

Epo it men wa enunu tin ku kin ewin som men, tumen ma it men ku kuk to nanaangin weh, tin ku it ning kumang auluungin to wungin tin yang min nawaehngin epon men to wungin tin it uluu Got men u to wungin tin it lem pit wo yang men kut tumen.
Epo Got tin ta it men men ken yau tin suuk sii endara mosop ii nginan men.
Wom men ku iso ira wungin tin ku mi wom pit wo po tin ehuro wom men li kut.
Wom kuk aku tulu wom som epo wom tin ku mara wom pit wo po tin nomisang men, epo kho ma po kara tin ning wungin tin tumen men hi pong epo engin si hi yuk tihngin kara me kuk hang i.

Tulu wom hu pit po po tin kan kanngin men, ken wom e kan kanngin to po men, u tulu wom hu pit po po tin sun songhu pit wo hi men kut tumen, epo wom tuo wom men iso kuk mi emkusi wom wo mulus kuma po ning i tumen epo wom maksin kut tumen ako.

Enanginngin men ku wom mosop mara wom ion i epon men tunus, ma ehus tin ta po tin enangin men men ku mara wom pit won tunus kuma won yil weh; epo po tin ning elwanngin men to sun tin sup si khi al men kuli Got iso wo los po hi ako.

Wungin tin ku wom karut wom epon men men ku to maran nesngin asin; si wom men ku mi wom ko lu wyu ung to endara tin wom kasum i kut men. Epo Got tuon wo taku, “Ngo men ku mang put wom wa wetpo ngo wa wom tumen angan akomen.”
Tumen ma it ku mi it puplet ma it pok put sakalngin taku, “Yang tin Akono men kha nhio wongin tin ta ngo men, tumen ma ngo ku lem akomen. Epo po tin tunus men kuli ning wungin tunia weh epo ngo?”

Tulu wom hu po tin mara hi pit wo wom men, tin pok put sakalngin ta Got si ta wom kho men, ma tulu wom hu pit po wungin ta hi tin si enun ung hut sun men, ma wom ira po to wo phepngin tin ta hi men weh.
A-Yesus Krais men wungin tan in kai wal to pi toisap, u homani, u to elup tin nuk e li kut men kut tumen.

Wom kuk aku kotngin tin maran kiring kiring men u tin enginin enginin men tumen ning i ma mi wom lu pit lu pit. Epon men tunus epo mi it tin ku pa nhingngin epo nanaangin tin ta Got men, si ku epo enda aiingin tin ku nhio wo po tin wo hi nuk wet men akomen.

It men suyung tin po ning talungin won men ta it ta ung, timen men ku po tin kum auluungin mi mang ausel tin ta Got men ku Got wa emhong ko po po epo po ku me ii endara tin nuk wo suyung tin imen akomen.

Epo li ken nginan emkusin tin imen tin yang tin ning kumang auluungin e nhum epo sun kara men wai kalolwan li sup mang emin tin auluungin weh men epon ku mut eya lasin men, men sutngin woringi pi tin po wim mi maulu epon men ako.
Tumen kut kha a-Yesus ku ning po masang to sun wala tin tan men si auluungin epo yang enghikan tuon, men yang wuh wungin tak li wetpo enunu mara sowon tin baul pi men maksin kut tumen.
Tumen ma it men ku li pol ta yang tak li mi maulu, kuma it men ku wa manngin tin ta yang men maksin ko po it kut tumen.
Epo pi tin ko pit iyi men ku enunu tin ung kokyok kokyok li men ku ta it ta ung akomen, si it kuk e hoo mi it epo enunu tin imen tin kuli iso me silung men.
Tumen ma a-Yesus kha ku it kuk e wilayuk epo it ku ning talungin tin ku it sam sam Got epon men, men talungin tin me pol mi wo it men, tin it sam sam yang yan epon men.
Si wom kuk aku tulu wom som ta wungin tin ku wom ning i tunus epo wal u tin ku wom nhio wo al epon men tumen asin. Epo talungin tin imen men Got min saah pit pon ako.

Wom men ku hul wet po tin mara hi pit wo wom men ma wom wa wom weh lu sup wet wili po weh, epo po kha kuk e haum eya enu wom weh ken po e ku pok put sakalngin si ta Got epo kumang tin po ning i men. Wom mang si po mara hi pit wo wom to min kehngin, si ku to min urut i asin, epon taku to min urut i, men ku timen nhio wo wom weh akomen.
Wom men ku kines Got epo pim, epo wo pim phep epo mi pim tin ku ples wungin men men ku to lasin ta akomen, ma mi pim epo pim ku kuk e ning wungin mosop to wungin tin ku ya pim tunus epon men misan.
Si nga suh mi kinga wom epo wom ku iso kuk e kines tumen weh, kumali nga kyok ti epo wom kerek engun.

Homani men ku Got tin sinsin epo min wyungin men, tin khek a-Yesus tin Akono ta it men mi po tin huu kho men kyok si men, men yang tin akono e maran pit wo sipsip men, kalolwan tin wungin siin tin nuk lunga Got to it e sindak in kokyok kokyok men,

kha ku yang ning wom si klet weh epo wungin turunus ning nginan mosop kuma wom ira wungin tin yang min epon men, ma yang ning kumang mi wom epo wungin tin ku yang min saah pit po wom ton to mara yang men, yanga wili a-Yesus Krais, yang tin imen kha ku it wai yan si kokyok kokyok li kut men. Men irawin.
Kut si ehurok, nga suh mi kinga wom epo wom ku mara wom ain ma wom hul wet wungin tin nga wo nut wom epon tin i, epo nga pan wungin tin iyi ti epo wom men wungin hut sok engun.
Nga pok wom epo wiro suk a-Timoti men plosngin li won pias kho kut, tin taku yang kerek me men, men ku tuk a ti ion wom.
Wom men ku wa mi wom si ta po mosop tin mara hi pit wo wom men u ta po masang to sun wala tin mosop e auluungin men kut tumen. Po tin api Itali men wa mi hi ti epo wom.
Nanaangin tin ta Got men ku in to wom mosop. Men irawin.

Ngo a-Yemis tin kum wet wili Got u a-Yesus Krais tin Akono men kut tumen kha tih kisang tin iyi ti epo wom tin khuuknginin siin khaut khum ta u ponwal me sup tumen, tin plak mingin li ung e li li yanga pi men. Pi mhangin tunus ti epo wom.
Ehurok, taku wom pon ta karongngin maran kiring kiring kara, men ku wom ion i ken i e epo min kehngin engun,
epo wom ion i epo wo phepngin ta wom tin ku karongngin men men pho po wungin mi wom tin ku wom pit nhing wet won maikngin epon men.
Ma wom men ku mang, si wungin tin wom pit nhing wet won maikngin epon men ku iso si pyu po kumang tan weh, kumali wom si nonomuru ma wom kuk to endara mosop, si wom ku kalwok epo endara ta akomen.
Si taku po ta wom ta kalwok epo mhin ekngin, men ku kines Got tin naa po mosop epo mhin ekngin hambip engun, si ku pio ewin som men, men ku yang wai si ta sun ako.
Takuma po tin imen ku kines to wo phepngin weh, si ku min ponwal asin, epo po tin mi hi ponwal men men ken esap tin eip tep i ma hik sup mi al yanga sun engun men.
Epo po tin imen ku hoo mi hi epo po ku wa endara ta hang yang tin Akono men asin,
epon men in to min tin ponwal men engun, ma wungin mosop tin po ning i men ku siin pit nhing som.
Si wiro it ta tin lungunan engun men ku wangan pon epon men yan pos ako,
si yang ta tin miran men ku wangan pon epon men lungunan engun, epon men kuli mli ko ken monkini tin epililan men engun.

Epo sinang me si ma sinang moom pi, ma epilil mlus kerek engun, ma plaua tan mlus ma hih ko, ma pon tin tunus men ko lengwal kut. Tumen kut kha ku po tin miran men mi pit ko mi kumang tin po tohuh epon men.

Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po yang ta tin pit nhing wet karongngin men. Epo minan tin kuli Got ion mi wungin ta yang ma Got wo epon e tunus men, men ku yang wa moolngin tin epo tunusngin men ko ung mhi yang, tin yang tin Akono men wo kuk mara po tin mi hi pit wo yang men epo yang ku espon si ta po men.

Si taku karongngin lengwal ta si ta po ta, men ku wo taku, “Got kha karong ngo men,” ti asin, epo Got men ku wungin lengwal ta karong i ewin akomen, kuru yang men ku karong po ta epo wungin lengwal ta ewin akomen kut tumen.
Si karongngin si, men si ta it then then, ma sangelekngin ta it tuo it men pa mulu it ma us it li sup mi esih.
Li klet ma sangelekngin tin imen kuman kut ken po wala ta tin kuman men, men ku khuuk lasin, li ma lasin si nomuru kut, kut ma lasin kha pho po hunngin men.
Ehurok, wom tin mi ngo pit pit wo wom weh men, wom kuk akuli sakalngin ta ek ek mi wom.

Epo nanaangin mosop tin turunus men u talungin mosop tin turunus weh men kut tumen, men api ili awon misan ako, ma me ko hang Wirama it tin sinsin epo esul mosop men, tin ku wungin tan phae ko ken endara enun tin sinang pal ma li nomalak li klet ma ko me hut yis men ewin akomen.
Epo yang min tuon kha yang khuuk it epo sakalngin tin irawin men, kumali it si kuk ken it e endara aiingin tin enun po ewun lunga sun tin yang pho pon men.

Tumen ma, ehurok, wom tin mi ngo pit pit wo wom weh men, wom mosop then then men ku kinga wom pus engin si kuk epon ku hul, takuma wom ku pus engin epon ku sakal asin, kuru wom men ku mi wom teng si kerek asin kut tumen.
Epo min teng si tin ta po tunus men ku pho po wungin siik tin ta Got men ewin akomen.

Tumen ma wungin maran kiring kiring tin min lengwal men u wungin lengwal tin ku iso ung e si mi wom ewin men kut tumen, men ku wom whis i mosop lu nuk worengin, si wom wa sakalngin tin whangin mi wom kho men to wungin amunu tin wom wa wom ko epon men. Sakalngin tin imen kha apalukngin epon ku palolo enu wom men.

Si wom men ku kuk ken po tin ira wungin nginangan men weh, si wom men ku kuk ken po tin hul wungin engun men asin, epon taku wom kuk ken po tin hul wungin engun men, men tuo wom torok mara wom kha men.
Epon taku po ta hul wungin engun, si ku iran weh som, men ken po ta tin ion i enun maran mi tupngin ta men engun kha men,
epo yang ion maran tuon kut ma li, li klet ma kerek engun ma yang tulun som tan maran tin tun tira men.

Si taku po ta maran ko pit mi wungin sinsin tin tunus weh e epo wungin tin epo won piasngin men ma iran sumsum, si ku in ken po ta tin hul i ma tulun som epon engun men akomen, si men in ken po ta tin ira sakalngin weh men, po tin imen kha ku Got wa emhong ko pon epo wungin tin po ning i men.

Taku po ta in lunga wom ma phaeng won taku i e won nuk wet Got ma ira sakalngin ta yang siik, takuma men ku maran pit mi won tunus som, si torok min tuon engun, men wo phepngin tan men ku tunus epon ku ning kumang ta epon som.

Wo phepngin tin mi yil e yomngin ku kara pit min som men tin nuk tumen to mara Got tin Wirama it men men wala nuk ti, men ku po li tuh wo sun tin wiwol men u po tin wamuh men kut tumen tin miu hi tuung wet won maikngin ta hi men, kuru epon ku po ta karuk i tunus weh, si ku mang ta wungin tin ta pi mulus men ku siluk pon ewin som kut tumen.

Ehurok, wom men ku kasum wo phepngin tin pit wo a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men, tin Akono e to moolngin men, to wungin tin ku wom ning wungin ieh sun epo po kara tin ya hi pos u ya hi amiron nginan tumen asin.

Epon taku yang ta ku me sup mi palu walngin tin ta wom men to moolngin tin sup sup hut wilin e golan men kara u to moolngin tin pon tunus men kut tumen, kuru yang lungunan ta me sup maksin to moolngin tin pon lengwal men,

ma sila wom khing pit po yang tin mool tunus men ma wom wo ta yang taku, “E mu ung pi tin tunus iyi,” ti, si wom wo ta yang tin lungunan men taku, “E mu lu pit imen” wa “E mu ko ung sii khi ngo hang enda tin khi ngo si klung won men,” ti,
iyi, wom ning wungin ieh wal lunga wom, ma wom si ken po tin ples wungin to mi hi tin wungin lengwal pong siin men kha men ako, wah?

Ehurok, wom tin mi ngo pit pit wo wom weh men, wom hul, iyi, epo po tin lungunan wo mulus tin iyi kha Got won ung wo hi epon ku miran to wo phepngin ta hi ma pakuh pongin epo enunu tin yang wo kuk mara po tin mi hi pit wo yang men epon men ako, wah?
Takuma wom men wa manngin ko po po tin lungunan men engun. Iyi, po tin mimiran men wala wa won maikngin ko po wom ma nak nak wom lu epo ples walngin men ako, wah?
Iyi, po tin imen wala ton mi yang yan tin tunus e po sikia wom ton men, ako wah?

Epon taku wom ira wungin sinsin tin ta yang tin Sinkhaung men weh, tin ira Panngin Auluungin tin wo taku, “Ngon men ku mip pit wo po tin wom ung then men ken ngon tin mip pit wo ngon tuop weh men,” ti, men wom ning i tunus weh kha men ako.
Si taku wom ning wungin ieh wal, men wom lasin kha men, ma wungin sinsin men ku tak si wom ma wom si kuk ken po tin hik put wungin sinsin nginangan men kha men.
Epon taku po ta ira wungin sinsin siik mosop, si plong ko epon then ta, men maran ken i e hik put wungin sinsin mosop ma lasin ung pon kha men.

Epo yang tin wo taku, “Ngon men ku sup si khi po ta asin,” men sakal maksin taku, “Ngon men ku wi po ta ko hun asin,” ti, kut tumen. Si taku ngon ku ning wungin tin e sup si khi po ta akomen, si e wi po ta ko hun, men e kho si in ken po ta tin hik put wungin sinsin men kha men.
Wom men ku sakal u wom ning wungin tunus kut tumen, ken wom e po tin wungin ta hi ku plesngin epo wungin sinsin tin epo won piasngin men.
Epo wungin ples nginan men ku min sukngin om min epo po ta tin ku ning min sukngin ewin som men. Si min sukngin men ku nomka weh hut wungin ples nginan ako.

Ehurok, taku po ta wo epon e won phep takuma wo phepngin tan ku ning kumang kara som, iyi, wo phepngin tin tumen men ku nhio wo are? Iyi, wo phepngin tin tumen ani ku po tin imen palolongin epon men, wah?
Epon taku ehuro it ta wa ilep a it ta wiwil ma kalwok epo endara aiingin tin ku iini to ungunan then then men,

ma po ta wom ta wo ta sun taku, “E yok to min wyungin ma e lu pama po ngon u e ii enda aiingin ma e mut tumen,” si ngon ku wa endara tin po elit hi hing won men si ta po ta som, men ku wungin timen kuli nhio wo are?
Tumen kut kha wo phepngin tin in ta tuon engun men, taku ku ning kumang kara som, men ken i e hun kut ako.

Si nga wo taku po ta ku wo taku, “Ngon men in to wo phepngin, si ngo men in to kumang tin nga ning i men kara.” Yo, e suk marango epo wo phepngin tin tap men to kumang tap tin kis kis men wet, si ngo men ku suk marap epo wo phepngin tin ta ngo men epo kumang tin ta ngo e si in pi mlaeng men weh ako.
Ngon men wop nuk wet wungin tin epo Got then ta in men, men e ning i tunus ako. Epo emiun tin lengwal men wo hi nuk wet wungin timen kut tumen ako, ma emiun kwat kwat to lemngin ta hi!
Auh, ngon tin wungin tap ulil men, mip epo ngon ku pon tan epo wo phepngin tin kumang tan om men men hun kut ako, wah?
Iyi, Abraham tin yau a it sin men men si in siik to mara Got epo kumang tin yang ning i minan tin yang taku ning talungin epo wirun Aisak wo suyung men ako, wah?

Iyi, ngon e ku ion i, epo wo phepngin tin ta yang men men klap to kumang tin tan men ma wulong ning kumang then to al, ma kumang tin yang ning i men men wo phepngin ta yang si suuk siingin epon men wala nuk ti, wah?
Ma Panngin Auluungin men si put plo nginan tin wo taku, “Abraham won nuk wet Got, ma Got maran ira wungin ta yang tin imen ken yang e in siik men.” Ma Got sikia yang men tita ngong weh.
Tumen ma wom ion i, epo po ta ku si in siik to mara Got epo kumang tin po ning i men weh, si ku epo wo phepngin misan akomen.

Kuru soput tin nuk timen maksin kha e-Rehap tin api put soput men si in siik to mara Got epo kumang tin wut ning i minan tin wut wa wulong tin ponwal e me to sakalngin men li ma wut ko tih wulong li ira soput enginin ta men ako, wah?
Epo po ta emkusin tin emiun om min men men hun kho kut ako, tumen kut kha wo phepngin tin kumang tan om min men men hun kho kut tumen ako.
Ehurok, po munuman ta wom men ku si wa kumang epo po kot nginan asin, epo wom ion i epo pim tin kot po men men kuli Got maran pit mi kumang ta pim weh epo po kara.

Epo it mosop men ko plong ko epo lasin maran kiring kiring ako. Ma taku po ta ku plong ko to sakalngin tin me pol won men som, men timen wungin tan siik weh, kuru men tuon ku maran pit won emkusin mosop weh kut tumen.
Iis, wom hul, epo it wa endara ta men ku si klet nuk wo hos kuma hos hul wet it engun, ma endara tin imen kha it phae hos emkusin mosop epon men.
Iis, wom ion imut kut, aku, men endara nhum ta ma eip nhum ta si men peh imut li, takuma endara tun ta misan kha phae imut ma imut saa ira yang tin luul to imut men min men.

Tumen kut kha mamai it men it emkusin tun ta engun, takuma men wangan pon to wungin nunhum kara. Auh, yau tun ta men ku pih ko ung mi wolopon ta, men ku wangan wut kuwing ma uspo pi misuk nhum ta ako.

Wai, mamai it men ken yau ta men, men ken pi mulus ta tin wungin tin ku siik som men maran kiring kiring in epon men. Mamai it men hihingin nuk lunga it emkusin ken endara ta tin ku ses mi it emkusin mosop men, ma men tun yau ung mi wungin mosop tin it ning i minan tin hosingin e it ko khuukngin wo mulus men ma weh li pol minan tin ku it huu men, men yau tin sindak men kha tuon tun i men.

Epo li ken nginan enih u emon u erhu u endara tin maran to tunusngin e kuk mi wiu men kut tumen, tin maran kiring kiring men, men homani ma po tunus wai me po mara hi pit won engun, kuru kho men po wai me sup wet wili po ma mal ewin kut tumen.

Si mamai it men ku po ta maran pit won tunus kuma mal ewin akomen. Awu. Mamai it men endara ta tin to wungin lengwal e ku po ta maran pit won tunus ewin akomen, men isel tin ku po huu epon men men klet pon.
Epo mamai it men it sam sam Got tin Wirama it men epon, kuru it ngil ngil po tunus tin Got ning hi kai yang enun tuon men epon ewin kut tumen.
