Ti ma nga phae kuma nga ion po tin wut hi sakal ta ngo men. Ma nga phae kut, men nga ion esul khin golan khaut eip u ponwal me sup tumen,
ma emin esul khin tin eip u ponwal me sup imen men nga ion yang ta maran ken Wiru Po Tunus men, men phi moolngin nomalak li kek pit wut khin u mulu golan ta men patngin nuk po engai yang kut tumen.
U yang mhin u yang yut kut tumen men pon eun engun ken sipsip yut men, men pon eun weh ken waup men, u yang maran tin ponwal e yang ion endara epon men men ken yau tin ngin ngin men kut tumen;
u yang khin men ken bras tin tunus weh e ken i e sutngin mi mang tin po sut ain wa tumen min men ma si pon yil weh men, u yang wut men ken eki nhum ta tin nuk e uu men;

ma po wili yang tin atunus men yang kasum awheng khaut eip u ponwal me sup, tumen, u bainat tongin tin ngin nuk ponwal men me pol mi wo yang, u yang maran men ken sinang tin ngin ngin weh men kut tumen.

Ma minan tin nga ion yang men men nga plong ko nuk po khi yang ken ngo e hun men. Takuma yang wilin tin ato sa men men ko nuk po ngo, ma yang sakal ta ngo taku, “E lem asin; ngo men tin li Muk men u tin me Silung men kut tumen kha iyi.

Ngo men yang tin tunus in men, tin kho ma hun men, si mara wom mu, epo ngo men tunus in ma ku in tumen kokyok kokyok li kut. Men irawin. Ma ngo men in to enda tin ku nga klas epo pi tin ta hunngin men u ta hunngin epon men kut tumen.
E pan endara mosop tin marap kon i kho men, u endara mosop tin kuk homani men, u endara mosop tin ku iso si sulung epo endara tin imen kut tumen.

Wungin kaunngin tin epo awheng khaut ponwal me sup tin marap kon i nuk yanga wili ngo tin atunus men u epo esul khin golan tin ponwal me sup men kut tumen sinsin wala ti: awheng tin ponwal me sup men men los po po tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ponwal me sup men, u esul khin tin ponwal me sup men men los po palu walngin tin ponwal me sup men kut tumen.

”Tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ung Epesus men men ku e pan sakalngin li epon ti, ‘Sakalngin tin mosop iyi men yang tin kasum awheng ponwal me sup nuk yanga wilin tin ato sa men, tin muk muk lunga esul khin golan tin ponwal me sup men men sakal taku:

“Nga ion wungin mosop tin e ning i men u ngon tin wuh kumang men u ngon tin pit nhing wet won maikngin men, u e mut po tin wungin ta hi lengwal men kut tumen. U e tong po tin wo epo hi e paengin si ku paengin weh som men, ma e pon tan epo po men tororok nginangan kha men;
u e tohuh weh ma e pit nhing wet won maikngin, ma e wuh kumang weh mut eya ya ngo si ngon ku mip mokongin ewin akomen.
Takuma nga in to wungin tin iyi epo ngon, epo ngon men mang ta min epongin tin e in ton muk men kho.

Tumen ma tulup hu epo pi tin e in epon kho ma e plong ko men; e phae mip ma e ning wungin tin e ning i muk kho men weh, wa taku pi engun, men ku nga me epo ngon kerek engun, ma nga klok esul khin tin tap men pi tin li pit epon men li.
Si wungin tunus tin e iso kasum i men men ti, epo e mut wungin ta po tin ira wungin ta a-Nikolas men, tin imen ngo kut nga mut i.

Po ta kingan ung, men ku hul sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin sakal i si ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men weh. Taku po ta apalukngin hut sun, men ku nga mang tan si ii sa tin epo tunusngin men enun, tin pit pi pon lungin tin ta Got e pit emin weh men.”’

“Si tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ung Smerna men men ku e pan sakalngin li epon taku, ‘Sakalngin tin iyi men yang tin li Muk men u tin me Silung men kut tumen, tin kho ma hun li ma si tunus kyok men kha sakal i men:

“Nga ion wungin mosop tin e ning i men u won maikngin tin po wai ko po ngon men u ngon tin kalwok men kut tumen (aku, ngon men miran ako); u nga ion ton mingin ta po tin wo epo hi e Yuda si hi men ku Yuda ainan akomen. Awu. Po men ta mang akotngin tin ta a-Nolongin men kha men.

E lem epo wungin tin tikayung ma ngon ku wuh i men asin. Irawin, epo tikayung ma emiun tin hik put wungin nginangan men ku whis wom kara lu sup mi mang tin po wo hi maik hi min ewin men, kuma wom karongngin, ma wom ku lat won maikngin to ungunan eip ponwal. E kasum wo phepngin tap weh li e hun, kumali nga wa moolngin tin epo tunusngin men ko ung mhip.

Po ta kingan ung epon ku hul, men ku hul sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin sakal i ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men weh. Taku po ta apalukngin hut sun, men ku hunngin tin me ponwal angan men mumhek min akomen.”’
“Si tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ung Pergamos men men ku e pan sakalngin li epon taku, ‘Wungin tin iyi men yang tin in to bainat tin tongin e ngin nuk ponwal men kha sakal i men:

“Nga ion wungin mosop tin e ning i men, u pi tin e ung epon men kut tumen, men pi tin ehus ta a-Nolongin ung epon men kha men. Ma e kasum ya ngo pip, si ngon ku sup sup put wo phepngin tin pit po ngo men minan tin Antipas kasum wo phepngin tan ma pok put sakalngin ta ngo epon men akomen, men yang tin wingin ko hun lunga wom men, men pi tin a-Nolongin ung epon men kha men.

Si nga in to wungin kara epo ngon, epo pi tin imen men po tin kasum kotngin tin ta a-Balam men kara kuk; a-Balam tin imen kha kot a-Balak epo yang ku wa endara ko nuk soput po tin husani a-Israel men tin ku po plong ko epon men, tin po ku ii endara tin po talu got tin tororokngin men epon men u po ku ning elwanngin kut tumen.
Tumen kut kha e in to po kara tin kasum kotngin tin ta a-Nikolas men, tin nga mut i men.
Tumen ma e phae mip, wa taku pi engun, men ku nga me epo ngon kerek engun ma nga hosi lek walngin si ewut po to bainat tin me pol mi wo ngo men.

Po ta kingan ung epon ku hul, men ku hul sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin sakal i ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men weh. Taku po ta apalukngin hut sun, men ku nga wa mana tin kaunngin men kara si tan kuma iini. U ngo ku wa enah pon kal ta si tan, ma po enah tin imen men yan homan ta panngin nuk pon, men ku po ta pon tan ewin akomen, si po tin wai men misan.”’

“Si tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ung Taiataira men men ku e pan wungin li epon taku, ‘Sakalngin tin iyi yang tin Wiru Got e maran ken yau tin ngin ngin men, u khin pon ken bras tin tunus weh men kut tumen kha sakal i men:

“Nga ion wungin mosop tin e ning i men, min epongin tap, kumang tap, wo phepngin tap, u ngon tin pit nhing wet won maikngin men kut tumen; ma wungin tap tin me sulung men men nhum epo sun tin muk men.

Takuma nga in to wungin kara tin ku nga wai ko los ngon men, epo e mang ta wut tin wala e-Yesebel men, tin tuon sikian pokngin ta men, ku kot po tin kum ta ngo men ma karong po epo po ku ning elwanngin u po ku ii endara aiingin tin po talu got tin tororokngin men enu hi epon men tumen.
Ma nga wa elup kara si ta wut tin ku wut phae min epo elwanngin tin ta wut men, takuma wut ku phae min som.
E hul, ngo ku psik wut ko nuk wo ehus to saihngin tan, u po tin ning elwanngin to wut men kut tumen, men ku hi sup mi won maikngin nhum ta, tin taku po ku phae mi hi som men.

Kuli nga lek po tin husani wut men epo hunngin, ma palu walngin mosop men ku ion i epo ngo kha yang tin ion mi wungin tin po tulu hi hu i u nuk mi po men tumen. Ma ngo ku wa wungin si ta wom then then ira wungin tin wom then then ning i weh men.

Si nga sakal si ta wom kara tin ung Taiataira men, men po tin khaut esini kuk ma ku hul wet kotngin tin imen akomen, tin ku pon ta wungin tin po sikian e wungin kaunngin tin mut weh e ta a-Nolongin men akomen, men ku nga wa won maikngin ta ko what wom kyok akomen.
Si enda tin wom kuk ton kut men men ku wom kasum i pip weh li pol minan tin kuli nga me men.

Si taku po ta apalukngin hut sun ma kasum wungin ta ngo weh li pol mi elup tin li ponsol men, po tin imen men ku nga wa emhong ko pon epon ku maran pit wo po tin hi khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men –
‘yang ku maran pit wo po to elip tin po koklong men ta; po men ku whisngin ko plak ma tingit tururun ken tawil eplukan kara men’ – men ken sun tin nga wa emhong epon mi wo Yok kut tumen;
ma ngo ku wa awheng tin ngin ngin to pi huus men si tan.
Po ta kingan ung, men ku hul sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin sakal i si ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men weh.”’

”Si tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ung Sadis men men ku e pan sakalngin li epon taku, ‘Sakalngin tin iyi yang tin in to Got Emiun tin ponwal me sup men u awheng tin ponwal me sup men tumen kha sakal i ti: “Nga pon ta wungin mosop tin e ning i men, tin e in to yap tin e iso tunus in men, takuma ngon men hun kut.
E haum tunus, ma e pa nhing endara tin iso pit men, tin e taku huu angan men, epo nga pon ta wungin tap kara men ku siik weh to mara Got akomen.

Tumen ma tulup hu wungin tin kho ma e wai tua u e hul i tua tumen, ma e kasum i pip ma e phae mip. Tumen ma taku ngon ku haum tunus som, men ku nga me epo ngon ken po tipngin ta men, ma ngon ku pon ta sinang maran tin ku nga me epo ngon epon men akomen.

Si e in to po sakun kara tin kuk epo pi Sadis men, tin ku ning moolngin ta hi ko pon lengwal kho akomen; ma po men ku muk muk to ngo mi moolngin tin pon kal men; epo po men wungin ta hi tunus epon tin ku nga ning wungin tin imen epo hi men.

Taku po ta apalukngin weh, men kuli phingin epo moolngin tin pon kal men misan, ma ngo ku mlus yan mi kisang tin epo tunusngin men angan akomen; si ngo ku pok put yan si in to mara Yok u to mara tihngin tin ta Yok men kut tumen.
Po ta kingan ung, men ku hul sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin sakal i si ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men weh.”’”

“Si tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ung Piladelpia men men ku e pan sakalngin li epon taku, ‘Sakalngin tin iyi yang tin auluungin men, yang tin wungin tan anuh men, “Yang tin in to enda tin ta a-Dewit e po klas epon ewin men, tin klas ma po ta ku sambal si akomen, u tin sambal si ma po ta ku klas akomen kut tumen” kha sakal i men:

“Nga pon ta wungin mosop tin e ning i men. E ion i, epo nga hihi sowon tin won pit men pit to marap, men ku po ta sambal si epon akomen; epo ngon men iso in to kakhangin kiak kara, ma e kasum sakalngin tin ta ngo men, si ngon ku sup put ya ngo akomen.

E hul, ngo ku ning i ma po tin ta mang akotngin tin ta a-Nolongin men, tin wo epo hi e Yuda si ku Yuda akomen, si po torok, iis, ngo ku ning i ma po me powut hi ko suul sii khi ngon ma po ku ion i tin mi ngo epo ngon kho men.

Epo e kasum sakalngin ta ngo tin nga wo nut ngon epo ngon ku pit nhing wet won maikngin men kho kut, tumen ma ngo ku kasum ngon maksin epo ngon tin ku lu sup mi elup tin epo karongngin men som kut tumen, men karongngin tin ku iso si epo po mosop tin ung e li li wo mulus men, kuma karong po mosop tin ung wo mulus men.
E hul, ngo ku me kerek engun! E kasum enda tin e in ton men pip, kumali po ta men ku nak moolngin tap tin ku ung mhip men li asin.

Taku po ta apalukngin weh, men ku nga ning i ma po si lapalak ta tin pit mi mang auluungin tin ta Got tin ta ngo men, ma po tin imen ku kyok li pol akomen. Ngo ku pan ya Got tin ta ngo men ko nuk pon u ya pi tin ta Got tin ta ngo men kut tumen, men Yerusalem tin homan men, tin ku me ko wet pi hang Got tin ta ngo men. Kuru ngo ku pan ya ngo tin homan men ko nuk pon kut tumen.
Po ta kingan ung, men ku hul sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin sakal i si ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men weh.”’

“Si tihngin tin ta palu walngin tin ung Laodisia men, men ku e pan sakalngin li epon taku, ‘Sakalngin tin iyi yang tin yan Irawin men, tin po sikian tin Pok Put Wungin Anuh u Irawin tumen, tin Sinsin epo endara mosop tin Got pho pon men kha sakal i taku:
“Nga pon ta wungin mosop tin e ning i men, tin ngon ku mip nglik weh wa mip ngeng ngeng weh akomen. Mi ngo epo ngon ku mip nglik weh wa mip ngeng ngeng weh tumen.
Epo mip ngeng ngeng amang engun tumen, si ngon ku mip nglik weh wa mip ngeng ngeng weh akomen, tumen ma ngo ku mutwuk ngon pol wo ngo.

Epo e wo taku, ‘Ngo men miran, ma nga si to miranngin ta ngo hambip, si ngo ku kalwok epo endara ta akomen’ – si ngon ku ion i som epo ngon men in lengwal weh, u e in amusukngin, u e lungunan engun, u marap mhi u e wiwil kut tumen –

tumen ma ngo ku wa wungin si tap epo ngon ku kul gol hang ngo tin sutngin put ngi yau ma si min yil weh men, kuma e si miran; u e kul moolngin tin po kal men hang ngo, kuma pang po elit ngon, kuma manngin tin epo wiwilngin tap men ku si in pi mlaeng akomen; u e wa sa sut tin epo marap men ko marap, kuma marap kleng kut tumen.
Po tin mi ngo epo hi weh esini kuk men kha nga pio hi u nga tus hi kut tumen. Tumen ma e tohuh ma e phae mip.
E hul, nga pit mara sowon ma nga nhong nhong. Taku po ta hul wut ngo ma klas, men ku nga li sup tan ma nga ii endara ton, u men ku ii endara to ngo kut tumen.
Taku po ta apalukngin hut sun, men ku nga mang tan si me ung to ngo wo ehus tin ta ngo tin sinkhaung men, ken ngo tin apalukngin hut po, ma nga li ung to Yok wo ehus tin ta Yok tin sinkhaung men.
“Po ta kingan ung, men ku hul sakalngin tin Emiun Auluungin sakal i si ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men weh.”’”

Silung epo wungin tin mosop imen anima marango li tuh, ih, sowon ta men won pit ili wet pi, ma wut po ta tin nga hul i muk kho men men ingut ken kiyak ta ma sakal ta ngo me ko taku, “E mu si iyi, kuma nga suk marap epo wungin kara tin ku iso weh si sulung epo sun tin iyi.”
Ti ma kerek engun ma Emiun Auluungin kasum ngo, ih, ehus tin ta po sinkhaung men ta hihingin ung ili wet pi, ma po ta ung wo ehus tin imen.
Ma yang tin ko ung wo ehus tin imen men pon kawhat ken enah yaspa ta u pon mhee ken enah sadius ta men kut tumen; ma li pospi ta men baul ehus tin imen, men pon ken enah emeral ta men.

Ma ehus tin ta po sinkhaung tin imen ehus ta po tin sinkhaung khum ponwal u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen (24) baul i, ma ehus tin mosop imen men marango ion po akokono khaut khum ponwal u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen (24) kai wal i ma hi ung e li li won, men piphi moolngin tin nuk po sun men pon eun u moolngin golan ung e li li mhi po kut tumen.

Ma ehus tin ung emin men men pi memlengin u pi kuklung u wut po kara kut tumen kuk e me pol min, u esul khaut ponwal me sup nuk e ngin ngin maran min ehus, men los po Emiun tin ta Got e khaut ponwal me sup men kha men.

Kuru maran min ehus men wiu min kleng kleng ken glas men ta nuk, men ken enah tin pon engil engil men ta men. Ma emin ehus u baul ehus kut tumen men endara maran to tunusngin khaut mnal kuk, men mara hi suuk sii hi mara hi u wetpo hi kut tumen.

Ma endara tin maran to tunusngin e muk men men ken laion ta men, u endara tin maran to tunusngin e me ponwal angan men men ken bulmakau asus ta men, u endara tin maran to tunusngin e me miuk angan men men maran ken po tunus ta men, u endara tin maran to tunusngin e me mnal angan men men ken eking wisu ta tin in e yap yap men kut tumen.

Ma endara tin maran to tunusngin e khaut mnal imen men then then mhit ta me sup ma mara hi suuk sii po mhit u wet mhit kut tumen sup e klet. Ma endara tin mosop imen ku nhing to pi mhangin wa to pi luk ewin som, si men kuk e sakal ti, “Auluungin, auluungin, auluungin men Got tin Akono e Apalukngin weh men, tin in kho, u in homani, u in to elup tin ku iso me men kut tumen!”
Ma minan tin endara tin maran to tunusngin imen wa moolngin u yan pos u sam samngin kut tumen si ta yang tin ung wo ehus men, tin sindak in kokyok kokyok men,

men po akokono tin khaut khum ponwal u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen (24) poplong ko maran min yang tin ung wo ehus men ma po mhi hi yuk ko ko epo yang tin sindak in kokyok kokyok men, ma po whis moolngin tin ta hi e ung e li li mhi hi men ko ko maran min ehus, ma po sakal taku,

“Auweh, ngon tin Akono men, ngon men wungin tap tunus epon kuma e wa moolngin u yan pos u emhong kut tumen tap weh; epo ngon kha pho po endara mosop men, ma epo mip kha endara tin mosop imen e pho pon ma si kuk men.”

Li klet ma nga ion kisang ta tin po wlong i men, men nuk yanga wili yang tin ung wo ehus men wilin tin ato sa men, men panngin nuk emin u wetpon kut tumen, ma kawene sut khaut ponwal me sup tin tosukngin ung e li li pon men men pat patngin nuk e li li pon epon ku kakaek i pip.
Kut ma nga ion tihngin apalukngin ta men wut pit hambip ma pok put sakalngin taku, “Ara weh e ku tunus epon ku las kisang ma pupluus kawene sut tin kan kan i men?”
Takuma po men ku ta in wet pi wa in wo mulus wa in wet mulus tumen kakha weh epon ku las kisang kuru tupan kara tumen akomen.
Tumen ma nga in e hau hambip weh, epon tin ku po pon ta sun ta tin ku tunus weh epon ku las kisang ma tiik i kuru tupan men ku ta in akomen.

Kut si po ta in mi sun tin akokono men ko sakal ta ngo taku, “E hau asin. E hul, Laion tin hi Yuda khuuk wal men, tin plok si po kimut a-Dewit men, kha apalukngin weh epon ku las kisang ma pupluus kawene sut tin ponwal me sup e kakaek i men.”

Ma nga tuh kyok, ih, emin ehus u endara tin khaut mnal e mara hi to tunusngin men, u emin po tin akokono men kut tumen, men Sipsip Asus ta pit, men maran ken i e po wini kho men, men in to imi khaut ponwal me sup pit e li li mhin u maran khaut ponwal me sup kut tumen, men los po Emiun khaut ponwal me sup tin ta Got e tihngin li li yanga mulusngin mosop men.
Kut ma yang me wa kisang po wili sun tin ung wo ehus men wilin tin ato sa men.

Ma yang wa kisang tin imen kho kut, anima endara tin khaut mnal e mara hi to tunusngin men, u po akokono tin khum ponwal u mnal tumen (24) poplong ko nuk mara Sipsip Asus, men hi then then kasum endara sok nginan ta tin ingut tunus ken gita men, u karu golan tin endara tin kuin nginan ipek tunus e los po kinesngin ta po tin auluungin men kol min men kut tumen.

Ma po lut lutngin homan ta, men sakal taku, “Ngon men tunus epon ku e wa kisang, ma e pupluus kawene sut tin kakaek i men; epo po wi ngon ko hun kho, ma e kiis li mut eya pim si ta Got epo ngon enghikan mi po mosop tin ung e li li yanga pi e lawin ta hi weh u sakalngin ta hi weh u po hi weh u khuuk wal ta hi weh men kut tumen,

ma e ning pim si po tin sinkhaung men u po tin kum auluungin ta Got tin ta it men kut tumen; ma pim men ku si po tin sinkhaung men ma pim ku kuk wo mulus ma mara pim pit wo po masang to sun wala tin ung wo mulus men.”

Li klet ma nga tuh kyok, ma nga hul wut tihngin munuman takut men baul ehus u endara tin mara hi to tunusngin men, u po tin akokono men kut tumen; ma po enu hi tiik nginan men khum khum khum khum ta (10,000) angan khum khum khum khum ta u tumen (10,000), u khum khum khum ta (1,000) angan khum khum khum ta (1,000) u tumen kut tumen,

ma po wut hi pit pit hambip ma po sakal taku, “Sipsip Asus tin po wini ko hun kho men men tunus epon kha ku wa wo phepngin, u miranngin, u mhin ekngin, u kakhangin, u yan pos, u moolngin u emhong kut tumen!”

Ma endara mosop tin pho pongin e kuk wet pi u wo mulus u wet mulus u tin maran kiring kiring e kuk mi wiu men u endara mosop tin kuk e li li pi tin mosop imen kut tumen nga hul hi sakal taku, “Sam samngin u yan pos u moolngin u wo phepngin kut tumen ta yang tin ung wo ehus men u ta Sipsip Asus kut tumen ku ta ngong in kokyok kokyok li kut!”

Kut ma endara tin khaut mnal e mara hi to tunusngin men ko sakal taku, “Men Irawin!” Ma po tin akokono e khum ponwal u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen (24) poplong ko ma po mhi hi yuk yuk ko kokyok kokyok to mara yang tin in kokyok kokyok li kut men ma po wa yang yan si.
Ma nga ion Sipsip Asus men pluus kawene sut tin patngin nuk men ta, ma nga hul endara tin mara hi to tunusngin men ta wut pit ken pi tin klung men ma sakal taku, “E mu ion i.”

Ti ma nga tuh kyok, ih, nga ion hos pon kal ta, ma yang tin ung wo li men kasum taplimngin ta; ma po wa moolngin tin ta po tin sinkhaung men si ung mhi yang, ma yang li pol, men yang in e lek po kumali yang si apalukngin epo po kara.
Li klet ma Sipsip Asus pluus kawene sut tin kaek kisang e me ponwal angan men, men nga hul endara tin mara hi to tunusngin men ta tin me ponwal angan men sakal taku, “E mu ion i.”

Ti ma hos ta maksin li pol, men pon ngheh ngheh ken yau men. Ma emhong ko ta yang tin ung wo hos men epo yang ku klok wungin aminis tin po ung epon wo mulus men li, si kuma po masang to sun wala lek wal ko huu; ma po wa bainat nhum ta si ta yang.

Li klet ma Sipsip Asus pluus kawene sut tin kaek kisang e me miuk angan men, men nga hul endara tin mara hi to tunusngin men ta tin me miuk angan men sakal taku, “E mu ion i.” Ti ma nga tuh, ih, hos po ku ta, ma yang tin ung wo li men kasum kaingin ta tin po kai maikngin epon men ung yanga wilin.

Ma nga hul wut po ta emin endara tin mnal e mara hi to tunusngin men men sakal taku, “Kaingin wit ta sup wet kumang ta ungunan then ta, u kaingin bali miuk sup wet kumang ta ungunan then ta kut tumen, si e in aku e siluk mi sa olip sut u wain tumen asin.”
Li klet ma Sipsip Asus pluus kawene sut tin kaek kisang e me mnal angan men, men nga hul endara tin mara hi to tunusngin men ta tin me mnal angan men sakal taku, “E mu ion i.”

Ti ma nga tuh, ih, hos pon howos ta, ma yang tin ung wo li men yan a-Hunngin, ma pi tin ta hunngin men ung e ira yang me. Ma wulong wa emhong tin ku wulong mara ngong pit wo mulusngin tingit ta mi sun tin mnal men, kuma wulong lek po epo bainat, u epo hun elipngin, u epo hunngin, u epo li ken nginan enih tin kuk wo mulus men kut tumen ko huu.

Li klet ma Sipsip Asus pluus kawene sut tin kaek kisang e me eip angan men, men nga ion suyung tin po ning talungin won men, men enu po tin lekngin ko huu pit mi sakalngin ta Got u pit mi wo phepngin tin po kasum i ma po pok put men nuk wet.

Ma po wut hi pit ili awon taku, “Aluuh, ngon tin Sinkhaung e wungin tap auluungin u anuh kut tumen, to pi elini weh ma ngon ku ples wungin ma e wa wungin emhut kalolwa pim ko po po tin ung wo mulus men?”

Kut ma po kikyu sun tin imen then then epo moolngin nomalaklak pon eun kara; ma sakalngin ko ta po epo po ku iso nhing sakun kara engun, li pol minan tin kuli po tin hi kum then men u po ehuro hi tin ku lekngin ko huu ken po men tiikngin ta hi si klet po sun wet.

Li klet ma Sipsip Asus pluus kawene sut tin kaek kisang e me ta me sup angan men, ih, pi kin nhum ta si; ma sinang phae ko ngi ku ken moolngin po ku tin po nok i epo meme yut men, u namih phae ko ngin ken enghik men,
u awheng tin nuk e li li wet pi men poplong ko wo mulus, ken sa pik ta tin enun sulung men eip tok i ma enun hi ko.
Kuru wet pi wlongngin li kis ken kisang ta tin po wlong i men, u put pi mosop u pi po nemut mut mosop tumen wonngin li ung pi enginin ta kut tumen.

Ma po tin sinkhaung e mara hi pit wo sun wo mulus men, u po tin ya hi pos men, u po tin miranngin ta hi tang pit men, u po phuan tin mara hi pit wo po nolo men, u po tin apalukngin men, u po mosop tin kum wo sun engun men, u po mosop tin wo hi pias men kut tumen li kakaun mi uwin tin ung e li li men u mi enah tin nuk e li li put pi men kut tumen,
ma po wo ta put pi u enah kut tumen taku, “Wom poplong ko phae po pim kuma wom kaun pim epo yang tin ung wo ehus men maran u epo yan salngin tin ta Sipsip Asus men kut tumen!
Epo elup tin nhum e to yan salngin tin ta yang men men kho si kut, ma ara weh ku kakha kuma pit nhing wet?”

Li klet ma mi khi wungin tin imen nga ion tihngin khaut mnal, men nuk e li li hut mulus porilin tin khaut mnal men, ma wuluk kasum eip tin ta mulus porilin tin khaut mnal men, epon akuli eip pit wo mulus, wa yanga wiu, wa po sa ta kut tumen.

Kut ma nga ion tihngin ta kyok men me si pi tin sinang me si epon men, ma yang kasum tosukngin tin ta Got tin in kokyok kokyok men tin ku yang kikhim lautngin ko nuk mara po kara epon men. Ma tihngin tin imen wut pit ili awon li epo tihngin tin khaut mnal e wa emhong epo wuluk ku mumhek mi mulus u wiu kut tumen,
ma yang wo taku, “Myuk kuk aku myuk mumhek mi mulus, wa wiu, wa sa tumen li pol minan tin kuli pim a kikhim lautngin ko nuk po po tin kum ta Got tin ta it men nuk e li li mhi po tin awang men wet.”

Ma nga hul po tin wa tosukngin men tiikngin ta hi tausen khum khum ta u tausen khum mnal u tausen mnal me nuk wo sun tumen (144,000), men hi me mi a-Israel husanin khuuknginin tin mosop men kha hi wa tosukngin men:

mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Yuda men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen (12,000) kha wa tosukngin men; mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Ruben men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men; mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Gat men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men;

mi khuuknginin tin ta Aser men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men; mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Naptali men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men; mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Manasa men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men;

mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Simeon men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men; mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Liwai men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men; mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Isakat men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men;

mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Sebulon men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men; mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Yosep men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men; u mi khuuknginin tin ta a-Bensamin men po tausen khum ta u tausen ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen kha wa tosukngin men kut tumen.

Silung epo wungin tin mosop imen ma nga tuh kyok, ih, nga ion po wa ilio angan kara tin po ta ku tiik i angan akomen, men po me mi sun mosop tin ung e li li e hi khuuk wal ta hi weh, u lawin sin ta hi weh, u po hi weh, u sakalngin ta hi weh kut tumen, men me nuk maran min ehus u to mara Sipsip Asus kut tumen, ma po phi moolngin nomalaklak pon eun u mariri khin pit po wili hi kut tumen,
ma po nuk e wut hi pit hambip ma po sakal taku, “Wungin tin it palolongin epon men men Got tin ta it e ung wo ehus men u Sipsip Asus kut tumen kha sinsin epon men!”
Li klet ma tihngin mosop nuk e baul ehus u po tin akokono men u endara tin khaut mnal e mara hi to tunusngin e Got pho po hi men kut tumen, ma po poplong ko mara hi ko ma po wa Got yan si,
ma po sakal taku, “Irawin! Emhong u moolngin u mhin ekngin u sam samngin u yan pos u wo phepngin u kakhangin kut tumen men ku ta Got tin ta it men in kokyok kokyok li kut. Men irawin.”
Kut ma po tin akokono men ta ko sakal ta ngo taku, “Po tin piphi moolngin nomalak pon eun imen men araling weh kuru hi me akani weh tumen?”

Ti ma nga ko wo ta yang taku, “Ngon tin akono men, tuop kha ion i men.” Tumen ma yang sakal ta ngo taku, “Po tin imen tin kuk mi won maikngin tin nhum men ma me pol, ma po khis po moolngin tin nomalaklak e ta hi men ko kal mi Sipsip Asus kalolwan kha imen.

Sinsin tin imen kha po me nuk maran min ehus tin ta Got men, ma po kum auluungin ta yang to pi mhangin u to pi luk kut tumen mi mang auluungin tin ta yang men kokyok kokyok. Ma yang tin ung wo ehus men kuli enun klet po po,
ma po ku huu elip kyok wa huu eki kyok, wa sinang wa endara ngeng ngeng ta tumen ku moom po kyok tumen akomen;

epo Sipsip Asus tin in emin ehus men kha ku maran pit wo po ken po ta tin maran pit wo sipsip men ma yang ku li muk po li epo eki maran tin epo tunusngin men, ma Got ku luk luk tinisngin mosop mara po li.”
Li klet ma Sipsip Asus pluus kawene sut tin kaek kisang e me ponwal me sup angan men, ma minan tin imen pi ili wet pi men sikip sikip ung put monlo long.
Ma nga ion tihngin tin khaut ponwal me sup e nuk maran min Got ewin men, ma kiyak khaut ponwal me sup men wangin si ta hi.

Kut si tihngin ta kyok me pit mara suyung, men kasum karu golan ta tin enda kuin nginan tin ipek tunus men kuk min men, ma endara kuin nginan tin ipek tunus men wangin hambip ko ta yang, epon ku yang talu i to kinesngin ta po mosop tin auluungin men wo suyung tin golan men tin ung maran min ehus tin ta Got men.
Ma endara tin ipek tunus men kuin nginan to kinesngin ta po tin auluungin men men nuk yanga wili tihngin ma si epo Got.
Li klet ma tihngin wa karu golan tin imen, ma yang wa yau tin pit wo suyung men ko kol min ma yang whis i ko mulus. Kut ma ingutngin si si, u pi kuklung, u pi memlengin u pi kin kut tumen.
Li klet ma tihngin tin khaut ponwal me sup e kasum kiyak tin ponwal me sup men hihi hi epo hi ku so so kiyak.

Kut ma tihngin tin muk men so kiyak tin tan men, ma pi yung tin enahan men u yau kut tumen, tin nau wal to enghik men, si, ma whisngin ko mulus, ma sa maran min ta mi sun tin miuk men yau iini si yau uspon, kuru epilil tin po keng men yau iini mosop si yau uspon kut tumen.

Li klet ma tihngin tin me ponwal angan men so kiyak tin tan men; ma endara maran ken pi po emian nhum ta ngin ngin ken yau men, men psikngin ko mi wiu ma wiu maran min ta mi sun tin miuk men ko min kalolwan.
Ma endara tin Got pho pon e maran to tunusngin kuk mi wiu men maran min ta kuk mi sun tin miuk men men huu, u imut maran min ta tin kuk mi sun tin miuk men men mhukngin kut tumen.

Li klet ma tihngin tin me miuk angan men so kiyak tin tan men, ma awheng nhum ta plong ko wet pi, men ngin ngin ken esul ta men, ma men plong ko mi eki nesiling tin kuk e li li men maran min ta tin kuk mi sun tin miuk men u ko mi eki tin maran buk si e kuk e li li men kut tumen.
Awheng tin imen yan a-Makalek. Ma eki maran min ta kuk mi sun tin miuk men ko makalek, ma po tunus munuman huu epo eki tin imen, epon tin eki phae ko makalek men.

Li klet ma tihngin tin me mnal angan men so kiyak tin tan men, ma sinang maran min ta mi sun tin miuk men men wingin, u namih maran min ta mi sun tin miuk men, u awheng tin kuk e li li men maran min ta kuk mi sun tin miuk men kut tumen, timen kuma endara tin imen maran min ta mi sun tin miuk men ko mi ku. Ma pi mhangin maran min ta kuk mi sun tin miuk men ku mha akomen, u pi luk men tumen kut tumen.

Li klet ma nga tuh kyok, men nga hul tihngin ta men yap mili pi alilil emin, ma yang wut pit ili awon taku, “Auh, auh, auh, wom tin ung wo mulus men, epo ingutngin tin kara e ta kiyak tin ta tihngin tin miuk kara men tin ngyuk ku so so i angan men.”
Li klet ma tihngin tin me eip angan men so kiyak tin tan men, ma nga ion awheng ta men plong me ko wet pi ko wo mulus kho kut, ma enda tin ku yang klas wo nahu tin sinsin om men wangin ko ta yang.

Ma yang klas mi nahu tin siin om men, ma yau kuin nginan si mi nahu men ken yau nhum ta tin kuldup si men. Tumen ma sinang maran u pi alilil kut tumen ko mi ku, sinsin epon tin yau kuin nginan si mi nahu tin siin om men.
Kut ma mi yau kuin nginan tin imen men esis kara me pol min ma ko wo mulus. Ma esis tin imen men emhong kara wangin ko tan, men ken yakawu tin api wo mulus men tin kuk to emhong men.
Ma wungin ko ta li epo li ku mumhek mi epilil tin nuk yanga mulus men, u endara tin po keng men ta, u sa ta tumen asin, si po tunus tin tosukngin ta Got om mhi hi awang men misa hi.

Ma emhong tin epo li ku lek po tunus ko huu men men ku wangin ko ta li akomen, si li ku wa won maanngin si ta po misan to namih khaut eip. Ma won maanngin tin ta esis men men ken won maanngin tin taku yakawu wel po tunus ta men.
Ma minan tin imen men ku po tunus lang lang epo hunngin, takuma po ku pon ta hunngin angan akomen; po ku mi hi epo po ku huu, takuma hunngin men ku saa silang po.
Si esis tin imen maran ken hos tin hihingin kho epon ku li epo lek walngin men, ma moolngin pon ken gol wa tumen ung e li li mhin, u mara li men ken po tunus mara hi men kut tumen.
Kuru li yut men ken po wala yut hi men, u li ngin men ken laion ngin men kut tumen.
U li engain men endara klet pon ken po tunus tin klet po engai hi epo aen men, u ingutngin tin ta li mhit men men ken ingutngin tin ta karis to hos munuman tin mhup li epo lek walngin men,
u li kut men ken yakawu kut men, u enda tin li wel po epon men nuk kut li kut tumen. Ma emhong ta li men epon ku li wa won maanngin ko ta po tunus to namih khaut eip.
Ma yang tin sinkhaung e maran pit wo po men ta hi ta in, men tihngin tin ta nahu tin siin om men, tin yan ira sakalngin ta hi Hibru ti, “Abadon,” si yan ira sakalngin Grik men ti, “Apoluon.”
Won maikngin tin tihngin kamus epon men ta kho li, auh, won maikngin ponwal maksin ku iso me ira sun tin imen.
Li klet ma tihngin tin me ta me sup angan men so kiyak tin tan men, ma nga hul wut po ta men yuk si mi imi tin khaut mnal e nuk wo suyung tin golan e ung maran min Got men,
men sakal ta tihngin tin me ta me sup e kasum kiyak men taku, “E poplos tihngin tin khaut mnal e kan kanngin kuk put eki nhum tin Yupretis men li wo hi pias.”
Tumen ma tihngin tin khaut mnal e hihingin kho epo sinang maran u ungunan u namih u posan tumen tin wala imen, men plosngin epon ku li lek po tunus maran min ta kuk mi sun tin miuk men ko huu.
Ma po nolo tin ung e li li wo hos men enu hi tiik nginan men milion khum khum ponwal (200,000,000); epo nga hul po enu hi tiik nginan.

Ma nga ion hos tin nomoyong imen mi enun yolngin tin marango plal ma nga ion i men men ti: po tin ung e li li wo hos men wa endara pon mhee ken yau men, u po ku amim, u po lok ken enah salpa men tumen klet po engai hi; u hos mhin men ken laion mhin men; ma mi wo li men yau, u yau kuin nginan u enah salpa tin ngiseng men tumen me pol.

Epo saihngin tin khaut miuk imen kha po tunus maran min ta mi sun tin miuk men lekngin ko huu epon men -- epo yau, u yau kuin nginan, u enah salpa tin ngiseng men tumen tin me pol mi wo hos men kha po huu epon men.

Epo emhong tin li lek po tunus epon men men pit wo li u pit kut li kut tumen; epo li kut men ken tamha men, men mhin ung e li li kut tumen; ma li kut tin li mhin ung e li li hut imen kha li wa won maanngin ko po po epon men.

Si po tunus tin kara e ku huu epo saihngin tin imen som men, men ku phae mi hi epo endara tin po ning i epo wili hi men som, epo wungin tin po uluu epo emiun tin lengwal men, u got tin tororokngin enu hi e po ning i epo gol u silwa u bras u enah u sa kut tumen tin ku maran iis endara wa kingan hul wa muk muk tumen ewin akomen, ku po mi hi epo po ku mang tan akomen.
Kuru po ku phae mi hi epo wungin tin po lek sun ko huu men, u wungin maran kiring kiring tin po wam wam sun men, u wungin tin po ning elwanngin men u wungin tin po tip tip endara men tumen akomen.
Li klet ma nga ion tihngin apalukngin ta kyok men me ko wet pi, men phae pon epo hingis ta, u li pospi ta nuk mhin, kuru maran men ken sinang men, u khin ken lapalak tin yauan men kut tumen.
Ma kisang tun ta men lapngin ma nuk yanga wilin. Ma yang wa khin tin atunus men ko pit yanga wiu u yang khin tin eronin men ko pit wo mulus tumen,
ma yang wut pit ili awon takut ken laion ta tin ingut hambip men. Ma yang wut pit, men pi kuklung tin khaut ponwal me sup men wut hi ingut ma sakal.

Ma minan tin pi kuklung tin khaut ponwal me sup men ingut ma sakal kho men nga taku pan i; takuma nga hul wut po ta me ko wet pi, men wo ta ngo ti, “E sambal si eya sakalngin tin pi tin kuklung men pok put men ta mip, si e pan i ko nuk asin.”
Li klet ma tihngin tin marango kon i pit yanga wiu u wo mulus tumen men tus wilin li si wet pi,

ma yang tung tung epo ya sun tin sindak in kokyok kokyok men, tin pho po wet pi to endara mosop tin kuk epon men, u mulus to endara mosop tin kuk won men, u wiu to endara mosop tin kuk min men kut tumen, epo pi men ku ung e lap kyok li ma Got ku kaeng kyok akomen,

si mi elup tin ku kiyak tin ta tihngin tin me ponwal me sup men ingut men, minan tin yang ku so i angan men, kut men ku wungin khekngin tin ta Got men ku si pyu pongin kut khae, ken sun tin kho ma yang wo ta po pokngin tin kum tan men.
Li klet ma wut po ta tin nga hul i kho e me ko wet pi men sakal ta ngo kyok taku, “E lu wa kisang tin tun e lapngin nuk yanga wili tihngin tin pit yanga wiu u wo mulus men tumen.”

Tumen ma nga li hang tihngin ma nga wo ta yang taku, “E wa kisang tin tun imen mu ta ngo.” Ti ma yang ko wo ta ngo taku, “E wai si e iini; men ku ning i ma ekupi ngon min makalek, si men ku phiit ken imep men wo ngon.”
Kut ma nga wa kisang tin tun imen yanga wili tihngin si nga iini, ma men phiit ken imep men wo ngo; takuli klet ma nga kuum i li ko ma ekupi ngo min makalek.

Li klet ma yang wo ta ngo taku, “Ngon men ku pok put wungin kyok weh epo po munuman tin masang to sun wala ta hi weh, u khuuk wal ta hi weh, u sakalngin ta hi weh, u epo po tin sinkhaung men kara kut tumen.

Kut ma kaas khin ta men wangin si ta ngo, men ken kamtukngin ta tin po kai endara epon men. Ma tihngin si pit ma yang wo taku, “E si kuma e kai mang auluungin tin ta Got men, u suyung, u e tiik po tin plong ko mara hi ko ma kuk e wa Got yan si mi mang men kut tumen.

Si nowhang tin ung wetpo mang auluungin men men ku e mang tan, si e kaini asin, epo nowhang tin imen men wangin sup yanga wili po tin ku khuuk wal Yuda som men kho. Ma po tin imen ku khi hi sak po pi tin auluungin men to namih khum mnal u ponwal tumen (42).

Ma ngo ku wa emhong ko ta wulong ponwal tin pok put wungin ta ngo men, ma wulong ku piphi moolngin tin epo tirukngin men ma wulong pok put wungin ta ngo to ungunan khum khum khum ta u khum khum ponwal, u khum ta me sup tumen (1,260).
Wulong tin imen men sa olip ponwal u esul khin tin ponwal men kut tumen tin nuk maran min Got tin maran pit wo mulus men kha men.
Ma taku po ta taku songhu pit wo wulong, men ku yau me pol wo wulong ma uspo po tin nolo wulong men engun. Ma taku po ta taku songhu pit wo wulong, men ku wingin ko hun weh epo wungin tin imen.

Wulong timen in to emhong tin ku wulong wa ehii mut eya wet pi men, kumali pi yung ku kara plong ko mi elup tin wulong pok put wungin ton men akomen. Kuru wulong in to emhong tin ku wulong phae eki ko min enghikan, u wulong lek po masang to sun wala tin ung wo mulus men epo saihngin maran kiring kiring epo mi ngong engun kut tumen.

Li klet ma wulong suuk sii kumang tin wulong pok put wungin ta Got men, anima li ken nginan enih tin me si mi nahu tin siin om men kuli sewut wulong, men ku wulong huuspit mara li, ma li lek wulong ko huu.
Ma wulong emkusi ngong ku nuk ira so tin nuk pi tin nhum e po sakal emol los po pi Sodom u Isip tumen epon men, men pi tin po poo poo yang tin Akono ta it men si kuk put sa wlong put wal epon men.

Ma po kara tin me mi po tin ung e li li e masang to sun wala ta hi weh u lawin siin ta hi weh u sakalngin ta hi weh u khuuk wal ta hi weh men tumen men ku me supa wulong emkusi ngong to ungunan miuk u misikin tumen, si po ku mang kuma po kil kil wulong ko pi tin tanuan men akomen.

Ma po mosop tin ung wo mulus men ku mi hi keh keh epo wulong tin huu kut men, ma po kakaom ma po tirih talungin li epo al, sinsin epon tin kho ma wulong tin pokngin imen wa won maanngin ko po po tin ung wo mulus men.

Li klet ma ungunan tin miuk u misikin imen kho li, anima emiun tin epo tunusngin e me hang Got men me sup mi wulong kyok, ma wulong kekhek si nuk ewi ngong, ma lemngin nhum takut si ta po tin ion wulong men.
Li klet ma wulong hul wut po ta me ko hambip wet pi, men sakal ta wulong taku, “Mom mu si iyi.” Ti ma wulong li si wet pi mi hingis ta, si po tin nolo wulong men nuk e supa wulong.

Kut ma siik to sinang maran timen pi kin nhum ta si, ma pi tin nhum imen maran min ta mi sun tin eip ponwal men kyum ko. Pi kin tin imen men po masang to sun wala khum khum khum ponwal me sup (7,000) huu epon, si po tin kara men lem ma po wa Got tin ung ili wet pi men yan si.
Won maikngin tin me ponwal angan e tihngin kamus epon men kho li. Auh, won maikngin tin me miuk angan men ku si angan kerek kut khae.

Li klet ma tihngin tin me ponwal me sup angan men so kiyak tin tan men, ma wut po kara pit pit hambip ili wet pi, men sakal taku, “Enunu tin ung e li li wo mulus tin iyi men si enunu ta yang tin Akono ta it men u ta Krais tin ta yang men kut tumen, ma yang men ku sinkhaung in kokyok kokyok li kut!”
Ma po tin akokono e khum ponwal u mnal me nuk wo sun tumen (24), tin ung e li li wo ehus tin ta hi sinkhaung men to mara Got men, men poplong ko mara hi ko ma po wa Got yan si,

ma po sakal taku, “Auweh, ngon tin Akono e Got Apalukngin Weh men, tin in homani u in kho u ku in mi elup tin ku iso me men kut tumen, pim a sam sam ngon, epo e wa emhong nhum tin tap men ma e si sinkhaung ma marap pit wo mulus weh kut.

Ma po tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men mi hi kakhat sun, u min kakhat sun tin tap men si, u elup ta po tin huu kho men si, tin ku e ples wungin ta po epon men, u tin ku e emhut wungin ta po tin kum tap e hi pokngin u hi auluungin men tumen, u po tin lem pit wo yap e taku ya hi om wa taku ya hi nuk men tumen, kuru e mumhek mi po tin ung e mumhek mi mulus men kut tumen.”

Li klet ma mang auluungin tin ta Got men won pit ili wet pi, ma wunwun tin to wungin siin tin Got kaek i lungan to po tunus men men si in pi mlaeng to mara po mi mang auluungin tin tan men. Ma pi memlengin u ingutngin kara, u pi kuklung, u pi kin ta, u pi yung tin enahan men nhum ta tumen si si kut tumen.
Kut si tosukngin nhum ta si ili wet pi: men wut wala ta phi sinang ken moolngin men, kuru namih ung wet khi wut, u moolngin tin po mol i epo awheng khum ta u ponwal tumen ung mhi wut kut tumen.
Ma wut kuman ma wut hau pit ili awon to won maanngin epo wut taku wanhung angan.

Kut si tosukngin ta maksin si ili wet pi: ih, tamha nhum po mhee ken yau men ta mhin khaut ponwal me sup ma imi eip ponwal ung e li li mhin, kuru moolngin ta po tin sinkhaung men khaut ponwal me sup ung e li li mhin tin imen kut tumen.

Ma li kut laluk awheng tin kuk e li li men maran min ta mi sun tin miuk men, ma li kut whis awheng tin imen ko mulus. Ma tamha tin nhum men si pit mara wut tin wala e taku wanhung angan men, epon kuli kuum sun hoin siik minan tin wut taku wanhung men.

Kut ma wut tin wala men khuuk sun masang ta, men tin ku wa elip aen ta ma maran pit wo po masang to sun wala mosop tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men. Ma yang tin Hoin e wut khuuk i imen uusngin si hang Got u ehus tan tumen.

Si wut tin wala men saa li in pi tahunggu pi ta wut ta tin Got hihi i ta wut kho men, epon kuli po wa endara aiingin pit wo wut pi tin imen to ungunan khum khum khum ta u khum khum ponwal u khum ta me sup tumen (1,260).
Kut si lek walngin ta si ili wet pi, men a-Maikel hi tihngin tin tan men sewut tamha tin nhum men; ma tamha hi tihngin tin tan men hi lek wal,
takuma tamha ku kakha epon ku luul to po akomen, kuru pi ta po ku po pon tan ta kyok ung ili wet pi akomen.

Tumen ma tamha tin nhum men men psikngin li ko, men tamha tin launekan e po sikian emiun tin ek ek mara po nginangan men u a-Nolongin kut tumen, men tin ek ek mara po masang to sun wala mosop tin ung wo mulus men kha psikngin li ko mulus men, kuru po tihngin tin tan men whisngin ko to yang kut tumen.

Li klet ma nga hul wut po ta si pit ili wet pi men sakal taku, “Homani men palolongin u kakhangin, u enunu tin ta Got tin ta it men, u emhong tin ta Krais tin yang won ung won men kut tumen kho si kut, epo yang tin hik put wungin pit wo po ehuro it to pi mhangin u to pi luk tumen nginangan men men psikngin kho li ko kut.
Ma po si apalukngin epo a-Nolongin epo Sipsip Asus enghikan u epo sakalngin tin po pok put men kut tumen, ma po ku mi hi ko wo hi akomen. Awu. Po mi hi alang si tunusngin ta hi ma po huu engun.

Tumen ma wet pi, ngon u po mosop tin kuk wet pi men kut tumen ku mi wom keh keh! Auh, wom tin kuk wo mulus u mi wiu men tumen, won maikngin nuk epo wom, epo yang tin ek ek mi po nginangan men kho ko in lunga wom, ma yang yan sal weh, epo yang ion i epo ungunan ta yang men me in tikayung kut khae.”
Kut si minan tin tamha tin nhum men ion i tin li psikngin kho ko in mulus kut men, li ning i lengwal epo wut tin khuuk sun masang ta tin imen.

Takuma emon wisu mhit ponwal wangin ko ta wut tin wala imen, kuma wut yap li in pi tin tahunggu men li in pi tin hihingin ta wut kho men, pi tin imen kha ku wut li in hin epo tamha tin imen ma ma wut wa endara aiingin to elup ta u elup ponwal u elup misikin ta tumen.
Kut ma tamha tin imen mutwuk eki tin kuk won men ko saa ken eki put ewun ta men ma sut li ira wut tin wala men kumali eki li ut mara wut tin wala men ma wa wut li.
Takuma mulus nhio wo wut tin wala men, ma mulus won kaa ma kuum eki tin put ewun e tamha tin nhum men mutwuk i pol won men.

Tumen ma tamha tin nhum men yan sal pit wo wut tin wala men kara kut, ma li li epo li taku sewut po tin wut husanin e kara maksin men, men tin ira wungin sinsin tin ta Got men u kuk to wungin tin po pok put ta a-Yesus Krais men kut tumen.

Li klet ma nga pit po namak suu wiu. Ma marango kon li ken nginan enih ta men me si mi wiu, ma mhin tan khaut ponwal me sup u imi tan eip ponwal, u moolngin tin ta po sinkhaung men eip ponwal ung e li li hut imi tin imen kut tumen, ma mhin then then men yan tin ton mi Got men panngin nuk e li li pon.

Ma li ken nginan enih tin marango kon i imen maran ken pusi enih tin lepat men ta, u khin ken li ken nginan tin po sikian bea men khin, kuru won men ken laion won men kut tumen. Ma tamha tin nhum men wa kakhangin tan tuon, u ehus tan tin ta po sinkhaung men u emhong tan tin nhum men kut tumen si ta li ken nginan enih tin imen.

Ma nga ion li mhin ta men maran ken po niin ma taku hun angan, li ma won sal tin li taku hun angan epon men ewin nam nam pit si li tunus. Tumen ma po masang to sun wala mosop tin ung wo mulus men whik wo li ma po ira li ken nginan enih tin imen.

Ma po powut hi ko suul to mara tamha tin nhum e wa emhong si ta li ken nginan enih men; kuru po powut hi ko suul to mara li ken nginan enih maksin kut tumen, ma po sakal taku, “Ara weh e ku ken li ken nginan enih? Ara e ku kakha epon ku sewut li?”

Ma emhong ko ta li ken nginan enih epo sakalngin tin li tuon wai si pit men u li ton mi Got kut tumen ku si mi won, ma emhong ko ta li epo li ku iso in e ning i tumen to namih khum mnal u ponwal tumen (42).
Kut ma li won ngam ma li ton mi Got u li ton mi Got yan, u mang ausel tin ta Got men, u po tin ung ili wet pi men kut tumen.

Ma emhong ko ta li ken nginan enih epon ku sewut po masang to sun wala tin auluungin e ta Got men, ma li men nomnga weh epo po. Ma emhong ko ta li epo li ku maran pit wo po masang to sun wala mosop tin ung e li li e lawin siin ta hi weh, u sakalngin ta hi weh, u khuuk wal ta hi weh men tumen.

Ma po mosop tin ung wo mulus men ku powut hi ko suul to mara li ken nginan enih, men po tin ya hi ku panngin nuk mi Kisang tin epo Tunusngin e ta Sipsip Asus tin wingin ko hun kho minan tin Got ku iso ning mulusngin sinsin kho som men.
Taku po ta kingan ung, men ku hul wungin tin ti:

Taku po ta wa sun ta li sup yanga wili po nolo, men ku weh li sup yanga wili po nolo maksin; taku po ta wi sun ta ko hun epo bainat, men ku weh wingin ko hun epo bainat maksin. Wungin tin po tin auluungin e ta Got men ku lat won maikngin li maran nomalak ma wo phepngin ta hi pit nhing epon men wala tumen.
Li klet ma marango kon li ken nginan enih ta maksin men me si mi mulus, ma imi ponwal ken imi ta sipsip hoin ta men ung mhin, ma men sakal ken tamha nhum ta men.

Ma li tohuh epo emhong tin ta li ken nginan enih tin muk men to mara sun. Ma li ning i ma mulus u po mosop tin ung e li li won men tumen powut hi ko suul mara li ken nginan enih tin si in muk e won sal tin li taku hun epon angan men ewin nam nam pit si li si tunus kyok men.
Ma li in e ning tosukngin maran kiring nunhum kara, tin kuli ning i ma yau me ko wet pi ko wo mulus to mara po masang wala men.

Ma li ek ek mara po tin ung wo mulus men epo tosukngin tin li wa emhong epo li ku ning i to mara li ken nginan enih tin muk men, ma li wo ta po tin ung wo mulus men epo po ku ning enun ta ta li ken nginan enih tin po niin epo bainat takuma li kyok si tunus in men.

Ma li wa emhong epo li ku wa emiun si ta li ken nginan enih enun tin imen, kuma li ken nginan enun ku sakal kuru ning i ma po tin esini e ku powut hi ko suul to mara li ken nginan enih enun som men ku lekngin ko huu kut tumen.

Ma li ning i ma po mosop tin ya hi om u tin ya hi pos, u tin nemokong ta hi tang pit u tin endara ta hi om, u tin wo hi pias u tin kum wo sun engun men tumen, ku wa tosukngin ta nuk po wili hi eronin tin wetpon men wa po mhi hi tin awang men tumen,
kumali po ta ku kul endara hang sun wa tih endara anaum epo sun tumen akomen. Awu. Po tin wa tosukngin wa ya li ken nginan enih wa tiikngin tin pok put li yan men tumen misa hi kha ku ning i men.

Mhin ekngin wala ti. Taku po ta maran ek weh, men ku maran ira tiikngin ta li ken nginan tin enih men, epon men tiikngin ta po tunus ta, men khum khum ta me sup u khum ta me sup u ta me sup tumen (666).

Kut si nga tuh kyok ma nga ion Sipsip Asus men si pit po pi emian Saion, ma po khaut tausen khum khum ta u tausen khum mnal u tausen mnal tumen (144,000) nuk to Sipsip, ma Sipsip Wiraman yan panngin nuk e li li mhi po tin awang men.
Ma nga hul ingutngin ta me ko wet pi, men ken eki nhum ta tin nuk e uu men, u ken pi tin kuklung hambip men tumen. Kuru nga hul ingutngin ta po kara tin kuk e sok sok gita ta hi kara men kut tumen.

Ma po lut lutngin ken i e lutngin homan ta men maran min ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men, u mara li ken nginan tin khaut mnal e mara hi to tunusngin men, u mara po tin akokono men kut tumen; ma po ta men ku urut lutngin tin imen akomen. Awu. Po tin tausen khum khum ta u tausen khum mnal u tausen mnal tumen (144,000) e Got kiis li mut eya po mi sun tin ung e li li wo mulus men misa hi kha urut lutngin men.

Po tin imen tin ku lus to sun wala ewin som men, epo po men mara hi pit wo hi tunus weh. Po tin imen tin ira Sipsip Asus mili mili pi tin akani e Sipsip Asus li epon men. Po men Got kiis li mut eya hi mi po masang to sun wala tin ung e li li wo mulus men, men kuk ken endara aiingin tin enun po ewun e ku ta Got u ta Sipsip Asus weh men.
Ma torokngin ku po pon tan ta nuk wo po akomen, epo po men lasin ta hi om to maran min ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men.

Li klet ma nga ion tihngin ta maksin men yap mili wet hingis, men in to pok putngin tunus tin sindak men epon ku yang pok put si ta po tin ung e li li wo mulus men, men ta po mosop tin ung e li li e hi khuuk wal ta hi weh, u lawin siin ta hi weh, u sakalngin ta hi weh, u masang wala ta hi weh men kut tumen,

ma yang wut pit hambip ma yang sakal taku, “Wom men ku lem pit wo Got ma wom wa yang yan si, epo elup tin ku yang ples wungin epon men si kut; ma wom uluu yang tin ning wet pi u mulus u wiu u eki maran tin nuk e li li men kut tumen.”

Kut si tihngin ta maksin ira sun me, ma yang sakal taku, “Pi Babilon men plong ko, men plong ko kut, men pi tin yan pos men, epo wut ning i ma po mosop tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men um wain tin tan e ning i ma po mi hi lup si epon ku ning elwanngin men.”

Li klet ma tihngin ta tin me miuk angan men ira sun me ma yang wut pit hambip ma yang sakal taku, “Taku po ta uluu li ken nginan enih u enun tumen, ma wa tosukngin nuk mhin tin awang men wa nuk wetpo wilin tumen,

men tuon ku um wain tin ta Got e to min kakat sun tin ta yang men maksin, tin ku phaengin to eki som si yuk yukngin to kakhangin tan mosop ko mi karu tin to yan salngin tin ta Got men, ma kuli yau u enah tin ngiseng men tumen koh po ma po wo hi maan maan hambip takut to mara tihngin tin auluungin e ta Got men u Sipsip Asus kut tumen.

Ma yau tin koh po men men kuin nginan si kokyok kokyok li kut; ma po ku nhing to pi mhangin wa to pi luk kara ewin akomen, men po tin uluu li ken nginan enih u enun, u po tin in akani e wa tosukngin epo li yan men tumen kha men.
Hoo mingin tin ku po tin auluungin e ta Got men wuh won maikngin li maran nomalak epon men wala tumen; po tin kasum wungin sinsin tin ta Got men u wo phepngin tin pit wo a-Yesus men tumen kha imen.

Li klet ma nga hul wut po ta si pit ili wet pi men sakal me ko ta ngo taku, “E pan wungin tin i ti, ‘Homani ma li kut men emhong tin ta Got men ko po po tin huu mi yang tin Akono men.’” Kuru Emiun Auluungin sakal ti, “Wai, kuma po nhing epo kumang tin po wuh i men, ma kumang tin po ning i kho kut men men ku pet kira po.”

Li klet ma nga tuh kyok ma nga ion hingis pon eun ta, ma po ta maran ken Wiru Po Tunus men ung wo hingis tin imen, ma moolngin tin ta po sinkhaung men golan ta ung mhin u po wili yang men yang kasum sarip to ngin hut kuluk ta.

Li klet ma tihngin ta maksin me pol mi mang auluungin ma yang wut pit hambip ma yang yuk li epo sun tin ung wo hingis men taku, “E psik sarip tap tin hut kuluk men ko e kaklat endara aiingin, epo elup tin ku e kaklat endara aiingin ton men si kut, epo endara aiingin tin nuk mulus men mumuru kut.”
Tumen ma yang tin ung wo hingis men payuh sarip tin hut kuluk men mili wo mulus, ma endara aiingin tin nuk wo mulus men kaklatngin kut.
Kut ma tihngin ta kyok me pol mi mang auluungin tin ung wet pi men, men kasum sarip tin hut kuluk e to ngin men ta kyok kut tumen.

Kuru tihngin ta maksin me pol wet suyung, men wa emhong epon ku maran pit wo yau, ma yang wut pit hambip ma yang yuk li epo sun tin kasum sarip tin to ngin e hut kuluk men taku, “E wa sarip tin to ngin tap men ma e kaklat wain enun tin wa ilio angan e kuk e li li put elik tin los po mulus men, epo wain enun tin tan men memhek koyang kut.”

Tumen ma tihngin payuh sarip tan tin hut kuluk men mili yanga mulus ma yang palu wain enun tin ta pi mulus men li pit, ma yang whis i ko mi pi won enahan tin nhum men tin epo wain enun paplot nginan e los po min kakhat sun tin ta Got men.

Ma wain enun men paplotngin mi pi won enahan tin ung wetpo enunu tin baul pi men, ma engik me pol mi pi won tin po paplot wain min men ma num si pol ta watngin tin kasum hos mhin men, ma saa mili mili ma hawus yanga mulus mosop li pol kilomita khum khum khaut miuk (300).

Li klet ma nga ion tosukngin ta maksin si wet pi, men nhum u awhik wo nginan kut tumen, men tihngin khaut ponwal me sup tin nuk to won maikngin khaut ponwal me sup tin me sulung weh men kha men, epo won maikngin tin imen kha min kakhat sun tin ta Got men pyu pongin epon weh men.

Ma nga ion endara ta maran ken wiu glasan mi kleng kleng ta men nau wal to yau, ma po tin nomnga hut li ken nginan enih, u hut li enun u epo tosukngin tan u epo tiikngin tin pok put ya li men kut tumen, men nuk yanga wiu tin mi kleng kleng men, ma po then then kasum gita tin ingut tunus e Got wai si ta po men.

Ma po lut lutngin tin ta a-Moses tin kum ta Got men u lutngin tin ta Sipsip Asus men kut tumen, ma po lut taku, “Aluuh, Got, Ngon tin Akono e Apalukngin weh men, kumang tin e ning i men men nunhum u awhik wo nginan kut tumen! Wungin tap men sisiik u anuh tumen, ngon tin Sinkhaung ta po tin auluungin tap men!

Aluuh, Ngon tin Akono men, ara weh ku in engun epon tin ku lem pit wo ngon ma wa yap si men? Epo misap kha auluungin men. Epo po mosop tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men ku me powut hi ko suul marap, epo wungin tap tin e ples i sisiik men men si in pi mlaeng kho kut.”
Li klet ma mi khi wungin tin imen nga tuh kyok, ih, mang auluungin tin ta Got men tin auselan e Got pok put wungin tan min e ung wet pi tin ta Got men won pit.

Ma mang auluungin tin imen men tihngin tin khaut ponwal me sup e kasum won maikngin tin khaut ponwal me sup men yok min ma me pol, men piphi moolngin pon turunus e po yil u po engil engil kut tumen, kuru po wat po engai hi epo watngin golan kara kut tumen.

Kut ma li ken nginan tin mara hi to tunusngin e khaut mnal men ta si wa kambuyu golan tin khaut ponwal me sup e min kakhat sun tin ta Got tin sindak in kokyok kokyok men kol min men si ta tihngin tin khaut ponwal me sup men.

Ma mang tin auluungin men yau kuin nginan si kol min, men me epo moolngin ta Got u emhong ta yang kut tumen, ma po ta men ku li sup mi mang auluungin angan akomen li pol minan tin won maikngin tin ponwal me sup e tihngin tin ponwal me sup men kasum i men pyu pongin wet.

Li klet ma nga hul wut po ta si wut pit hambip, men me pol mi mang auluungin, ma sakal li epo tihngin tin khaut ponwal me sup men taku, “Wom lu yuk yuk kambuyu tin golan e khaut ponwal me sup e to min kakhat sun tin ta Got men li ko wo mulus.”

Tumen ma tihngin tin muk men yok li yuk yuk kambuyu tin tan men li ko wo mulus, ma elak tin mara wa wa e po wo hi maan maan takut ton men ta si ung e li li po po masang to sun wala tin tosukngin ta li ken nginan enih nuk po hi u po powut hi ko suul to mara enu li men kut tumen.

Li klet ma tihngin tin me ponwal angan men li yuk yuk kambuyu tin tan men li ko mi wiu, ma wiu phae ko min enghikan ken po ta tin hun kho men enghikan men; ma endara mosop tin maran to tunusngin e kuk mi wiu men huu.
Li klet ma tihngin tin me miuk angan men li yuk yuk kambuyu tin tan men li ko put eki put ewun u maran tumen tin nuk e li li men, ma eki mosop paphae ko min enghikan.

Kut ma nga hul tihngin tin maran pit wo eki tin nuk e li li men men wo taku, “Aluuh, ngon tin Akono men, tin in homani u kho u ku iso in kut tumen, wungin tap men siik, epo e ples wungin tin imen kho kut.
Epo po men lek sun tin auluungin u pokngin tumen ma po enghik a hi yuk yuk ko, ma e wa enghik si ta po kuma po um i. Epo wungin tin imen men emhut sun tin po ning i men siik weh ako.”
Ti ma nga hul wut po ta maksin men sakal hang suyung taku, “Wai, ngon tin Akono e Got tin Apalukngin weh men, wungin tin e ples i men men irawin u siik tumen mosop.”
Li klet ma tihngin tin me mnal angan men li yuk yuk kambuyu tin tan men li ko mara sinang, ma sinang wa emhong epon ku koh po tunus ken yau men.
Ma sinang koh po tunus hambip takut, ma po ton mi Got yan tin in to emhong tin ku yang maran pit wo won maikngin tin mosop imen; si po ku phae mi hi kuma po wa yang yan si akomen.

Li klet ma tihngin tin me eip angan men li yuk yuk kambuyu tin tan men li ko wo ehus tin ta li ken nginan enih tin sinkhaung men, ma enunu tin ta li ken nginan enih men men pi mi ku ko awhus i; ma po tunus wo hi maan maan takut ma po kuk e ngi hi kakla po mamai hi.
Ma po ton mi Got tin in ili wet pi men epon tin po wo hi maan maan u po wo hi sal sal men kut tumen, si po ku phae mi hi epo wungin tin po ning i men akomen.

Li klet ma tihngin tin me ta me sup angan men li yuk yuk kambuyu tin tan men li ko put eki put ewun Yupretis tin nhum men, ma eki mlus mosop li kuma soput ta po tin sinkhaung e api sinang me si men ku hihingin nuk.
Ma nga ion emiun lengwal khaut miuk, men maran ken emko men, men me pol wo tamha, u me pol wo li ken nginan enih, u me pol wo pokngin tin torokngin men kut tumen.

Epo emiun tin imen men tin lenglengwal e ning ning tosukngin maran kiring kiring men, tin li pol epo po tin sinkhaung e hi ung e li li wo mulus men u epo po mosop tin ung wo mulus men kut tumen, epon ku palu po tin imen li epo lek walngin tin ta ungunan tin nhum e ta Got tin Apalukngin Weh men.

Wom hul, epo ngo ku yem engun me ken tipngin ta men. Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po ta tin maran wat ma haum tunus men u iso kapu moolngin tin tan men tunus kut tumen, epon akuli po tin imen wiwil ma muk muk li yanga pi ma po masang to sun wala ion manngin tan.”
Kut si emiun tin lengwal men palu po me palu wal pi tin po ira sakalngin ta hi Hibru ma po sikian Armagedon men.

Li klet ma tihngin tin me ponwal me sup angan men li yuk yuk kambuyu tin tan men li ko put pi alilil, ma po ta wut pit hambip me pol mi mang auluungin tin ung ili wet pi men, men me pol hang ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men, men sakal taku, “Men pyu pongin kut khae.”
Kut ma ingutngin kara si u pi kuklung u memlengin u papat kut tumen; kuru pi kin nhum ta si, men ku pi kin hambip u nhum ta tumen ta si kho minan tin po tunus ko kuk wo mulus ma me men akomen.

Ma pi tin nhum men pal mingin ko tingit miuk, u pi nunhum tin ta po tin hi khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men kukyum ko kut tumen. Ma Got tulun hu pit po pi Babilon ma lasin tan si in to mara yang, kuma yang wa karu tin to wain tin los po min kakhat sun tin ngeng ngeng weh e ta yang men si ta wut ma wut um i.
Kut ma pi po nemut mut mosop mhup ma li kis kis, kuru pi po emian mosop men ku po pon tan kyok akomen kut tumen.

Ma pi yung enahan nunhum me ko wet pi ma ko lek po tunus, epo pi yung tin imen psit psit then then men maikngin tan ken kilo khum mnal u eip me nuk wo sun (45) wa tumen. Ma po tunus ton mi Got, sinsin epo pi yung tin enahan e lek po men, epo won maikngin tin imen men nhum weh.

Li klet ma tihngin tin ponwal me sup e kana wal kambuyu tin ponwal me sup men ta me sakal ta ngo taku, “E mu, nga suk marap epo mumhek mingin tin ku si epo wut tin yan nhum to elwanngin men tin ung put eki tin munuman men,
tin po tin sinkhaung e hi ung e li li wo mulus men ning wungin elwanngin ton, kuru po mosop tin ung wo mulus men um wain tin tan e epo elwanngin men ma po mara hihi hi epon men kut tumen.”

Tumen ma tihngin wa ngo li mi Emiun Auluungin li pi tin tahunggu men. Ma nga ion wut wala ta men ung wo li ken nginan enih po mhee ta, men wungin tin ton mi Got men tang nuk po li ken nginan, kuru mhin khaut ponwal me sup u imi eip ponwal ung e li li mhi li kut tumen.

Ma wut tin wala imen phi moolngin po mhee ama u po mhee weh kut tumen, ma wut mool epo gol u enah maran kiring kiring tin pon turunus e po ngel epon men u eyuk enun tin pho mi sun e po ngel epon men kara kut tumen, ma wut kasum karu golan ta, men wungin maran kiring kiring tin hies to mara Got e wungin min lengwal tin wut elwan ton men kol min.

Ma mara wut tin awang men yan ta panngin nuk ti, “Wungin kaunngin, Babilon tin Yan Pos men, tin toni po wala mosop tin ning elwanngin nginangan men u wungin maran kiring kiring tin hies to mara Got men kut tumen.”
Ma nga ion wut men um po tin auluungin e ta Got men u po tin pok put wungin ta a-Yesus men kut tumen kalolwa hi hambip ma wut maran hih hih epon. Ma nga ion i, men teretngin nhum ta wa ngo.

Takuma tihngin ko wo ta ngo ti, “Tua ma e teret won? Ngo ku pok ngon epo wungin kaunngin tin ta wut tin wala imen u epo li ken nginan enih tin lat wut e mhin khaut ponwal me sup u imi eip ponwal tumen sinsin.

Li ken nginan enih tin e ion i men, men in kho si homani ma kis, si kuli iso si mi nahu tin siin om men ma li epo mumhek mingin tin sindak men. Ma po tin ung wo mulus men, tin ya hi ku panngin nuk som mi kisang tin epo Tunusngin men ewo maran tin mulus iso pho pongin som men, ku ion li ken nginan enih tin in kho si homani ma kis, takuli sulung men kyok si in men, men ku po whik won.
Po ta tin mhin ekngin nuk min men wala ti: li mhin tin khaut ponwal me sup imen men los po pi emian khaut ponwal me sup tin wut tin wala men ung epon men.
Kuru po sinkhaung khaut ponwal me sup kuk, men po ta hi khaut eip poplong ko kho kut, ta men iso in, u tin ta maksin men ku kho me som. Ma yang ku me, men ku yang in put monlo long engun.

Ma li ken nginan enih tin in kho si kis homani men men maksin si sinkhaung tin me miuk me sup men, takuma men then to po sinkhaung tin khaut ponwal me sup men, ma kuli iso li epo mumhek mingin tin sindak men.

U imi eip ponwal tin e ion i men men los po po sinkhaung eip ponwal tin ku wa enunu ta hi kho som, si kuli po wa emhong to sinang maran then ta engun kuma po si sinkhaung to li ken nginan tin enih men.
Po tin sinkhaung imen mi hi then, ma po ku wa kakhangin ta hi u emhong ta hi kut tumen si ta li ken nginan tin enih men.

Po tin sinkhaung imen ku hi sewut Sipsip Asus, ma Sipsip Asus men ku apalukngin hut po, epo yang men Akono ta po akono, u Sinkhaung ta po sinkhaung kut tumen; ma po tin kuk to yang men Got yuk hi, u yang won ung wo hi, u po men pit nhing to wo phepngin ta hi kut tumen.”

Kuru tihngin iso sakal ta ngo taku, “Si eki munuman tin e ion i men, tin wut tin wala e ning elwanngin nginangan men ung put men, men los po po masang to sun wala tin lawin ta hi siin then, u po wa ilio angan kara, u po tin khuuk wal ta hi weh, u po tin sakal ta hi weh men kut tumen tin hi ung e li li wo mulus men.

Ma imi tin khaut eip ponwal tin e ion i ung e li li mhi li ken nginan tin enih men ku mi hi lel wut tin elwan men, ma po mumhek mi wut ma po ning i ma wut wiwil, ma po ii wut emalin u po sut wut epo yau kut tumen.

Epo Got wa wungin ko nuk mi po tin sinkhaung men epon ku po ning wungin tin yang nana i ta min kho men, tin ku po mi hi then ma po wa enunu ta hi si ta li ken nginan tin enih men, li pol minan tin ku sakalngin mosop tin me pol mi wo Got men ku si pyu pongin weh men.
Kuru wut tin wala e ion i men men los po pi nhum tin yan pos e maran pit wo po tin sinkhaung e hi ung e li li wo mulus men kut tumen.”
Kut si mi khi wungin tin imen nga ion tihngin ta kyok, men me ko wet pi to emhong nhum, ma moolngin tin tan men men mha ko nuk wo mulus takut.

Ma yang wut pit hambip ma yang sakal taku, “Pi Babilon tin yan pos men men plong ko kho kut, men plong ko kho kut, ma men si pi ta tin emiun tin ek ek mara po nginangan men kuk epon men, u emiun lengwal mosop li kan kanngin pit epon, u lahembengin tin emon tin lengwal weh e amutngin men mosop li kan kanngin pit min men kut tumen.

Epo po mosop tin ung e khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men um wain tin ta wut e ning i ma po ewhat hi siwil si epon ku ning elwanngin to wut men, u po tin sinkhaung e hi ung e li li wo mulus men ning elwanngin to wut, u po tin kum anaum e hi ung e li li wo mulus men si wa miranngin ta hi hambip epo miranngin tin ta wut e wut sasayih ton e hambip weh men kut tumen.”

Kut si nga hul wut po ta maksin men me ko wet pi ma sakal taku, “Wom masang to sun wala tin ta ngo men, wom mang ta wut tin imen si wom mu pol, epon akuli lasin ta wut los wom to wut, epon akuli wom wa won maikngin tin ku wut mumhek mingin epon men maksin kut tumen.
Epo lasin ta wut iso halung pongin weh si pol ili wet pi, ma Got tulun hu wungin lengwal tin ta wut men kho kut.

Wom men ku ning wungin emhut sun si ta wut ken sun tin wut ning i epo wom men, men ku wom phae wungin kyok si epo wut ira kaingin tin wut ning i epo wom men kuru kaingin ta kyok si po sun kut tumen; karu tin wut tuon phae wain ko min men, men ku wom phae wain ta wut kyok ko min, kuru kaingin ta kyok si po sun kut tumen.

Kaingin tin wut tuon wai si pit ma sasayih to miranngin tan hambip men, kha ku wom iran kai wal ma wom wa won maanngin to min urut i ko po wut men; epo wut wo ta min taku, ‘Ngo men ung ken po wala tin lamit men ta, si ngo ku wamuh, ma nga pon ta min urut i ta akomen,’ ti.

Wungin sinsin tin imen kha kuli won maikngin si ta wut mi ungunan then ta engun men, men hunngin u min urut i u elwip kut tumen. Ma kuli wut sutngin epo yau tin ku suuk sii wut weh men, epo Got tin Akono e ku ples wungin ta wut men men apalukngin takut.

Ma po tin sinkhaung e hi ung e li li wo mulus men, tin kho ma ning elwanngin to wut ma sasayih to wut to miranngin ta hi tin hambip weh men, men ku tirinis u hahau amusukngin epo wut minan tin po ion yau kuin nginan tin yau ii wut ma kuldup si men,

men ku po li nuk hin long, epon tin lemngin wa po epo mumhek mingin tin si ta wut men, ma po sakal taku, “Aluuh, aluuh, ngon tin Babilon e yap pos u apalukngin kut tumen, epo sinang maran then ta kha mumhek mingin si tap epon men.”
Kuru po tin kum anaum e hi ung e li li wo mulus men ku tirinis u mi hi urut hi epo wut kut tumen, epo homani ma po ta ku me kul nomokong tin ta po men kyok akomen,

men nemokong tin golan u silwa an u enah maran kiring kiring tin po ngel sun epon men u eyuk enun tin pho mi sun e po ngel epon men kut tumen, kuru mulu tin pon eun e wia weh men, u mulu kara maksin tin pon mhee ama men, u mulu tin pon engil engil u tin pon mhee men kut tumen. Kuru sa maran kiring kiring tin ipek tunus men, u endara maran kiring kiring tin po klas i epo yahong tin ta elepen men, u endara maran kiring kiring tin po ning i epo sa tin po ngel sun epon ewin men, u epo bras, u aen, u enah tin po kal e pon urut mi al men kut tumen;

kuru sinamon u endara tin kuin nginan ipek tunus men, u nowhong tin ipek tunus men u sa sut tin ipek tunus men, u wain u sa olip sut u plaua tin aiingin men, u wit ihun u bulmakau u sipsip u hos u karis tin epo lek walngin men u po tunus emkusi hi u enu hi kut tumen.

Sa enun tin memhek e marap nes i kho men men kis kis silang ngon kho kut, u endara tin e iini tuleng weh men u tin pon engil engil e mool epon men kut tumen moyong li kuk hin epo ngon kho kut, ma ngon ku pon tan kyok angan akomen.”

Po tin kum anaum epo endara tin mosop imen, tin wa miranngin ta hi hang wut men, men kuli nuk hin long epon tin lemngin wa po epo won maanngin nhum takut tin si ta wut men, ma po tirinis u po mi hi urut hi kut tumen,

ma po sakal taku, “Aluuh, aluuh, pi Babilon tin yan pos men, tin kho ma phi moolngin tin tunus e pon eun men u tin pon mhee ama men, u tin po mhee weh men tumen, u men mool epo gol u enah maran kiring kiring tin po ngel sun epon men, u eyuk enun tin pho mi sun e po ngel epon men kut tumen,

epo sinang maran then ta engun kha nomokong tin ta wut e hambip men mosop ko om epon men.” Kuru po mosop tin mara hi pit wo imut luul to nginan men u po mosop tin kuk e li wo imut men, u po mosop tin kuk e kum wo imut men, u po mosop tin esini e hi tih endara anaum li yanga wiu men kut tumen, li nuk hin long epo pi,
ma po ion yau tin ii wut men kuin nginan si, ma po yuk hambip ma po sakal taku, “Pi tin akani weh e ku yan pos ken sun tin ikop?”

Ti ma po ko mot mot nokokwa si po tep i si mhi hi, ma po tirinis u po mi hi urut hi, ma po yuk si taku, “Aluuh, aluuh, pi tin yan pos takut men, tin po mosop tin imut ta hi kuk e mili yanga wiu men si mimiran epo miranngin tin ta wut men, epo sinang maran then ta misan kha wut mumhek mingin epon men!
Aluuh, ngon tin wet pi men u wom tin paengin u pokngin tumen tin auluungin men, wom men ku mi wom keh keh, epo Got ples wungin ta wut emhut sun tin wut ning i lengwal epo wom men kho kut!”

Kut ma tihngin apalukngin ta me lat enah ta si, men kai enah tin po tut wit epon men nhum ta, si yang psik i ko mi wiu ma yang sakal taku, “Wungin amhees tin tumen kha ku pi Babilon tin yan pos men psikngin ko epon men, ma kuli po pon tan kyok angan akomen.

Ma ingutngin ta po tin sok sok gita men u ta po tin lulut nginangan men, u ta po tin so so lawi nginangan men, u ta po tin so so kiyak nginangan men kut tumen, men ku hulngin mi enunu tin tap men angan ta kyok akomen. Kuru po tin nut kumang nginangan e kumang ta hi then then weh men ku po pon tan ta in mi ngon kyok akomen, u ingutngin ta enah tin po tut wit ihun epon men, ku po hul i mi ngon kyok akomen kut tumen.

Kuru esul tin ngin ngin men ku ta kyok ung pi tap akomen, u po masang tin ku enangin homan men u po wala tin enangin homan men tumen, men ku po hul wut sun mi enunu tin tap men angan ta kyok akomen kut tumen. Epo kho men po tin tap e kum anaum men ya hi pos mi sun kara tin ung wo mulus men, epo wamngin tin tap men kha po mosop tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men mara hi ek ek marangin epon men.
Kuru pi Babilon men enghik tin ta po tin pokngin men u tin ta po tin auluungin men, u tin ta po tin kara maksin e po lek hi ko huu wo mulus men tumen kha po pon tan nuk min men kut tumen.”

Kut si mi khi wungin tin imen nga hul po wa ilio angan maran min nhum ta wut hi pit pit hambip ili wet pi, ma po sakal taku, “Sam samngin men ku ta yang tin Akono men! Wungin tin po palolongin epon men, u moolngin u yan pos, u kakhangin kut tumen, men ta yang tin Akono e Got ta it men misan!

Epo wungin ples nginan tin tan men men irawin u siik kut tumen; epo yang men ples wungin ta wut tin wala e yan pos e ning elwanngin men, tin mhuk mi po tin ung wo mulus men epo elwanngin tin tan men, ma yang wa wungin emhut sun tin ta wut men, tin wut ning i ma po tin kum ta yang men kalolwa hi yuk yuk ko men.”
Kut ma po sakal angan ta kyok taku, “Sam samngin men ku ta yang tin Akono men! Epo yau tin ii wut men kuin nginan pit e tup si kokyok kokyok li kut!”

Kut ma po tin akokono e khum ponwal u mnal tumen (24) u li ken nginan tin mara hi to tunusngin e khaut mnal men tumen poplong ko mara hi ko ma po uluu Got tin ung wo ehus tin ta yang tin sinkhaung men, ma po yuk taku, “Irawin! Sam samngin men ku ta yang tin Akono men weh!”

Li klet ma wut po ta me pol hang ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men, men sakal taku, “Wom men ku sam sam Got weh, wom mosop tin kum ta yang u tin uluu yang men kut tumen, aku, taku ya wom om wa ya wom pos!”

Kut ma nga hul ingutngin ta men ingut ken po tin wa ilio angan maran min nhum ta men u ken eki nhum ta tin sut ma nuk e uu men u ken pi tin kuklung mi maik men tumen, men wut pit taku, “Sam samngin men ku ta yang tin Akono men weh! Epo yang tin Akono e Got tin Apalukngin Weh men si sinkhaung weh kut!
It men ku mi it keh keh, men ku mi it keh keh weh ma it wa yang yan si, epo elup tin ta Sipsip Asus tin ku yang enangin epon men kho si kut, ma titien tuon men hihi i in kut.”
Ma po wa moolngin tin tunus e pon yil weh u pon engil engil men tumen si ta wut kuma wut mool epon, epo moolngin tin tunus imen los po wungin tin sisiik e ta po tin auluungin men.

Li klet ma tihngin ko wo ta ngo taku, “E pan wungin ta taku, ‘Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin yukngin me epo kakaomngin tin epo enanginngin tin ta Sipsip Asus men.’” Kut ma yang ko sakal ko pit po sun si ta ngo kyok taku, “Wungin tin irawin weh e ta Got men kha imen.”

Ti ma nga plong ko nuk sii khi tihngin ma nga taku uluu yang. Takuma yang ko wo ta ngo taku, “Si e in aku e ning i tumen asin, epo ngo men tin kum ken ngon men u ken ehuro wom tin kasum wungin tin po pok put ta a-Yesus men tumen kha iyi. Si ngon men ku uluu Got weh! Epo wungin tin po pok put ta a-Yesus men kha emiun tin pong si po pokngin ma po pok put sakalngin men.”

Li klet ma nga ion wet pi min pok pit, ih, hos pon eun ta ma yang tin ung won men po sikian e to wungin tin ira sakalngin tan nginangan u to wungin anuh misan men kut tumen, ma wungin siik kha yang ples wungin ma yang sewut po ma hi lek wal epon men.
Yang maran ken yau tin ngin ngin men, u moolngin tin ta po tin sinkhaung men munuman ung mhi yang kut tumen. Ma yang yan panngin nuk pon tuon, men ku po ta pon tan akomen, si yang misan.
Ma yang phi moolngin tin nuk po sun men ta men pamutngin ko mi enghik, ma yang yan men “A-Sakalngin ta Got.”
Ma po nolo tin kuk wet pi men sup mi moolngin tin tunus e pon pon eun u pon yil yil weh men tumen, ma po ung e li li wo hos tin pon pon eun men ma po ira yang li.

Ma bainat tongin ta me pol mi wo yang epon kumali yang lek po mosop tin ung e khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men epon. Ma yang tuon men ku maran pit wo po ken po ta tin maran pit wo sipsip men to kamtukngin aenan ta men. Ma yang tuon khin paplot wain enun tin epo min kakhat sun tin amhees weh e ta Got tin Apalukngin Weh men.
Ma moolngin tin yang phini nuk po sun men men uu put luu yang kut tumen men yang yan panngin nuk pon taku, “SINKHAUNG TA PO SINKHAUNG MOSOP U AKONO TA PO AKONO MOSOP.”
Kut ma nga ion tihngin ta men pit mara sinang ma wut pit hambip li epo emon mosop tin yap yap mili wet pi alilil men taku, “Wom mu palu wal epo kakaomngin tin nhum e ta Got men,

kuma wom mu ii po tin sinkhaung men emali hi, u po phuan tin mara hi pit wo po nolo men emali hi, u po tin apalukngin men emali hi u hos munuman emalin u po tin ung e li li wo hos men emali hi u po tin wo hi pias men u po tin kum wo sun engun men u po tin ya hi om men u po tin ya hi pos men kut tumen mosop emali hi.”

Li klet ma nga ion li ken nginan enih u po tin sinkhaung e hi ung e li li wo mulus men u po nolo tin ta hi men kut tumen, men kho me palu wal epon ku sewut yang tin ung wo hos men to po tin ta hi nolo men.

Kut ma po sung sung wo li ken nginan enih to pokngin torokngin tin ning tosukngin maran kiring kiring to mara li ken nginan enih men. Epo tosukngin tin imen kha pokngin torokngin ek ek mi po mosop tin wa tosukngin tin ta li ken nginan enih men nuk po hi ma po uluu li enun men epon men. Ma po whis wulong mara ngong to tunusngin li ko mi ehung tin yauan e enah ngiseng pit e ngin ngin epon men.
Si po tin ta hi kara men lekngin ko huu epo bainat tin me pol wo yang tin ung wo hos men. Ma emon mosop me pa ken kuma hi epo po emali hi si hi mut mut weh.
Li klet ma nga ion tihngin ta men me ko wet pi, men isum endara tin po klas epon e ta nahu tin siin om men u esih po koklong nhum ta pit yanga wilin kut tumen.
Ma tihngin sung wo tamha tin nhum men, tin in launekan kho men, men emiun tin hik put wungin pit wo po nginangan e yan a-Nolongin men, ma tihngin kan kan sun pit to posan khum khum khum ta (1,000);

ma yang psik tamha ko mi nahu tin siin om men, si yang sambal kakaek si eya sun, ma yang wa tosukngin ta ko pon, epon akuli a-Nolongin iso ek ek mi po masang to sun wala tin ung e khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men li pol to elup tin ku posan khum khum khum ta (1,000) tin imen pyu pongin men. Si mi khi wungin tin imen anima yang men ku won pias kara weh put monlo long wet.

Kut si nga ion ehus tin ta po tin sinkhaung men kara nuk, ma po kara nuk e li li won, ma wungin ples nginan wangin sup yanga wili po. Kuru nga ion po tin kaklat wutngin pit mi hi tin pok put wungin ta a-Yesus men u pit mi wungin tin ta Got men kut tumen enu hi, u po tin ku uluu li ken nginan enih wa enun men som u ku wa tosukngin nuk mhi hi tin awang men wa hut wili hi tin wetpon men som men, men si turunus ma si sinkhaung to Krais to posan khum khum khum ta (1,000).

Si po tin hu hu e kara maksin men ku si turunus som weh li pol minan tin kuli posan khum khum khum ta (1,000) tin imen pyu pongin men. Ewo maran tin po tin hu hu kho men ku khek kyok si turunus epon men wala imen.

Taku po ta in mi sun tin hi kekhek kyok si turunus ewo maran men, men emhong tin ta Got men ko pon ma si auluungin kha men. Po tin imen hunngin tin me ponwal angan men ku emhong tan los hi akomen. Awu. Po men ku iso si po tin kum auluungin ta Got u ta Krais men tumen, ma po si sinkhaung to Krais to posan khum khum khum ta (1,000).
Li klet ma posan khum khum khum ta (1,000) tin imen li kut, anima a-Nolongin ku plosngin pi tin yang kan kanngin pit epon men ma won pias,

ma yang li pol kumali ek ek mi po tin ung e khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li hut mulus porilin tin khaut mnal men, men Gok u Magok, kumali yang palu po me kuk then epon ku hi lek wal to po kara, epo po tin imen men tiikngin ta hi ken namak tin nuk suu wiu men.

Ma po li si pol wo mulusngin tin yangae e nhum men ma po baul pi tin po tin auluungin men tekel i men u pi mi enunu tin Got min pit won weh men kut tumen. Takuma yau me ko wet pi hang Got men ma suuk sii po ii nginan li.

Ma emiun tin hik put wungin pit wo po nginangan e ek ek mi po nginangan men psikngin ko mi ehung tin yau u enah tin ngiseng men tumen pit epon men, men pi tin li ken nginan enih u pokngin tin torokngin men tumen kuk epon kut men. Ma po ku kuk e wo hi maan maan to pi mhangin u to pi luk tumen to elup tin ku nuk e lap li kut men.

Li klet ma nga ion ehus ta po tin sinkhaung men pon eun nhum ta, u yang tin ung won men tumen, tin mulus u wet pi tumen mosop mhup li kis kis to maran men, ma pi tin ku mulus u wet pi li nuk epon men ku po pon tan ta ung akomen.

Ma nga ion po tin huu kho men tin ya hi om u ya hi pos men tumen, men si nuk mara Got, ma kisang tin kara men lapngin. Kuru kisang ta maksin men lapngin kut tumen, men Kisang tin epo Tunusngin men. Ma po tin huu kho men wungin ta hi plesngin epo wungin tin panngin nuk mi kisang tin kara men, men plesngin ira wungin tin po ning i kho men.

Ma wiu pau po tin huu mi wiu men me, kuru hunngin, u pi tin ta hunngin men tumen men pau po tin hu hu e kuk epon men maksin me kut tumen. Ma wungin ta po mosop men plesngin ira wungin ta po then then siik.
Li klet ma Hunngin u Pi tin ta hunngin men tumen men whisngin ko mi ehung tin yauan men. Tin imen men hunngin tin me ponwal angan men kha men.
Ma taku po ta ku po pon tan yan panngin nuk mi kisang tin epo tunusngin men som, men ku po psik i ko mi ehung tin yauan men kut.
Li klet ma nga ion wet pi homan ta u mulus homan ta tumen, epo wet pi tin muk men u mulus tin muk men men kis kis kut, u wiu ku maksin nuk tumen akomen.
Ma ngo a-Yon marango kon pi tin auluungin men, men Yerusalem tin homan men, men ung e me ko wet pi hang Got men, men hihingin to moolngin tan ken wut wala ta tin ku enangin titien men.

Ma nga hul wut po ta pit hambip me ko wet pi, ma sakal taku, “Wom hul, mang ausel tin ta Got men ko ung mi po tunus kut, ma yang ku in lunga po. Ma po ku kuk masang to sun wala tin ta yang weh men, u yang tuon ku in lunga po ma Got ta po weh kut tumen.
Ma Got ku luk luk tinisngin mara po mosop li; ma hunngin u min urut i u haungin, kuru won manngin kut tumen men ku mak nuk akomen. Epo endara mosop tin nuk muk men men kis kis kho kut.”
