Li klet ma yang tin ung wo ehus men wo taku, “Wom hul, ngo ku ning endara mosop homan khae.” Kuru yang ko wo kyok si ta ngo taku, “E pan wungin tin imen ko, epo sakalngin tin imen men irawin, ma ku wo wom nuk wet weh.”

Kuru yang wo ta ngo taku, “Men klet kut. Ngo men Alpa u ngo men Omega, tin Sakalngin Hosingin u Sakalngin Pyu Pongin men tumen. Ma po tin huu eki men ku nga naa hi hut emul engun epo eki maran tin epo tunusngin men.
Taku po ta apalukngin hut sun, men ku nga pakuh pon epo endara mosop, ma ngo ku Got tan u men wirukan kut tumen.

Si po tin wo hi to hi men u po tin wo phepngin ta hi om men u po tin ning wungin tin amutngin men, u po tin lek sun ko huu men, u po tin ning elwanngin men, u po tin wam nginangan men, u po tin uluu got tin tororokngin enu hi men u po mosop tin torok nginangan men tumen kuli wa pi ta hi mi ehung tin yau u enah ngiseng tumen ngin ngin pit epon men, men hunngin tin me ponwal angan men kha imen.”

Li klet ma tihngin tin khaut ponwal me sup e kana wal kambuyu tin golan e won maikngin tin khaut ponwal me sup e me sulung epo sun men kol min men ta me wo ta ngo taku, “E mu iyi, ngo ku suk marap epo wut tin wala e ku enangin men, men Sipsip Asus titien.”
Kut ma tihngin wa ngo li mi Emiun li po pi emian nhum nomalak ta, ma tihngin suk marango epo pi tin yan pos men, men Yerusalem tin auluungin men, men kuk e usngin me ko wet pi hang Got men,
ma pi ngin ngin epo moolngin tin ta Got men; ma pi mha ken enah pon tunus ta tin po ngel sun epon weh men, men ken enah yaspa men, men mi kleng kleng ken enah tin mi kleng kleng weh men.

Kuru enunu nhum nomalak ta baul i, men sowon khaut eip ponwal u ponwal tumen pit e li li put, ma tihngin khaut eip ponwal u ponwal tumen nuk e li li mara sowon, ma po ya hi kara panngin nuk wo sowon then then, men ya po tin khaut eip ponwal u ponwal tumen tin yau a po siin ta hi then then weh e me mi po tin khuuknginin tin ta a-Israel men:
sowon khaut miuk nuk li mara naeng angan, u khaut miuk nuk li esaul angan, u khaut miuk nuk li nekip siin angan, u khaut miuk nuk li solong siin angan kut tumen.

Ma enunu tin baul pi men siin ko po enah khaut eip ponwal u ponwal me nuk wo sun tumen, ma po enah then then men po tin paengin ta Sipsip Asus e khaut eip ponwal u ponwal tumen ya hi panngin nuk e li li pon.
Ma tihngin tin pit e sakal ta ngo men in to kaingin golan ta tin ku yang kai pi u sowon tin pit e li li men u enunu tumen epon men.

Ma pi ko ung siin emol mnal, ma hut li pol hut u porilin ta li pol porilin ta kyok tumen men kai wal misan. Ma tihngin kai pi epo kaingin, men kilomita khaut khum khum khum ponwal u khum khum ponwal tumen (2,200), men nomalak tan, u nhum tan u nomalak tan tin in ti si men tumen men kai wal.

Kuru yang kai enunu tin ta pi men, men kaingin tan khaut khum khum ta u khum mnal u mnal tumen (144), men ira kaingin tin ta po tunus wili hi tin si waut men li pol wili hi pon pon men kha tihngin kai pi epon men.
Ma enunu men ningngin epo enah yaspa, si pi men ningngin epo gol misan, men pon engil engil weh ken glas men.

Ma enah tin po ning pi siin si won men po pa mool i epo enah tin po ngel wal pit min e maran kiring kiring men: enah tin ung pi siin emol tin muk men men enah yaspa, si tin me ponwal angan men men enah sapaia, u tin me miuk angan men men enah salsedoni, u tin me mnal angan men men enah emeral,

u tin me eip angan men men enah sadonikis, u tin me ta me sup angan men men enah konilian, u tin me ponwal me sup angan men men enah krisolait, u tin me miuk me sup angan men men enah beril, u tin me mnal me sup angan men men enah topas, u tin me khum ta men men enah krisopres, u tin me khum ta u ta me nuk wo sun tumen men enah haiasin, u tin me khum ta u ponwal tumen men men enah ametis tumen.

Ma sowon tin khaut eip ponwal u ponwal tumen men eyuk enun tin po ngel wal pit min men then then kuk e li li maran, ma sowon then then men ningngin epo eyuk enun tingit ta, u soput tin nhum e nuk emin men men ningngin epo gol misan kut tumen, men pon engil engil weh ken glas men.
Takuma ngo ku ion mang auluungin ta ku ung epon akomen, epo Got tin Akono e Apalukngin weh men u Sipsip Asus tumen kha mang auluungin tin ta pi men.
Ma pi ku hing wo sinang wa namih tumen ku pal nuk mara pi akomen, epo moolngin tin ta Got men pal nuk mi pi kut, u Sipsip Asus kut kha esulan ta pi men kut tumen.

Ma po tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men, tin palolongin kut men, ku kuk e muk muk mi esul tin imen, ma po tin sinkhaung e hi ung e li li wo mulus men ku wa moolngin u endara tin po ya hi pos ton men tumen me sup mi pi tin imen.
Ma ungunan ta men ku po sambal si mara sowon angan akomen, epo pi tin imen ku luk ewin akomen.
Ma po ku kot moolngin u endara tin po tin khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men ya hi ton men tumen me sup mi pi tin imen.

Si endara tin amiron nginan engun men, u endara tin ning i ma wungin hies to mara Got men, u torokngin tumen ku ta me sup mi pi angan akomen. Awu. Po tin ya hi panngin nuk mi kisang tin epo Tunusngin e ta Sipsip Asus men misa hi kha ku li sup men.

Li klet ma tihngin suk marango epo eki put ewun ta tin eki tin epo tunusngin men misan nuk epon men, men min kleng kleng weh ken glas tin mi kleng weh men, men me pol hang ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men u ta Sipsip Asus kut tumen.

Kuru soput tin nhum e nuk emin pi men, eki porilin ta u porilin ta, men sa tin epo tunusngin men nuk iran, men enun maran kiring kiring khaut eip ponwal u ponwal tumen, men sa then then enun to namih then then tin ung e li men. Ma sa kiin men epon ku mimlis saihngin ta po tin ung e khuuk wal ta hi weh e hi ung e li li wo mulus men.
Si ngil ngilngin tin ta Got men ku maksin in akomen, ma ehus tin ta Got tin sinkhaung men u ta Sipsip Asus tumen ku ung pi tin imen, ma po tin kum ta yang men ku kuk e kum auluungin ta yang epon.
Ma po ku mara hi whus po yang maran, ma yang yan men ku nuk mhi po tin awang men.

Ma pi tin imen men ku luk kyok ewin akomen, wa po ku hing wo esul wa sinang wa tumen tin ku pal men kyok akomen. Awu. Epo Got tin Akono men ku mha ko nuk po po. Ma po ku si sinkhaung ma po mara hi pit wo sun to elup tin ku nuk e lap li kut men.

Kut ma tihngin wo ta ngo taku, “Wungin tin imen ku po wo hi nuk wet weh, epon men irawin weh ako. Epo Got tin Akono ta po tin pokngin tin auluungin men tih tihngin tin tan men epon ku suk mara po tin kum tan men epo wungin tin ku iso si angan men.
Wom hul, ngo men ku me kerek engun! Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin ira sakalngin tin ta Got e pok putngin nuk mi kisang tin iyi.”

Ngo a-Yon kha tin marango nuk po wungin tin imen u nga hul i kut tumen. Ma minan tin nga hul u nga ion i tumen, men nga plong ko nuk sii khi tihngin ma nga taku uluu tihngin tin suk marango epo wungin tin imen.

Takuma tihngin ko wo ta ngo taku, “E in aku e ning i tumen asin. Epo ngo men tin tong kum then men, u po tin ehuro wom e pokngin men, u po mosop tin ira wungin tin nuk mi kisang tin iyi tumen kha it mosop kum then to wal men. Si e uluu Got misan!”
Kuru tihngin wo ta ngo taku, “E ning i aku e sambal ma e kakaek eya wungin kaunngin tin pok putngin e nuk mi kisang tin iyi asin, epo elup maran men me tikayung kut khae.

Po ta tin wungin tan ku siik som men, men ku iso in to wungin tan tin ku siik som men li kut; po ta tin wungin tan lengwal men, men ku iso in to wungin tan tin lengwal men li kut; po ta tin wungin tan siik men, men ku iso in to wungin tan tin siik men li kut; u po ta tin wungin tan auluungin men, men ku iso in to wungin tan tin auluungin men li kut tumen.
Wom hul, ngo men ku me kerek engun, ma talungin tin ta ngo men men ku nga me ton, ma ngo ku wa talungin si ta po then then emhut kumang ta hi weh.
Ngo men Alpa u Omega tumen, tin Sakalngin Hosingin weh u Sakalngin Li Pyu Pongin weh tumen, tin in Muk weh u in Silung weh men tumen.”
Emhong tin ta Got men men ko po po tin ira sakalngin tin ta yang men, kumali po wa emhong epon ku po ii sa tin epo tunusngin men enun, u po li sup mara sowon tin li sup epo pi tin nhum men kut tumen.

Si wetpo enunu men po tin ira wungin lengwal weh men u po tin wam sun men, u po tin ning elwanngin men, u po tin lek sun ko huu men, u po tin wo hi nuk wet got tin tororokngin enu hi men, u po mosop tin mi hi pit pit epon ku ira wungin tin torokngin men tumen kha kuk pi tin imen.

Ngo a-Yesus kha tih tihngin tin ta ngo men kuma tihngin li pok put sakalngin tin mosop iyi si tap, men ku ta palu walngin tin ung e li li men. Ngo men tin si po tin khuuknginin ta a-Dewit men u ngo men tin awheng tin mha weh to pi tin huus king kauk men kut tumen.”

Kut ma Emiun u Sipsip Asus titien kut tumen sakal taku, “E muh.” Kuru po ta tin hul wungin tin imen ku wo taku, “E muh,” kut tumen. Kuru po ta tin hun eki men ku me kut tumen. Po ta tin in akani e min epon men, men ku me wa eki tin epo tunusngin men hut emul engun.

Epo nga pok put wungin si ta po mosop tin hul wungin kaunngin tin pok putngin e nuk mi kisang tin iyi, epon taku po ta wa wungin kara ko po sun tin iyi, men kuli Got wa won maikngin tin pok putngin mi kisang tin iyi ko pon maksin kut tumen.

U taku po ta klok wungin tin pok putngin e nuk mi kisang tin iyi put ta li, men kuli Got klok talungin tan tin nuk mi Kisang tin epo Tunusngin men, u mi pi tin nhum e auluungin men, u mi endara mosop tin panngin nuk mi kisang tin iyi kut tumen li.
Yang tin pok put sakalngin epo wungin tin mosop imen wo taku, “Wai, ngo ku me kerek engun ako.” Irawin. Wai, Yesus, Ngon tin Akono men, ngon men ku muh!
Nanaangin tin ta a-Yesus Krais tin Akono ta it men men ku in to wom mosop. Men irawin.
